The Philadelphia Sixers traveled to Wells_Fargo_Center and defeated the Indiana Pacers , 121 - 110 , on Friday evening . The Sixers ( 5 - 4 ) showed grit and resiliency , allowing them to come from behind with an impressive reaction during the second half . Even though the Pacers ( 5 - 4 ) built a 63 - 56 after the first half , Philadelphia stormed back with a 65 - 47 victory during the final 24 minutes . The game was tight throughout most of the contest , but the Sixers pulled away in the fourth quarter and moved over .500 for the first time since 2013 . J.J. Redick and Ben Simmons paved the way for the Sixers in this one . The veteran shooting guard had his best performance since joining Philadelphia in the offseason as he finished with a game - high 31 points ( including 8 - of - 13 from three - point range ) , while Simmons posted the second triple - double of his career . The talented rookie finished the contest with 14 points , 11 assists , 11 rebounds , three blocks , and two steals . On the other end , Victor Oladipo once again led the way for the Pacers with another stellar offensive output of 31 points , seven assists , and five rebounds . Bojan Bogdanovic finished with 21 points . Former Sixer Thaddeus Young chipped in with 15 points and five boards . Myles Turner came off the bench to contribute with 11 points and nine rebounds after a seven - game absence due to a concussion .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the visiting Utah Jazz , 107 - 86 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Monday evening . The 76ers ( 9 - 7 ) were coming off a disappointing defeat against the Golden State Warriors during the weekend , but they bounced back with a dominant effort over a shorthanded Jazz ( 7 - 11 ) team that did n't have key players such as Rudy Gobert and Joe Johnson . Philadelphia was so dominant that they won the first quarter 25 - 15 , and they never looked back . In fact , Philadelphia won all quarters individually in what was the best proof of how dominant they looked . Ben Simmons led the way for the Sixers with a double - double of 27 points and 10 rebounds , as the rookie once again looked like a dominant force on both ends of the court . Joel Embiid also added a double - double of 15 points and 11 boards , but he also chipped in with three assists and two blocks . J.J. Redick added 20 points , and Amir Johnson produced off the bench thanks to eight points , 13 rebounds , and four blocks . On the other hand , Donovan Mitchell led the way for the Jazz , as the rookie once again was the team 's top scoring threat and finished with 17 points , five assists , and four rebounds . Rodney Hood added 13 points off the bench and Ricky Rubio chipped in with 12 points , but also committed six turnovers while dishing out just two assists .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the host Philadelphia 76ers , 101 - 95 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Tuesday evening . The teams traded baskets through the first quarter , with the Kings taking the early advantage , up 30 - 27 after one quarter . The 76ers fired back in the second quarter , outscoring Sacramento 30 - 18 to take a 57 - 48 lead into halftime . The Sixers held on to most of their lead through the third quarter and took a 78 - 71 advantage heading into the final frame . Things took an immediate turn in the fourth , as the Kings mounted a 130 run to take a six - point advantage with just over seven minutes remaining . The Kings were able to hang on the rest of the way and snap a two - game losing streak . Zach Randolph led the way for Sacramento with 27 points on 12 - of - 19 shooting , in 28 minutes . Buddy Hield followed up with 24 points on 9 - of - 19 shooting , in 28 minutes off the bench , while Frank Mason added 16 points in 22 minutes off the bench . The Kings shot 45 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 27 from long range . Meanwhile , Robert Covington was the high - point man for Philly , with 17 points on 5 - of - 19 shooting , in 32 minutes . Ben Simmons finished with 13 points , 12 rebounds , nine assists and three steals , in 32 minutes . Jarryd Bayless chipped in 15 points on 5 - of - 12 shooting , in 26 minutes off the bench . The Sixers shot 42 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 35 from long range . This marked the third straight loss for the Sixers . The 76ers ( 14 - 16 ) will look to get back on track as they play host to the Raptors on Thursday . The Kings ( 10 - 20 ) will be right back in action as they take on the Nets in Brooklyn on Wednesday .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 116 - 94 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Saturday evening . The Sixers ( 22 - 20 ) went into the contest with a built - in advantage , as both Giannis Antetokounmpo ( knee ) and Malcolm Brogdon ( personal ) were ruled out for the visiting Bucks ( 23 - 22 ) since Friday . The pair of prominent absences appeared to give Philadelphia an early boost , as they jumped out to a 37 - 29 first - quarter lead . Milwaukee battled back to outscore their hosts by a 51 - 47 margin over the second and third periods , sending them into the final 12 minutes with a very manageable 84 - 80 deficit . However , a 13 - 2 Philadelphia run over the first 3:34 of the fourth quarter gave the home squad the cushion they needed to notch a comfortable double - digit victory . The Bucks did see all five of their makeshift first unit post double - digit scoring , but they shot a mediocre 40 percent as a team . Meanwhile , the Sixers managed to drain 53 percent of their 85 shot attempts , and without the Greek Freak 's dominant presence down low , they won the rebounding battle , 45 - 35 . As has been the case in previous Antetokounmpo absences , Khris Middleton led the way for the Bucks , posting a 23 - point , 14 - rebound , 10 - assist triple - double that also included one steal . Tony Snell drew the start at power forward and contributed 15 points , four rebounds , one assist and two steals . The backcourt duo of Eric Bledsoe and Sterling Brown generated matching 14 - point efforts , with the former adding three assists , five steals and one block , and the latter supplying two boards and one steal . John Henson rounded out the first unit 's productive night with 11 points , four rebounds , one assist and one block . Marshall Plumlee and Thon Maker co - led the bench with six points apiece . Joel Embiid unsurprisingly paced the Sixers with 29 points , nine rebounds , one assist , two blocks and one steal . Ben Simmons registered 16 points , nine assists , eight rebounds and one steal . Timothe Luwawu-Cabarrot drew the start for Jerryd Bayless ( wrist ) and matched Simmons ' scoring total while also hauling in three rebounds and dishing out a pair of dimes . Dario Saric and Robert Covington contributed 13 points each . Saric also posted seven assists , six rebounds and one steal , while Covington filled out the stat sheet with five boards , three assists , four steals and one block . T.J. McConnell led the second unit with 11 points , seven assists , three rebounds and two steals . The Bucks head back home to face off with the Phoenix Suns on Monday night , while the Sixers hit the road and take on the Memphis Grizzlies on Monday evening as well .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 100 - 82 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Friday evening . The Pelicans ( 28 - 26 ) likely arrived in a City of Brotherly Love still awash in post - Super Bowl euphoria with an itch to get on the court , considering their most recent contest had the distinction of having been `` rained out `` , a true rarity in NBA circles . New_Orleans ' Wednesday showdown with the Indiana Pacers never got started due to a leak in the arena roof at Smoothie King Center , and the fact they 'd therefore been off since Monday may have caused a bit of rustiness . The 76ers ( 27 - 25 ) looked to be playing a couple of notches faster in a prolific first quarter , one that saw them establish a dominant 32 - 14 lead . The visitors appeared to awaken from their slumber in the second , but they still trailed by a 56 - 41 margin heading into intermission . Any hopes of a second - half comeback were dashed in short order early in the third , as Philadelphia opened the period on a 10 - 4 run that got their edge back up over 20 points . It was up to 32 points by the end of the quarter , leading to a comfortable victory . As the final score implied , the Sixers dominated across the stat sheet , particularly in the area of rebounds and assists . The hosts won the battle on the glass by a 58 - 46 margin and dished out 26 dimes to the Pelicans ' 17 . Ian Clark paced the Pelicans with a modest 15 points in 22 minutes off the bench , with the majority of that scoring coming in the latter stages of the fourth quarter . He added one rebound . Anthony Davis followed with 14 points , eight rebounds and one steal . He played 28 minutes and shot 6 - for - 19 from the field . Darius Miller followed with 13 points , six rebounds , one assist and one steal . Nikola Mirotic delivered 12 points , five rebounds and two assists . Jrue Holiday poured in nine points and added one rebound and two blocks . Cheick Diallo turned six points , seven boards and one steal , while Rajon Rondo tallied five points but posted 10 assists and two steals . The Sixers ' balanced first - unit effort was paced by a pair of 24 - point efforts from the frontcourt tandem of Joel Embiid and Dario Saric . The former overcame an ankle issue to also produce 16 rebounds , two steals and one block , while the latter hauled in five boards and dished out four assists . J.J. Redick followed with 15 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . Ben Simmons filled out the stat sheet in impressive fashion with 10 points , nine rebounds , eight assists , three steals and one block . Robert Covington totaled eight points , three rebounds , one assist and two blocks . Justin Anderson matched Covington 's scoring total to lead the bench and also had one rebound and one assist . The Pelicans remain on the road and make the short trip to the Big Apple , where they 'll face off with the Brooklyn Nets on Saturday night . The Sixers remain home and await a visit from the Los_Angeles Clippers on Saturday evening as well .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the visiting Miami Heat , 104 - 102 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Wednesday evening . The Heat got out to a great start on the road , as they closed the first quarter on a 17 - 9 run that gave them a 29 - 20 lead heading into the second quarter . They continued the dominance in the second , as they started off with a 60 run to push their lead to 15 , just two minutes into the quarter . The Heat did not let up and pushed their lead to 62 - 39 by halftime . However , it was a tale of two halves , as the Sixers mounted a comeback in the third quarter , where they chipped away until the trailed by just eight , down 81 - 73 , heading into the final frame . They kept up the pressure into the fourth , and pulled within one point with six minutes left in the game . The Sixers then used a 12 - 5 run to take a six - point lead with 2:25 to go in the game . They were able to hang on the rest of the way en route to their fifth straight win . Ben Simmons tallied a triple - double with 18 points , 12 rebounds 10 assists , along with four steals , in 36 minutes , to lead the 76ers in the win . Dario Saric finished with 19 points , eight rebounds , three assists and one steal , while Marco Belinelli poured in 17 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting , in 27 minutes off the bench , in his debut with Philadelphia . The 76ers shot 42 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 35 from long range . Meanwhile , James Johnson was the high - point man for Miami , with 22 points on 8 - of - 10 shooting , in 21 minutes off the bench . Goran Dragic followed up with 18 points , four assists and three rebounds , while Hassan Whiteside finished with 16 points , 10 rebounds , three blocks and one assist . The Heat shot 46 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 27 from long range . The Heat ( 30 - 28 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Pelicans in New_Orleans on Friday . The 76ers ( 30 - 25 ) will be right back in action , as they take on the Bulls in Chicago on Thursday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 101 - 98 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Tuesday . The Pacers ( 40 - 28 ) and the Sixers ( 36 - 30 ) played a game that went down to the wire and that could have easily gone to overtime , but Philadelphia missed a game - tying three - point attempt that would have extended the game . Indiana jumped to the lead in the first quarter after winning 33 - 23 , but they had to hold off Philadelphia during the rest of the game . The Sixers quickly reduced the lead and they made it a four - point game heading into the fourth quarter , but Indiana managed to survive and secured a massive win against a potential playoff contender . Myles Turner led the way for the Pacers with a strong 25 - point , six - rebound performance . Thaddeus Young added a strong double - double of 19 points and 10 rebounds . Cory Joseph chipped in with 13 points , five rebounds and five assists , while Victor Oladipo contributed 11 points , four rebounds , three assists and two steals . Darren Collison ( 10 points ) and Lance Stephenson ( 11 points ) did a decent job off the bench . The entire starting lineup for Philadelphia scored in double digits , but Joel Embiid paved the way with 29 points , 12 rebounds , four assists and three blocks , but he also committed eight turnovers . Ben Simmons contributed with a strong triple - double of 10 points , 13 rebounds , and 10 dimes . Dario Saric had 18 points , J.J. Redick added 16 , and Robert Covington chipped in with 10 points and 10 boards .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 108 - 94 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Monday . While there were six ties and 11 lead changes in this matchup , Philly really pulled away in the second half . In fact , the Sixers rode a 32 - 14 third quarter to victory , as the Hornets trailed by double figures for the final five minutes of action . The shooting disparity was huge , with the Sixers hitting 45 percent from the field and 41 percent from three - point range while the Hornets connected on 38 percent from the field and 27 percent from long range . Rebounding is what really changed the game , with Philadelphia outrebounding Charlotte , 60 - 40 . Ball movement was also critical , with the Sixers handing out 30 assists while holding the Hornets to 16 assists . The Hornets ( 30 - 41 ) were led by Kemba Walker , as he tallied 24 points , eight rebounds , five assists and three steals . Jeremy Lamb amassed 14 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Willy Hernangomez led the bench with 17 points , three rebounds and two steals . The Sixers ( 39 - 30 ) got another triple - double out of Ben Simmons , as he accumulated 11 points , 12 rebounds , 15 assists and three steals . Joel Embiid totaled 25 points , 19 rebounds and four blocks . Robert Covington finished with 18 points , five rebounds and two assists . Marco Belinelli led the bench with 21 points , two rebounds and two assists . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , with Philly playing host to the Memphis Grizzlies and Charlotte traveling to face the Brooklyn Nets .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 119 - 105 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Wednesday evening . The Grizzlies ( 19 - 52 ) did n't exactly sport the brightest outlook coming into the contest , as a couple of factors stood out as immediate red flags on paper . One was simply motivation - - Memphis ' playoff dreams seemed to crash sometime before the calendar even flipped to 2018 , while the 76ers ( 40 - 30 ) came in looking to improve their already solid No . 6 standing in the Eastern_Conference . The second was the matter of home/road splits . The Grizzlies had prevailed in only five of 33 games away from FedEx Forum prior to Wednesday , so they were already firmly established as a club that simply does n't travel well . Like clockwork , both factors began to manifest shortly after tip - off , as the home squad forged a 26 - 19 first - quarter lead that had grown to 58 - 44 by intermission . When they added 16 more to their advantage with a 41 - point third period , the game was essentially decided . A 36 - point surge by the visitors in the fourth dressed up the final score a bit , but it was yet another rough landing for Memphis away from the comfort of home . The Sixers drained an impressive 55 percent of their 84 attempts and saw six players - - including all five first - unit members - - hit double digits in the scoring column . Wayne Selden led the way for the Grizzlies off the bench with 18 points - - a total he supplemented with four assists and two rebounds . Deyonta Davis delivered a 16 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included two assists over just 21 minutes . Dillon Brooks poured in 14 points and added one assist and one steal . JaMychal Green supplied 14 as well , while also registering seven rebounds and two assists . Mario Chalmers went for 10 points , five assists , four rebounds and one steal . Jarell Martin managed eight points , five rebounds and one assist . Marc Gasol could only muster five points , six rebounds , four assists and one block . Brice Johnson was productive in reserve with nine points , four boards , one assist and one block . The Sixers were paced by a quartet of 15 - point efforts from J.J. Redick , Dario Saric , Robert Covington and Marco Belinelli , with the latter turning in his tally off the bench . Redick added three rebounds and one assist ; Saric accounted for three boards , two assists , one steal and one block ; Covington complemented his scoring with two rebounds , one assist and one steal ; and Belinelli also dished out a pair of assists and recorded one block . Joel Embiid finished with 14 points , seven rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . Ben Simmons filled out the stat sheet with 13 points , nine assists , seven rebounds and two steals . Richaun Holmes posted eight points , five rebounds and two assists in 15 second - unit minutes . The Grizzlies make the quick trip back home to take on the Charlotte Hornets on Thursday evening , while the Sixers also board a plane and land in Central Florida for a Thursday night date with the Orlando Magic .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 120 - 108 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Saturday . The 76ers ( 42 - 30 ) and the Timberwolves ( 42 - 32 ) engaged in a tight battle that saw Philly break free in the first three quarters , and even though Minnesota managed to come back in the fourth , they did n't have enough time to change their fate . Philadelphia jumped to a 32 - 24 lead in the first quarter , but the Wolves made it closer with a 28 - 27 second quarter . The biggest differential here was the third quarter , as the Sixers won that period by 20 points ( 39 - 19 ) and closed it out comfortably in the fourth despite the fact Minny won the final quarter they extended it after winning the next 37 - 22 . Ben Simmons led the way for the Sixers after notching another triple - double of 15 points , 13 assists and 12 rebounds . Joel Embiid was the top scorer after finishing with 19 points , six boards and three blocks , while Dario Saric added 18 points . Robert Covington chipped in with 11 points , while Marco Belinelli contributed 17 points off the bench . Andrew Wiggins chipped in with 16 points and eight rebounds . Karl-Anthony Towns had 15 points with 11 rebounds , and Gorgui Dieng ended with the same stat line . The bench provided quite a spark for Minnesota in this game , as Jamal Crawford ( 13 points ) , Tyus Jones ( 11 points with six assists ) and Marcus Georges-Hunt ( 11 points ) all did a good job off the bench .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Denver Nuggets , 123 - 104 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Monday . Despite the fact that Denver led for the entirety of the first half , Philly came back and cruised to an easy win . In fact , the Sixers turned an eight - point halftime deficit into a 19 - point win by outscoring Denver in the second half , 72 - 45 . Rebounding was the most lopsided statistic , with Philly outrebounding Denver , 54 - 37 . The shooting disparity was also key , with the Sixers hitting 51 percent from the field and 45 percent from three - point range while the Nuggets connected on just 42 percent from the field and 34 percent from long range . A 24 - 10 fastbreak differential and 50 - 40 points in the paint advantage were also huge statistics for Philadelphia . The Nuggets ( 40 - 34 ) were led by Will Barton , as he accrued 25 points and three assists . Jamal Murray totaled 17 points , three rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks . Paul Millsap finished with 16 points , nine rebounds and three assists . Nikola Jokic accumulated 14 points , seven rebounds and four assists while Wilson Chandler provided eight points , eight rebounds and seven assists . The Sixers ( 43 - 30 ) were led by Joel Embiid , as he tallied 20 points 13 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Dario Saric generated 20 points , six rebounds and three assists . Ben Simmons accumulated seven points , 13 rebounds and 11 assists . Markelle Fultz had the best game of his rookie year , providing 10 points , four rebounds and eight assists off the bench . On deck for Denver is another road game against the Toronto Raptors on Tuesday . As for Philly . they play host to the New_York Knicks on Wednesday for their next fixture .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the visiting New_York Knicks , 118 - 101 , at Wells_Fargo_Center on Wednesday evening . The 76ers got out to a good start , with a 10 - point lead midway through the first quarter , where they went on to outscore the Knicks , 37 - 28 . The Sixers expanded their lead to 15 early in the second quarter , but the Knicks rallied back to tie it up at 56 with just under three minutes left in the half , before trailing 67 - 63 at halftime . The Knicks came out strong in the third quarter and kept it close for the first few minutes , however the 76ers took over the remainder of the quarter with a 19 - 8 run , to take a 93 - 80 lead into the fourth . The rest of the game belonged to Philly , as the 76ers cruised to their eighth straight win . Joel Embiid ( face ) was forced to leave the game after a collision with Markelle Fultz , early in the second quarter . Dario Saric led the Sixers with 26 points , 14 rebounds , five assists and two steals , in 35 minutes . Ben Simmons finished with 13 points , 10 assists , eight rebounds and one blocks , while J.J. Redick tallied 21 points , six rebounds , five assists and one steal . The 76ers shot 46 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Michael Beasley was big for the Knicks , with 22 points , eight rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Emmanuel Mudiay also finished with 22 points , and added four rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one steal . Enes Kanter tallied 17 points , 14 rebounds , one assist and one block , while Trey Burke finished with 18 points , six assists , two rebounds and one steal . The Knicks shot 38 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 31 from long range . The Knicks ( 27 - 49 ) will look to avoid a third straight loss , as they play host to the Pistons on Saturday . The 76ers ( 44 - 30 ) take on the Hawks in Atlanta on Friday .
The Philadeplhia 76ers defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 109 - 97 at Wells_Fargo_Center on Sunday . The 76ers ( 50 - 30 ) had a clear advantage on paper in this game against the Mavericks ( 24 - 57 ) , and they did n't have problems to translate that dominance into the score . The Sixers jumped to a 28 - 20 advantage in the first quarter , and they extended it to a 13 - point lead at the half time break . Dallas won the third quarter , 28 - 24 , and it seemed as if they were going to make things tough for Philadelphia down the stretch , but the hosts did n't rattle and closed things out with ease in the fourth . With the win , the Sixers extended their winning streak to 14 games and also hit the 50 - win mark . J.J. Redick was Philadelphia 's top scorer with 18 points and four assists . Ben Simmons had 16 points , but the talented rookie also filled the stat sheet thanks to nine assists , seven rebounds , four steals and one block . Robert Covington made an impact on both ends of the court , thanks to 15 points , 10 rebounds , three assists , Mario Belinelli ( 15 points ) and Ersan Ilyasova ( 11 points , 12 rebounds ) made their presence felt off the bench . Six out of Dallas ' nine players scored in double digits in this one , and the top scorer was Harrison Barnes who finished with 21 points . Dennis Smith Jr. finished with 20 points , 11 assists , five rebounds , three steals and two blocks . Dwight Powell had 13 points and 10 boards . Dorian Finley-Smith and Doug McDermott both netted 10 points in the same exact 26 minutos of action .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the host Milwaukee Bucks , 116 - 97 , at BMO_Harris_Bradley_Center on Friday evening . The Cavs ( 20 ) used a great team effort to overcome a strong attack from the Bucks ( 1 - 1 ) in Milwaukee . Six players scored in double digits for Cleveland , including four of the five starters . The Cavs shot 54 percent from the field , including 42 percent from long range , and went 17 - of - 17 from the foul line . On the other hand , the Bucks hit 46 percent from the field , and 31 percent from long range . LeBron James led the way in the win with 24 points on 10 - of - 16 shooting , eight assists , five rebounds , a block and a steal , in 37 minutes . Kyle Korver chipped in 17 points on 6 - of - 8 shooting , including 5 - of - 6 from long range , in 19 minutes off the bench . Kevin Love totaled 17 points , to go along with 12 rebounds , six assists and two blocks . Meanwhile , Giannis Antetokounmpo did all he could to keep his team in the game , finishing with 34 points , eight assists , eight rebounds , three steals and one block , in 39 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for Milwaukee was Malcolm Brogdon , who finished with 16 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting . The Bucks will be right back in action , as they play host to the Trail_Blazers on Saturday . The Cavaliers will also be in action on Saturday , when they play host to the Magic .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers , 113 - 110 , at BMO_Harris_Bradley_Center on Saturday . Giannis Antetokounmpo scored a career - high 44 points to lead the Bucks ( 2 - 1 ) . He added eight rebounds , four assists and two steals . Antetokounmpo came up big in the waning moments with a steal , a block and a dunk to seal the game in the final 30 seconds . There were 15 ties and 10 lead changes with neither team leading by double - digits . The shooting disparity was the difference , with Milwaukee hitting 53 percent from the field , while holding Portland to just 43 percent . The Bucks also dominated down low , outscoring the Trail_Blazers , 54 - 26 , in the paint . The Blazers ( 2 - 1 ) dropped their first game in the last of a three - game road trip to start the season . Damian Lillard was Portland 's best player , as he accrued 26 points , five rebounds , four assists and four steals . C.J . McCollum also scored 26 points , adding three rebounds and two steals to his stat line . Jusuf Nurkic finished with 17 points , 11 rebounds , three assists and three blocks . Khris Middleton totaled 18 points , six rebounds and three assists for Milwaukee . Tony Snell went 7 - of - 8 from the field to score 17 points . Malcolm Brogdon was the only other Buck in double figures , totaling 13 points , six assists and four steals . On deck for Milwaukee is a home matchup against the Charlotte Hornets . Portland plays its home opener Tuesday against the New_Orleans Pelicans .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 98 - 90 , at BMO_Harris_Bradley_Center on Saturday . Milwaukee came into this game as a sizable favorite , as they left no doubt with this victory . It was closer than expected though , as there were 10 ties and 10 lead changes in total . The key in the game was the turnover differential , as the Bucks forced 23 of them from the Lakers , while committing just 11 of them on their end . Los_Angeles killed themselves at the charity stripe , as they hit just 22 - of - 37 , while Milwaukee went 22 - of - 26 . The first and third quarters were decisive , with Milwaukee outscoring Los_Angeles , 50 - 35 . The Lakers ( 5 - 8 ) were led by Lonzo Ball , as he became the youngest player in NBA history to capture a triple - double . He finished the game with 18 points , 12 rebounds , 13 assists , three steals and three blocks . Kyle Kuzma led the team , as he totaled 21 points and 11 rebounds en route to a double - double . Julius Randle led the bench with 17 points and eight rebounds . The Bucks ( 6 - 6 ) have now won two - straight with Eric Bledsoe in the fold , as they look like a defensive powerhouse with him in the backcourt . He finished this game with 11 points , two rebounds and two assists . Giannis Antetokounmpo was the player of the game , as he accumulated 33 points , 15 rebounds and three assists . Khris Middleton amassed 13 points , four rebounds and four assists . Malcolm Brogdon was a huge spark off the bench , providing 16 points , three rebounds , three assists and three steals . Both teams return to action on Monday , with Milwaukee hosting the Memphis Grizzlies and Los_Angeles traveling to face the Phoenix Suns .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Utah Jazz , 117 - 100 , at BMO_Harris_Bradley_Center on Saturday . Despite the fact that Utah grabbed the first lead in this game , Milwaukee dominated throughout . In fact , the Bucks led 29 - 19 after the first quarter , as Utah never tied or took the lead from there . Shooting was key , with the Bucks hitting 54 percent of their shots , while holding Utah to just 43 percent shooting . In addition , Milwaukee forced 16 turnovers from Utah , while committing just 11 on their end . A 33 - 26 defensive rebounding advantage was decisive for the Bucks as well . The Jazz ( 13 - 14 ) were led by Rudy Gobert , as he tallied 20 points and nine rebounds . Joe Ingles collected 12 points , four rebounds and four assists . Alec Burks had another big game off the bench , providing 20 points , six rebounds and three assists . The Bucks ( 15 - 10 ) had four players score at least 16 points , as Giannis Antetokounmpo led them with 37 points , 13 rebounds , seven assists and two steals . Eric Bledsoe amassed 20 points , four rebounds and three steals . Khris Middleton accumulated 20 points , five rebounds and five assists . Malcolm Brogdon led the bench with 16 points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals . Both teams are off until Wednesday , as Milwaukee travels to face the New_Orleans Pelicans and Utah facing the Chicago Bulls on the road as well .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the host Milwaukee Bucks , 115 - 109 , at BMO_Harris_Bradley_Center on Friday evening . The Bucks started out well , taking an early 16 - 6 lead , however the Bulls responded instantly and pushed ahead to take a 33 - 30 lead after one quarter . The game stayed very close through the second and third quarters , with the teams trading small leads . The score was tied at 82 heading into the fourth . Little changed through most of the fourth quarter , with both teams battling until it was tied up at 104 with 3:10 left . It was here that the Bulls managed to put together a 50 run that would give them a cushion to ride to the finish . This marks the fifth straight win for Chicago . Bobby Portis led the way for Chicago , with 27 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting , 12 rebounds and one steal , in 29 minutes off the bench . Nikola Mirotic followed up with 22 points , eight rebounds , two assists , and one steal , in 29 minutes of action . Robin Lopez added 18 points and eight rebounds , while Kris Dunn finished with 17 points and seven assists . The Bulls shot 48 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 23 from long range . Meanwhile , Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for the Bucks , with 29 points , 16 rebounds , four assists and one block , in 39 minutes . Eric Bledsoe followed up with 12 points , seven assists , two rebounds and one steal , while John Henson tallied 11 points , seven rebounds , two blocks and one assist , in 19 minutes . The Bucks shot 48 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 33 from long range . The Bucks ( 15 - 12 ) will be right back in action as they take on the Rockets in Houston on Saturday . Meanwhile , the Bulls ( 8 - 20 ) play host to the 76ers on Monday .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the visiting Indiana Pacers , 122 - 101 , at BMO_Harris_Bradley_Center on Wednesday evening . The Bucks got out to a great start and had a 20 - 9 lead with just over five minutes left in the first quarter . The Pacers were able to get their act together before things got much worse , but could not make much of a dent in the deficit , as they trailed 62 - 52 at halftime . The Bucks continued to play with the edge , expanding their lead to 18 in the third quarter , before taking a 93 - 76 lead into the fourth . The Bucks maintained a healthy cushion the rest of the way as they cruised to the win . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for Milwaukee , with 31 points , 10 rebounds , five assists , two blocks and one steal , in 29 minutes . Khris Middleton followed up with 27 points , three rebounds , two assists and one steal , while Malcolm Brogdon chipped in 17 points , five assists and two rebounds , in 31 minutes off the bench . The Bucks shot 59 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 17 from long range . Meanwhile , Domantas Sabonis led the Pacers with 24 points on 10 - of - 13 shooting , in 32 minutes off the bench . Darren Collison finished with 17 points , three steals , two assists and two rebounds , while Lance Stephenson tallied 15 points , seven rebounds and five assists , in 34 minutes . The Pacers shot 49 percent from the field , including 3 - of - 15 from long range . The Pacers ( 19 - 19 ) will look to get back on track as they play host to the Bulls on Saturday . The Bucks ( 20 - 16 ) play host to the Raptors on Friday .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 129 - 110 , at BMO_Harris_Bradley_Center on Friday evening . The Raptors ( 27 - 10 ) and the Bucks ( 20 - 17 ) played a very even game during the first half , and all signs indicated this one was headed for another close finish just like it happened when these two Eastern_Conference rivals met earlier this week . However , the Raptors pulled away for good in the second half , as their impressive performance during the third quarter ( 43 - 19 ) pulled them away for good . Milwaukee won the fourth quarter , but it was n't enough and Toronto secured the win rather comfortably . Surprisingly , Serge Ibaka led the Raptors offensively since he finished with 21 points and five rebounds . DeMar DeRozan added 20 points with five rebounds and four assists , while Jonas Valanciunas chipped in with 20 points and 13 rebounds . Kyle Lowry added 15 points , six boards , four dimes and two steals . The bench did a good job as well , as three players ( Delon Wright ( 12 ) , C.J . Miles ( 11 ) and Fred VanVleet ( 10 ) ) scored in double digits . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for the Bucks , as the Greek forward finished with 24 points , five rebounds , five assists and two steals . Eric Bledsoe chipped in with 17 points , and Khris Middleton had 11 points . Malcolm Brodgon thrived coming off the bench , as the second - year guard scored 19 points .
The Miami Heat defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 106 - 101 , at BMO_Harris_Bradley_Center on Wednesday evening . The Heat ( 26 - 18 ) came into Wednesday 's game looking to extend an impressive stretch that had seen them notch victories in seven of their prior eight contests . Armed with a solid 13 - 9 road record , they certainly appeared capable of accomplishing the feat despite the opposition from a quality squad in the Bucks ( 23 - 21 ) . A tightly contested first half ended with the hosts holding a relatively slim 57 - 52 advantage , a lead Miami was able to whittle down to one point by the start of the fourth period . After Milwaukee tallied the first five points of the quarter to take an 83 - 78 advantage with 10:56 remaining , the visitors went on a 22 - 10 run over the ensuing 8:22 to garner a seven - point cushion that would prove insurmountable . Khris Middleton got the Bucks as close as 104 - 101 with 10 seconds remaining , but a subsequent pair of Wayne Ellington free throws provided the final margin of victory . Hassan Whiteside led the way for the Heat with a 27 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included a game - high six blocks . Goran Dragic contributed 15 points , five assists and four boards . Kelly Olynyk matched Dragic 's scoring total to lead the second unit and added one rebound and one assist . Josh Richardson provided a full line of 14 points , six rebounds , three assists and two steals . Ellington finished with 11 points , five boards and four assists in 28 minutes off the bench . James Johnson supplied nine points , seven rebounds and six assists . Middleton paced the Bucks with 25 points , a total he supplemented with five rebounds , three assists and one steal . Giannis Antetokounmpo managed a 22 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included six assists , two steals and two blocks . Tony Snell led the bench with 12 points and added two rebounds , two assists and one block . Eric Bledsoe managed 11 points , five assists , three rebounds and one steal . John Henson pitched in a 10 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and one block . The Heat next head to the Big Apple , where they 'll face the Brooklyn Nets on Friday night . Meanwhile , the Bucks head to the City of Brotherly Love for a showdown with the Philadelphia 76ers on Saturday evening .

The fact that this game went into overtime shows just how close it really was , as there were 15 ties and 13 lead changes in total . The Wizards got out to a blistering start on the road , as they outscored the Bucks , 40 - 22 , in the first quarter . The Wizards expanded their lead to as many as 19 during the second quarter , but the Bucks pushed back to make it a 14 - point game heading into the half , where they trailed 64 - 50 . The Bucks came out strong in the third , and quickly cut the lead to single digits . They outscored the Wizards 31 - 20 in the quarter , making it just a three - point game heading into the fourth . The Bucks kept battling and made it really close , as they cut the deficit to just one point midway through the quarter , however the Wizards were able to maintain that slight edge and thanks to a clutch three by Bradley Beal in the last minute , created enough separation to come away with the win . Beal led the Wizards with 21 points , eight assists , seven rebounds and one steal , in 34 minutes . Atlanta looked better early on , though , and they jumped to a 31 - 26 lead in the first quarter . Milwaukee answered with a 30 - 19 lead in the second quarter , and they would never look back . The Bucks added to their lead on a 39 - 37 third quarter , and while the Hawks stormed back in the fourth ( 30 - 27 ) , it was n't enough and the Bucks clinched a much - needed win at home . The Bulls established some distance with a 59 - 48 halftime edge and then blew the game open in the third , outscoring Orlando by a 31 - 18 margin during the period . The Chicago Bulls defeated the New_York Knicks , 92 - 87 , at United_Center on Wednesday evening . The Bulls ( 12 - 22 ) have progressively been clawing their way out of their considerable early - season hole , and their ability to defend the home court has been integral to that effort . Chicago came into Thursday 's contest with a respectable 8 - 8 record at United_Center , but their quest to rise above .500 was looking bleak after a first quarter in which they were outscored by a 28 - 17 margin . However , the home squad turned the tables on the improved Knicks ( 17 - 17 ) in the second , rattling off 32 points to close their halftime deficit to a manageable 52 - 49 spread . A tightly contested third period in which the teams virtually matched each other basket - for - basket paved the way for an exciting final 12 minutes . Ultimately , two of the Bulls ' emerging young players flashed some steely nerve with the game on the line , as both Kris Dunn and Justin Holiday managed to drain a pair of free throws apiece over the final seven seconds to afford Chicago the final margin of victory . Notably , both teams posted identical 41 percent success rates from the field overall , but New_York connected on only 17 percent of their 23 attempts from behind the arc . Kristaps Porzingis led the way for the Knicks with 23 points , and he added six rebounds , one assist , three blocks and one steal . Courtney Lee followed with 17 points , four assists , three rebounds and one steal . Jarrett Jack posted 11 points , eight assists and four rebounds . Enes Kanter could n't come close to duplicating the 31 - point , 22 - rebound double - double he 'd managed in his most recent contest , as he finished with four points , 11 boards and one assist . Kyle O'Quinn contributed a bench - leading nine points and eight rebounds - - along with one assist - - in 17 minutes . Dunn paced the Bulls with 17 points , five rebounds , five assists , two steals and one block . Lauri Markkanen pitched in 12 points , two boards , one assist , one steal and one block . Robin Lopez and Holiday had matching 11 - point efforts , with the former adding six rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block , and the latter supplying nine rebounds , three assists and one steal . Denzel Valentine registered nine points , nine rebounds and one steal . Paul Zipser and Bobby Portis led the second unit with matching eight - point tallies . The Knicks remain on the road and head to the Lone Star State , where they 'll take on the San_Antonio Spurs on Thursday evening . The Bulls remain home and await a visit from the Chicago Bulls on Friday night .
