The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 121 - 112 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Thursday night . The Cavaliers ( 21 - 8 ) and the Lakers ( 10 - 17 ) engaged in quite a battle in this game , as the Lakers proved to be a harder - than - expected opponent for a Cavs team that has been on a roll of late . The Cavaliers built a three - point advantage at the break and they never looked back , but that does n't mean the game was easy . Both teams missed chances to either cut or extend the lead , and in the end the more experienced team came out on top . But the Lakers certainly proved they can compete with any team in the league if they engage to do so . LeBron James was the undisputed star for the Cavaliers , as the small forward finished with a strong triple - double of 25 points , 12 rebounds , and 12 assists but he was n't the only player who made a difference for Cleveland . Kevin Love contributed with 28 points and 11 rebounds , and Jose Calderon contributed with 17 points , six assists , three rebounds and two steals . Dwyane Wade had 10 points with six assists . Brandon Ingram led the way for the Lakers with 26 points , six rebounds and six assists . Lonzo Ball came close to a triple - double , as the rookie point guard with 13 points , 11 assists , and eight boards . Two players off the bench delivered strong performances as well , as Kyle Kuzma finished with 20 points and seven rebounds , and Julius Randle added 13 points with four boards and three assists .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Chicago Bulls , 115 - 112 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Thursday evening . The Cavaliers ( 24 - 9 ) knew they 'd have their hands full against the rapidly improving Bulls ( 10 - 21 ) , which had managed seven straight wins coming into Thursday , a stretch that encompassed all six games Nikola Mirotic had played since his season debut on Dec. 8 . The script played out more or less as expected , as Chicago literally hung with the defending Eastern_Conference champs shot - for - shot until 14 seconds remaining in the contest . The visitors had closed the deficit to 113 - 112 at that point following a Denzel Valentine driving layup , but that 's when two players with six NBA championships between them stepped up to deny them victory . LeBron James drained a pair of free throws with 11 seconds left , and Dwyane Wade put his trademark defense on display by blocking Kris Dunn 's would - be game - tying 27 - foot three - point attempt and then grabbing the rebound on a subsequent Valentine three - point miss with under two ticks on the clock . As the final score implied , both teams put on an offensive display , with the Bulls draining 55 percent of their 85 attempts and the Cavs managing a 51 percent success rate of their own . Lauri Markkanen paced Chicago with 25 points , two rebounds , two assists and one steal . Valentine followed with 18 points , five rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . Mirotic was next with a bench - leading 15 points , a total he supplemented with five boards and one assist . Robin Lopez posted 14 points , three rebounds , three assists and one steal . Dunn managed a modest 10 points but also dished out 14 assists , hauled in five rebounds and recorded one steal . Justin Holiday pitched in eight points , seven rebounds , five assists and one steal . James led the Cavaliers with 34 points , nine assists , six rebounds and three steals . Kevin Love totaled 27 points , seven boards and two assists . Kyle Korver led the second unit with 15 points and also registered two rebounds , two assists and one steal . Wade and Jeff Green had matching 10 - point tallies , with the former also totaling four assists , three rebounds , three steals and two blocks and the latter bringing down four boards . Jose Calderon had eight points , five assists , one rebound and one steal . The Bulls remain on the road and tangle with Celtics on Saturday night , while the Cavaliers head west for a marquee Christmas Day Finals rematch against the Golden_State Warriors .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers , 127 - 110 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Tuesday evening . While much fanfare surrounded the expected debut of Isaiah Thomas ( hip ) on Tuesday , the Cavaliers ( 25 - 12 ) were likely more focused on simply righting their ship after having lost four of their previous five games , a stretch that even included a defeat at the hands of the lowly Sacramento Kings . Matters were n't looking too positive in that regard in the first half , as the Trail_Blazers ( 19 - 18 ) , buoyed by the return of their star point guard Damian Lillard from a hamstring injury , forged a 56 - 53 halftime lead . However , Cleveland came out firing on all cylinders offensively after intermission and never let up , scoring an impressive 74 points over the final 24 minutes to put together a comfortable double - digit home win . Thomas ' encouraging play was certainly an added bonus , as he produced 17 points and three assists over just 19 minutes , shooting 50 percent ( 6 - for - 12 ) from the field . The home squad enjoyed a strong shooting night overall , posting a 52 percent success rate from the floor , including 41 percent from three - point range . Lillard paced the Blazers in his return from a five - game absence , managing 25 points , six assists and one steal . Jusuf Nurkic tallied 23 points , seven boards , four assists and two steals . C.J . McCollum took on a less pronounced role in the offense with Lillard 's return but still supplied 19 points , five boards and four assists . Evan Turner filled out the stat sheet with 15 points , eight rebounds , three assists and one block . Al-Farouq Aminu mustered a modest five points but also brought down nine rebounds , dished out two assists and recorded one steal . Noah Vonleh led the reserves with six points and added three rebounds . LeBron James led the Cavaliers with 24 points , eight assists , six rebounds , four steals and one block . Kevin Love , questionable until earlier in the afternoon with an illness , registered 19 points , seven rebounds , one steal and one block . Jae Crowder tallied 17 points , three assists , two rebounds , two steals and one block . Thomas led the bench with his aforementioned scoring total , while Dwyane Wade ( 15 points , eight rebounds , three assists ) and Jeff Green ( 10 points , five assists , four rebounds , two steals ) were productive off the second unit as well . The Trail_Blazers head back home to face the Atlanta Hawks on Friday evening , while the Cavaliers hit the road to face the Boston Celtics on Wednesday night .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Orlando Magic , 104 - 103 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Thursday . Cleveland looked to be in control for the majority of this game , but Orlando actually fought back to make it a close game . In fact , Orlando overcame a 20 - point halftime deficit to take their one and only lead in the final two minutes . Cleveland was still able to prevail though , as Isaiah Thomas hit two big free throws late to take the lead . Orlando dominated the stat sheet , as they won the field goal percentage , assists , steals , blocks and turnover differentials . Points off turnovers was Cleveland 's only big advantage , as they won that battle , 28 - 17 . The Magic ( 13 - 32 ) were led by Elfrid Payton , as he tallied 19 points , eight rebounds , four assists and two steals . Aaron Gordon finished with 17 points . 11 rebounds , two assists and three steals . Evan Fournier amassed 17 points , five rebounds and three assists . The Cavaliers ( 27 - 17 ) were led by Isaiah Thomas , as he accrued 21 points , three rebounds , four assists and two steals . LeBron James collected 16 points , five rebounds and six assists . Kevin Love totaled 12 points and 11 rebounds .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Indiana Pacers , 115 - 108 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Friday evening . Given recent events , the Cavaliers may well have been the first 28 - 19 team in NBA history in desperate need of a victory . Cleveland came into Friday 's contest having lost six of their previous eight games , a streak with a particularly grim undertone considering their lofty expectations . However , as poor as many of their recent performances had been , the defending Eastern_Conference champs came out of the gates with the hot hand . The home squad racked up an eye - popping 73 points in the first half , but their suspect defense also allowed the Pacers ( 26 - 23 ) to tally a robust 60 to keep within striking distance . The Cavs kept their foot on the gas in the third , keeping their lead large enough heading into the final period to ultimately withstand a late Indiana surge . Cleveland not only prevailed on the scoreboard , but they also triumphed in two key categories ; they outshot the visitors by a 56 percent - 47 percent margin and won the rebounding battle , 44 - 37 . Victor Oladipo led the way for the Pacers with 25 points , a total he supplemented with seven assists , six rebounds and one steal . Darren Collison followed with 19 points , seven assists , two rebounds , six steals and one block . Domantas Sabonis produced a 17 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and one steal . Lance Stephenson managed a bench - leading 11 points while also hauling in three rebounds and dishing out two assists . Bojan Bogdanovic and Thaddeus Young turned in matching 10 - point efforts , with the former adding five rebounds , one assist and three steals , and the latter turning in two rebounds , four assists and one steal . LeBron James paced the Cavaliers with a 26 - point , 11 - assist , 10 - rebound triple - double that also included four steals and one block . However , he also committed a game - high 11 turnovers . J.R. Smith followed with 23 points and also supplied four steals . Derrick Rose accounted for 14 points , two rebounds , two assists and one steal . Isaiah Thomas posted 12 points , five assists , two rebounds and one block . Jeff Green turned in 11 points , two rebounds , two assists and one block . Tristan Thompson and Kevin Love both turned in 10 - point double - doubles . Thompson added 10 rebounds , one assist and one steal , while Love hauled in 13 boards , dished out three assists and recorded a pair of steals . The Pacers head back home to face off with the Orlando Magic on Saturday night , while the Cavaliers remain home and await a visit from the Detroit Pistons on Sunday evening .
The Houston Rockets defeated the host Cleveland Cavaliers , 120 - 88 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Saturday . It 's rare to see a Finals contender dominated so badly at home , but that 's indicative of which direction these teams are headed . In fact , it was a wire - to - wire win for the Rockets , as the Cavaliers trailed by at least 20 points for the entirety of the second half . That can be attributed to a 65 - 39 first half in the favor of Houston , as they never got within single - digits after the first quarter either . The Rockets ended up hitting 44 - of - 93 from the field and 19 - of - 51 from three - point range . Cleveland hit just 34 - of - 87 from the field while hitting 8 - of - 30 from three - point range . The Rockets ( 38 - 13 ) were led by Chris Paul , as he collected 22 points , eight rebounds and 11 assists . Ryan Anderson totaled 21 points and eight rebounds . James Harden accrued 16 points , six rebounds , nine assists and two steals . Gerald Green led the bench with 17 points , three rebounds and three blocks . The Cavaliers ( 30 - 21 ) had no player score more than 12 points , as Isaiah Thomas led them with 12 points , five rebounds and three assists . J.R. Smith matched those 12 points , adding seven rebounds to his line . LeBron James accumulated 11 points , nine rebounds and nine assists . Both teams play road games on Tuesday for their next outings , with Houston playing the Brooklyn Nets and Cleveland facing off with the Orlando Magic .
In a game that may go down as a modern classic , the Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 140 - 138 , in overtime on Wednesday . The game featured 34 lead changes and a late 80 run to help Minnesota regain the lead . The two teams shot the lights out from three - point range , setting a new NBA record by combining for 40 made three - pointers . In overtime , the team traded buckets back and forth , with Jimmy Butler doing most of Minnesota 's damage and LeBron James leading the charge for Cleveland . With 24 seconds left and the game tied , Minnesota had the ball and was able to run an isolation for Butler , but Butler was rejected by James at the rim . Cleveland 's J.R. Smith recovered the ball and called a quick time - out with one second left on the clock . The Cavaliers managed to inbound the ball from the backcourt up to James in the paint , who knocked down a turnaround jumper at the buzzer to give Cleveland a much - needed win . For the Cavaliers ( 31 - 22 ) , it was all about LeBron James . James shot 16 - of - 22 from the field en route to a team - high 37 points . He had a triple - double as well , notching 16 assists and 10 rebounds . The Cavs also saw a rare strong game from veteran starter J.R. Smith , who has seen his production fall off a cliff this season . Despite his poor season to this point , Smith scored 20 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting in Wednesday 's win . Minnesota ( 35 - 22 ) , on the other hand , balanced its attack between its two All-Stars . Butler was the team 's leading scorer with 35 points on 14 - of - 21 shooting . Seven of those points came in the overtime period . Karl-Anthony Towns , meanwhile , had a ridiculously efficient 10 - of - 12 shooting night . Towns scored 30 points and went a perfect 6 - of - 6 from three - point range . Towns has now made his last nine straight three - point shots , tying a Timberwolves franchise record . The Cavaliers will visit Atlanta on Friday , while the Timberwolves will travel to Chicago .
The Washington Wizards defeated the host Cleveland Cavaliers , 110 - 103 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Thursday . Despite the fact that Cleveland had won five of their previous six games over Washington , the Wizards were able to prevail here despite not having John Wall ( knee ) . This matchup was close throughout though , as there were 10 ties and 14 lead changes in total , with neither team ever leading by more than 12 points . Three-point shooting was a key statistic , with Washington connecting on 12 - of - 30 and Cleveland hitting just 8 - of - 35 . Free-throw shooting also killed the Cavaliers , as they went just 11 - of - 19 from the charity stripe while the Wizards went a perfect 10 - of - 10 . Washington ended up winning the rebounding , assisting , steals , blocks and turnover differentials as well . The Wizards ( 34 - 24 ) were led by Bradley Beal , as he tallied 18 points , two rebounds , nine assists and two blocks . Tomas Satoransky amassed 17 points , four rebounds , eight assists and two steals . Otto Porter finished with 15 points , eight rebounds , two assists and two steals . Markieff Morris accrued nine points , eight rebounds , three assists and two steals . Kely Oubre Jr. led the bench with 17 points , five rebounds , two assists and two steals . The Cavaliers ( 34 - 23 ) were carried by LeBron James , as he collected 32 points , nine rebounds and eight assists on 13 - of - 18 from the field . Tristan Thompson totaled 12 points , nine rebounds and two assists . The only other Cavalier in double figures was J.R. Smith , who scored 15 points but failed to provide much else . Both teams play again on Friday , with Cleveland traveling to play the Memphis Grizzlies and Washington playing host to the Charlotte Hornets .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 110 - 94 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Sunday afternoon . The Spurs ( 36 - 25 ) and Cavaliers ( 35 - 24 ) came into the marquee matinee with strikingly similar records but decidedly different trajectories . San_Antonio was reeling prior to Sunday , having dropped six of their previous seven contests . Meanwhile , buoyed by a plethora of prudent trade - deadline acquisitions , Cleveland had rattled off four victories in their last five games to somewhat right their ship . The first half was a testament to how evenly matched the two clubs were , as the hosts got out to a slim 53 - 50 halftime lead . Matters took a turn for the better for the visitors coming out of intermission , as they outscored the Cavs by a 26 - 21 margin during the period . The beginning of the fourth quarter would prove to be the difference in the tightly contested battle , as the Spurs ripped off a 16 - 5 run over the first 5:3 , giving them a double - digit cushion that would prove to be enough . The defending Eastern_Conference champs never got closer than eight points after that juncture , and they failed to score over the final 1:21 of the contest . LaMarcus Aldridge led the way for the Spurs with 27 points , a total he supplemented with six rebounds , three assists and one block . Danny Green headed to the bench but thrived , pouring in 22 points and adding three rebounds , one steal and one block over 23 minutes . Dejounte Murray supplied a full line of 13 points , nine boards , five assists , four steals and three blocks . Bryn Forbes totaled 12 points , one rebound and one steal in 20 minutes on the second unit . Patty Mills and Pau Gasol provided matching 11 - point efforts , with the former also dishing out five assists , hauling in two rebounds and recording one steal , and the latter tallying seven rebounds and three assists . Kyle Anderson was solid while contributing 10 points . six rebounds , four assists , three blocks and two steals . LeBron James paced the Cavaliers with a near - triple - double of 33 points , 13 rebounds , nine assists and one steal . Jordan Clarkson went for 17 points and two rebounds while leading the bench in scoring . Jeff Green posted 14 points , two boards , one assist and one steal . Tristan Thompson accounted for six points , 13 rebounds and one steal . Cedi Osman mustered just four points and one rebound , while the starting backcourt duo of George Hill ( two points , two rebounds , one assist and one block ) and J.R. Smith ( two points , two rebounds ) were significantly underwhelming . The Spurs head back home and take on the New_Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday evening , while the Cavaliers remain home and await a Tuesday evening visit from the Brooklyn Nets .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers 108 - 97 on Thursday at Quicken_Loans_Arena . After the 76ers ( ) led nearly the entire game , the Cavaliers ( ) went on a run in the final period and a three - pointer from Kyle Korver ultimately cut the lead to one at 95 - 94 with 2:25 remaining . Then , Philadelphia 's Dario Saric responded with a three from the corner , and that kicked off a 13 - 3 run for the Sixers to end the game and put an end to their two - game skid . It was a complete team effort from the 76ers , with all five starters scoring in double figures . J.J. Redick led the way with an impressive shooting performance , going 4 - of - 7 from behind the arc and 7 - of - 11 from the field overall en route to scoring a team - high 22 points . Ben Simmons came close to a triple - double with 18 points , nine rebounds and eight assists , while Joel Embiid posted a monster double - double of 17 points and 14 rebounds to go along with six assists . As for Cleveland , they 've now dropped three of their last five games , with their two wins coming over the lowly Grizzlies and Nets . It was a loss caused by yet another poor shooting performance from behind the arc , as these Cavaliers are starting to show how much they live and die by the three . As a team , Cleveland shot just 28 percent from downtown , with the starting backcourt of George Hill and Rodney Hood combining to go just 1 - of - 9 . The only bright spot for the Cavaliers was , once again , the play of LeBron James , who nearly recorded yet another triple - double with a game - high 30 points , nine rebounds and eight assists . The result brings these teams closer together , with the 76ers now just 2 games behind the Cavaliers for the No . 3 seed in the Eastern_Conference .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 107 - 102 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Friday evening . The game was meaningful to both clubs in terms of playoff positioning , but even more so for the Pelicans ( 45 - 33 ) , which despite a sixth seed , stood precariously close tumbling out of the tight Western_Conference playoff race with a couple of ill - timed losses . Accordingly , New_Orleans turned up the heat after drawing even with the Cavaliers ( 46 - 30 ) , 29 - 29 , after one quarter . They outscored their hosts by a 28 - 18 margin in the second to forge a 10 - point halftime advantage , but Cleveland came roaring back in the third with a 33 - point quarter that took them into the fourth sporting a one - point edge . The Pelicans would battle back to take an 85 - 82 lead at the 10:3 mark of the final period following a Darius Miller 26 - foot three - point jumper , but the home squad would erase it soon thereafter and would n't relinquish the lead again . Jrue Holiday led the way for the Pelicans with 25 points , a total to which he added six rebounds , two assists and two steals . Nikola Mirotic led the second unit with 20 points and supplemented them with seven rebounds and three assists . Anthony Davis had a rough shooting night , managing a modest 16 points on a 6 - for - 19 tally from the field . He also ripped down eight rebounds , dished out three assists , posted two blocks and recorded one steal . Miller finished with 11 points , three rebounds , one assist and one steal . Rajon Rondo drew the start and mustered seven points , eight assists and one rebound . Solomon Hill and Ian Clark contributed matching seven - point tallies off the bench , with the former also collecting five rebounds and three assists , and the latter registering two assists and one rebound . LeBron James paced the Cavaliers with a 27 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included nine rebounds and one steal . Jordan Clarkson followed with a bench - leading 23 points , along with four boards and two assists . Rodney Hood poured in 16 points and tallied two rebounds and two assists . Kevin Love was able to play after clearing concussion protocol but totaled a modest eight points , eight rebounds , two assists and one steal over 24 minutes . George Hill matched his scoring total , while Larry Nance , Jr. offered five points , five rebounds , three assists and three steals over 15 minutes . The Pelicans head back home and face the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Sunday evening , while the Cavaliers remain home and tangle with the Dallas Mavericks on Sunday evening as well .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the visiting Dallas Mavericks , 98 - 87 , at Quicken_Loans_Arena on Sunday evening . The Mavericks got out to a strong start on the road , with an early 10 - 4 lead , and hung on to take a 25 - 18 lead into the second quarter . They stayed in control to start the second , and led down to the final minute of the half . Nonetheless , the Cavs chipped away and closed the quarter strong to claim a 48 - 47 lead by halftime . The Mavericks came back in the third quarter , and took the lead just a couple minutes in . They maintained an edge for most of the rest of the quarter and carried a 77 - 73 lead into the fourth . The tides turned in the fourth , as the Cavs overtook the lead early and ultimately outscored Dallas 25 - 10 in the quarter , to notch their third straight win . LeBron James led Cleveland with yet another triple - double , with 16 points , 13 rebounds and 12 assists , in 38 minutes . Kevin Love finished with 13 points , 13 rebounds , one steal and one block , while Jordan Clarkson chipped in 16 points off the bench . The Cavs shot 41 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 26 from long range . Meanwhile , Harrison Barnes led the Mavericks with 30 points on 10 - of - 19 shooting , in 36 minutes . Dennis Smith Jr. followed up with 14 points , six assists and four rebounds , while Doug McDermott added nine points and two rebounds off the bench . The Mavs shot 40 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 37 from long range . The Mavericks ( 23 - 54 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Trail_Blazers on Tuesday . The Cavaliers ( 47 - 30 ) play host to the Raptors on Tuesday .
The Boston Celtics defeated the San_Antonio Spurs 108 - 94 on Monday at TD_Garden . The win ended an 11 - game losing streak to the Spurs for the Celtics ( 5 - 2 ) , which dates all the way back to 2011 . They managed to break it thanks to an 18 - 2 run that started with two minutes left in the second quarter and lasted through the first five minutes of the third . From that point on , Boston managed to go punch - for - punch with San_Antonio the rest of the way and hold them off . Kyrie Irving led the way for the Celtics , scoring a game - high 24 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt ) to go along with six assists and three steals in 30 minutes . Jaylen Brown was also excellent in the outing , posting 18 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting in 30 minutes of his own . As for the Spurs ( 4 - 3 ) , they 've now dropped three straight games , and it appears they are starting to miss superstar Kawhi Leonard ( quad ) after their hot start to the season . San_Antonio struggled to get anything going offensively , and it was Brandon Paul would ended up leading the team in scoring with 18 points ( 6 - 8 FG . 3 - 4 3Pt ) in 30 minutes off the bench . Star big man LaMarcus Aldridge failed to get much going , scoring just 11 points in 26 minutes . What really hurt the Spurs was their awful free throw shooting , as they shot a miserable 10 - of - 20 from the charity stripe . Up next , the Celtics will look to extend their winning streak to six games Wednesday against the Kings while the Spurs will look to stop their losing streak Thursday against the Warriors .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Golden_State Warriors , 92 - 88 , at TD_Garden on Thursday . Despite the fact that Golden_State led for the majority of this game , Boston were able to prevail and extend their winning streak to 14 games . It was competitive throughout though , as there were 11 ties and 10 lead changes in total . Defense was on display for both teams , as Golden_State hit just 40 percent of their shots and Boston shooting just 33 percent from the field . The difference for Boston was getting to the free - throw line , as they went 33 - of - 38 , while holding Golden_State to just 12 - of - 19 . The Warriors ( 11 - 4 ) were led by Kevin Durant , as he tallied 24 points , three rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Klay Thompson , Stephen Curry and Draymond Green combined for just 33 points on 11 - of - 45 shooting . Green did provide eight rebounds , five assists and three blocks , while Curry added six rebounds , five assists and four steals to his line . The Celtics ( 14 - 2 ) got 22 points , seven rebounds , two steals and two blocks out of Jaylen Brown to lead the way . Al Horford totaled 18 points , 11 rebounds and two assists . Kyrie Irving amassed 16 points , five rebounds and six assists on 4 - of - 16 shooting . Marcus Morris and Jayson Tatum each scored 12 points . Both teams return to action on Saturday , as the Celtics travel to play the Atlanta Hawks and the Warriors playing the Philadelphia 76ers on the road as well .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Boston Celtics 118 - 108 on Monday at TD_Garden . Monday night 's performance was among the most impressive of the season from the Pistons ( 13 - 6 ) , as they pretty much led the game from wire to wire . For every run the Celtics ( 18 - 4 ) had in them , Detroit had a response . Andre Drummond was phenomenal for the Pistons , scoring 26 points on 10 - of - 12 shooting from the field to go along with 22 rebounds , six assists and four steals . Tobias Harris continued his great 2017 - 18 campaign , scoring a game - high 31 points and grabbing eight rebounds , while Reggie Jackson scored 20 points of his own and dished out seven assists . As a team , the Pistons shot a scorching 44 percent from behind the arc and 52 percent from the field overall . Unsurprisingly , for the Celtics , it was their worst defensive performance of the season by far , with the league 's top scoring defense gave up a season - high 118 points . Boston still had a great shooting night , shooting an impressive 16 - of - 33 ( 48 percent ) from three and 52 percent from the field overall , but the Celtics committed 17 turnovers and shot just 12 - of - 21 from the free throw line . Marcus Smart came off the bench and did everything he could to keep his team in the game , shooting 6 - of - 9 from behind the arc en route to scoring a team - high 23 points in 32 minutes , but ultimately it was not enough . Kyrie Irving added 18 points and nine assists , but shot just 6 - of - 16 from the field . Up next , the Pistons will look to continue their winning ways Wednesday against the Suns , while the Celtics will remain home Thursday and play the 76ers .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Boston Celtics , 107 - 95 , at TD_Garden on Friday evening . The Jazz ( 14 - 15 ) came into Friday 's game looking to snap a four - game losing streak , although a road matchup against a tough Celtics ( 24 - 7 ) certainly did n't bode well for their chances of doing so . Matters then took a turn for the worse during the contest , as Rudy Gobert went down in the first quarter after teammate Derrick Favors rolled up on his left knee . Favors eventually exited the contest with his own injury , as he suffered a facial laceration that required six stitches . However , Utah 's reserves stepped up , as Jonas Jerebko celebrated his return to Boston by co - leading the bench with 17 points , a total he supplemented with seven rebounds , two steals and one block . The second unit contributed 50 points overall , and the visitors managed an impressive 48 percent success rate from the field , including 52 percent from three - point range . Meanwhile , they limited the Celtics to 41 percent shooting , and despite their shallow frontcourt , they outrebounded Boston by a 55 - 31 margin . Ricky Rubio led the Jazz with 22 points , a total he supplemented with seven rebounds , five assists and one steal . Donovan Mitchell followed with a near double - double consisting of 17 points , nine assists and six rebounds . Rodney Hood matched Mitchell 's scoring total land added five rebounds , one steal and one block . Joe Ingles pitched in with 12 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Alec Burks was productive off the bench with eight points , seven rebounds , one assist and one steal . Kyrie Irving led the Celtics with a dynamic 33 - point tally that also included six assists and four rebounds . Al Horford was next with 21 points , seven assists , six rebounds and two steals . Shane Larkin led the bench with nine points and added a rebound and a steal . Jayson Tatum posted seven points , four rebounds and two assists . Jaylen Brown mustered a modest six points , but he also hauled in six rebounds , recorded four steals and posted three blocks . The Jazz remain on the road and visit the Cleveland Cavaliers on Saturday night , while the Celtics tangle with the Memphis Grizzlies at FedEx Forum on Saturday evening as well .
The Boston Celtics defeated the visiting Brooklyn Nets , 108 - 105 , at TD_Garden on Sunday evening . The Celtics ( 30 - 10 ) were massive favorites ahead of this game , but they had to work harder than expected against a hard - working Nets ( 13 - 23 ) team that made things quite complicated for Boston . Even though the Celtics jumped to a 10 - point lead after the first quarter , the Nets answered and cut the deficit to two points at the break . Both teams went back and forth during the second half , but in the end Boston came on top despite Brooklyn 's attempts to send the game to overtime . One of the big differences was both teams ' shooting from the field , as the Celtics hit 49 percent of their shots while Brooklyn converted just 41 of theirs . Star point guard Kyrie Irving led the way for Boston , as he finished with 28 points . Jaylen Brown had 13 points , and Al Horford contributed with 10 points , 10 rebounds , five assists , and three blocks . Markieff Morris and Terry Rozier had very good performances coming off the bench as well . The shooting guard contributed with 14 points and seven rebounds , while the power forward chipped in with 15 points of his own . Six Brooklyn players scored in double digits , led by Rondae Hollis-Jefferson who contributed with 22 points and 12 rebounds . Allen Crabbe had 12 points , and Spencer Dinwiddie chipped in with 10 points and eight assists . Caris LeVert had a monster game off the bench as well , finishing with 16 points , seven assists , six rebounds , and two steals . Quincy Acy had 14 points as well .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the host Boston Celtics , 116 - 113 , in overtime at TD_Garden on Tuesday evening . The Pelicans got out to a good start on the road , as they managed to take the early advantage through the first quarter and hold a 32 - 25 lead heading into the second . They continued to play with the advantage through the second quarter and pushed their lead to 10 , up 58 - 48 , heading into halftime . The Celtics did a better job in the second half and chipped away until they took a three - point lead with 4:40 left in the game . The teams traded buckets during the last minutes of regulation , until Kyrie Irving nailed a game - tying layup with 11 seconds left , that would send it to overtime . The Pelicans held strong in OT and edged the Celtics , en route to their third straight win . Anthony Davis led the way for New_Orleans with 45 points , 16 rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one steal , in 44 minutes of action . DeMarcus Cousins added 19 points , 15 rebounds , five assists and three steals , while Jrue Holiday finished with 23 points , seven assists , four rebounds , three steals and one block . The Pelicans shot 45 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 27 from long range . Meanwhile , Kyrie Irving was the high - point man for the Celtics , with 27 points on 8 - of - 24 shooting , in 40 minutes . Jaylen Brown followed up with 16 points , five assists , four rebounds and one steal , while Al Horford finished with 14 points , nine rebounds , six assists , one steal and one block . The Celtics shot 40 percent from the field , including 19 - of - 50 from long range . The Celtics ( 34 - 11 ) play host to the 76ers on Thursday . The Pelicans ( 23 - 20 ) will be right back in action as they take on the Hawks in Atlanta on Wednesday .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the host Boston Celtics , 129 - 119 , at TD_Garden on Wednesday . Eight ties and 16 lead changes make this game look much closer than it actually was , as the Clippers held the lead for over 40 minutes . The first and fourth quarters were key for Los_Angeles , outscoring Boston , 70 - 53 . The shooting disparity was a big factor as well , with the Clippers shooting 50 percent while holding Boston to just 43 percent from the field . Much of that was done down low , with Los Angles outscoring Boston in the paint , 56 - 36 The Clippers ( 30 - 26 ) were led by DeAndre Jordan , as he collected 30 points , 13 rebounds , three assists and four steals on 11 - of - 14 from the field . Tobias Harris accrued 21 points , eight rebounds and five assists . Danilo Gallinari amassed 20 points and nine rebounds while Lou Williams led the bench with 19 points , two rebounds and six assists . The Celtics ( 40 - 20 ) got a gem out of Kyrie Irving , as he totaled 33 points and eight assists . Al Horford finished with 20 points , four rebounds and two blocks . Marcus Morris led the bench with 13 points , 11 rebounds and three assists . The Clippers are off until the 22nd , when they travel to play the Golden_State Warriors . As for Boston , they 're off until the 23rd , when they travel to play the Detroit Pistons .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the host Boston Celtics , 99 - 97 , at TD_Garden on Sunday evening . The game started out close , with the Celtics holding a slight edge through the first and a 25 - 24 lead entering the second quarter . The Celtics picked up the pace in the second , as they outscored the Pacers 25 - 16 in the quarter , expanding their lead to 50 - 40 by halftime . Kyrie Irving ( knee ) did not take the floor in the second half . The Pacers took advantage of the shorthanded Celtics in the third quarter , as they outscored the Celtics 34 - 20 in the quarter to take a 74 - 70 lead into the fourth . The Pacers maintained a lead through most of the fourth quarter , until the Celtics rallied to tie it up at 95 with 36 seconds left . The Pacers responded with a lay up by Myles Turner and then two free throws from Victor Oladipo to take a four - point lead . However , the Celtics were not finished as Jayson Tatum hit a lay up to make it a two - point game . They then immediately drew a charge to get the ball back , but missed their final shot attempt at the buzzer , leaving the Pacers to their second straight win . Victor Oladipo led the Pacers with 27 points , four assists , three rebounds , three steals and one block , in 35 minutes . Myles Turner followed up with 19 points , 10 rebounds , three blocks and one steal , while Bojan Bogdanovic added 14 points , three rebounds , three assists and one block . The Pacers shot 48 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 22 from long range . Meanwhile , Marcus Smart led the Celtics with 20 points , eight assists , seven rebounds and four steals , in 35 minutes . Jayson Tatum followed up with 19 points , five rebounds , three assists , two blocks and one steal , while Terry Rozier added 16 points , six rebounds and two assists . The Celtics shot 42 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 37 from long range . The Celtics ( 46 - 21 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Wizards on Wednesday . The Pacers ( 39 - 28 ) take on the 76ers in Philly on Tuesday .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 100 - 99 , at TD_Garden on Tuesday evening . The Celtics ( 48 - 23 ) still retain an outside shot of recapturing the top spot in the Eastern_Conference from the Toronto Raptors , but they 'll have to keep piling up wins to do so . The fact that star point guard Kyrie Irving ( knee ) remains out of commission only makes the task more daunting , but Tuesday 's contest ultimately showed why Boston ca n't be counted out just yet . After a highly entertaining , back - and - forth affair that saw both teams often match each other bucket for bucket , the Thunder ( 43 - 30 ) looked like they 'd finally built an insurmountable 98 - 92 cushion with 25 seconds remaining . No one gave the trio of Jayson Tatum , Terry Rozier and Marcus Morris the memo , however , as they all drained clutch baskets over the final 18 seconds to seal the improbable comeback . Rozier 's 27 - foot three - pointer with 13 seconds remaining followed a free - throw line sequence by Russell Westbrook where he had a key miss on the first of his two shots . The trey left the home squad down only two , and then Carmelo Anthony subsequently missed two more attempts from the charity stripe - - the second of which was rebounded by Tatum . That set up a 26 - footer from Morris that found the net with 1 seconds left and gave the hosts a one - point lead . Westbrook would have one more chance to atone for his earlier misfire , but he hit the front of the rim on his last - gasp three - point attempt at the buzzer . Westbrook led the way for the Thunder with 27 points and added eight rebounds , seven assists and one steal . Paul George posted a 24 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and one steal . Steven Adams produced 14 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Anthony finished with 13 points , five boards , three assists , one steal and one block . Corey Brewer supplied 11 points , five rebounds , three assists , two steals and one block . The bench played a minor role , as Jerian Grant paced the second unit with a modest six points , two rebounds and one assist . Tatum paced the Celtics with a 23 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included four assists , one steal and one block . Morris posted 21 points , four rebounds and one steal . Greg Monroe continued his strong play off the bench with 17 points , six rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Rozier managed 14 points , six rebounds , six assists and two steals . Shane Larkin was productive on the second unit with 13 points , four boards and one assist . Al Horford had a rough 2 - for - 9 shooting night on his way to five points , a total he complemented with seven assists , six rebounds and two blocks . The Thunder head back home and await a Friday night visit from the Miami Heat , while the Celtics embark on a West Coast road swing that begins with a Friday night showdown with the Portland Trail_Blazers .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 110 - 97 , at TD_Garden on Wednesday . The Celtics ( 55 - 27 ) managed to secure a huge win over the Nets ( 28 - 54 ) as they managed to finish their regular - season campaign on a strong note , and it seems they are ready to take on a postseason path where they appear as one of the favorites to make a deep run in the Eastern_Conference . The Celtics quickly jumped ahead to a 27 - 22 lead in the first quarter , and they extended it both in the second ( 26 - 21 ) and the third quarter ( 30 - 27 ) , so they looked set to close things out with ease . The final 12 minutes of action ended 27 - 27 , so Boston closed things out with a huge 110 - 97 victory that should have them heading into the playoffs riding high on confidence . The Celtics rested most of their regulars , but still did a good job overall . Aron Baynes was the best player for the Celtics since he finished with a strong double - double 26 points and 14 rebounds . Guerschon Yabusele finished with 16 points , five rebounds , and two steals . Shane Larkin came close to a triple - double since he had 12 points , 10 rebounds , and seven assists . Jonathan Gibson added 18 points off the bench . The top scorer for the Nets was Nik Stauskas , who had 18 points in 35 points coming off the bench . Allen Crabbe finished with 16 points and seven rebounds . D'Angelo Russell finished with 11 points and three assists . Caris LeVert contributed 11 points , six assists , and three steals . Jarrett Allen chipped in with 10 points and seven rebounds while only playing 19 minutes .
The host Los_Angeles Clippers took down the Utah Jazz , 102 - 84 , at Staples_Center on Tuesday . Both the Jazz ( 2 - 2 ) and the Clippers ( 30 ) came into Tuesday 's matchup with hopes of continuing their hot starts to the season . Early on , the game seemed to be a competitive one , with multiple lead changes occurring in the first two quarters . The early going saw strong defensive play on both sides , with lock - down centers Rudy Gobert and DeAndre Jordan each impressing . After the start of the second half , however , Blake Griffin and the Clippers ' offense began to run away with the game . Los_Angeles outscored Utah 33 - 15 in the third quarter , thanks to a quick start from Griffin and the rest of the opening unit . Utah began to mount a comeback effort in the fourth , whittling the lead down to single digits , but quickly saw its hopes stamped out by tough play from the Clippers . Star defensive guard , Patrick Beverley , helped put the game out of reach with two clutch steals in the game 's final minutes , and added a dagger three - pointer on the offensive end . Overall , Los_Angeles once again relied heavily on Griffin as an offensive leader . With superstar point guard Chris Paul parting ways with the Clippers this offseason , the highly - skilled Griffin has seen the ball in his hands more than ever over the first three games . On Tuesday , Griffin helped lead the winning effort with a team - high 22 points , as well as eight rebounds and six assists . Griffin turned heads in the first quarter with an emphatic highlight - reel dunk over All-Defense center Rudy Gobert . Another one of LA 's entertaining dunkers , DeAndre Jordan , also impressed with his play . Jordan led the team with 18 rebounds and chipped in 11 points . However , the game marked an unfortunate return to form for Jordan at the free - throw line , where he shot just 1 - of - 4 after having not missed a free - throw in his first two games of the season . Utah , meanwhile , lost control of the game in the second half but still had plenty of positive takeaways from the loss . Rookie wing Donovan Mitchell had a team - best scoring performance , pouring in 19 points and helping to spark the Jazz 's comeback effort in the fourth quarter . Rudy Gobert , meanwhile , looked potent on both ends of the floor , shooting a perfect 5 - of - 5 from the field and rejecting three shots . It appears Utah has yet to find a consistent go - to scorer to replace Gordon Hayward , however , as in each of the first four games a different member of the Jazz led the team in shot attempts . Mitchell was the team 's top shot - taker on Tuesday with 20 field goal attempts . The Jazz will visit Phoenix on Wednesday , while the Clippers see Portland on Thursday .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the host Los_Angeles Clippers , 95 - 87 , at Staples_Center on Saturday . Los_Angeles came into this game as the final undefeated team in the league , but they choked this game away despite a 10 - point lead at the half . In fact , Detroit outscored Los_Angeles , 28 - 15 , in the fourth quarter to cap off their comeback win . Defense was key for Detroit , as they held Los_Angeles to 33 percent shooting , while forcing them to commit 18 turnovers . Detroit also won the points in the paint battle , 38 - 22 , and the fastbreak differential , 22 - 7 . The Pistons ( 4 - 2 ) were led by Reggie Jackson , who accumulated 15 points , four rebounds and seven assists . Andre Drummond also finished with 15 points , adding 17 rebounds and three blocks to his tally . Avery Bradley tallied 12 pints , five rebounds , two assists and four steals . The Clippers ( 4 - 1 ) got another double - double out of Blake Griffin , as he accrued 19 points , 11 rebounds and four assists . Austin Rivers led the team in scoring , amassing 20 points , four rebounds and four steals . DeAndre Jordan scored just seven points , but provided 14 rebounds and three blocks . Detroit will have a quick turnaround , as they play the Golden_State Warriors on Sunday for their next fixture . The Clippers next opponent will also be the Warriors , as they play host to them on Monday for their next game .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the visiting Dallas Mavericks , 119 - 98 , at Staples_Center on Wednesday night . The Clippers ( 5 - 2 ) cruised their way to a relatively easy win in this one , as they pulled away in the first half and never looked back . Los_Angeles built a 66 - 48 lead in the first half , highlighted by an impressive 34 - 19 run during the second quarter . They simply kept the Mavs away on the scoreboard during the remaining two quarters . Dallas tried to react from time to time , but the Clips always shut the door en route to a comfortable win . Blake Griffin 's solid all - around effort certainly sparked the Clippers , as the star power forward finished the game with 20 points , six rebounds and six assists . Austin Rivers had another decent outing with 19 points starting at shooting guard . DeAndre Jordan added 13 points with eight boards . Lou Williams provided a spark off the bench thanks to 17 points , four rebounds and three assists off the bench . On the Mavericks ' side , all five of their starters scored in double digits but that was n't enough to take down the Clippers . Rookie point guard Dennis Smith Jr. led the way with 18 points , but he also committed six turnovers . Harrison Barnes had 14 points and Dirk Nowitzki ended with 13 points , eight boards and two assists . One player to highlight was Maxi Kleber , as the German rookie finished with 11 points ( on 4 - for - 4 from the field ) off the bench .
The Miami Heat defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 104 - 101 , at Staples_Center on Sunday afternoon . The Heat ( 4 - 5 ) came into the game still seeking their first road win of the season , and they came out of the gates seemingly locked in on accomplishing the feat Sunday . Miami forged a 34 - 20 lead by the end of the first quarter and took an 89 - 66 advantage into the fourth period . However , the Clippers ( 5 - 4 ) battled back , ultimately racking up 35 points in the final 12 minutes and even taking a 101 - 100 lead with 26 seconds remaining . A pair of clutch free throws by James Johnson allowed Miami to regain a 102 - 101 advantage with eight seconds left , and Josh Richardson sealed the deal with another pair of successful attempts from the charity stripe after he grabbed a defensive rebound off a missed Blake Griffin 17 - footer . The visitors prevailed despite getting decimated on the glass by a 50 - 37 margin . Hassan Whiteside led the way for the Heat with a 21 - point , 17 - rebound double - double that also included one assist , three steals and two blocks . Tyler Johnson followed with a bench - leading 19 points , which he supplemented with three assists , two rebounds and three steals . Wayne Ellington tallied 17 points , two assists , one rebound and one block . Johnson and Richardson generated matching 14 - point efforts , with the former adding five assists , two rebounds and one block and the latter supplying four assists , two rebounds and three steals . Goran Dragic managed 12 points , six assists , four rebounds and one steal . Griffin led the way for the Clippers with 23 points , eight rebounds , four assists and two steals . Lou Williams followed with a bench - leading 22 points , which he supplemented with two boards and two assists . Austin Rivers registered 12 points , three assists , two rebounds , four steals and one block . Willie Reed was productive on the second unit against his old squad , totaling 10 points , four rebounds and one steal . DeAndre Jordan matched Reed 's point total and also hauled in 19 rebounds , dished out three assists and recorded a block . The Heat continues on their brief West Coast swing with a visit to the Golden_State Warriors on Monday evening , while the Clippers tangle with the Spurs in San_Antonio on Tuesday night .
The Utah Jazz took down the host Los_Angeles Clippers , 126 - 107 , at Staples_Center on Thursday . Utah ( 11 - 11 ) saw one of its best offensive nights of the season , as the team hit 58 percent of its shots and knocked down 17 three - pointers . The Jazz relied on a team - focused approach on the offensive end , as every Jazz starter scored at least 12 points in the win . The team dished out a whopping season high of 38 assists on the night , assisting on over three - quarters of their made field goals . The starters ' strong effort extended to the bench , as the Jazz 's second unit contributed an additional 49 points , including a team high of 28 from Alec Burks . The Jazz were relentless on the offensive end until the night 's conclusion , scoring 100 points over the final three quarters of action . All in all , the team enjoyed one of its strongest offensive showings despite the continued absence of injured All-NBA center Rudy Gobert . The Clippers ( 8 - 12 ) have become one of the league 's most severely shorthanded teams this season . Los_Angeles has seen major injuries to both members of its starting backcourt - - Milos Teodosic and Patrick Beverley . More recently , the team lost All-Star big man Blake Griffin to an MCL sprain . The power forward is expected to miss at least two months with the injury . LA was also missing small forward Danilo Gallinari on Thursday , as the newly - acquired wing is nursing a strained left glute . On Thursday , the undermanned Clippers took the court and delivered a respectable offensive showing , shooting a highly - efficient 54 percent from the field and 10 - of - 29 from beyond the arc . The backcourt of Austin Rivers and Lou Williams , both of whom have been thrust into starting roles , combined for 45 points on 15 - of - 30 shooting . No other Clipper scored more than 13 , however , and only four total Clippers finished in double digits for scoring . The lack of overall offensive firepower made it tough for LA to match Utah 's ridiculous offensive onslaught . Utah will host the Pelicans on Friday , while the Clippers will visit Dallas on Saturday .
The Los_Angeles Clippers took down the Phoenix Suns , 108 - 95 , at Staples_Center on Wednesday . The win snapped a three - game losing streak for Los_Angeles ( 12 - 18 ) , but was in line with recent matchups between the two teams . The Clippers have now defeated the Suns in six straight meetings , and have won 15 of their last 17 against Phoenix dating back to 2013 . On Wednesday , the struggling Clippers looked far removed from their recent woes , shooting a healthy 47 percent from the field and holding a double - digit lead for the majority of the game . All-Star center DeAndre Jordan enjoyed a dominant performance on the interior , finishing with 12 points and a game - high 20 rebounds . The game also marked a bounce back for recently - returned Clippers rookie Milos Teodosic . Teodosic , who missed significant time with a foot injury earlier in the season , earned the start and led the team with eight assists in the win . Phoenix ( 11 - 22 ) was coming off two straight wins before dropping to the Clippers on Wednesday . The Suns struggled mightily on the offensive end , shooting just over 36 percent on the night . Those struggles were particularly apparent early in the game , as the team scored just 11 points over the first 10:54 of play . While things began to came together more in the second half , Phoenix was unable to whittle away at the double - digit lead that Los_Angeles established early on . With star shooting guard Devin Booker ( groin ) out , the Suns relied heavily on forward T.J. Warren for scoring . Warren finished the game with 22 points and 10 rebounds , but shot an unimpressive 9 - of - 24 from the field in the game . Rookie wing Josh Jackson also shouldered some of the offensive load , taking 18 shots en route to 17 points . The Clippers will visit Houston to take on the first - place Rockets on Friday . Phoenix , meanwhile , faces the second half of a back - to - back as the Suns host the Grizzlies on Thursday .
The Los_Angeles Clippers took down the host Sacramento Kings on Tuesday , 122 - 95 . The win was hardly ever in question for LA ( 14 - 19 ) , as the Clippers jumped out to an 18 - point lead by halftime . Strong bench play and work on the boards helped propel LA to the blowout win . The team saw multiple 20 - point outings off the bench , including a team - high 22 from big man Montrezl Harrell . All in all , the Clippers ' second unit scored a whopping 72 points , proving a crucial component of the blowout victory . LA also excelled on the glass , finishing with 22 second - chance points . This was , in part , thanks to All-Star caliber center DeAndre Jordan , who had a 13 - point , 15 - rebound double - double . The Clippers have now won three of their last four games , despite the continued absence of Blake Griffin ( knee ) . The Kings ( 11 - 22 ) had a two - game road win streak coming into Tuesday 's contest , but looked lost against a red - hot Clippers team . Only one Kings player , Willie Cauley-Stein , scored more than 10 points in the tough loss . Cauley-Stein led the team with 17 . The rest of the Kings , meanwhile , struggled to find the basket , as the team shot just 41 percent from the field in the loss . The Kings were not helped by an inability to make it to the free - throw line . The team took just 12 foul shots while allowing 27 for Los_Angeles . The Kings will host the Cleveland Cavaliers on Wednesday , while the Clippers will square off with the Lakers on Thursday .

The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Sacramento Kings , 126 - 105 , at Staples_Center on Saturday afternoon . The Clippers ( 21 - 21 ) prepared the final meeting of the season against the Kings ( 13 - 29 ) knowing a win would give them a swept of the season series , and that was exactly what happened . Los_Angeles have been getting healthier and hotter in the past few games , and the results back that up since they extended their winning run to four games thanks to another dominant performance . Los_Angeles jumped ahead to a 30 - 17 lead in the first quarter , and they never looked back . They won the second quarter and third quarters as well ( by scores of 34 - 28 and 27 - 23 ) , and even though Sacramento won the final 12 minutes , the game was already over by then . The Clippers delivered a strong effort and eight players scored in double figures , including the entire starting lineup . Lou Williams led the offense once again after scoring 26 points , and he added four steals as well . Blake Griffin chipped in with 11 points and nine assists , while Willie Reed - who started in place of DeAndre Jordan - contributed with 14 points and 13 rebounds . Montrezl Harrell added 17 points and six rebounds coming off the bench . Willie Cauley-Stein was the top player for the Kings , as the talented big man contributed with 23 points , 12 rebounds , and four assists . De'Aaron Fox had 17 points and 10 assists , while Skal Labissiere had 14 points and seven boards coming off the bench . Buddy Hield ( 10 points ) and Bogdan Bogdanovic ( 13 points , five assists ) contributed off the bench as well .
The host Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 104 - 101 , at Staples_Center on Monday . It was a back - and - forth game throughout , with the lead changing hands seven times by the game 's end . While Dallas led for much of the fourth quarter , LA was able to make a late push to come back to within one . After taking the lead by one point , the Clippers recovered a jump ball with 4 seconds remaining , leading to a clutch Avery Bradley lay - in to give the Clippers a three - point lead with under a second remaining . The Clippers ( 27 - 25 ) have now won four of their last five and do not seem to be missing a beat since trading star big man Blake Griffin last week . Griffin 's trade returned Avery Bradley and Tobias Harris from the Detroit Pistons . The duo has worked its way into the Clippers starting five seamlessly , and combined for 31 points in Monday 's win . The star of the show for LA , though , was Danilo Gallinari . Gallinari , who has struggled with injuries all season , was healthy and firing on all cylinders on Monday , as he scored a game - high 28 points on only 13 shot attempts . Dallas ( 17 - 37 ) is now 7 - 27 in games decided by five or fewer points this season . While the Mavericks have remained competitive with most teams , the relatively young squad remains one of the league 's bottom - tier teams due to poor clutch play . A lineup helmed by rookie point guard Dennis Smith , Jr. closed out the game for the Mavericks , which ended up in a 10 - point lead being blown over the last 4:42 of the game . Smith , Jr. finished the game with 12 points on 5 - of - 17 shooting , committed nine turnovers , and fouled out . The Mavericks will visit Golden_State on Thursday , while the Clippers face the Pistons on Friday .

The Bucks battled back to take a late lead , holding an advantage for much of the second half . The Clippers , though , fought back . Austin Rivers tied the game at 88 with a three - pointer , then hit a layup to give the Clippers the lead with just under six minutes remaining . The Clippers never gave up that lead , earning a much - needed win as they look to remain relevant in the Western_Conference playoff picture . Tobias Harris led the Clippers with 19 points on 8 - of - 17 shooting . DeAndre Jordan added a double - double , scoring 13 points and pulling down 16 rebounds . Overall , the team benefited from strong three - point shooting . The Clippers went 15 - of - 28 from beyond the arc in the win . The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the visiting Golden_State Warriors , 111 - 101 , at FedEx Forum on Saturday . Led by Marc Gasol 's 34 points and 14 rebounds , the Grizzlies took a 19 - point lead in the third quarter before the Warriors rallied , cutting the deficit to nine points with about nine minutes remaining . That 's as close as they would get , however . Stephen Curry and Kevin Durant were both ejected with 44 seconds left ; Curry for throwing his mouthpiece and Durant for arguing with the officials . Curry led the Warriors with 37 points , six rebounds and three assists , while Durant added 29 points , 13 rebounds and three blocks . Defense was key for Memphis , as it held Golden_State to 39 percent from the field and 32 percent from three - point range . Golden_State also committed 17 turnovers . Klay Thompson struggled from the field , scoring 14 points on 5 - of - 16 shooting . No other player on the roster had more than eight points , as the Warriors fell to 1 - 2 , the first time in more than two years they have been below .500 . James Ennis totaled 13 points , four rebounds and three assists on 6 - of - 6 shooting for Memphis ( 20 ) . Mike Conley finished with 10 points and seven assists , despite going just 3 - of - 14 from the field . Both teams have road matchups on Monday for their next game , with Memphis playing the Houston Rockets and Golden_State facing the Dallas Mavericks .

The Houston Rockets defeated the hosting Memphis Grizzlies , 105 - 83 , on Saturday evening . The Rockets ( 13 - 4 ) extended their positive run of results with an easy win over a Memphis ( 7 - 8 ) that was no match for Houston 's high - powered offense . Mike D'Antoni 's team quickly jumped to a 33 - 25 lead in the first quarter , and they never looked back . In fact , Houston won all four quarters and were in absolute control of the game from start to finish in order to clinch their eighth win in their last nine games . On the other hand , the Grizzlies dropped below the .500 mark . James Harden once again led Houston 's offense with a strong effort of 29 points , seven assists , and five rebounds . Chris Paul added 17 points with six assists , and Clint Capela once again notched a double - double after finishing with 17 points and 14 boards . Ryan Anderson added 13 points , and Eric Gordon chipped in with 12 points off the bench . The Grizzlies did n't have Mike Conley , but Mario Chalmers did a decent job starting as point guard with eight assists alongside six points , four rebounds , and four steals . Chandler Parsons led the way with 17 points , while both JaMychal Green and Marc Gasol ended with 15 points apiece . Gasol ended one rebound shy of a double - double .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 95 - 94 , at FedEx Forum on Wednesday evening . The Grizzlies started out strong , taking a 27 - 12 lead after one quarter . They carried the lead through halftime , before giving up a poor third quarter that allowed the Mavericks to take a two - point lead heading into the fourth . The Mavericks held a four - point lead with 3:30 to go in the game , before the Grizzlies battled back to tie things up with a clutch three - pointer by Marc Gasol , and then take a two - point lead with only 0 second left , thanks to a put - back jam by JaMychal Green . However , the game had room for one more highlight play , as Harrison Barnes banked in a game - winning , buzzer - beating , three - point shot , off an inbounds play with 0 second left , to steal the win for Dallas . Barnes led the way for the Mavericks ( 4 - 15 ) with 22 points , nine rebounds and one assist , in 34 minutes . Dennis Smith Jr. followed up with 17 points , four rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 26 minutes . J.J. Barea contributed 10 points , 11 assists and one rebound , in 24 minutes off the bench , while Devin Harris added 11 points , four steals and two rebounds , in 17 minutes off the bench . The Mavericks shot 43 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 28 from long range . Meanwhile , Tyreke Evans led the Grizzlies ( 7 - 10 ) with 18 points , nine rebounds , seven assists , two steals and one block , in 30 minutes . Marc Gasol tallied 14 points , 10 rebounds , four assists and one block , while Chandler Parsons chipped in 11 points on 5 - of - 9 shooting . The Grizzlies shot 46 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 29 from long range . This marked the sixth straight loss for the Grizzlies , who take on the Nuggets in Denver on Friday . The Mavericks play host to the Thunder on Saturday .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 102 - 101 , at FedEx Forum on Saturday . This was a competitive matchup throughout , as it took a extra - session to decide a winner . In fact , there were nine ties and 12 lead changes en route to Oklahoma_City 's win , as neither team led by more then five points for the final 25 minutes of action . Memphis did everything they could to lose , as they went 2 - of - 6 from the free - throw line in the final 10 seconds of regulation and overtime . Transition offense was the only true advantage for the Thunder in the stat sheet , as they won the fastbreak differential , 25 - 16 . The Thunder ( 12 - 13 ) got a triple - double out of Russell Westbrook , as he collected 20 points , 11 rebounds and 14 assists . Carmelo Anthony amassed 21 points , nine rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Those two combined to go just 14 - of - 49 from the field and 3 - of - 18 from three - point range though . Steven Adams finished with 21 points and nine rebounds , while Alexis Abrines accrued 20 points , four rebounds and three steals . The Grizzlies ( 8 - 18 ) were led by Tyreke Evans , as he tallied 29 points , 13 rebounds and five assists . Marc Gasol accumulated 22 points , six rebounds and six assists . Dillon Brooks provided 13 points , four rebounds and three assists . Ben McLemore led the bench with 17 points and four rebounds . Both teams return home on Monday , with Oklahoma_City hosting the Charlotte Hornets and Memphis facing the Miami Heat .
The Miami Heat defeated the Memphis Grizzlies 107 - 82 on Monday at FedExForum . The Heat made light work of the home team Monday , outscoring them by 17 points in the final quarter and 24 points across the entire second half . And it was a complete team effort from Miami , with seven different players managing to score in double figures . Point guard Goran Dragic led the way with 19 points , five assists and five rebounds in just 25 minutes , with Josh Richardson not far behind with 17 points and five rebounds in 30 minutes . As a team , Miami shot a very impressive 56 percent from the field and a scorching 52 percent from behind the arc . Tyler Johnson and Wayne Ellington were a big part of that , as they both came off the bench to shoot a combined 8 - of - 13 from three . The Grizzlies , on the other hand , failed to find the same success from the floor , shooting just 30 percent from behind the arc and 39 percent overall . The resulting 82 points was their lowest total in seven games , and they have now lost four games in a row and 15 of their last 16 . Marc Gasol led the way in defeat with 19 points and six rebounds , but he shot just 5 - of - 14 from the field . Andrew Harrison was close behind with 16 points of his own on 5 - of - 6 shooting , while Tyreke Evans was the only other Grizzlies player to hit double figures with 11 points . Up next , the Heat will head home Wednesday to take on the Trail_Blazers , while the Grizzlies will travel to Washington on Wednesday to play the Wizards .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the New_York Knicks , 105 - 99 , at FedEx Forum on Wednesday evening . The Grizzlies ( 15 - 28 ) and the Knicks ( 20 - 25 ) played a very even game early on , but the Grizzlies always looked in control and grabbed right from the get go and they never looked back . Memphis built a one - point lead after the first quarter , increased it to an eight - point advantage at half time , and extended it to a 15 - point lead after three . One would have thought that Memphis would cruise the rest of the way , but New_York did n't give up that easily . The Knicks won the final 12 minutes by a nine - point advantage , but it was n't enough and the Grizzlies walked away with a huge win that pushed their winning streak to two . Meanwhile , the Knicks remain on a downward spiral and now have dropped four of their last five . As it has been the trend all season long , once again Tyreke Evans was Memphis ' best player since he finished with 23 points , 10 assists , and six rebounds . JaMychal Green delivered another strong effort , since the power forward posted a double - double of 18 points , 13 rebounds , and three assists . Dillon Brooks had 17 points , and Jarell Martin had 17 points off the bench . Kristaps Porzingis led the way for the Knicks , as the Latvian star had 21 points and nine rebounds . Enes Kanter added 20 points with nine boards , while Courtney Lee chipped in with 18 points of his own . The bench delivered a strong performance as well , since Tim Hardaway Jr. had 16 points and Michael Beasley added 18 points with seven rebounds .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 92 - 88 , at FedEx Forum on Wednesday evening . Both teams started out slow . The Jazz took an eight point lead mid way though the first and hung on to lead 21 - 16 heading into the second . The Grizzlies battled back in the second and tied it up at 28 with six minutes left in the quarter , but the Jazz pulled away and settled on a 44 - 39 lead by halftime . The Jazz and Grizzlies played to a tie though the third , so that the Jazz took a five - point lead into the fourth . The Jazz expanded their lead to 11 , with 7:30 left in the fourth and did not look back from there , en route to their seventh straight win . Ricky Rubio led the way for the Jazz with 29 points on 8 - of - 16 shooting , eight rebounds , three assists and three steals , in 28 minutes of action . Rodney Hood followed up with 18 points on 5 - of - 12 shooting , while Rudy Gobert tallied eight points , 12 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . The Jazz shot 42 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 22 from long range . Meanwhile , Andrew Harrison was the high - point man for the Grizzlies , with 23 points on 9 - of - 15 shooting , in 35 minutes . Marc Gasol followed up with 20 points on 7 - of - 20 shooting , six rebounds , five assists , three blocks and one steal , in 36 minutes . Dillon Brooks and JaMychal Green chipped in 11 points each . The Grizzlies shot 42 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 23 from long range . The Grizzlies ( 18 - 36 ) will look to end a five game losing streak , as they take on the Thunder in OKC on Sunday . The Jazz ( 26 - 28 ) play host to the Hornets on Friday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 108 - 102 , at FedEx Forum on Friday . Denver needed this game a lot more than Memphis and it showed in the final minutes . In fact , the Nuggets held the Grizzlies to just 1 - of - 10 from the field to end the game , despite the fact that Memphis narrowly caught them with a 22 - 17 fourth quarter . The Nuggets actually led for over 45 minutes , as they led by at least three points from the first quarter on . Bench production was a huge factor for Denver , as they outscored Memphis ' bench , 45 - 27 . Both teams did a terrible job of taking care of the ball , as they combined for 31 steals . Shooting was also a critical difference for Denver , as they hit 55 percent of their shots while holding Memphis to just 44 percent from the field . The Nuggets ( 34 - 28 ) were led by Gary Harris , as he totaled 26 points , four rebounds and four steals on 11 - of - 18 from the field . Paul Millsap accrued 15 points , seven rebounds and four steals in a season - high 27 minutes . Nikola Jokic collected nine points , nine rebounds and five assists . Will Barton was huge off the bench , providing 24 points , six rebounds and two assists . The Grizzlies ( 18 - 43 ) were led by Marc Gasol , as he tallied 22 points , nine rebounds and five assists . Jarrell Martin amassed 16 points and seven rebounds . Mario Chalmers accumulated 12 points , six assists and two blocks while Ben McLemore generated 12 points , three rebounds , two assists and four steals . Both teams will play road games on Saturday for their next outings , with Memphis playing the Orlando Magic and Denver facing the Cleveland Cavaliers .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the host Atlanta Hawks , 105 - 100 , at Phillips Arena on Friday evening . It was a close contest for most of three quarters , however the Nuggets ( 2 - 3 ) were able to create some separation with a 15 - 7 run in the third , to take a 83 - 75 lead with just under nine minutes to play . The Nuggets upped their game in the fourth to seal the win , shooting 13 - of - 20 in the quarter , while the Hawks ( 1 - 5 ) let up on defense . Five players scored in double digits for Denver , including Gary Harris , Nikola Jokic and Will Barton , who tallied 18 points each . Jokic fortified his stat line with 15 rebounds and five assists , in 31 minutes of action . Paul Millsap and Emmanuel Mudiay added 16 points each , to help round out the Nuggets ' balanced attack . Meanwhile , Dennis Schroder was the high - point man for the Hawks , with 20 points , to go along with six assists and three rebounds , in 32 minutes . Taurean Prince continued his solid play with 19 points , seven rebounds , three assists and two steals , in 32 minutes . Dewayne Dedmon recorded a double - double with 13 points and 10 rebounds , while the only other player to score in double digits for the Hawks was Marco Belinelli , with 15 points on 5 - of - 8 shooting , in 28 minutes off the bench . The Hawks will look to bounce back when they play host to the Bucks on Sunday . The Nuggets will be in Brooklyn to take on the Nets on Sunday .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 116 - 103 , at Phillips Arena on Wednesday night . The two teams came into Wednesday night badly in need of a victory , as the Clippers ( 6 - 11 ) had lost a whopping nine straight while the Hawks ( 3 - 15 ) had dropped seven of their previous eight . The visitors turned out to want it just a bit more , as they rode a 9 - 2 run at the beginning of the fourth quarter to gain some distance and notch the double - digit road win . Los_Angeles enjoyed the benefit of some blistering shooting , as they posted a 58 percent success rate from the field , including 50 percent from three - point range . Blake Griffin unsurprisingly led the way for the Clippers with 26 points , 10 rebounds , 10 assists and one steal . Wesley Johnson was right behind him with 24 points , a total he supplemented with one rebound , one assist , one steal and one block . Johnson went a red - hot 8 - for - 10 from the field , including 6 - for - 7 from three - point range . Lou Williams drew the start at two - guard and poured in 20 points , along with eight assists , one rebound and one steal . Austin Rivers contributed 18 points , five assists , two rebounds , two steals and one block . Marco Belinelli paced the Hawks with 20 points in 26 minutes off the bench . He also tallied three rebounds , two assists and two steals . Dennis Schroder turned in 19 points , seven assists , three rebounds and one steal . Dewayne Dedmon supplied 17 points , six rebounds , one assist and one block . John Collins was stellar while starting at power forward , providing a 14 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and four steals . Taurean Prince notably scored just two points in 21 minutes , going 1 - for - 7 from the field . The Clippers head back to California to take on the Sacramento Kings in a Saturday night road showdown , while the Hawks are home against the New_York Knicks on Friday evening .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 121 - 114 , at Philips_Arena on Thursday evening . The Cavaliers ( 15 - 7 ) checked into Thursday as perhaps the NBA 's hottest team , having ripped off nine consecutive victories and seemingly having left their early - season struggles in the dust . Their chances at a 10th straight win appeared to be pretty solid against a Hawks ( 4 - 17 ) squad that had been able to do little right through the first 20 games of the campaign . However , as the old adage stresses , the games are played out on the court , not on the stat sheet . Atlanta surprised their visitors by bouncing back from a 42 - 35 first - quarter deficit with a 32 - 21 advantage in the second quarter that sent them into halftime with a 67 - 63 edge . Cleveland utilized intermission to regroup , however , as they regained the lead with a strong 36 - point third period before nearly matching their hosts point - for - point in the final 12 minutes to hang on for the win . The scoreboard operator was kept busy throughout the night , with each time tallying identical 52 percent success rate from the field . Kevin Love put on a second consecutive explosive performance to lead the Cavaliers , managing 25 points , 16 rebounds and two assists . LeBron James was right behind him with a 24 - point , 12 - assist double - double that also included six rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Dwyane Wade produced a bench - leading 19 points and supplemented them with three assists , two rebounds , four steals and two blocks . Jae Crowder poured in 15 points and added three assists and two rebounds . Jeff Green was productive on the second unit as well with 12 points , three rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Dennis Schroder took on his usual role as offensive leader for the Hawks , leading the way with 27 points , five assists and two rebounds . Ersan Ilyasova supplied 22 points , three rebounds and five steals . Marco Belinelli registered 18 points , five assists , four rebounds and one block in 28 minutes off the bench . John Collins contributed 13 points , seven rebounds , two steals and one block in his first start for Dewayne Dedmon ( leg ) . Taurean Prince totaled 12 points , four rebounds and two assists . The Cavaliers head back home to tangle with the Memphis Grizzlies on Saturday night , while the Hawks head to Brooklyn to face off with the Nets on Saturday afternoon .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 105 - 95 , at Philips_Arena on Wednesday night . The Pacers ( 18 - 14 ) came into the game with a vastly superior record to the Hawks ( 7 - 24 ) , but it was n't evident by the play in the first half . Atlanta hung with Indiana virtually point - for - point on their home court , leading to a slim 53 - 51 halftime advantage for the visitors . However , the Pacers managed to be just a bit better than the Hawks in the second half , outscoring their hosts by a 52 - 44 margin . They got it done with the help of some solid marksmanship , as they saw five players shoot better than 50 percent , and another tally a 46 percent success rate . Meanwhile , they played effective defense overall , with Atlanta 's highest scorer , John Collins , posting a modest 18 points . Victor Oladipo led Indiana with 23 points , which he complemented with five rebounds , two assists and one steal .
