Myles Turner followed with 20 points and added six rebounds , two assists , three blocks and one steal . Bojan Bogdanovic poured in 19 points and also brought in one rebound and recorded two steals . Darren Collison registered 11 points , one rebound and one assist . Cory Joseph turned in 11 points , three boards and two assists in 28 minutes off the bench . Lance Stephenson filled out the stat sheet on the second unit , totaling 10 points , eight rebounds , six assists and one block . Collins supplemented his aforementioned team - high scoring haul with nine rebounds and one block . Kent Bazemore and Marco Belinelli managed matching 13 - point contributions from the starting five and bench , respectively . The former also offered three rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block , while the latter posted three assists and one rebound . Miles Plumlee collected 10 points , five rebounds , one assist , two blocks and one steal . Ersan Ilyasova matched Plumlee 's scoring total and added five boards and one assist . Dennis Schroder had a rare down game with eight points on 4 - for - 15 shooting , and he also dished out eight assists , three rebounds and two steals . Taurean Prince had eight points , six rebounds , three assists and one block . The Pacers head back home and face the Brooklyn Nets on Saturday night , while the Hawks hit the road and do battle with the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Friday evening .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the visiting Dallas Mavericks , 112 - 107 , at Philips_Arena on Saturday evening . The teams fought to a tie through the first quarter . The second quarter stayed tight as well , with neither team taking a lead greater than a couple of possessions , with the Mavericks leading 53 - 48 at halftime . The Hawks started out the third with a 7 - 2 run to tie it up at 55 . They continued to apply pressure and led for most of the third before the Mavericks rallied back to take a one - point , 80 - 79 , lead heading into the fourth . Thing stayed close for most of the fourth , with the Mavs leading by two with 4:40 to go . However , the Hawks turned it up down the stretch , taking a slight edge and maintaining it for the final minutes . Dennis Schroder led the way for the Hawks , with 33 points on 13 - of - 22 shooting , seven assists , three rebounds and one steal , in 35 minutes . Ersan Ilyasova followed up with 21 points , seven rebounds , two assists , one steal and a block , while John Collins chipped in 13 points , four rebounds and two assists , in 20 minutes off the bench . The Hawks shot 57 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 24 from long range . Meanwhile , Harrison Barnes led Dallas with 22 points on 10 - of - 21 shooting , in 34 minutes . J.J. Barea came up large off the bench , with 15 points , 12 assists , three steals and two rebounds , in 29 minutes . Dirk Nowitzki finished with 18 points , six rebounds , four assists and one block . The Mavericks shot 51 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 33 from distance . The Mavs ( 9 - 25 ) play host to the Raptors on Boxing Day . The Hawks ( 8 - 25 ) play host to the Wizards on Wednesday .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 113 - 97 , at Philips_Arena on Saturday afternoon . The Bulls ( 18 - 28 ) did n't have problems to record another win , demostrating that their surge during the past month or so has been the real deal . Chicago jumped to a 29 - 21 lead in the first half , and they increased it to a 55 - 38 advantage at the halftime break , as the Hawks ( 13 - 32 ) simply did n't have answers for a Bulls team that was clicking on all cylinders . Atlanta fought back in the third quarter , but the Bulls never left the foot out of the gas and cruised their way in the fourth , sealing the deal on the road and registering their fourth win in their last five games . Robin Lopez was the star of the game for Chicago , as the big man finished with 20 points ( on 9 - of - 13 from the field ) and five rebounds . Lauri Markkanen had 19 points , Bobby Portis had 14 , and Justin Holiday chipped in with 13 points , four rebounds , and four assists . Zach LaVine continue to work his way back from injury , as he contributed eight points and nine boards in 18 minutes . The Hawks had a balanced offense since 13 different players managed to score . However , Dennis Schroder was the undisputed leader of the offense since he contributed 18 points , four assists , three rebounds and two steals . Dewayne Dedmon impressed off the bench , as he finished with 11 points and 11 rebounds in 23 minutes . No other Hawks player scored in double digits .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Utah Jazz , 104 - 90 , at Philips_Arena on Monday evening . The Hawks ( 14 - 32 ) delivered a strong performance on both ends of the court and as a result , they defeated a talented - - yet inconsistent - - Jazz ( 19 - 28 ) that did not have enough answers to fight back against an Atlanta team that seems to be on the rise . The first half showed both teams going back and forth , but the Hawks held a one - point lead ( 42 - 41 ) at the break . Atlanta increased their lead the rest of the way , winning the remaining two quarters by a combined 13 - point differential . The Hawks had four players scoring in double digits in this game and , as it has been the trend all season long , Dennis Schroder was the star thanks to his 20 - point performance . Taurean Prince had 17 points , three assists and three steals , while Kent Bazemore added 11 points of his own . Marco Belinelli also added 11 points off the bench . Ersan Ilyasova had five points and 11 boards . The Jazz registered five players scoring in double digits , although they featured an unsung hero coming off the bench since Alec Burks had 17 points . Donovan Mitchell had 13 points , but he only made five of his 13 shot attempts . Derrick Favors and Raul Neto had 11 points , while Royce O'Neale filled the stat sheet with 10 points , five boards , and four dimes .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 114 - 109 , at Philips_Arena on Friday . The Warriors ( 49 - 14 ) were massive favorites ahead of this game and even though they managed to pull away with the win , they did n't have the kind of dominant performance many were expecting considering they were playing against one of the worst teams in the Eastern_Conference such as the Hawks ( 19 - 44 ) . It 's safe to say the Warriors cruised , though , They built a 12 - point lead at halftime and never looked back , and even though Atlanta won the last two quarters ( 34 - 28 and 25 - 24 , respectively ) , Golden_State was never in danger of losing this game . Kevin Durant led the way for the Warriors with 28 points , five assists , three rebounds and two blocks . Stephen Curry also delivered 28 points , but he left the game with an ankle injury so his status going forward will likely be determined in the coming hours . Klay Thompson had 15 points , and Nick Young chipped in with 16 points off the bench . Draymond Green only had two points , but added nine assists and seven boards . Kent Bazemore was the best player for the Hawks , as he finished with 29 points while going 10 - 16 from the field . Dennis Schroder had 27 points and nine assists to go along with five rebounds . Taurean Prince had 15 points , four steals , and three rebounds . John Collins delivered a strong effort as well thanks to 16 points and eight rebounds .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Orlando Magic , 94 - 88 , at Philips_Arena on Sunday . In a battle between two bottom dwellers , Atlanta was able to prevail thanks to a big first half . In fact , a 35 - 25 second quarter in advantage of Atlanta really set the tone , as they carried a 13 - point lead into the half and never trailed in the second half . The shooting disparity was critical , as Atlanta shot 48 percent from the field while holding Orlando to just 34 percent . Rebounding was also huge , with the Hawks winning that battle , 52 - 41 . Ball movement was also a huge factor , with Atlanta recording 33 assists and Orlando handing out just 19 . The Hawks won despite attempting just one free - throw attempt , the lowest total from any team all season . The Magic ( 22 - 54 ) were led by D.J . Augustin , as he tallied 20 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Jonathan Issac totaled 15 points and four rebounds . Nikola Vucevic went just 3 - of - 19 from the field but still finished with 10 points , 14 rebounds , three assists and three blocks . Aaron Gordon amassed 10 points , seven rebounds and three assists . The Hawks ( 22 - 55 ) were led by Dewayne Dedmon , as he accrued 17 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . John Collins generated 10 points , 11 rebounds and two blocks . Tyler Dorsey led the bench with 19 points and two assists . Mike Muscala provided 13 points , 10 rebounds and three assists off the bench as well . On deck for Atlanta is a road matchup versus the Miami Heat on Tuesday . Orlando also returns to action on Tuesday , as they travel to face the New_York Knicks .
The Miami Heat defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 115 - 86 , at Philips_Arena on Wednesday evening . The Heat ( 42 - 36 ) came into Wednesday 's contest looking to make it two wins in two nights against the hapless Hawks ( 22 - 57 ) , which they 'd upended by a 101 - 98 score on Tuesday in Miami to clinch a playoff spot . It would have likely to blame the visitors if they came out a bit flat as a result , especially with Goran Dragic sitting with an ankle injury . Matters seemingly played out that way in the first quarter , with Atlanta taking a 29 - 23 lead in the first 12 minutes . However , it was all Heat from that point forward , as they hit or eclipsed 30 points in each of the last three periods while allowing their hosts no more than 21 points in any one quarter . The disparity lead to a comfortable and runaway victory for Miami , which produced identical 45 percent tallies from the floor and three - point range . Josh Richardson and Kelly Olynyk led the way for the Heat with matching 19 - point efforts , with the latter notably notching 15 of his on five three - pointers in the second quarter . Richardson added four rebounds , two assists , four blocks and three steals , while Olynyk also supplied eight rebounds and five assists . Justise Winslow turned in 18 points , five assists and one rebound . Rodney McGruder drew the start at shooting guard with Tyler Johnson sliding over to point guard in Dragic 's place , and he produced 14 points , two boards , one assist and one steal . Wayne Ellington poured in 11 points off the bench and also ripped down three rebounds and recorded one steal . Derrick Jones , Jr. went for 10 points , four boards and one assist . Johnson collected just six points , two rebounds , two assists and one block over 23 minutes . Hassan Whiteside totaled a modest four points but did haul in 13 rebounds , dish out two assists and post three blocks . Taurean Price paced the Hawks with 20 points , a total he supplemented with four assists , one rebound and one steal . Damion Lee delivered 15 points , four boards , one assist and one steal . Tyler Dorsey matched Lee 's scoring total while leading the bench and also offered five rebounds , one assist and two steals . John Collins managed a full line of nine points , eight rebounds , four assists and one block . Dewayne Dedmon pitched in six points , eight boards and two assists . The Heat 's next stop is in the Big Apple , where they 'll face off with the New_York Knicks on Friday night . The Hawks hit the road themselves and land in the Nation 's Capital , where they 'll tangle with the Washington Wizards on Friday evening , as well .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Atlanta Hawks,121-113 , at Philips_Arena on Tuesday evening . The 76ers ( 51 - 30 ) came into the contest with perhaps a bit more motivation than a team that already has a postseason spot well in hand , as they were looking to set a franchise record by extending their winning streak to 15 games . However , they were facing a Hawks ( 24 - 58 ) team that was coming off a pair of victories over a couple of other Eastern_Conference playoff teams in the Wizards and Celtics . Accordingly , Atlanta came out ready to compete , and they trailed by a very manageable 65 - 61 score at halftime . However , Philadelphia was determined to keep their extended stretch of success unblemished , and they were able to stave off a late surge by the home squad in the fourth quarter to secure the win . The Sixers held sizable advantages in both shooting and rebounding , as they drained 49 percent of their attempts while holding the Hawks to a 42 percent figure and also won the battle on the glass by a 54 - 39 margin . J.J. Redick spearheaded the Sixers with 28 points , a total he supplemented with five assists and four rebounds . Dario Saric exited the game after suffering a lip laceration in a collision with John Collins 13 seconds into the contest , so Ersan Ilyasova played a full load of minutes and posted 26 points , eight rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one steal . Marco Belinelli poured in 20 points and added four rebounds , one steal and one block . Amir Johnson posted 15 points , eight boards , five assists and one steal . Ben Simmons overcame an illness to turn in 14 points , 10 rebounds , six assists , two steals and one block . Robert Covington mustered six points , eight rebounds , four assists , three blocks and one steal . Taurean Prince led the Hawks with 27 points , a total he supplemented with six assists , four rebounds and one steal . Tyler Dorsey managed 17 points , two rebounds , one assist and one steal . Dewayne Dedmon tallied 14 points , seven rebounds , two assists and three blocks . Collins delivered 13 points , nine rebounds , five assists and one steal . Isaiah Taylor supplied 10 points , four assists , three rebounds and one steal . Mike Muscala registered nine points , four rebounds and two assists , while Damion Lee and DeAndre ' Bembry generated matching seven - point efforts in the starting five . The Sixers close out their season at home against the Bucks on the Wednesday evening , while the Hawks have now wrapped up their season .
The San_Antonio Spurs came away with a win on the road , 117 - 100 , against the Miami Heat at American_Airlines_Arena on Wednesday night . These two long - time playoff rivals got engaged in a tight first quarter that finished with 30 points apiece . However , the Spurs pulled away when they built a 15 - point advantage entering the final 12 minutes . San_Antonio never looked back , and they closed things out to maintain their perfect start to the season . San_Antonio ( 40 ) once again did not have Kawhi Leonard ( quadriceps ) , but that did not seem to matter . LaMarcus Aldridge paced the offense with 31 points , and Kyle Anderson once again did his best Leonard impression with a double - double of 12 points and 10 rebounds . Danny Green added 12 points ( on 6 - for - 7 shooting ) , seven rebounds and three assists , while Rudy Gay contributed with 22 points coming off the bench . As for the Heat ( 2 - 2 ) , they did n't have Hassan Whiteside ( knee ) , but Goran Dragic picked up the slack . The Slovenian point guard was questionable a few hours before tip - off due to a thigh injury , though he still finished with 20 points to be one of the offensive leaders for Miami . Their highest - scoring player was Tyler Johnson , however , as the point guard exploded for 23 points ( on 7 - for - 13 shooting ) off the bench . Meanwhile , James Johnson produced a solid display on both ends of the court with 21 points , seven rebounds , and four assists .
The Boston Celtics defeated the host Miami Heat , 96 - 90 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Saturday evening . This marks the Celtics ' fourth straight win , after they dropped their first two of the season . The Celtics led 74 - 63 after three quarters but the Heat gave them a scare with 70 run to bring it to a two - point game , with 2:16 left in the fourth . However , Kyrie Irving showed the poise of a champion as he poured in seven straight points for the Celtics , to seal the deal . Irving was the high - point man for the Celtics ( 4 - 2 ) with 24 points , on 10 - of - 23 shooting , along with four rebounds and three assists , in 33 minutes . Jayson Tatum had another impressive game , with 20 points and five rebounds , in 31 minutes . Al Horford was solid with 12 points , nine rebounds , three assists and one steal , while Marcus Smart chipped in 16 points , four rebounds and four assists , in 26 minutes off the bench . Meanwhile , Goran Dragic led the way for Miami ( 2 - 3 ) with 22 points , four assists , three rebounds and one block , in 36 minutes . Josh Richardson and James Johnson chipped in 16 points each , while Kelly Olynyk added 14 points , nine rebounds and three blocks , in 23 minutes off the bench . Justise Winslow hauled in 12 rebounds and contributed six points , three assists , two blocks and one steal , in 23 minutes . The Heat will look to bounce back as they play host to the Timberwolves on Monday . The Celtics play host to the Spurs on Monday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the host Miami Heat , 120 - 95 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Sunday evening . It was a back and forth first half , with Indiana leading 58 - 55 at halftime . However the tide turned in the third quarter , where the Pacers kicked things off with a 19 - 4 run , and ultimately outscored Miami 32 - 13 in the quarter to take a 90 - 68 lead into the final frame . The Pacers were able to cruise to the finish , grabbing their third straight win . Six players scored in double digits for the Pacers ( 9 - 8 ) , led by Bojan Bogdanovic , who poured in 26 points on 9 - of - 14 shooting , in 34 minutes . Myles Turner was huge on both ends of the floor for Indiana , and finished with 25 points , seven rebounds , four assists , three blocks and one steal , in 31 minutes . Victor Oladipo chipped in 15 points , while Domantas Sabonis hauled in 10 rebounds , in 18 minutes off the bench . The Pacers shot 59 percent from the field , including 48 percent from long range . Meanwhile , Wayne Ellington was on fire for the Heat ( 7 - 9 ) , as he tied his career - high with seven three - pointers , on his way to a team - high 21 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting , in 24 minutes off the bench . On the other hand , Dion Waiters went 0 - of - 10 from the field , as he struggled to find his groove . Hassan Whiteside tallied 15 points and seven rebounds , while Josh Richardson also tallied 15 points . Richardson left the game after being poked in the eye and did not return . The Heat will look to bounce back as they play host to the Celtics on Wednesday . The Pacers will be looking for their fourth straight win , as they take on the Magic in Orlando on Monday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the hosting Miami Heat , 123 - 95 , at American Airlines Center on Sunday evening . The Warriors ( 18 - 6 ) were coming off a huge win against the Orlando Magic , and continued their road trip with another excellent performance on the offensive end of the court . Despite the fact the Heat ( 11 - 12 ) led after the first quarter and were down by two after half time , they simply could n't find a way to contain Golden_State in the second half . The reigning NBA champions won the third quarter 37 - 17 and 24 - 18 in the fourth , looking dominant in the process and improving their road record to 10 - 3 . Meanwhile , Miami fell to 5 - 6 at home . Stephen Curry led the Warriors offensively with 30 points , as the two - time MVP winner shot 11 - of - 16 from the field and 5 - of - 9 from three - point range . Kevin Durant added 24 points with seven assists , and Klay Thompson chipped in with 19 points , five rebounds , and four assists . Omri Casspi contributed with 10 points and six boards off the bench . At the other end , Goran Dragic led the way for the Heat with 20 points and Josh Richardson added 12 points , but they would have liked a better performance from Dion Waiters . The shooting guard only made one of his 10 field - goal attempts , and finished the game with four points in 24 minutes . Tyler Johnson ( 13 points ) and Kelly Olynyk ( 14 points , seven boards and five assists ) did a good job off the bench as well .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the host Miami Heat , 102 - 95 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Wednesday . Despite the fact that Miami led for the majority of this game , it came down to the final seconds with Portland coming out as the victors . In fact , the Trail_Blazers led for less than five minutes , as they finished the game with a 32 - 16 fourth quarter to comeback and win . Free-throw shooting was a huge factor , with Portland hitting 20 - of - 23 and Miami going just 14 - of - 23 from the charity stripe . The Turnover differential was also a big factor , as Portland forced 16 turnovers from Miami , while committing just 11 on their end . The Trail_Blazers ( 14 - 13 ) were led by C.J . McCollum , as he tallied 28 points , three rebounds , three assists and two steals . Damian Lillard struggled early on , but still finished with 18 points , three rebounds and six assists . Al-Farouq Aminu recorded a 15 - point , 13 - rebound double - double . The Heat ( 13 - 14 ) had all five starters score in double figures , as none of them reached 20 points . Dion Waiters was the closest , as he accrued 17 points , two rebounds and three assists . James Johnson flirted with a triple - double , as he collected 10 points , 10 rebounds and eight assists . Wayne Ellington was huge off the bench , dropping 24 points . On deck for Portland is a road matchup versus the Orlando Magic on Friday . As for Miami , they play host to the Los Angeles Clippers on Saturday for their next fixture .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the host Miami Heat , 109 - 94 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Saturday . Miami are dealing with as many injuries as anyone right now , as they simply could n't match up with this potent New_Orleans roster in this game . The middle quarters were key , with New_Orleans outscoring Miami , 56 - 41 , as the Pelicans held the lead for the entirety of the second half . New_Orleans were lights - out , as they shot 53 percent from the field and 60 percent from three - point range . Miami shot just 42 percent from the field and 31 percent from long range . The Pelicans ( 17 - 16 ) were led by Anthony Davis , as he tallied 16 points , six rebounds , three assists and four blocks . DeMarcus Cousins finished with 16 points , seven rebounds , eight assists , two steals and three blocks . Jrue Holiday collected 13 points , six rebounds and four assists . Ian Clark was huge off the bench , as he dropped 19 points on 5 - of - 6 from three - point range . The Heat ( 17 - 16 ) were led by Tyler Johnson , as he amassed 20 points , three rebounds and two assists . Goran Dragic totaled 13 points , four rebounds and two assists . Josh Richardson accrued 12 points , four rebounds and two assists . On deck for Miami is a home matchup versus the Orlando Magic on Tuesday . New_Orleans will be off until Wednesday , as they host the Brooklyn Nets .
The Miami Heat defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 95 - 91 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Friday . Despite the fact that there were only four ties and four lead changes in this game , it was n't decided until the final whistle . In fact , Miami ended the game on an 8 - 1 run over the final three minutes , as that turned a three - point deficit into a four - point win . The second and fourth quarters were decisive for the Heat , as they outscored the Hornets , 56 - 35 . The shooting disparity was vast , with Miami hitting 45 percent of their shots while holding Charlotte to under 35 percent from the field . Much of that was attributed to ball movement , with the Heat recording 25 assists while the Hornets only handed out 12 dimes . The Hornets ( 20 - 28 ) got a gem out of Kemba Walker , as he tallied 30 points , six rebounds and five assists . Dwight Howard finished with 20 points , 16 rebounds and four blocks . No other player on the Hornets reached double figures in scoring or handed out more than three assists . The Heat ( 28 - 21 ) were led by Josh Richardson , as he accrued 19 points , two rebounds and five assists . James Johnson totaled 10 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . Wayne Ellington was huge off the bench , providing 17 points and two rebounds . Kelly Olynyk also played well off the bench , accumulating 16 points , four rebounds and six assists . Both teams play road games on Monday for their next fixture , with Charlotte facing the Indiana Pacers and Miami traveling to play the Dallas Mavericks .
The Houston Rockets defeated the host Miami Heat , 109 - 101 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Wednesday evening . The Rockets got out to a great start on the road , as they created some separation halfway through the first quarter , to take a 35 - 24 lead into the second . They pushed their lead to 17 mid way though the second quarter , but the Heat battled back to close the gap to just four , as they trailed 61 - 57 at halftime . The third quarter went back and forth , with the Heat taking a small lead at one point , but the Rockets were able to take back a three - point lead , ahead 83 - 80 , heading into the final frame . The Heat kept the pressure on and managed to take a two - point lead early in the fourth , however the Rockets jumped ahead one final time before they were able to seal the deal with a 90 run that put them ahead by seven with five minutes to go . They were able to hang on from there , to earn their sixth straight win . James Harden led the way for the Rockets with 41 points on 13 - of - 25 shooting , in 36 minutes . Chris Paul followed up with 24 points , seven rebounds , seven assists and one block , in 36 minutes . Clint Capela tallied 13 points and eight rebounds , while Gerald Green added 12 points and three rebounds , off the bench . The Rockets shot 51 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Josh Richardson and Goran Dragic poured in 30 points each to lead the Heat , while Hassan Whiteside came up big with 16 points , 17 rebounds and one assist . The Heat shot 45 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 32 from long range . The Heat ( 29 - 26 ) will look to bounce back , as they play host to the Bucks on Friday . The Rockets ( 40 - 13 ) play host to the Nuggets on Friday .
The Miami Heat defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 115 - 89 , at AmericanAirlines Arena on Saturday night . The Heat ( 31 - 29 ) looked absolutely dominant in this game , as they remembered some of their early - season form in a game where the Grizzlies ( 18 - 40 ) simply did n't have answers to what Miami was offering . The Heat jumped ahead to a three - point lead after the first 12 minutes ( 34 - 31 ) and they never looked back ; extending it to eight after two , 22 after three , and 26 at the final buzzer . The numbers did n't lie either . Miami shot better from the field ( 46 percent against 44 ) and won the rebounding battle as well ( 51 - 39 ) . Usually , that 's a winning combination . Six Miami players scored in double digits in this game . Tyler Johnson led the way with 23 points , while Justise Winslow had 17 points and seven rebounds . Josh Richardson added 15 points , while Hassan Whiteside had 12 points , eight boards and three blocks . Wayne Ellington had 15 points off the bench , and Bam Adebayo had 13 points . Goran Dragic struggled , though , with only six points . Andrew Harrison was the top scorer for the Grizzlies with 17 points , six assists and four rebounds . JaMychal Green had 10 points and 11 rebounds , and Deyonta Davis contributed 14 points and seven boards . Those were the only three Memphis players that scored in double digits , though , and even though five players contributed on offense , neither managed to crack the 10 - point mark .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the host MIami Heat , 131 - 113 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Thursday evening . The Lakers got out to a good start on the road , leading 20 - 7 mid way through the first quarter . However , the Heat answered back by outscoring the Lakers 29 - 13 through the rest of the quarter , to take a 36 - 33 lead into the second . The Lakers took it to another level in the second though , as they used a 21 - 4 run to take a 14 - point lead mid way through the quarter . They kept the pressure on , outscoring the Heat by a total of 40 - 26 in the quarter , to take a 73 - 62 lead into halftime . The Lakers stayed strong to start the second half , as they maintained their lead through the third quarter , to take a 104 - 94 lead into the final frame . They turned up the intensity yet again in the fourth , as they quickly expanded their lead to 20 points just minutes into the quarter , allowing themselves the opportunity to cruise to their fourth straight win . Isaiah Thomas was on fire for Los_Angeles , as he led the way with 29 points on 11 - of - 20 shooting , including 6 - of - 11 from long range , in 29 minutes off the bench . Julius Randle followed up with 25 points , six rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block , while Brandon Ingram tallied 19 points , five rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block . Lonzo Ball filled the stat sheet with eight points , seven assists , six rebounds and six steals . The Lakers shot 60 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 29 from long range . Meanwhile , Dwyane Wade led Miami with 25 points on 11 - of - 18 shooting , in 25 minutes off the bench . Goran Dragic tallied 19 points , seven assists , four rebounds and one steal , while Justise Winslow added 17 points , five rebounds , two assists and two steals . The Heat shot 48 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 31 from deep . The Heat ( 32 - 30 ) will look to bounce back as they host the Pistons on Saturday . The Lakers ( 27 - 34 ) take on the Spurs in San_Antonio on Saturday .
The Miami Heat defeated the Detroit Pistons , 105 - 96 , at AmericanAirlines Arena on Saturday . The Pistons ( 29 - 34 ) and the Heat ( 33 - 30 ) played a tightly - contested game in the first quarter , but Detroit was n't able to keep up with Miami 's rhythm and ended losing deservedly , further extending their negative streak and putting themselves one step further from a potential playoff spot while the Heat took another step towards a postseason berth . The big difference in this game was Miami 's performance in the second quarter , as their 32 - 18 lead over that period was enough to give them a much - needed win at home . With such a healthy lead , they decided to cruise their way the rest of the game and closed things out rather comfortably . Six Heat players ended scoring in double digits in this one . Josh Richardson and Kelly Olynyk scored 17 points each , although Olynyk 's performance certainly stood out since he came off the bench and only needed 23 minutes to reach that scoring output . James Johnson had 14 points , while Goran Dragic and Justise Winslow each had 13 points . Hassan Whiteside only scored eight points , but grabbed 19 rebounds . Andre Drummond led the way for Detroit with a strong double - double of 22 points , 18 rebounds , four steals and two blocks . Blake Griffin was the top scorer of the team thanks to a 31 - point performance , but he also added six assists and four boards . Reggie Bullock had 11 points and eight rebounds . No other Detroit player scored in double digits in this one , and the team shot just 42 percent from the field overall .
The Miami Heat defeated the Washington Wizards at American_Airlines_Arena on Saturday night . The Heat ( 36 - 31 ) came into the contest riding a wave of strong play , as they 'd emerged victorious in five of their previous seven games . However , the Wizards ( 38 - 29 ) had proven to be a rather tough puzzle to solve for them this season , as they 'd notched wins in two of three tries against Miami . The home squad came out seemingly determined to forge a tie in the series , as they exploded for a 60 - point first half while limiting Washington to 48 . The contest was then essentially decided in the third period , as the Heat racked up a whopping 43 points to enter the final 12 minutes with a 27 - point cushion . They treaded water the rest of the way by drawing even with the visitors during the fourth quarter , allowing them to maintain the same margin by game 's end . Miami made up for the absence of Hassan Whiteside ( hip ) with a balanced offensive effort in which seven players hit double digits in the scoring column . Jodie Meeks saw extended run in the blowout loss and led the Wizards with 23 points , a total he supplemented with four boards and two assists . Bradley Beal saw only 27 minutes of action and parlayed them into 14 points , three rebounds , one assist and one block . Ramon Sessions logged 12 points , four assists and two rebounds . Kelly Oubre , Jr. managed 11 points , six rebounds and two steals . Otto Porter , Jr. supplied 10 points , five boards , two assists and one steal . Tomas Satoransky finished with nine points , five boards , one assist and one steal . Mike Scott collected an efficient seven points and three rebounds in 15 minutes off the bench . James Johnson paced the Heat with 20 points and added five assists , two rebounds and one steal . Wayne Ellington poured in 17 points and also tallied three rebounds , two assists and one steal . Josh Richardson , Tyler Johnson , Kelly Olynyk and Rodney McGruder contributed matching 13 - point efforts . Richardson also posted four assists , one rebound and two steals , Johnson pitched in three assists and two rebounds , Olynyk ripped down 11 rebounds , dished out two assists , notched two blocks and recorded one steal and McGruder had one assist and one steal . Goran Dragic went for 10 points , three assists and two rebounds in only 19 minutes . Justise Winslow generated 10 points , eight rebounds and two assists . The Wizards head back home to tangle with the Minnesota Timberwolves on Tuesday evening , while the Heat head to the West Coast to take on the Portland Trail_Blazers on Monday night .
The Miami Heat defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 98 - 79 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Tuesday . While this was n't a wire - to - wire win , Miami held the lead for the final 45 minutes of play . The first quarter really set the tone , as they outscored Cleveland , 29 - 18 . The Cavaliers actually never got the game within 10 points after that dominant first quarter . Defense was key for Miami , as they held Cleveland to 37 percent from the field and 15 percent from long range . The Heat ended up connecting on 47 percent from the field and 31 percent from long range . Rim protection was also huge , with Miami recording nine blocks and the Cavaliers picking up just one block . Ball movement was also critical , with the Heat recording 24 assists while holding the Cavaliers to just 15 assists . The Cavaliers ( 44 - 30 ) had no player reach 20 points scored , as LeBron James led them with 18 points , six rebounds and seven assists . Jose Calderon started and totaled 11 points and two assists . Kevin Love left after just seven minutes due to an elbow to the face . Rodney Hood led the bench with 15 points and three boards . The Heat ( 40 - 35 ) were led by Kelly Olynyk , as he provided 19 points , five rebounds , three assists and three steals off the bench . James Johnson led the starters with 15 points , nine rebounds , five assists , two steals and three blocks . Josh Richardson accrued 15 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . On deck for Cleveland is a road matchup versus the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday . As for Miami , they play host to the Chicago Bulls on Thursday for their next fixture .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the visiting Atlanta Hawks , 109 - 91 , at Spectrum_Center on Friday evening . The Hornets ( 1 - 1 ) trailed by 10 after the first quarter and by seven after two quarters , however they came out of halftime with a new intensity and outscored the Hawks 60 - 35 in the second half . The Hawks ( 1 - 1 ) were held to 38 percent from the field and 23 percent from long range , and were hardly able to capitalize on the Hornets ' 21 turnovers . Dwight Howard was a man on a mission for the Hornets , as poured in 20 points and grabbed up 15 rebounds to help lead the way against his former squad . Kemba Walker was the high - point man for the Hornets , with 26 points on 6 - of - 13 shooting , and 10 - of - 12 from the foul line . Frank Kaminsky came up big for the Hornets , with 21 points six rebounds , three assists and a steal , in 33 minutes off the bench . Meanwhile , Dennis Schroder was the bright spot for the Hawks , with 25 points on 11 - of - 21 shooting , five assists , three rebounds and a steal , in 32 minutes . Three other players scored in double digits for Atlanta , including Taurean Prince , who finished with 15 points , six rebounds , two assists and a steal , in 29 minutes . Dwayne Dedmon and Kent Bazemore pitched in 11 points each . The Hawks look ahead to Sunday , when they take on the Nets in Brooklyn . The Hornets have a few days rest before they take on the Bucks in Milwaukee on Monday .
The visiting Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 115 - 107 , at Spectrum_Center on Wednesday . LeBron James scored 31 points to lead the Cavaliers , but he was on the bench when the Cleveland ( 8 - 7 ) took the lead for good late in the game . James picked up his fourth foul with 3:31 to play in the third quarter , and went to the bench , trailing 82 - 79 . Moments later , Kyle Korver hit a 3 - pointer that gave the Cavaliers an 86 - 84 lead with 1:6 left in the quarter that they would not relinquish . James returned with 8:58 to play and help extend a 95 - 88 lead to double digits in the fourth quarter . Kevin Love totaled 22 points and 10 rebounds as the Cavaliers won their third consecutive game . Jeff Green had 13 points , while Korver added 11 and J.R. Smith had 10 . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist scored a season - high 22 points but could n't prevent the Hornets ( 5 - 8 ) from losing their fifth in a row . Kemba Walker had 20 points and seven assists . Nic Batum totaled 16 points , six assists and five rebounds in his first game of the season after a tearing a ligament in his left elbow in October . Both teams are back in action Friday with the Cavaliers playing host to the Los_Angeles Clippers and the Hornets at the Chicago Bulls . Cavaliers : Host the Los_Angeles Clippers on Friday night .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 103 - 87 , at Spectrum_Center on Saturday evening . Kemba Walker , the Hornets ' most prized offensive piece , came into Saturday night 's contest partly compromised because of a wrist injury suffered in Friday 's three - point loss to the Bulls . However , the All-Star point guard battled through any discomfort to score a game - high 26 points , a total he supplemented with six assists and two rebounds . Walker was 8 - for - 17 from the field overall , including an impressive 6 - for - 9 from three - point range . The Hornets ( 6 - 9 ) also were extremely careful with the ball , committing only eight turnovers while eliciting 14 from the visiting Clippers ( 5 - 10 ) . Their defensive effort also included limiting Los_Angeles to just 40 percent shooting overall , including 28 percent from three - point range . Lou Williams paced the Clippers with a 25 - point effort off the bench , and he added four assists and two rebounds . Blake Griffin totaled 19 points , eight rebounds and four assists . DeAndre Jordan followed with a 10 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and two blocks . Wesley johnson and Austin Rivers provided matching nine - point efforts , with the former adding five rebounds , one assist , two blocks and one steal , and the latter supplying four boards , three assists and one steal . Jeremy Lamb , back on the second unit now that Nicolas Batum has returned to action , led the bench with 17 points , four rebounds , one assist and two steals . Dwight Howard mustered a 16 - point , 16 - rebound double - double that also included one assist , two steals and one block . Batum filled out the stat sheet with 12 points , seven assists , four rebounds , two blocks and one steal . Marvin Williams tallied 10 points , four rebounds , one assist , two blocks and one steal . The Clippers next to the Big Apple to take on the New_York Knicks on Monday night , while the Hornets remain home to tangle with the Minnesota Timberwolves on that same evening .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 110 - 99 , at Spectrum_Center on Saturday evening . The Lakers ( 10 - 15 ) are quietly assembling a winning streak with their second straight victory of the campaign , and once again they looked like a competent team on both ends of the court . The Hornets ( 9 - 16 ) actually built a four - point advantage at half time , but the Lakers used a strong second - half surge to come out on top . Los_Angeles led by one entering the fourth quarter , but won the final 12 minutes by a 10 - point margin to pull away for good . Jordan Clarkson was the best player offensively for the Lakers , as he finished with 22 points , six assists , and five rebounds coming off the bench . Lonzo Ball only registered five points , but he filled the stat sheet thanks to five rebounds and nine assists . Brandon Ingram added 18 points with six boards , and both Julius Randle and Kyle Kuzma contributed with 12 points off the bench . Dwight Howard was the best player for the Hornets , as the veteran big man finished with a double - double of 21 points and 12 rebounds while shooting 9 - for - 14 from the field . Kemba Walker added 23 points with four assists and Marvin Williams chipped in with 13 , but the rest of the offense went silent . Johnny O'Bryant III surprised with 11 points and seven boards off the bench , though .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 111 - 106 , at Spectrum_Center on Saturday evening . The Hornets ( 12 - 21 ) came into Saturday 's contest on a bit of a revenge mission , considering they 'd just been toppled by the Bucks ( 17 - 14 ) on Friday night in the first game of the home - and - home series . Matters were n't looking too favorable heading into the final period , despite Milwaukee being without Giannis Antetokounmpo due to knee soreness . The home team entered the fourth quarter trailing by an 85 - 81 margin , but they were able to go on a 28 - 17 run over the final 10:5 to secure their 10th home victory of the campaign . Both clubs had the hot hand from the field , with the visitors draining 48 percent of their 87 shot attempts and the Hornets posting a 49 percent success rate of their own . Khris Middleton unsurprisingly stepped up in Antetokounmpo 's absence , leading the way with 31 points and adding five rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . Eric Bledsoe filled out the stat sheet with 16 points , seven boards and six assists . John Henson matched Bledsoe 's scoring total and added five boards and one assist . Tony Snell poured in 11 points and added three assists , two rebounds and one block . Sean Kilpatrick matched Snell 's point total off the bench and complemented it with four boards and two assists . Malcolm Brogdon was productive on the second unit with 10 points , four dimes and one steal . Dwight Howard paced the Hornets with a 21 - point , 16 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and two blocks . Kemba Walker turned in 19 points , eight assists , one rebound and one block . Frank Kaminsky and Troy Graham co - led the bench with 14 - point tallies , with the former adding four rebounds , one assist and one steal , and the latter registering with a pair of boards . Jeremy Lamb posted 13 points , two rebounds and one assist . Nicolas Batum supplied a full line of 12 points , six assists , five rebounds , two blocks and one steal . The Bucks head back home to tangle with the Chicago Bulls on Tuesday evening , while the Hornets remain home and await the Boston Celtics for a Wednesday night showdown .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Washington Wizards , 133 - 109 , at Spectrum_Center on Wednesday evening . The Hornets ( 18 - 25 ) have n't exactly made their mark as an offensive juggernaut this season , but one would n't have known it by looking at their first - half performance . Charlotte exploded for 77 points over the first 24 minutes , leading to a 16 - point halftime lead . The focus then turned to their defense in the third quarter , as they limited the Wizards ( 25 - 20 ) to just 18 points during the period while compiling another 25 themselves . That paved the way for the surprisingly easy win , which also evened the Hornets ' home record at 12 - 12 for the season . As the final score implied , it was a red - letter offensive night for the hosts , which tallied a 49 percent success rate from the field , including 48 percent from three - point range . Seven Charlotte players also hit double digits in the scoring column , and the second unit compiled 52 points with extended minutes in the runaway victory . Bradley Beal led the way for the Wizards with 26 points , a total he supplemented with three rebounds , two assists and one block . Michael Scott collected a bench - leading 18 points and added three assists , two rebounds and one steal . Kelly Oubre , Jr. posted 16 points and five boards . John Wall had a near double - double of 12 points , nine assists , two rebounds and two blocks . Jason Smith poured in 10 points and also provided three rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Otto Porter , Jr. ( six points , two rebounds , two assists ) and Markieff Morris ( two points , five boards , one assist ) had decidedly underwhelming efforts , while Marcin Gortat was held scoreless over 18 minutes but supplied eight rebounds , one assist and two steals . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist paced the Hornets with 21 points while also registering four rebounds , two assists and three steals , all over a modest 23 minutes . Kemba Walker mustered 19 points , seven assists , three rebounds and two blocks . Dwight Howard produced an 18 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , two steals and two blocks . Jeremy Lamb 's 16 points led the reserves , and he complemented the scoring with three rebounds and one block . Frank Kaminsky was productive off the second unit as well with 14 points , two rebounds , two assists and one steal . Marvin Williams managed 12 points , three rebounds and one assist . Nicolas Batum poured in 11 points and also tallied four assists , three rebounds and one steal . The Wizards remain on the road and head to Motown for their next stop , where they 'll tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Friday night . The Hornets remain home and await a Saturday night visit from the Miami Heat .
The Miami Heat defeated the host Charlotte Hornets , 106 - 105 , at Spectrum_Center on Saturday evening . The Heat started out well and controlled the lead for most of the first half , before taking a 57 - 48 lead into halftime . The Hornets came out much stronger in the third quarter , and chipped away until they tied it up at 73 , with 3:12 left in the quarter . They then went on a 100 run to close the quarter and take an 83 - 73 lead into the final frame . Despite trailing for most of the quarter , the Heat snuck up on the Hornets , as they closed the gap to 105 - 102 on a driving layup by James Johnson with 30 seconds left . The Heat then immediately stole the inbound pass and Johnson knocked down a game - tying three . The Hornets flopped on their last possession , which allowed the Heat one more push up the floor , where Kelly Olynyk was fouled . Olynyk knocked down one - of - two free throws to take the win . Wayne Ellington was the high - point man for Miami , with 26 points on 10 - of - 15 shooting , in 36 minutes . James Johnson followed up with 22 points , seven assists and six rebounds , in 29 minutes , while Hassan Whiteside tallied 10 points , 14 rebounds and three assists , in 24 minutes . Kelly Olynyk added 16 points , 10 rebounds and three assists , in 24 minutes off the bench . The Heat shot 49 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 28 from long range . Meanwhile , Nicolas Batum led the Hornets with 26 points , six assists , three rebounds and three steals , in 33 minutes . Kemba Walker followed up with 22 points , seven assists , three rebounds and three steals , while Dwight Howard added 14 points , 15 rebounds , three blocks , an assist and a steal . The Hornets shot 46 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 27 from long range . The Hornets ( 18 - 26 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Kings on Monday . The Heat ( 27 - 19 ) take on the Rockets in Houston on Monday .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the host Charlotte Hornets , 101 - 96 , at Spectrum_Center on Wednesday . It took 15 ties and 10 lead changes to determine a winner , as this was one of the most competitive games of the season . In fact , the five - point final margin was the largest team for either team across the final 30 minutes of action . Ball movement was the difference for the Pelicans , as they out - assisted the Hornets , 26 - 16 . Free-throw shooting was Charlotte 's downfall , as they went just 18 - of - 31 from the free - throw line . The Pelicans ( 26 - 21 ) were led by Anthony Davis , as he tallied 19 points , six rebounds , four assists , three steals and two blocks . Jrue Holiday matched those 19 points , adding five rebounds and four assists to his tally . DeMarcus Cousins committed eight turnovers , but still accumulated 16 points , 13 rebounds , five assists and five blocks . The Hornets ( 19 - 27 ) were carried by Dwight Howards , as he totaled 22 points , 16 rebounds and three blocks . Marvin Williams amassed 14 points and 14 rebounds . Kemba Walker accrued 20 points , five rebounds and seven assists . Frank Kaminsky led the bench with 16 points and five rebounds . Both teams play home games on Friday for their next fixture , with New_Orleans hosting the Houston Rockets and Charlotte facing the Atlanta Hawks .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Chicago Bulls , 118 - 103 , at Spectrum_Center on Tuesday evening . The Hornets ( 28 - 33 ) have been seemingly honed in on their postseason aspirations since resuming play after the All-Star break , as they 'd rattled off victories in all three subsequent contests - - and four consecutive overall - - coming into Tuesday 's game . The outlook for the Bulls ( 20 - 41 ) was the opposite , as they 'd dropped eight of their previous 10 contests , including 23 of their 30 road tilts . However , it was Chicago that came out of the gates hot , as they took a 29 - 26 first - quarter lead . The teams were knotted at 51at the half , but that 's when Charlotte 's superior talent took over . They compiled 36 points in the third and followed up with 31 in the final period , leading to a comfortable victory . Both teams shot particularly well , with the hosts edging the visitors in that category 54 percent to 48 percent . In all , six Bulls players hit double digits in the scoring column , but none compiled more than Zach LaVine 's 21 points , which he complemented with four rebounds and four assists . Denzel Valentine followed LaVine with 14 points , a total he supplemented with six rebounds , four assists and one steal . Cristiano Felicio provided 12 points , six boards , four assists and one steal . Bobby Portis matched his scoring total to lead the bench and also hauled in 10 rebounds , dished out one assist and recorded one steal . Lauri Markkanen and David Nwaba posted matching 11 - point efforts , with the former supplying seven boards , one assist and two steals , and the latter generating six rebounds , two assists , three steals and one block . Kris Dunn registered 10 points , three assists , two rebounds and two blocks . Kemba Walker turned in 31 points , five assists , two rebounds and three steals . Dwight Howard finished with 24 points , six rebounds , one assist and five steals . Jeremy Lamb accounted for a bench - leading 15 points and complemented them with five assists and one rebound . Marvin Williams totaled 14 points , five rebounds , one assist and one block . Frank Kaminsky was productive off the bench as well with 11 points , two rebounds and one block . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist was forced from the game after six minutes with a hamstring injury and was unable to return . The Bulls head back home to tangle with the Dallas Mavericks on Friday night , while the Hornets hit the road to face off with the Boston Celtics on Wednesday evening .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 125 - 111 , at Spectrum_Center on Thursday evening . The Nets ( 21 - 45 ) have been in spoiler mode for some time now , as any postseason aspirations they may have had are a distant memory . Brooklyn has been playing competitively in many of its losses , making them a dangerous opponent with nothing to lose . The Hornets ( 28 - 38 ) found that out the hard way Thursday , allowing a whopping 65 points to the visitors in the first half and then coming up with no real answers at intermission . The Nets racked up another 60 over the third and fourth periods and shot an impressive 51 percent overall . They benefited from an excellent performance by their second unit , which compiled 54 points . Allen Crabbe spearheaded the Nets ' efforts with 29 points , a total he supplemented with eight rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Caris LeVert tallied a bench - leading 22 points and eight assists while also contributing four rebounds and one steal . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson generated an 18 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included four assists , two blocks and one steal . DeMarre Carroll pitched in 15 points , five boards , three assists , three steals and one block . Jarrett Allen registered 13 points , seven rebounds , one assist and one block . Joe Harris poured in 11 points and dished out one assist . D'Angelo Russell posted eight points , two rebounds and two assists . Kemba Walker paced the Hornets with 21 points and added six assists and two steals . Dwight Howard was next with 19 points , which he complemented with seven rebounds , three blocks and one steal . Jeremy Lamb accounted for 15 points and two rebounds . Cody Zeller and Malik Monk posted matching 13 - point efforts , with the former adding four rebounds and one assist , and the latter totaling five assists , three rebounds and one block . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist turned in 10 points , five rebounds and one assist . The Nets head back home and face off with the Philadelphia 76ers on Sunday evening , while the Hornets remain home and await a Saturday afternoon visit from the Phoenix Suns .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 140 - 79 , at Spectrum_Center on Thursday . The Hornets ( 32 - 41 ) had one of their best performances of the season , and they ended destroying a Grizzlies ( 19 - 53 ) team that could n't deny a bucket to save their lives . After jumping to a 37 - 14 advantage in the first quarter , Charlotte did n't sit back and did n't take the foot off the gas for one second . In fact , Charlotte won all three remaining quarters ( 38 - 28 , 37 - 15 and 28 - 22 , respectively ) and cruised their way to the biggest win of the entire season if we consider the point differential . Kemba Walker led the way for Charlotte since he had an impressive performance of 46 points , four rebounds and four assists , including a franchise - high 10 three - pointers . Marvin Williams had 15 points with six rebounds , and Jeremy Lamb filled the stat sheet thanks to 12 points , nine rebounds and six assists . Dwayne Bacon ( 15 points ) and Frank Kaminsky ( 14 points ) did a good job off the bench as well . Wayne Selden Jr. was the top scorer for the Grizzlies in this game , as he came off the bench and ended scoring 18 points while going 7 - 12 from the field . Tyreke Evans chipped in with 16 points , seven rebounds and four assists . Jarell Martin contributed 12 points and eight boards . No other Memphis player scored over 10 points , and the team as a whole shot just 38 percent from the field .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 123 - 117 , at Spectrum_Center on Sunday . The Pacers ( 48 - 33 ) and the Hornets ( 35 - 46 ) engaged in quite a battle as both teams wanted to end the regular season as strong as possible , but this time Indiana 's better individual quality decided the game in their favor . The Pacers quickly jumped to a 31 - 25 advantage in the first quarter , and they continued to dominate the rest of the way after winning the second and third quarters , 39 - 32 and 25 - 24 , respectively . Charlotte won the final 12 minutes by a 36 - 28 score , but it was n't enough and Indiana ended winning the game rather easily . Domantas Sabonis came off the bench for the Pacers but ended leading the team offensively thanks to 30 points ( on 13 - of - 21 from the field ) , and he also added eight rebounds , three assists and three steals . Victor Oladipo filled the stat sheet as well since he finished with 27 points , five assists , three boards , and three steals . Bojan Bogdanovic had 13 points , the same tally as Cory Joseph and Glenn Robinson III . Seven Charlotte players scored in double digits , but the top scorer came off the bench as Malik Monk had an impressive effort of 22 points in only 24 minutes . Dwight Howard had 10 points and 12 rebounds , while Kemba Walker chipped in with 12 points and five assists . Marvin Williams added 16 points , and Guillermo Hernangomez delivered 14 points and eight rebounds .
The Utah Jazz took down the visiting Los_Angeles Lakers at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Saturday , 96 - 81 . Utah ( 3 - 3 ) evened its record after a tumultuous start to the new season . On Saturday , the team failed to eclipse 100 points for the fifth time in six games , but made up for its low scoring totals with strong defensive play . Holding Los_Angeles to just 38 percent shooting and five made three - pointers , the Jazz was able to hold a comfortable lead for the majority of regulation . Throughout the game , rookie Donovan Mitchell proved to be a tremendous bright spot for Utah . Mitchell , who ranked last in the league in True Shooting Percentage before Saturday 's game , scored a highly efficient 22 points to lead the team . The 13th overall pick in the 2017 draft came off the bench and played 27 minutes , leading the team in both scoring and shot attempts for the second time this season . Utah has struggled to find a reliable first option early in the year , so Mitchell 's confidence and efficiency for a rookie was surely appreciated . The Lakers ( 2 - 4 ) , meanwhile , saw far less impressive play from their highly - touted rookie guard . Second overall pick Lonzo Ball once again struggled to find the basket on Saturday , shooting a woeful 3 - of - 9 from the field and posting five turnovers with just four assists . The former UCLA stud delivered an impressive outing when LA faced Phoenix , but has shot under 25 percent from the field in his other five games . It was a tough shooting night for the majority of the Lakers , as the team finished just 5 - of - 22 from beyond the arc . While LA was able to outscore Utah 40 - 36 in the paint , struggles with perimeter play hampered the team 's offense all night . In addition to Ball , shooting guard Kentavious Caldwell-Pope finished a dismal 2 - of - 11 from the field . Los_Angeles also would have liked to see better shooting from the free - throw line , where it went just 70 percent in total . Utah will host the Dallas Mavericks on Tuesday , while Los_Angeles will host the Pistons on Thursday .
The Miami Heat took down the Utah Jazz , 84 - 74 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Friday . Miami ( 6 - 6 ) saw success on the defensive end in its fifth game of an extended road trip . In Utah , star center Hassan Whiteside dominated , pulling down a game - high 20 rebounds while anchoring the successful Heat defense . Whiteside delivered three steals and three blocks . Thanks to the strong defensive effort , Miami was able to stomach a sub - par scoring performance . The Heat shot only 30 - of - 77 from the field and dished out only ten assists as a team . Despite the poor offensive night , the Heat were able to pull ahead in the fourth quarter , establishing a double - digit lead in the final three minutes . Utah ( 5 - 7 ) has now dropped three straight home games after starting a perfect 50 this season . The Jazz have seen their fair share of struggles on the offensive end , and Friday epitomized the team 's issues . Utah shot only 34 percent from the field , coming up with only 74 total points on the night . Once again , Utah failed to find a solid primary option on offense . Guard Rodney Hood led the team with 19 points , but shot just 5 - of - 19 from the field . No Utah starter scored more than 12 points . Rookie Donovan Mitchell , who earned the start , scored 12 points but shot only 5 - of - 14 on the night . Utah will host Brooklyn on Saturday , while the Heat will visit Detroit on Sunday .
The Utah Jazz protected their home court on Saturday , defeating the visiting Milwaukee Bucks , 121 - 108 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena . Utah ( 9 - 11 ) has started the season slowly , but remains a tough matchup on its home court . The Jazz are now 8 - 4 in Utah , and won Saturday 's home stand in impressive fashion . The team made 18 three - pointers , a new single - game franchise record . While it was the team 's eighth straight game without star center Rudy Gobert , the Jazz were able to excel without their franchise player . Rookie Donovan Mitchell led the team , pouring in 24 points including six made three - pointers . Off the bench , sixth man Rodney Hood added 21 points and knocked down three three - pointers . The inconsistent duo had a stellar night , helping Utah 's impressive efficiency with a combined 17 - of - 31 shooting performance . Utah also set a new season high in assists , dishing out 31 en route to the win . Milwaukee ( 9 - 9 ) is not lacking in talent , but has struggled to stay firmly over .500 early in the season . The Jazz were the second team in the last two weeks that Milwaukee allowed to set a franchise high in three - pointers . On Saturday , defense proved a major issue for the Bucks , as the team allowed over 56 percent of Utah 's shots to be successful . The Bucks were able to construct their own stellar offensive outing , shooting 53 percent as a team . Superstar forward Giannis Antetokounmpo led the team with 27 points and had 14 rebounds . However , perimeter defense proved to be too large an issue to overcome , as the Bucks were sent home easily on Saturday night . Utah will host the Denver Nuggets on Tuesday , while the Bucks will visit Sacramento .
The Utah Jazz took down the visiting New_Orleans Pelicans , 114 - 108 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Friday night . Utah ( 12 - 11 ) is back above .500 thanks to Friday 's win , which came on the back of a whopping scoring night from rookie Donovan Mitchell . Mitchell became the first rookie in the 2017 class to score at least 40 points in a game , leading the Jazz with 41 . The rookie guard posted his new career high on 13 - of - 25 shooting , including six made three - pointers . It was a much less balanced approach than on previous nights for Utah , as the team leaned heavily on Mitchell to provide offensive production . Only seven Utah players scored on Friday , and Mitchell was one of only two players to score more than 13 points . The other was bench guard Alec Burks , who recorded 24 points on the heels of a 28 - point outing on Thursday . The Jazz as a whole shot an efficient 49 percent from the field and hit 12 three - pointers on the night . New_Orleans ( 11 - 11 ) fell to .500 after dropping its third straight game on Friday . All five Pelicans starters scored in double figures , as the team took an unusually balanced approach . Still , the superstar duo of Anthony Davis and DeMarcus Cousins led the team on both ends . Cousins was the team 's top scorer , posting 23 points to go with 13 rebounds . Davis added a double - double , scoring 19 points along with 10 rebounds . The Pelicans had issues at the line throughout the night , though , making just nine free - throws on 60 percent shooting . The Pelicans will visit Portland on Saturday , while Utah will see the Washington Wizards on Monday .
The host Utah Jazz blew out the Washington Wizards at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Monday , 116 - 69 . The Jazz ( 13 - 11 ) have now won six straight , with Monday 's win coming in historic fashion . Monday 's blowout marked the second - largest margin of victory in franchise history for Utah . Center Rudy Gobert made his return to the lineup Monday after missing the past four weeks with a knee injury . Gobert contributed in limited fashion on the offensive end ( four points ) , but blocked two shots and had a steal on defense . Defense was the key for Utah , as Washington was held to just 28 percent shooting from the field . On the offensive end , guard Alec Burks had a team - high 27 points . The veteran has now turned in three straight performances of at least 24 points . Washington ( 12 - 11 ) , meanwhile , had its largest deficit of the season in Monday 's loss . The Wizards shot only 28 percent from the field and hit just four three - pointers on the night . Starters Bradley Beal and Marcin Gortat combined to go just 4 - of - 20 from the field in the loss , also contributing three turnovers . Washington also had a significant deficit on the glass , pulling down just 32 boards as opposed to 52 from Utah . It was an all - around off night for the Wizards , as only one Wizard scored more than 11 points in the game . The Jazz will visit OKC on Tuesday , while the Wizards will travel to Portland .
The Houston Rockets defeated the host Utah Jazz , 112 - 101 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Thursday evening . Despite the Jazz 's strong home record , the Rockets came into Utah and took control from the start . The Rockets led 25 - 20 after one quarter and carried the five - point lead to halftime , where they led 51 - 46 . Houston came out firing on all cylinders in the third , where they outscored the Jazz 37 - 20 , to take an 88 - 66 lead into the final frame . The Rockets extended their lead to 24 points , before the Jazz took to a 90 run to make things interesting , however the Rockets pulled away for the win . This marks the eighth straight win for the Rockets , coinciding with Chris Paul 's return to the lineup . Paul was stellar in this one , with 18 points , 13 assists , nine rebounds , three steals and one block , in 36 minutes . James Harden finished with 29 points on 8 - of - 19 shooting , five rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 35 minutes . Ryan Anderson added 23 points , six rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 35 minutes . The Rockets shot 47 percent from the field , including 18 - of - 41 from long range . Meanwhile , Donovan Mitchell led the Jazz with 26 points on 9 - of - 19 shooting , four rebounds , four assists and one steal , in 35 minutes . Alec Burks followed up with 17 points , while Thabo Sefolosha chipped in 14 points off the bench . The Jazz shot 44 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 30 from long range . The Jazz ( 13 - 13 ) go on to take on the Bucks in Milwaukee on Saturday . The Rockets ( 19 - 4 ) visit Portland to take on the Trail_Blazers on Saturday .
The visiting New_Orleans Pelicans took down the struggling Utah Jazz , 108 - 98 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Wednesday . New_Orleans ( 19 - 18 ) snapped a quick two - game losing streak with Wednesday 's win . The team has had issues with depth all season , but was able to rely on its starters to take down Utah . The Pelicans ' starting five combined for 90 of the team 's 108 points and had 37 total rebounds . Superstar big man Anthony Davis led the way with 29 points and 15 rebounds . Davis played a team - high 40 minutes on Wednesday , helping make up for star center DeMarcus Cousins ' mildly limited minutes due to foul trouble . Cousins had five fouls on the night , but managed to record a 19 - point , 11 - rebound double - double nonetheless . Utah ( 16 - 22 ) , meanwhile , has lost 11 of its last 14 games . The team is still without star center Rudy Gobert ( knee ) . On Wednesday , Utah struggled to find reliable sources of offense . The team shot just 21 percent from three - point range and reached the free - throw line a meager 17 times . The top scorer for the Jazz , rookie Donovan Mitchell , had 24 points but shot just 6 - of - 17 on the night . Two of Mitchell 's buckets came in garbage time , when the rookie refused to let up his intense offensive push . Veteran Joe Johnson added another 20 points off the bench . The Jazz will visit Denver on Friday , while the Pelicans will travel to Minnesota on Saturday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 97 - 90 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Saturday . Despite the fact that Utah were sizable favorites in this matchup , eight ties and six lead changes show just how close this game was . In fact , this game was within a single - digit margin for all but six minutes , as neither team led by more than seven points for the final 30 minutes of action . Free-throw shooting was huge for the Jazz , as they connected on 20 - of - 26 while the Mavericks hit just 12 - of - 14 . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Utah recording seven more assists than Dallas while committing five fewer turnovers . Scoring down low was also big , with Utah winning that battle , 46 - 30 . The Mavericks ( 18 - 42 ) were led by J.J Barea , as he tallied 17 points , three rebounds and 12 assists . Dirk Nowitzki finished with 12 points , 10 rebounds and three blocks . Yogi Ferrell led the bench with 13 points , five rebounds and four assists . Dennis Smith Jr. had a game to forget , as he totaled seven points , seven rebounds , no assists and five turnovers on 2 - of - 11 from the field . The Jazz ( 31 - 29 ) got another gem out of Donovan Mitchell , as he led the team with 25 points , six rebounds , five assists and two steals . Derrick Favors accrued 14 points and six rebounds . Rudy Gobert amassed 13 points and 10 rebounds while Joe Ingles accumulated 12 points , four rebounds , eight assists , two steals and two blocks . Both teams play home games on Monday for their next fixtures , with Utah welcoming the Houston Rockets and Dallas playing the Indiana Pacers .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Orlando Magic , 94 - 80 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Monday . While there were 10 lead changes in the first 20 minutes , Utah held the lead for the entirety of the second half . The second quarter is where the game was decided , as the Jazz outscored the Magic , 29 - 15 , as Orlando never got the game within five points in the second half . Defense was once again the key for Utah , as they held Orlando to 34 percent from the field and 32 percent from three - point range . Defensive rebounding was a big part of that , with the Jazz winning that battle , 42 - 30 . Utah ended up shooting 49 percent from the field and 32 percent from long range . The Magic ( 20 - 44 ) were led by Nikola Vucevic , as he tallied 15 points , 12 rebounds and three assists . Aaron Gordon finished with 13 points and six boards . Evan Fournier went just 4 - of - 18 from the field to total 12 points , two rebounds and two assists . The Jazz ( 34 - 30 ) got a gem out of Rudy Gobert , as he collected 21 points , 17 rebounds and two blocks . Donovan Mitchell accrued 19 points , five rebounds and four assists . Joe Ingles generated 18 points , seven rebounds , eight assists and three steals . Ricky Rubio accumulated 12 points , four rebounds and eight assists . Both teams will play road games on Wednesday for their next outings , with Utah traveling to face the Indiana Pacers and Orlando facing the Los_Angeles Lakers .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Sacramento Kings 105 - 100 at Golden_1_Center on Wednesday . The Rockets played their second game of a road back - to - back after edging the Warriors in a thriller on Tuesday , and although they played without newcomer Chris Paul ( knee ) , Clint Capella and James Harden were able to muscle Houston to a 20 record to start the season . The Kings showed promise from their youthful team , playing physical basketball in the post and holding the Rockets to just 27 percent from behind the three point line . Houston took a four point lead into half , but was not able to sustain a large lead in the second half as Sacramento ( 0 - 1 ) rallied from a 10 point deficit in the third quarter behind leadership from George Hill and quality shots from Skal Labissiere and Buddy Hield . Hill finished with 16 points , three rebounds and three assists , while Willie-Cauley Stein led the Kings with 21 points and 10 boards . Labissiere and Hield both logged 33 minutes each as starters and combined for 31 points , 15 rebounds and five assists . De'Aaron Fox , the Kings premier selection out of Kentucky in the NBA Draft , posted 24 minutes off the bench and scored 14 points , to go with four rebounds and five assists . James Harden led all scorers with 27 points , nine assists and three rebounds on 8 - of - 21 shooting . Harden , along with many other Rockets players , struggled from behind the arc and finished shooting 4 - of - 14 from deep . Capella 's 22 points and 17 rebounds , which tied a career high in rebounds for the Rockets big man , was instrumental in Houston escaping Sacramento with a second straight victory to open the season . Next up , the Kings visit the Dallas Mavericks on Friday , while the Rockets host their home opener against the same Mavericks on Saturday .
The host Sacramento Kings took down the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 94 - 86 , at Golden One Center on Tuesday . Sacramento ( 2 - 8 ) bounced back from an eight - game losing losing streak on Tuesday . The Kings were bolstered on their home court by strong bench play . The team got off to a rough start , falling down by double digits before scoring a single point . Sacramento ended up leaning heavily on its second unit , setting an NBA record with 29 bench points before a single starter scored . Sophomore guard Buddy Hield wound up being the offense 's driving force , scoring a team - high 21 points on 7 - of - 9 shooting . Rookie guard De'Aaron Fox also impressed off the bench , shooting 5 - of - 10 for 10 points and dishing out eight assists off the bench . The Kings ultimately shot 46 percent on the night , handily out - shooting the Thunder , who finished at just 33 percent on the night . Oklahoma_City ( 4 - 6 ) , meanwhile , has not started the season as many expected it to . The Thunder are rich with star talent after the acquisition of Paul George and Carmelo Anthony , but the team has still dropped three straight games and remains winless against the Western_Conference . On Tuesday , the Thunder struggled heavily from the field , shooting just over 33 percent as a team . Reigning MVP Russell Westbrook was a big part of the Thunder 's issues , as he shot just 7 - of - 21 from the field . George and Anthony fared no better , combining to shoot only 8 - of - 33 on the night . While the team found some early offense in a blazing hot start from center Steven Adams , who scored 10 first - quarter points , they failed to involve him for the rest of the night . Adams finished the game with 14 points on five shot attempts . Sacramento will host the 76ers on Thursday , while the Thunder will visit Denver .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the visiting Philadelphia 76ers , 109 - 108 , at Golden One Center on Thursday evening . Tied at 26 after the first quarter , the game stayed tight most of the way until the fourth . The Kings ( 3 - 8 ) held a three - point lead heading into the final quarter , but the 76ers ( 6 - 5 ) started the quarter strong and quickly took the lead , which they expanded to a six - point margin with 1:30 remaining in the game . However , things took a turn once again as the Kings willed themselves to their second straight win , behind a clutch block from Willie Cauley-Stein and a game - winning jumper by De'Aaron fox . It marks the first game - winner of Fox 's young career , as he finished with 11 points , seven assists and four rebounds , in 29 minutes off the bench . Zach Randolph was the high - point man for the Kings , with 20 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting , in 29 minutes . Justin Jackson contributed 19 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting , in 29 minutes off the bench , while Willie Cauley-Stein added 15 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting , in 24 minutes . The Kings shot 43 percent from the field , including 44 percent from long range , and dished 20 assists in the contest . They also hit a season - high 12 threes . Meanwhile , the 76ers saw their five - game winning streak come to an end as they fell apart late in the game after what looked like another promising performance . All five starters scored in double digits for the Sixers , led by Robert Covington , who finished with 24 points , on 7 - of - 16 shooting , in 35 minutes . Joel Embiid followed up with 22 points and 15 rebounds , in 32 minutes , while Ben Simmons added 18 points and six assists , in 26 minutes . The 76ers will look to get back on track as they take on the Warriors in Golden_State on Saturday . The Kings take on the Knicks in New_York on Saturday .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Sacramento Kings , 102 - 87 , at Golden_1_Center on Sunday afternoon . The Raptors ( 17 - 7 ) had reason to believe they 'd have a relatively easy assignment despite the road setting , as the Kings ( 8 - 18 ) did n't have the talent to match Toronto on paper . While that 's not always the best measuring stick for how a game will unfold , it was reasonably accurate Sunday . The visitors started fast and kept their foot on the gas , turning a modest 22 - 17 first - quarter lead into a 54 - 46 halftime advantage . The Raptors would go on to outscore Sacramento by a 48 - 41 margin in the second half , sealing the double - digit road victory in efficient fashion . While the Kings actually enjoyed a strong shooting afternoon marked by a 48 percent success rate from the field , they ultimately committed 21 turnovers while only eliciting 13 from Toronto . DeMar DeRozan led the way for the Raptors with 25 points , nine assists and three rebounds . Serge Ibaka managed 20 points , four rebounds , one assist and one block . Kyle Lowry contributed a 15 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included six assists and one steal . C.J . Miles tallied a bench - leading 11 points and added two rebounds , one assist and five steals . Jonas Valanciunas contributed nine points , eight boards and a steal . Backup Jakob Poeltl matched his scoring total and also hauled in four rebounds . Zach Randolph paced the Kings with a 19 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and one steal . Buddy Hield led the bench with 17 points and complemented them with three rebounds , two assists and one steal . Bogdan Bogdanovic supplied 15 points , one rebound and one assist . Jakarr Sampson was solid off the bench with 11 points , four rebounds , three blocks and one steal .
