The Raptors continue their West Coast swing with a visit to the Los_Angeles Clippers on Tuesday evening , while the Kings remain home and tangle with the Phoenix Suns on Wednesday night .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers , 109 - 95 , at Golden1 Center on Thursday evening . The Cavs got out to a quick 12 - 6 lead but the Kings battled back to take a 28 - 27 lead by the end of the first quarter . The Kings continued the strong effort through the second quarter , outscoring the Cavs , 34 - 28 , to take a 62 - 55 by halftime . The Cavs tightened things up through the third quarter , but still trailed 85 - 80 heading into the final frame . The Kings pushed their lead to 14 early in the fourth and were able to keep enough of a cushion to come out with the impressive win . Vince Carter was on fire and came up clutch in the final minutes for Sacramento . Carter finished with a team - high 24 points on 10 - of - 12 shooting , along with five rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block , in 29 minutes of action off the bench . Willie Cauley-Stein finished with 17 points , nine rebounds , four assists and one block , while Bogdan Bogdanovic tallied 16 points , eight assists , four steals , three rebounds and one block , in 30 minutes . The Kings bench outscored the Cavs bench 68 - 32 . The Kings shot 52 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Kevin Love finished with a team - high 23 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting for Cleveland . LeBron James tallied a triple - double with 16 points , 14 assists and 10 rebounds , in 37 minutes . J.R. Smith was the only other player to score in double digits for the Cavs , with 15 points . The Cavs shot 44 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 31 from long range . The Cavaliers ( 24 - 11 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Jazz in Utah on Saturday . The Kings ( 12 - 22 ) play host to the Suns on Friday .

The Kings came out stronger in the third quarter and cut the deficit to three early , but still trailed 88 - 83 at the end of the frame . The Kings managed to pull ahead early in the fourth but the Suns were the ones to execute down the stretch for the win . T.J. Warren led the way for Phoenix with 26 points on 12 - of - 18 shooting , and 10 rebounds , in 28 minutes . The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the host Sacramento Kings , 114 - 96 , at Golden One Center on Sunday . This was a dominating victory for the Grizzlies , as the Kings never tied or led after the first five minutes . In fact , Memphis led by 14 after the first quarter , by 18 at the half and held a 27 - point lead headed into the fourth quarter . Sacramento actually never got within double - digits for the final three quarters . Defensive rebounding was a huge factor , with the Grizzlies outrebounding the Kings , 38 - 30 . The shooting disparity was huge as well , as Memphis shot 54 percent from the field and 47 percent from three - point range . The Kings hit just 43 percent from the field and 37 percent from long range . The Grizzlies ( 12 - 25 ) got another gem out of Tyreke Evans , as he collected 26 points , seven rebounds and five assists . Marc Gasol totaled seven points , two rebounds , three assists and four blocks . The bench was huge , as Jarrell Martin , James Ennis , Wayne Selden Jr. Deyonta Davis , Mario Chalmers and Ben McLemore all scored between eight and 12 points . The Kings ( 12 - 24 ) were led by Willie Cauley-Stein , as he provided 21 points , eight rebounds and two assists off the bench . Garrett Temple was the only starter in double figures , as he accumulated 13 points , three rebounds and three assists . Bogdan Bogdanovic totaled eight points , five rebounds and five assists . Both teams return to action on Tuesday with Sacramento hosting the Charlotte Hornets and Memphis traveling to play the Los_Angeles Clippers .
The Sacramento Kings took down the Denver Nuggets , 106 - 98 , at Golden_1_Center on Saturday . The Kings ( 13 - 25 ) had been slipping a bit recently , having gone just 1 - 3 through the first four games of their current home stand . On Saturday , however , the team was able to turn its luck around . Recently-returned rookie De'Aaron Fox was dominant in his second game back from a quad injury . Fox led the team with 18 points and seven assists . Fox was one of seven Kings players to score in double digits on Saturday . One of those players , Willie Cauley-Stein , had 17 points and was a major factor on the defensive end . Cauley-Stein came away with seven steals , a new career high and the most by any Sacramento player this season . Cauley-Stein 's active defense was a big reason for Denver 's turnover issues . The Nuggets turned it over 25 times on the night . Denver ( 21 - 18 ) had issues managing the ball in what was the second half of a back - to - back for the young team . Three different Nuggets starters - Nikola Jokic , Jamal Murray , and Wilson Chandler - committed five turnovers on the night . Though Denver was able to match or exceed the Kings ' shooting splits across the board , lost possessions due to turnovers wound up being the difference in the game . Jokic , Denver 's star center , had an interesting night , as he led the team with 10 assists but struggled to crash the glass or find his shot . He went just 3 - of - 10 from the field en route to eight points and had only seven rebounds . The Nuggets will visit Golden_State on Monday , while Sacramento will host the San_Antonio Spurs .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the host Sacramento Kings , 107 - 100 , at Golden_1_Center on Monday evening . The Kings started out strong on their home court , getting to a six - point lead midway through the first and hanging on to lead 25 - 21 at the end of the quarter . They turned it up in the second , pushing their lead to as many as 14 before settling on a 56 - 46 lead at the half . The Spurs began chipping away at the lead in the third quarter , until they trailed by only three heading into the fourth . The Kings hung on as long as they could , maintaining a lead until the final three minutes , where the Spurs took over , as Davis Bertans hit a go - ahead three , followed by seven straight points from LaMarcus Aldridge to seal the deal for San_Antonio . Aldridge led the way for the Spurs with 31 points on 13 - of - 20 shooting and 12 rebounds , in 36 minutes of action . Davis Bertans not only came up clutch , but dropped 28 points on 11 - of - 15 shooting , in 31 minutes off the bench . Patty Mills chipped in 14 points , while Bryn Forbes added 12 points . The Spurs shot 49 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 26 from long range . Meanwhile , Willie Cauley-Stein was the high - point man for the Kings , with 22 points on 8 - of - 12 shooting , along with a team - high nine rebounds , in 30 minutes . De'Aaron Fox recorded a double - double with 11 points and 10 assists , while Bogdan Bogdanovic added 16 points , five rebounds and five assists off the bench . The Kings shot 49 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 23 from long range . The Kings ( 13 - 26 ) will be right back in action on Monday , as they take on the Lakers in Los_Angeles . The Spurs ( 28 - 14 ) have a couple days off before they take on the Lakers in L.A. on Thursday .
The Golden_State Warriors took down the host Sacramento Kings , 119 - 104 , at Golden One Center on Friday . Though the final score would not indicate it , Friday 's California clash was a relatively close game throughout . The Kings ( 16 - 35 ) remained within single digits of the defending champions for the majority of the game , and trailed by just one point with seven minutes left in regulation . From there , though , it was all about Kevin Durant . Durant had 10 consecutive points for the Warriors ( 41 - 11 ) , including two big three - pointers to help the team reclaim a double - digit lead . Golden_State scored 20 points in total in the final seven minutes of the game , helping to open up a commanding lead on the Kings ' home court . Durant finished the game with a team - high 33 points , which came on 12 - of - 17 shooting . Steph Curry had 23 points , while Klay Thompson added another 20 . The trio 's strong play helped make up for the team 's relatively high number of turnovers . Golden_State committed 25 on the night , which was just one away from tying its season high . For the Kings , all five starters scored in double digits in what was a relatively strong showing for the first 42 minutes . Veteran Zach Randolph led the team with 18 points and seven rebounds . Rookie forward Justin Jackson added another 17 , shooting 7 - of - 13 on the night . Both teams face the second half of a back - to - back on Saturday , as the Warriors travel to Denver while Sacramento hosts the Dallas Mavericks .
The Dallas Mavericks took down the host Sacramento Kings , 106 - 99 , at Golden One Center on Saturday . Dallas 's Yogi Ferrell helped to spark a fourth quarter run that helped push the Mavericks to victory . While Ferrell finished with just 11 points , the bulk of those came in rapid succession , as he knocked down three straight three - pointers to fuel a game - winning final push for the Mavs . The team outscored Sacramento by 11 points in the fourth , helping to push them over the edge to victory . It was a balanced approach in the win for Dallas ( 17 - 36 ) , as six players scored in double digits . This included all five starters , as well as Ferrell . The team 's high scorer was Harrison Barnes , who scored 18 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting . Rookie point guard Dennis Smith , Jr. also had a solid game , scoring 12 points to go with five rebounds and five assists . The team as a whole shot 49 percent from the field and hit 13 three - pointers . Sacramento ( 16 - 36 ) dropped their second straight game with the loss . The team was able to shoot very effectively , hitting 53 percent of its shots from the field . However , getting to the free - throw line proved immensely difficult . The team attempted only six free - throws in the game , compared to 14 for Dallas . Rookie De'Aaron Fox led the team with 15 points and also came away with three steals . Sacramento will host the Chicago Bulls on Tuesday , while the Mavericks will visit the Los_Angeles Clippers .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the host Sacramento Kings , 110 - 107 , at Golden_1_Center on Thursday evening . The Thunder got out to a blistering hot start , as they jumped out to a 12 - 3 lead within the first three minutes , and went on to pour in 44 points in the first quarter , while holding the Kings to 21 . However , the Kings answered back in the second quarter with a 22 - 7 run , which cut the deficit to eight points , as they trailed 51 - 43 with six minutes left in the half . The Kings held on to trail by seven at halftime , down 67 - 60 . The Kings carried the momentum into the third quarter , where they outscored the Thunder 30 - 18 , to take a 90 - 85 lead into the final frame . The teams battled through the fourth down to the last minute , where Russell Westbrook came up with a buzzer beating , game - winning three - pointer to devastate the home crowd and seal the win for OKC . Westbrook tallied a triple - double with 17 points , 15 rebounds and 12 assists . Paul George finished with a team - high 26 points , along with eight rebounds and eight assists , while Carmelo Anthony finished with 23 points on 8 - of - 17 shooting . Steven Adams had a solid outing with 18 points and 11 rebounds . The Thunder shot 45 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 36 from long range . Meanwhile , Zach Randolph had a huge night for Sacramento with 29 points on 12 - of - 23 shooting , and 12 rebounds . Garret Temple and Vince Carter chipped in 13 points each , while Buddy Hield added 19 points , 10 rebounds and four assists , off the bench . The Kings shot 46 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 27 from long range . The Kings ( 18 - 40 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Lakers on Saturday . The Thunder ( 34 - 26 ) take on the Warriors in Golden_State on Saturday .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 116 - 111 , at Golden_1_Center on Thursday . The fact that neither team ever attained a double - digit lead in this matchup shows just how close it was , as it took an overtime session to determine a winner . The shooting differential was critical for Sacramento , as they connected on 52 percent of their shots while holding Brooklyn to under 44 percent from the field . Interior play was just as important , with the Kings outscoring the Nets in the paint , 50 - 28 . Brooklyn could n't take care of the ball either , as they committed 22 turnovers while forcing just 13 from Sacramento The Nets ( 20 - 43 ) got a game - high 24 points out of DeMarre Carroll , as he also accrued 10 rebounds and two assists on 9 - of - 12 shooting . D'Angelo Russell totaled 12 points and 12 assists . Jarrett Allen generated 15 points , 11 rebounds and three blocks . Allen Crabbe hit six three - pointers on his way to 18 points . The Kings ( 19 - 43 ) were led by Bogdan Bogdanovic , as he tallied 23 points , five rebounds , three assists and two steals . De'Aaron Fox finished with 19 points , three rebounds , three steals and two blocks . Willie Cauley-Stein amassed 17 points , seven rebounds and six assists . Buddy Hield was huge off the bench , as he provided 16 points , four rebounds , four assists and three steals . On deck for Sacramento is a home matchup versus the Utah Jazz on Saturday . As for Brooklyn , they return to action on Sunday to face the Los_Angeles Clippers on the road .
The host Sacramento Kings took down the New_York Knicks , 102 - 99 , in a last - second thriller at Golden_1_Center on Sunday evening . The game came down to the wire after New_York ( 24 - 40 ) started the fourth quarter on an impressive run . After out - scoring Sacramento 27 - 16 through the first 11 minutes of the fourth , the Knicks had the game tied at 99 - 99 . Sacramento ( 20 - 44 ) , though , had possession , and sophomore big man Skal Labissiere was able to make the most of it . Labissiere received the inbounds pass with five seconds remaining and stepped into a three - pointer , knocking the shot down to win the game with 2 seconds remaining . In addition to his clutch shot , Labissiere had 14 points , six rebounds , and three blocks . He shot 5 - of - 10 and added to what was a relatively efficient offensive night for the Kings . Rookie guard Bogdan Bogdanovic , though , was the driving force for the Sacramento offense . He led the team with 22 points on 7 - of - 11 shooting and had seven assists while committing no turnovers . The Knicks , meanwhile , have now lost 12 of their last 13 games . Since All-Star big man Kristaps Porzingis went down with an ACL tear , the team has been among the league 's worst . On Sunday , the team struggled to hit from three - point range . New_York went just 6 - of - 21 from beyond the arc . Tim Hardaway , Jr. was the team 's leading scorer with 24 points . The Knicks will visit Portland on Tuesday , while Sacramento will host the New_Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday .
The Sacramento Kings took down the Orlando Magic , 94 - 88 , at Golden_1_Center on Friday night . The Kings ( 21 - 45 ) led by as much as 15 in what was a fairly cut - and - dry win for the struggling team . Head coach Dave Joerger earned his 200th career win with the victory , though wins have been few and far between for Sacramento this season . The same can be said for Orlando ( 20 - 46 ) , who struggled to make anything happen on Friday night . The team shot just 42 percent in the game and 31 percent from beyond the arc . Garrett Temple led the Kings with 23 points and knocked down four of the team 's nine three - pointers . Big man Kosta Koufos , meanwhile , scored a season - high 18 points to go with 13 rebounds . Koufos logged a team - high 38 minutes as he enjoyed a breakout night , shooting 9 - of - 12 from the field and committing only one turnover . Orlando , meanwhile , saw a game - high 25 points from Jonathan Simmons . Simmons reached the free - throw line nine times , accounting for more than half of Orlando 's makes and attempts from the charity stripe . Unfortunately for the Magic , their bench was unable to contribute anything meaningful . The Orlando second unit had only 21 points on 8 - of - 24 shooting in the loss . The Magic will visit the Clippers in Los_Angeles on Saturday , while the Kings travel to Denver to see the Nuggets on Sunday .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the visiting Miami Heat , 123 - 119 , at Golden_1_Center on Tuesday evening . The Heat got out to a good start on the road , as they pulled ahead to a 10 - point lead in the first quarter before taking a 31 - 24 lead into the second . The Kings answered in the second quarter , where they outscored the Heat by 14 , to take a 59 - 52 lead into halftime . The Kings managed to stay ahead through the third quarter and expanded their lead to 12 entering the fourth . The Heat made a strong push in the fourth quarter , as they slowly chipped away until they tied it up at 106 , with 2:10 seconds left . They then pulled ahead and owned a 111 - 109 lead with three seconds left in regulation time , however , De'Aaron Fox knocked down a shot at the buzzer to send the game to overtime . The Kings were able to take the first advantage of the overtime period and did not let up , as they held on to earn the home win . Buddy Hield led the Kings with 24 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting , in 31 minutes . Zach Randolph followed up with 22 points , nine rebounds , four assists and one block , while De'Aaron Fox tallied 20 points , three assists and two rebounds . The Kings shot 51 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 24 from long range . Meanwhile , Goran Dragic led the Heat with 33 points on 11 - of - 21 shooting , in 39 minutes . James Johnson finished with 18 points , 10 rebounds , seven assists , two steals and one block , while Wayne Ellington added 22 points on 7 - of - 19 shooting , off the bench . The Heat shot 41 percent from the field , including 18 - of - 43 from long range . The Heat ( 36 - 33 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Lakers in Los_Angeles on Friday . The Kings ( 22 - 47 ) take on the Warriors in Golden_State on Friday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the host Sacramento Kings , 106 - 103 , at Golden_1_Center on Thursday evening . The first quarter was tight as the Kings and Pacers swapped the lead a few times , before taking tie , 28 - 28 , into the second . The Kings jumped ahead to start the second and held the lead until the Pacers took the advantage with four minutes left in the half . The Pacers closed the second quarter on a 14 - 10 run , to take a 61 - 56 lead into halftime . The Kings responded in the third quarter , outscoring the Pacers 23 - 18 to even things up at 79 heading into the final quarter . The Pacers took the lead early and held a slight edge for most of the fourth quarter . However , the Kings made it a two - point game with 13 seconds left , and then hit a three with two seconds left , to make it a one - point game after the Pacers hit a couple free throws . Nonetheless , the Pacers stuck it out and earned their fourth straight win . Bojan Bogdanovic led the Pacers with 25 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting , in 35 minutes . Victor Oladipo tallied 24 points , five rebounds , three steals , two assists and one block , while Thaddeus Young finished with 18 points , eight rebounds , one assist and one block , in 33 minutes . The Pacers shot 50 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 26 from long range . Meanwhile , Bogdan Bogdanovic led the Kings with 21 points , four assists , three rebounds and one steal , in 39 minutes . Willie Cauley-Stein finished with 19 points , seven rebounds , five assists and one block , while Buddy Hield added 20 points , seven rebounds and four assists , in 30 minutes off the bench . The Kings shot 54 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 31 from long range . The Kings ( 24 - 52 ) will look to avoid a fourth straight loss , as they play host to the Warriors on Saturday . The Pacers ( 45 - 31 ) Head to L.A. to take on the Clippers on Sunday .
The Sacramento Kings closed out the regular season by defeating the Houston Rockets , 93 - 86 , at Golden_1_Center on Wednesday night . Houston ( 65 - 17 ) was coming off a back - to - back and had already secured the league 's top overall record , and thus opted to rest a number of key players . James Harden , Chris Paul , Clint Capela , and Eric Gordon all sat out for rest on Wednesday . With the powerhouse Rockets severely undermanned , the Kings ( 27 - 55 ) were able to close out the season on a high note . Sacramento took an early lead and never looked back , never trailing over the final three quarters of the game . Willie Cauley-Stein led Sacramento with 22 points and 11 rebounds . The Kings largely scored by committee , as seven players scored in double figures despite the team only putting up 93 points in total . Buddy Hield was the top scorer off the bench , finishing with 14 points as well as five rebounds and five assists . The Rockets , meanwhile , were led by 31 points from Gerald Green . Despite Green 's stellar contribution , the Rockets largely struggled on offense . shooting under 38 percent from the field and hitting only eight free - throws . R.J. Hunter added another 19 points for the Rockets while receiving a spot in the starting lineup . Sacramento will not suit up again until next season . Houston , meanwhile , will gear up for the first round of the 2018 NBA Playoffs , in which they will face the Minnesota Timberwolves .
The New_York Knicks defeated the Denver Nuggets , 116 - 110 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Monday . Despite the fact that there were only four ties and two lead changes in this game , it was close throughout the second half . In fact , it was a single - digit margin for the final 18 minutes . Denver actually overcame a 22 - point halftime deficit by going on a 27 - 2 run in the third quarter to take their one and only lead . Rebounding was decisive for the Knicks , as they outrebounded the Nuggets 49 - 36 . New_York ended up shooting 50 percent from the field while holding Denver to just 41 percent shooting . The Nuggets ( 3 - 4 ) were led by Nikola Jokic , who accumulated 28 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Jamal Murray finished with 20 points , three rebounds and two assists . Gary Harris collected 18 points , three assists , three steals and two rebounds . The Knicks ( 3 - 3 ) got a career - high from Kristaps Porzingis , who led the team with 38 points , seven rebounds and three blocks . Tim Hardaway Jr. accrued 13 points , four rebounds , three assists and three steals . Kyle O'Quinn came off the bench to provide 15 points , 12 rebounds and five blocks . Both teams play again on Wednesday , with Denver hosting the Toronto Raptors and New_York hosting the Houston Rockets .

Things got tight in the fourth , where the game was tied at 85 , with six minutes remaining . The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the New_York Knicks , 105 - 98 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Monday afternoon . The Sixers ( 15 - 18 ) received some good news prior to tip - off , as Joel Embiid determined his troublesome back was in good enough shape for him to suit up for the Christmas Day clash . His presence turned out to be pivotal to Philadelphia 's success , as he led the way with a 25 - point , 16 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and three blocks . However , as spectacular as the big man 's final line was , he was one - upped by Enes Kanter , who posted 31 points , 22 rebounds and one assist for the Knicks ( 17 - 16 ) . Kanter put up a game - high 21 shot attempts as well , but a fourth - quarter push by the visitors , which included a clutch Embiid three - pointer with 2:23 remaining , sealed the hard - fought win . J.J. Redick was right behind Embiid in his return from a hamstring injury , pouring in 24 points and adding six rebounds , two assists and two steals . T.J. McConnell followed with a bench - leading 15 points - - a total he supplemented with five rebounds , four assists and two steals . Dario Saric supplied 10 points , three rebounds and three assists . Robert Covington tallied eight points , three rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Ben Simmons matched his scoring total and added eight boards , three assists , one steal and one block . Kristaps Porzingis was second to Kanter on the Knicks with 22 points , seven rebounds and five blocks . Courtney Lee registered 20 points , three rebounds , two assists and two steals . Michael Beasley led the bench with 10 points , five boards , one assist and one steal . Lance Thomas ( two points , one rebound ) and Jarrett Jack ( zero points , seven assists , two rebounds and two steals ) underwhelmed on the first unit . The Sixers remain on the road and head across the country to tangle with the Portland Trail_Blazers on Thursday evening , while the Knicks visit the Chicago Bulls on Wednesday evening .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the New_York Knicks , 100 - 91 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Tuesday evening . The Spurs ( 26 - 12 ) had to come from behind after losing the first quarter to the Knicks ( 18 - 19 ) by a 29 - 25 score , but eventually settled and delivered another strong performance in what was a record - setting night for Gregg Popovich . The long - time head coach registered his 1,176 career win , passing George Karl for fifth most in the history of the NBA . Despite the fact the Spurs had to rally for this win , they looked absolutely in control as soon as the second quarter started . The biggest difference here was the third quarter , since the 29 - 18 lead from the Spurs over that period was a differential the Knicks could mount back . LaMarcus Aldridge and Kawhi Leonard carried with the Spurs ' offense in this game . Aldridge finished with 29 points and five rebounds , while Leonard filled the stat sheet and proved to be quite a weapon on both ends of the court after contributing with 25 points , eight boards , four assists , and four steals . Pau Gasol chipped in with 11 points and eight rebounds , while Manu Ginobili added 12 points off the bench . Michael Beasley led the way for the Knicks after registering 18 points and nine rebounds coming off the bench . Kristaps Porzingis contributed with 13 points , the same amount as Courtney Lee and Lance Thomas , although the Latvian star also added nine boards . Enes Kanter had 12 points and Jarrett Jack added 10 , meaning all five starters for New_York scored in double digits .
The Boston Celtics defeated the New_York Knicks , 121 - 112 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Saturday evening . The Celtics ( 42 - 19 ) have been more renowned for their defense than their work on the other end of the floor , although the team 's stellar record is naturally the product of a strong all - around effort . However , the script was somewhat flipped Saturday , as Boston 's offense turned out to be the linchpin of what was a third consecutive road triumph . After a tight first quarter that saw the Knicks ( 24 - 37 ) emerge with a slim 24 - 23 advantage , the visitors exploded for 36 points in the second to take a 59 - 56 halftime lead . They kept their foot on the gas in the second half as well , outscoring their hosts by a 62 - 56 margin to secure the victory . Kyrie Irving led the Celtics with a near triple - double with 31 points , nine rebounds , eight assists and two steals . Jaylen Brown followed with 24 points , three rebounds and one assist . Terry Rozier provided a bench - leading 14 points and supplemented them with three rebounds and one assist . Al Horford posted a 13 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included three blocks . Jayson Tatum delivered a full line of 11 points , five boards , four assists , four steals and one block . Marcus Smart matched Tatum 's point total off the bench and added five assists , two rebounds and three steals across 28 minutes . Daniel Theis drew the start for Aron Baynes ( elbow ) and generated six points , seven rebounds , one assist and one block . Trey Burke continued his stellar play while pacing the Knicks with 26 points in 26 minutes off the bench . He added eight assists and one steal . Tim Hardaway Jr. poured in 17 points and added two rebounds , two assists and one steal . Michael Beasley contributed 15 points , eight boards and one steal . Troy Williams accounted for 14 points , four rebounds and one steal . Emmanuel Mudiay supplied 13 points , six assists , four rebounds and one steal . Enes Kanter registered nine points , 12 boards , one steal and one block . Frank Ntilikina totaled eight points , five boards , one assist and one steal . The Celtics head back home to tangle with the Memphis Grizzlies on Monday evening , while the Knicks remain in the Big Apple and await a visit from the defending champion Golden_State Warriors on Monday night as well .
The New_York Knicks defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 124 - 101 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Saturday . Despite the fact that Charlotte either led or tied for the entirety of the first quarter , that 's the only time this game was competitive . In fact , a 35 - 26 second quarter set the tone for the Knicks , as a 42 - 17 third quarter was the dagger . Charlotte actually never got the game within 20 points in the fourth after that devastating third quarter . The shooting differential was key , with New_York hitting 49 percent from the field and 46 percent from three - point range while holding Charlotte to 37 percent from the field and 27 percent from long range . Much of that can be attributed to ball movement , with the Knicks recording 24 assists and the Hornets handing out only 11 assists . The Hornets ( 30 - 40 ) had no player surpass 15 points scored , as Dwayne Bacon led the team with 15 points and three assists off the bench . Frank Kaminsky and Malik Monk both provided 12 points apiece off the bench as well . Dwight Howard led the starters with 14 points and 13 rebounds . Kemba Walker and Nicolas Batum combined for 12 points , four assists and no steals . The Knicks ( 25 - 45 ) had just one starter in double figures , as Tim Hardaway Jr. tallied 25 points , three rebounds and three assists . Enes Kanter amassed nine points and nine rebounds . Four bench players reached double figures , as Frank Ntilinka , Trey Burke , Troy Williams and Isaiah Hicks combined for 54 points . Both teams return to action on Monday , with New_York playing host to the Chicago Bulls and Charlotte traveling to face the Philadelphia 76ers .
The New_York Knicks defeated the Chicago Bulls , 110 - 92 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Monday . While there were seven ties and 14 lead changes in the first half , New_York really dominated in the second half . The middle quarters were the difference , with the Knicks outscoring the Bulls , 64 - 49 . Defense was key for New_York , as they held Chicago to 33 - of - 92 from the field and 3 - of - 30 from three - point range . Rebounding was also a huge factor , with the Knicks outrebounding the Bulls , 61 - 48 . The Bulls ( 24 - 46 ) were led by Cristiano Felicio , as he tallied 17 points and six rebounds . No other starter had more than eight points , as Cameron Payne tallied four points , six rebounds and six assists starting for Kris Dunn . Bobby Portis led the bench with 16 points , seven rebounds and four assists . Noah Vonleh also played well off the bench , providing nine points and 12 boards . The Knicks ( 26 - 45 ) were led by Tim Hardaway Jr. , as he amassed 22 points , two rebounds and two steals . Michael Beasley finished with 17 points , six rebounds and two assists . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , with New_York traveling to face the Miami Heat and Chicago playing host to the Denver Nuggets .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the New_York Knicks , 108 - 104 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Friday evening . The Timberwolves ( 42 - 31 ) likely were n't taking anything for granted coming into the matchup , but the Knicks ( 26 - 47 ) probably turned out to be a more formidable opponent than they expected . New_York appeared to be in a spoiler mindset , and remained as close as 105 - 101 with 1:39 remaining . A trio of free throws from Karl-Anthony Towns ( one ) and Jeff Teague ( two ) then extended the lead to seven with 11 seconds remaining , giving Minnesota the needed cushion to escape the Big Apple with a win and clinch their first winning record since the 2005 - 6 season . Towns paced the Timberwolves with 24 points , 13 rebounds , three assists , three blocks and one steal . Taj Gibson posted 18 points , seven rebounds , one assist and one steal . Andrew Wiggins generated a 17 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and two steals . Nemanja Bjelica matched Wiggins ' scoring total and added six rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Jamal Crawford tallied a bench - leading 13 points and also supplied three assists and one rebound . Teague pitched in 10 points and eight assists . Tim Hardaway was brilliant while leading the Knicks , accounting for 39 points , three assists , two rebounds and three steals . Trey Burke contributed a bench - leading 15 points , which he complemented with nine assists , two rebounds and two steals . Frank Ntilikina pitched in 13 points , five boards , three assists and one steal . Enes Kanter delivered an 11 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included one assist . Michael Beasley mustered eight points , eight rebounds and two assists . The Timberwolves continue their trek through the Northeast and visit the Philadelphia 76ers on Saturday night , while the Knicks head to the Nation 's Capital to do battle with the Washington Wizards on Sunday evening .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the New_York Knicks , 115 - 109 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Saturday afternoon . The Pistons ( 36 - 40 ) knew Saturday was yet another must - win situation for them , as they found themselves five games out of the eighth seed in the Eastern_Conference with just seven games remaining . Standing in their way were the Knicks ( 27 - 50 ) , who 'd been effective as spoilers at times during the home stretch but were also faced with a key absence in starting center Enes Kanter ( back ) . To their credit , New_York played hard in front of the home crowd , and they trailed by just one point going into the final period . However , Detroit would never let the visitors catch them , and they sealed the victory with a pair of Luke Kennard free throws with just 9 seconds remaining . Andre Drummond led the way with a 22 - point , 17 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and three blocks . Reggie Jackson mustered 17 points , five assists , two rebounds and one steal . Anthony Tolliver matched Jackson 's scoring total and added two rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Reggie Bullock supplied 16 points , four boards , three assists and two steals . Stanley Johnson mustered 10 points , one rebound and three steals . James Ennis III and Henry Ellenson co - led the bench with matching nine - point tallies . Ennis added one rebound and one assist , while Ellenson supplied four boards and three dimes . Michael Beasley stepped up in Kanter 's absence to muster 32 points , four rebounds , three assists and one steal . Tim Hardaway , Jr. and Trey Burke contributed 18 points apiece , with the former also supplying three assists , two rebounds and one steal and the latter dishing out 15 dimes , hauling in five rebounds and recording one steal . Troy Williams stepped into the starting five and finished with 11 points , four rebounds , two assists and one steal . Kyle O'Quinn drew the start for Kanter and went for eight points , 15 rebounds , three assists and one block . The Pistons remain in New_York and take on the Brooklyn Nets on Sunday evening , while the Knicks remain home and await a Tuesday night visit from the Orlando Magic .
The host Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Washington Wizards , 102 - 99 , at Staples_Center on Wednesday . The Lakers made up for a tough Dodgers loss after a thrilling affair matching up the elite John Wall against No . 2 overall pick Lonzo Ball . The matchup went back and forth through the first half with the Wizards eventually pulling away in the third quarter . However , the Lakers ( 2 - 2 ) defense rejuvenated the youthful team in the fourth quarter where they held the Wizards ( 3 - 1 ) to just 13 points . With just a few ticks on the clock remaining , Brandon Ingram missed a driving layup but followed up with a tip on his own rebound with one second left to send the game to overtime . The overtime period started off in favor of Bradley Beal after a basket , a pair of free throws and a floater continued to give Washington the momentum , but the Lakers kept up on each possession including two big three - pointers from Kyle Kuzma and Kentavious Caldwell-Pope . After a Julius Randle dunk which put Los_Angeles up three points with four seconds remaining , John Wall missed a relatively clean look from three as the Lakers walked away with their first home win of the season . Bradley Beal led all scorers with 28 points , to go with six rebounds , two assists , three steals and one block , while John Wall struggled from the field but still posted 18 points on 7 - of - 22 shooting . Jodie Meeks was efficient off the bench for Washington and contributed 11 points in 16 minutes while adding three steals on the defensive end . Lonzo Ball struggled more than Beal with his jumper and finished just 2 - of - 11 from the field , but added 10 assists and eight rebounds , including some highlight worthy full court feeds . Ingram was the hero in the fourth quarter and added 19 points and 10 boards on 50 percent shooting . Both teams play on Friday , as the Wizards head north to face the Golden_State Warriors , while the Lakers host the Toronto Raptors .
The Phoenix Suns edged out the Los_Angeles Lakers , 122 - 113 , at Staples_Center on Friday . Phoenix ( 6 - 11 ) is now 6 - 8 on the season since parting ways with head coach Earl Watson . On Friday , the team saw strong offensive output , with six players scoring in double figures . Third-year guard Devin Booker delivered a game - high 33 points , knocking down six three - pointers along the way to the win . Three-point shooting proved key to the victory for the Suns , as the team hit 13 shots from beyond the arc on over 40 percent from the field . Off the bench , Phoenix enjoyed strong play headed up by young big man Alex Len . Len delivered a season - high 18 rebounds to go along with 17 points , which led the team 's second unit . The Lakers ( 6 - 10 ) , meanwhile , took the loss but still saw plenty of positives in the win . Rookie forward Kyle Kuzma continued his impressive campaign , scoring a career - high 30 points to lead the team and go along with ten rebounds . Recently-acquired center Brook Lopez , meanwhile , scored 19 points and blocked four shots .LA saw four starters score at least 13 points , with rookie Lonzo Ball being the sole exception . Ball 's struggles continued , as he scored just six points despite playing 38 minutes . The rookie shot 3 - of - 7 from the field and committed three turnovers along with just six assists . On Sunday , Phoenix will host the Bulls while the Lakers will host the Nuggets .
The host Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the visiting Denver Nuggets , 127 - 109 , at Staples_Center on Sunday . Los_Angeles ( 7 - 10 ) bounced back from a two - game losing streak with Sunday 's promising win . Though they faced tough competition in the Nuggets , the Lakers delivered one of their strongest showings of the season , winning by 18 points . Key to the team 's success was the play of rookie point guard Lonzo Ball . While Ball has largely struggled this season , ranking last in the league in true shooting percentage , he impressed on Sunday . The UCLA alum had his second career triple - double , finishing the night with 11 points , 16 rebounds , and 11 assists . Off the bench , meanwhile , fourth - year forward Julius Randle delivered a huge performance . Randle scored 24 points , had seven rebounds , and dished out five assists . Denver ( 9 - 7 ) , meanwhile , saw a worst - case scenario occur , as the team was only able to see 25 combined minutes from its star big man duo of Nikola Jokic and Paul Millsap . Jokic , along with Nuggets head coach Mike Malone , was ejected early in the game after an exchange with a referee . Millsap , meanwhile , exited the game with a sprained left wrist . As a result , the Nuggets were forced to play shorthanded for over half the game . Backup center Mason Plumlee filled the void with 29 disappointing minutes off the bench . The big man went just 2 - of - 10 at the free - throw line en route to eight points . The Nuggets ' duo of young point guards , Jamal Murray and Emmanuel Mudiay , also delivered sub - par outings . The two combined to shoot just 4 - of - 20 from the field . Murray , who had delivered three straight games of at least 18 points , scored only ten while shooting 2 - of - 11 from the field . The Nuggets will visit Sacramento on Monday , while the Lakers will host the Chicago Bulls on Tuesday .
The Golden_State Warriors escaped a near - upset at Staples_Center on Wednesday , defeating the Los_Angeles Lakers , 127 - 123 in overtime . Golden_State ( 16 - 6 ) looked shockingly sluggish throughout regulation , committing 20 turnovers and trailing for large portions of the second half . Former back - to - back MVP Steph Curry , in particular , started the game on a slow note , going just 3 - of - 10 and committing five turnovers in the first two and a half quarters . By overtime , however , Curry looked back to his MVP form , as he finished the game 9 - of - 20 from the field with 28 points . Curry sealed the game at the line in the final seconds after Draymond Green regained possession for the Warriors following a rare Curry miss at the charity stripe . Kevin Durant added an additional 29 points for the Warriors , shooting 12 - of - 25 from the field . Durant hit multiple late - game jumpers to help force overtime . Los_Angeles ( 8 - 13 ) put up a valiant effort against the reigning champions , but ultimately came up short . Still , the team saw a career night from sophomore star Brandon Ingram . Ingram was the game 's leading scorer at 32 points , as he put up a new career high on 12 - of - 21 shooting . Rookie Lonzo Ball also turned in an impressive performance . Although he has largely struggled with his shot this season , Ball hit three three - pointers in Wednesday 's game . Two of those came during a personal 80 run that Ball went on in the third quarter . The Lakers added 49 points off the bench in what was a well - rounded team effort on Wednesday . The Warriors will visit Orlando on Friday , while the Lakers will visit Denver on Saturday .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 109 - 99 , at Staples_Center on Wednesday . Memphis ( 11 - 23 ) had been in the midst of a free - fall coming into Wednesday 's matchup . The Grizzlies had lost 20 of their last 23 games before picking up a double - digit win on Wednesday . While the Grizzlies initially pulled ahead , a tough third - quarter rally from the Lakers had the game tied heading into the fourth quarter . In the fourth , though , Memphis ' offense was able to pull away with the game . 12 of the team 's 33 fourth - quarter points came from veteran guard Tyreke Evans , who finished the night with a team - high 32 . Evans added seven rebounds and seven assists . Marc Gasol also made a splash in the game , finishing with nine rebounds and five assists in addition to his 11 points . Los_Angeles ( 11 - 22 ) , meanwhile , was shorthanded on Wednesday . Guard Lonzo Ball ( shoulder ) and center Brook Lopez ( ankle ) sat out of Wednesday 's action . It was a rough night for rookie Kyle Kuzma without his fellow rook , as he shot just 4 - of - 24 from the field including 1 - of - 11 from three - point range . Kuzma was a primary contributor to the Lakers ' rough team shooting splits . The team shot just 38 percent from the field on the night and 29 percent from beyond the arc . Brandon Ingram led the team with 23 points , but had some frustration throughout the night , as he committed five turnovers and went just 5 - of - 11 at the free - throw line . Ingram was assessed a technical for complaining about a call in the game 's final minute . The Lakers will tangle with the Clippers on Friday , while the Grizzlies visit the Golden_State Warriors on Saturday .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 108 - 94 , on their home court on Friday night . The Hornets ( 15 - 23 ) had clear control of the game by the end of the first half , as they held a 15 - point lead . While shots were n't always falling for Charlotte , the Hornets benefited from an awful offensive showing from the home team . The Hornets were able to hold the Lakers to just 40 percent shooting from the field , and allowed only 12 free - throw attempts on the night . On offense , Charlotte was carried by a few strong performances . Kemba Walker finished the night with 19 points , a team high . Off the bench , Jeremy Lamb scored an efficient 17 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting . The team recorded 26 team assists as well , as ball movement was a focus throughout . Los_Angeles ( 11 - 27 ) had yet another pitiful showing on both ends , leading to their ninth straight loss . Rookie point guard Lonzo Ball returned to the starting five following an extended absence due to a shoulder sprain . Ball played fairly well , scoring 11 points and dishing five assists in 27 minutes . Unfortunately , the same could not be said of his fellow rookies . Kyle Kuzma shot just 2 - of - 14 for four points on the night . He also committed three turnovers . Josh Hart , meanwhile , shot just 1 - of - 6 . The team as a whole shot only 40 percent from the field and went just 9 - of - 12 at the free - throw line . Los_Angeles will host the Atlanta Hawks on Sunday , while the Hornets will host the Dallas Mavericks on Tuesday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the New_York Knicks , 127 - 107 , at Staples_Center on Sunday afternoon . Both teams looked like they 'd left their respective defenses in the locker room in the first half , as evidenced by the slim 67 - 63 halftime lead the Lakers ( 17 - 29 ) held . Not much changed in the third period , as the two clubs combined for another 56 points heading into the final 12 minutes . That 's when the home squad separated itself , with Los_Angeles ' 100 run between the 6:11 and 3:29 marks of the fourth quarter giving them the cushion they needed to build an insurmountable lead . As the final score implied , both teams ' shooting percentages were stellar , with the Lakers edging the Knicks ( 21 - 26 ) in that category by a 56 percent to 54 percent margin . The hosts also prevailed in two other key categories , winning the turnover battle by a 17 - 6 margin and notching a 39 - 33 advantage in the rebounding department . Kristaps Porzingis , Tim Hardaway , Jr. and Michael Beasley co - led New_York with matching 17 - point efforts . Porzingis added four rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block , Hardaway posted three rebounds and one block and Beasley supplied one rebound and one assist . Courtney Lee managed 16 points , two assists and one rebound . Enes Kanter generated a 12 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included two assists . Jarrett Jack mustered a modest six points but also dished out 10 assists , hauled in three rebounds and recorded one steal . Jordan Clarkson paced the Lakers with 29 points on 12 - for - 19 shooting in 38 minutes off the bench . He also contributed 10 assists , six rebounds and three steals . Julius Randle followed with a 27 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that was complemented by five assists and one steal . Kyle Kuzma poured in 15 points over just 10 minutes . Brook Lopez registered 14 points and four rebounds . Larry Nance , Jr. accounted for 13 points , five boards , one assist , two blocks and one steal . Brandon Ingram fought through an ankle issue to draw the start and tally 10 points , three assists and two rebounds . The Knicks remain on the West Coast to tangle with the Golden_State Warriors on Tuesday evening , while the Lakers await a visit from the Boston Celtics on Tuesday night as well .
The Los_Angeles Lakers overcame the Cleveland Cavaliers , 127 - 113 , at Staples_Center on Sunday evening . Julius Randle had a career - high 36 points to lead the Lakers ( 30 - 36 ) to victory . He added 14 rebounds and seven assists in what was a career night for the fourth - year forward . The Lakers pulled away in the second half after a 22 - 3 run in the third quarter . LA exploited the weak defense of Cleveland ( 38 - 28 ) , shooting 50 percent from the field and knocking down 13 three - pointers . Former Cavalier Isaiah Thomas played a big role in the team 's second - half success , providing a spark off the bench . He finished with 20 points and nine assists to lead the second unit . Veteran center Brook Lopez added 22 points to go with eight rebounds in the win . Kyle Kuzma , LA 's standout rookie forward , had 14 points and 10 rebounds . Five Lakers finished in double digits in the win . While LeBron James continued to excel , scoring 24 points along with 10 rebounds and seven assists , the Cavaliers could not get the job done . Former Laker Larry Nance , Jr. was the only other Cleveland starter to score in double digits , as he finished with 16 points . Jordan Clarkson , who was acquired by Cleveland in a deadline - day trade from LA , shot just 1 - of - 8 in his return to his former home court . On Tuesday , both teams will face a new adversary . LA will host the Denver Nuggets , while the Cavaliers will continue their road trip with a visit to Phoenix .
The Los_Angeles Lakers took down the Denver Nuggets , 112 - 103 , at Staples_Center on Tuesday . It was a game of runs , and it was ultimately a fourth - quarter push by Los_Angeles ( 31 - 36 ) that secured a home - court win . The Lakers , led by rookie forward Kyle Kuzma , outscored Denver 35 - 21 in the fourth to earn a victory . Kuzma led the team with 26 points and 13 rebounds , including five three - pointers . He also dished out two assists . Eight of those points came in a 90 - second span in the middle of the fourth quarter , helping the Lakers pull ahead before the game 's close . Julius Randle matched Kuzma 's production , also scoring 26 points and pulling down 13 rebounds . Randle , though , was especially effective on the offensive glass , where he pulled down a whopping seven boards . Randle was also assessed a technical in the closing moments after a heated exchange with Denver star Nikola Jokic . Both big men were slapped with technicals following the testy confrontation , which included Randle shoving Jokic to the ground . Veteran forward Wilson Chandler was the top scorer for Denver with 26 points on 11 - of - 16 shooting . Chandler played a whopping 41 minutes , which was also a team high . Unfortunately for the Nuggets , it was a tough night for their bench unit . Denver 's second unit shot just 9 - of - 29 on the night for 25 points . The Lakers will fly to the Bay Area to take on the Golden_State Warriors on Wednesday night . Meanwhile , Denver will return home to host the Detroit Pistons on Thursday .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the host Orlando Magic , 105 - 83 , at Amway_Center on Friday . The recent forms of these teams would indicate an easy win for Orlando , but Chicago was in charge for the majority of this matchup . The second half is where the Bulls really separated themselves , outscoring the Magic , 61 - 38 . Rebounding was a huge factor as well , with Chicago winning the rebounding battle , 48 - 38 . The Magic really struggled shooting , hitting just 41 percent from the field , 29 percent from three - point range and 60 percent from the free - throw line . The Bulls ( 2 - 5 ) were led by Justin Holiday , who tallied 19 points , two rebounds and two steals . David Nwaba amassed 16 points , five rebounds and two steals . Lauri Markkanen totaled 13 points , nine rebounds and three assists . Robin Lopez amassed 11 points and 10 rebounds en route to a double - double . Kris Dunn , Denzel Valentine and Paul Zipser all reached double figures off the bench . The Magic ( 6 - 3 ) got 21 points , five rebounds and three assists out of Even Fournier . Nikola Vucevic accrued 14 points , three rebounds and two assists . Aaron Gordon collected 11 points , seven rebounds and two assists . No other player on the roster scored more than eight points . Chicago will have a quick turnaround , as they host the New_Orleans Pelicans on Saturday for their next game . Orlando will host the Boston Celtics on Sunday for their next fixture .
The Boston Celtics defeated the host Orlando Magic , 104 - 88 , at Amway_Center on Sunday . Boston have now won eight - straight games , as they now sit with the best record in the NBA . This was a decisive win too , considering Boston held a double - digit lead for the final 10 minutes . They really separated themselves in the second and fourth quarters , outscoring the Magic 54 - 37 . Defense was key for the Celtics , as they held the Magic to 36 percent from the field and 21 percent from three - point range . Boston also won the rebounding battle , 55 - 45 . The Celtics ( 8 - 2 ) had all five starters score in double figures , even though none of them played more than 28 minutes . Jaylen Brown led them with 18 points , seven rebounds and two steals . Al Horford recorded a double - double , amassing 14 points , 10 rebounds and four assists . Marcus Smart flirted with a triple - double off the bench , collecting 11 points , eight rebounds and eight assists . The Magic ( 6 - 4 ) were led by Aaron Gordon , who tallied 18 points and 12 rebounds . Nikola Vucevic accrued 13 points , 10 rebounds and seven assists . Evan Fournier and Terrence Ross combined to shoot just 4 - of - 26 from the field as the starting guards . Boston will be in action again on Monday , as they travel to play the Atlanta Hawks . As for Orlando , they host the New_York Knicks on Wednesday for their next game .
The Orlando Magic defeated the visiting Oklahoma_City Thunder , 121 - 108 , at Amway_Center on Wednesday evening . The Magic jumped out to a great start , taking an early 20 - 10 lead , while the Thunder had five turnovers in that span . The Magic held on to take a 59 - 57 lead into halftime and expanded it further through the third quarter , so that they entered the final frame ahead 87 - 80 . After a great three quarters , the Magic still found a way to turn it up in the fourth , where they opened with a 130 run to go up 100 - 80 with just over eight minutes to play . This marks the end of a nine - game losing streak for Orlando ( 9 - 13 ) , while it is the third straight loss for the Thunder ( 8 - 12 ) . Aaron Gordon led the way for the Magic with 40 points , 15 rebounds , four assists , four steals and one block , in 44 minutes . Elfrid Payton followed up with 19 points , six assists , five rebounds , four steals and one block , in 30 minutes , while Nikola Vucevic finished with 15 points , seven rebounds and seven assists . Terrence Ross ( knee ) left the game and did not return for the second half . The Magic shot 59 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 30 from long range . Meanwhile , Russell Westbrook led the way for the Thunder with 37 points , 11 rebounds , five assists and five steals in 38 minutes . Paul George finished with 22 points , five rebounds , four assists , and one steal , while Carmelo Anthony tallied 16 points , seven rebounds , three assists and one block . The Thunder shot 40 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 31 from long range . The Thunder will look to get back on track as they play host to the Timberwolves on Friday . The Magic play host to the Warriors on Friday .

The Warriors ( 17 - 6 ) came into Friday 's contest with their Big Three carrying some sort of injury designation . However , the trio of Kevin Durant , Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson not only all made it onto the floor , they all played pivotal parts in what turned out to be a comfortable road victory . They shot a combined 30 - for - 48 while compiling 75 of Golden_State 's 133 points . In all , the visitors shot a blistering 62 percent from the field , including 50 percent from three - point range , and put together a jaw - dropping 78 - point first half . Durant posted 25 points , seven assists , two rebounds and four blocks , but he was ejected late in the game for arguing with an official . Curry poured in 23 points and added 10 assists , six rebounds and three steals . Jordan Bell followed with a bench - leading 16 points , which he supplemented with four rebounds , three blocks and one steal . Augustin led the bench with 12 points , two boards , two assists and one steal . Elfrid Payton generated 10 points , nine assists , four rebounds and three steals . The Orlando Magic defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 127 - 105 , at Amway_Center on Wednesday evening . The Magic ( 15 - 35 ) had an impressive performance in this game , and dominated the Lakers ( 19 - 31 ) from start to finish , to the point that they won each quarter separatedly on route to a massive win that also ended their three - game losing skid . Orlando grabbed a four - point advantage after one , and increased it to seven at halftime . The biggest differential came in the third , as Orlando pulled away thanks to a 43 - 30 huge lead in the third , and the Lakers did n't have enough response through the remainder of the game . It was a convincing win for Orlando , and one that should definitively boost their confidence going forward . The Magic had a balanced performance on offense , since seven players ended scoring in double digits . The New_York Knicks defeated the Orlando Magic , 120 - 113 , at Amway_Center on Thursday evening . The Knicks ( 24 - 36 ) had to come from behind in this game against the Magic ( 18 - 40 ) , but they managed to secure the win to snap their losing streak at eight . Orlando got off to a good start and they won the first quarter 41 - 31 , and they held a six - point advantage heading into the second half . However , New_York did n't give up and they turned things around in the second half . After winning the third quarter 30 - 21 , they sealed the deal with a strong fourth - quarter performance ( 27 - 23 ) . As a result , the Knicks are back in the winning column while the Magic have now dropped their last four contests .
