The Toronto Raptors defeated the Orlando Magic , 117 - 104 , at Amway_Center on Wednesday evening . The Raptors ( 43 - 17 ) could n't afford to come into Wednesday 's contest too relaxed despite what would be considered an inferior opponent - - their slim lead over the Boston Celtics for the top spot in the Eastern_Conference was down to just one game . Accordingly , Toronto came out with a considerable sense of urgency , racking up an impressive 42 points in the first 12 minutes . However , not to be outdone , the Magic ( 18 - 43 ) did their best to hang with the visitors , compiling 37 points of their own to keep their deficit to a manageable five . After the clubs battled to a virtual draw in the second , Orlando actually made up most of their six - point halftime deficit in the third , leaving them behind by a sole point entering the final period . A Shelvin Mack driving layup even gave them a short - lived 91 - 90 edge just 37 seconds in , but that would be the last lead the hosts would enjoy . The Raptors outscored them by a 27 - 13 spread the remainder of the way , holding the home squad scoreless over the final 1:6 . As their final tally implied , Toronto shot well , posting a 54 percent success rate from the field , although the Magic were n't far behind with a 48 percent figure . The two teams were deadlocked on the boards , as each hauled down 42 rebounds . DeMar DeRozan led the way for the Raptors with 21 points , a total he supplemented with four assists , three rebounds and one steal . Kyle Lowry posted a 17 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included seven rebounds . Pascal Siakam delivered a bench - leading 14 points and added six rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block . Jakob Poeltl supplied a full line of 13 points , eight rebounds , five assists , three blocks and two steals . Fred VanVleet was productive on the second unit with 12 points , three boards , three assists and two steals . Jonas Valanciunas posted 10 points , five rebounds , one assist and one block . Serge Ibaka registered nine points , two rebounds , one steal and one block . The Magic were paced by a pair of 17 - point efforts from Evan Fournier and Mario Hezonja , with the former adding four assists and two rebounds and the latter also managing two boards , one assist and two steals . Nikola Vucevic accounted for 14 points , six rebounds and three assists . Jonathon Simmons turned in 13 points , four rebounds , three assists and one steal . Mack tallied 12 points , four assists , two rebounds and two steals in 21 minutes off the bench , while D.J . Augustin and Aaron Gordon poured in 11 points apiece . Gordon notably added 10 rebounds , three assists , two steals and one block . The Raptors remain on the road and head to the Nation 's Capital , where they 'll take on the Washington Wizards on Friday night . The Magic remain home and await a visit from the Detroit Pistons that same evening .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Orlando Magic , 92 - 83 , at Amway_Center on Friday evening . The Celtics ( 47 - 22 ) came into the contest in a little bit better shape healthwise than in their Wednesday overtime loss to the Wizards , but they were still missing two key components in Kyrie Irving ( knee ) and Marcus Smart ( thumb ) . While the Magic ( 21 - 49 ) did n't shape up as formidable opponents on paper , Boston could n't afford to take anything for granted , considering their ongoing chase for the top spot in the Eastern_Conference . Fittingly , they came out of the gates focused and playing suffocating defense , forging a 48 - 31 halftime lead . They ultimately took a 75 - 52 advantage into the final period , and although Orlando got as close as 87 - 76 with 2:9 remaining , their advantage was never seriously threatened . Boston 's second unit played a key role , as they contributed a total of 39 points on the night . Terry Rozier and Greg Monroe co - led the Celtics with 17 points , with the former also supplying seven rebounds and five assists , and the latter providing five boards , two assists , three steals and one block . Al Horford was able to return to the lineup after missing Wednesday 's game with an illness and generated 15 points , nine rebounds , three assists and one steal . Abdel Nader tallied 11 points , three rebounds , two blocks and one steal . Shane Larkin delivered 10 points , two rebounds and one steal . Marcus Morris posted nine points , 11 boards , two assists and one steal . Jayson Tatum produced eight points , eight rebounds , and one block . Shelvin Mack paced the Magic with 16 points in 26 minutes off the bench , a total he supplemented with seven rebounds and three steals . D.J . Augustin registered 13 points , four assists , three rebounds and two steals . Jonathon Simmons matched Augustin 's scoring total and added four boards , three assists and one steal . Nikola Vucevic contributed 12 points , four rebounds , two assists and one block , and Mario Hezonja accounted for 11 points , four rebounds , one assist and three steals . The Celtics remain on the road and head west to take on the New_Orleans Pelicans on Sunday night . The Magic remain home and face the Toronto Raptors on Tuesday evening .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Orlando Magic , 118 - 98 , at Amway_Center on Thursday evening . The 76ers ( 41 - 30 ) were on the second game of a back - to - back set , but they had a couple of factors still working in their favor . One was their ongoing motivation to improve their playoff positioning , while the other was simply the abysmal quality of play the Magic ( 21 - 51 ) have often displayed . Both appeared to heavily play into what was a spectacular first half for the visitors , which racked up a whopping 70 points to forge a 21 - point halftime lead . That essentially made the rest of the game a formality , and by the final buzzer , the scoreboard was n't the only place that Philadelphia owned a significant advantage in . The Sixers also won the battle on the glass handily , outrebounding the Magic by a robust 56 - 40 margin . Ersan Ilyasova paced the Sixers off the bench with 18 points - - a total he supplemented with three rebounds . Joel Embiid followed with 17 points , nine rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Robert Covington turned in 15 points , three rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Marco Belinelli matched his scoring total and added one rebound , one assist , one steal and one block . J.J. Redick produced 12 points , three assists and one rebound . Dario Saric generated a 10 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included one steal . Ben Simmons mustered a modest six points but hauled down 11 rebounds , dished out 10 assists , recorded three steals and posted one block . Rodney Purvis paced the Magic with 19 points and added one assist in 22 minutes off the bench . Bismack Biyombo tallied 13 points and six rebounds . Marreese Speights poured in 10 points . Aaron Gordon managed 10 of his own and complemented them with 11 rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Mario Hezonja generated nine points , three rebounds and two assists . Wesley Iwundu collected eight points , three rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Nikola Vucevic posted seven points , four rebounds , one assist and one steal . Arron Afflalo matched his scoring total off the bench and also pitched in two assists , one rebound and two steals . D.J . Augustin registered six points , four assists and two rebounds . The 76ers head back home for a showdown with the Minnesota Timberwolves on Saturday night , while the Magic remain home to take on the Phoenix Suns on Saturday evening as well .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Phoenix Suns , 105 - 99 , at Amway_Center on Saturday . Despite the fact that there were only four lead changes and one tie in this fixture , it came down to the final seconds . In fact , neither team ever led by more than 10 points , as it was within an eight - point margin for the entirety of the second half . The third quarter is where Orlando took the game , as they outscored Phoenix , 39 - 28 . Rebounding was the difference for the Magic , as they outrebounded the Suns , 54 - 41 . Ball movement was also huge , with Orlando handing out 29 assists and Phoenix recording just 21 assists . That led to the Magic hitting 44 percent from the field and 37 percent from three - point range while the Suns connected on 40 percent from the field and 24 percent from long range . The Magic ( 22 - 51 ) got a near triple - double out of Aaron Gordon , as he collected 29 points , 11 rebounds , eight assists and three steals . Nikola Vucevic amassed 24 points , 11 rebounds and three assists . D.J . Augustin accrued 15 points , nine rebounds and 10 assists . Mario Hezonja totaled 14 points , eight rebounds , four assists and four steals . The Suns ( 19 - 55 ) were led by Josh Jackson , as he tallied 18 points , two rebounds , five assists and three steals . Elfrid Payton accumulated 14 points , five rebounds , eight assists and three steals . Alex Len was huge off the bench , providing 15 points , nine rebounds and two steals . On deck for Phoenix is a home matchup versus the Boston Celtics on Monday . As for Orlando , they 're off until Wednesday when they play host to the Brooklyn Nets .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the Orlando Magic , 90 - 82 , at Amway_Center on Friday evening . As their records clearly imply , the Bulls ( 25 - 51 ) and Magic ( 22 - 53 ) are simply playing out the string on a pair of non - playoff seasons , which theoretically could lead to an interesting dynamic when facing each other . Despite their unsightly marks this year , the two clubs are not devoid of talent by any means , and accordingly , much of that shined through in what was an entertaining and competitive first half befitting of two teams with much better records . Chicago did pull away in the second to establish a 13 - point halftime lead , but a lopsided third period in which Orlando outscored the visitors by a 25 - 9 margin gave them a three - point lead heading into the final period . However , to their credit , the Bulls flipped the script almost entirely in the fourth , forging a 24 - 13 edge that gave them the eight - point margin of victory . Poor shooting on the part of both squads ( Bulls- 36 percent/ Magic- 33 percent ) led to plenty of rebounding opportunities , and the Magic won the battle on the glass by a 55 - 53 margin . Lauri Markkanen led the way for the Bulls with 13 points , a total he supplemented with eight rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block . Sean Kilpatrick matched his scoring total off the bench and also delivered four boards and two assists . Cameron Payne followed with 11 points , six assists , two rebounds and one block . Cristiano Felicio mustered eight points , 16 rebounds and one assist . Justin Holiday poured in eight points of his own and also posted one rebound , two steals and one block . Noah Vonleh followed with eight points , 11 boards , one assist , one steal and one block . Ryan Arcidiacono tallied eight points as well , along with one assist and two steals . Bobby Portis registered seven points , five rebounds and two blocks . Aaron Gordon paced the Magic with 18 points and also provided seven rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . D.J . Augustin totaled 15 points , seven rebounds , four assists and one steal . Nikola Vucevic accounted for 12 points , 14 rebounds , three assists , two blocks and one steal . Shelvin Mack managed nine points , five rebounds , three assists and one steal . Jamel Artis went for eight points and four boards . Ricky Purvis drew the start and delivered five points , two boards , one assist and one steal . The Bulls head back home to face the Washington Wizards in an Easter Sunday battle , while the Magic pay a visit to the Hawks on Sunday evening as well .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Orlando Magic , 137 - 100 , at Amway_Center on Friday . The Hornets ( 35 - 45 ) had one of their best scoring performances of the season and even though they are solely playing for their pride , it is clear that Charlotte has some nice pieces going forward . This time , they outplayed the Magic ( 24 - 55 ) right from the start of the game , and jumped to an 18 - point lead after the first quarter . Charlotte never looked back and in fact they were so dominant that they managed to win all four quarters separatedly : 43 - 25 , 29 - 24 , 31 - 26 and 34 - 25 . The Magic looked outmatched on both ends of the court , and Charlotte cruised their way towards an easy win . Dwight Howard has been a beast on the paint of late , and once again delivered a great performance of 16 points , 17 rebounds and four blocks , so he made his presence felt on both ends of the court , Kemba Walker had 13 points and four assists , while Marvin Williams added 18 points . The team 's top scorers came from the bench , however , as Malik Monk had 26 points and eight dimes , while Frank Kaminsky had 21 points . Orlando rest some of their best players for this game , but they still had some notable performances worth highlighting . D.J . Augustin was the top scorer with 19 points in just 18 minutes . Rodney Purvis , Khem Birch and Jamel Artis had 12 points , while Mario Hezonja added 11 . Wesley Iwundu finished with 10 points , and Marreese Speights added 14 off the bench .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 117 - 111 , at American_Airlines_Center on Wednesday . In a game that went down to the wire and was n't decided until the very last second , the Hawks stunned the Mavs and came away with a surprising win on the road at Dallas . Atlanta led 58 - 47 at the break , but Dallas came out of nowhere to tie it 82 - 82 after three . The final minutes of the fourth quarter were quite sloppy , but Atlanta held on and secured the win thanks to a few clutch free throws in the final minute of the game . Dennis Schroder led the Hawks offense with 28 points and seven assists in 34 minutes . Marco Belinelli provided a scoring punch off the bench with points , and John Collins added 14 from the second unit as well . Second-year forward Taurean Prince fell one point shy of a double - double thanks to nine points and 10 rebounds in 25 minutes . Dennis Smith Jr. might be on the losing end of this one , but there is no question the first - year point guard did a good job in his NBA debut . The former NC State standout contributed with 16 points and 10 assists , but at the same time , he committed three turnovers . Nerlens Noel provided 16 points and 11 rebounds off the bench , while Wesley Matthews added 15 points , eight rebounds and five assists . The small - forward , however , also committed five turnovers .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 111 - 104 , at American_Airlines_Center on Saturday night . The Cavaliers ( 6 - 7 ) have n't made it look easy this season , even in wins . They 've seemingly had their share of challenges against even the weakest of opponents , with Saturday 's performance serving as a textbook example . Cleveland could n't get a handle on the Mavericks ( 2 - 11 ) in the first half , which resulted in a surprising 52 - 49 halftime deficit . The unexpected developments seemed to shake them up during intermission , as the defending Eastern_Conference champs exploded for 34 points in the third period to take an 83 - 74 lead into the fourth quarter . Dallas was n't done yet , however , as they rattled off a 100 run that brought them to within 91 - 90 with 6:44 remaining . They would close the gap to one again with 2:51 remaining after a Wesley Matthews ' three - pointer , but the Cavs were able to stave them off the rest of the way to seal the win . Cleveland notably established an advantage on the glass , winning the rebounding battle by a 53 - 42 margin . Kevin Love led the way for the visitors with a 29 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and one block . LeBron James turned in a 19 - point , 11 - rebound double - double and added four assists and one block . J.R. Smith posted 17 points , three rebounds , three assists and two steals . Jae Crowder supplied 15 points , seven boards and three assists . Kyle Korver led the bench with 13 points - - all which he scored in the fourth quarter - - and added three rebounds . Harrison Barnes paced the Mavericks with a 23 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included one assist . Dwight Smith , Jr. followed with 21 points , seven assists , five rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Dirk Nowitzki turned in 14 points , brought down five boards and recorded both a steal and a block . Matthews poured in 12 points overall and complemented them with six assists , two rebounds and two steals . Devin Harris and J.J. Barea co - led the bench with matching nine - point tallies . The Cavaliers next head to the Big Apple to tangle with the New_York Knicks on Monday night , while the Mavericks do battle with the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Sunday evening .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Denver Nuggets , 122 - 105 , at American_Airlines_Center on Monday . Dallas have struggled all season , but a wire - to - wire win here may be what they need to get going . In fact , they led by at least eight points for every second after the first six minutes . Shooting was key , with the Mavericks hitting 57 percent of their shots , while holding the Nuggets to under 42 percent . Scoring down low was huge as well , as Dallas outscored Denver , 64 - 42 , in the paint . The Nuggets ( 13 - 10 ) had to play this game without Nikola Jokic and Paul Millsap , as they simply could n't match up with his hungry Dallas team . Will Barton led the team , as he provided 23 points , eight rebounds and six assists off the bench . Jamal Murray led the starters with 22 points , despite not recording a rebound or an assist . Gary Harris accrued 21 points , three rebounds , four assists and three steals . Kenneth Faried amassed 13 points and 11 rebounds . The Mavericks ( 7 - 17 ) were led by Harrison Barnes , as he amassed 22 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . Dennis Smith Jr. collected 20 points , five rebounds and three assists . Devin Harris , Dwight Powell and Yogi Ferrell all reached double figures in scoring off the bench . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , as Dallas travel to play the Boston Celtics , while Denver travels to face the New_Orleans Pelicans .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Toronto Raptors , 98 - 94 , at American_Airlines_Center on Tuesday evening . On paper , the matchup between one of the Eastern_Conference 's best squads and the struggling Mavericks ( 10 - 25 ) looked like a considerable mismatch , but that 's why the games unfold on the hardwood . The Raptors ( 23 - 9 ) came into Tuesday looking to extend their winning streak to seven games , but Dallas , who had secured seven of the nine wins they 'd notched prior to the contest in their home arena , had other ideas . The Mavericks jumped on the visitors early , forging a 31 - 23 first - quarter lead on the strength of impressive efforts from the frontcourt duo of the ageless Dirk Nowitzki and the emerging Maxi Kleber . Toronto mounted enough of a comeback in the second period to close the deficit to 57 - 54 by halftime , but the home squad did just enough in the second half to maintain their razor - thin advantage . Both clubs clamped down on defense in the final 12 minutes , as a scant total of 29 points were scored in the quarter . However , the Mavericks ' defense was the more impressive of the two , as they limited their guests to a 34 percent success rate from the field , including 31 percent from three - point range . Kyle Lowry led the way for the Raptors with 23 points , which he supplemented with eight rebounds , six assists and one steal . Jonas Valanciunas posted a 17 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and one steal . Serge Ibaka provided a 12 - point , 12 - rebound double - double in his own right while also recording a trio of blocks . DeMar DeRozan had one of his worst shooting nights of the campaign , draining only three of his 16 shot attempts on his way to eight points . He did add five assists , three rebounds and two steals . Jakob Poeltl led the bench with nine points and also supplied four boards , one steal and one block . J.J. Barea paced the Mavericks with 20 points , four assists and three rebounds in 23 minutes off the bench . Nowitzki followed with 18 points , seven rebounds , one assist , three blocks and one steal . Harrison Barnes posted a 16 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included a pair of assists . Kleber poured in 15 points to go along with eight rebounds , two assists , five blocks and two steals . Dennis Smith , Jr. contributed eight points on 3 - for - 14 shooting , but he also tallied five rebounds and four assists . Wesley Matthews had trouble finding the net as well , going just 2 - for - 9 from the field while totaling a modest five points , four rebounds , three assists and one block . The Raptors remain on the road and are right back in action on Wednesday , when they 'll face off with the Oklahoma_City Thunder . The Mavericks are also back on the court Wednesday night , when they 'll tangle with the Indiana Pacers in a road tilt as well .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 125 - 122 , at American_Airlines_Center on Wednesday evening . The Warriors ( 30 - 8 ) entered this game as heavy favorites , but they had to work harder than expected to defeat a Mavericks ( 13 - 26 ) team that made things quite difficult for the reigning NBA champions . Golden_State built a decent 35 - 26 lead in the first quarter , but Dallas answered back in the second and third quarters to make it a two - point game heading into the fourth . Both teams went back and forth and it was tied at 122 late in the game . But a late three - pointer from Steph Curry and solid defense in the final play of the game allowed Golden_State to come away with a win on enemy soil . Stephen Curry led the way offensively for the Warriors with 32 points , eight assists and six rebounds while shooting 6 - of - 13 from three - point range . Both Klay Thompson and Kevin Durant ended with 25 points , although the former Oklahoma City Thunder filled the stat sheet since he also added 10 rebounds , six assists , and four blocks . Draymond Green chipped in with 18 points , 10 boards , and six assists . Seven Dallas players scored in double figures , as Dwight Powell led the way off the bench with 21 points and seven rebounds . Wesley Matthews had 19 points , while Harrison Barnes contributed with 18 . Dennis Smith Jr. chipped in with 14 points and eight assists , and Dirk Nowitzki came close to a double - double after registering 12 points and eight boards .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Dallas Mavericks on overtime , 107 - 101 , at American_Airlines_Center on Saturday afternoon . The Lakers ( 15 - 27 ) have been one of the hottest teams in the NBA of late , and they delivered another impressive outing as they went out to defeat the Mavericks ( 15 - 29 ) on the road . It was a back - and - forth game during the first half , however , as the Lakers jumped to a 31 - 20 lead in the first quarter , only to see Dallas storming back and creating a six - point advantage ( 52 - 46 ) at the break . The Lakers won the remaining two quarters by three points each , so the game needed five extra minutes to decide what would have happened . And Los_Angeles won the OT period 12 - 6 , pushing their winning streak up to four games . Meanwhile , Dallas has lost four of their last six . Julius Randle was the biggest star for the Lakers , as the power forward delivered a strong double - double of 23 points and 15 rebounds . Lonzo Ball struggled from the field going 4 - for - 13 , but he filled out the stat sheet thanks to nine points , seven rebounds , and seven assists . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope had 17 points . Kyle Kuzma ( 18 points , 10 rebounds ) and Jordan Clarkson ( 19 points ) starred off the bench as well . Yogi Ferrell led the Mavericks offense , finishing with 11 points , 10 rebounds , and four assists . The highest scorer was Dennis Smith Jr. , however , as the rookie point guard chipped in with 23 points . Harrison Barnes and Wesley Matthews had 17 points each , and Dwight Powell left his mark off the bench after contributing with 13 points and four boards .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the host Dallas Mavericks , 114 - 109 , at American_Airlines_Center on Tuesday . Despite the fact that Dallas attainted the first lead of the game , that would mark their only lead in this matchup as Sacramento controlled from there . In fact , Sacramento led by at least five points from the end of the first quarter all the way to the final whistle . The Kings actually led by 23 points at the half , but Dallas got it close at the end thanks to a 38 - 26 fourth quarter . The shooting disparity was vast , with Sacramento connecting on 54 percent of their shots and Dallas hitting just 46 percent from the field . The rest of the statistics were eerily similar , with the rebounding , assisting , blocks and turnover differentials all within one . The Kings ( 18 - 38 ) were led by Zach Randolph , as he tallied 22 points , seven rebounds and three assists on 10 - of - 15 shooting . Bogdan Bogdanovic accrued 19 points , five rebounds and four assists . Justin Jackson totaled 12 points , six rebounds and three assists while De'Aaron Fox finished with 11 points , four rebounds and seven assists . The Mavericks ( 18 - 40 ) got a gem from J.J. Barea in his return from injury , as he led the team with 19 points , five rebounds and 13 assists . Harrison Barnes accumulated 18 points , five rebounds and two assists . Dennis Smith Jr. provided 17 points , three rebounds and three assists while Dwight Powell led the bench with 18 points , six rebounds and five assists . Sacramento will have to play again on Wednesday , as they travel to play the Houston Rockets . Dallas is now on their all - star break , as they wo n't return to action until February 23rd in a road matchup versus the Los_Angeles Lakers .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the host Dallas Mavericks , 111 - 110 , in overtime at American_Airlines_Center on Wednesday evening . The Thunder started out well , as they led for most of the first quarter and built a 32 - 21 lead heading into the second . They expanded their lead to 15 midway through the second , but the Mavericks answered back to match them with 22 points in the quarter , making it a 54 - 43 lead for the Thunder at halftime . The Mavs started the third quarter with a 9 - 2 run to cut the deficit to five . They kept the pressure on and outscored the Thunder 33 - 23 in the quarter , to make it a one - point game , trailing 77 - 76 entering the fourth . The Mavs kept up the strong play , and held a five - point lead mid way through the quarter . However , the Thunder tied it up at 98 with 3:24 left . The game stayed tied at 98 for two minutes , before the Thunder took a go - ahead basket . The Mavs managed to tie it up at the buzzer with a put - back shot by Dwight Powell , sending the game to overtime . It was a one - possession game through overtime , with the Thunder getting the game - winning point on a free throw thanks to a foul on a made basket by Russell Westbrook with 38 seconds left . Westbrook led the Thunder with 30 points , 11 rebounds , seven assists , three steals and one block , in 41 minutes . Paul George followed up with 23 points , 11 rebounds , six assists and one steal , while Carmelo Anthony added 12 points and six rebounds . The Thunder shot 45 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 36 from long range . Meanwhile , Harrison Barnes led the Mavericks with 26 points , five rebounds , five assists and two steals . Dwight Powell followed up with 21 points , eight rebounds , three assists and three steals , while Dennis Smith Jr. finished with 17 points , six assists , two rebounds and one steal . The Mavs shot 48 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 36 from long range . The Mavs ( 19 - 43 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Bulls in Chicago on Friday . The Thunder ( 36 - 27 ) take on the Suns in Phoenix on Friday .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 114 - 80 , at American_Airlines_Center on Saturday . It 's rare to see a double - digit margin from the first quarter on , but that 's just how badly Memphis is struggling right now . In fact , a 31 - 13 first quarter was too much for the Grizzlies to overcome , as Dallas led by at least 17 points for the final three quarters . Defense was key for the Mavericks , as they held the Grizzlies to 36 percent from the field while connecting on 48 percent of their shots . Rebounding was a big part of that , with Dallas outrebounding Memphis . 52 - 41 . The Grizzlies ( 18 - 48 ) were without Mike Conley , Marc Gasol and Tyreke Evans for this game , as it marked their 17th - straight defeat . Dillon Brooks led the way , as he tallied 17 points and six rebounds . JaMychal Green amassed 14 points , 10 rebounds and two assists . Jarrell Martin accrued 13 points , three rebounds and three assists . Ben McLemore totaled 10 points , six rebounds , three assists and three blocks . The Mavericks ( 21 - 45 ) were led by Harrison Barnes , as he generated 25 points and seven rebounds . J.J. Barea started and accumulated 20 points , five rebounds and five assists . Dwight Powell finished with 15 points , 10 rebounds , four assists and two steals . Doug McDermott led the bench with 20 points and seven boards . Dallas will play again on Sunday , as they play host to the Houston Rockets . As for Memphis , they play host to the Milwaukee Bucks on Monday for their next fixture .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the host Dallas Mavericks , 93 - 92 , at American_Airlines_Center on Friday . Despite the fact that Dallas held the lead for the entirety of the first half , Minnesota came back and prevailed with a huge win . While there were only five ties and three lead changes in this game , it was within a single - digit margin for all but one minute . Defense was key for Minnesota , as they forced 14 turnovers from Dallas while recording 10 steals . The Timberwolves also held the Mavericks to 45 percent from the field and 39 percent from three - point range . Free-throw shooting was also huge , with Minnesota connecting on 15 - of - 17 and Dallas hitting just 5 - of - 7 . A 23 - 11 fastbreak differential was also big for the T'Wolves The Timberwolves ( 44 - 33 ) were led by Karl-Anthony Towns , as he totaled 21 points and 20 rebounds . Jeff Teague accrued 14 points , four rebounds and two assists . Taj Gibson amassed 12 points , six rebounds and two steals . Jamal Crawford led the bench with 24 points , three rebounds , two assists and two steals . Andrew Wiggins went just 4 - of - 17 from the field but still accumulated eight points , four rebounds , three assists , three steals and two blocks . The Mavericks ( 23 - 53 ) were led by Harrison Barnes , as he collected 19 points , four rebounds and two assists . Dennis Smith Jr. generated 17 points , seven assists and two steals . No other starter had more than seven points . Yogi Ferrell led the bench with 14 points , four rebounds , three assists and two steals . Both teams return to action on Sunday , with Dallas traveling to face the Cleveland Cavaliers and Minnesota playing host to the Utah Jazz .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers , 115 - 109 , at American_Airlines_Center on Tuesday . Despite the fact that this matchup looked lopsided on paper , 10 ties and 14 lead changes show just how close this game was . With that said , Dallas held the lead for the final 20 minutes of action , as Portland simply could n't recapture the lead . Turnovers really killed the Trail_Blazers , as they committed 13 of them while forcing just seven from the Mavericks . Three-point shooting was also huge , with Dallas hitting 17 - of - 44 while Portland connected on just 10 - of - 40 . Fastbreak points were also critical , with the Mavericks winning that battle , 21 - 12 . The Trail_Blazers ( 48 - 30 ) were led by Damian Lillard , as he tallied 29 points , five rebounds and eight assists on just 6 - of - 20 from the field . C.J . McCollum finished with 16 points , four rebounds and eight assists . Jusuf Nurkic totaled 15 points and 13 rebounds . Shabazz Napier led the bench with 13 points and four assists . The Mavericks ( 24 - 54 ) had all five starters reach double figures in scoring , as Dennis Smith Jr. led them with 18 points , eight rebounds and eight assists . J.J. Barea amassed 15 points , two rebounds and five assists . Harrison Barnes and Dirk Nowitzki each went 5 - of - 14 from the field as they scored 15 and 14 points respectively . On deck for Dallas is a road matchup versus the Orlando Magic on Wednesday . As for Portland , they travel to face the Houston Rockets on Thursday for their next outing .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 112 - 107 , at Barclays_Center on Wednesday night . Coming into the contest , it would n't have been difficult to imagine the defensively - deficient Nets ( 3 - 2 ) as a sacrificial lamb for a Cavaliers ( 3 - 2 ) squad looking for a signature win to regain a bit of lost confidence . Cleveland 's 3 - 1 mark coming in masked some of the difficulties they 'd endured , with their latest struggles having come Tuesday night in what should have been an easy victory over the Bulls . Cleveland once again rolled out its new - look lineup Wednesday , with LeBron James manning the point and Tristan Thompson down low at center . However , the first half brought them more of the same misery , as they entered intermission trailing by a 55 - 52 margin . The deficit grew further in the third period before a fourth - quarter push by the Cavs eventually saw them take a 94 - 92 lead with 5:12 remaining . They would n't be able to sustain it , however , and Spencer Dinwiddie 's jaw - dropping 31 - foot three - pointer with 43 seconds remaining gave the Nets the lead for good . James paced the visitors with a 29 - point , 13 - assist , 10 - rebound triple - double that also included four blocks . He did also commit a game - high eight turnovers . Kyle Korver was next with a bench - leading 22 points , a total he supplemented with two rebounds , one steal and one block . Jeff Green continued his strong play on the second unit to open the season , posting 18 points , six rebounds , three assists , two blocks and one steal . Kevin Love managed a 15 - point , 12 - rebound double - double , while Thompson mustered only three points but also pulled down eight boards and recorded a steal . With D'Angelo Russell ( knee ) sitting Wednesday , Dinwiddie drew the start at point guard and led the way with 22 points , six assists , five rebounds and one steal . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson supplied 19 points , six rebounds , two assists , three blocks and one steal . Allen Crabbe matched Hollis-Jefferson 's scoring total while leading the bench and also provided three assists and two rebounds . DeMarre Carroll continued his strong start to the season with 18 points , seven rebounds , one assist and four steals . Joe Harris was productive off the bench as well with 11 points , while Caris LeVert , starting at shooting guard , poured in 10 points and added four assists , one rebound and one steal . The Cavaliers have until Saturday night to stew in the loss , as they 'll return action then against the New_Orleans Pelicans in the Big Easy . The Nets will next take the floor against the Knicks across town on Friday night .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Washington Wizards , 103 - 98 , at Barclay 's Center on Tuesday . In a battle between two teams near the bottom of the Eastern_Conference , it came down to the final possessions . In fact , there were 10 ties and 21 lead changes in total , as it was a single - digit margin for all but a few minutes . In fact , it was within a five - point margin for the final eight minutes . Both teams really struggled offensively , as they both shot just 40 percent from the field and less than 25 percent from three - point range . Ball movement was key for Brooklyn , as they recorded 26 assists , while holding Washington to just 18 assists . A 44 - 37 defensive rebounding margin was key as well for the Nets . The Wizards ( 14 - 13 ) were led by Bradley Beal , as he tallied 28 points , two rebounds , four assists and two steals . Otto Porter was the only other starter in double figures , as he amassed 11 points , five rebounds and three assists . Kelly Oubre Jr. led the bench with 12 points and nine rebounds . The Nets ( 11 - 15 ) got a double - double out of Rondae Hollis-Jefferson , as he totaled 16 points and 12 rebounds . DeMarre Carroll accrued 15 points and eight rebounds . Allen Crabbe went just 3 - of - 15 from the field , but still finished with 13 points , five rebounds and three assists . Spencer Dinwiddie collected 11 points , six rebounds , 12 assists and two steals . Caris LeVert led the bench with 16 points , three rebounds and eight assists .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Orlando Magic , 98 - 95 , at Barclays_Center on Monday evening . A hard - fought contest between two evenly - matched teams fittingly came down to the closing seconds , as both clubs remained within striking distance of each other throughout all four quarters . The Nets ( 14 - 23 ) could n't pull away despite outscoring the Magic ( 12 - 16 ) by a 49 - 43 margin in the middle periods , as they entered the final 12 minutes with a razor - thin 71 - 70 lead . Ultimately , it was Allen Crabbe 's two clutch free throws with 18 seconds remaining and his subsequent block of an Evan Fournier 27 - foot three - point pullup jumper that helped seal the win , although nothing was assured until D.J . Augustin also misfired on a three - point attempt with one second left . Brooklyn made Orlando work for their points , as they held the Magic to a 36 percent success rate from the field , including an unsightly 19 percent from three - point range . Aaron Gordon paced the visitors with a 20 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included one steal . Elfrid Payton posted 17 points , seven assists , four rebounds , two steals and one block . Fournier and Bismack Biyombo had matching 13 - point efforts , with the former adding one assist , one steal and one block , and the latter hauling in 17 boards and posting a trio of blocks . Jonathon Simmons pitched in 10 points , five rebounds , three assists and one steal . Jarrett Allen led the Nets with 16 points in 20 minutes off the bench , and he complemented his scoring with six rebounds . Caris LeVert was right behind him with 15 points and added eight assists , five rebounds and two steals . Crabbe matched his scoring total and also supplied eight boards , one assist , three blocks and one steal . DeMarre Carroll turned in a 14 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and one steal . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson managed 13 points , seven rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . The Magic head back home to tangle with the Houston Rockets on Wednesday evening , while the Nets remain home and await the Minnesota Timberwolves on Wednesday night as well .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 98 - 97 , at Barclay 's Center on Wednesday . This was an extremely competitive game throughout , as it took a shot at the buzzer to decide a winner . In fact , Spencer Dinwiddie hit a floater with nine seconds left to take a one - point lead , as Jimmy Butler missed a fade - away 20 - footer at the buzzer that ultimately cost the T'Wolves the game . Prior to that , there were 10 ties and seven lead changes in total , as this game was within a five - point margin for well over 30 minutes of action . Three-point shooting was the difference , as Minnesota went just 1 - of - 11 from long range , while Brooklyn hit 14 - of - 30 . The Nets ended up shooting 51 percent from the field , while winning the assist battle , 22 - 10 . The Timberwolves ( 24 - 15 ) were led by Jimmy Butler , as he collected 30 points , three rebounds , four assists and two steals . Andrew Wiggins finished with 17 points , two rebounds and two steals . Karl-Anthony Towns totaled 16 points and 10 rebounds . The Nets ( 15 - 23 ) not only got a game - winner out of Spencer Dinwiddie , he led the team with 26 points and nine assists on 9 - of - 14 from the field . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson amassed 10 points and five rebounds before fouling out . Joe Harris was huge off the bench , as he provided 17 points and four rebounds on 6 - of - 7 shooting . Minnesota will return to action on Friday in a road matchup versus the Boston Celtics , As for Brooklyn , they also face the Celtics for their next fixture , as they play host to them on Saturday .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Brooklyn Nets on overtime , 114 - 113 , at Barclays_Center on Monday . The Nets ( 15 - 25 ) made things difficult for a streaking Toronto ( 28 - 10 ) team , but the Canadian franchise eventually ended securing a win after a tight contest that needed an overtime period to find a winner . The Raptors always seemed to be in control , but the Nets found a way to respond time and time again , including on a 36 - 29 fourth - period lead that sent the game to OT . It seemed another overtime would be needed to find a winner , but a clutch free throw from DeMar DeRozan lifted Toronto to a huge win on the road that pushed their winning streak to five games . DeMar DeRozan led the way offensively for the Raptors , as the reigning Eastern_Conference Player of the Week contributed with 35 points and six assists . Three other Toronto players had doubles - doubles . Jonas Valanciunas chipped in with 21 points and 13 rebounds , Kyle Lowry added 18 points with 11 assists , and Serge Ibaka had 11 points , 12 rebounds , and six blocks . Spencer Dinwiddie had a great performance for the Nets , as the talented guard finished with 31 points , seven assists , and five rebounds . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson filled the stat sheet thanks to 14 points , 17 boards , and five assists . Allen Crabbe chipped in with 20 points and eight rebounds , while Jarrett Allen 14 points and five rebounds . Joe Harris chipped in with 12 points .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 100 - 95 , at Barclays_Center on Wednesday evening . The Spurs ( 30 - 16 ) and the Nets ( 16 - 29 ) delivered a game that ended being far tighter than what anyone would have expected , but the Western_Conference team ended coming out on top . It was n't easy , however , as the Nets never gave up and in fact Brooklyn looked impressive in the fourth quarter , so much that they could have easily evened things up had they reacted sooner . San_Antonio jumped on top quickly , as they won the first quarter 31 - 26 and maintained that five - point advantage heading into halftime . The Spurs extended that lead in the third , and entered the final 12 minutes with a 12 - points advantage . Brooklyn reacted and made it a close contest late in the fourth , but it was too late and San_Antonio ended winning a tough game on the road . LaMarcus Aldridge was the star of the game for San_Antonio , as the power forward once again carried a heavy load on the offense and finished with 34 points and eight rebounds . Patty Mills had one of his best games of the season coming off the bench , as the Australian point guard chipped in with 25 points on 7 - of - 10 from the field . Pau Gasol came close to a triple - double after notching 13 points , 12 rebounds and seven assists . Allen Crabbe was the top scorer for the Nets , as the talented scorer registered 20 points with eight rebounds and three assists . Spencer Dinwiddie struggled from the field since he finished with nine points on 3 - of - 13 from the field , but had 12 assists and two steals . Joe Harris ( 18 points ) and Caris LeVert ( 13 points ) made an impact off the bench . DeMarre Carroll had 11 points and 10 boards .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Philadelphia 76ers 116 - 108 on Wednesday at Barclays_Center . Wednesday night was the complete , efficient team effort that the Nets ( 19 - 33 ) needed to end their four - game winning streak . Point guard D'Angelo Russell embodied that efficiency , as despite still being limited off the bench in his slow return from a knee injury , Russell shot 8 - of - 15 from the field en route to scoring 22 points in just 17 minutes as a reserve . He was only outdone by starting point guard Spencer Dinwiddie , who scored a team - high 27 points in 34 minutes thanks to his ability to get to the free throw line , shooting 13 - of - 15 from the charity stripe . In all , five Brooklyn players scored in double figures while the team shot 41 percent from three and 51 percent from the field overall , as they managed to torch a stout Philadelphia defense . That poor defensive effort from the 76ers ( 24 - 24 ) ended up being the difference in Wednesday 's game , as the team still managed to have a pretty solid overall effort on the offensive end , shooting 39 percent from three and 47 percent from the field overall . Joel Embiid , Ben Simmons and J.J. Redick accounted for majority of Philly 's offensive production , with the three starters combining to score 73 of the team 's 108 points Wednesday . Embiid led the way with a monster double - double of 29 points and 14 rebounds in 38 minutes . Up next , the Nets will remain home Friday and play the Lakers , while the 76ers will return home Friday to take on the Heat .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 109 - 94 , at Barclays_Center on Sunday afternoon . The Bucks ( 29 - 23 ) came into Sunday 's game sporting a clear advantage on paper , and they appeared seemingly ready to validate it by taking a 36 - 22 first - quarter lead . Their edge had grown to 62 - 41 by intermission , a margin that strongly hinted at a runaway road win . However , the Nets ( 19 - 35 ) came out of the halftime locker room playing with some pride , racking up 31 points in the third period while limiting their visitors to 21 . That brief surge ultimately was n't enough , though , as Milwaukee prevented Brooklyn from narrowing their deficit beyond seven points . As has been the case with many of the Nets ' opponents , the Bucks thrived on the glass , outrebounding their hosts by a sizable 54 - 36 margin . They also were sharp from the field , as evidenced by a 52 percent success rate overall , including a solid 42 percent from behind the arc . That well - balanced production helped the visitors overcome an early exit from star big man Giannis Antetokounmpo , who left the game with 7:34 remaining after hurting his right ankle . Eric Bledsoe led the way for the Bucks with 28 points on 12 - for - 20 shooting , a total he supplemented with six assists , four rebounds and one steal . John Henson followed with a massive 19 - point , 18 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and two blocks . Antetokounmpo finished with 16 points , eight rebounds , four assists and one block in 28 minutes before being sidelined . Khris Middleton matched his scoring total and added four rebounds and one assist . Jabari Parker was once again successful in his second game back , leading the second unit with 11 points , two assists , one rebound , two blocks and one steal . Tony Snell was held scoreless over 31 minutes but did pitch in three rebounds and one block . DeMarre Carroll and Caris LeVert co - led the Nets with 15 points apiece . The former also supplied three rebounds and one block , while the latter managed one assist . Jarrett Allen drew another start at center and generated 14 points and seven rebounds . Allen Crabbe poured in 11 points and also posted five boards . Spencer Dinwiddie mustered a modest nine points but dished out 10 assists and recorded three steals . Quincy Acy produced seven points , four rebounds , two assists and one steal . Joe Harris was productive off the bench as well with eight points , five rebounds and three assists . The Bucks remain in the Big Apple in anticipation of a Tuesday night battle with the New_York Knicks , while the Nets remain home and await a visit from the Houston Rockets on that same evening .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 123 - 113 , at Barclays_Center on Tuesday evening . The Rockets ( 39 - 13 ) and the Nets ( 19 - 36 ) played a tight game during the first half , but Houston pulled away for good in the second half and clinched the win against a difficult opponent on the road . After the first two quarters ended with a 65 - 63 advantage for Houston , the Rockets increased that advantage to 10 points after three . Brooklyn could n't turn things around in the final 12 minutes , and the Rockets sealed the deal to complete the season - series sweep of the Nets . James Harden led the way for the Rockets with an impressive performance of 36 points , five assists , and four rebounds , but he also made history since he reached 15,0 - career points . Chris Paul added 25 points with seven rebounds and five assists . Clint Capela had 18 points with 11 rebounds , once again emerging as a force on both ends of the court . The bench provided a spark as well , as Gerald Green ( 16 points ) and Eric Gordon ( 13 points ) did a good job in the second unit . DeMarre Carroll was the top player for the Nets , as he finished with 21 points . Spencer Dinwiddie filled the stat sheet nicely after finishing with 18 points , nine assists , and three rebounds . Jarrett Allen chipped in with 16 points . Jahill Okafor had a good performance off the bench with 15 points and six boards in 15 minutes , and D'Angelo Russell had 10 points on 4 - of - 12 from the field .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the host Brooklyn Nets , 114 - 101 , at Barclays_Center on Monday evening . The Clippers got out to a good start , as they took a 6 - 5 lead and did not look back until they ended the first quarter up 34 - 22 . They not only maintained their comfortable cushion through the second , but the Clippers expanded their lead to 66 - 51 by halftime . The third quarter was more of the same , as the Clippers pushed their lead to 23 , taking a 90 - 67 lead into the final frame . The Nets finally showed some life as they started the fourth with a 14 - 6 run , which made it a 15 - point game , with 8:30 to go . However , it was too little , too late for the Nets , as they fell to their sixth straight loss . Lou Williams led the way for Los_Angeles , with 20 points on 8 - of - 16 shooting , in 29 minutes off the bench . DeAndre Jordan came up large , with 16 points , 17 rebounds , two assists and two blocks , while Austin Rivers chipped in 17 points , four assists , two rebounds and a steal . Danilo Gallinari added 16 points , five rebounds and two blocks . The Clippers shot 56 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 16 from long range . Meanwhile , D'Angelo Russell and Joe Harris tallied 16 points each off the bench , to lead the Nets in scoring . DeMarre Carroll shot 5 - of - 15 from the field , and finished with 12 points , and 10 rebounds , while Allen Crabbe added 15 points , six rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . The Nets shot 46 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 40 from long range . The Nets ( 19 - 39 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Pacers on Wednesday . The Clippers ( 29 - 26 ) take on the Celtics in Boston on Wednesday .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the visiting Memphis Grizzlies , 118 - 115 , at Barclays_Center on Monday evening . The first quarter kicked off the high - scoring contest with both the Nets and Grizzlies getting out to a good start . The Nets took a 32 - 31 lead after the first quarter . The Grizzlies rallied ahead to a 47 - 40 lead mid way through the second quarter , but the Nets battled back to take a two - point , 65 - 63 , lead by halftime . The Grizzlies came out strong in the third and outscored the Nets 31 - 22 in the quarter , to take a 94 - 87 lead heading into the final frame . The Nets answered back in the fourth , tying it up at 94 with 10 minutes left in the game . They then used a 90 run mid way through the quarter to take an eight point lead , which was enough of a cushion to keep them ahead the rest of the way . Allen Crabbe led the Nets with 22 points , three rebounds , two assists and one block , in 27 minutes . Caris LeVert tallied 22 points , three rebounds , two assists and one block , in 24 minutes off the bench . D'Angelo Russell finished with 14 points , seven assists , five rebounds , two steals and two blocks , in 29 minutes . The Nets shot 50 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 40 from long range . Meanwhile , JaMychal Green came up big for Memphis , with 14 points , 16 rebounds , three assists , three steals and one block in 29 minutes . Andrew Harrison tallied 19 points , eight assists , one rebound and one block , while Wayne Selden added 17 points , three rebounds and two assists , in 23 minutes off the bench . The Grizzlies shot 52 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 23 from long range . The Grizzlies ( 19 - 51 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the 76ers in Philadelphia on Wednesday . The Nets ( 23 - 48 ) play host to the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 111 - 105 , at Barclays_Center on Wednesday . The Hornets ( 30 - 41 ) pulled quite an upset in this game , as they came back from a huge deficit in the first half . Brooklyn jumped to a 62 - 43 lead after the break , but Charlotte did n't sit back and they managed to turn things around in the second half . Charlotte turned things around in the third with a 32 - 25 lead in the third , and they rode the momentum to come away with the game thanks to a huge 36 - 18 advantage in the fourth quarter . It was an impressive performance from Charlotte , and they kept their slim playoff chances alive . Dwight Howard led the way for Charlotte with an impressive performance , as he finished with 32 points and an astonishing 30 rebounds , including 11 offensive boards . Kemba Walker had a very good effort as well , as he finished with 24 points , six assists , five rebounds , and two steals . Jeremy Lamb had 17 points with seven boards . Frank Kaminsky did a good job off the bench with 11 points . D'Angelo Russell led the way for the Nets , as he finished with 19 points , five assists , and four boards . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson filled the stat sheet nicely , as he had 13 points , five rebounds , three assists , and three steals . DeMarre Carroll delivered 11 points with six rebounds , and Spencer Dinwiddie had a great effort off the bench thanks to 13 points .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting Toronto Raptors , 129 - 111 , at Pepsi_Center on Wednesday evening . The Nuggets ( 4 - 4 ) were not messing around in their first game back home after a four - game trip , as they poured in a season - high 129 points in a convincing victory over the Raptors ( 4 - 3 ) . They pounced on the Raptors , taking a 34 - 19 lead by the end of the first quarter . Toronto woke up in the second quarter but only managed the trim one point off the lead before halftime . However , the Nuggets poured in 43 third - quarter points to take a 103 - 69 lead into the final frame , where they turned on cruise control . Jamal Murray was the high - point man for Denver , with 24 points on 8 - of - 10 shooting , along with three rebounds and two assists in 21 minutes . This marked the third straight 20 - point game for Murray . Nikola Jokic only scored eight points on 4 - of - 10 shooting , but dominated the glass with 16 rebounds and dropped 10 dimes , along with two blocks and a steal in 30 minutes . Paul Millsap added 20 points , four assists , three rebounds and two steals in 26 minutes . The Nuggets shot 53 percent from the field and 50 percent from long range , while assisting on 35 of their 47 field goals . Meanwhile , Norman Powell led the Raptors with 14 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting in 28 minutes . Four other players scored in double digits for Toronto , including Delon Wright , who finished with 12 points and six assists in 25 minutes off the bench . Serge Ibaka chipped in 11 points , while DeMar DeRozan finished with 10 points . Kyle Lowry had nine points , five rebounds and four assists . The Raptors will continue their road trip as they take on the Jazz in Utah on Friday . The Nuggets play host to the Heat on Friday .
The host Denver Nuggets recorded a season - best scoring output as they blew out the New_Orleans Pelicans , 146 - 114 , at Pepsi_Center on Friday . Denver ( 9 - 6 ) has now won four of its last five games after Friday 's monstrous scoring night . The Nuggets scored a new season high , recording 146 points in the win . Sophomore guard Jamal Murray recorded a team - high 31 points in his second 30 - point outing of the season . Murray was one of three Nuggets to score in double digits and six to score in double figures . Denver shot a whopping 63 percent from the field on the night , also marking a new season high for the squad . Denver splashed in 18 three - pointers on the night , shooting 52 percent from beyond the arc . The team finished the game on a high note , scoring 82 second - half points and 40 in the fourth quarter . New_Orleans ( 8 - 8 ) delivered a surprisingly balanced performance in the loss . The Pelicans saw six players score in double digits , with Anthony Davis and DeMarcus Cousins combining for only 31 points in the game . Cousins shot just 6 - of - 16 en route to 14 points , weighing down the Pelicans ' offense which shot a solid 53 percent from the field . Davis wound up leading the team with 17 points on 7 - of - 11 shooting from the field . Point guard Rajon Rondo , who recently returned from injury , shot 6 - of - 8 en route to 13 points in what proved to be an ultimately futile effort against Denver . The Nuggets will visit LA and the Lakers on Sunday , while New_Orleans will host the Thunder on Monday .
The Denver Nuggets took down the visiting Los_Angeles Lakers , 115 - 110 , at Pepsi_Center on Saturday thanks to a strong fourth - quarter comeback effort . Denver ( 13 - 9 ) entered the fourth quarter trailing by two points , but delivered a strong fourth - quarter performance to pull off the significant victory . Denver delivered a whopping 37 points in the fourth , ultimately establishing a comfortable double - digit lead . Drama , though , ensued in the game 's final minute . As time ran out , sophomore point guard Jamal Murray dribble around Lakers rookie Lonzo Ball , a gesture that seemingly offended Lakers forward Julius Randle . Randle swung at Murray in the final seconds of the game , leading to a foul that put Murray at the line and allowed him to extend his team - high scoring total to 28 points . Besides his involvement in the late - game controversy , Murray delivered a strong performance . He not only led the Nuggets with 28 points , but delivered four assists and two steals . Murray 's offensive contribution was much - needed , as Denver remains without star big men Nikola Jokic ( ankle ) and Paul Millsap ( wrist ) . In their absence , though , several other Nuggets stepped up in addition to Murray . Trey Lyles and Will Barton led a strong showing for the Denver bench , combining for 34 points . Los_Angeles ( 8 - 14 ) has now lost nine of its last 12 games , as struggles are beginning to mount for one of the league 's youngest teams . On Saturday , the Lakers enjoyed a strong outing from sophomore star Brandon Ingram , who scored a team - high 20 points . However , highly - touted rookie Lonzo Ball did not impress to the same degree . Ball shot just 4 - of - 10 for nine points and finished with five turnovers . Ball 's adjustment to the league remains a work in progress , as his field goal percentage remains under 35 percent for the season . However , another Lakers rookie , Kyle Kuzma , has shone in his debut season . Kuzma returned from a brief injury on Saturday and delivered a double - double off the bench . Los_Angeles will host the Houston Rockets on Sunday , while Denver will see the Dallas Mavericks on Monday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the host Denver Nuggets , 112 - 104 , at Pepsi_Center on Wednesday evening . The Nuggets have been great at home this season and started the game out that way , leading 24 - 17 after one quarter . The Timberwolves picked up the intensity in the second quarter , first cutting the deficit , then responding to Denver 's run , so that the Nuggets led by only two , 52 - 50 at halftime . The Timberwolves managed to hang around through the third , despite the Nuggets expanding their lead to four heading into the fourth . The fourth belonged to the Timberwolves , as their big guns came alive helping to outscore the Nuggets 32 - 20 in the quarter and run off with the win . Karl-Anthony Towns helped spark the Timberwolves , scoring their first 11 points of the first quarter . Towns finished with 25 points on 11 - of - 16 shooting , 10 rebounds , three steals and two assists , in 37 minutes . Jimmy Butler tallied 25 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting , as he also came up big down the stretch for Minnesota . Jamal Crawford poured in 20 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting , in 28 minutes off the bench . The Timberwolves shot 49 percent from the field , including 33 percent from long range . Meanwhile , Jamal Murray led the Nuggets with 30 points on 10 - of17 shooting , in 37 minutes . Nikola Jokic followed up with 22 points , six rebounds , four assists and two blocks , in 36 minutes , while Mason Plumlee tallied 13 points , 10 rebounds , six assists and three steals , in 28 minutes . The Nuggets shot 51 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 29 from long range , however gave up 21 turnovers in the contest . The Nuggets ( 16 - 15 ) head to Portland to take on the Trail_Blazers on Friday . The Timberwolves ( 19 - 13 ) head to Phoenix to take on the Suns on Friday .
The Philadelphia 76ers narrowly edged out the Denver Nuggets , 107 - 102 , at Pepsi_Center on Saturday . Philadelphia ( 16 - 19 ) will be happy to have the win , as it had gone just 1 - 5 over its last six games . Moreover , star center Joel Embiid ( rest ) was not active for Saturday 's contest . Still , the team earned the win , thanks in large part to a strong defensive effort . The Sixers held the Nuggets to just 40 percent shooting overall and 7 - of - 32 shooting from beyond the three - point line . On the offensive end , six Philadelphia players scored in double digits , in what was a balanced effort for the team . Dario Saric led the Sixers with 20 points on 6 - of - 15 shooting . It was a rare off night for rookie star Ben Simmons despite the win . Simmons had just six points and committed five turnovers on the night . For Denver ( 19 - 17 ) , the loss is the second straight in tough , last - minute fashion . The team struggled to find its shot throughout the night , despite a team - leading performance from sophomore guard Jamal Murray . Murray shot 11 - of - 23 en route to a team - high 31 points . The 20 - year - old is now averaging 19 points per game in the month of December . Star center Nikola Jokic also had a big night , scoring 19 points to go with 13 rebounds . The duo combined to shoot 16 - of - 18 at the free - throw line , reaching the charity stripe more times than the entire 76ers team . Philadelphia will travel to Phoenix on New Year 's Eve . Denver , meanwhile , will host Phoenix next Wednesday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the Phoenix Suns , 134 - 111 , at Pepsi_Center on Wednesday evening . The Nuggets ( 20 - 17 ) have already been one of the toughest teams to knock off in their home arena this season , as they came into Wednesday 's game with a 12 - 4 record at Pepsi_Center . That alone stacked the odds against the Suns ( 15 - 25 ) , and travel issues that delayed their flight into early Wednesday morning certainly did n't help their cause whatsoever . However , the way that Denver 's Gary Harris was shooting , it 's unlikely anything could have derailed the home squad . The talented two - guard led all scorers with 36 points , draining 14 of his 17 shots from the field , including three of his five from long distance . His efforts helped spearhead a stellar 62 percent shooting effort overall for the Nuggets , which also won the rebounding battle by a comfortable 48 - 35 margin . To their credit , Phoenix responded to a 34 - 26 first - quarter deficit by exploding for 41 in the second to forge a 67 - 61 halftime lead . That quickly evaporated in the third quarter , however , as Denver outscored the visitors by a 37 - 18 margin in the third to pull away for good . Devin Booker paced the Suns with 17 points , which he supplemented with five assists and two rebounds . Greg Monroe saw the floor for the first time since Dec. 21 and managed a 16 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included four assists . Marquese Chriss matched Monroe 's scoring total and added four rebounds , one assist and five steals . Josh Jackson managed a bench - leading 14 points and added two boards , two assists and one steal . T.J. Warren supplied 13 points , five rebounds , five assists , four steals and one block . Harris added four rebounds , three assists and two steals to his game - high scoring total . Wilson Chandler tallied 17 points , seven boards , four assists and two blocks . Trey Lyles led the second unit with 16 points , 11 rebounds and one assist . Nikola Jokic posted 14 points , nine rebounds , eight assists and two steals . Jamal Murray registered 13 points , two assists , two steals and one block . Will Barton ( 12 points , six assists and three rebounds ) and Malik Beasley ( 10 points , three assists , two rebounds , one steal and one block ) were productive off the bench as well . The Suns head to San_Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday night , while the Nuggets remain home to face the Jazz on Friday evening as well .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting Utah Jazz , 99 - 91 , at Pepsi_Center on Friday evening . The first quarter was a neck - and - neck battle as the teams traded baskets . The Jazz led 26 - 23 to start the second quarter but that quickly changed as the Nuggets went on a 14 - 3 run to take a 37 - 29 lead just four minutes into the quarter . The Jazz fought back and swung things again in their favor by regaining their three - point lead by halftime . The third quarter ended up being the decisive one , as the Nuggets caught fire , outscoring the Jazz 38 - 16 , to take a 84 - 65 lead into the fourth . Although the Jazz put up a fight in the fourth , outscoring Denver 26 - 15 , it was not enough to recover from the 19 - point deficit they faced with 12 minutes to go . This marks the second straight win for the Nuggets . Jamal Murray and Trey Lyles poured in 26 points each to give the Nuggets the juice they needed to move their home record to an impressive 14 - 4 . Gary Harris added 13 points , while Will Barton tallied in 12 points and eight assists , in 33 minutes off the bench . The Nuggets shot 44 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 35 from long range . Meanwhile , five players scored in double digits for the Jazz , led by Donovan Mitchell and Ricky Rubio who finished with 15 points each . Derrick Favors followed up with 14 points and 10 rebounds , while Rodney Hood chipped in 12 points , four rebounds , three assists and a steal , in 30 minutes off the bench . The Jazz shot 45 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 33 from long range . The Jazz ( 16 - 23 ) will look to avoid a third straight loss as they head to Miami to take on the Heat on Sunday . The Nuggets ( 21 - 17 ) will be right back in action as they take on the Kings in Sacramento on Saturday .
The host Denver Nuggets defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers , 104 - 101 , in a late - game thriller at Pepsi_Center on Monday . The game was tight throughout , with the largest lead of the game being just eight for Denver early in the first quarter . The teams traded buckets back and forth for the majority of the contest , culminating in a tense final minute that decided the outcome . After an and - one from Jamal Murray gave Denver the lead , Portland held possession with 31 seconds remaining and a one - point deficit . Both C.J . McCollum and Evan Turner missed potential go - ahead jumpers , as multiple offensive rebounds were unable to save the possession for Portland . Four free - throws from Will Barton in the final seconds helped seal the win for the Nuggets . For Denver ( 24 - 23 ) , Jamal Murray 's go - ahead bucket was just one of many in the win . Murray scored a whopping 38 points on 14 - of - 19 shooting . His offense was sorely needed in what was generally a poor shooting night for Denver . The team as a whole shot just 41 percent from the field , and the Nuggets starters outside of Murray and Mason Plumlee combined to shoot just 9 - of - 38 . Portland ( 25 - 22 ) , meanwhile , snapped a three - game winning streak with Monday 's heartbreaking loss . While Damian Lillard excelled , scoring a team - high 25 points and dishing eight assists , Portland 's other star guard did not . C.J . McCollum shot just 3 - of - 14 , including a miss on an ill - advised mid - range jumper on one of Portland 's final possessions . The Blazers as a whole shot only 42 percent in the game . Portland will host the Minnesota Timberwolves on Wednesday . Denver , meanwhile , will see the New_York Knicks on Thursday .
The Denver Nuggets took down the visiting Golden_State Warriors , 115 - 108 , at Pepsi_Center on Saturday . While the defending champions held a lead for much of the early going , a fourth quarter run from the Nuggets helped push the team to victory . The Nuggets scored 38 points in the fourth , taking the lead with just over four minutes remaining and never allowing it to go away . Star big man Nikola Jokic hit a crucial three - pointer with just over two minutes left , and followed it up with a pair of free - throws on the next possession . The Nuggets were ultimately able to put the game out of reach thanks to two technical free - throws , which came after technical fouls were assessed to Nick Young and Kevin Durant with 30 seconds remaining in the game . For Denver ( 28 - 25 ) , the strong offensive night was led by combo wing Will Barton . Barton had 25 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting . Star center Nikola Jokic had a team - high nine rebounds , along with 19 points and five assists . One of the keys for the team was free - throw shooting , as they shot 25 - of - 29 from the stripe in the win . On the other hand , Golden_State ( 41 - 12 ) uncharacteristically struggled at the free - throw line . They went just 14 - of - 23 from the line , including rare misses from Kevin Durant and Steph Curry . Durant , nevertheless , scored a team - high 31 points on highly efficient 12 - of - 16 shooting . Curry also excelled , scoring 24 points on 8 - of - 16 shooting . Denver will host the Charlotte Hornets on Monday , while the Warriors will square off with the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Tuesday evening .
The Houston Rockets defeated the host Denver Nuggets , 119 - 114 , at Pepsi_Center on Sunday evening . The Rockets got out to a dominant start , as they jumped to an early 15 - 5 lead . The Nuggets battled back to make it a five - point game , but the Rockets closed the quarter on 19 - 11 run , to take a 38 - 25 lead into the second . The Rockets kept the foot on the gas through the second quarter , not allowing Denver to catch up at all , and took a 66 - 52 lead into halftime . The third quarter was more of the same , as the Nuggets could hardly trim the deficit to single digits , before the Rockets would take off again . Houston took a 92 - 79 lead into the final frame , where the Nuggets continued their best effort to claw back . They did a great job chipping away , making it just a five - point game with 4:31 to go . However , the Rockets managed to stay a couple steps ahead in order to notch their 12th straight win . James Harden led Houston with 41 points on 11 - of - 20 shooting , eight rebounds , seven assists and one steal , in 37 minutes . Chris Paul followed up with 23 points , six assists , five rebounds and two steals , while Trevor Ariza added 14 points , six rebounds and one steal . The Rockets shot 51 percent from the field , including 15 - of - 34 from long range . Meanwhile , Will Barton led the Nuggets with 25 points , seven rebounds , six assists and three steals , in 36 minutes . Nikola Jokic finished with 21 points , 14 rebounds , eight assists , one steal and one block , while Jamal Murray tallied 19 points , five assists and two rebounds . The Nuggets shot 48 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 29 from long range . The Nuggets ( 33 - 27 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Clippers on Tuesday . The Rockets ( 46 - 13 ) will be right back in action as they take on the Jazz in Utah on Monday .
The visiting Los_Angeles Clippers squeaked by the Denver Nuggets , 122 - 120 , at Pepsi_Center on Tuesday evening . The Clippers ( 32 - 27 ) can thank their second unit for the win , as the team 's bench combined to pour in 74 points on Tuesday . Tuesday 's win came in dramatic fashion , as the fourth quarter featured four ties and three lead changes . LA , though , managed to come out on top , despite Denver ( 33 - 28 ) bringing the game to within one with under 20 seconds remaining . After Lou Williams sank two clutch free - throws to give LA its ultimate lead , Denver was able to get the ball back with a chance to tie or win with only seven seconds left . Clippers forward Tobias Harris foiled them , though , with a clutch steal . LA re - entered the playoff picture with Tuesday 's win . The team now sits at eighth in what is proving to be a hotly - contested Western_Conference . Despite the team suffering several injuries and making major mid - season shakeups , one player has been a constant rock for the Clippers : Lou Williams . The former Sixth Man of the Year impressed once again on Tuesday , leading his team with 25 points off the bench . Big man Boban Marjanovic also delivered an electrifying bench performance . He recorded a season - high 18 points in only 15 minutes of play . For Denver , meanwhile , it was the starters who got the job done . All five Nuggets starters scored at least 18 points in what was a terrific game for the starting unit . Shooting guard Gary Harris led the team with 23 points . However , the bench came up short , scoring only 24 of the team 's 120 points in the loss . Veteran All-Star Paul Millsap played for the first time in 100 days , making his return from a wrist injury that sidelined him in December . Los_Angeles will host the red - hot Houston Rockets on Wednesday , while the Nuggets will travel to Memphis on Friday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting Los_Angeles Lakers , 125 - 116 , at Pepsi_Center on Friday evening . The Nuggets got out to a great start at home , as they outscored the Lakers 37 - 28 in the first quarter . They expanded their lead to 13 early in the second , before the Lakers made a push to cut the deficit to just one , as they trailed 47 - 46 , 5:30 into the quarter . The Nuggets managed to stay ahead until halftime , where they led 65 - 62 . The Nuggets came out strong in the third and led for most of the quarter , until the Lakers made a push to finish the quarter on a 11 - 4 run , and take a 96 - 94 lead into the fourth . The Lakers kept a slight edge for most of the fourth quarter , but the Nuggets kept chipping away and managed to reclaim a 112 - 110 lead with 4:24 left in the contest . The Nuggets closed the game on a 13 - 6 run , that propelled them to the much - needed win . All five starters scored in double digits for Denver , led by Jamal Murray who finished with 22 points , eight assists , four steals , three rebounds and one block , in 35 minutes . NIkola Jokic and Paul Millsap followed up with 21 points each , while Gary Harris tallied 19 points , five rebounds , five assists and three steals . Will Barton added 13 points , five rebounds , five assists and one steal . The Nuggets shot 51 percent from the field , including 15 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Brook Lopez led the Lakers with 29 points on 12 - of - 18 shooting , in 32 minutes . Julius Randle followed up with 18 points , six rebounds , four assists and one steal , while Kentavious Caldwell-Pope added 17 points , nine rebounds , one assist and one steal . The Lakers shot 50 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 34 from long range . The Lakers ( 29 - 36 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Cavaliers on Sunday . The Nuggets ( 36 - 30 ) play host to the Kings on Sunday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting Detroit Pistons , 120 - 113 , at Pepsi_Center on Thursday evening . The first quarter was full of action as they teams traded buckets , until the Nuggets emerged with a 33 - 29 lead heading into the second . They applied more pressure in the second quarter and outscored the Pistons 32 - 22 , to take a 65 - 51 lead by halftime . The Nuggets stayed in control through the third quarter , where they matched the 33 points scored by the Pistons . The Nuggets led by 14 entering the fourth quarter and were able to keep a comfortable cushion the rest of the way , en route to the much - needed win . Jamal Murray was the high - point man for Denver with 26 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting , along with nine rebounds , two steals and one assist , in 32 minutes . Nikola Jokic tallied a triple double with 23 points , 12 rebounds , 10 assists , along with three steals and three blocks , in 37 minutes . Will Barton added 23 points , four rebounds , three assists and two blocks , in 31 minutes off the bench . The Nuggets shot 50 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 28 from long range . Meanwhile , Blake Griffin led the Pistons with 26 points , nine assists , six rebounds and one steal , in 36 minutes .
