The Pistons ( 30 - 38 ) will look to bounce back as they visit Portland to take on the Trail_Blazers on Saturday . The Nuggets ( 38 - 31 ) take on the Grizzlies in Memphis on Saturday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 100 - 96 , at Pepsi_Center on Thursday evening . With the tight playoff race between the two teams coming to a head , it was only fitting that Thursday 's matchup was a back - and - forth thriller . While Minnesota ( 44 - 35 ) opened up a lead in the second quarter thanks to an 80 run , neither team was able to truly establish command of the game . The Nuggets ( 44 - 35 ) began to turn things around in the late third and early fourth quarter , when veteran guard Devin Harris scored eight quick points to jump - start the team 's offense . The game went down to the wire , but the Nuggets were able to earn the win after All-Star power forward Paul Millsap hit two free - throws to put them up by five points with 34 seconds remaining . Harris had 20 points off the bench , providing much - needed life to Denver 's second unit . The Nuggets saw only six other points from their bench , all from big man Mason Plumlee . Sophomore guard Jamal Murray led the team in scoring overall , shooting 8 - of - 16 en route to 22 points . Star center Nikola Jokic flirted with a triple - double , finishing with 16 points , 14 rebounds , and nine assists . The win moved Denver into a tie with Minnesota for eighth in the Western_Conference standings with only three games remaining . The Timberwolves , meanwhile , were led by their own star big man . Karl-Anthony Towns had 26 points on 10 - of - 16 shooting along with 13 rebounds in the narrow loss . Veteran Taj Gibson was also a major factor for the Wolves , scoring 17 points and grabbing six offensive rebounds . Ultimately , though , the Timberwolves had excessive trouble scoring from three - point range . Minnesota went just 6 - of - 24 from beyond the arc in the loss . The team remains without All-Star wing Jimmy Butler ( meniscus ) , and is still making a push for the first Minnesota playoff berth in 13 years . Both teams will travel to Los_Angeles for their next game , with the Timberwolves playing the Lakers on Friday and the Nuggets visiting the Clippers on Saturday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting Portland Trail_Blazers , 88 - 82 , at Pepsi_Center on Monday evening . The Nuggets got out to a good start at home with an early 12 - 3 lead , and went on to outscore the Trail_Blazers 28 - 23 through the first quarter . The Blazers bounced back in the second , as they used a 10 - 4 run to take the lead , 33 - 32 , just four minutes into the quarter . They maintained a slight edge and then closed the quarter with a 60 run , to lead 49 - 42 by halftime . The Trail_Blazers carried the momentum into the third , as they pushed their lead to double digits , just a couple minutes into the quarter . However , the Nuggets rallied back to cut the deficit to just three points heading into the final frame , as they trailed 69 - 66 . The fourth quarter went right down to the wire , as the Nuggets led by two , with 30 seconds left . The Nuggets were able to finish it off at the line , to earn their sixth straight win and keep their playoff hopes alive . Will Barton led the Nuggets with 22 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting , seven rebounds and three assists , in 39 minutes . Nikola Jokic finished with 15 points , 20 rebounds , 11 assists , two steals and one block , in 38 minutes . Jamal Murray and Gary Harris chipped in 12 points each . The Nuggets shot 37 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 27 from long range . Meanwhile , Damian Lillard led the Trail_Blazers with 25 points on 8 - of - 22 shooting , four rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 40 minutes . Jusuf Nurkic tallied 20 points , 19 rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 29 minutes . C.J . McCollum added 16 points , seven rebounds , three assists and two steals . The Trail_Blazers shot 33 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 33 from long range . The Blazers ( 48 - 33 ) play host to the Jazz on Wednesday . The Nuggets ( 46 - 35 ) take on the Timberwolves in Minnesota on Wednesday .

The Indiana Pacers defeated the visiting San_Antonio Spurs , 97 - 94 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Sunday afternoon . The Spurs ( 4 - 2 ) came close to pull a comeback in this one , but fell short in the dying seconds after LaMarcus Aldridge 's mid - range jumper and Patty Mills ' last - second three - pointer both came up short . San_Antonio seemed to be on the verge of mounting a huge comeback after they started the fourth quarter on a 90 run , but Indiana ( 3 - 3 ) fought back and eventually came out on top . A three - pointer from Victor Oladipo with 10 seconds left and two free - throws from Cory Joseph closed the deal for the Pacers as they moved back to .500 with the win , while San_Antonio lost their second straight . Oladipo paced the Pacers ' offense in this one . Aside from scoring a key three late in the fourth quarter , the shooting guard finished the game with 23 points , five assists , and four rebounds . Domantas Sabonis added 22 points ( on 9 - of - 9 from the field ) with 12 rebounds , and Bojan Bogdanovic contributed with 15 points , eight rebounds , and two assists . On the Spurs ' side , Aldridge once again led the way in Kawhi Leonard 's absence with 26 points and eight rebounds , while Pau Gasol looked solid on both ends of the court as he finished with 17 points , seven rebounds , five assists and five blocks . Rudy Gay and Patty Mills each finished with 10 points coming off the bench , but the Spurs ' biggest sin was their shooting as they only converted 40 percent of their attempts from the field .

The Indiana Pacers defeated the Orlando Magic , 121 - 109 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Monday evening . The Pacers ( 12 - 9 ) received a bit of notably good news earlier in the day when they learned that Victor Oladipo would be able to return from a one - game absence due to a knee injury to face his old squad , a team he had already lit up for 29 points , nine rebounds , five assists , seven steals and two blocks on Nov. 20 . Indiana got off to a fast start , building a 33 - 25 lead after one quarter . To their credit , the Magic ( 8 - 13 ) battled back , and they entered the fourth quarter trailing by only an 85 - 84 margin . They even forged an 86 - 85 edge 15 seconds into the final period on an Evan Fournier basket before the home team regained an advantage they 'd would n't relinquish again . The Pacers ultimately prevailed in the fourth quarter , 36 - 25 , to seal the hard - fought win . Although Orlando was able to shoot relatively well , Indiana was that much more effective while draining 53 percent of their 79 attempts , including 58 percent of their 26 three - point shots . Jonathon Simmons drew the start at small forward and led the way with 21 points , three rebounds and one assist . Nikola Vucevic contributed a 16 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and three blocks . Aaron Gordon matched Vucevic 's scoring total and added six boards , two assists , four blocks and one steal . Elfrid Payton tallied 15 points , five assists , three rebounds and one steal . Fournier poured in 12 points overall and complemented them with four assists and a pair of boards . D.J . Augustin scored a bench - leading 11 points , dished out four assists and hauled in one rebound . Oladipo enjoyed another successful game versus his old squad , pacing Indiana with 26 points , six rebounds , five assists , four blocks and two steals . Bojan Bogdanovic supplied 22 points and three rebounds . Domantas Sabonis led the second unit with 19 points , eight rebounds and five assists . Lance Stephenson was productive off the bench as well with 18 points , eight rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block . Myles Turner matched his point total and also posted four rebounds . Darren Collison had a down game with a modest seven points , two rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . The same was true for Thaddeus Young , who shot just 1 - for - 9 on his way to two points . He also had five rebounds , five assists and two steals . The Magic will head back home and await the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Wednesday night , while the Pacers head to the Lone Star State to take on the Houston Rockets on that same evening .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers , 106 - 102 , at BankersLife Fieldhouse on Friday evening . The Pacers ( 15 - 11 ) came from behind and secured a win no one expected them to clinch . The Cavaliers ( 18 - 8 ) were riding a franchise - record 13 - game winning streak , but Indiana ended their streak with a strong performance in the second half . The Cavs had managed to build a 63 - 57 advantage at the half , but the Pacers came from behind and used a stellar third - quarter to gain a three - point lead heading into the final 12 minutes . Cleveland tried hard to recover the lead , but Indiana made some clutch buckets towards the end of the game , and sealed a huge win in front of their own crowd . The biggest star for the Pacers in this game was Victor Oladipo , as the shooting guard once again emerged as a huge scoring threat when the team needed him the most . Oladipo finished the game with 33 points , seven rebounds and five assists , and hit a clutch three - pointer with 1:1 left in the fourth that sealed the deal for Indiana . Myles Turner added 15 points , and Thaddeus Young contributed with 13 points and nine boards . LeBron James led the way for the Cavs , as he came close to a triple - double thanks to his 29 points , 10 rebounds and nine assists . Kevin Love added 20 points with seven rebounds , while J.R. Smith contributed with 15 points . But the Cavs ' bad shooting doomed them in this game , as they only shot 31 percent from three - point range .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Indiana Pacers , 100 - 95 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Wednesday evening . Neither team came into the contest with stellar records , but the game was n't short on star power and intriguing storylines by any stretch . The night marked Paul George 's first regular - season contest in the Hoosier State in an opposing uniform , while Victor Oladipo was also facing off against many of his Oklahoma_City teammates from last season . As it turned out , it was Steven Adams , who 's enjoyed a breakout campaign on the offensive end thus far , who spearheaded the Thunder ( 13 - 14 ) on a night when George and Russell Westbrook went a combined 6 - for - 31 from the field . Adams drained 11 of his 16 shots on the way to a 23 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included one assist . The visitors also definitively erased a 27 - 22 first - quarter deficit with a 29 - point second quarter that helped them forge a 51 - 46 halftime advantage . While the Pacers ( 16 - 12 ) opened the third with an 11 - 2 run , Oklahoma_City was able to battle back and eventually escaped with the hard - fought victory . Alex Abrines drew another start for Andre Roberson ( ankle ) and followed Adams with 14 points , four rebounds , one assist and one steal . George and Carmelo Anthony turned in matching 12 - point tallies , with the former also supplying five assists , two rebounds and three steals , and the latter adding five rebounds , two blocks and one steal . Westbrook mustered a modest 10 points due to his aforementioned shooting struggles but did haul in 17 rebounds , dished out 12 assists and recorded two steals . Jerami Grant led the bench with nine points , six rebounds and three blocks . Oladipo paced Indiana with 19 points , a total he supplemented with six assists , five rebounds and two steals . Bojan Bogdanovic was next with 15 points , four rebounds , three assists and two steals . Darren Collison registered 14 points , three rebounds , three assists and one block . Thaddeus Young generated an 11 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included seven steals , three blocks and one assist . Myles Turner totaled nine points , four rebounds , two assists and three blocks , and Lance Stephenson matched his scoring total while also tallying eight rebounds and two assists . The Thunder 's next stop is in Philadelphia , where they 'll face off with the Sixers on Friday night . Meanwhile , the Pacers remain home to tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Friday evening .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Brooklyn Nets in overtime , 123 - 119 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Saturday . Brooklyn looked like they were going to cruise to an easy win when they led by 16 at the half , but Indiana fought back to capture this comeback win in overtime . In fact , a 39 - 24 third quarter is what got the Pacers back in it , as they outscored the Nets , 12 - 8 , in overtime . In addition , the Pacers never trailed in the final 15 minutes of play . Shooting was key , with the Pacers hitting 52 percent of their shots and the Nets shooting just 43 percent from the field . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Indiana recording seven more assists than the Nets , while committing two less turnovers . The Nets ( 12 - 20 ) were led by Spencer Dinwiddie , as he tallied 26 points and eight assists . DeMarre Carroll amassed 20 points , 13 rebounds and four assists . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson accrued 18 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Caris LeVert led the bench with 14 points , four rebounds and two assists . The Pacers ( 19 - 14 ) got another gem out of Victor Oladipo , as he accumulated 38 points , four rebounds and six assists . Myles Turner totaled 23 points , nine rebounds and six blocks . Darren Collison provided 14 points and nine assists , while Bojan Bogdanovic collected 17 points and six boards . Both teams return to action on Tuesday , with Indiana traveling to play the Detroit Pistons and Brooklyn playing the San_Antonio Spurs on the road as well .

The Indiana Pacers defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 105 - 101 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Wednesday evening . The see - saw battle fittingly came down to the closing seconds , as the two clubs took their respective turns enjoying breakout quarters . The Pacers ( 29 - 23 ) were at their best during the middle periods after falling behind by a modest 25 - 21 margin in the first period . The Grizzlies ( 18 - 32 ) ultimately made a comeback from the nine - point deficit they entered the fourth quarter with , eventually taking the 101 - 100 lead on a Wayne Selden 29 - foot three - point jumper with 1:57 remaining . Their edge was short - lived , however , and Memphis ' inability to convert on multiple shot attempts in the final minute - plus played a pivotal part in their failure to ever reclaim the lead . A Jarrell Martin personal foul with 34 seconds left led to two successful Myles Turner free throws , and after Selden was ejected for a technical foul with a second remaining following a Cory Joseph block of his layup attempt , Bojan Bogdanovic converted all three of his tries from the charity stripe for the final margin of victory . In addition to Selden 's aforementioned miss , Dillon Brooks and Marc Gasol failed to find the net on a combined three shots over the final 1:14 . Selden led the way for the Grizzlies with 24 points , a total he supplemented with four rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Gasol followed with a near double - double of 23 points , nine rebounds , six assists and one steal . Andrew Harrison provided 13 points , six assists and five rebounds . Brooks finished with 12 points , five rebounds , two assists and four steals . Martin and Ivan Rabb generated matching seven - point efforts , with the former also supplying four rebounds and two assists , and the latter registering eight boards and one assist . Bogdanovic paced Indiana with 21 points and added five boards , one assist and three steals . Darren Collison managed 16 points , four assists , three rebounds and three steals . Myles Turner drew the start and generated a 15 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included three blocks and two steals . Victor Oladipo had a modest showing by his standards , tallying 13 points , five assists , three rebounds and two steals . Lance Stephenson collected 13 points of his own to lead the bench and also posted three boards and two assists . Thaddeus Young contributed 10 points , five assists and two steals , while Domantas Sabonis matched his scoring total and complemented it with seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . The Grizzlies remain on the road and in the Midwest , taking on the Detroit Pistons in Motown on Thursday night . The Pacers also pack their bags and pay a Friday evening visit to the Charlotte Hornets .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Indiana Pacers , 111 - 102 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Monday evening . The Wizards ( 31 - 22 ) have somehow managed to continue rolling along despite the absence of John Wall , as they came into the contest with a perfect 40 record since the All-Star point guard went down to a knee injury . Washington was facing an equally surging team in the Pacers ( 30 - 25 ) on Monday , however , so the battle promised to be a hard - fought one . As they 've tended to do recently , the visitors got off to a quick start by building a 28 - 23 first - quarter lead . They 'd expanded their advantage to 58 - 49 by halftime , but a short - handed Indiana squad that was missing their starting backcourt of Darren Collison ( knee ) and Victor Oladipo ( illness ) continued to battle . Ultimately , though , the Wizards were able to pull away in the fourth , never letting the Pacers get closer than eight points . Washington got it done with red - hot shooting and strong rebounding , as they tallied a 55 percent success rate from the field and won the battle on the glass by a 43 - 35 margin . Bradley Beal led the way with 21 points for the Wizards and added three assists and one rebound . Kelly Oubre , Jr. followed with a bench - leading 15 points , a total he supplemented with seven rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Otto Porter , Jr. collected 13 points , three assists and two rebounds . Ian Mahinmi was productive on the second unit with 12 points , seven rebounds , one assist and two steals . Marcin Gortat and Markieff Morris produced matching 11 - point efforts , with the former also supplying nine rebounds and one assist and the latter registering 10 boards and a pair of dimes . Mike Scott poured in 11 of his own while also hauling in four boards and dishing out two assists . Jodie Meeks rounded a 50 - point night for the Washington bench with 10 points and three assists . Bojan Bogdanovic continued a recent offensive tear by leading the Pacers with 29 points . He also posted four rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Joe Young was next with 17 points , two rebounds and one steal in 28 minutes off the bench . Domantas Sabonis accounted for 15 points and added four rebounds and two assists . Lance Stephenson drew the start for Oladipo and contributed 13 points , nine rebounds , six assists and two steals . Cory Joseph was n't as successful while filling in for Collison , totaling seven points , four assists and two rebounds . Both Thaddeus Young ( seven points , seven rebounds , two assists and one steal ) and Myles Turner ( six points , five boards and one block ) turned in underwhelming efforts . The Wizards look to continue their winning ways in a road tilt against the Philadelphia 76ers on Tuesday evening , while the Pacers next face off with the New Orleans Pelicans in the Big Easy on Wednesday night .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the New_York Knicks , 121 - 113 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Sunday evening . The Pacers ( 32 - 25 ) came into the contest looking like the clear - cut favorites on paper , considering both their superior record and the short - handed nature of the Knicks ' ( 23 - 24 ) rotation . Having recently lost Kristaps Porzingis for the season with a torn ACL , New_York was initially expected to also be without center Enes Kanter for a second consecutive game due to recent oral surgery . However , Kanter was subsequently declared as available earlier in the afternoon , affording the visitors some much - needed firepower . It appeared to certainly benefit them early , as New_York forged a 37 - 36 lead after a high - scoring first quarter . However , the hosts began to exert their will in the second , resulting in a 68 - 62 halftime advantage . Both defenses played slightly better coming out of intermission , but the Pacers added another four points to their cushion to head into the final 12 minutes with a 94 - 84 edge . They were able to maintain double - digit distance for the majority of the fourth quarter , with the Knicks ' last hurrah coming when they got within six points at the 1:10 mark following a Frank Ntilikina 27 - foot three - point jumper . Strong shooting and rebounding were both pivotal for the home squad , as they posted a 50 percent success rate from the field - - including 43 percent from three - point range - - while also winning the battle on the glass , 54 - 45 . Kanter and Tim Hardaway , Jr. co - led the Knicks with matching 17 - point efforts . The former also hauled in 11 rebounds and dished out one assist , while the latter provided three assists , one rebound and two steals . Michael Beasley drew the start at power forward and generated a 16 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included three assists . Courtney Lee , Kyle O'Quinn and trade - deadline acquisition Emmanuel Mudiay all posted 14 - point efforts . Lee also registered four assists and one steal , O'Quinn totaled nine rebounds , two assists and three blocks and Mudiay dished out 10 dimes and hauled in a pair of boards . Ntilikina tallied 12 points , three rebounds and one assist . Veteran Jarrett Jack was significantly outpaced and outplayed by both of his young position mates , as he only managed two points and two rebounds in a scant eight minutes of playing time . Victor Oladipo spearheaded the Pacers with 30 points , a total he supplemented with nine assists , eight rebounds , six steals and one block . Bojan Bogdanovic turned in 20 points , three rebounds and two assists . Thaddeus Young produced an 18 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included five assists and one block . Lance Stephenson contributed 15 points , four rebounds , two assists and one steal . Myles Turner collected 13 points , six rebounds and one block . Joe Young delivered 11 points , three rebounds and one assist . Al Jefferson and Domantas Sabonis accounted for matching six - point tallies , with Jefferson also responsible for three rebounds , one assist and two blocks , and Sabonis pulling in 10 boards and recording a trio of dimes . Cory Joseph started at point guard once again for Darren Collison ( knee ) but could only muster two points , six rebounds and four assists over 21 minutes . The Knicks will look to snap what is now a six - game losing streak when they take on the Philadelphia 76ers in a road matchup Monday night , while the Pacers are off until Wednesday evening when they face off with the Brooklyn Nets in the Big Apple .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 112 - 87 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Friday evening . The Pacers ( 38 - 28 ) came into Friday 's contest with a couple of built - in advantages , one which was clearly the futility of their opponent on the road . The Hawks ( 20 - 46 ) had only notched five wins in 31 tries away from Philips_Arena prior to landing in the Hoosier State , and the first quarter of Friday 's game played out exactly like one would expect a matchup between a playoff - caliber team and a unit with no postseason aspirations at this stage of the season would . Indiana jumped out to a 34 - 15 advantage after 12 minutes , and a 53 - 37 halftime lead . Once Indiana expanded their edge by eight additional points courtesy of a 34 - point third period , the game was effectively decided . Although the final score spoke to the extent of their dominance , the home squad particularly exerted their will down low , winning the rebounding battle by a 49 - 35 margin . Tyler Dorsey 's relatively modest 18 points in 25 minutes off the bench , which he supplemented with four rebounds , paced the Hawks . Dennis Schroder mustered 15 points , four assists , one rebound and one steal . Mike Muscala supplied 12 points , five boards , two assists and two steals . John Collins and Dewayne Dedmon generated matching eight - point efforts , with the former adding six rebounds , three assists and one steal , and the latter registering seven boards , one assist , two steals and one block . Kent Bazemore ( four points , three rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block ) and Taurean Prince ( three points , one rebound , one assist and one block ) struggled while draining a combined three of 14 attempts . Bojan Bogdanovic led the way for the Pacers with 21 points , three rebounds , two assists and two steals . Cory Joseph tallied 18 points , seven boards , four assists and two steals . Victor Oladipo connected on an impressive seven of nine attempts on his way to 17 points , a total he complemented with five rebounds , five assists and two steals . Darren Collison made his return from an 11 - game absence following arthroscopic knee surgery and matched Oladipo 's scoring total while leading the second unit . He also dished out five dimes , hauled down two rebounds and recorded one steal . Thaddeus Young managed just four points , two rebounds , one assist and two steals . The Hawks head back home to tangle with the Chicago Bulls on Sunday afternoon , while the Pacers pay a visit to the Boston Celtics on Sunday evening .
The Indiana Pacers defeated Los_Angeles Lakers , 110 - 100 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Monday . The Lakers ( 31 - 39 ) jumped to a quick lead against the Pacers ( 41 - 30 ) , but they could n't maintain what they did during the first half and crumbled in the second half , as Indiana took advantage of that to secure a massive win at home that puts them one step closer to playoff contention . The Lakers built a 37 - 29 lead after the first quarter , but the Pacers showed signs of a potential comeback when they made it a two - point game at halftime ( 59 - 57 ) . Indiana took control of the game with a 35 - 21 third quarter , and the Lakers did n't have enough in them to turn things around in the fourth despite the fact they won the final 12 minutes ( 20 - 18 ) . Indiana closed things out with ease , securing a huge win in front of their own crowd . Myles Turner returned to the starting lineup in this game and did with a great performance , as he finished with 21 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Victor Oladipo added 20 points with four rebounds and three steals . Thaddeus Young had 18 points , nine rebounds , four assists and two blocks . Darren Collison had 15 points and eight assists , while Lance Stephenson added 16 points and five rebounds coming off the bench . Kyle Kuzma led the way for the Lakers with a 27 - point , eight - rebound performance . Robin Lopez had 23 points , eight rebounds , and three assists . Julius Randle chipped in with 21 points , nine boards , and three assists . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope contributed 12 points and seven rebounds , while Lonzo Ball chipped in with just four points ( 1 - 4 FG ) but added eight assists .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Indiana Pacers , 119 - 93 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Tuesday . The Hornets ( 36 - 46 ) were already out of the postseason and the Pacers ( 48 - 34 ) had locked up their seed in the Eastern_Conference , so this game had nothing but pride at stake for both franchises . Charlotte started this game with a chip on their shoulder , however , and quickly jumped to a 37 - 25 lead in the first quarter . Indiana pulled back in the second quarter ( 26 - 30 ) and made things close entering the second half , but the Hornets pulled away and won the final two quarters , 24 - 16 and 32 - 22 , to end the regular season on a strong note . Meanwhile , the Pacers will now enter the playoffs with lots of doubts . Frank Kaminsky was the best player for the Hornets in this game , as he finished with 24 points and seven rebounds while coming off the bench . Malik Monk also thrived as a substitute , as he contributed 17 points on 25 minutes . Kemba Walker and Marvin Williams each finished with 15 points , while Dwight Howard and Nicolas Batum had 14 points . Howard also added 17 rebounds . The Pacers did n't have a good offensive performance , as they only had five players reaching the 10 - point mark but neither scored over 15 points . Darren Collison , Glenn Robinson III and T.J . Leaf all had to lead the way on a Pacers squad that did n't have Victor Oladipo due to rest . Al Jefferson registered 12 points , while Domantas Sabonis came off the bench and finished with 10 points and 10 boards in 16 minutes .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers , 123 - 101 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Saturday evening . The Pelicans ( 3 - 3 ) took control early , finishing off the first quarter with a 35 - 22 lead . The Cavaliers ( 3 - 3 ) managed to close the gap with a solid third quarter , but the Pelicans still held a 89 - 83 lead heading into the fourth . The Cavaliers looked depleted as the Pelicans dominated the final frame , out - scoring the Cavs 34 - 18 , to seal the win . This marks the second straight win for New_Orleans , while Cleveland has now dropped two in a row . The Pelicans were firing on all cylinders , with four players topping 20 points . Anthony Davis was the high - point man , 30 points , along with 14 rebounds , three blocks , two steals and two assists , in 36 minutes . DeMarcus Cousins posted a complimentary 29 points , 12 rebounds , 10 assists and three steals , in 32 minutes . Jrue Holiday tallied 29 points , seven assists and four rebounds , while E'Twaun Moore chipped in 24 points on 10 - of - 13 shooting . Meanwhile , Kevin Love was the high - point man for the Cavaliers , with 26 points and 11 rebounds , in 27 minutes . LeBron James was relatively quiet , with 18 points , eight assists and five rebounds , in 30 minutes of action . The only other player to score in double digits for the Cavs was Dwyane Wade , who finished with 15 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting , in 23 minutes off the bench . The Cavaliers will be right back in action as they play host to the Knicks on Sunday . The Pelicans play host to the Magic on Monday .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 111 - 103 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Saturday . While New_Orleans could n't run away with this game , they were in control for the majority of it . In fact , the Pelicans led for all but five minutes , despite never leading by more than 11 points . Rebounding was the difference in the game , with the Pelicans outrebounding the Clippers , 51 - 37 . The shooting disparity was vast as well , as New_Orleans hit 54 percent of their shots , while holding the Clippers to just 41 percent from the field . The Clippers ( 5 - 7 ) have now lost seven of their last eight games , as they continue to free fall down the standings . Blake Griffin led Los_Angeles , as he accumulated 26 points , four rebounds and six assists , despite going just 9 - of - 26 from the field . Austin Rivers tallied 19 points , three rebounds , two assists and two steals . DeAndre Jordan recorded a 12 - point , 14 - rebound double - double . The Pelicans ( 7 - 6 ) were led by DeMarcus Cousins , as he collected 35 points , 15 rebounds and five assists on 14 - of - 23 shooting . Anthony Davis amassed 25 points , 10 rebounds , five assists , two steals and two blocks . E'Twaun Moore finished with 18 points , as the only other Pelican in double figures . Both teams return to action on Monday , with the Clippers hosting the Philadelphia 76ers and the Pelicans hosting the Atlanta Hawks .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the visiting Atlanta Hawks , 106 - 105 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Monday evening . The Hawks ( 2 - 12 ) started off strong , with a 32 - 23 lead after one quarter . The Pelicans ( 8 - 6 ) tightened things up in the second quarter , but still trailed by five at halftime . The Hawks held strong and managed to hold a two - point lead heading into the final frame . The game came down to the final couple possessions , where the Pelicans nabbed the one - point lead with a few clutch shots . The Hawks had a chance to win it with a final possession , but ended up giving up a turnover with three seconds left in the game . E'Twaun Moore tied his career - high with 24 points on 11 - of - 18 shooting , in 33 minutes . DeMarcus Cousins followed up with 22 points , 16 rebounds , seven assists and three steals , while Anthony Davis added 13 points , 10 rebounds , seven assists and two steals . Darius Miller gave the Pelicans a much - needed boost , with 21 points on 8 - of - 11 shooting , in 21 minutes off the bench . The Pelicans shot 54 percent from the field and assisted on 31 of their 41 field goals . Meanwhile , seven players scored in double digits for the Hawks , led by Kent Bazemore , who finished with 22 points , seven assists , four rebounds and three steals , in 29 minutes . Marco Belinelli chipped in 14 points , while Tyler Cavanaugh added 16 points and six rebounds , in 18 minutes off the bench . Luke Babbitt and John Collins totaled 12 points each . The Hawks shot 45 percent from the field , including 47 percent from long range . The Hawks will look to end a four - game losing streak , as they play host to the Kings on Wednesday . The Pelicans play host to the Raptors on Wednesday .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the host New_Orleans Pelicans , 125 - 116 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Wednesday . Toronto are one of the hottest teams in the league right now , a this marked their fourth win in five games . They really took control in the middle quarters , outscoring the Pelicans , 69 - 52 . The Raptors actually turned a three - point deficit into a 17 - point lead in a 10 - minute span between the third ad fourth quarters . Toronto 's offense could n't be stopped , as they shot 59 percent from the field and 47 percent from three - point range . The Raptors ( 9 - 5 ) got a near triple - double out of Kyle Lowry , as he collected 22 points , 11 rebounds and nine assists . DeMar DeRozan led the team in scoring , tallying 25 points , nine rebounds , six assists and two steals on 11 - of - 18 shooting . Jonas Valanciunas amassed 21 points , six rebounds and two assists . C.J . Miles led the bench with 17 points . The Pelicans ( 8 - 7 ) were led by DeMarcus Cousins , who totaled 25 points , nine rebounds , five assists and four steals . Anthony Davis finished with 19 points , five rebounds and three steals . Jrue Holiday accrued 18 points , four rebounds and five assists . Rajon Rondo made his first start of the season and provided four points and eight assists in 14 minutes of action . Both teams return to action on Friday , with New_Orleans traveling to play the Denver Nuggets and Toronto hosting the New_York Knicks .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 120 - 102 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Wednesday evening . The superstar - laden matchup started off as evenly matched as one would assume , given the two teams ' similarly talented lineups . However , after a tightly - contested first quarter that the Pelicans ( 11 - 10 ) emerged from with a narrow 29 - 28 advantage , the balance of power underwent a seismic shift . New_Orleans ' Anthony Davis was ejected with 4:11 remaining in the second quarter after arguing a foul call against him , leaving the home squad without an integral component . The Timberwolves ( 13 - 9 ) were able to take advantage , forging a 62 - 49 halftime lead and outscoring their hosts by a 58 - 53 margin in the second half to garner the comfortable victory . Minnesota shot an impressive 58 percent from the field and won the rebounding battle by a decisive 44 - 28 margin , an advantage that the absence of Davis undoubtedly help create . Andrew Wiggins led the way on the night for the Timberwolves , compiling 28 points on 10 - for - 18 shooting and adding eight rebounds , five assists and one block . Jimmy Butler followed with 19 points , four rebounds , three assists and one steal . Gorgui Dieng matched Butler 's scoring total and supplemented it with six rebounds , five assists and four steals . Tyus Jones drew another start for Jeff Teague ( Achilles ) and was impressive once again , filling out the stat sheet with 16 points , six assists , four rebounds and four steals . Ageless veteran Jamal Crawford poured in 12 points and also supplied three assists and one rebound . Karl-Anthony Towns took more of a back seat than usual on the offensive end with only seven shot attempts , but he still mustered an 11 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included three assists . Taj Gibson managed a 10 - point , 10 - rebound double - double of his own that featured four assists and one steal . Jrue Holiday nearly matched Wiggins basket for basket while leading the Pelicans with 27 points , five assists , one rebound , two steals and one block . Davis was enjoying a successful evening before getting the hook , as he 'd amassed 17 points and five rebounds in just 18 minutes . DeMarcus Cousins matched Davis ' point haul and added 10 rebounds , six assists , one steal and one block . E'Twaun Moore registered just five points , two boards , one assist and one steal , while Rajon Rondo could only provide three points , six assists , one rebound and one steal in 27 minutes . Darius Miller led the bench with 12 points . The Timberwolves continue on the road and face the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Friday night , while the Pelicans visit the Utah Jazz on Friday evening as well .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the host New_Orleans Pelicans , 125 - 115 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Monday . Despite the fact that New_Orleans dominated throughout the first half , Golden_State responded by running away in the second half . In fact , the Pelicans led by 20 at the half and ended up being outscored by 30 in the second half . Golden_State 's offense was key , as they recorded 36 assists , while shooting 52 percent from the field . The Warriors dominated with transition offense as well , winning the fastbreak differential , 35 - 20 . The Warriors ( 19 - 6 ) were led by Stephen Curry , as he collected 31 points , five rebounds and 11 assists . Klay Thompson amassed 22 points and three rebounds . Kevin Durant accumulated 19 points , seven rebounds , five assists and two steals . Draymond Green totaled 19 points , nine rebounds , seven assists , four steals and two blocks . The Pelicans ( 12 - 12 ) played without Anthony Davis ( groin ) , as Jrue Holiday led the team 34 points , six rebounds and four assists . E'Twaun Moore scored a season - high 27 points , while adding six rebounds and two assists . DeMarcus Cousins accrued 19 points , 11 rebounds , seven assists , five steals and three blocks . Rajon Rondo provided 10 points , five rebounds , 11 assists and two steals . On deck for New_Orleans is a home matchup versus the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday . As for Golden_State , they travel to play the Detroit Pistons on Friday .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the hosting New_Orleans Pelicans on overtime , 116 - 109 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Friday evening . The Kings ( 8 - 17 ) seemed to be set to lose a tight contest against the Pelicans ( 13 - 13 ) , but somehow they found a way to come out on top thanks to a huge comeback during the fourth quarter , and a dominant performance during overtime . The game went back and forth during the first 36 minutes and New_Orleans had a five - point advantage heading into the fourth , but Sacramento stormed back to even things up and later secure the win on overtime . The Kings dominated the five extra minutes of action , and their win was never in doubt during the final minutes . Zach Randolph scored a season - high mark of 35 points for the Kings , and also added 13 rebounds and three assists to his name . Rookie point guard De'Aaron Fox finished with 14 points , four assists and two steals , and Buddy Hield made a huge impact of the bench since he contributed with 18 points and seven boards . Sacramento 's bench scored 53 points in total . DeMarcus Cousins had a huge game for the Pelicans , but his efforts were n't enough and he ended on the losing end of this game despite the fact he finished with 38 points , 11 rebounds , four assists , and three steals . Anthony Davis returned to the lineup following a groin problem , and contributed with 18 points and six rebounds across 31 minutes . But the Pelicans ' bench looked awful , as they only scored 16 points as a whole .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the visiting Milwaukee Bucks , 115 - 108 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Wednesday evening . The Pelicans put an end to the Bucks ' three - game winning streak by coming up big down the stretch . The Bucks started out strong and led 37 - 32 after one quarter . The Pelicans responded in the second quarter , where they outscored the Bucks 30 - 26 , however they still trailed by one , 63 - 62 at half time . The Pelicans came out strong again in the third and managed to overtake the lead , holding a two - point advantage heading into the fourth . The Bucks made a run to start the fourth but by midway through the quarter the Pelicans had regained the lead and did not let go from there . DeMarcus Cousins led the way for New_Orleans with 26 points , 13 rebounds , seven assists and one block , in 37 minutes of action . Anthony Davis followed up with 25 points , 10 rebounds , four blocks and two assists , in 36 minutes . E'Twaun Moore was a difference maker with 21 points , five rebounds and four assists , in 35 minutes . The Pelicans shot 56 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 25 from long range . Meanwhile , Giannis Antetokounmpo led the Bucks with 32 points , nine rebounds , five steals , four assists and one block , in 41 minutes of action . Khris Middleton followed up with 15 points , 10 assists and five rebounds , in 36 minutes , while Eric Bledsoe and John Henson added 14 points each . The Bucks shot 46 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 27 from long range . The Bucks ( 15 - 11 ) will look to get back on track as they play host to the Bulls on Friday . The Pelicans ( 15 - 14 ) head to Denver where they will take on the Nuggets Friday .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the visiting Brooklyn Nets , 128 - 113 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Wednesday evening . The Pelicans ( 18 - 16 ) delivered a strong all - around effort as they cruised their way against a struggling Nets ( 12 - 22 ) that never got it going on either end of the court . New_Orleans quickly jumped to an eight - point lead in the first quarter , and by halftime they were up by 23 points . Brooklyn showed some signs of life in the second half , but it was n't enough and the Pelicans ended securing a relatively easy win at home . The passing game was the biggest difference here , as New_Orleans led 40 - 26 in the assist department . Rajon Rondo was the absolute star of the game for the Pelicans . The veteran point guard only scored two points , but registered an NBA-season-high mark of 25 assists as well as seven rebounds in 30 minutes . Anthony Davis was a force to be reckoned with on both ends of the court , as he finished with 33 points , 11 rebounds and six blocks , while DeMarcus Cousins chipped in with 27 points , 14 rebounds , and five assists . Jrue Holiday ( 23 points ) and E'Twaun Moore ( 20 points ) delivered solid offensive performances as well . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson was the only Nets starter that topped the 10 - point mark , as he finished with 15 points , seven rebounds , and four assists . The bench was extremely productive , as they outscored the starters 80 - 33 . Caris LeVert ( 22 points , seven assists , six rebounds ) and Nik Stauskas ( 21 points ) had very good performances within the second unit .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 128 - 120 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Friday evening . The Mavericks ( 12 - 25 ) came into Friday 's game riding a rare two - game winning streak , but their chances of extending it to a season - high three on the road looked rather bleak , considering both quality of opponent and Dallas ' own 3 - 14 record away from American Airlines Center . However , the Mavericks came out seemingly ready to make a statement , as they rattled off 36 points in the first quarter and took it up another notch with a 41 - point haul in the second . That offensive explosion led to a 77 - 60 halftime lead , which was followed by both teams lighting up the scoreboard in the third period . However , defense was the order of the day in the fourth , as both teams scored a modest 19 points apiece . The Pelicans ( 18 - 17 ) got as close as 120 - 117 after a pair of Anthony Davis free throws with 3:7 remaining , but Dallas finished the game with an 8 - 3 run to seal the win . As their final score implied , the Mavericks enjoyed a prolific night from the field , posting a 55 percent success rate , including 56 percent from three - point range . Dennis Smith , Jr. led the way for Dallas with a 21 - point , 10 - rebound , 10 - assist triple - double that also included one steal . Wesley Matthews followed with 18 points , four rebounds , two assists and two steals . Devin Harris led the bench with 17 points , which he supplemented with three rebounds and one assist . Dwight Powell supplied 15 points , three rebounds and one steal . J.J. Barea had a near double - double of 14 points , nine assists , two boards , one steal and one block . Dirk Nowitzki posted a 13 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and one block . Harrison Barnes matched his scoring total and supplied five boards . Davis led the way for the Pelicans with 33 points , five rebounds , two assists and two steals . DeMarcus Cousins posted a 32 - point , 20 - rebound double - double that also included eight assists , five blocks and two steals . Jrue Holiday poured in 23 points and added three assists , two rebounds and one block . E'Twaun Moore registered 16 points , three assists , one rebound and a steal . Rajon Rondo could n't quite follow up the explosive 25 - assist effort he 'd generated in his last game , tallying six points , eight assists , two rebounds and three steals . The Mavericks next visit the Oklahoma_City Thunder for a New Year 's Eve battle on Sunday night , while the Pelicans remain home to tangle with the New_York Knicks on Saturday evening .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the visiting Portland Trail_Blazers , 119 - 113 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Friday evening . The Trail_Blazers got out to a good start , with a 19 - 11 lead halfway through the first . However , the Pelicans turned it up and rallied to take a 31 - 25 lead by the end of one . The teams fought hard through the second quarter , where the Blazers were able to make up some ground and bring it to a tie game , at 61 by halftime . The third quarter was much like the first , with the Blazers getting out to a bit of a lead , before the Pelicans turned the tables , taking a two - point lead into the final frame . New_Orleans managed to maintain a one , or two possession lead the rest of the way , and pulled away in the last minutes , to seal the win . Anthony Davis led the Pelicans with 36 points , nine rebounds , two assists and two blocks , in 40 minutes . DeMarcus Cousins followed up with 24 points , 19 rebounds , eight assists and two blocks , in 36 minutes . Jrue Holiday added 25 points , six assists , five rebounds and four steals , in 36 minutes . The Pelicans shot 55 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 19 from long range . Meanwhile , Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum tallied 23 points each , while Al-Farouq Aminu finished with 19 points , 11 rebounds and three steals . Jusuf Nurkic added 19 points , five rebounds , three blocks , two assists and one steal . The Trail_Blazers shot 45 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 42 from long range . The Trail_Blazers ( 22 - 20 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Timberwolves in Minnesota on Sunday . The Pelicans ( 21 - 20 ) take on the Knicks in New_York on Sunday .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 111 - 104 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Saturday night . The Pelicans ( 24 - 21 ) and Anthony Davis appeared set to run away with things early , as they jumped out to a 34 - 18 lead after just one quarter , and the Grizzlies ( 16 - 29 ) still found themselves trailing by a 59 - 44 margin at halftime . A prolific third quarter in which they racked up 37 points left them down by just 83 - 81 heading into the final 12 minutes , but they were never able to quite catch up to their hosts . The final nail in the coffin might well have been DeMarcus Cousins ' 26 - foot three - point jumper with 3:41 remaining , a bucket that opened up New_Orleans ' lead to 106 - 99 . They then held Memphis scoreless for the ensuing 2:9 , and they finished on a 5 - 2 run following a Wayne Selden three - pointer at that point . As the final score implied , both teams shot well , with the Pelicans edging the Grizzlies in that department 50 percent to 45 percent . Selden led the Grizzlies with 31 points in 27 minutes off the bench , a total he supplemented with two boards and two assists . Marc Gasol was a distant second with 16 points , seven assists and five rebounds . Tyreke Evans produced 12 points , six assists and four rebounds . Jarell Martin tallied 11 points , four boards , two assists and one block . Ben McLemore and Dillon Brooks pitched in with matching 10 - point efforts , with the former adding one assist and the latter providing five boards , three assists and one steal . JaMychal Green mustered a modest eight points but also hauled in 16 boards and recorded one steal . Jrue Holiday paced the Pelicans with 27 points , which he complemented with eight assists , five rebounds , one steal and one block . DeMarcus Cousins posted a 24 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included five assists , two steals and one block . Davis registered 21 points , 12 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Darius Miller led the bench with 12 points and added six rebounds , one steal and one block . E'Twaun Moore ( nine points , three rebounds , two assists ) and Rajon Rondo ( seven points , five assists , four rebounds and one steal ) had relatively underwhelming nights . The Grizzlies head back home and await a visit from the Philadelphia 76ers on Monday night , while the Pelicans remain home to tangle with the Chicago Bulls on Monday evening as well .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the visiting Houston Rockets , 115 - 113 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Friday evening . The Pelicans got out to a good start at home , with an early 14 - 9 lead , but the Rockets battled back to take a one - point , 30 - 29 , lead heading into the second quarter . The Pelicans picked up the pace in the second , and took a 10 - point lead but five minutes left in the half . They continued to the pressure and pushed their lead to 66 - 53 by halftime . The Pelicans carried the momentum into the third , where they pushed their lead to 20 , with 6:50 left in the quarter , however , the Rockets were able to avoid catastrophe by fighting back and cutting the lead to 10 , heading into the final frame . The Rockets continued to rally back and finally managed to tie it up at 104 , with 2:34 left in the game . The Pelicans quickly regained the lead and managed to hold on to a slight edge for the final minutes , en route to their fourth straight win . However , in the process , DeMarcus Cousins suffered a torn Achilles , which will keep him out for the remainder of the season . Anthony Davis led New_Orleans with 27 points on 10 - of - 22 shooting , in 37 minutes of action . Jrue Holiday followed up with 21 points on 8 - of - 12 shooting , in 37 minutes , while DeMarcus Cousins tallied a triple double with 15 points , 13 rebounds and 11 assists , in 29 minutes . The Pelicans shot 54 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 27 from long range . Meanwhile , Chris Paul led the Rockets with 38 points on 11 - of - 19 shooting , in 33 minutes . James Harden followed up with 23 points , 11 assists , five rebounds , two steals , and a block , in 33 minutes , while Eric Gordon poured in 27 points on 10 - of - 15 shooting , off the bench . The Rockets shot 46 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 36 from long range . The Rockets ( 34 - 13 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Suns on Sunday . The Pelicans ( 27 - 21 ) play host to the Clippers on Sunday .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the host New_Orleans Pelicans , 112 - 103 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Sunday . This was a true tale of two halves , as Los_Angeles overcame a big halftime deficit to prevail with a win . In fact , New_Orleans led by 21 at times in the second quarter , as they led by 11 heading into the half . The Clippers then responded with a 61 - 41 second half , as Los_Angeles held the lead for the entirety of the fourth quarter . Despite an extremely close stat sheet , the biggest difference was the assist - to - turnover ratio . In fact , Los_Angeles recorded six more assists than New_Orleans while committing three fewer turnovers . That was evident with the Clippers taking 96 total shots while the Clippers took just 85 field goal attempts . The Clippers ( 25 - 24 ) got a gem out of Blake Griffin , as he tallied 27 points , 12 rebounds and seven assists . DeAndre Jordan amassed 12 points and 19 rebounds . Tyrone Wallace accrued 19 points , six rebounds and six assists . Lou Williams led the bench with 22 points , four rebounds , six assists and two steals . The Pelicans ( 27 - 22 ) were led by Anthony Davis , as he tallied 25 points , 17 rebounds , six assists and two steals . Jrue Holiday accumulated 20 points . nine rebounds , seven assists and three blocks . E'Twaun Moore was the final Pelican in double figures , as he totaled 18 points and two rebounds . Both teams return to action on Tuesday , with New_Orleans hosting the Sacremento Kings and Los_Angeles welcoming the Portland Trail_Blazers to Staples_Center .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the visiting Miami Heat , 124 - 123 , in overtime , at Smoothie_King_Center on Friday evening . The Heat got out to a great start on the road with a 10 - 2 run just two minutes into the game , and held on to a 27 - 22 lead heading into the second . The teams went back and forth through a high scoring second quarter , where the Pelicans outscored the Heat , 35 - 32 , to cut the deficit to two by halftime . The Heat managed to stay a couple steps ahead through a hard - fought third quarter and took an 89 - 84 lead into the fourth . The Pelicans came back to tie it up at 92 just four minutes into the fourth quarter . It remained a one or two possession game the rest of the way , with the Pelicans holding a two - point lead with 17 seconds left . However , Goran Dragic came up with a huge rebound and put - back shot to tie it up at 108 with 14 seconds left , which would send the game to overtime . The overtime period was more back and forth action , with the teams staying within one possession of each other . The Heat held a one - point advantage with 21 seconds left thanks to a jumper by Dwyane Wade . However , the Pelicans got the last laugh as Jrue Holiday knocked down the game - winning floater with seven seconds left . Anthony Davis led the way for New_Orleans with 45 points on 17 - of - 34 shooting , 17 rebounds , five steals , five blocks and two assists . Jrue Holiday followed up with 29 points , nine assists , seven rebounds and a steal , while Ian Clark chipped in 21 points off the bench . The Pelicans shot 44 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Goran Dragic led the Heat with 30 points , nine rebounds and eight assists . Hassan Whiteside tallied 19 points and 16 rebounds , while Tyler Johnson chipped in 15 points . The Heat shot 47 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 19 from long range . The Heat ( 30 - 29 ) will be right back in action as they play host to the Grizzlies on Saturday . The Pelicans ( 32 - 26 ) take on the Bucks in Milwaukee on Sunday .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Phoenix Suns , 125 - 116 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Monday . The Pelicans ( 34 - 26 ) and the Suns ( 18 - 44 ) engaged in quite a battle that ended with New_Orleans winning its sixth straight game , while Phoenix dropped its 10th straight contest . New_Orleans had to come from behind in this one , however , as Phoenix quickly jumped to a 36 - 26 point lead in the first quarter and reached half time up by seven . The Pelicans answered back with a huge fourth quarter , however , and a 38 - 24 third - period performance put them up by seven heading into the fourth . Phoenix tried to comeback , but New_Orleans sealed the deal and ended winning a tough game that could end up being decisive for the team 's playoff chances . Anthony Davis led the way for the Pelicans with a monster stat line : 53 points , 17 rebounds , five blocks , and three assists in only 38 minutes . Jrue Holiday contributed 20 points and seven assists , while Emeka Okafor had 14 points and four rebounds in just 19 minutes . Rajon Rondo finished with six points and five rebounds but dished out 12 assists . Nikola Mirotic added 10 points and eight boards off the bench . Devin Booker had quite a game as well for the Suns , as the talented shooting guard finished with 40 points , 10 rebounds and seven assists . T.J. Warren had 23 points and six rebounds , while Elfrid Payton had 16 points , seven boards , five assists and two steals . Josh Jackson chipped in with a 20 - point performance coming off the bench .

The Mavericks got out to a good start on the road , as they led late in the first quarter and held on to take a 30 - 29 lead into the second . They pushed their lead to double digits early in the second , but the Pelicans rallied back to tie it up at 49 with just under four minutes left in the half . The Pelicans kept the pressure on and managed to grab a 54 - 52 lead by halftime . Things stayed tight through the third quarter , while the Mavericks outscored the Pelicans , 28 - 26 , to tie it up at 80 heading into the final frame . The Pelicans took control early in the fourth and carried on to make it decisive in the last few minutes , as they earned their second straight win . Anthony Davis led New_Orleans with 37 points , eight rebounds , two assists and two blocks , in 35 minutes . Rajon Rondo had a great game , as he tallied 19 points , 14 assists , nine rebounds and three steals , in 30 minutes . The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Indiana Pacers , 96 - 92 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Wednesday . This was a rescheduled game from a February 7 matchup in which the game got called off due to a leakage issue , as both of these teams left it all on the floor in this crucial matchup . In fact , neither team ever led by more than six points , as there were nine ties and 17 lead changes in total . The difference for New_Orleans was their transition offense , with the Pelicans outscoring the Pacers , 26 - 15 , in fastbreak points . New_Orleans ended up shooting 43 percent from the field while holding Indiana to just 37 percent shooting . Defensive rebounding was also big , with the Pelicans winning that battle , 40 - 33 . The Pacers ( 41 - 31 ) were led by Victor Oladipo , as he tallied 21 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Myles Turner amassed 13 points , 10 rebounds and two blocks . Thaddeus Young totaled nine points , 10 rebounds , two assists and three steals . The Pelicans ( 42 - 30 ) got another double - double out of Anthony Davis , as he collected 28 points , 13 rebounds and five blocks . E'Twaun Moore accumulated 23 points , three rebounds and two steals . Nikola Mirotic led the bench with 15 points , six rebounds and two blocks . Cheick Diallo also played well off the bench , providing nine points and 10 rebounds . New_Orleans will have to play their third game in three days on Thursday , as they play host to the Los_Angeles Lakers . As for Indiana , they play host to the Los_Angeles Clippers on Friday for their next outing .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the visiting Memphis Grizzlies , 123 - 95 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Wednesday evening . The Pelicans got out to a good start right from the jump , as they rushed out to a 100 lead , and hung on to lead 32 - 23 by the end of the first quarter . The Grizzlies made a push early in the second , making it a three - point game , but the Pelicans quickly took back the momentum and built a double - digit lead . The Pelicans led for the rest of the quarter and took a 65 - 53 lead into halftime . The Grizzlies came totally undone in the third , as the Pelicans extended their lead to 21 , just four minutes into the quarter . There was not much competition from that point on as the Pelicans cruised to a much - needed win , ending a four - game losing streak . E'Twaun Moore led the Pelicans with 30 points , four assists , three steals , one rebound and one block , in 29 minutes . Anthony Davis tallied 28 points , 12 rebounds , three blocks , two steals and two assists , while Nikola Mirotic added 25 points , seven rebounds and one block . The Pelicans shot 52 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 36 from long range . Meanwhile , MarShon Brooks led Memphis with 25 points , seven assists , four rebounds and two steals , in 36 minutes off the bench . Ivan Rabb added 16 points and seven rebounds , off the bench , while Jarell Martin finished with 15 points , five rebounds and one assist . The Pelicans ( 44 - 34 ) take on the Suns in Phoenix on Friday .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the San_Antonio Spurs 122 - 98 on Wednesday at Smoothie_King_Center It was a complete team effort from the Pelicans ( 48 - 34 ) in Wednesday 's regular season finale , with all five starters and six players in total scoring in double figures in the wire - to - wire win . Jrue Holiday topped off a career - best regular season by scoring a game - high 23 points on 11 - of - 15 shooting and dishing out seven assists in 35 minutes . Anthony Davis was n't too far behind with 22 points and 15 rebounds , while Nikola Mirotic nearly matched that double - double with 21 points and 15 rebounds of his own . Rajon Rondo also got in on the double - double action with 19 points and a game - high 14 points . In the end , as shown by the individuals , it was a very efficient offensive night for the Pelicans , as they shot a scorching 59 percent from the field Wednesday . As for the Spurs ( 47 - 35 ) , it was a pretty uninspiring effort , as while six different players managed to score in double figures , nobody scored more than 11 points . LaMarcus Aldridge , Dejounte Murray and Tony Parker each reached 11 points , while Bryn Forbes , Brandon Paul and Kyle Anderson each had 10 . San_Antonio 's low offensive output was simply due to a lackluster shooting performance from the team , as they managed to shoot just 40 percent from the field and managed to commit 17 turnovers . However , even with the loss , the Spurs still sit comfortably in the playoffs as the No . 7 seed . Unfortunately for them , that means they will have to take on the defending champions in Golden State .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the visiting Minnesota Timberwolves , 122 - 101 , at Little Ceasars Arena on Wednesday . This was expected to be quite a battle between two 2 - 2 teams , and it showed right from tip - off . The game was extremely close in the first quarter and the Timberwolves were actually in front , 26 - 23 , after the first 12 minutes . But Detroit ( 3 - 2 ) responded with a 40 - 18 win during the second quarter , and they never looked back . Despite the fact Minnesota ( 2 - 3 ) kept things close in the second half losing 59 - 57 over that span , Detroit did all the damage in the second quarter and moved over .500 with a convincing win in front of their home crowd . The Pistons had huge contributions all across the board in this game . Tobias Harris was the undisputed star of the game for Detroit , as his 34 - point performance matched a career - high for the small forward . However , he was n't alone in Detroit 's impressive offensive output . Avery Bradley added 20 points , Andre Drummond contributed with a double - double of 15 points and 14 rebounds , and Reggie Jackson chipped in with 10 points . A total of six Detroit players scored in double figures , including all five members of the starting lineup . On the other hand , the Timberwolves were missing Jimmy Butler ( illness ) and could not mask the absence of their star forward . Karl-Anthony Towns had 23 points with 10 rebounds and Andrew Wiggins added 21 points of his own , but it was not enough for a Minnesota squad that lost their second consecutive game . They only shot 44 percent from the field , and were out - rebounded , 47 - 37 . That 's usually not a recipe for success .
The host Detroit Pistons defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 105 - 96 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Friday . Milwaukee has now lost four of their last five games , as they ran into a hot Detroit team here . The second quarter was decisive for the Pistons , as they outscored the Bucks , 31 - 22 . No other quarter had a margin of more than two points . Another key for the Pistons was their ability to get to the free - throw line , as they went 23 - of - 28 , while holding Milwaukee to just 8 - of - 9 . The Bucks ( 4 - 5 ) got another gem out of Giannis Antetokounmpo , as he tallied 29 points , four rebounds , three assists and four blocks . Malcolm Brogdon amassed 21 points and 10 assists . Khris Middleton totaled 17 points , seven rebounds and seven assists . The Pistons ( 6 - 3 ) were led by Andre Drummond , who amassed 24 points and 15 rebounds , while going 14 - of - 16 from the free - throw line . Avery Bradley collected 23 points , two rebounds , two assists and three steals . Reggie Jackson totaled nine points , three rebounds and eight assists . Detroit 's next game will be on Saturday , as they host the Sacramento Kings . Milwaukee is off until Tuesday , when they travel to play the Cleveland Cavaliers .

The Pistons ( 8 - 3 ) fell behind early , as the Pacers ( 5 - 7 ) put together an impressive 30 - point first quarter . However , the light went on for the home squad after that point , as they came back with a second - quarter surge that led to a 59 - 52 halftime advantage . Detroit never looked back , holding serve in the third quarter before pulling away in the final 12 minutes . The Pistons gained a considerable advantage on the glass , as they outrebounded Indiana by a 50 - 38 margin . Andre Drummond was responsible for a significant chunk , as he brought down a game - high 21 boards and complemented them with 14 points , four assists and one block . Detroit also had the hot hand all night , shooting 52 percent from the field , including 44 percent from three - point range . Victor Oladipo led the way for the Pacers with 21 points , a total he supplemented with three rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Avery Bradley mustered 14 points , three rebounds , one steal and one block . Langston Galloway led the reserves with 12 points , a total he supplemented with three boards . The Pacers next head to the Windy City for a Friday night showdown with the Chicago Bulls , while the Pistons remain home to tangle with the Atlanta Hawks on Friday evening as well .

The Heat ( 6 - 7 ) fired back in the second quarter and kept the momentum into the third , where they led 75 - 68 halfway through the quarter . The Pistons bounced back though , using a 21 - 8 run to close the third and take an 83 - 81 lead into the fourth . The Pistons continued to push and reached their biggest lead of the game with about four minutes left in the fourth , from where they cruised to their fifth straight win . Avery Bradley followed up with 24 points , six rebounds , two steals and one assist , in 30 minutes . The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Detroit Pistons , 116 - 88 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Monday night . The Cavaliers ( 10 - 7 ) have progressively been finding their footing after a shockingly inconsistent start , checking into Monday 's contest as winners of four consecutive games . However , even in wins , they 'd often looked vulnerable thus far , particularly on defense . The complete domination they exerted in Monday 's road victory over a quality Pistons ( 11 - 6 ) squad was therefore significantly surprising , as it marked the first time that Cleveland truly looked like defending Eastern_Conference champions . The visitors ambushed the home squad early , jumping out to a 36 - 23 lead after one quarter and a 73 - 46 halftime advantage . They continued cruising in the third quarter , and only a 26 - point fourth period by the Pistons after the game was out of hand prevented the final score from representing an outright massacre . Kevin Love led the way for the Cavaliers with a 19 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included four assists . Jae Crowder and LeBron James followed with matching 18 - point efforts , with the former also providing five boards and the latter registering eight assists , two rebounds , one steal and one block . Jose Calderon drew the start at point guard and surprised with 14 points , four rebounds , two assists and one steal . Jeff Green led the bench with 11 points , three rebounds and one assist , while Channing Frye pitched in 10 points , two rebounds and two assists . As the final score implied , the Pistons ' starting five did n't enjoy the most productive of nights . Tobias Harris paced them with a modest 11 points , a total he supplemented with five rebounds and three assists . Stanley Johnson managed 10 points , three rebounds and one steal . Reggie Jackson matched Johnson 's point total and added six assists and one rebound . Avery Bradley supplied nine points , three assists and two rebounds . Andre Drummond went for eight points , eight rebounds , three assists and one steal , but he also turned the ball over a game - high six times . Langston Galloway led the second unit with eight points , while Reggie Bullock , Anthony Tolliver , Eric Moreland and Henry Ellenson chipped in a quartet of six - point tallies . The Cavaliers return home to tangle with the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday night , while the Pistons visit the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Friday night .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Phoenix Suns , 131 - 107 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Wednesday evening . The Pistons ( 14 - 6 ) checked into Wednesday 's game riding high after upsetting the Boston Celtics by a 118 - 108 margin on Monday night , and they faced a team in the Suns ( 8 - 15 ) that they matched up very well against , particularly in the frontcourt . There was little doubt as to which team had come to play right from the jump , as Detroit forged a commanding 36 - 19 first - quarter lead that had grown to 69 - 41 by halftime . Even with the home squad mostly putting things on cruise control in the second half , they still managed a comfortable 24 - point win while shooting a blistering 57 percent from the field , including 46 percent from three - point range . The Pistons ' reserves saw plenty of run in the second half with the large lead , as they compiled a combined 51 points . Devin Booker led the way for Phoenix with 22 points , four rebounds and one steal . Rookie Josh Jackson saw 31 minutes off the bench and managed 20 points , seven rebounds , one assist , three steals and one block . Greg Monroe filled out the stat sheet with 14 points , seven rebounds , five assists and two steals . Tyler Ulis turned in 13 points , four assists , two rebounds and one steal . Marquese Chriss poured in 10 points and added four boards , one assist , two steals and one block . T.J. Warren was the one Suns starter not in double digits , supplying only seven points , two rebounds and one block across 23 minutes . Reggie Jackson exploited the Suns ' suspect point guard defense to register a team - leading 23 points , a total he supplemented with five assists , two steals and one rebound . Avery Bradley and Tobias Harris followed with matching 20 - point tallies . The former also posted one assist and two steals , while the latter hauled in seven boards and recorded one assist . Andre Drummond collected 13 points , seven rebounds , seven assists , one steal and one block over 28 minutes . Ish Smith led the bench with 14 points and added six assists , three rebounds and one block . Luke Kennard was productive on the second unit as well , tallying 12 points , six assists , two rebounds and two steals . The Suns next head to Beantown , where they 'll face the Boston Celtics on Saturday afternoon . Despite the fact that there were only three ties in this game , it was a competitive matchup throughout . In fact , there were nine lead changes , as neither team ever led by more than 12 points . The Warriors actually recorded 15 blocks in their win , as the Pistons swatted away just two shots . Golden Stat 's ball movement was pristine as well , outasssiting Detroit , 29 - 20 . The Pistons also killed themselves at the free - throw line , hitting just , 10 - of - 19 . The Warriors ( 21 - 6 ) were led by Kevin Durant , as he collected 36 points , 10 rebounds , seven assists and five blocks . Klay Thompson amassed 21 points , four rebounds and five assists . The Denver Nuggets defeated the Detroit Pistons , 103 - 84 , at Little Ceasars Arena on Tuesday evening . The Pistons ( 14 - 13 ) entered this game with six straight losses and wanted to turn things around at home , but could not accomplish that feat and registered a seventh consecutive loss with another lackluster display . The Nuggets ( 15 - 12 ) dominated the game almost entirely and they never looked back after jumping to an eight - point advantage after the first quarter . Aided by a nine - point lead at the break and an 18 - point advantage after three , Denver closed it out in the fourth despite Detroit 's attempts to turn things around . The lack of confidence is severe on a Detroit team that is yet to win during December . Jamal Murray was the undisputed star of the game for Denver , as the talented guard finished with 28 points , four rebounds , and three assists . Wilson Chandler added 18 points , and Mason Plumlee came out of nowhere to post a strong double - double of 10 points and 13 rebounds . Trey Lyles was quite a scoring threat off the bench , as he ended with 20 points on 7 - for - 7 from the field . Both players carried the Pistons ' offense coming off the bench , as the starters struggled badly . In fact , Reggie Jackson ( 12 points ) was the only starter who reached double digits in this one . In fact , Detroit 's bench outscored the starters 53 - 31 .
