The Detroit Pistons defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 93 - 79 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Saturday night . The Spurs ( 25 - 12 ) had their entire first unit at their disposal Saturday , a development that 's been somewhat of a rarity this season due to injuries and subsequent maintenance programs , especially for Kawhi Leonard . The All-Star forward was not only in action against the Pistons ( 20 - 15 ) , but he ended up logging his highest amount of minutes of the five games he 's played thus far this season . However , his presence was nowhere near enough against a defensive - minded Detroit squad . The home team got off to a hot start with a 24 - 13 lead after one quarter , and they also forged a 30 - 22 advantage over the final 12 minutes to seal the win . The Pistons ultimately limited San_Antonio to a 37 percent success rate from the field , including an especially unsightly 19 percent from three - point range . Moreover , Leonard 's modest 18 - point tally served as the Spurs ' team - high figure . Leonard added three assists , two rebounds and one steal to his aforementioned scoring total . LaMarcus Aldridge turned in a 15 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and two blocks . Bryn Forbes led the bench with 10 points . Pau Gasol mustered eight points , 10 rebounds and one assist . Danny Green poured in six points and added one rebound and one steal . Reggie Bullock led the way for the Pistons with 22 points , which he complemented with one rebound . Luke Kennard followed with a bench - leading 20 points and added one rebound , one assist and three steals . Ish Smith provided 18 points , four assists , three rebounds and one steal . Andre Drummond dominated down low with a 14 - point , 21 - rebound double - double that also included six assists and three steals . Tobias Harris supplied 12 points , six rebounds and five assists . The Spurs are off until Tuesday evening , when they 'll take on the New_York Knicks at Madison_Square_Garden . The Pistons hit the road and travel to South Florida , where they 'll take face off with the Miami Heat on Wednesday evening .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Houston Rockets , 108 - 101 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Saturday evening . The hard - fought contest featured a first half in which both clubs matched each other virtually basket for basket , leading to a slim 58 - 57 halftime advantage for the Rockets ( 27 - 11 ) . However , the third quarter is when the Pistons ( 21 - 17 ) managed to distance themselves , as Detroit racked up 31 points while limiting Houston to a modest 19 . That enabled them to enter the final 12 minutes with a relatively comfortable 88 - 77 advantage , which allowed them to withstand a strong 24 - point period by the visitors . Detroit consistently got it done on the offensive end , as evidenced by a 51 percent success rate from the field , including 48 percent from three - point range . Chris Paul led the way once again for the Rockets , managing a 16 - point , 13 - assist double - double that also included seven rebounds and two steals . Eric Gordon , Trevor Ariza and Gerald Green all followed with 15 - point efforts , with the latter making his contributions from the bench . Gordon also posted seven assists and three rebounds , Ariza provided four boards and one assist and Green added three rebounds to his scoring total . Clint Capela posted a 14 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included two blocks . Tarik Black was productive on the second unit as well with 13 points , six rebounds and one block . Tobias Harris paced the Pistons with 27 points , which he supplemented with eight rebounds , one assist and one steal . Ish Smith managed 17 points , four assists , three rebounds and two steals . Dwight Buycks followed with a bench - leading 16 points and added two rebounds , two assists and one block . Reggie Bullock supplied 14 points , two rebounds and two assists . Avery Bradley registered 12 points , three assists , one rebound and one steal . With Andre Drummond sitting out with a rib contusion , both Boban Marjanovic and Eric Moreland saw extended opportunity . The former contributed 10 points , five rebounds , one assist and two blocks , while the latter totaled eight points , eight boards , four assists , two steals and one block . The Rockets remain in the Midwest and next head to the Windy City , where they 'll face the Bulls on Monday night . The Pistons also hit the road and head down to the Big Easy for a showdown with the New_Orleans Pelicans on Monday evening as well .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the host Detroit Pistons , 101 - 100 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Sunday evening . The Nets got out to a great start on the road and led 30 - 20 after the first quarter . The Pistons rebounded in the second quarter and tightened the gap , but still trailed 53 - 48 at halftime . The Nets kept up the pressure in the third quarter and quickly stretched their lead to double digits . They held on to take a nine - point lead into the fourth . The Pistons made a strong push in the fourth and were able to tie things up at 94 , with 2:16 left in the game . It looked like Detroit would pull off the comeback , as Andre Drummond hit a go - ahead bucket , with 5 seconds left . However , after a timeout , Spencer Dinwiddie maneuvered his way through the lane and hit the game - winner for Brooklyn . Dinwiddie led the Nets with 22 points on 9 - of - 13 shooting , in 30 minutes of action . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson followed up with 21 points , eight rebounds , seven assists and a block , in 30 minutes , while DeMarre Carroll added 16 points , five rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 34 minutes . The Nets shot 46 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Tobias Harris was the high - point man for the Pistons with 20 points on 8 - of - 18 shooting , in 35 minutes . Ish Smith tallied 11 points , three assists and two rebounds , while Andre Drummond finished with seven points , 13 rebounds , four assists and one block . Stanley Johnson played well off the bench , with 18 points and four rebounds , in 26 minutes . The Pistons shot 42 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 29 from long range . The Pistons ( 22 - 23 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Jazz on Wednesday . The Nets ( 18 - 29 ) take on the Thunder in OKC on Tuesday .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Detroit Pistons , 121 - 108 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Saturday afternoon . The Thunder ( 29 - 20 ) came into Saturday 's contest with an underwhelming 10 - 13 record away from Chesapeake_Energy_Arena , but they played as if they were in front of the home crowd right from the opening tip . OKC racked up a whopping 69 points in a prolific first half , and despite their best attempts to keep up , the Pistons ( 22 - 25 ) still found themselves trailing by 12 at intermission . The visitors kept their foot on the gas in the third , despite losing guard Andre Roberson to what now appears to be a season - ending injury to his patellar tendon . Ultimately , even a game - high 27 points in the fourth quarter could n't draw Detroit anywhere near a tie , leading to their 10th home loss of the campaign . The two teams were very close in shooting percentage , with the Thunder 's 48 percent success rate from the field barely edging the Pistons ' 46 percent figure . The turnover battle was a different story , however , as the hosts lost the ball on 16 occasions as compared to a more modest nine on the part of Oklahoma_City . Russell Westbrook led the way for the Thunder with a 31 - point , 13 - assist , 11 - rebound triple - double that also included two steals . Paul George followed with 26 points , three rebounds , two assists and three steals . Carmelo Anthony provided 21 points , five rebounds , one assist and two steals . With the Big Three all enjoying productive offensive afternoons , Steven Adams scaled back his involvement but still managed 13 points , seven rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Roberson tallied five points , five rebounds , one assist and one block in 22 minutes before his injury . Tobias Harris paced the Pistons with 21 points , a total he supplemented with three rebounds , one assist and one steal . Reggie Bullock followed with a bench - leading 16 points and added six rebounds , four assists and one steal . Ish Smith supplied 15 points , nine assists and three rebounds . Boban Marjanovic registered 14 points , eight rebounds , two assists and one steal in just 14 minutes off the bench . Andre Drummond pitched in a 12 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , three blocks and one steal . Luke Kennard poured in 11 points and one rebound . With Detroit dealing with a sizable second - half deficit , their bench saw extended run and totaled 64 points . The Thunder head back home and await a Sunday evening visit from the Philadelphia 76ers , while the Pistons hit the road and visit the Cleveland Cavaliers on Sunday evening as well .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 104 - 102 , at Little Ceasar 's Arena on Thursday . It 's rare to see a game stay within a 10 - point margin for the whole 48 minutes , but that was the case here in this close - fought battle . In fact , there were 13 ties and 21 lead changes in total , as the largest lead for either team was an eight - point margin . While Memphis was more efficient from the free - throw line , the difference in the game was Detroit 's ability to get there . The Pistons ended up going 27 - of - 37 from the free - throw line , while the Grizzlies hit 14 - of - 14 . Detroit also played some great defense , as they held Memphis to 42 percent from the field while recording eight steals . The Grizzlies recorded just three steals and forced only seven turnovers from the Pistons . The Grizzlies ( 18 - 32 ) were led by Marc Gasol , as he accumulated 19 points , 14 rebounds and two assists . Andrew Harrison started and provided 18 points , four rebounds and eight assists . Dillon Brookes amassed 13 points , four rebounds and three assists . Deyonta Davis and JaMycal Green combined for 20 points and 15 rebounds off the bench . The Pistons ( 23 - 26 ) got a gem out of Blake Griffin in his debut , as he collected 24 points , 10 rebounds and five assists . Andre Drummond totaled 14 points , 15 rebounds , three assists and three steals . Ish Smith accrued 12 points , five rebounds , four assists and two steals . Stanley Johnson finished with 14 points , three rebounds and three assists . Detroit will play host to the Miami Heat on Saturday for their next fixture , while Memphis will travel to play the Toronto Raptors on Sunday for their next game .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 104 - 98 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Wednesday evening . The Pistons ( 28 - 29 ) have n't exactly been the picture of consistency this season , but they still came into the contest as fairly solid favorites against a Hawks ( 18 - 41 ) squad that 's struggled to generate any type of extended winning streak , and that was missing its starting backcourt of Dennis Schroder ( back ) and Kent Bazemore ( rest ) . The first half pretty much went according to script , as the home squad established a comfortable 45 - 33 halftime lead . To their credit , Atlanta awoke from their offensive slumber to an extent during intermission , scoring 28 points in the third period . However , in allowing Detroit to compile 37 of their own , they actually saw their deficit grow to a seemingly insurmountable 21 entering the final 12 minutes . The Hawks put their collective nose to the grindstone yet again , though , clawing all the way back to get as close as 100 - 96 with 12 seconds remaining following an Isaiah Taylor and - one . Ish Smith and Stanley Johnson the made good on four subsequent free - throw attempts for the hosts , sealing what became a hard - fought win . Andrew White III was the surprise team leader in scoring for the Hawks with 15 points , and he added two rebounds , one assist and one steal . Taurean Prince generated 14 points , three boards , one assist and one steal . Taylor finished with 13 points , seven assists , one rebound and one steal . John Collins posted an 11 - point , 10 - rebound double - double while drawing the start at power forward . He also recorded two blocks and one steal . Malcolm Delaney matched Collins ' scoring total and also supplied seven assists and three steals . Tyler Dorsey went for nine points , six assists , five rebounds and one steal in his start at shooting guard . Dewayne Dedmon turned in eight points and seven boards . The Pistons had seven players post double digits in the scoring column beginning with Smith , who tallied 22 points along with nine assists , four rebounds and two steals . Reggie Bullock poured in 15 points and also collected three rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Johnson delivered 14 points , five rebounds and two assists . Andre Drummond contributed a 13 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included three blocks . Blake Griffin had a near triple - double with 13 points , 12 rebounds , nine assists and one block . Anthony Tolliver and James Ennis III co - led the bench with matching 11 - point efforts , with the former also posting three boards and two assists and the latter registering three boards and one assist . The Hawks are now off for the All-Star break until Friday , Feb. 23rd , when they 'll take on the Indiana Pacers on the road . The Pistons pick things back up on that same night in a home date versus the Boston Celtics .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Detroit Pistons , 110 - 98 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Friday evening . The Celtics ( 41 - 19 ) had to come from behind to defeat the Pistons ( 28 - 30 ) , as they went down by six in the first quarter but stormed back in the second ; a 38 - 21 pushed Boston in front and they never looked back . Detroit won the third quarter by three , but Boston answered with a three - point lead in the final 12 minutes The game was over after the second quarter , however , as Boston built a 12 - point lead they would never let go . One of the reasons why Boston walked away with the win as comfortably as they did was because they shot better than Detroit , especially from three - point range ( 44 against 30 percent ) . Boston had a balanced effort since six players scored in double figures , but surprisingly the top scorer came from the bench as Daniel Theis finished with 19 points and seven rebounds in just 21 minutes of action . Kyrie Irving had 18 points , six assists and four rebounds , and Jayson Tatum added 15 points . Marcus Morris had 15 points and six rebounds off the bench , and Marcus Smart had 12 points in his return from injury . The entire starting lineup of the Pistons scored in double figures in this game . Ish Smith led the way with 20 points and six assists , while Andre Drummond finished with a double - double of 15 points and 17 rebounds . Blake Griffin had 17 points , but he only shot 5 - of - 19 from the field . Reggie Bullock had 13 points , and Stanley Johnson added 12 points with four boards .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 110 - 87 , at Little Ceasars Arena on Wednesday . The Pistons ( 29 - 32 ) had an impressive performance at home and put an end to their three - game losing streak with a huge performance at home against a Bucks ( 33 - 28 ) team that never got it going . Things were quite square after the first quarter ( 32 - 32 ) , but Detroit pulled away in the second quarter ( 21 - 12 ) and the Bucks never got it back . In fact , Detroit won the remaining two quarters ( 32 - 26 and 25 - 17 , respectively ) so won quite comfortably in front of their own fans . Andre Drummond was the best player for the Pistons , as he finished with 15 points , 16 rebounds and two steals . Reggie Bullock chipped in with 16 points and three assists , and Blake Griffin had eight points , nine rebounds , and seven assists . The bench did most of the heavy lifting , though , as four players had over 10 points . Stanley Johnson ( 19 points ) and Eric Moreland ( 10 points , 12 boards ) stood out . Eric Bledsoe was the best player for the Bucks , as he finished with 19 points , six rebounds and four assists . Khris Middleton had 17 points and Giannis Antetokounmpo added 11 , but both teams struggled overall since they combined for 8 - 23 from the field . The rest of the team struggled overall , and the Bucks paid a steep prize for their problems on offense .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 113 - 106 , in overtime at Little_Caesars_Arena on Friday evening . The Pistons ( 38 - 41 ) came in on a hot streak despite a recent elimination from postseason contention . Meanwhile , the Mavericks ( 25 - 55 ) were on the opposite end of the spectrum , having dropped nine of their previous 11 contests . Nevertheless , in a contest between two teams with nothing to lose , anything can happen . Accordingly , Detroit and Dallas punched and counter - punched throughout the evening , and a game - tying three - point jumper by Johnathan Motley with 11 seconds remaining in regulation ultimately sent the game into overtime . The home squad dominated from the 2:15 mark of the extra period onward , however , going on an 8 - 1 run to seal the hard - fought victory . Motley led the way for the Mavericks with a 26 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and two steals . Harrison Barnes produced 17 points and four rebounds across 31 minutes . Dorian Finney-Smith generated a 15 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and one steal . Dwight Powell delivered 13 points , seven rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Dennis Smith , Jr. took the court despite recent knee issues but only managed seven points on 2 - for - 12 shooting and also provided eight assists , three rebounds and one steal across 31 minutes . Reggie Jackson paced the Pistons with 24 points and seven assists . Andre Drummond compiled a 19 - point , 16 - rebound double - double that also included five assists , two blocks and one steal . Anthony Tolliver poured in 16 points and also registered three rebounds , two assists and one steal . Langston Galloway finished with a bench - leading 15 points and also supplied four rebounds , one assist and one steal . Stanley Johnson went for 11 points , six rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block . Henry Ellenson matched Johnson 's scoring total and added five rebounds . The Mavericks remain on the road and next visit the Philadelphia 76ers on Sunday afternoon , while the Pistons pay a visit to the Memphis Grizzlies on Sunday afternoon , as well .

The Raptors ( 20 ) controlled this one from the start , bursting out to a 36 - 19 lead after the first quarter . DeMar DeRozan and Kyle Lowry did not hit the floor in the fourth quarter . However , the Raptors experienced a bit of a downer as Jonas Valanciunas left the game in the second quarter with a sprained ankle . DeRozan led the way for Toronto with 30 points on 8 - of - 12 shooting , along with three rebounds and three assists , in only 26 minutes . Serge Ibaka was on fire from long range , hitting 5 - of - 9 from deep , on his way 21 points , five rebounds , two assists and two blocks , in 24 minutes . The Toronto Raptors defeated the visiting Chicago Bulls , 119 - 114 , at Air Canada Center on Tuesday evening . The Raptors ( 6 - 4 ) entered the fourth quarter with a comfortable 98 - 81 lead . They started off the final frame well and pushed the lead to as many as 19 . However , the Bulls slowly and steadily chipped away throughout the fourth quarter , amassing a 20 - 9 run that brought it to an eight - point game with just under five minutes left . The Bulls ( 2 - 7 ) closed the deficit to just three points with 18 seconds left but in the end the Raptors were able to hold themselves together to save the win . DeMar DeRozan was the high - point man for Toronto , with 24 points on 9 - of - 18 shooting , in 35 minutes . Jonas Valanciunas tallied a double - double with 21 points and 10 rebounds , in just 24 minutes . Kyle Lowry had a full line , with 17 points , six rebounds and six assists , in 32 minutes . The Raptors shot 54 percent from the floor , including 52 percent from long range . Meanwhile , the Bulls shot 50 percent from the floor but were not as sharp from long range , hitting 37 percent . Bobby Portis gave Chicago a great boost off the bench , as he helped propel their late run , and finished with 21 points , 13 rebounds and four assists , in 24 minutes . Robin Lopez added 20 points , while Justin Holiday chipped in 15 . Lauri Markkanen finished with 12 points , reaching double figures in scoring in all of his first nine NBA games . The Bulls go on to play host to the Pacers on Friday . The Raptors play host to the Pelicans on Thursday .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Washington Wizards , 100 - 91 , at Air_Canada_Centre on Sunday afternoon . The Raptors ( 11 - 5 ) have enjoyed an excellent start to their season , and they 've been especially effective at home . Toronto came into Sunday having won five of their last six , with their only loss during that stretch having come by a single point . They were at it again Sunday against the short - handed Wizards ( 9 - 7 ) , who were missing All-Star point guard John Wall ( knee ) . It certainly was n't easy , however , as the two teams battled to a 28 - 28 deadlock after one quarter . The Raptors had a tight 60 - 55 lead at the half , but DeMar DeRozan ultimately proved to be too much for Washington to handle . The All-Star two - guard went 15 - for - 26 from the field on the way to 33 points , and he added eight rebounds , six assists , two steals and one block . The home team was able to overcome a strong shooting effort from the Wizards , which posted a 58 percent success rate from three - point range . The Raptors ' excellent ball security was also key to the win , as they only turned the ball over on seven occasions . In Wall 's absence , Bradley Beal led the way for the visitors with 27 points , a total he supplemented with four boards and one assist . Otto Porter , Jr. was a distant second with 15 points , six boards and one steal . Marcin Gortat contributed a 12 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included seven assists and one steal . Kelly Oubre , Jr. led the bench with 10 points , two rebounds and one block , while Tim Frazier , drawing the start at point guard in Wall 's stead , pitched in six points , eight rebounds and eight assists . C.J . Miles followed DeRozan with a bench - leading 12 points . Kyle Lowry mustered 10 points , six assists , five rebounds and two steals . Fred VanVleet matched Lowry 's point total off the bench over 24 minutes and also provided five assists and three rebounds . Serge Ibaka overcame a knee injury to post nine points , eight rebounds and one block . Jonas Valanciunas had a quiet afternoon with four points , seven rebounds , one assist and two blocks . The Wizards remain on the road and next land in Milwaukee , where they 'll face the Bucks on Monday night . Meanwhile , the Raptors are off until Wednesday , when they 'll take on the New_York Knicks in the Big Apple .

Despite the fact that it was close throughout the first half with 12 lead changes , the Raptors actually led for the entirety of the second half . Ball movement was a huge factor , with Toronto out - assisting Indiana , 29 - 21 . The biggest difference in the game was scoring in the paint though , with Toronto getting 70 paint points to Indiana 's 44 . The Pacers ( 12 - 11 ) got another gem from Victor Oladipo , as he scored a season - high 36 points on 14 - of - 22 shooting . He also added seven rebounds , six assists , three steals and three blocks to his tally . Myles Turner amassed 17 points and six rebounds . Darren Collison accrued 16 points , five rebounds , six assists and two steals . Thaddeus Young tallied 12 points , seven rebounds and three assists . In fact , the Raptors won all four quarters , as they led by 10 after the first quarter and by 27 after the third quarter . The starters were key , with Toronto 's starting - five outscoring Brooklyn 's starters , 76 - 28 . That was evident in the shooting , with the Raptors hitting 56 percent of their shots , while holding the Nets to under 42 percent shooting . Toronto also recorded 11 more assists than Brooklyn , while committing 15 less turnovers . The Nets ( 11 - 17 ) did n't have a single starter reach double figures in scoring , as Rondae Hollis-Jefferson led them with nine points and four rebounds . In fact , the Raptors led by eight at the end of the first quarter , by 15 at the half and carried a 19 - point lead headed into the fourth quarter . Turnovers really killed Atlanta , as they committed 18 of them , while forcing just 11 from Toronto . The Raptors did a great job of protecting the rim too , recording 15 blocks to the Hawks seven . The Toronto Raptors defeated the visiting Milwaukee Bucks , The Raptors ( 25 - 10 ) and the Bucks ( 19 - 16 ) engaged in a battle that needed five extra minutes to settle , but Toronto in the end came away on top and registered a franchise - record 12th staright win at home . Toronto grabbed the lead 35 - 30 in the first quarter and it seemed they would cruise for the remainder of the game , but Milwaukee had something to say about it , and sent the game to overtime with a huge performance in the fourth quarter . Defense was key for Toronto during OT , however , as they limited Milwaukee to just 13 points , and a pair of clutch free - throws from DeMar DeRozan sealed the deal for the Raptors . DeRozan had a record - setting performance in this game , registering a new franchise - record and a career - high of 52 points to go along with eight assists and five rebounds . Kyle Lowry did not want to be less , and he contributed with 26 points , seven assists , and five rebounds . Serge Ibaka was a force on both ends of the court , finishing with 11 points , eight rebounds , and four blocks including a couple of key defensive stops in the final minutes . Despite the fact that there were three ties and five lead changes in the first five minutes , that 's the only time this game was close . In fact , the Raptors rode a 37 - 18 first quarter lead , as Portland never got the game within single - digits from there . Offensive rebounding was the difference , with the Raptors winning that battle , 17 - 4 . That allowed them to take 99 shots while the Blazers took only 73 shot attempts . Three-point shooting was also decisive , with Toronto hitting 19 - of - 40 and Portland going just 7 - of - 21 . Bench production was also a huge difference , with Toronto outscoring Portland 's bench , 53 - 25 . In fact , Toronto outscored Memphis , 25 - 12 , in the fourth quarter and 31 - 20 in the second quarter . Defense was key for the Raptors , as they recorded 13 steals and seven blocks while winning the turnover differential , 19 - 11 . They also held Memphis to just 36 percent from the field while shooting 46 percent on their end . The Toronto Raptors defeated the New_York Knicks , 113 - 88 , at Air_Canada_Centre on Wednesday evening . The Raptors ( 38 - 16 ) came into this game riding a three - game winning streak and had no problems to extend it four , since the Knicks ( 23 - 33 ) barely posed a threat offensively . The absence of Kristaps Porzingis was something New_York could n't mask , and Toronto controlled the game right from the start . In fact , the Raptors jumped to a 23 - 18 lead after the first quarter and they never looked back , winning each quarter by at least five points on route to a comfortable 25 - point win . The loss extended New_York 's losing streak to five contests . DeMar DeRozan ( eight points , 2 - 11 FG ) and Kyle Lowry ( seven points , 2 - 10 FG ) did n't have good performances , but the bench picked up the slack for the Raptors in this one since five second - unit players scored at least 10 points . The star of the game for Toronto was Jonas Valanciunas , who filled the stat sheet with 18 points , 10 rebounds , two blocks and two steals . Serge Ibaka had 13 points . Pascal Siakam added 14 off the bench . Michael Beasley was New_York 's top scorer with 21 points and seven rebounds . Jarrett Jack had 10 points with five assists , and Trey Burke had 12 points in just 13 minutes off the bench . Luke Kornet added 11 points . Tim Hardaway Jr. struggled , however , and finished with only nine points on 4 - 14 from the field .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Miami Heat , 115 - 112 , at Air_Canada_Centre on Tuesday evening . The Raptors ( 40 - 16 ) came into the game having lost just four times over 27 home outings , so based on that trend alone , they were considered a solid favorite . Additionally , Toronto and the Heat ( 30 - 27 ) have also been trending in decidedly different directions , as the former was riding a five - game winning streak entering Tuesday , while the latter had just snapped a five - game skid in their last contest . As it turned out , none of those numbers mattered in a tightly contested first half that culminated with the home squad sporting a slim 57 - 55 advantage . The hosts then looked to have the game in hand after a 41 - point third quarter that extended their lead to 17 entering the final 12 minutes . However , Miami still had life late , as they mounted a furious 16 - 3 run over the final 4:42 that brought them as close as 114 - 112 with 7 seconds left following a Wayne Ellington three - pointer . Ultimately , C.J . Miles made one of two free throws - - one of the only three points the Raptors managed during that span , with all coming from the charity stripe - - and Josh Richardson 's would - be game - tying trey could n't find the net at the buzzer . The Heat second unit helped lead the fourth - quarter charge and posted a collective 52 points . They also outperformed the Raptors in multiple categories , but Toronto did win the key turnover battle by a 16 - 8 margin . Goran Dragic overcame a tough individual matchup against Kyle Lowry to lead the way for the Heat with a game - high 28 points , which he supplemented with four assists , two rebounds and one steal . James Johnson followed with a bench - leading 16 points and added seven rebounds . Ellington finished with 15 points , seven boards and one assist , with all of his scoring coming from three - pointers . Bam Adebayo supplied 11 points , five boards , three assists and one block . Dwayne Wade managed a 10 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included six assists in his second game back with Miami . Hassan Whiteside accomplished the feat as well with 10 points , 10 boards , one assist , two steals and one block . Richardson accounted for 10 points , five assists , three rebounds , one steal and one block . Tyler Johnson drew the start and mustered a modest seven points , four rebounds , two assists and one steal . DeMar DeRozan paced the Raptors with 27 points , a total he complemented with four assists , two rebounds and one steal . Lowry contributed 22 points , eight assists , four rebounds and two steals . Serge Ibaka generated a 14 - point , 10 - rebound double - double . Miles poured in 11 points to lead the bench , while Fred VanVleet and Delon Wright tallied matching 10 - point efforts . VanVleet also registered six assists , five rebounds and two steals , while Wright had two assists , one rebound , one steal and one block . Jonas Valanciunas totaled six points , 10 rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . The Heat remain on the road and tangle with the Philadelphia 76ers on Wednesday evening , while the Raptors also pack their bags and face off with the Chicago Bulls in the Windy City on Wednesday night as well .

The Bucks ( 33 - 25 ) had a great performance and even though they wasted away an eight - point lead heading into the fourth quarter , they still managed to turn the game around when it mattered the most . The Raptors ( 41 - 17 ) won the fourth quarter by eight points and they built a five - point advantage starting the OT period . But the Bucks scored eight straight points and they never looked back until they clinched a huge win on the road against one of the top teams in the Eastern_Conference . As it has been the trend through most of the season , Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for Milwaukee with 26 points , 12 rebounds and five assists . Eric Bledsoe chipped in with 21 points , eight rebounds and four assists , while Khris Middleton added 21 points , six assists , and four boards . The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Toronto Raptors , 132 - 125 , at Air_Canada_Centre on Sunday . The Thunder ( 43 - 29 ) and the Raptors ( 52 - 18 ) played one of the most intense , thrilling games in the NBA in recent weeks . In the end , the visitors came out on top thanks to a huge comeback in the fourth quarter that propelled them to victory . OKC actually jumped in front after the first quarter ( 40 - 34 ) , but the Raptors won the subsequent two quarters ( 30 - 26 and 34 - 31 ) to make it a one - point game heading into the third quarter , as Toronto was up 98 - 97 . But the Thunder came from behind and after winning the final quarter 35 - 27 , they secured a much - needed win that should boost their confidence for the final part of the season . Russell Westbrook was the best player for the Thunder , as he finished with 37 points , 14 assists and 13 rebounds to notch his fifth consecutive triple - double . Steven Adams contributed 25 points , eight rebounds and four assists , while Paul George added 22 points , five boards , three assists and three steals . Carmelo Anthony had 15 points , and Corey Brewer finished with 10 . DeMar DeRozan led the way for the Raptors with a 24 - point performance , but it was n't enough . Kyle Lowry delivered a double - double of 22 points and 10 assists , while Jonas Valanciunas had 10 points . Delon Wright chipped in with 15 points and eight assists coming off the bench , while substitutes C.J . Miles ( 15 points ) and Pascal Siakam ( 10 ) also scored in double figures .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 107 - 91 , at Toyota_Center on Saturday evening . The Rockets ( 30 ) were able to keep their record unblemished despite once again playing without prize offseason acquisition Chris Paul ( knee ) , who could be out up to a month according to latest reports . His absence has shifted James Harden back to a position he enjoyed great success in last season , point guard . Harden led the way Saturday with 29 points , seven assists , three rebounds and two steals . Meanwhile , Harden 's backcourt mate Eric Gordon , who 's come into the starting lineup as part of the domino effect of Paul 's injury , had another successful outing with 18 points , two assists , and one rebound . Houston also played a strong defensive game , limiting the Mavericks ( 0 - 3 ) to 37 percent shooting . In what is becoming a disturbing trend for Dallas , they were once again outrebounded by an extensive 54 - 41 margin . J.J. Barea led the Mavericks despite not drawing the start , as he posted 19 points , five rebounds and three assists off the bench . Barea had drawn the start on Friday night in place of Dennis Smith , Jr. ( knee ) and played well , but head coach Rick Carlisle had Yogi Ferrell run with the first unit Saturday . Harrison Barnes followed Barea with 14 points , five rebounds , two assists and one steal . Wesley Matthews collected 11 points , four rebounds , two assists and one steal . Ferrell managed eight points , one rebound , one assist and one steal . Dirk Nowitzki mustered a modest two points , five rebounds and one assist . Gian Clavell was also productive off the bench , offering nine points , five rebounds , two assists and one steal . Nene Hilario was next behind Harden and Gordon with 14 points and two rebounds in 10 minutes off the bench . Clint Capela totaled 11 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Trevor Ariza managed eight points , four rebounds , one assist , four steals and one block . Ryan Anderson provided only three points but also brought down 10 rebounds and dished out an assist . Luc Mbah_a_Moute supplied six points , three rebounds and two steals in 24 minutes off the bench . The Mavericks head back home to tangle with the Golden_State Warriors on Monday night , while the Rockets remain home and take on the Memphis Grizzlies on Monday evening as well .

The Rockets ( 15 - 4 ) came from behind in this one , and delivered a great performance in the second half to come out on top against a Knicks ( 10 - 9 ) that just could n't keep up with Houston 's intensity on both ends of the court . But the Rockets flipped the script in the third quarter , and put themselves on top with a 37 - 13 win in the subsequent 12 minutes . The Pacers could n't react in the fourth , and Houston extended their winning streak to six games with another huge performance at home . The Houston Rockets defeated the Miami Heat , 99 - 90 , at Toyota_Center on Monday evening . The Heat ( 27 - 20 ) came into the contest sporting a stellar 9 - 2 record over their previous 11 games , a stretch made even more impressive by the fact that they 've dealt with several key backcourt injuries at different points . However , the Rockets ( 33 - 12 ) came in surging as well , with a 5 - 1 record over their prior six contests despite a recent multi - game absence by James Harden due to a hamstring injury . Houston was the healthier team Monday , however , and that may have been the difference in what turned out to be a hard - fought affair . Miami actually used a 33 - point first quarter to vault to a 50 - 46 halftime lead . The home squad got things turned around in the second half , collecting 53 points while limiting their visitors to 40 over the final 24 minutes . Houston also played some stingy defense , eliciting a total of 16 turnovers and limiting the Heat to an unsightly 23 percent ( 7 - for - 30 ) success rate from long distance . The Rockets ' top backcourt trio of Harden , Chris Paul and Eric Gordon - - finally at full health - - were key , as they combined for 60 of the team 's 99 points . Hassan Whiteside paced the Heat with a 22 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and three steals . Wayne Ellington provided 13 points , five rebounds and two assists . Josh Richardson followed with 12 points , three rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . James Johnson contributed 10 points , four assists and three rebounds . Kelly Olynyk matched Johnson 's scoring total to lead the bench and also supplied two boards , one assist and one steal . Harden led the way for the Rockets with 28 points , a total he supplemented with five assists , two rebounds , two blocks and two steals . Paul followed with 16 points , six rebounds , six assists and three steals . Gordon poured in 16 of his own to lead the second unit and also posted a pair of rebounds and assists apiece . Clint Capela tallied 14 points , eight rebounds , two assists and one steal . Ryan Anderson pitched in nine points , two rebounds and two assists . Trevor Ariza returned from his two - game suspension and played 28 minutes , but he only registered three points , five rebounds and two steals . The Heat heads back to South Florida to await a Thursday night visit from the Sacramento Kings , while the Rockets make the short trip to tangle with the intrastate rival Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday evening .

The Houston Rockets defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 120 - 102 , at Toyota_Center on Friday evening . The Rockets ( 45 - 13 ) were likely itching to get back on the floor following the All-Star break , as they 'd ridden a blistering - hot 10 - game winning streak into the extended layoff . Moreover , with 23 wins in 29 home dates , they were poised to resume play on a positive note , even against a quality opponent like the Timberwolves ( 36 - 26 ) . However , the visitors turned the tables early , establishing a 32 - 26 first - quarter lead . It was all downhill from there , though , as the hosts outscored them 94 - 70 the rest of the way . Despite the double - digit loss , the most worrisome aspect of the night for Minnesota had nothing to do with the scoreboard , as star guard Jimmy Butler appeared to suffer a serious knee injury in a non - contact situation late in the third quarter and had to be helped off the court . The exact severity is still to be determined , but the entire development naturally cast a pall on the proceedings for the Timberwolves . Andrew Wiggins led the way for Minnesota with 21 points , a total he supplemented with four rebounds and two assists . Karl-Anthony Towns generated an 18 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and one block . Jeff Teague matched Towns ' scoring total and added four boards , four assists and two steals . Jamal Crawford produced a bench - leading 14 points and complemented them with three rebounds . Butler supplied 10 points , five rebounds , three assists and one steal in 25 minutes before exiting . Taj Gibson registered a modest nine points , three rebounds , one assist and one block . James Harden paced the Rockets with 31 points , nine assists , two rebounds and two steals . Clint Capela followed with 25 points , 11 rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Chris Paul contributed a near triple - double with 14 points , 10 rebounds , eight assists and one steal . P.J . Tucker delivered 11 points , five boards and one assist . Trevor Ariza returned from his hamstring injury to tally 11 points , five rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Joe Johnson produced a bench - leading 10 points and also turned in three rebounds and one assist . The Timberwolves head back home to face off with the Chicago Bulls on Saturday evening , while the Rockets head a bit further west and tangle with the Denver Nuggets on Sunday night .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Detroit Pistons , 100 - 96 , in overtime at Toyota_Center on Thursday evening . The Rockets ( 58 - 14 ) knew they 'd be tested to an extent coming in , as starting point guard Chris Paul was declared out for the contest earlier in the day with a hamstring injury . However , to an elite squad like Houston , that usually means another top - shelf player needs to step up , especially against a struggling opponent like the Pistons ( 32 - 40 ) . James Harden was highly likely to fit that bill and then some , which is what made Thursday 's final stat sheet all the more surprising - - the home team managed to log a win almost in spite of their MVP , as opposed to because of him . The Beard shot just 4 - for - 20 from the field and missed a potential game - winning floating jump shot at the end of regulation . His struggles extended into the extra period , as he also missed two free throws with 3 seconds remaining . However , the Rockets ' four - point cushion at the time was enough to withstand the misfires . With the Western_Conference pacesetters shooting an abysmal 35 percent overall , there were a plethora of rebounding opportunities for Detroit , leading to a massive 66 - 52 advantage for them on the glass . Blake Griffin led the way for the Pistons with a 21 - point , 10 - rebound , 10 - assist triple - double . Ish Smith followed with a bench - leading 18 points - - a total he supplemented with eight rebounds , three assists and one block . Andre Drummond generated a 17 - point , 20 - rebound double - double that also included one assist , one steal and one block . Reggie Jackson saw a 20 - minute workload , but a 2 - for - 13 effort from the field led to just four points , which he complemented with three rebounds and one steal . Eric Gordon paced the Rockets with 22 points . He added five assists , three rebounds and two steals . Harden clawed his way to 21 points on sheer volume and a 13 - for - 18 showing from the free - throw line . He also supplied eight boards , five assists , two steals and two blocks . Joe Johnson led the bench with 11 points and also tallied three rebounds and two steals . Clint Capela generated a 10 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included three assists . P.J . Tucker matched Capela 's scoring and also hauled in eight rebounds and dished out one assist . Trevor Ariza contributed nine points , five rebounds , two assists and one steal . The Rockets got out to a great start at home , as they used an 18 - 5 run to close the first quarter with a 36 - 17 lead . The Trail_Blazers came out strong in the third quarter and began chipping away . The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the hosting San_Antonio Spurs , 94 - 87 , at AT & T Center on Friday night . The game went down to the wire , as both teams traded leads until the second half , where the Bucks ( 5 - 6 ) held on and secured a much - needed win that snapped their four - game losing streak . San_Antonio ( 7 - 5 ) tried to fight back , but Milwaukee showed enough maturity and poise to seal the deal in a tough environment . The turning point of the game for the Bucks was undoubtedly the third quarter , as Milwaukee were down 47 - 46 at the break but ended the third period up by six thanks to a 30 - 23 scoring run during those 12 minutes . As it has been the case all season long , Giannis Antetokounmpo led the Bucks offensively with a double - double of 28 points and 12 rebounds , but he also added five assists , three blocks , and one steal . Eric Bledsoe chipped in with 13 points in his first start with the franchise after coming on a trade with the Phoenix Suns , and Khris Middleton contributed with 13 points and eight boards . Last but not least , John Henson made an impact on both ends of the court after ending the contest with 10 points , seven rebounds , six assists and two blocks . On the other end , LaMarcus Aldridge led San_Antonio 's offense with a 20 - point , 12 - rebound performance that also included four assists , two blocks , and one steal . Patty Mills chipped in with 14 points and four assists , and Manu Ginobili offered a vintage effort coming off the bench since the Argentinian veteran ended the game with 18 points in only 24 minutes of action .
The San_Antonio Spurs took down the visiting Detroit Pistons , 96 - 93 , at AT & T Center on Monday . San_Antonio ( 16 - 8 ) has won five of its last six games and has thrived on the backs of strong play from its big men . Gasol , meanwhile , added 15 . It was a strong top - down night for the Spurs offense , as seven players scored in double figures . The bench added 34 points in the win , shooting a respectable 12 - of - 26 . Detroit ( 15 - 9 ) has played three games in four nights , and narrowly dropped Monday 's road game . Outside of Jackson , though , the Pistons largely struggled to find offense . Jackson was the only Detroit starter to shoot more than 50 percent from the field , and the team finished having hit only 41 percent of its shots on the night . The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Phoenix Suns , 103 - 89 , at AT & T Center on Friday night . Shortly before tip - off , the Spurs ( 27 - 13 ) announced that LaMarcus Aldridge would get the night off for rest . However his absence was offset by the return of the talented trio of Kawhi Leonard , Tony Parker and Manu Ginobili , who 'd all sat for the same reasons in San_Antonio 's most recent game Wednesday evening . The Suns ( 15 - 26 ) hit the floor ready to do battle , however , as they worked the home squad to a 26 - 26 draw in the first quarter . The Spurs were able to gain some distance in the second period before Phoenix battled back in the third to enter the final 12 minutes trailing by a manageable 80 - 72 deficit . San_Antonio finally drove the nail in the coffin with an 11 - 2 run between the 8:30 and 5:42 mark of the fourth quarter , which extended their lead to a comfortable 97 - 78 margin . The visitors did themselves no favors with poor ball security , as they committed a total of 23 turnovers . Devin Booker led the way for the Suns with 21 points , which he complemented with five rebounds , four assists and one steal . Marquese Chriss posted 12 points , seven rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block . Josh Jackson drew the start for T.J. Warren ( illness ) and produced 11 points , five rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Alex Len and Troy Daniels led the bench with matching 10 - point tallies , with the former adding five boards and the latter supplying three assists , two boards and two steals . Tyson Chandler mustered a modest three points but also hauled in 12 boards . Leonard paced the Spurs with 21 points , three boards , three assists , four steals and three blocks . Ginobili matched Leonard 's scoring total and also registered three assists , one rebound , two steals and one block . Bryn Forbes poured in 16 points and added three rebounds , one assist and three steals . Pau Gasol contributed 15 points and seven rebounds . Davis Bertans supplied 12 points , seven boards , one assist and one block . Parker generated four points , seven assists and two rebounds . The Suns head back home to take on the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Sunday evening , while the Spurs hit the road to tangle with the Portland Trail_Blazers on Sunday night as well .
The San_Antonio Spurs cruised by the Denver Nuggets on Saturday , 112 - 80 , at AT & T Center . It was smooth sailing for the Spurs ( 29 - 15 ) , who enjoyed the return of superstar forward Kawhi Leonard from a shoulder injury . Leonard played 34 minutes in a starting role , scoring 19 points and coming away with five steals . Various injuries have cost Leonard the majority of the season , but he was able to log a season - high in playing time in Saturday 's win . The Spurs as a whole had a tremendous offensive night , shooting 53 percent from the field and knocking down 14 - of - 28 from three - point range . Denver ( 22 - 21 ) , meanwhile , struggled to find offensive production . Only two Nuggets scored more than eight points - Nikola Jokic and Gary Harris . Jokic led the team with 23 points on 9 - of - 13 shooting . He added nine rebounds and five assists . Despite his stellar production , the team shot just 35 percent from the field . The Nuggets went 7 - of - 27 from beyond the arc as well in what was a poor shooting night . The Spurs will visit Atlanta on Monday , while Denver will host the Dallas Mavericks on Tuesday .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the host San_Antonio Spurs , 121 - 116 , at AT & T Center on Wednesday . San_Antonio held the lead for the first 44 minutes of this game , but New_Orleans prevailed when it mattered most . In fact , the Pelicans rode a 34 - 21 fourth quarter to a comeback victory , as the Spurs led by 15 points late in the third quarter . The only real difference in the stat sheet was scoring in the paint , with New_Orleans winning that battle , 68 - 58 . The Pelicans starters also dominated , as they outscored the Spurs starters , 81 - 48 . The Pelicans ( 35 - 26 ) were led by Anthony Davis , as he accumulated 26 points , 15 rebounds and two steals . Jrue Holiday finished with 25 points , four rebounds and three assists . Rajon Rondo accrued 13 points , eight rebounds and 12 assists . Ian Clark was a nice spark off the bench , generating 10 points , four rebounds and four assists . The Spurs ( 36 - 26 ) were unfortunate to lose their leading scorer in this game , as LaMarcus Aldridge departed in the first half due to a right ankle sprain . Dejounte Murray led the way in his absence , as he collected 18 points , nine rebounds and five assists . Patty Mills amassed 11 points , three rebounds and two assists . Rudy Gay led the bench with 19 points , five rebounds , four assists and three blocks . Manu Ginobili also played well off the bench , providing 17 points , two rebounds and three assists . San_Antonio 's next game will be on Saturday when they play host to the Los_Angeles Lakers . As for New_Orleans , they 're off until Sunday when they travel to face the Dallas Mavericks .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Portland Trail_Blazers , 116 - 105 , at AT & T Center on Saturday evening . The first quarter was tight , with the teams exchanging the lead a few times before the Trail_Blazers took a one - points , 33 - 32 , lead heading into the second . The second quarter was more of the same , as the teams exchanged the lead a few times before the Trail_Blazers emerged once again with the slight edge , with a 56 - 54 lead at halftime . However , the Spurs came out strong in the third , where they took the lead and held it for most of the quarter . They outscored the Trail_Blazers , 27 - 21 , in the quarter , to claim an 81 - 77 lead heading into the fourth . The Trail_Blazers tied it up early in the fourth , but the Spurs quickly reclaimed the lead and then pushed their lead to double digits . They maintained a double - digit lead for almost the entire final six minutes of the game , earning the home win and ending a two - game slide . LaMarcus Aldridge led San_Antonio with 28 points on 13 - of - 22 shooting , eight rebounds , four steals and one assist , in 37 minutes . Manu Ginobili and Dejounte Murray tallied 17 points each , while Rudy Gay chipped in 16 points , four rebounds , three assists , and one block . The Spurs shot 56 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 21 from long range . Meanwhile , Damian Lillard led the Trail_Blazers with 33 points on 11 - of - 22 shooting , five assists and three rebounds , in 35 minutes . Evan Turner followed up with 18 points , while Jusuf Nurkic finished with 12 points , 12 rebounds , four assists and three blocks . The Trail_Blazers shot 48 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 28 from long range . The Trail_Blazers ( 48 - 32 ) will look to avoid a fourth straight loss , as they take on the Nuggets in Denver on Monday . The Spurs ( 46 - 34 ) play host to the Kings on Monday .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Sacramento Kings , 98 - 85 , at AT & T Center on Monday evening . The Kings got out to a good start on the road , as they jumped ahead 60 and went on to outscore the Spurs , 25 - 17 , in the first quarter . The Spurs picked up their game in the second quarter but the Kings kept their advantage all the way to halftime , where they led 50 - 43 . The Kings stayed on top to start the third and even held a double - digit lead for most of the quarter . However , the Spurs closed the quarter on a 12 - 6 run that cut the deficit to six , as they trailed , 66 - 60 , heading into the fourth . The Spurs kept up the momentum going in the fourth and took their first lead of the half . The Kings fought back , but the Spurs shut it down over the final five minutes , where they outscored the Kings 16 - 6 , to seal the home win and clinch a playoff spot for the 21st consecutive season . Rudy Gay led the Spurs with 18 points on 5 - of - 9 shooting , six rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block , in 21 minutes off the bench . Manu Ginobili followed up with 17 points on 5 - of - 11 shooting , six rebounds , five assists and one steal , in 27 minutes off the bench . LaMarcus Aldridge tallied 15 points , 14 rebounds , two assists and two blocks , in 32 minutes . The Spurs shot 42 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 27 from long range . Meanwhile , Willie Cauley-Stein led the Kings with 25 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and one block , in 37 minutes . De'Aaron Fox followed up with 21 points , seven assists and four rebounds , in 37 minutes . Buddy Hield added 17 points , in 32 minutes off the bench , while Nigel Hayes added seven points , nine rebounds , one assists and one steal . The Kings shot 41 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 18 from long range . The Kings ( 26 - 55 ) go on to play host to the Rocket on Wednesday . The Spurs ( 47 - 34 ) take on the Pelicans in New_Orleans on Wednesday .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 98 - 92 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Monday . This was a competitive game throughout , as it was within a 10 - point margin for the final 30 minutes . Despite that fact , Brooklyn never relinquished the lead in the second half . The key to victory for the Nets was defense , as they held the Suns to 35 percent from the field and 24 percent from three - point range . Brooklyn 's ability to score in the paint was huge , as they scored 44 paint points to Phoenix 's 30 . The Nets ( 4 - 6 ) were led by D'Angelo Russell , who scored 14 of his 23 points in the fourth quarter . He also added six rebounds , nine assists and two steals on 8 - of - 13 shooting to his line . DeMarre Carroll recorded a double - double , totaling 14 points and 11 rebounds . Allen Crabbe was the only other starter in double figures , as he amassed 15 points and four rebounds . Joe Harris led the bench with 18 points and three rebounds . The Suns ( 4 - 7 ) had just four players score over seven points , as T.J. Warren led the team with 20 points , nine rebounds , two steals and three blocks . Devin Booker accumulated 18 points , two rebounds and two steals . Mike James collected 16 points , three rebounds , two assists and two steals . Alex Len scored just seven points , but provided 14 rebounds and two blocks off the bench . On deck for Phoenix is a home matchup against the Miami Heat on Wednesday . As for Brooklyn , they travel to face the Denver Nuggets on Tuesday for their next game .
The visiting Miami Heat defeated the Phoenix Suns , 126 - 115 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Wednesday night , . The Heat ( 5 - 6 ) grabbed a decent lead in the first quarter , and they would never let it go . After jumping to a 69 - 54 following the first half , Phoenix ( 4 - 8 ) showed signs of potentially turning things around but every time they got closer , Miami pushed them away , and ultimately came away on top after finishing things in the fourth quarter . The win represented Miami 's third victory over their last six games , while the Suns dropped their third straight contest . This means that Phoenix has had at least two three - game losing streaks during the current campaign . The Heat enjoyed a balanced scoring effort this Wednesday , as seven of their eight players that saw the floor contributed with at least 10 points . Goran Dragic led the way with 29 points , nine rebounds and four assists , while Hassan Whiteside added a double - double of 23 points and 10 rebounds . James Johnson produced on both ends of the court coming off the bench ( 15 points , seven rebounds , five assists and two steals ) , and both Wayne Ellington ( 15 points ) and Kelly Olynyk ( 10 points ) added double figures ias well . The one player who did n't reach the 10 - point plateau was Josh Richardson , who only got four points . On the other hand , Devin Booker led the way for the Suns with 30 points although he only made nine of his 23 shots . Mike James had 18 points , and T , J . Warren added 16 . Jared Dudley had a decent effort off the bench as well , finishing the contest with 13 points and six boards .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 118 - 110 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Saturday evening . The Suns ( 5 - 9 ) used a 140 run late in the fourth quarter to steal one from the Timberwolves . The Timberwolves ( 7 - 5 ) held a slight lead for most of the game , but went dry with a four - minute scoring drought , that allowed the Suns to pass them by . After winning five straight , this marks the second loss in a row for Minnesota . T.J. Warren and Devin Booker poured in 35 points each to lead Phoenix in the win . Booker added nine rebounds and six assists , while Warren grabbed six boards of his own . Marquese Chriss added 13 points , seven rebounds , five blocks and two assists , in 26 minutes . No other player scored in double digits for the Suns , but Mike James was solid in 18 minutes off the bench , with nine points , five assists and three rebounds . The Suns shot a blistering 53 percent from the field , including 38 percent from long range . Meanwhile , Andrew Wiggins led the Timberwolves with 27 points on 10 - of - 22 shooting , in 38 minutes . Jimmy Butler followed up with 25 points , seven rebounds , five assists , one block and one steal , in 40 minutes of action . Karl-Anthony Towns notched a double - double with 17 points and 12 rebounds , in 38 minutes . The only other player to scored in double digits for Minnesota was Taj Gibson , who also recorded a double - double , with 16 points and 11 rebounds , in 36 minutes . The Timberwolves shot 40 percent from the field , including only 20 percent from long range . The Timberwolves will move on to face the Jazz in Utah on Monday . The Suns play host to the Lakers on Monday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 142 - 116 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Thursday evening . The Rockets ( 11 - 4 ) took off right out of the gate , scoring 45 points in each of the first two quarters , on their way to a franchise - best 90 - point first half . The 90 - point first half ties the record for the second - most points scored in a half in NBA history . This game marked Chris Paul 's return to the line up for the Rockets , after he missed all but the first game of the season . Paul finished with 11 points , 10 assists , four rebounds and two steals , in just 21 minutes of action . James Harden was the high - point man in the contest , with a ridiculous 48 points , seven assists , two rebounds , two steals and one block , in only 35 minutes . Clint Capela notched a double - double with 12 points and 10 rebounds , while Ryan Anderson poured in 24 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting . The Rockets shot 48 percent from the field and tallied 27 assists . Meanwhile , the Suns ( 5 - 11 ) shot 45 percent from the field , including 33 percent from long range , rebounded competitively , tallied 28 assists and tied the Rockets with 14 turnovers , but fell short as they were out done from three - point range and from the foul line . Greg Monroe logged 26 minutes in his debut for the Suns , and finished with 20 points and 11 rebounds . Devin Booker finished with 18 points and 10 assists , while Josh Jackson chipped in 16 points , in 28 minutes off the bench . Troy Daniels added 23 points , in 26 minutes off the bench . The Suns will be right back in action , as they head straight to L.A. , where they will take on the Lakers on Friday . The Rockets take on the Grizzlies in Memphis on Saturday .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 115 - 91 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Friday . It 's rare to see a home team dominated so thoroughly , but that 's what New_Orleans did to Phoenix here . In fact , the Pelicans led by 12 at the end of the first quarter , while carrying a 30 - point lead into the half . Phoenix actually never got the game within 24 points in the second half . Defense was key for New_Orleans , as they held Phoenix to 39 percent from the field and 10 percent from three - point range . The Pelicans ended up shooting 50 percent , while outassisting the Suns , 29 - 12 . The Pelicans ( 11 - 8 ) were led by Anthony Davis , as he tallied 23 points , and nine rebounds on 9 - of - 12 shooting . DeMarcus Cousins collected 19 points , 10 rebounds , six assists and two steals . Jrue Holiday accrued 18 points , two assists and five steals . The Suns ( 7 - 13 ) got 18 points , two rebounds and three blocks from T.J , Warren to lead the team . Tyson Chandler went 6 - of - 7 from the field to total 14 points and nine rebounds . Devin Booker amassed 13 points and three rebounds , but went 4 - of - 13 from the field , while committing six turnovers . On deck for New_Orleans is a road matchup against the Golden_State Warriors on Saturday . As for Phoenix , they return to action on Sunday in a road matchup versus the Minnesota Timberwolves .
The San_Antonio Spurs narrowly escaped the Phoenix Suns at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Saturday , 104 - 101 . The Spurs ( 19 - 8 ) have now earned two last - second wins in as many nights . On Friday , Manu Ginobili hit a three - point shot with 5 seconds remaining to put the Spurs over the edge against the red - hot Boston Celtics . On Saturday , Bryn Forbes was the hero for San_Antonio , sinking a shot with 21 seconds left on the clock to give San_Antonio its final lead . Forbes was one of five Spurs to score in double figures on Saturday , as the team took a balanced approach on the offensive end . Point guard Patty Mills and big man LaMarcus Aldridge tied for the team - high in scoring , putting up 20 points each . San_Antonio also benefited from a sizable rebounding advantage , as the team pulled down 20 offensive boards on the night . While it had initially been rumored that injured superstar Kawhi Leonard ( quad ) would make his return to the court , Leonard did not appear in Phoenix . The Suns ( 9 - 19 ) , meanwhile , are struggling immensely . The team has dropped eight of its last 11 games , including Saturday 's heart - breaker against San_Antonio . While the Suns are missing star scorer Devin Booker ( groin ) , the team still saw multiple strong scoring performances on Saturday . Undrafted rookie point guard Mike James led the team with 25 points . James , who recently became the first NBA player to graduate from a two - way G-league contract , shot 50 percent from the field and also came away with three steals on the defensive end . Forward T.J. Warren , meanwhile , scored 24 points on 7 - of - 16 shooting . Ball movement proved to be an issue for the team , though . No Sun recorded more than three assists in the game . The Spurs will visit Dallas for a divisional showdown on Tuesday , while the Suns will also take to the road to face Sacramento that night .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 115 - 109 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena . This marked the fourth and final game of a road trip for the Raptors , which they finished with a 3 - 1 record . After falling apart late in their last game , the Raptors came out strong in this one with an early 37 - 31 lead after one quarter . After a tight second quarter , Toronto maintained the six - point advantage at halftime . The Raptors came out strong once again in the third , expanding their lead to 92 - 79 heading into the fourth . Things got interesting in the fourth as the Suns fought to make it a three - point game with just under 30 seconds to go , however the Raptors were able to hit just enough of their free throws down the stretch to hang on . DeMar DeRozan led the Raptors with 37 points on 12 - of - 24 shooting , seven rebounds and four assists , in 36 minutes . Serge Ibaka followed up with 21 points , 13 rebounds , one assist and one block , while Jonas Valanciunas tallied 20 points and 11 rebounds . Kyle Lowry chipped in 12 points , seven assists , two rebounds and one steal . The Raptors shot 43 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 26 from long range . Meanwhile , Troy Daniels was on fire for Phoenix , finishing with 32 points on 11 - of - 16 shooting , in 31 minutes off the bench . Greg Monroe followed up with 17 points , 11 rebounds , two blocks and one steal , while T.J. Warren added 17 points , three rebounds and one assist . The Suns shot 46 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 24 from long range . The Suns ( 9 - 21 ) head to Minnesota to take on the Timberwolves on Saturday . The Raptors ( 18 - 8 ) play host to the Nets on Friday .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the visiting Memphis Grizzlies , 97 - 95 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Thursday evening . The first quarter was a tight one , with the Suns emerging with a one - point , 26 - 25 , lead . The Suns turned it up a notch in the second , outscoring the Grizzlies 34 - 26 , to take a 60 - 51 lead into halftime . The Grizzlies turned the tables in the third quarter , pouring in 30 points to take a two - point lead heading into the fourth . The final quarter was a nail - biter as neither team took more than a two - point lead for the entire way . The score was stuck at 95 - 94 for Memphis for three and a half minutes before the Suns hit a three that would be the game - winner . T.J. Warren led the way for Phoenix , with 27 points on 9 - of - 15 shooting , five rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block , in 33 minutes . Troy Daniels came up big off the bench , with 14 points , including the game - winner . Josh Jackson tallied 13 points and five rebounds , while Greg Monroe finished with eight points , 12 rebounds and seven assists . The Suns shot 41 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 26 from long range . Meanwhile , Tyreke Evans led the Grizzlies , with 23 points , nine rebounds , five assists and one steal , in 34 minutes . Marc Gasol tallied 13 points , 11 rebounds , five assists and three blocks , while JaMychal Green finished with 12 points , 10 rebounds and two assists . The Grizzlies shot 44 percent from the field , including 5 - of - 26 from long range . The Grizzlies ( 9 - 23 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Clippers on Saturday . The Suns ( 12 - 22 ) play host to the Timberwolves on Saturday .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 99 - 97 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Tuesday night . The Suns ( 13 - 23 ) and the Grizzlies ( 10 - 24 ) played a very entertaining game that went down to the wire until the final seconds . Phoenix went up by 10 in the first quarter , but Memphis answered right back to the point that they evened things up 76 - 76 heading into the fourth . The Suns had the lead late , but Jarrell Martin evened things up with less than one second left . It seemed things were headed for overtime , but an alley - oop connection between Tyson Chandler and Dragan Bender in the final seconds pulled the Suns up to an improbable win at home . Devin Booker led the way for the Suns in his return from injury , as the shooting guard finished with 32 points , six assists , and five rebounds . Alex Len contributed with 12 points , six boards , and four assists off the bench . T.J. Warren chipped in with 17 points . Tyreke Evans was the best player for the Grizzlies , as the versatile combo guard once again dazzled thanks to 25 points , five rebounds , and five assists . Marc Gasol contributed on both ends of the court , as he ended with 18 points , six rebounds , and four blocks . James Ennis III added 11 points and five boards with two assists off the bench .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 104 - 103 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Tuesday . Despite the fact that Atlanta led for the majority of this game , Phoenix led when it mattered most . In fact , the Suns led for less than five minutes , as Phoenix ended the game on a 15 - 4 run to escape with a win . The second and fourth quarters were decisive for Phoneix , as they outscored Atlanta , 61 - 44 . The Suns dominated the shooting , hitting 51 percent of their shots , while holding the Hawks to just 41 percent from the field . A 47 - 40 rebounding differential was also imperative for Phoenix , as they also outassisted the Hawks , 24 - 18 . Phoenix also dominated the scoring down low , outscoring Atlanta in the paint , 46 - 34 . The Hawks ( 10 - 27 ) were led by Ersan Ilyasova , as he tallied 21 points and nine rebounds . Kent Bazemore accrued 20 points , three rebounds , four assists and four steals on 7 - of - 8 shooting . Dennis Schroder collected 20 points , two rebounds and five assists . Marco Belinelli led the bench with 16 points . The Suns ( 15 - 24 ) got another gem out of Devin Booker , as he led Phoenix with 34 points , five rebounds , seven assists and three steals . T.J. Warren was n't far behind , totaling 31 points , five rebounds and two assists on 15 - of - 21 shooting . Marquese Chriss amassed 17 points , 11 rebounds , three assists and two steals .

Despite the fact that Oklahoma_City came into this matchup as a sizable favorite , Phoenix had other ideas . In fact , they held their lead for the final three quarters , as they led by at least five points for the entirety of the fourth quarter . Three-point shooting was key , with the Thunder hitting just 8 - of - 27 and the Suns going 17 - of - 39 from long range . Oklahoma_City also killed themselves at the free - throw line , hitting just 12 - of - 21 , while Phoenix went 19 - of - 23 . The Thunder ( 22 - 18 ) were led by Russell Westbrook , as he collected 26 points , 10 rebounds and 11 assists en route to his second - straight triple - double . Paul George accrued 19 points , eight rebounds and five assists . Steven Adams amassed 18 points , five rebounds and three blocks . Carmelo Anthony was the only other OKC player in double figures , as he dropped 14 points . The Suns ( 16 - 26 ) were led by Devin Booker , as he tallied 26 points , two rebounds and four assists . Dragan Bender was huge off the bench , providing 20 points , six rebounds , four assists and three blocks . As for Phonix , they 're off until Friday , when they host the Houston Rockets .

In fact , Indiana led by double - digits for the final three quarters , as they led by at least 20 points for the entirety of the fourth quarter . The shooting disparity was huge , with the Pacers hitting 55 percent of their shots , while holding the Suns to just 41 percent from the field . Three-point shooting was equally as lopsided , with Indiana hitting 11 - of - 23 and Phoenix going just 9 - of - 37 from long range . The nine steals were also huge for Indiana , as Phoenix could only muster up two steals . The Pacers ( 23 - 20 ) were led by Darren Collison , as he tallied 19 points , three rebounds and two assists . Victor Oladipo collected 17 points , five rebounds and four steals .
