The Phoenix Suns took down the Dallas Mavericks , 102 - 88 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Wednesday . While Phoenix ( 18 - 34 ) earned a much - needed quality win , the story of the game was centered around a gruesome lower leg injury to one of the Suns ' players . Play stopped in the second quarter when Phoenix 's Isaiah Canaan hit the floor hard and appeared to break his left ankle . Canaan was eventually helped off the floor and exited the game after only five minutes of play . Though the injury rattled players on both teams , the Suns were still able to come away with a win . They jumped out to a double - digit lead in the first 10 minutes of the game and managed to remain ahead for the remainder of regulation . Rookie forward Josh Jackson continued his strong stretch of recent play , leading the team with 21 points on 9 - of - 14 shooting . Dallas ( 16 - 36 ) is in a tough spot following the loss . The team has now gone just 1 - 8 in its last nine contests . Wednesday 's loss was in part due to poor shooting from the Mavericks . As a whole , the team shot just over 36 percent from the field and went only 14 - of - 26 from the free - throw line . The Mavericks were also led by a rookie , as Dennis Smith , Jr. scored a team - high 17 points in the loss . Phoenix will host the Utah Jazz on Friday , while Dallas will travel to take on The Sacramento Kings on Saturday .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 124 - 116 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Friday evening . The Suns got out to a solid start at home , leading 20 - 13 mid way through the first and held on to take a 37 - 32 lead after one . They kept the momentum through the second quarter , where they expanded their lead to 10 , before settling on a 67 - 60 lead at halftime . The Suns kept up the strong play to start the third , and held a 10 - point lead at the six - minute mark of the quarter . However the Thunder powered their way back into the game with an 18 - 10 run to close the quarter , which cut the deficit to just two , so that they trailed 99 - 97 heading into the final frame . They started the fourth with a quick 50 run to overtake the lead and stayed ahead until around the two - minute mark , where the Suns pulled ahead again , owning a two point advantage with 1:40 to go . That is when Russell Westbrook struck with eight straight points to put the Thunder back on top and solidify the road win . Westbrook led the Thunder with 43 points , 14 rebounds , eight assists , one steal and one block , in 39 minutes . Paul George followed up with 20 points , five rebounds , five assists , two steals and two blocks , while Carmelo Anthony added 14 points , eight rebounds and two assists . The Thunder shot 48 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 34 from long range . Meanwhile , Devin Booker had another huge game for the Suns , with 39 points on 16 - of - 28 shooting , in 38 minutes . Josh Jackson and T.J. Warren added 19 points each , while Elfrid Payton finished with 18 points , 10 rebounds , eight assists , two steals and two blocks . The Suns shot 48 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 25 from long range . The Suns ( 19 - 45 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Hawks in Atlanta on Sunday . The Thunder ( 37 - 27 ) will be right back in action as they take on the Trail_Blazers in Portland on Saturday .
The Detroit Pistons smashed the Phoenix Suns , 115 - 88 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Tuesday evening . It was a wire - to - wire win for the Pistons ( 32 - 39 ) , who are gaining steam with their second straight win . Everything seemed to go right for Detroit on both ends in Tuesday 's win , as the team knocked down 15 three - pointers on the offensive end while playing stifling defense . Phoenix ( 19 - 53 ) was held to just 37 percent shooting from the field . Detroit tallied 12 steals as a team , leading to 19 total turnovers for the Suns on the night . All-Star big man Blake Griffin led the team with a near triple - double in the win . Griffin scored a team - high 26 points to go with nine rebounds and 10 assists . Andre Drummond added 10 rebounds and 10 points , while six players ultimately finished in double digits for the Pistons . Rookie guard Luke Kennard came off the bench for 16 points in 24 minutes of play . Phoenix , meanwhile , was without star shooting guard Devin Booker and struggled to find offense in his absence . Four players scored in double digits for the ailing Suns . Their top scorer was Alex Len , who had 19 points and 12 rebounds . Rookie wing Josh Jackson also had a big impact , scoring 15 points and grabbing 11 rebounds . The Pistons will visit Houston on Thursday , while the Suns will play in Cleveland on Friday night .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Phoenix Suns , 122 - 103 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Friday evening . New_Orleans ( 45 - 34 ) took an early lead , starting the game on a 27 - 10 run in the first nine minutes of game play . The Pelicans earned the win in commanding fashion , knocking down 16 three - pointers en route to 122 points on the night . Anthony Davis scored 33 points to go with 11 rebounds and three blocks in the win . Power forward Nikola Mirotic , meanwhile , added 31 points while grabbing a team - high 16 rebounds on Friday night . Veteran point guard Jrue Holiday scored an additional 22 points , knocking down four three - pointers along the way . The win moved the Pelicans into fifth place in the Western_Conference . Phoenix ( 20 - 60 ) , on the other hand , holds the league 's worst record and is likely to finish the season with the best odds in the 2018 draft lottery . Despite the commanding loss , the Suns saw a number of promising performances on Friday night . Sophomore forward Marquese Chriss led the team with 23 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting . Rookie wing Josh Jackson , meanwhile , added 22 points along with a team - high 11 rebounds . Despite the impressive performances from the young forwards , the team shot only 39 percent on the night . The team struggled to find offense , particularly from deep , shooting just 9 - of - 33 from beyond the arc . Both teams will face the Golden_State Warriors in their next game , with New_Orleans seeing them on Saturday , while Phoenix will host the reigning champions on Sunday .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the visiting New_York Knicks , 105 - 84 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Thursday evening . Russell Westbrook picked up right where he left off last season by notching a triple - double in his first game of the new season . Westbrook led the way as the new - look Thunder ( 10 ) rolled over the New_York Knicks ( 0 - 1 ) . After a tight first quarter , the Thunder pulled away by outscoring the Knicks 52 - 35 over the second and third quarters . The big three of Carmelo Anthony , Paul George and Westbrook combined for 71 points in their first regular season contest together . George was the high - point man with 28 points , while Anthony followed up with 22 points . Westbrook had a line of his own with 21 points , 16 assists and 10 rebounds . Steven Adams was also solid for the Thunder , with 12 points , five rebounds , five steals and three blocks , in 29 minutes . The Thunder shot only 43 percent from the field and 28 percent from long range , but were able to force 25 turnovers to help make up the difference . Meanwhile , the Knicks struggled mightily . Other than Kristaps Porzingis , the team was unimpressive . Porzingis led the way with 31 points and 12 rebounds , while the only other player to score in double digits was Enes Kanter , with 10 . Tim Hardaway Jr. had a really tough time , going 3 - of - 10 from the field in his first regular season game after signing a large contract in the off season . Michael Beasley left the game early in the first quarter after injuring his ankle . The Knicks look ahead to Saturday , when they play host to the Pistons . The Thunder head to Utah for a contest against the Jazz on Saturday .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the visiting Indiana Pacers , 114 - 96 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Wednesday evening . The Thunder capitalized on a poor shooting night from the Pacers by sharing the ball and knocking down a solid percentage of their own attempts . The Pacers hit only 33 percent from the field , while the Thunder were much more consistent , hitting 48 percent of their field goal attempts . Paul George picked up two fouls in the first quarter and was limited to only 19 minutes in the contest against his former team . Russell Westbrook notched his second triple - double of the season , with 28 points , 16 assists and 10 rebounds , in 35 minutes . Carmelo Anthony came up clutch with 28 points and 10 rebounds , in 33 minutes . Steven Adams continued his strong play this season , with 17 points , 11 rebounds , two steals and two blocks in the contest . Meanwhile , Victor Oladipo was the only player for the Pacers that hit ( minimum two attempts ) at least 50 percent from the field . Oladipo was on fire early , almost single - handedly keeping the Pacers in the game and finished with 35 points on 11 - of - 18 shooting . Darren Collison followed up with 18 points , three assists , two rebounds and two steals , in 37 minutes , while Thaddeus Young added 14 points , including 3 - of - 6 shooting from distance . The Pacers will look to bounce back on Sunday , when they play host to the Spurs . The Thunder take on the Timberwolves in Minnesota on Friday .
The host Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 112 - 99 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Sunday evening . For the second straight game , All-Star forward Paul George led the Thunder ( 6 - 7 ) to the victory . George , who scored a team - high 42 points in the Thunder 's recent win over Los Angeles , scored another 37 points to lead the team on Sunday . The veteran All-Star hit seven three - pointers and shot 12 - of - 22 overall on the night in what was arguably his most effective night in a Thunder uniform . George 's strong play helped to make up for the absence of star forward Carmelo Anthony , who missed the game with a back injury . Reigning MVP Russell Westbrook also delivered big numbers , scoring 27 points . However , the point guard continued to struggle from the field , shooting only 6 - of - 18 on the night . Dallas ( 2 - 12 ) owns the unfortunate title of the league 's worst record . Despite a tough battle against the reigning Eastern_Conference champion Cavaliers on Saturday , the Mavericks have dropped two straight games and sit at the bottom of the Western_Conference standings . While the Mavericks have seen few bright spots in the 2017 - 18 campaign , rookie point guard Dennis Smith , Jr. has impressed with his strong play . On Sunday , Smith scored 15 points to go along with five rebounds . Smith was among Dallas 's leading scorers in the game . The team 's leader in the points column , though , was veteran forward Harrison Barnes , who scored 22 to go along with 13 rebounds . Dallas will host the Spurs on Tuesday , while OKC will host the Bulls on Wednesday .
The host Oklahoma_City Thunder took down the Chicago Bulls , 92 - 79 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Wednesday evening . The Thunder ( 7 - 7 ) got off to a slow start this season , but are back to .500 after earning a third straight win against Chicago . Wednesday 's win came in particularly ugly fashion , though , as the Thunder shot only 36 percent from the field in the game and scored over a third of their points at the free - throw line . Russell Westbrook and Carmelo Anthony were the Thunder 's two leading scorers , combining for 39 points and 18 made free - throws . Westbrook , the reigning MVP , went a reassuring 7 - of - 7 at the line after starting out the season uncharacteristically shooting under 60 percent from the stripe . In addition to free - throw shooting , the Thunder were able to secure the easy win with strong rebounding despite overall poor play . OKC held a 48 - 38 advantage on the glass by the game 's end . Chicago ( 2 - 10 ) lived up to its conference - worst record on Wednesday . The Bulls shot a dismal 35 percent from the field and managed to commit a whopping 27 fouls on the night . While rookie stud Lauri Markkanen gave the team a reason to be optimistic with his team - high 16 points , the Bulls still trailed for the entirety of the game despite OKC 's poor shooting . The team struggled to make up for its poor shooting night , finishing with only six offensive rebounds . On Thursday , Chicago will host the Charlotte Hornets , while the Thunder will visit San_Antonio to take on the Spurs .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 90 - 87 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Sunday . Despite the fact that San_Antonio played this game without three of their best players , it came down to the final shot . In fact , there were four led changes in the fourth quarter , as neither team led by more than eight points . Rebounding carried Oklahoma_City , as they outrebounded San_Antonio , 47 - 39 . They also dominated scoring down low as well , as they outscored the Spurs in the paint , 52 - 36 . The lack of starter production really hurt San_Antonio as well , as the Thunder 's starters outscored their starting - five , 66 - 41 . The Spurs had to play this game without Kawhi Leonard , LaMarcus Aldridge and Tony Parker , as they almost pulled out their most impressive win of the season . Dejounte Murray carried the load with all those players out , as he tallied 17 points , 10 rebounds , five assists and three steals . No other starter reached double figures in scoring . David Bertans led the bench with 16 points , four rebounds and five blocks . The Thunder were led by Russell Westbrook . as he collected 22 points , 10 rebounds and 10 assists en route to a triple - double . Steven Adams totaled 19 points , 10 rebounds and three steals . Paul George had a game to forget , as he accumulated eight points , eight rebounds and four assists on 2 - of - 17 shooting , while committing six turnovers . San_Antonio will have to play again on Monday , as they host the Detroit Pistons . As for Oklahoma_City , they play host to the Utah Jazz on Tuesday for their next fixture .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the visiting Utah Jazz , 100 - 94 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Tuesday evening . The Thunder ( 11 - 12 ) came from behind to pull a huge win against the Jazz ( 13 - 12 ) that seemingly came out of nowhere . Utah was leading through most of the game and they entered the final 12 minutes up 80 - 68 . But the Thunder used a massive comeback in the fourth quarter to pull away , including a 30 - 12 scoring run in the final 10:30 minutes of the game . Utah tried to recover , it was too late for them and their own mistakes - most notably on the defensive end of the court - doomed them . Russell Westbrook was the star of the game for the Thunder , as the All-Star point guard once again delivered a triple - double thanks to his 34 points , 13 rebounds , and 13 assists . He was n't alone in the comeback effort , though . Carmelo Anthony and Paul George both came through in the clutch for OKC , and finished with 14 and 21 points , respectively . Steven Adams added 20 points with nine rebounds . Donovan Mitchell was the star of the game for the Jazz , as the talented rookie finished with 31 points , four assists and four steals , although he also committed five turnovers . Joe Ingles added 16 points , while Thabo Sefolosha and Alec Burks both had big games off the bench . Sefolosha finished with 11 points , seven boards and four steals , while Burks added 11 points with five assists .

In fact , Charlotte turned a 66 - 66 tie into an 88 - 68 lead with a 20 - 2 run . Oklahoma_City could n't recover from there , as the Thunder never got within single - digits from there . Shooting was key , with Charlotte hitting 53 percent of their shots , while holding the Thunder to just 41 percent from the field . They also played well on defense , with the Hornets recording eight steals and four blocks . The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Utah Jazz , 107 - 79 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Wednesday . This was as dominating of a victory as you 'll see in the NBA , as it was a wire - to - wire win for the Thunder . In fact , they held a double - digit lead for the entirity of the second half , including at least a 20 - point lead for the whole of the fourth quarter . A lopsided first quarter really set the tone , with Oklahoma_City outscoring Utah , 25 - 9 . Shooting was a huge disparity , with the Thunder hitting 52 percent of their shots , while holding the Jazz to under 36 percent from the field . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , as Oklahoma_City recorded 10 more assists than Utah , while committing five less turnovers . That was evident by the fact that the Thunder recorded a season - high 15 steals as well . The Jazz ( 14 - 18 ) only had one starter in double figures , as Rodney Hood dropped 17 points , while failing to record a rebound or an assist . Alec Burks was their best player , as he provided 14 points , seven rebounds , four assists and two steals off the bench . No other player on the roster had more than 12 points or four assists . The Thunder ( 16 - 15 ) were led by Russell Westbrook , as he collected 24 points , 10 rebounds , seven assists and four steals . Carmelo Anthony accrued 18 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Paul George accrued 18 points , four rebounds , four assists and two steals . On deck for the Thunder is a home matchup versus the Atlanta Hawks on Friday . As for Utah , their next game is at home in a rematch versus Oklahoma_City .

While this was a wire - to - wire win for Oklahoma_City , it was much closer than that would indicate . In fact , Washington turned a 14 - point deficit into just a two - point margin at one point int he third quarter , as they simply could n't grab a lead . Turnovers really killed the Wizards , as they committed 23 turnovers while forcing just 14 from the Thunder . A huge part of that was the 16 steals that Oklahoma_City recorded . Scoring down low was also huge for the Thunder , as they outscored the Wizards in the paint , 60 - 40 . The Oklahoma_City Thunder took down the Philadelphia 76ers , 122 - 112 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Sunday . The win extended OKC 's league - best winning streak to eight games . After a tumultuous first half , the Thunder ( 30 - 20 ) found themselves entering the second half with a one - point deficit . This was partially due to a slow start from reigning MVP Russell Westbrook , who shot just 6 - of - 20 in the first half of the game . Westbrook came back with a vengeance , though , exploding for 23 points and nine assists in the second half . After Philadelphia ( 24 - 22 ) began the fourth quarter on a 10 - 2 run , Westbrook checked back into the game and immediately slammed down an emphatic dunk to shift the momentum . The Thunder were able to establish a double - digit lead by midway through the fourth quarter , and Westbrook finished the game with 37 points , 14 assists , nine rebounds , and only one turnover . The win was not just a product of Westbrook 's play , though . Recently-named All-Star reserve Paul George contributed 31 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting . George , who is having a career year on the defensive end , also came away with four steals . Offensive rebounding also played a huge role in the win , and the obvious difference - maker was the league 's leader on the offensive glass , Steven Adams . Adams alone had 10 offensive boards , as he decidedly won the battle against Philly 's Joel Embiid on the glass . Adams finished the game with 20 points and 13 total rebounds . Despite being one - upped by Adams on the glass , Embiid still led the Sixers with his own double - double . The All-Star center finished the game with 27 points , 10 rebounds , and two blocks . Rookie sensation Ben Simmons , meanwhile , scored 22 points on 10 - of - 14 shooting and dished out seven assists . Still , the team struggled to match Oklahoma_City 's star power . The Sixers were missing the offensive production of J.J. Redick , who sat out with a leg injury . On Monday , the Sixers will travel to Milwaukee to face the Bucks . The Thunder , meanwhile , are scheduled to visit the Washington Wizards on Tuesday .

Nonetheless , the Thunder were able to cruise to the finish , as they maintained a double digit lead through the fourth quarter . This was one of the most competitive games in recent memory , as a season - high 31 lead changes shows just how tight to the vest it was . In addition to that , there were 15 ties , with neither team leading by more than 11 points . The second half was especially competitive , as neither team led by more than five points in the final 24 minutes of action . The Thunder had a chance to tie to the game at the buzzer , but Carmelo Anthony missed missed that opportunity from the right wing . Rebounding was a huge factor for Minnesota in their win , as they outrebounded Oklahoma_City , 44 - 35 . The benches did very little , as the 13 combined bench players scored just 33 points between them . Two of the most promising young teams in the league squared off on Tuesday , with the Philadelphia 76ers earning a 118 - 112 win over the Minnesota Timberwolves in a thrilling overtime period at Target_Center . Philadelphia ( 14 - 13 ) snapped its four - game losing streak on Tuesday in exciting fashion . The Sixers kept it close against the host Timberwolves throughout , ultimately taking the game in overtime . Throughout the win , Philly 's offensive approach was characterized by aggressively drawing contact . The team took 32 free - throws on the night , including 23 between starters Joel Embiid and J.J. Redick . The duo capitalized on those attempts , shooting a near - perfect 22 - of - 23 from the line . Embiid dominated throughout the game , finishing with a team - high 28 points and 12 rebounds , as well as eight assists . He made the most of the matchup with Minnesota star Karl-Anthony Towns , holding the opposing big man to just 6 - of - 16 shooting from the field . Redick also excelled throughout the game , scoring 26 points and knocking down three three - pointers . Minnesota ( 16 - 12 ) , meanwhile , was not in the best position for an overtime period , as every starter played big minutes in regulation . Karl-Anthony Towns and All-Star Jimmy Butler played at least 45 minutes each , including 48 for Towns . Butler made the most of the minutes , though , scoring a game - high 38 points on 15 - of - 33 shooting . The Wolves were beneficiaries of an enormous number of Philly turnovers , as the Sixers coughed the ball up 24 times on the night . Thanks to the huge turnover disparity , as well as a solid offensive rebounding night , Minnesota attempted 28 more field goals than Philadelphia in the game . The gap in shot attempts made up for the Wolves ' poor shooting , as the team shot only 41 percent from the field and hit just five three - pointers . Minnesota will host the Kings on Thursday , while Philadelphia will see the Thunder on Friday .

The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves 101 - 93 on Monday at Target_Center . The Grizzlies entered Monday 's contest having lost four in a row and a staggering 23 of their last 24 , but they came out firing Monday night and managed to go shot - for - shot with the Timberwolves before managing to pull away at the end . Wayne Selden put together a terrific performance off the bench for Memphis , shooting 4 - of - 6 from behind the arc and 9 - of - 14 from the field en route to scoring team - high 23 points in 26 minutes . Selden led what ended up being a terrific team performance from three - point range Monday , as the team shot 48 percent from downtown . Marc Gasol , who was 4 - of - 7 from three himself , added 20 points and 10 rebounds in 34 minutes , while JaMychal Green managed to post a double - double himself with 11 points and 11 boards in a team - high 40 minutes . As for the Timberwolves , this was a loss they simply could n't afford with the postseason just around the corner . The uncharacteristic home loss puts Minnesota in a tie for the No . 7 seed with the Jazz , and the team now sits just two games ahead of the lurking Nuggets . The loss came due to an overall poor offensive effort from the Timberwolves , as they shot just 42 percent from the field and failed to score 100 points for the first time in 11 games . Jeff Teague led the way scoring for Minnesota , posting a game - high 25 points while dishing out 12 assists . Young stars Karl-Anthony Towns and Andrew Wiggins , however , could n't get anything going on the offensive end . The two combined to shoot just 12 - of - 30 from the field and score 33 points .
The host Portland Trail_Blazers took down the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 103 - 99 , in a thriller at Moda_Center on Sunday evening . Portland ( 6 - 4 ) earned a hard - fought win on Sunday , thanks in large part to strong play from star point guard Damian Lillard . Lillard scored a game - high 36 points and dished out 13 assists . He was also integral to closing the game for Portland , as he hit a layup and two free - throws to seal the game in the final minute . In the lead - up , Portland traded baskets with OKC in what was an extremely tight game . However , the Blazers were able to maintain the lead thanks to two clutch three - pointers from shooting guard C.J . McCollum . McCollum finished the night with six made threes , and scored 22 points to aid in the winning effort . Big man Jusuf Nurkic rounded out a strong showing for Portland 's `` big three , `` delivering 25 points and drawing a controversial flagrant foul call that resulted in the ejection of OKC star Carmelo Anthony . Oklahoma_City ( 4 - 5 ) has not had the start to the season it hoped for , dropping to below .500 after its fourth crunch - time loss in nine games . On Friday , the team saw its chances diminished after All-Star forward Carmelo Anthony was ejected for flagrant foul . The call was a controversial one , as Anthony was removed after making seemingly minor incidental contact with Portland 's Jusuf Nurkic on a layup attempt . In his absence , fellow All-Stars Russell Westbrook and Paul George took on the offensive load for Oklahoma_City . Westbrook and George scored the team 's final 18 points , but Westbrook came up unfortunately short in the clutch . The reigning MVP was fouled on a three - point attempt with under a minute remaining , but missed all three of the ensuing free - throw attempts . Westbrook also lost the ball while down three with 11 seconds left on what could have been the game - tying possession . Portland will host the Memphis Grizzlies on Tuesday , while the Thunder will visit Sacramento .
The host Portland Trail_Blazers narrowly defeated the Orlando Magic , 99 - 96 , on Wednesday night at Moda_Center . Portland ( 8 - 6 ) has had an up - and - down start to the season , but is now on a two - game win streak . While Orlando jumped out to an early lead , Portland fought back with a strong second quarter run , taking a four - point lead by halftime . As is routine at this point , the Blazers ' success hinged largely on the play of star guards Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum . Lillard flirted with a triple - double , scoring a team - high 26 points , pulling down 11 rebounds , and dishing seven assists . The star point guard helped put the game away , hitting a layup with 1:16 remaining in the fourth quarter to put Portland up by eight . McCollum , meanwhile , hit multiple big shots late in the game . He finished with 24 points and also came away with three steals on the defensive end . Orlando ( 8 - 7 ) has now lost three straight games after a red - hot start to the season . Though the Magic are having a down stretch , they remain in the top five in both three - point makes and three - point percentage . The uptick in shooting has helped fuel the new - look Orlando offense , which is seeing more success in head coach Frank Vogel 's second season with the team . On Wednesday , the team again shot well from deep , hitting 11 three - pointers on 38 percent shooting from beyond the arc . Each member of the Magic 's starting five hit at least one shot from beyond the arc . The team also saw strong bench play , headed up by sixth man Jonathan Simmons . Simmons scored 16 points off the bench , and has now scored 13 or more points in six straight games . The Blazers will visit Sacramento on Friday , while Orlando will host the Jazz on Saturday .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the host Portland Trail_Blazers , 103 - 91 , at Moda_Center on Thursday evening . The Bucks got out to a great start , leading 33 - 21 through one quarter . They continued the assault in the second quarter to push their lead to 15 , 60 - 45 , by halftime . The Bucks did not let up , extending their lead even further , to a 21 - point advantage , 87 - 66 , after three quarters . The Trail_Blazers gave up 19 turnovers in the contest and subsequently were never able to catch up significant ground . This marks the second straight win for the Bucks ( 11 - 9 ) , and the end of a four - game road trip , where they went 3 - 1 . Khris Middleton led the way for Milwaukee , with 26 points on 10 - of - 17 shooting in 35 minutes . Eric Bledsoe followed up with 25 points on 10 - of - 17 shooting , while Giannis Antetokounmpo added 20 points , nine rebounds , five assists , three steals and three blocks . The Bucks shot 48 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 20 from long range . Meanwhile , the Trail_Blazers ( 13 - 9 ) shot 42 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 23 from long range . Jusuf Nurkic led the way for Portland , with 25 points , 11 rebounds , three steals , one assist and one block in 31 minutes . Damian Lillard followed up with 18 points , seven rebounds and seven assists , while C.J . McCollum tallied 15 points , six rebounds , five assists and one block . The Trail_Blazers will look to get back on track , as they play host to the Pelicans on Saturday . The Bucks play host to the Kings on Saturday .
The visiting Denver Nuggets took down the Portland Trail_Blazers with ease on Friday , winning 102 - 85 at Moda_Center . Denver ( 17 - 15 ) had an up - and - down start to the season that included injuries to star big men Paul Millsap ( wrist ) and Nikola Jokic . While Millsap remains sidelined by the injury , Jokic is back to starting for Denver , and has been a major boost for his team . On Friday , he was the backbone of the Denver offense , scoring a team - high 27 points and dishing out six assists . Jokic 's performance helped spark a much - needed win for the Nuggets , who currently sit in the middle of the pack among Western_Conference playoff contenders . Friday 's win was never in much jeopardy for Denver , as the team jumped out to a double - digit lead in the first half and did n't look back . With star point guard Damian Lillard ( hamstring ) sitting out the game , it was difficult for Portland to muster the offensive output necessary for a comeback . On Denver 's end , things were smooth sailing , as five players scored in double figures and the team shot over 49 percent from the floor . Though it was a slow night for sophomore point guard Jamal Murray , who had seven points on 3 - of - 10 shooting , the team was able to find production elsewhere . Shooting guard Gary Harris and forward Wilson Chandler combined for 38 points on 15 - of - 27 shooting . Portland ( 16 - 16 ) , meanwhile , could have used the win , as they have also found themselves in the middle of a crowded Western_Conference playoff picture . With Lillard out , though , the team had trouble finding reliable offense . The Blazers looked to shooting guard C.J . McCollum in his stead , but with the Nuggets able to ramp up defensive pressure on him , McCollum shot just 7 - of - 18 . The team as a whole struggled throughout the night , shooting just 43 percent from the field including a disappointing 6 - of - 22 from beyond the arc . The Blazers did find some production from their second unit , though , as three players scored in double figures off the bench . The Blazers will look to bounce back as they visit the Los_Angeles Lakers on Saturday . Denver , meanwhile , will travel to Oakland to face the defending champion Golden_State Warriors .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the visiting San_Antonio Spurs , 111 - 110 , at Moda_Center on Sunday evening . This game was a thriller right from the start , as the two teams played to a tie through the first quarter . The second quarter was tight as well but the Spurs pulled away towards the end to take a 53 - 48 lead at halftime . The Trail_Blazers took their turn in the third quarter , and fought back to tie it up at 80 heading into the fourth . The fourth quarter was heated , with the Spurs pulling ahead , before Portland pushed back to take a seven - point lead with 5:30 to go . The drama was no where near finished though , as the Spurs took one last lead , up 110 - 109 with 13 seconds left , setting the stage for C.J . McCollum to bury the game - winning bucket with five seconds left . The Spurs had time for a final shot but it fell short , leading to the Trail_Blazers ' second straight win . C.J . McCollum led the way for Portland with 25 points on 11 - of - 24 shooting , in 38 minutes . Jusuf Nurkic added 17 points and 13 rebounds , while Maurice Harkless tallied 19 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting . Evan Turner finished with eight points on 4 - of - 9 shooting , in 23 minutes , and Shabazz Napier added 15 points , seven assists and five rebounds . The Blazers shot 52 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 23 from long range . Meanwhile , LaMarcus Aldridge led the Spurs with 30 points and 14 rebounds , in 34 minutes . Pau Gasol tallied 16 points . nine rebounds , five assists and two steals . Manu Ginobili came up big with 26 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting , in 27 minutes off the bench . The Spurs shot 49 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 23 from long range . The Spurs ( 27 - 14 ) will be right back in action as they take on the Kings in Sacramento on Monday . The Trail_Blazers ( 21 - 18 ) head to OKC to take on the Thunder on Tuesday .
The Portland Trail_Blazers took down the Phoenix Suns , 118 - 111 , at Moda_Center on Tuesday , despite a fourth - quarter comeback effort by Phoenix . The Trail_Blazers ( 23 - 21 ) went up big early on thanks to top - notch offensive play . The team dropped a whopping 66 first half points and held a 20 - point lead heading into the fourth quarter . Still , the Blazers were forced to fight until the very end as Phoenix exploded for a 39 - point fourth quarter effort . Though the gap narrowed , the Blazers were able to hang on , partially due to their lights - out three - point shooting . The team went a superb 17 - of - 35 from beyond the arc in the win . The backcourt of Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum accounted for ten of those three - pointers , as the two stars combined for 58 points . The last 21 points of the game for Phoenix ( 16 - 29 ) came from star shooting guard Devin Booker . Booker finished the game with 43 points , but his heroics came too late to overcome the Suns ' major deficit . Phoenix rallied to cut the lead to single digits late in the game , but was unable to walk away victorious . Still , the team had a stellar offensive night . The Suns hit 16 three - pointers and went 21 - of - 22 from the free - throw line . Six of those three - pointers came from Booker 's backup , Troy Daniels , who delivered 18 points off the bench . Portland will host the Indiana Pacers on Thursday , while the Suns will visit Denver on Friday .
The Portland Trail_Blazers took down the Dallas Mavericks , 117 - 108 , at Moda_Center on Sunday . Portland 's success began and ended with their backcourt on Sunday , as the Trail_Blazers ' ( 25 - 21 ) duo of starting guards combined to score 57 points in the win . Damian Lillard continued his All-Star push , scoring 31 points on 10 - of - 15 shooting while dishing out nine assists . C.J . McCollum , meanwhile , added 26 points and hit two three - pointers . While the game was never quite a blowout , Portland managed to keep Dallas at a comfortable distance late in the game . A late basket from Lillard and several free - throws helped keep the lead at eight or more points for the final four minutes . Dallas ( 15 - 31 ) got off to a rough start , allowing Portland to take a double - digit lead in the first quarter . Despite a stronger second half , Dallas was unable to close the gap by the game 's end . Like the Blazers , the Mavericks relied heavily on their starters to provide offense . Three members of Dallas 's starting five scored at least 21 points . Veteran wing Wesley Matthews led the team with 23 , while aging star Dirk Nowitzki turned in a vintage performance with 21 . The Mavericks will play host to the Washington Wizards on Monday . Portland , meanwhile , will see the Nuggets in Denver .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Chicago Bulls , 124 - 108 , at Moda_Center on Wednesday . Portland ( 29 - 22 ) got off to an explosive start thanks to star guard C.J . McCollum . McCollum set a new franchise record with 28 points in the first quarter alone , finishing with 50 points overall . Thanks to McCollum 's historic contribution , the Blazers finished the first quarter with a massive 22 - point lead . The hot start set the tone for the game , as Portland held a double - digit lead for the remainder of regulation . McCollum seemingly could not miss on Wednesday , as he went 18 - of - 25 from the field . He was the driving force of a strong Blazers offense , which shot 56 percent from the field in the game . Damian Lillard scored 13 points , but took only nine shots as McCollum was able to take the reigns to the offense in the blowout win . Chicago ( 18 - 33 ) , meanwhile , could seemingly not stop Portland 's perimeter attack early in the game . On offense , though , the team saw some positive developments . Zach LaVine led the team with 23 points on 8 - of - 13 shooting . This marked the end of a major slump for LaVine , who had shot just 5 - of - 28 over his previous two games . The team was also able to hit 13 three - pointers despite the absence of elite shooter Lauri Markkanen , who sat out the game for personal reasons . The Trail_Blazers will visit Toronto on Friday , while the Bulls will take on the Los_Angeles Clippers on Saturday .

The first quarter started off as a close battle with neither team taking more than a two - possession lead , before the Thunder emerged with a 28 - 25 advantage heading into the second . The Trail_Blazers came out strong in the third quarter and kept the advantage for most of the way , as they expanded their lead to 83 - 75 heading into the final frame . The Blazers kept their foot on the gas and pushed their lead to 10 with 5:44 left in the game . They stayed in control the rest of the way , playing the Thunder to a tie through the fourth quarter , en route to their sixth straight win . C.J . McCollum led the way for Portland with 28 points on 10 - of - 20 shooting , eight rebounds , six assists , two blocks and one steal , in 37 minutes . Damian Lillard followed up with 20 points on 5 - of - 18 shooting , seven assists , one rebound , one steal and one block , in 36 minutes . The Trail_Blazers got off to a good start , as they led for most of the first quarter before taking a 33 - 27 lead into the second . The carried the momentum into the second , where they pushed their lead to 14 just two and a half minutes into the quarter . The Warriors cut the deficit to two in the final minutes of the half , but the Trail_Blazers made run to push their lead back to nine , as they took a 61 - 52 lead into halftime . The Warriors came out strong in the third quarter and began chipping away until they finally overtook the lead , 75 - 73 , with 4:30 left in the quarter , however the Trail_Blazers battled back to reclaim an 87 - 83 lead heading into the final frame . The Trail_Blazers did not look back as they dominated the fourth quarter , out scoring the Warriors 38 - 25 , en route to their ninth straight win . They also snapped Golden_State 's six - game winning streak , C.J . McCollum led the Blazers with 30 points on 10 - of - 19 shooting , in 38 minutes . The Trail_Blazers ( 40 - 26 ) play host to the Heat on Monday .

The Trail_Blazers got out to a good start , as they led for most of the first quarter , before they went on an 11 - 2 to end the quarter and take a 34 - 25 lead into the second . They stayed ahead to start the second and pushed their lead to 12 mid way through the quarter , and held on to a take a 12 - point , 59 - 47 lead into halftime . Portland came out strong again in the third quarter , where they outscored the Heat29-25 , to push their lead to 88 - 72 entering the fourth . The Heat battled back to make it just a three - point game mid way through the final frame , but the Blazers quickly pushed the lead back to double digits and cruised to their 10th straight win . Damian Lillard led the way for Portland with 32 points , 10 assists and five rebounds , in 37 minutes . Jusuf Nurkic followed up with 27 points , 16 rebounds , three assists and three blocks , while C.J . McCollum added 17 points , five assists , two rebounds , one steal and one block . The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 110 - 102 , at Moda_Center on Thursday evening . Portland ( 42 - 26 ) took control of the game thanks to stellar play to start the second half . After entering the third quarter leading by five points , the team quickly hit multiple three - pointers that helped them go ahead by as much as 15 . Cleveland ( 39 - 29 ) played relatively well offensively , but poor rebounding and free - throw shooting kept the team from mounting a successful comeback . While Portland pulled down 13 offensive rebounds , Cleveland had just two . The Cavs also shot just 12 - of - 21 from the free - throw line . C.J . McCollum scored a team - high 29 points for the Trail_Blazers , shooting 12 - of - 24 from the field and knocking down three three - pointers . Damian Lillard added another 24 points despite going just 1 - of - 8 on three - point attempts . Al-Faroq Aminu was a key contributor as well , scoring 11 points and grabbing four offensive rebounds . For the Cavaliers , it was all about LeBron James . James led the team with 35 points , 14 rebounds , and six assists . He added two steals and three blocks on the defensive end . While James was lights - out from the field , shooting 15 - of - 25 , he was also a major reason for the team 's free - throw struggles . He went just 4 - of - 9 at the stripe in the loss . On Saturday , the Cavaliers will travel to Chicago , while Portland will host the Detroit Pistons .
The Boston Celtics took down the Portland Trail_Blazers , 105 - 100 , at Moda_Center on Friday night . Boston ( 49 - 23 ) continues to play without its stars , as Kyrie Irving ( knee ) is sidelined in addition to Gordon Hayward ( ankle ) , who is out for the season . Marcus Smart ( thumb ) and Daniel Theis ( knee ) were also out on Friday , but the Celtics prevailed nonetheless . Tied with three minutes remaining , Al Horford hit a big three - pointer to take the lead . The game was back - and - forth over the final two minutes , but Marcus Morris sealed the win with a three - pointer to put the team up by five with under one minute remaining . Morris led the team with 30 points on 9 - of - 13 shooting . Terry Rozier , meanwhile , scored 16 points and had a crunch - time steal that led to clutch free - throws . Off the bench , big man Greg Monroe led the team with 10 rebounds and scored 10 points . Overall , it was an efficient offensive night for the team . The Celtics knocked down 11 three - pointers on over 60 percent shooting from beyond the arc . For Portland ( 44 - 28 ) , star point guard Damian Lillard once again played a leading role on offense . Lillard scored 26 points and dished out eight assists . Shooting guard C.J . McCollum added another 26 points , shooting 12 - of - 22 from the field . However , the Trail_Blazers struggled on offense as a team , going just 8 - of - 33 from beyond the arc . On Sunday , the Celtics will visit Sacramento , while the Trail_Blazers will travel to Oklahoma_City .

The Jazz picked up the intensity in the fourth , but the Trail_Blazers held on to go out on a high note in their final before the playoffs . The Houston Rockets defeated the host Golden_State Warriors , 122 - 121 , at Oracle_Arena on Tuesday . In the opening game of the season for these title contenders , it came down to the final seconds to decide a winner . Despite the fact that the Warriors led for over 46 minutes of this game , the Rockets ended up prevailing in comeback fashion . The win has to be attributed to a monster fourth quarter , in which Houston outscored Golden_State , 34 - 20 . Turnovers really killed the Warriors , as they committed 17 of them in their defeat . Houston also did a fantastic job down low , outscoring Golden_State , 54 - 32 , in the paint . The Rockets ( 10 ) were huge underdogs in this game , but James Harden carried them to an impressive win . Harden led Houston with 27 points , six rebounds and 10 assists . Eric Gordon led the bench in scoring , providing 24 points , despite going 0 - of - 6 from three - point range . P.J . Tucker was also huge off the bench , totaling 20 points and six rebounds . Chris Paul went just 2 - of - 9 from the field in his debut with Houston , but still finished with four points , eight rebounds , 11 assists and two steals . The Warriors ( 0 - 1 ) are prohibited favorites to repeat on their title this year , but a loss like this is uncharacteristic of this bunch . Draymond Green was the difference , as he tallied nine points , 11 rebounds and 13 assists before departing in the third quarter due to a knee injury . Once he went out , the Rockets overcame a double - digit deficit to comeback and win . Nick Young led the Warriors in scoring , as he dropped 23 points on 8 - of - 9 shooting off the bench . Kevin Durant amassed 20 points , five rebounds , seven assists and four blocks , despite committing nine turnovers . Stephen Curry accrued 22 points , five rebounds and four assists . On deck for the Rockets is a road matchup with the Sacramento Kings on Wednesday , while the Warriors play the New_Orleans Pelicans on Friday for their next game .

The Pelicans ( 11 - 9 ) jumped right out of the gate , outscoring the Warriors 31 - 17 in the first quarter . The Warriors ( 15 - 5 ) responded in the second quarter , where they outscored the Pelicans 36 - 22 , to tie it up at 53 by halftime , and carried the momentum through the third to take the lead , 84 - 75 , heading into the fourth . The Pelicans made a push in the final frame , bringing it to a six - point game with 4:30 to go , before the Warriors pulled away one final time . Stephen Curry was the high - point man for the Warriors , with 27 points on 9 - of - 25 shooting , in 36 minutes . Klay Thompson followed up with 24 points , four rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks , in 36 minutes . Andre Iguodala gave a solid boost off the bench , with 14 points , four assists , three rebounds and two steals , in 30 minutes of action . The Warriors shot 42 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 34 from long range , and dished 30 assists . Meanwhile , Anthony Davis was the high - point man for New_Orleans , with 30 points , to go with 15 rebounds , two assists and two blocks , in 38 minutes . The Warriors play host to the Kings on Monday .
Two teams heading in the opposite direction squared off on Wednesday , as the Golden_State Warriors took down the Memphis Grizzlies , 97 - 84 , at Oracle_Arena . Golden_State ( 25 - 6 ) remains without superstar point guard Steph Curry ( ankle ) and All-NBA forward Draymond Green ( shoulder ) , but the team continues to cruise along nonetheless . On Wednesday , the Warriors earned their tenth straight win , thanks in large part to a red - hot first half from All-Star guard Klay Thompson . Thompson finished the first half with 27 points , knocking down three three - pointers along the way . While Thompson finished the game with only 29 , his hot second quarter helped the Warriors establish a lead that was maintained through the entirety of the second half . Thompson shot 10 - of - 16 on the night , contributing to Golden_State 's relatively efficient 46 percent shooting from the field . Superstar forward Kevin Durant was another major factor for the Warriors , as he poured in 22 points to go with eight rebounds . Memphis ( 9 - 22 ) has been the coldest team in the league since point guard Mike Conley injured his Achilles in early November . The Grizzlies are in one of their worst ruts in team history , having now dropped 18 of their last 20 games . On Wednesday , the team 's struggles were unfortunately apparent , as the Grizzlies shot only 33 percent from the field as a team . Marc Gasol , who shot just 5 - of - 15 , was the only Memphis player to score more than 10 points . Surprisingly , one of the only areas where the Grizzlies were able to hold an edge was three - point shooting . The normally lukewarm Grizz got hot from deep , knocking down 12 three - pointers as a team . Still , points were hard to come by , as has often been the case for the league 's 29th - ranked offense . The Grizzlies will visit Phoenix on Thursday , while Golden_State will host the Lakers on Friday .
The Golden_State Warriors defended their home court , beating the Los_Angeles Lakers , 113 - 106 , at Oracle_Arena on Friday . Golden_State ( 26 - 6 ) is back to having the league 's best record thanks to the win . The reigning champions are also now 30 against the Lakers this season . While the results have been lopsided , the games have been anything but . Both of the team 's previous two matchups were narrowly won by Golden_State in overtime . While Friday 's contest ended in regulation , the game excited until the end . The Lakers launched a major fourth - quarter comeback to cut a double - digit lead down to just two points . In the end , though , the game finished in less - than - exciting fashion , as the star - powered Warriors pulled away in the final minutes . The Warriors saw a career night from their rookie center , Jordan Bell . Bell had 20 points and 10 rebounds , along with a block and a steal . The game proved to be a showcase of young talent , as Bell traded baskets and highlight - reel plays with the Lakers ' own rookie phenoms . Still , it was established superstar Kevin Durant who decided the game , scoring a team - high 33 points , including four points in the final minute of regulation to help seal the win . Los_Angeles ( 11 - 19 ) saw yet another heartbreaking loss at the hands of the defending champions . Still , the Lakers left Oracle_Arena with plenty of positive takeaways on Friday , as a number of their young talents stood out on the big stage . Rookie point guard Lonzo Ball had one of his best shooting nights to date , scoring 24 points while going 5 - of - 6 from beyond the three - point line . Ball , along with rookie forward Kyle Kuzma , dominated on the offensive end throughout the night , helping push the Lakers to near - victory . Kuzma scored a team - high 27 points to go along with 14 rebounds . The performance comes just days after Kuzma recorded a career - high 38 points in Houston . Los_Angeles will host the Portland Trail_Blazers on Saturday , while Golden_State will host the Denver Nuggets .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the host Golden_State Warriors , 96 - 81 , at Oracle_Arena on Saturday . Golden_State came into this matchup as a monster favorite , but Denver really put it to them in this shocking result . In fact , the Nuggets never trailed over the final three quarters , as a 31 - 21 second quarter really put separation between them and the Warriors . Golden_State had their worst offensive game of the season , as they went just 32 - of - 83 from the field and 3 - of - 27 from three - point range . In addition , the Warriors actually missed 20 - straight three 's in this defeat . Rebounding was also key , with Denver outrebounding Golden_State , 45 - 38 . The Nuggets ( 18 - 15 ) best player was Nikola Jokic , as he amassed 18 points , nine rebounds and four assists . Wilson Chandler accrued 15 points and nine rebounds . Jamal Murray accumulated 14 points , six rebounds , four assists and two steals . Gary Harris provided 19 points , three assists and two steals . The Warriors ( 26 - 7 ) had their 11 - game winning streak snapped , as they had their worst offense game of the season . Kevin Durant led the team , as he tallied 18 points , six rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Klay Thompson totaled 15 points , five rebounds , four assists and three steals . Those two combined to go just 12 - of - 38 from the field though . Draymond Green collected 10 points , five rebounds , six assists , two steals and two blocks . On deck for Golden_State is a home matchup versus the Cleveland Cavaliers on Monday , As for Denver , they play host to the Utah Jazz on Tuesday .
The visiting Los_Angeles Clippers took down the Golden_State Warriors , 125 - 106 , at Oracle_Arena on Wednesday night . The win was the Clippers ' first against Golden_State since December 25 , 2014 . With All-Star guards Steph Curry ( ankle ) and Klay Thompson ( rest ) sitting out for the Warriors ( 33 - 9 ) , the game looked like a prime opportunity for superstar forward Kevin Durant to take over on offense . Durant , who had missed the last four games with a calf strain , came out strong , scoring 25 first half points . Despite his early efforts , Golden_State was able to carry only a four - point lead into halftime . Durant 's early dominance was overshadowed by a miraculous second - half outing from Clippers guard Lou Williams . Williams scored 27 points in the third quarter alone , finishing with a career high of 50 points in the commanding win . He shot 16 - of - 27 from the field and 10 - of - 10 from the free - throw line , hit eight three - pointers , and dished out seven assists . Williams helped the Clippers ( 19 - 21 ) earn a double - digit lead early in the fourth quarter , which the team built up to 21 points by the middle of the fourth . For the Warriors , Durant was the only player to score more than 12 points . He finished with 40 points on 14 - of - 18 shooting and scored his 20,0th career point in the blowout loss . Fellow All-Star Draymond Green shot just 1 - of - 9 from the field and had only seven points . The Clippers , meanwhile , were without All-Star forward Blake Griffin ( concussion ) , but found offense in Williams and others on Wednesday . Bench guard Tyrone Wallace shot 7 - of - 11 to add 22 points off the bench in the win . DeAndre Jordan , meanwhile , had 12 rebounds to lead the team , including three on the offensive end . Both teams will hit the road , as the Clippers visit Sacramento on Thursday while the Warriors are slated to play in Milwaukee on Friday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Boston Celtics , 108 - 105 , at Oracle_Arena on Saturday . Despite the fact that Boston led for the entirety of the first half , Golden_State prevailed thanks to a big second half . The third quarter was the difference in the game , with the Warriors outscoring the Celtics , 30 - 19 . It was competitive throughout though , as there were seven ties and seven lead changes in total , with neither team ever leading by more than 10 points . The only notable difference in the stat sheet was rim protection , as Golden_State swatted away nine shots , while Boston recorded just two blocks . Fastbreak scoring was also a big factor , with the Warriors winning that battle , 17 - 7 . The Celtics ( 35 - 15 ) were led by Kyrie Irving , as he amassed 37 points , two rebounds and four assists on 13 - of - 18 from the field . Jaylen Brown totaled 20 points and two rebounds . Al Horford accumulated 15 points , 13 rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Marcus Morris led the bench with 12 points and eight rebounds . The Warriors ( 40 - 10 ) got a season - high 49 points out of Stephen Curry , as he also added four rebounds , five assists and two steals on 16 - of - 24 from the field . Kevin Durant finished with 20 points , nine rebounds and two assists . Draymond Green collected 15 points , 11 rebounds , five assists and three blocks . On deck for Boston is a road matchup versus the Denver Nuggets on Monday . As for Golden_State , they travel to play the Utah Jazz on Tuesday .
The Golden_State Warriors took down the visiting Los_Angeles Clippers , 134 - 127 , behind Steph Curry 's 44 points at Oracle_Arena on Thursday . In the first game back from the All-Star Break , the Warriors ( 45 - 14 ) showcased their top - ranked offense . It was an offense - heavy game from both teams , as LA ( 30 - 27 ) nearly caught up with Golden_State 's 70 - point first half thanks to 69 points of their own in the second . Ultimately , though , it was two - time MVP Steph Curry 's night to shine . Curry hit eight three - pointers en route to a game - high 44 points . He shot 14 - of - 19 from the field . As a team , the Warriors shot a brilliant 62 percent from the field . Five players scored in double figures . All-Star forward Kevin Durant followed up his recent 50 - point game with 21 points on Friday . He added eight assists . The team also knocked down over 54 percent of its three - point attempts , making 13 as a team on the night . LA , meanwhile , showcased its own offensive acumen . Despite the loss , the team had seven double - digit scorers , including all five starters . Forward Tobias Harris , who was recently acquired in the trade that sent Blake Griffin to Detroit , scored a team - high 22 points . Offensive powerhouse Lou Williams came off the bench and delivered another strong outing , scoring 21 points . The Clippers will visit Phoenix on Friday , while Golden_State will host the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Saturday .
The Utah Jazz took down the Golden_State Warriors , 110 - 91 , at Oracle_Arena on Sunday night . The playoff - hungry Jazz ( 42 - 32 ) capitalized on an opportunity on Sunday , as Golden_State ( 54 - 19 ) was without all four of its All-Star players . MVPs Steph Curry ( MCL ) and Kevin Durant ( rib ) will be hoping desperately to get healthy before the playoffs , while Klay Thompson ( thumb ) and Draymond Green ( pelvis ) are dealing with more short - term injuries . Still , all four were absent from Sunday 's tilt , clearing a path for Utah to earn a wire - to - wire win . The Jazz knocked down 12 three - pointers , shot 48 percent from the field , and highlighted their top - tier defense , holding Golden_State to just 42 percent shooting . Donovan Mitchell once again led the Jazz in the points column , scoring 21 on the night . Center Rudy Gobert had a big double - double , scoring 17 points to go with 15 rebounds , three steals , and four blocks . Forward Joe Ingles delivered a well - rounded performance , scoring 14 points to go with six rebounds and eight assists . The ailing Warriors , meanwhile , were running with only a skeleton crew as they struggled to find any points production . Only two players scored in double digits in the loss . Quinn Cook led the team with 17 points , also dishing out eight assists . The team went just 6 - of - 15 from three - point range , a major deviation from the norm for the typically sharpshooting squad . Golden_State will host the Indiana Pacers on Tuesday , while Utah will host the Boston Celtics on Wednesday .
The visiting Indiana Pacers took down the Golden_State Warriors , 91 - 82 , at Oracle_Arena on Tuesday night . With All-Stars Steph Curry , Klay Thompson , Kevin Durant , and Draymond Green all sidelined by various injuries , the Warriors ( 54 - 20 ) had trouble finding the bottom of the basket . This was n't too problematic early in the game , as their stifling defense held Indiana ( 44 - 31 ) to just 39 first - half points . However , the Pacers heated up in the third quarter , thanks largely to All-Star guard Victor Oladipo . Oladipo had 24 points to lead the team as they steadily gained a lead through the second half . On top of Oladipo , forwards Bojan Bogdanovic and Thaddeus Young added a combined 34 points . Young also pulled down 10 rebounds , including five on the offensive end . While the team had a relatively strong night from inside the arc , hitting 49 percent of its shots , three - point shooting was a difficulty . The Pacers went just 6 - of - 21 from beyond the three - point line , including 1 - of - 6 off the bench . Golden_State , though , struggled far more from every spot on the floor . The Warriors shot just 41 percent from the field , including 5 - of - 17 from three - point range . Veteran guard Nick Young was the team 's scoring leader with only 12 points . The one saving grace for Golden_State , though , was its strong offensive rebounding . The team grabbed 17 boards on the offensive end . On Thursday , Golden_State will host the Milwaukee Bucks . Meanwhile , the Pacers will stay in California for a visit to Sacramento .
The visiting Milwaukee Bucks took down the Golden_State Warriors , 116 - 107 , at Oracle_Arena on Thursday . Superstar forward Kevin Durant made his return from a rib injury for Golden_State ( 54 - 21 ) , but his comeback was cut short by an ejection in the second quarter . Durant received two technical after a heated exchange with an official just before halftime . While the game had been a close one with Durant on the court , Milwaukee ( 40 - 35 ) capitalized on the star 's absence in the second half . The Bucks grew their nine - point halftime lead to 20 by the end of the third quarter , and successfully staved off a Warriors comeback in the fourth . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the Bucks with 32 points on wildly efficient 14 - of - 18 shooting from the field . The 'Greek Freak ' was also one of three Milwaukee players to record five or more assists . The team moved the ball extremely well , tallying 30 dimes in total . Khris Middleton and Eric Bledsoe added 23 and 20 points , respectively . The Warriors , meanwhile , were still without All-Stars Steph Curry ( knee ) and Klay Thompson ( thumb ) . The team 's tandem of All-Star forwards , Durant and Draymond Green , did not have the impact the team expected as they both returned from injury . The duo combined for only 21 points , including 10 from Durant before his ejection . Quinn Cook delivered an impressive performance for the shorthanded Warriors , scoring a team - high 30 points on 12 - of - 15 shooting . The Bucks will visit the Los_Angeles Lakers on Friday , while the Warriors travel to Sacramento on Saturday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Phoenix Suns , 117 - 107 , at Oracle_Arena on Sunday evening . The Warriors ( 55 - 21 ) had finally gotten some reinforcements back in their most recent contest , as both Kevin Durant and Klay Thompson had rejoined the starting five in a Saturday night victory over the Kings . That duo played a pivotal part again Sunday , as they posted the top two scoring efforts for Golden_State while shooting a combined 22 - for - 38 from the field . The Suns ( 19 - 59 ) actually put up a valiant effort , but they were n't able to overcome a disastrous third quarter in which they were doubled up by the home squad , 36 - 18 . Marquese Chriss and Josh Jackson co - led the Suns with matching 22 - point tallies , with the former adding eight rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block , and the latter totaling five assists , two rebounds , two steals and one block . Danuel House , Jr. chimed in with a bench - leading 16 points and also supplied six boards , three assists and two blocks . Dragan Bender posted a 14 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included one assist . Tyler Ulis filled out the stat sheet with 12 points , eight assists , four rebounds and two steals . Alan Williams was productive off the bench with eight points , six rebounds , three assists and two steals . Durant paced the Warriors with a 29 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included eight assists and two blocks . Thompson pitched in 23 points and added two rebounds , two assists and two steals . Quinn Cook tallied 19 points , six assists , four rebounds and three steals . Draymond Green produced a 13 - point , 12 - assist double - double that also included six rebounds , two steals and one block . Jordan Bell pitched in 10 points , five rebounds , one assist and one steal . Kevon Looney drew the start at center and finished with five points , five rebounds , two blocks and one steal . The Suns remain home and take on the Sacramento Kings on Tuesday evening , while the Warriors pay a visit to the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Tuesday night as well .
The visiting New_Orleans Pelicans took down the Golden_State Warriors , 126 - 120 , at Oracle_Arena on Saturday night . The Pelicans ( 46 - 34 ) established themselves early , scoring 40 first - quarter points and taking an early eight - point lead . However , the Warriors ( 57 - 23 ) , led by All-Star forward Kevin Durant , battled back , taking the lead back midway through the third quarter . The final 15 minutes of the game was a back - and - forth slog , but the Pelicans were able to take a commanding edge with just under four minutes left . A Nikola Mirotic three - pointer gave New_Orleans an eight - point lead , and while the Warriors were able to whittle that down to a one - possession game , the Pelicans retained the lead until time expired . Anthony Davis led the Pelicans with 34 points and 12 rebounds , padding his stellar season averages of 28 points and 11 rebounds per game . Veteran point guard Rajon Rondo dished out a whopping 17 assists while also scoring 12 points . Mirotic scored another 28 , while Jrue Holdiay added 25 points to the winning effort . All five New_Orleans starters scored in double digits in the win . Durant , meanwhile , was the Warriors ' offensive leader , scoring a team - high 41 points despite the loss . Durant also grabbed 10 rebounds , as did fellow All-Star forward Draymond Green , who added 11 points and nine assists . Guard Quinn Cook scored another 21 points and dished out seven assists . On Sunday , the Warriors will visit Phoenix , while the Pelicans will travel to Los_Angeles on Monday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Washington Wizards , 130 - 122 , at Capital_One_Arena on Friday night . To say that the Cavaliers ( 4 - 5 ) were starting to get a little desperate would be an understatement of significant proportions . The defending Eastern_Conference champions had dropped four straight contests coming into Friday night , all to teams that they would have been expected to handle with varying degrees of ease . With concern intensifying and a tough road matchup against a conference opponent , LeBron James decided to take matters into his own hands . He was in vintage form against a Washington team that had been vulnerable to small forwards in the early going , posting 57 points , 11 rebounds , seven assists , three steals and two blocks over 43 minutes . He played an integral part of a jaw - dropping 74 - point first half for the Cavaliers , who nevertheless allowed the Wizards ( 4 - 4 ) 66 points during the first two periods as well . The shootout continued throughout the second half , but James was able to convert a key and - one with 52 seconds remaining that gave Cleveland a commanding 128 - 119 lead . As the final score implied , both teams shot superbly throughout the contest , with the visitors compiling a 56 percent success rate from the field and the home squad countering by draining 54 percent of their attempts . Derrick Rose checked in as a distant second to James with 20 points , two assists and one rebound . Jae Crowder drew the start and posted 17 points , seven rebounds , one assist and two steals . Kevin Love managed 11 points , eight rebounds and one steal . J.R. Smith had a small role in the offense once again , mustering only three points , one assist and one steal despite playing 30 minutes . Kyle Korver led the bench with eight points . Bradley Beal led Washington 's offensive barrage with 36 points , a total he supplemented with four rebounds , four assists and one steal . Kelly Oubre Jr. headed back to the bench with Markieff Morris ( abdomen ) making his season debut and supplied 21 points , six rebounds , two assists and one steal . Marcin Gortat and Otto Porter Jr. registered matching 15 - point tallies , with the former adding five rebounds , one steal and one block and the latter providing five boards as well . John Wall posted a modest 13 points on 4 - for - 13 shooting , but he dished out 15 assists , hauled in six rebounds and recorded both a steal and a block . Morris generated two points , four rebounds and three assists while seeing just 14 minutes in his first game of the season . Mike Scott was productive on the second unit as well , totaling 12 points and three rebounds . The Cavaliers will look to build on Friday 's effort against the Atlanta Hawks on Sunday afternoon , while the Wizards travel north of the border to do battle with the Toronto Raptors on Sunday evening .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 111 - 95 , at Capital_One_Arena on Thursday evening . Both teams came out with the hot hand , as evidenced by the 37 - 34 score in favor of the Wizards ( 6 - 5 ) at the end of the first quarter . However , Washington used a strong second period to create some distance from the Lakers ( 5 - 7 ) , who may have been feeling some of the effects of an East Coast back - to - back set . The home squad was able to keep Los_Angeles at bay throughout the second half , utilizing some aggressive defense that led to a total of 19 turnovers on the part of the visitors , along with a pedestrian 36 percent success rate from the field ( including 13 percent from three - point range ) . The Lakers were able to get seven players into double figures in the scoring column , but none tallied more than 15 points . Brook Lopez and Jordan Clarkson both produced that total from the starting five and bench , respectively . Lopez added four rebounds , two blocks and one steal , while Clarkson supplied two rebounds . Kyle Kuzma and Kentavious Caldwell-Pope produced matching 13 - point tallies , with the former adding nine rebounds and one assist and the latter registering four rebounds , three assists and three steals . Julius Randle turned in a near double - double off the bench with 11 points , nine rebounds , one assist and one steal . Brandon Ingram contributed 10 points , four rebounds and one assist . Lonzo Ball matched his point total but his shooting woes continued , as he drained only three of 12 from the field . He did add eight rebounds , eight assists and two steals . John Wall paced the Wizards with 23 points , eight rebounds , five assists , three blocks and two steals . Backcourt mate Bradley Beal followed closely behind with 22 points , five rebounds , five assists and one steal . Otto Porter , Jr. turned in a 20 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and one steal . Markieff Morris compiled 16 points , five rebounds and one assist over 17 minutes in his best outing of the season . Marcin Gortat managed eight points , five rebounds and one assist . The Lakers continue on to Milwaukee to face the Bucks on Saturday night , while the Wizards remain home and take on the Atlanta Hawks on Saturday evening as well .
The Washington Wizards defeated the visiting Memphis Grizzlies , 93 - 87 , at Capital_One_Arena on Wednesday evening . The Wizards ( 14 - 13 ) received the surprising news of John Wall 's return , and there is no question the point guard gave quite a boost to a team that was struggling on both ends of the court . The Wizards looked in control early on and built a 12 - point advantage heading into half time , but the Grizzlies ( 8 - 19 ) crawled back and made it a three - point game heading into the fourth . However , the Wizards prevailed and escaped with a six - point win that should boost the team 's morale going forward . John Wall only played 27 minutes in his return from injury , but he contributed with 13 points , four assists , two steals and one huge block over Chandler Parsons . Bradley Beal led the scoring with 18 points , seven assists , and four rebounds , and Otto Porter Jr. added 14 points with eight boards . All five starters finished with at least 10 points , and Kelly Oubre Jr. added 11 points off the bench . On Memphis ' end , Andrew Harrison had one of the best games of his NBA career since he finished with 20 points , seven assists , three rebounds , and three steals . JaMychal Green added a strong double - double of 15 points and 15 boards , while Marc Gasol chipped in with 15 points and nine rebounds of his own . The bench struggled , however , as they only scored 19 points on 8 - for - 25 from the field .
The Washington Wizards defeated the visiting New_Orleans Pelicans , 116 - 106 , at Capital_One_Arena on Tuesday evening . The Wizards ( 17 - 14 ) had a solid performance in this game and even though they looked overmatched in the fourth quarter , they held on to secure a massive win against a Pelicans team that reacted too late to escape with a better result . The Wizards had a six - point advantage heading into halftime and a big 23 - point lead into the fourth quarter , but they held on . The Pelicans won the fourth quarter 36 - 23 , but it was n't enough and Washington ended securing a huge win that put them three games over .500 . Meanwhile , the Pelicans dropped one game below .500 as they remain quite inconsistent this season . Bradley Beal was the biggest star for the Wizards in this game , as the shooting guard finished with 26 points , five rebounds , and four assists . John Wall added a double - double thanks to 18 points and 10 assists , while Marcin Gortat also added a double - double of 10 points and 14 rebounds . One of the biggest surprises for Washington was Mike Scott , as he finished with 24 points off the bench while shooting 11 - of - 15 from the field . Anthony Davis and DeMarcus Cousins both shone in this game for New_Orleans , but their performances were n't enough to win against a Wizards team that held on late in the game . Davis finished with 37 points and nine rebounds , while Cousins contributed with a huge double - double of 26 points and 13 rebounds . Jrue Holiday added 13 points with six rebounds and five assists .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the host Washington Wizards , 110 - 103 , at Verizon Center on Saturday . This was a tightly - fought battle , as there were 11 ties and 13 lead changes in total , with neither team ever leading by more than 11 points . Milwaukee had to pull off their win in comeback fashion , as they outscored Washington , 28 - 18 , in the fourth quarter . In addition , the Bucks ended the game on a 14 - 4 run across the final three minutes . Despite the fact that Milwaukee is the worst rebounding team in the league , they ended up controlling the glass here , outrebounding the Wizards , 45 - 34 . Milwaukee was also much better at taking care of the ball , as they recorded 11 steals , while Washington only mustered up six . The Bucks ( 21 - 17 ) got a near triple - double out of Giannis Antetokoumpo , as he collected 34 points , 12 rebounds and seven assists on 12 - of - 17 from the field . Eric Bledsoe finished with 21 points , four rebounds , four assists and three steals . Khris Middleton accrued 20 points and five rebounds . John Henson amassed 11 points and 11 rebounds en route to a double - double . The Wizards ( 23 - 17 ) were led by Bradley Beal , as he tallied 20 points , five rebounds and two blocks . John Wall accumulated 16 points , three rebounds and 16 assists , Marcin Gortat totaled 17 points , seven rebounds and three blocks . Markieff Morris provided 14 points and 10 rebounds . On deck for Milwaukee is a road matchup versus the Indiana Pacers on Monday . As for Washington , they 're off until Wednesday when they play host to the Utah Jazz .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Washington Wizards , 107 - 104 , at Capital_One_Arena on Wednesday evening . The Jazz ( 17 - 24 ) came into the contest facing relatively steep odds of a win , considering they 'd notched only three road victories in 20 tries and the Wizards ( 23 - 18 ) owned a solid 13 - 7 mark at home . Matters looked even bleaker after Washington jumped out to a 32 - 25 lead after the first quarter . However , Utah bounced back to outscore their hosts by a 58 - 45 margin over the second and third quarters , even overcoming the adversity of seeing Rodney Hood get ejected in the third quarter for picking up a pair of technical fouls . Ultimately , the player who enjoyed the biggest boost in playing time due to Hood 's early hook , veteran Joe Johnson , drained a trio of key free throws in the closing seconds to seal the hard - fought win . Both teams shot notably well , with the visitors posting a 47 percent success rate from the floor and the Wizards countering with an even more impressive 53 percent mark , including 40 percent from three - point range . However , ball security was a serious deterrent for Washington , as they turned the ball over a whopping 23 times . Ricky Rubio paced the Jazz with 21 points and added three assists , two rebounds and four steals . Donovan Mitchell followed with 16 points , a total he supplemented with five boards , four assists , one steal and one block . Ekpe Udoh matched Mitchell 's scoring total and also tallied nine rebounds , two assists , three steals and two blocks . Johnson led the bench with 16 points of his own while also supplying four rebounds , four assists and three steals . Joe Ingles provided 10 points , six assists and five rebounds . Royce O'Neale poured in 10 as well in 14 minutes off the bench . John Wall paced the Wizards with a 35 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included six rebounds , three steals and one block . Backcourt mate Bradley Beal followed with 23 points , seven assists and five rebounds . Otto Porter , Jr. supplied 14 points , six rebounds , one assist and three steals . Kelly Oubre , Jr. managed a bench - leading 12 points and added six rebounds . Marcin Gortat and Markieff Morris generated matching eight - point efforts , with the former adding eight rebounds and two assists , and the latter compiling six rebounds , two assists and one steal . The Jazz remain on the road and next head to North_Carolina , where they 'll take on the Hornets in a Friday night battle . The Wizards remain home and await a visit from the Orlando Magic on Friday evening as well .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Washington Wizards , 104 - 95 , at Capital_One_Arena on Monday afternoon . The Wizards ( 25 - 19 ) and the Bucks ( 23 - 20 ) played a game that seemed to be going down to the wire , but Milwaukee looked in absolute control after the second half and they simply did n't allow Washington to come back into the game . Washington actually jumped on top by two after the first quarter , but Milwaukee answered with a four - point lead in the second quarter , so they built a two - point advantage , 53 - 51 , heading into halftime .
