The Boston Celtics defeated the Phoenix Suns , 116 - 111 , at TD_Garden on Saturday afternoon . The Celtics ( 20 - 4 ) got more than they 'd likely bargained for against the Suns ( 8 - 16 ) squad , as Phoenix managed to make matters interesting despite being down by as much as 17 with 10 minutes remaining in the fourth quarter . The visitors clawed all the way back to reduce their deficit to 114 - 111 with just under 18 seconds remaining following a Devin Booker 26 - foot three - point jumper , but two clutch free throws by Marcus Smart and a Jaylen Brown steal sealed the hard - fought win for Boston . For a change , it was the Celtics ' offense that was largely responsible for the victory , as they shot an impressive 52 percent from the field , including 45 percent from three - point range . Booker enjoyed another excellent shooting afternoon in TD_Garden , compiling 38 points , five assists and four rebounds before fouling out . He 'd left the game briefly in the first half after appearing to tweak his right leg , but was able to return and clearly play a pivotal part in the contest . T.J. Warren contributed 19 points , five rebounds , one assist and four steals . Tyson Chandler pitched in with a 14 - point , 18 - rebound double - double that also included three assists . Tyler Ulis ( six points , two assists and one steal ) and Marquese Chriss ( two points , two rebounds , two assists and one steal ) were underwhelming , and Mike James led the bench with eight points . Greg Monroe was productive on the second unit as well with six points , eight boards and three assists . Kyrie Irving paced the Celtics with 19 points , five assists and two steals . Jaylen Brown poured in 17 points and added two assists , two steals and one block . Marcus Morris led the bench , matching Brown 's scoring total and added eight rebounds . Jayson Tatum produced 15 points , six rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks . Al Horford posted a 14 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included five boards and one block . Marcus Smart thrived on the second unit as well with 13 points , seven assists , four rebounds and one block . The Suns next head to Philadelphia , where they 'll take on the 76ers on Monday night . The Celtics remain home to take on the Milwaukee Bucks on Monday evening as well .
The Boston Celtics defeated the visiting Milwaukee Bucks , 111 - 100 , at TD_Garden on Monday evening . The Celtics ( 21 - 4 ) entered this game as the top teams in the Eastern_Conference , and once again showed very few teams can stop them when they are clicking on offense . The Bucks ( 12 - 10 ) certainly tried their best and at times got closer in the second half , but Boston prevailed and secured their fifth game in their last six encounters . Meanwhile , the Bucks saw their three - game winning streak come to an end . Al Horford was the main star for Boston , as the talented power forward almost finished with a triple - double thanks to 20 points ( on 8 - of - 10 from the field ) , nine rebounds , and eight assists . But Kyrie Irving was n't far behind when it comes to being an influential player for the Celtics , as the All-Star point guard contributed with 32 points on 13 - of - 24 from the field . Jayson Tatum added 17 points with six rebounds . On the other hand , Giannis Antetokounmpo was the brightest star for the Bucks , as the versatile forward finished with 40 points , nine rebounds , and four assists . Eric Bledsoe helped him with 18 points and three assists , while Khris Middleton added 19 points , eight boards , and five assists across 41 minutes . Malcolm Brogdon contributed with 10 points off the bench .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 97 - 90 , at TD_Garden on Wednesday night . The Celtics ( 22 - 4 ) came into the contest knowing that they would be playing without all of the weapons in their artillery , so to speak , as both Marcus Morris ( knee ) and Jaylen Brown ( eye ) were ruled out in the hours leading up to the game . Those developments pushed the capable duo of Marcus Smart and Terry Rozier into expanded roles , but Boston nevertheless looked a bit short on firepower in the first half . The Mavericks ( 7 - 18 ) were able to exploit their advantage and build a 57 - 47 halftime lead . However , Boston apparently gathered itself at intermission , as they were able to outscore their visitors by a 50 - 33 margin over the final 24 minutes . The Celtics got the job done on the glass , winning the rebounding battle by a 53 - 45 spread , and benefited from a pair of double - digit scoring efforts and one double - digit rebounding tally off their bench . Harrison Barnes unsurprisingly led Dallas with 19 points , a total he supplemented seven rebounds and three assists . Dirk Nowitzki posted 16 points , six rebounds and one steal . The emerging Maxi Kleber managed 13 points , five rebounds , one assist , five blocks and one steal . Dennis Smith , Jr. tallied a full line of 12 points , six rebounds , one assist and two steals . J.J. Barea led the second unit with nine points , six assists and five rebounds , while Yogi Ferrell totaled eight points , seven rebounds , three assists and one steal in 34 minutes off the bench . Kyrie Irving paced the Celtics with 23 points , five assists , two rebounds and two blocks . Jayson Tatum followed with a 17 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included a steal . Al Horford matched Tatum 's scoring total and added eight rebounds , eight assists , three blocks and two steals . Rozier led the bench with 12 points and added nine rebounds and one assist . Shane Larkin was right behind him with 11 points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals . Smart musted a modest two points , four assists and one rebound in 34 minutes . Daniel Theis totaled seven points , 11 rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block in a reserve role . The Mavericks remain on the road and face off with the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday night , while the Celtics head to San_Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday evening as well .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Denver Nuggets , 124 - 118 , at TD Center on Wednesday evening . The Celtics ( 24 - 6 ) came into the night knowing they would be short - handed down low , considering Marcus Morris would be sitting with a knee injury and Al Horford was taking the night off for rest purposes . However , their absences figured to be offset by the return of Kyrie Irving from a one - game absence with a quadriceps strain . The latter development was ultimately a pivotal factor , as the All-Star point guard posted a team - high 33 points , which he supplemented with seven assists , one rebound , two blocks and one steal . Both teams enjoyed stellar shooting nights , with Boston draining 60 percent of their 79 shot attempts and the Nuggets ( 15 - 13 ) posting a 50 percent success rate from the field . With the Celtics ' weakened frontcourt , Denver actually dominated on the glass by a 48 - 30 margin . Gary Harris led the Nuggets with 36 points and added six assists , three rebounds and two steals . Jamal Murray generated a 28 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and three steals . Mason Plumlee drew the start at center and tallied 15 points , six boards , two assists and two blocks . Wilson Chandler supplied 14 points , five rebounds , two assists and two steals . Trey Lyles filled out the stat sheet in a start at power forward , collecting nine points , six rebounds , two assists and one steal . Jaylen Brown followed Irving with 26 points , five rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block . Aron Baynes drew the start at center in Horford 's stead and contributed 17 points , six rebounds and two assists . Jayson Tatum supplied 15 points , four boards , two assists and one block . Shane Larkin led the bench with 14 points , three rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Marcus Smart mustered a modest four points but dished out nine assists and posted one rebound , two steals and two blocks . The Nuggets head back home to take on the New_Orleans Pelicans on Friday night , while the Celtics remain home and await the Utah Jazz on Friday evening as well .
The Miami Heat defeated the Boston Celtics , 90 - 89 , at TD_Garden on Wednesday evening . The Heat ( 16 - 15 ) and the Celtics ( 26 - 8 ) went down to the wire in a very intense game that was only decided in the final minutes of the fourth quarter . Boston grabbed an eight - point lead at halftime , but Miami did n't sit back and responded with a huge third quarter where they won 26 - 15 . They entered the final 12 minutes with a three - point advantage , and they would never looked back . Despite Boston 's attempts to turn things around in the final minutes , the Heat held on and secured a massive win on the road that put them over .500 once again . Kelly Olynyk was the undisputed star for the Heat , as the former Celtics player finished with 32 points and seven rebounds . Josh Richardson added 19 points with six assists and four boards , while Dion Waiters chipped in with 10 points and six assists despite the fact that he shot just 3 - of - 11 from the field . They were the only three Heat players to score in double digits . Kyrie Irving led the way for the Celtics , as the star point guard finished with a line of 33 points , five assists , and four rebounds . Jaylen Brown added 16 points , and rookie Jayson Tatum contributed with 11 points and seven boards . Marcus Smart chipped in with 15 points off the bench , and his scoring output helped mitigate Al Horford 's struggling night . The talented big man only scored six points while shooting 2 - of - 10 from the field .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Chicago Bulls , 117 - 92 , at TD_Garden on Saturday . Boston came into this game as a monster favorite and a 25 - point margin shows just how lopsided of a matchup it was . The third quarter was the difference in the game , as the Celtics outscored the Bulls , 38 - 18 . The assist - to - turnover ratio was also key , as Boston recorded five more assists than Chicago , while committing 10 less turnovers . The Celtics ended up shooting 48 percent from the field , while holding the Bulls to under 40 percent shooting . The Bulls ( 10 - 22 ) were led by Bobby Portis , as he provided 17 points and eight rebounds off the bench . Justin Holiday totaled 12 points , five rebounds and two steals . Lauri Markkanen amassed 12 points and five boards . Kris Dunn had a game to forget , as he scored just two points on 1 - of - 12 shooting . The Celtics ( 27 - 9 ) had seven players reach double figures in scoring , as Kyrie Irving led the way with 25 points , three rebounds , seven assists and two steals . Jaylen Brown amassed 20 points , five rebounds and three assists . Jayson Tatum accumulated 13 points , seven rebounds and five assists . Daniel Theis led the bench with 10 points and 15 rebounds . On deck for Boston is a home matchup versus the Washington Wizards on Monday . As for Chicago , they travel to play the Milwaukee Bucks on Tuesday for their next fixture .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Boston Celtics , 111 - 103 , at TD_Garden on Monday afternoon . The Wizards ( 19 - 15 ) and the Celtics ( 27 - 10 ) played a tight contest that went down to the wire , but Washington came up big in the second half to secure the win . The first two quarters were quite even , and the Wizards held a slim two - point advantage at the break before running away with the game in the third and four quarters . The main difference here was the advantage on the boards , as the Wizards out - rebounded the Celtics 47 - 45 , including a 14 - 8 edge on the offensive glass . Boston was quite sloppy with the ball as well , as they committed 16 turnovers to Washington 's eight . John Wall and Bradley Beal led the way for the Wizards in this game . The All-Star point guard finished with 21 points and 14 assists , while the sharpshooter was Washington 's biggest scoring threat after pouring 25 points to go along with eight rebounds . Otto Porter Jr. contributed with 20 points and six boards , while Kelly Oubre added 16 points off the bench . Marcin Gortat chipped with a double - double thanks to 11 points and 10 boards . Kyrie Irving and Jayson Tatum were Boston 's top scorers , as both ended with 20 points . Al Horford made quite an impact on both ends of the court , as the versatile big man contributed with 12 points , seven rebounds , six assists , two blocks , and one steal . Terry Rozier offered a decent scoring punch off the bench , as he added 16 points across 26 minutes .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Houston Rockets , 99 - 98 , at TD_Garden on Thursday . Despite the fact that Houston led for all but one minute , Boston led for the most important minute . In fact , the Celtics only lead came on their final shot , as Al Horford hit a game - winning jumper with three seconds left . It was quite the comeback from Boston , as they trailed by 25 points midway through the third quarter and rode a 62 - 36 second half en route to their comeback . The Celtics defense was key , as they held Houston to under 38 percent shooting , while hitting 45 percent on their end . Interior play as also key for Boston , as they outscored Houston in the paint , 56 - 28 . The Rockets ( 25 - 8 ) were led by James Harden , as he collected 34 points , six rebounds , 10 assists and two steals . Eric Gordon started and totaled 24 points , three rebounds and three assists . No other player on the roster had more than one assist , as the bench combined for just 10 points . The Boston Celtics defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 102 - 88 , at TD_Garden on Wednesday evening . The Celtics ( 31 - 10 ) had one of their best performances of the season , while the Cavaliers ( 25 - 13 ) had one of the worst , and those two factors combined for a huge win for Brad Stevens ' team . In fact , the Celtics jumped ahead to a 32 - 21 lead in the first 12 minutes , and they never looked back . Despite showing some fighting spirit in the second quarter , Boston destroyed them in the final 24 minutes . The box score does n't lie , and the Celtics dominated in most categories on route to an absolutely dominant win . One of the main differences was the shooting , as the Celtics made x percent of their field - goal attempts , while Cleveland converted just of their shots . The Celtics had a balanced effort , as six players scored in double digits . Against all odds , it was Terry Rozier who led the scoring for Boston with 20 points , while Marcus Smart and Jayson Tatum each added 15 points . Jaylen Brown contributed with 14 points , and Al Horford had 11 points with eight rebounds . Kyrie Irving also scored 11 points , but chipped in with nine rebounds and six assists as well . The Cavaliers did not look good on offense , although LeBron James was the top scorer with 19 points , seven rebounds and six assists . Kyle Korver had 15 off the bench , and Tristan Thompson contributed with 10 points and 10 rebounds . Dwayne Wade ( five points , 2 - 10 FG ) and Kevin Love ( two points , 1 - 11 FG ) struggled badly , however .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 91 - 84 , at TD_Garden on Friday . In a battle between two emerging teams , they left it all on the floor in this defensive battle . In fact , there were 14 ties and 15 lead changes in total , as the game was within a five - point margin for nearly 40 minutes of play . Rebounding was the difference in the game , with Boston outrebounding Minnesota 56 - 43 . The Celtics held Minnesota to just 36 percent from the field , despite Boston hitting just 6 - of - 36 from three - point range . Scoring down low was also a huge factor , as Boston won the point in the paint battle , 50 - 24 . The Timberwolves ( 24 - 16 ) were led by Karl-Anthony Towns , as he totaled 25 points and 23 rebounds . Jimmy Butler and Andrew Wiggins both went just 3 - of - 12 from the field , as Butler finished with 14 points , while Wiggins dropped 10 . Jamal Crawford was the only other Timberwolf in double figures , as he provided 13 points off the bench . The Celtics ( 32 - 10 ) best player was Marcus Smart , as he provided 18 points , three rebounds and three assists off the bench . Kyrie Irving led the starters with 16 points , nine rebounds and eight assists . Aron Baynes recorded an 11 - point , 11 rebound double - double . Al Horford collected seven points , five rebounds and eight assists . Both teams return to action on Saturday , with Minnesota playing host tot he New_Orleans Pelicans and Boston traveling to face the Brooklyn Nets .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Boston Celtics , 89 - 80 , at TD_Garden on Thursday evening . Chants of `` MVP `` have become customary in various cities around the NBA when certain star players are on the floor . There may be no more appropriate locale for that chorus than in Beantown , where the Celtics ( 34 - 12 ) looked completely out of sorts on the offensive end Thursday without All-Star point guard Kyrie Irving ( shoulder ) , who was ruled out for the contest earlier in the day . Boston played a competitive first quarter before mustering just 13 points in the second , leading to a 39 - 32 halftime deficit . Their defense then betrayed them to an extent in the third , during which the Sixers ( 21 - 20 ) generated 32 points to extend their advantage to 71 - 53 . While the home squad did manage a nice surge late in the fourth quarter , some costly misses by the likes of Shane Larkin and Al Horford in the latter half of the period left them just a bit short in their comeback bid . Despite a modest point total , Philadelphia was able to post a solid 47 percent success rate from the field and overcome 22 total turnovers . Joel Embiid undeniably served as the offensive linchpin for the visitors , as he turned in a 26 - point , 16 - rebound double - double that also included six assists , two blocks and one steal . Dario Saric managed 16 points , six boards , two assists and three steals . T.J. McConnell was productive off the bench once again with 15 points , two rebounds , two assists and three steals . Ben Simmons tallied eight points , seven boards , four assists and one steal . Robert Covington registered five points , two rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Jerryd Bayless drew the start for J.J. Redick ( leg ) and supplied four points , two rebounds and two assists . Al Horford and Marcus Morris paced the Celtics with matching 14 - point efforts off the first unit and bench , respectively . Horford added three rebounds , three assists , two blocks and one steal , while Morris provided six boards and one assist . Marcus Smart fought through an illness to offer 13 points , five rebounds and one assist . Jaylen Brown generated 12 points , four assists , three rebounds and one steal . Jayson Tatum posted 11 points , four boards , two steals and two blocks . Arron Baynes drew the start at center and totaled two points , four rebounds and one block . The Sixers head back home and await a visit from the Milwaukee Bucks on Saturday night , while the Celtics remain home to tangle with the Orlando Magic on Sunday afternoon .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Boston Celtics , 103 - 95 , at TD_Garden on Sunday afternoon . The Magic ( 14 - 32 ) have been one of the worst teams in the NBA this season , but they certainly did not look like that in this game against a Celtics ( 34 - 13 ) team that struggled on both ends of the court . The game was actually tight during the first half , as the scoreline read 59 - 58 for Boston after two quarters but Orlando pulled away in the third . A 32 - 12 scoring run during the third quarter was just too much to handle , and the Magic built a 19 - point lead heading into the fourth . Boston fought back and won the final 12 minutes , 24 - 13 , but it was n't enough and the Magic pulled one of the biggest upsets of the season thus far . All 11 players of Orlando scored at least two points , but there 's no question the biggest star was Elfrid Payton , as the talented point guard had 22 points , six rebounds , and two assists . Aaron Gordon had 11 points with 13 rebounds and three assists , while Evan Fournier chipped in with 19 points , three rebounds , and three assists . Both D.J . Augustin and Shelvin Mack added 10 points off the bench . The Celtics had a monster performance from Kyrie Irving , as the All-Star guard returned from a shoulder injury and looked 100 % healthy since he finished with 40 points , seven rebounds , and five assists . Unfortunately , the rest of the team could not respond the same way . Jaylen Brown had 17 points and Marcus Morris had 12 , but no other Boston player reached the 10 - point mark .
The Boston Celtics defeated the visiting New_York Knicks , 103 - 73 , at TD_Garden on Wednesday evening . Despite missing Kyrie Irving ( quad ) the Celtics were focused right from the start . They matched the Knicks toughness through the first quarter and held a three - point lead going into the second . The Knicks tied it up at 29 , two minutes into the second quarter , but the Celtics took the lead back and kept a slight edge all the way until halftime , when they led 50 - 45 . The Celtics kept up the intensity in the second half , as they pushed their lead to 10 halfway though the third quarter , and held on to a 16 - point lead heading into the final frame . The fourth quarter was very decisive , as they Celtics out scored the Knicks 22 - 8 , to complete the blowout win at home . Marcus Morris came up huge for Boston , as he led the way with 20 points on 6 - of - 9 shooting , in 19 minutes off the bench . Terry Rozier tallied a triple - double with 17 points , 11 rebounds and 10 assists , in 32 minutes . Jayson Tatum tallied 15 points , while Jaylen Brown and Al Horford added 14 points each . The Celtics shot 48 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 26 from long range . Meanwhile , Enes Kanter led the Knicks with 17 points and 17 rebounds , in 26 minutes of action . Kristaps Porzingis tallied 16 points , four rebounds , three assists and three blocks , in 35 minutes , while the only other player to score in double digits for New_York was Michael Beasley , with 12 points in 11 minutes off the bench . The Knicks shot 32 percent from the field , including 3 - of - 17 from long range . The Knicks ( 23 - 29 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Bucks in Milwaukee on Friday . The Celtics ( 37 - 15 ) play host to the Hawks on Friday .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 119 - 110 , at TD_Garden on Friday evening . The Celtics ( 38 - 15 ) came into Friday 's contest looking to continue putting some distance between themselves and the Toronto Raptors for the top spot in the Eastern_Conference . They were certainly primed to do so on paper , considering the Hawks ( 15 - 37 ) walked into Boston 's home court with the poorest record in the NBA . However , in a testament to why the games are played on the hardwood and not the stat sheet , Atlanta jumped out to a surprising 32 - 26 first - quarter lead . The home squad began to rectify matters in the second period , cutting their deficit to a very manageable 55 - 53 by intermission . It was the third quarter that made all the difference , however , as the hosts established their superiority with a 41 - point outburst while limiting the visitors to a modest 20 . That gave the Celtics a comfortable 94 - 75 advantage going into the final 12 minutes , and the cushion would turn out to be all they needed to secure their 20th home victory of the campaign . Boston 's biggest advantage came from the field , as they shot an impressive 51 percent , including 46 percent from distance . Taurean Prince led the way for the Hawks with 31 points , a total he supplemented with eight boards , two assists and three steals . Dennis Schroder tallied 25 points , three rebounds and one assist . Marco Belinelli poured in a bench - leading 15 points and added two assists . Kent Bazemore posted 11 points , five rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . Dewayne Dedmon produced nine points , seven rebounds , one assist and one steal . Ersan Ilyasova mustered a modest seven points , four boards and one block . Terry Rozier logged a second consecutive start for Kyrie Irving ( quad ) and managed a team - leading 31 points . He added seven boards , two assists and two steals . Jayson Tatum pitched in 27 points , four boards , three assists and four steals . Jaylen Brown supplied 19 points , four assists and three rebounds . Al Horford managed 17 points , seven assists , six rebounds , one steal and one block . Aron Baynes tallied 11 points , eight boards and five assists . The Hawks remain in the Northeast and head to the Big Apple , where they 'll face off with the New_York Knicks on Sunday afternoon . The Celtics remain home and will try to extend their winning streak to four games against the Portland Trail_Blazers in a Sunday matinee as well .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers , 97 - 96 , at TD_Garden on Sunday afternoon . The Celtics ( 39 - 15 ) and the Trail_Blazers ( 29 - 24 ) played a thrilling game this Sunday , one where the Celtics had to come from behind in the second half to keep their winning run alive . Portland jumped to a 26 - 19 lead in the first quarter , and they increased it to a 16 - point advantage at half time . One would have thought the Blazers would n't have problems to close things out , but Boston came out of nowhere to turn things around . A 31 - 19 win during the third quarter made things close heading into the final 12 minutes , and a 28 - 23 win in the final quarter lifted Boston to a huge one - point win over Portland to keep their winning streak alive . Boston 's streak reached four games , while Portland has dropped their last two . Boston did n't have Kyrie Irving , but Terry Rozier once again delivered as the starter since he finished with 11 poonts , six rebounds and five assists , although he only shot 5 - of - 18 from the field . Al Horford was the team 's top player since he contributed 22 points , 10 rebounds , five assists , and two blocks . Jayson Tatum had 17 points with five assists , and Jaylen Brown had 16 points with six rebounds and four assists . The backcourt duo of Damian Lillard ( 21 points , nine assists , six rebounds ) and C.J . McCollum ( 22 points , three rebounds , three assists ) once again carried Portland 's offense , but it was n't enough this time . Jusuf Nurkic had 14 points with eight rebounds . Al-Farouq Aminu added 11 points with eight boards , and Maurice Harkless chipped in with 19 points and eight rebounds off the bench .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Boston Celtics , 97 - 91 , at TD_Garden on Friday night . The Pacers ( 31 - 25 ) came in with fresh legs courtesy of having seen their scheduled Wednesday night tilt against the Pelicans cancelled due to a roof leak , and their energy was pivotal to them establishing a surprising 30 - 16 first - quarter lead . The Celtics ( 40 - 17 ) gave a slightly better accounting of themselves in the second period , but with Indiana continuing to score , they actually extended their lead to a 21 - point spread by halftime . Boston came out a different team in the third , however , doubling up the visitors by a 34 - 17 margin . That left the hosts with a very manageable 76 - 72 deficit entering the final 12 minutes , setting up an exciting fourth quarter . The Celtics managed to claw all the way back and even forge an 85 - 84 lead with 4:1 remaining , but a 70 run by the Pacers over the subsequent 2:24 gave them enough cushion to secure the hard - fought road victory . Shooting and rebounding were both key to the win - - Indiana shot 45 percent while limiting Boston to a 38 percent figure , and they also won the battle on the glass , 53 - 38 . Victor Oladipo led the way for the Pacers with a 35 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and five steals . Myles Turner posted 19 points , seven boards and two blocks . Thaddeus Young produced a 13 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included one steal . Bojan Bogdanovic generated 13 points , four boards , three assists and one block . Cory Joseph was held scoreless over 34 minutes but also dished out seven assists and hauled in two rebounds . Kyrie Irving paced the Celtics with 21 points , and he supplemented that total with five assists and two rebounds . Jaylen Brown generated 16 points , one rebound , one assist and one steal . Jayson Tatum tallied 15 points , three rebounds , one assist and four blocks . Al Horford filled out the stat sheet with 10 points , eight rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . Terry Rozier matched Horford 's scoring total to lead the bench and also collected three assists , one rebound , two steals and one block . Aron Baynes delivered six points , six rebounds , one assist and one block . The Pacers head back home and tangle with the New_York Knicks on Sunday afternoon , while the Celtics host the new - look Cleveland Cavaliers for a Sunday matinee as well .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Boston Celtics,121-99 , at TD_Garden on Sunday afternoon . The Cavaliers ( 33 - 22 ) likely came into Sunday 's showdown riding a modest yet tangible wave of optimism , as not only had they emerged victorious in their previous two games , but they would also be rolling out all of the new pieces they 'd acquired in their flurry of activity at the trade deadline . However , a Celtics ( 40 - 18 ) squad looking to make a statement on their home court on Paul Pierce Tribute Day came out ready to match them bucket for bucket , which helped them forge a 32 - 31 lead after one quarter . Cleveland began separating themselves in the second , however , compiling another 33 points to give them a 64 - 52 halftime advantage . That essentially set the tone for the rest of the contest , and the visitors took an insurmountable 95 - 64 lead into the final period . Three of the newest Cavaliers - - George Hill , Rodney Hood and Jordan Clarkson - - all contributed double - digit scoring totals in their team debuts , and the second unit compiled 52 points altogether in the blowout . Despite the overall makeover , the Cavs leaderboard still featured a familiar face at the top , as LeBron James led the way with 24 points , 10 assists , eight rebounds , one steal and one block in just 28 minutes . Clarkson followed with a bench - leading 17 points , a total he supplemented with three boards , one assist and two steals . The two - guard duo of J.R. Smith and Rodney Hood followed with matching 15 - point efforts , with the former adding six rebounds , one assist , two blocks and one steal , and the latter supplying three boards , one steal and one block . Hill poured in 12 points and also posted three boards and one assist . Cedi Osman drew another start and matched Hill 's scoring total while also registering five rebounds , one assist and one steal . Jeff Green mustered 10 points , three rebounds and one assist . Tristan Thompson was the only member of the starting five to not hit double digits in the scoring column , totaling six points , four rebounds and one block . Larry Nance , Jr. , who came over with Clarkson from the Lakers , also suited up for the first time on his new team but generated a modest five points , four rebounds , three assists and one steal in 21 minutes . The Celtics had just three players score in double digits , with Terry Rozier leading the way off the bench . He collected 21 points , nine rebounds , five assists and one block over 34 minutes . Kyrie Irving was next with 18 points , five assists and three rebounds . Marcus Morris accounted for 17 points and three boards . Jayson Tatum and Al Horford pitched in matching nine - point tallies . Tatum also delivered two rebounds , one assist and one steal , while Horford turned in six boards , six assists , two blocks and one steal . Jaylen Brown managed just five points on 2 - for - 9 shooting but also hauled in seven rebounds and one assist . Recent signee Greg Monroe went for five points , five rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block in 12 minutes off the bench . The Cavaliers will look to continue their modest surge in a marquee road matchup against the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Tuesday evening , while the Celtics remain home and take on the visiting Los_Angeles Clippers on Wednesday night .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 109 - 98 , at TD_Garden on Monday . The Celtics ( 43 - 19 ) had little to no problem to win this game against a struggling Memphis ( 18 - 41 ) team that ca n't seem to find the right answers on either end of the court right now . Boston quickly raced to a 33 - 24 lead in the first quarter and the game was over from that point as Boston kept increasing the lead against an out - of - form Memphis team that has now lost 10 straight . A 34 - 17 second quarter gave Boston a huge 26 - point lead at the break , and Memphis could n't come back despite the fact they won the remaining two quarters , 28 - 19 and 29 - 23 , respectively . Kyrie Irving was the star of the game after scoring 25 points to go along with six rebounds and five assists . Jaylen Brown added 13 points , and the bench did an impressive job thanks to Marcus Morris ( 13 points , eight boards ) , Terry Rozier ( 13 points ) , and Daniel Theis ( 12 points with seven boards ) . Al Horford and Jayson Tatum struggled , however , as both finished five points each ( on a combined 2 - 15 FG ) . JaMychal Green led Memphis offensively thanks to a double - double of 21 points and 11 rebounds . Marc Gasol came close to a triple - double , as the Spaniard had 17 points with eight rebounds and eight assists . Andrew Harrison had 14 points , seven boards and seven dimes as well . Deyonta Davis contributed 12 points in 13 minutes off the bench .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 134 - 106 , at TD_Garden on Wednesday evening . The Celtics ( 44 - 19 ) have been playing with a renewed sense of purpose coming out of the All-Star break , as they 'd notched three straight wins in an attempt to recapture the top spot in the Eastern_Conference from the Toronto Raptors . Typically renowned for some stingy defense , Boston had turned up the heat on offense a notch or two over that span , averaging 113 points . However , their performance Wednesday was on another level altogether , as they put together a 67 - point first half . The Hornets ( 28 - 34 ) did n't exactly lay down , though , compiling 59 points of their own to remain within striking distance . The home squad then came out of intermission firing on all cylinders , as they racked up 36 more points during the third quarter while limiting Charlotte to 20 . That provided more than enough cushion to put it into cruise control in the final period , leading to the 28 - point win . Both teams were impressively careful with the ball while committing just seven turnovers apiece , but the home squad 's 47 - 33 rebounding advantage and 62 percent - 46 percent shooting edge were both instrumental . The Hornets were led by Kemba Walker , who tallied 23 points and added five assists . Dwight Howard , playing through a rib injury , followed with 21 points but turned in an unusually scant three rebounds . He also recorded one steal and one block . Frank Kaminsky provided a bench - leading 16 points and complemented them with three boards and two assists . Michael Carter-Williams supplied an efficient 14 points , two rebounds , two assists , three blocks and one steal in 19 minutes . Jeremy Lamb went for 10 points , two boards and one block . Nicolas Batum mustered a modest seven points but also dished out 10 assists , recorded a pair of steals and managed one block . Marvin Williams generated just four points but did add nine rebounds and two assists . Kyrie Irving paced the Celtics with 34 points on 13 - for - 18 shooting and also pitched in five assists , four rebounds and one steal . Jaylen Brown and Marcus Morris produced 15 - point efforts , with Brown adding five rebounds , four assists and one steal , and Morris registering eight boards and two assists in addition to his point tally . Greg Monroe and Terry Rozier followed with 14 points apiece . The former also collected four rebounds , two assists and one block , and the latter posted three assists and two rebounds . Aron Baynes contributed a 12 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and two blocks . Marcus Smart delivered a full line of 10 points , six assists , two rebounds and one steal . Jayson Tatum continued a recent downturn with only seven points and three boards . The Hornets remain in the Northeast and next head to Philadelphia for a Friday night date with the 76ers . Meawhile the Celtics pay a visit to the Houston Rockets for a Saturday night showdown .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Boston Celtics in double overtime , 125 - 124 , at TD_Garden on Wednesday evening . The Wizards ( 39 - 30 ) came into the road battle with some confidence , knowing that they 'd forged a solid 19 - 15 record away from their home floor this season . Moreover , there was another factor particularly in their favor Wednesday , as the Celtics ( 46 - 22 ) , were set to take the court without starters Kyrie Irving ( knee ) , Jaylen Brown ( concussion ) and Al Horford ( illness ) , and would also be without the services of Marcus Smart ( thumb ) . However , to their credit , Boston seemed determined to prove their mettle despite the short - handed nature of their roster , taking an impressive 37 - 23 first - quarter lead . The visitors chipped seven points off their deficit in the second period and kept coming in the third , taking a slim 81 - 80 edge in the final 12 minutes . The hosts would regain control and looked to be on their way to sealing a hard - fought victory until a late surge by Washington that culminated in a Jodie Meeks three - pointer with 2 seconds sent the game into overtime knotted at 106 - 106 . In the first extra period , Boston 's Jayson Tatum would play the hero , tying the game at 115 with a driving layup with 3 seconds remaining , although he missed the subsequent free throw , leading to a second five - minute period . In the second overtime , the Celtics left themselves poised to complete a comeback from six points down with 1:25 remaining when Terry Rozier drained a 26 - foot three - pointer with 47 ticks left , but Tatum missed a 28 - foot three - point jumper on Boston 's final possession to send the Wizards home exhausted winners . Bradley Beal led the way for the Wizards with 34 points , a total he supplemented with nine assists , seven rebounds , two steals and one block . MarKieff Morris provided 20 points , seven rebounds and four assists . Otto Porter , Jr. posted an 18 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and three steals . Ian Mahinmi led the bench with a 14 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included one assist , one steal and one block . Tomas Satoransky managed 10 points , six assists , two rebounds and two steals . Mike Scott ( nine points ) , Kelly Oubre , Jr. ( eight points ) and Meeks ( eight points ) were all productive off the bench . Marcus Morris drew the start for Horford and paced the Celtics with 31 points , which he complemented with nine rebounds , one assist and two steals . Terry Rozier tallied 21 points , nine assists , five rebounds , three blocks and two steals . Tatum totaled 19 points , six assists and five rebounds . Greg Monroe posted a 16 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included one assist , two blocks and one steal . Shane Larkin accounted for 11 points , four assists and one rebound in 24 minutes off the bench . Abdel Nader turned in 10 points , five rebounds and one assist . The Wizards head back home and take on the Indiana Pacers on Saturday night , while the Celtics pay a visit to the Orlando Magic on Friday evening .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Toronto Raptors , 110 - 99 , at TD_Garden on Saturday . In a battle between the top - two teams in the Eastern_Conference , neither club wanted to let up . In fact , neither team led by more than six points until the final five minutes , as there were 20 ties and 15 lead changes in total . Boston really ran away with it late , as they finished the game on an 18 - 7 run after the game was tied with five minutes remaining . In addition , the Celtics rode a 28 - 15 fourth quarter to complete their comeback win . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with Boston hitting 7 - of - 17 and Toronto connecting on just 8 - of - 35 . Turnovers were also critical , as the Celtics forced 15 from the Raptors while committing just five on their end . The Raptors ( 55 - 21 ) were led by DeMar DeRozan , as he tallied 32 points , seven rebounds and seven assists on 12 - of - 19 from the field . Serge Ibaka totaled 15 points and 10 rebounds . Jonas Valanciunas amassed 13 points and 11 boards . Kyle Lowry accrued 11 points , three rebounds and nine assists . The Celtics ( 53 - 23 ) best player came off the bench , as Marcus Morris led the team with 24 points , nine rebounds and three assists . Jayson Tatum led the starters with 24 points , six rebounds and four assists . Terry Rozier collected 21 points , three rebounds and seven assists . Aron Baynes provided 12 points , five rebounds and three assists . Both teams play road games on Monday for their next outing , with Toronto facing the Cleveland Cavaliers and Boston playing the Milwaukee Bucks .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Chicago Bulls , 111 - 104 , at TD_Garden on Friday evening . The Celtics ( 54 - 25 ) came into the game recently having received the unfortunate news that Kyrie Irving 's knee injury would keep him out through the postseason , which ca n't help but put somewhat of a damper on their overall playoff expectations . Additionally , with their most recent loss to the Toronto Raptors , they pretty much saw their chances of regaining the top spot in the Eastern_Conference evaporate . Therefore , they opted to begin strategically resting some players Friday , sitting both Jayson Tatum and Al Horford . That made for a makeshift starting five , which became even more short - handed when Marcus Morris got the boot for a relatively benign scuffle with Bobby Portis . Despite the absence of anything resembling a normal roster , Boston hung tough , outscoring the Bulls ( 27 - 52 ) by a 56 - 46 margin in the second half to seal the victory . Sean Kilpatrick led the Bulls with 24 points , a total he supplemented with three rebounds and one steal . Lauri Markkanen followed with 20 points and added five rebounds and two assists . Jerian Grant supplied 15 points , eight assists , one rebound and five steals . Cameron Payne managed 11 points , four rebounds and four assists . David Nwaba delivered 10 points , four rebounds , one assist and one steal . Cristiano Felicio tallied six points , nine rebounds , two assists and four steals . Justin Holiday accounted for five points , seven rebounds , two assists and three steals . Jaylen Brown paced the Celtics with 32 points and also posted four rebounds and two assists . Greg Monroe produced a 19 - point , 11 - rebound , 10 - assist triple - double that also included two assists and one block . Jabari Bird collected 15 points , three rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Morris contributed 12 points , three assists , one rebound and two steals . Jonathan Gibson posted nine points , two assists and one rebound in just nine minutes . Terry Rozier mustered just seven points , six boards , four assists , two steals and one block . Guerschon Yabusele drew the start and finished with six points , six rebounds , one assist and two blocks . The Bulls remain head back home and face off with the Brooklyn Nets on Saturday night , while the Celtics remain home and take on the Atlanta Hawks on Sunday afternoon .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Boston Celtics , 112 - 106 , at TD_Garden on Sunday afternoon . The Hawks ( 24 - 57 ) were n't exactly brimming with motivation coming into the contest , considering their absence of postseason aspirations . However , for what it was worth , they were coming off a surprising 103 - 97 victory over the Washington Wizards on Friday night . With a second consecutive Eastern_Conference playoff team on the schedule , Atlanta had a chance to keep generating some late - season momentum . The Celtics ( 54 - 27 ) were n't exactly playing with a sense of urgency given that they 're locked into the No . 2 seed , but they came out and played sharp basketball for three quarters and entered the final period with an 82 - 76 advantage . The visitors mounted a comeback , however , racking up a game - high 36 points over the final 12 minutes to seal the win . Both teams shot well in the high - scoring affair , with the Hawks draining 50 percent of their 86 attempts and Boston posting a 51 percent success rate . Taurean Prince paced the Hawks with 33 points , a total he supplemented with eight rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block . Damion Lee followed with 14 points and added eight boards , two assists and one steal . Isaiah Taylor accounted for 13 points , six assists and two rebounds . John Collins generated 12 points , five rebounds , three assists , three steals and one block . DeAndre ' Bembry tallied 11 points , three rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Dewayne Dedmon supplied 10 points , four rebounds , one assist and one block . Mike Muscala was productive off the bench with nine points , three rebounds and three assists . Jayson Tatum led the Celtics with 19 points and complemented them with four rebounds , two assists and four steals . Greg Monroe generated a bench - leading 17 points and also provided four assists , two rebounds and one steal . Al Horford went for 16 points , seven rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . Semi Ojeleye delivered 13 points , six rebounds , one assist and one block . Jaylen Brown poured in 12 points and also managed three rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Terry Rozier mustered a full line of 10 points , nine assists , eight rebounds and one block . The Hawks return home to take on the Philadelphia 76ers at Tuesday evening , while the Celtics hit the road and take on the Washington Wizards on Tuesday night as well .
The host Los_Angeles Clippers demolished the Phoenix Suns , 130 - 88 , at Staples_Center on Saturday . For the second straight game , the Clippers ( 20 ) enjoyed a wire - to - wire blowout victory . The team took the lead in the first quarter and only grew the gap from there , pushing the lead to double digits in the second quarter and starting the second half on a game - clinching run . While Los_Angeles was able to revel in the hefty blowout , the second quarter also saw an unfortunate injury to rookie Milos Teodosic . Teodosic was helped off the floor with an apparent left foot injury and will undergo an MRI to assess its severity soon . Los_Angeles once again benefited from its star power , with All-Star Blake Griffin heading up the offense with 29 points in just 28 minutes of play . Griffin knocked down three three - pointers and made it to the free - throw line 14 times , showing a diverse and efficient offensive arsenal en route to the dominant performance . Fellow All-Star DeAndre Jordan , meanwhile , pulled down a team high of 13 rebounds . Jordan never reached the free - throw line , so the infamously poor foul shooter remains without a missed free - throw in the 2017 - 18 season . Another major story for the Clippers was the continued defensive dominance of Patrick Beverly . Beverly , who made headlines with his stellar defense on rookie Lonzo Ball in Wednesday 's season opener , delivered five steals in Saturday 's blowout win . Phoenix ( 0 - 3 ) , meanwhile , saw a third straight disappointing loss on Saturday . While it paled in comparison to Wednesday 's blowout , the Suns failed to maintain competitive play at any point against the Clippers . The star backcourt of Eric Bledsoe and Devin Booker disappointed , combining for only 17 points on 6 - of - 18 shooting . Booker was the only Sun to play more than 30 minutes , as the Clippers ' lead became seemingly insurmountable fairly soon into the second half . Overall , the team struggled significantly on offense , making only six three - pointers while shooting under 40 percent overall from the field . Phoenix will host the Sacramento Kings on Monday , while the Clippers will host the Utah Jazz on Tuesday .
The visiting Golden_State Warriors demolished the Los_Angeles Clippers , 141 - 113 , at Staples_Center on Monday . The defending champion Warriors ( 5 - 3 ) have had a rocky start to the season , but it did not show on Monday . Golden_State faced the league 's top - ranked defense in Los_Angeles and racked up a season - high 141 points . The Warriors made scoring look easy throughout , shooting over 59 percent from the field and pouring in 14 three - pointers . Six of those three - pointers came from two - time MVP Steph Curry , who led the team with 31 points in just 30 minutes of time on the floor . Curry is now averaging just over 28 points per game , leading the scoring - rich Warriors . Former MVP Kevin Durant added 19 points on 7 - of - 11 shooting from the floor . The team finished with six players scoring in double figures and 37 team assists , rounding out what was a tremendous offensive onslaught . Los_Angeles ( 4 - 2 ) entered the game with a league - best defensive rating of 93 . The home crowd would not have guessed it based on Monday 's showing , as the Clippers were thoroughly dismantled throughout the night . While Los_Angeles posted a fine offensive night of its own , shooting 46 percent and scoring 113 points , it was nowhere near enough to bridge the gap with Golden_State . It did not help the Clippers ' case that star forward Blake Griffin had arguably his worst outing of the new season , shooting 4 - of - 10 and finishing with only three rebounds and four assists . The Clippers have now dropped two straight games after a red - hot opening to the season . Los_Angeles will look to bounce back against the league - worst Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday . Golden_State will next see the Spurs in San_Antonio on Thursday night .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 113 - 104 , at Staples_Center on Saturday afternoon . The Grizzlies ( 6 - 3 ) have enjoyed a reputation for staunch defense over multiple seasons , with good reason . However , they also boast two All-Star level offensive talents in Marc Gasol and Mike Conley . Both players stepped to the forefront to key Saturday 's victory , posting 21 and 22 points , respectively . Memphis had the hot hand overall , posting a 48 percent success rate from the field , including 42 percent from three - point range . Meanwhile , they limited the Clippers ( 5 - 3 ) to an unsightly 15 percent tally from long distance on 26 attempts from behind the arc . Conley added three assists , one rebound and one steal to his team - leading scoring total . Gasol also hauled in six rebounds and dished out one assist . Tyreke Evans , who 's served as an excellent source of scoring off the bench , managed 20 points , four assists and three rebounds . James Ennis III provided 13 points , five rebounds , two assists and one block . Brandan Wright matched Ennis ' scoring total off the bench and added nine rebounds , two assists , four blocks and one steal . Mario Chalmers supplied 12 points , four rebounds , four assists and two steals . Chandler Parsons registered 10 points , four boards , three assists , two steals and two blocks . Blake Griffin spearheaded the Clippers ' attack with 30 points , 11 rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Patrick Beverley totaled 23 points , seven rebounds , two assists and one steal . Lou Williams contributed a bench - leading 13 points and added three rebounds , one assist and one steal . DeAndre Jordan posted a 12 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and three blocks . Danilo Gallinari poured in 10 points and also supplied six assists , four rebounds and one block . The Grizzlies will remain in Los_Angeles to take on the Lakers on Sunday night , while the Clippers tangle with the Miami Heat on Sunday afternoon at Staples_Center as well .
The visiting Philadelphia 76ers took down the struggling Los_Angeles Clippers , 109 - 105 , at Staples_Center on Monday night . Philadelphia ( 7 - 6 ) brought its record back to above .500 after losing two straight on its West Coast road trip . It has been an exciting start to the season for the young Sixers team , as they look to be in the early playoff mix for the first time in over four years . On Monday , the 76ers won a nail - biter , looking poised beyond their years as they grinded out the road win in the game 's final minutes . While star big man Joel Embiid struggled a bit down the stretch , committing multiple fouls and seeing shots blocked , the Sixers ' arsenal of shooters was able to help the team out . Big three - pointers from Robert Covington and former Clipper J.J. Redick helped push the team over the top in the final two minutes . Embiid led the team overall with 32 points , shooting 11 - of - 20 . The sophomore center added a team - high 16 rebounds . Covington , meanwhile , was a key factor for Philly in the win . He scored 31 points and shot 9 - of - 12 from the field , including five three - pointers . The Sixers ' other promising young big man , rookie forward Ben Simmons , scored 22 points and pulled down 12 rebounds . It was ultimately a terrific night for Philadelphia 's young frontcourt , despite facing off against a pair of All-Stars in Blake Griffin and DeAndre Jordan . Los_Angeles ( 5 - 8 ) has now lost eight of its last nine games , despite starting the season 40 . The Clippers saw relatively strong play on Monday night , hanging in until the game 's final minutes . However , LA 's top two offensive options , Blake Griffin and Lou Williams , both went cold with the game on the line . Griffin threw up two air - balls in the game 's final two minutes , while Williams was unable to find his range from beyond the arc . Still , the duo delivered relatively impressive numbers on the night . Griffin scored 26 points , leading LA 's starters , while Williams scored 31 points off the bench . The sixth man also came away with five steals . The 76ers will stay in Los_Angeles to play the Lakers on Wednesday , while the Clippers will visit Cleveland on Friday .
The host Los_Angeles Clippers defeated their cross - town rivals , the Lakers , 120 - 115 , at Staples_Center on Monday night . The Clippers ( 8 - 11 ) were led by a whopping 42 points from shooting guard Lou Williams . Williams , who has stepped into a starting role following a season - ending injury to Patrick Beverley , shot 12 - of - 21 and an incredible 14 - of - 14 at the free - throw line in Monday 's win . The guard capped off the performance with four points in the final 32 seconds of the game to help seal a Clipper victory . The team - high scoring performance was a season - best for the former sixth man , who played a team - high 38 minutes in the game . Despite the win , it was not all good news on Monday for the Clippers . All-Star forward Blake Griffin left the game in the fourth quarter with a knee injury , which could potentially sideline the big man for future games . The Clippers commented on Griffin 's status post - game , saying it was `` too early to tell `` the severity of the former first overall pick 's injury . The big man had recorded 26 points , 11 rebounds , and six assists before exiting Monday 's action . The Lakers ( 8 - 12 ) , meanwhile , narrowly missed out on a much - needed victory . The Lakers ' own shooting guard , Kentavious Caldwell-Pope , had a scoring outburst of his own . Caldwell-Pope recorded 29 points and also came away with three steals . In addition to KCP 's strong play , the Lakers saw strong play from their bench . The Lakers bench combined for 52 points , including 17 from backup point guard Jordan Clarkson . Clarkson added eight rebounds and five assists . The strong play from Clarkson was much needed , as starting point guard Lonzo Ball struggled in the loss . Ball shot just 1 - of - 7 in 26 minutes of play , and also recorded three turnovers . The Lakers will host the Golden_State Warriors on Wednesday , while the Clippers will see the Utah Jazz on Thursday .
The visiting Minnesota Timberwolves took down the host Los_Angeles Clippers , 113 - 107 , at Staples_Center on Wednesday . Minnesota ( 15 - 11 ) is now four games above .500 and looks to be in position to snap its league - leading playoff drought . After Wednesday 's win , the Wolves are sitting at fourth in the Western_Conference , and the team is just 2 games behind the Spurs for third place . The Timberwolves have been driven by their star power through the beginning of the season , and Wednesday 's showing in LA was no different . Karl-Anthony Towns led the team with 21 points . Towns added 12 rebounds and brought uncharacteristic defensive intensity , finishing with two steals and four blocks . Veteran All-Star Jimmy Butler , meanwhile , took a commanding role on offense , scoring 19 points and dishing out eight assists . Butler added another eight rebounds . For the fifth straight game , head coach Tom Thibodeau opted for an eight - man lineup rotation . The unusually shallow bench led to every Wolves starter playing at least 36 minutes , with Butler recording team - high 43 . Los_Angeles ( 8 - 15 ) is now 3 - 14 in its last 17 games , and is still struggling to cope with injuries to key players . Three members of the team 's original starting five were absent from Wednesday 's game due to injury . Most notably , All-Star big man Blake Griffin remains sidelined with a knee injury . On Wednesday , one of the two remaining Clippers starters , DeAndre Jordan , made his presence known against a tough Minnesota frontcourt . Jordan scored 18 points and pulled down a game - high 21 rebounds . The normally defensive - minded big man attempted 12 shots , hitting eight . The backcourt duo of Austin Rivers and Lou Williams , meanwhile , took charge on offense . Each guard scored 23 points , helping to keep the Clippers within single digits until the game 's end . Los_Angeles will host the Washington Wizards on Friday , while Minnesota will see Dallas on Sunday .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Washington Wizards , 113 - 112 , at Staples_Center on Saturday afternoon . The Clippers ( 9 - 15 ) came into Saturday 's game having lost four consecutive contests , as life without Blake Griffin ( knee ) has unsurprisingly disagreed with them . Matters looked bleak early against a quality Wizards ( 14 - 12 ) squad that went on a 130 run to open the game . However , Los_Angeles turned it on from that point , outscoring Washington by a 60 - 34 margin over the final 19:30 of the first half . Bradley Beal gave them a taste of their own medicine in the third , pouring in 16 of his 25 points during the period to put the visitors back in it . Holding on to a slim 85 - 81 lead entering the fourth , the Clippers ultimately let their advantage slip away on multiple occasions and found themselves down by a 109 - 105 score with as little as 45 seconds remaining . Lou Williams , who led all scorers with 35 points , drained a pair of clutch free throws and Austin Rivers sank a 25 - foot three - pointer with less than 12 seconds on the clock to get the home squad the one - point lead . After seeing the Wizards vault them once again courtesy of more heroics from Beal , Williams fittingly sank a 29 - footer to provide the home team with the final margin of victory . Otto Porter , Jr. paced the Wizards with 27 points , a total he supplemented with 11 rebounds , five assists and three steals . Beal added three assists , two rebounds and one steal to his aforementioned scoring total . Mike Scott was excellent off the bench with 22 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Ian Mahinmi provided 14 points , three assists and two rebounds on the second unit . Tomas Satoransky pitched in 11 points , six rebounds and six assists in 27 minutes . Marcin Gortat filled out the stat sheet with nine points , eight rebounds , four assists and one block , but he missed a would - be game - winning 21 - foot jumper at the buzzer . Williams supplemented his game - high point haul with eight assists and two rebounds in 35 minutes off the bench . Danilo Gallinari managed 25 points , three rebounds , two assists and one steal . Rivers tallied 16 points , seven assists and one block . Montrezl Harrell supplied 11 points , three rebounds , one assist and one steal off the bench . DeAndre Jordan mustered a modest six points but hauled in 17 rebounds , dished out two assists and recorded a steal and a block apiece . The Wizards remain on the road but head back to the East Coast , where they 'll tangle with the Brooklyn Nets in the Big Apple on Tuesday evening . The Clippers remain home and face off with the Toronto Raptors on Monday night .
The Los_Angeles Clippers narrowly took down the Toronto Raptors , 96 - 91 , at Staples_Center on Monday . The Clippers ( 10 - 15 ) have struggled significantly lately , with All-Star Blake Griffin ( knee ) sidelined due to injury . Still , the team was able to eke out a narrow win over the Raptors on Monday night . The Clippers benefited from strong bench play in the game , as the second unit poured in 50 points in total . Lou Williams led the charge , scoring a team - high 17 points . For the starters , All-Star center DeAndre Jordan excelled , finding himself in a big - man battle with Toronto 's Jonas Valanciunas . Jordan led the game with a whopping 17 rebounds and also blocked two shots . Jordan also scored 14 points , shooting 6 - of - 8 from the field . Toronto ( 17 - 8 ) had won six consecutive games heading into Monday 's matchup . While the team had been averaging 117 points per game during the win streak , the Raptors struggled on offense in LA . The team shot just 40 percent from the field , making only seven three - pointers in total on the night . It was a strong night , though , for big man Jonas Valanciunas . Valanciunas turned in a game - high 23 points and pulled down 15 rebounds . It was Valanciunas 's first double - figure scoring performance in three games and his first double - digit rebounding night since November 9th . While the big man excelled , no other Raptors starter shot better than 41 percent from the field , as the team struggled to find scoring throughout . Toronto will face off against the Suns in Phoenix on Wednesday , while the Clippers will travel to Orlando .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 106 - 98 , at Staples_Center on Sunday . In a battle between two teams trying to climb out of a hole , Los_Angeles was able to prevail thanks to a big third quarter . In fact , the Clippers outscored the Hornets , 33 - 17 , in the third quarter , as Charlotte never got the game within four points from there . Defense was key for Los_Angeles , as they held Charlotte to 39 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . The Clippers ended up hitting 47 percent of their shots , recording 24 assists on 36 made baskets . A 46 - 32 scoring in the paint advantage was huge as well for Los_Angeles The Hornets ( 13 - 23 ) only starter in double figures was Kemba Walker , as he tallied 30 points , two assists and two steals . Nicolas Batum collected nine points , five rebounds and six assists . Frank Kaminsky led the bench with 16 points , eight rebounds and two blocks . Jeremy Lamb also played well off the bench , totaling 12 points , five rebounds , five assists and three steals . The Clippers ( 16 - 19 ) also had just one starter in double figures , as Blake Griffin accumulated 25 points , seven rebounds , six assists and two blocks . Lou Williams was the player of the game , as he provided 40 points and eight assists off the bench . DeAndre Jordan amassed eight points and 16 rebounds . Both teams return to action on Tuesday , with Los_Angeles hosting the Memphis Grizzlies and Charlotte traveling to play the Sacramento Kings .
The host Los_Angeles Clippers took down the Memphis Grizzlies , 113 - 105 , in a close game at Staples_Center on Wednesday . Los_Angeles ( 17 - 19 ) has now won four straight and five of its last six games . The team has bounced back from its sub - par record during Blake Griffin 's extended injury - related absence . Sixth man Lou Williams has been a big part of the team 's recent heat . Williams , the reigning Western_Conference Player of the Week , scored a team - high 33 points in Wednesday 's win . Williams added six assists , two of which came on crucial Blake Griffin buckets in the last two minutes that helped the Clippers seal the win . Overall , it was a very strong offensive night for Los_Angeles . The team shot 55 percent from the field and got to the free - throw line at a high rate , notching 31 foul shots in total . Five players scored in double digits . Griffin led the way for the starting five with 21 points . Memphis ( 12 - 26 ) remains near the bottom of the Western_Conference standings thanks to the loss . While Memphis was able to keep Wednesday 's game close , cutting the Clippers ' lead to just two with under two minutes remaining , poor shooting ultimately sunk the team 's chances . The team struggled from beyond the three - point arc and from the free - throw line . At the foul line , the team went just 21 - of - 33 . Team-leading scorer Tyreke Evans contributed to the issue , shooting just 7 - of - 13 from the stripe en route to his 18 points . The team shot just 8 - of - 26 from three - point range as well , including 0 - of - 3 from star center Marc Gasol . Gasol was just 3 - of - 10 on the night for 11 points . LA will host the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Friday , while Memphis will host the Washington Wizards on Saturday .

The Warriors ( 32 - 8 ) cruised their way to an easy win over the Clippers ( 17 - 21 ) to kick off Saturday 's slate of games . Golden_State grabbed the advantage in the first quarter , and they jumped to a nine - point lead at halftime . Los_Angeles could not storm back in the third quarter , and Golden_State took advantage of that with a 39 - 21 win after three . The Clippers looked better in the final quarter , but it was too late and the Warriors cruised to another dominant win . Stephen Curry was the absolute star in this game , registering 45 points in just 30 minutes despite sitting out the entire fourth quarter . The host Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 108 - 107 , in a down - to - the - wire game at Staples_Center on Monday . Los_Angeles ( 18 - 21 ) led for the majority of the game , even going up by as much as 13 in the third quarter . However , an early fourth quarter lapse allowed Atlanta to claw back and take the lead . Still , the Clippers were able to edge out their guests in the final minute of play . Shooting guard C.J . Williams knocked down a three - pointer with eight seconds left to give the Clippers the win . Preceding that , though , were four clutch free - throws from big man DeAndre Jordan . Up by five , the Hawks elected to intentionally foul the free - throw wary Clippers center . Despite his usual woes , Jordan went 4 - of - 4 at the free - throw line in the final two minutes to help the Clippers remain within reach . Jordan finished with 24 points and also had 17 rebounds . Though he did not contribute in the final minutes , the Clippers once again enjoyed a stellar outing from shooting guard Lou Williams . Williams led the team with 34 points , and is averaging over 28 points per game over the last three weeks . His offense helped the team make up for the absence of All-Star forward Blake Griffin ( concussion ) . The Hawks ( 10 - 30 ) squandered a hard - fought comeback by blowing a six - point lead in the game 's final minutes . Though the game took a 19 - point swing in Atlanta 's favor in the late third and early fourth quarter , the Hawks were unable to walk away with a win . Poor overall shooting was one of the primary issues in the loss . The team hit just 40 percent of its shots from the field . The Hawks ' starting backcourt was a major source of the their inefficiency , as Kent Bazemore and Dennis Schroder combined to shoot just 11 - of - 33 on the night . Taurean Prince was the Hawks ' leading scorer with 20 points , and was one of the few Hawks to shoot 50 percent or better from the field . On Wednesday , the Clippers will visit Golden_State , while the Hawks will visit Denver .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the visiting Houston Rockets , 113 - 102 , at Staples_Center on Monday evening . The Rockets got out to a quick start , leading 11 - 4 just a couple minutes into the game . The Clippers responded and cut the deficit to one , down 31 - 30 , heading into the second . The Rockets started the second quarter well , quickly pulling ahead by nine . However , the Clippers battled back once again and this time took the lead , up 59 - 56 , heading into the half . The Clippers carried the momentum out into the second half , where kicked things off by pushing their lead to 10 , just four minutes into the quarter and held on to lead 92 - 84 heading into the fourth . The Clippers did not waiver , holding the lead throughout the fourth en route to their fifth straight win . Lou Williams led the way for the Clippers once again , this time with 31 points on 12 - of - 19 shooting , nine assists , three rebounds and one block , in 39 minutes . Blake Griffin followed up with 29 points , 10 rebounds , six assists and one steal , in 34 minutes , while Milo Teodosic added 12 points , six rebounds , six assists and one steal , in 29 minutes . The Clippers shot 56 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 25 from long range . Meanwhile , Chris Paul tallied 19 points , seven assists , six rebounds and one block , while Eric Gordon finished with 19 points , four rebounds and three assists . Trevor Ariza chipped in 17 points , five rebounds and three steals , in 33 minutes . The Rockets shot 40 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 44 from long range . The Rockets ( 30 - 12 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Timberwolves on Thursday . The Clippers ( 22 - 21 ) play host to the Nuggets on Wednesday .
The Los_Angeles Clippers took down the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , 109 - 104 . The Clippers ( 23 - 21 ) continued their recent surge with Wednesday 's win . LA was able to edge out the win thanks in large part to the play of its star players . Blake Griffin led the team with 20 points and 12 rebounds . Breakout sensation Lou Williams contributed 17 points , though he shot an inefficient 6 - of - 18 from the field . The team was able to overcome major issues with both turnovers and free - throw shooting . LA went just 17 - of - 29 at the free - throw line and committed 20 turnovers on the night . Fortunately for the Clippers , the team was able to knock down ten three - pointers while limiting the ice - cold Nuggets to just five . Denver ( 23 - 22 ) had its hopes dashed by poor perimeter play . While six Nuggets players scored in double digits , the team could not get anything going from beyond the arc . Denver shot just 5 - of - 24 from deep in the loss . Turnovers also proved to be a major issue , as the team coughed it up 20 times in the loss . Shooting guard Gary Harris led the team with 19 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting . However , the Nuggets primarily played through their strong set of big men . Big men Nikola Jokic , Mason Plumlee , and Trey Lyles all scored in double figures . Denver will host the Phoenix Suns on Friday , while the Clippers will visit the Utah Jazz on Saturday .
The Minnesota Timerwolves defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers on Monday , 126 - 118 . Minnesota ( 31 - 18 ) was without All-Star wing Jimmy Butler on Monday , but a strong performance from Andrew Wiggins helped make up for his absence . Wiggins followed up a season - high 29 points in the Wolves ' last win with 40 on Monday . Despite struggling with efficiency all season , Wiggins shot an impressive 16 - of - 28 from the field . His performance made up for a rough 1 - of - 7 shooting night from co - star Karl-Anthony Towns . Towns , though , was instrumental in crashing the offensive glass for Minnesota . He came away with six offensive boards on the night . Another area where Minnesota excelled was at the free - throw line , thanks largely to point guard Jeff Teague . Minnesota went 33 - of - 39 from the line , while Teague alone shot a whopping 16 - of - 17 en route to 30 points . Los_Angeles ( 24 - 22 ) flexed its own star power on Monday , as Blake Griffin finished the game with a massive triple - double . Griffin led the team with 32 points , 12 rebounds , and 12 assists . The Wolves will visit Portland on Wednesday , while Los_Angeles will host the Boston Celtics .
The Boston Celtics took down the host Los_Angeles Clippers , 113 - 102 , at Staples_Center on Wednesday evening . Boston ( 35 - 14 ) was coming off a four - game losing streak , its longest of the season . Wednesday 's win came in refreshingly comfortable fashion for the team . From the second quarter on , the Celtics held the lead . While Boston had kept LA at a safe distance for much of the game , a quick run in the third quarter helped Boston build its lead up to 14 by the end of the quarter . Kyrie Irving and the other Celtics starters were able to sit for the majority of the fourth quarter , as Boston 's bench took care of business late in the game . All-Star big man Al Horford ( head ) and bench guard Marcus Smart ( hand ) were both late scratches from the lineup . The Celtics ' healthy starters were able to make up for the key absences , though . Kyrie Irving finished with a team - high 20 points , as well as eight rebounds and seven assists . Jayson Tatum , meanwhile , bounced back from a poor showing against the Lakers to score 18 points . The Clippers ( 23 - 24 ) are now in their own losing skid , having dropped three straight . A huge free - throw disparity helped LA remain competitive for much of the game . At one point , the Clippers ' free - throw attempts outnumbered Boston 's 36 to 10 . Unfortunately for the Clippers , converting on free - throws proved difficult . The Clippers shot just 27 - of - 39 on free - throw attempts in the game . Star forward Blake Griffin led the team with 23 points . Sixth man Lou Williams , meanwhile , came up big off the bench . He scored 20 points to go with seven assists . The Clippers will travel to Memphis on Thursday , while the Celtics have a show down with the Warriors at Oracle_Arena on Friday .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 104 - 96 , at Staples_Center on Tuesday evening . The game marked the first for the Clippers ( 25 - 25 ) since trading franchise big man Blake Griffin to the Detroit Pistons on Monday . The trade netted LA starting - caliber players in Avery Bradley and Tobias Harris , but they had not yet joined the team by Tuesday 's tip - off . Thus , the Clippers were playing shorthanded on Tuesday as they looked to move past their former star . Griffin had spent the last nine years with the Clippers and had earned five All-Star selections during his tenure there . Things got off to a decent start for the new - look Clippers , as they traded baskets with Portland ( 28 - 22 ) for much of the first half . It was a one - possession game until the third quarter , when the Trail_Blazers went on an explosive run to start the second half . Damian Lillard was a key factor in the team 's offense , as he scored 28 points and went a perfect 11 - of - 11 at the free - throw line . Offensive rebounding also proved key . Jusuf Nurkic led Portland with 20 rebounds , seven of which came on the offensive end . The Clippers saw 19 rebounds from their own center , DeAndre Jordan . Only three of those were offensive , though , as second - chance points were few and far between for the Clippers . Perhaps the biggest issue for the Clippers was the sub - par play of sixth man Lou Williams . Williams has had a career year , but on Tuesday , he had one of his worst nights of the season . He shot just 5 - of - 26 from the field and turned the ball over four times . Portland will host the Chicago Bulls on Wednesday . Los_Angeles , meanwhile , will host the Bulls on Sunday in what could be the debut of their new players .

Los_Angeles jumped to a five - point lead after the first quarter , but Chicago did not give up and managed to maintain that advantage heading into the final two quarters . It seemed as if Chicago was set to put up a good fight , but Los_Angeles won both the third and fourth quarters , getting a huge 10 - point win that put the Clippers over .500 as they continue to make a playoff push in the Western_Conference . The run culminated in an astonishing highlight reel three - pointer from James Harden after an ankle - breaking crossover on LA 's Wesley Johnson . Harden contributed heavily to the team 's hot start , recording 22 points in his first 20 minutes of play . With the win , Houston finishes February a perfect 120 . This marks the third time in franchise history that the Rockets have gone undefeated over the course of a month . Harden led the team with 25 points in 33 minutes of play . He also dished out seven assists . Clint Capela added 22 points and 13 rebounds , while Chris Paul had eight assists and two steals . Houston is now 31 - 1 when Harden , Capela , and Paul all play . The Rockets own the league 's best record and remain 1/2 game ahead of the defending champion Warriors . At that point , the game was essentially out of reach , as Houston led by more than 20 by the end of the first .
