The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the visiting Brooklyn Nets , 123 - 120 , at Staples_Center on Sunday evening . The Clippers got out to a strong start with a quick 100 run but Nets battled back within the quarter to trail 32 - 27 entering the second . The Clippers kept the advantage for the entire second quarter , and pushed their lead to double digits , before settling on a 65 - 53 lead by halftime . They came out strong in the third and maintained a double - digit lead for most of the quarter , but the Nets made a push in the last few minutes to cut the deficit to five , to trail 91 - 86 entering the fourth . The Nets kept the pressure on and tied it up at 94 a couple minutes into the fourth . They then pulled ahead to an eight - point lead with 3:11 left in the game . The Nets held the lead into the final minute , until Austin Rivers hit a three - pointer to take a 121 - 120 lead with 33 seconds left . The Nets were unable to answer and the Clippers sealed the deal with dagger by Lou Williams . Rivers led the Clippers with 27 points on 10 - of - 15 shooting , five rebounds and three assists , in 36 minutes . Tobias Harris followed up with 26 points on 11 - of - 19 shooting , eight rebounds , three steals , three blocks and two assists , in 38 minutes . DeAndre Jordan finished with 17 points and 15 rebounds , while Lou Williams added 21 points on 8 - of - 22 shooting off the bench . The Clippers shot 52 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 27 from deep . Meanwhile , Caris LeVert led the Nets with 27 points on 11 - of - 19 shooting , in 29 minutes off the bench . DeMarre Carroll added 20 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting , seven rebounds , one steal and one assist , in 28 minutes , while Joe Harris finished with 19 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting , off the bench . The Nets shot 44 percent from the field , including 19 - of - 45 from long range . The Nets ( 20 - 44 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Warriors in Golden_State on Tuesday . The Clippers ( 34 - 28 ) play host to the Pelicans on Tuesday .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the host Los_Angeles Clippers , 121 - 116 , at Staples_Center on Tuesday evening . The Pelicans got out to a great start on the road with an early 12 - 2 run , and hung on to take a 35 - 27 lead after one quarter . The Clippers clawed back and take a one - point , 49 - 48 , lead mid way through the second but the Pelicans closed the quarter strong with an 18 - 4 run , that put them ahead 67 - 52 at halftime . The Pelicans stayed ahead through the third quarter , as the teams played to a draw , leaving the Clippers trailing 97 - 82 entering the final frame . The Clippers made a push in the fourth and tied things up at 104 halfway through the quarter . The game was tied at 113 with under a minute to go , when Anthony Davis knocked down a jumper to give the Pelicans a two - point lead with 31 seconds left . Despite a clutch three - pointer from Lou Williams , the Pelicans were able to close the game out at the foul line . The marks the ninth straight win for the Pelicans . Davis led New_Orleans with 41 points , 13 rebounds , three steals , three blocks and two assists , in 37 minutes . Jrue Holiday came up large with 19 points , 17 assists , four rebounds , two blocks and one steal , in 36 minutes . Rajon Rondo tallied 13 points , nine assists , three rebounds and two steals . The Pelicans shot 45 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 30 from long range . Meanwhile , Tobias Harris led the Clippers with 27 points , 11 rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block , while Lou Williams finished with 27 points , 11 assists and three rebounds , off the bench . DeAndre Jordan tallied 10 points , 20 rebounds , one assist and one block , in 27 minutes . The Clippers shot 47 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 27 from long range . The Clippers ( 34 - 29 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Cavaliers on Friday . The Pelicans ( 37 - 26 ) will be right back in action as they take on the Kings in Sacramento on Wednesday .
The host Los_Angeles Clippers made quick work of the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , winning 116 - 102 at Staples_Center . The game was hardly ever in question , as Los_Angeles ( 35 - 29 ) came out of the gate red - hot and took an 18 - point lead in the first quarter . The Clippers were led largely by their big men , who helped the team earn a significant advantage on the glass . Despite five offensive rebounds from Larry Nance , Jr. , the Cavaliers ( 38 - 26 ) were out - rebounded 52 - 40 on Friday . All-Star Clippers center DeAndre Jordan led the charge for LA , finishing the night with 20 points and 23 rebounds . Montrezl Harrell had 20 points off the bench and added two more offensive rebounds for the Clippers . Tobias Harris was the team 's leading scorer with 23 points . He shot 8 - of - 17 from the field and knocked down five three - pointers . Every Clippers starter scored at least 14 points , despite injuries forcing rookie Sindarius Thornwell and veteran sixth man Lou Williams into the starting five . Thornwell impressed in the start , shooting 5 - of - 9 and scoring 14 points . The Clippers ' win came at an important time , as a loss would have pushed them back out of the Western_Conference playoff picture . For Cleveland , LeBron James delivered his usual dominant performance , but it was not enough . James shot 11 - of - 20 for 25 points and had 10 rebounds , but his team shot only 45 percent and 12 - of - 36 from three - point range . Free-throw woes were an issue for the Cavaliers , who went just 12 - of - 18 at the line . The struggles did not skip over James , who missed both of his free - throw attempts . The Clippers will host the Magic on Saturday , while the Cavaliers will stay in Los_Angeles and face the Lakers on Sunday .
The Los_Angeles Clippers took down the Orlando Magic , 113 - 105 , at Staples_Center on Saturday night . A brilliant fourth quarter push from LA ( 36 - 29 ) , coupled with Orlando ( 20 - 47 ) falling apart down the stretch , helped the Clippers earn the crucial win on Saturday . After putting up 89 points through three quarters , Orlando was held to just 16 in the fourth . The Clippers , meanwhile , saw stellar offense through the early part of the quarter . This was largely due to veteran guard Lou Williams , who knocked down two big three - pointers in the quarter and had 10 fourth - quarter points in total . Williams led the Clippers with 25 points on 10 - of - 22 shooting . Uncharacteristically , though , Williams did not tally an assist in the game . He is the team 's leading assist man on the season with 5 per game . All-Star center DeAndre Jordan had 18 rebounds , but missed a double - double in the points column , where he had only nine . Rookie Euroleague product Milos Teodosic had 15 points and seven assists off the bench . The win helped LA 's playoff chances , moving the team to 1/2 game ahead of both Denver and Utah . The Magic , meanwhile , saw a team - high 24 points from Jonathan Simmons . It was Simmons ' second straight game leading the team in scoring with at least 24 . He added seven assists , filling in for the offensive hole left by the absence of Aaron Gordon ( concussion ) and Evan Fournier ( MCL ) . The Magic wound up outmatched significantly on the boards , as LA held a 41 - 33 advantage in the rebounding column . Both teams are off until Tuesday evening , when the Clippers will travel to Chicago and the Magic will visit San_Antonio .
The Portland Trail_Blazers took down the Los_Angeles Clippers , 122 - 109 , at Staples_Center on Sunday evening . The win extended Portland 's league - best win streak to 13 games . What started as a neck - and - neck game quickly devolved into a runaway win for the Trail_Blazers . After the Clippers ( 37 - 32 ) tied the game at 44 - 44 with just over four minutes remaining in the second quarter , Portland ( 44 - 26 ) went on a quick 120 run to open up a double - digit lead . The Blazers ' offense was unrelenting , as the team shot 50 percent from the field and knocked down 14 three - pointers . All five Portland starters scored at least 16 points , with three players eclipsing 20 on the night . Damian Lillard was Portland 's top scorer with 23 points , including a perfect 9 - of - 9 night at the free - throw line . Both Moe Harkless and C.J . McCollum added an additional 21 points . Harkless was particularly impressive , shooting 8 - of - 11 from the field and grabbing two steals . Jusuf Nurkic led the Blazers in the rebound column , as he grabbed 12 boards to record the team 's only double - double . For the Clippers , meanwhile , a stand - out performance from Lou Williams was not enough to earn a win . Williams scored a game - high 30 points off the bench , including three three - pointers and a perfect 5 - of - 5 at the free - throw line . Montrezl Harrell also impressed off the bench , tallying 24 points to go with seven rebounds . It was the Clippers ' starters who struggled , as Austin Rivers was the only member of the starting unit to score more than 11 points for LA . On Tuesday , Portland will look to defend its win streak against the first - place Houston Rockets . The Clippers , meanwhile , will travel to Minnesota to take on the Timberwolves .
The Los_Angeles Clippers took down the San_Antonio Spurs , 113 - 110 , at Staples_Center on Tuesday . With playoff seeding on the line and both teams seeing big nights from their power forwards , Tuesday 's contest delivered plenty of late - season drama and thrills . Despite leading for only 48 seconds of game time , the Clippers ( 42 - 36 ) scored at just the right times in Tuesday 's clutch win . Led by a 15 - point fourth quarter from veteran guard Lou Williams , LA was able to cut the Spurs ' ( 45 - 33 ) seven - point lead down and tie the game . Austin Rivers hit a clutch go - ahead three - pointer to give the Clippers the final lead with under 30 seconds remaining . Tobias Harris led the Clippers with 31 points , shooting 11 - of - 19 from the field and 8 - of - 9 at the free - throw line . Harris added nine rebounds . Despite Harris 's big night , it was Lou Williams who delivered down the stretch for LA . Williams finished the game with 22 points off the bench , scoring 15 of those points in the fourth quarter . The Clippers attempted a whopping 43 free - throws , making 34 of those attempts . Their performance at the line helped them overcome a poor three - point shooting night in which they knocked down only five triples . The win keeps the Clippers alive in the Western_Conference playoff race , where they currently sit at 10th place . The Spurs , meanwhile , saw an 18 - year streak of winning at least 50 games come to an end with Tuesday 's loss . Though the team saw its 33rd loss of the season , All-Star big man LaMarcus Aldridge had an incredible night , shooting 13 - of - 21 en route to 35 points . Aldridge added four offensive rebounds and three blocks in the narrow loss . The Spurs will stay in Los_Angeles and visit the Lakers on Wednesday . The Clippers , meanwhile , travel to face the Utah Jazz on Thursday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 134 - 115 , at Staples_Center on Saturday . The Nuggets ( 45 - 35 ) and the Clippers ( 42 - 38 ) entered this game knowing this was going to be a pivotal game on the race to secure a playoff berth in a surprisingly contested Western_Conference . But the main difference was that Denver brought their A-game to this contest , while the Clippers could n't quite do that , and ended looking overmatched right from the start . Perhaps the best example of how the game happened was the fact that Denver won each quarter individually - 33 - 26 , 33 - 32 , 35 - 31 and 33 - 26 , respectively . The Clippers could n't match and ended losing what was a key game for them . The biggest star of the game was no other than Nikola Jokic , who once again delivered a strong triple - double of 23 points , 11 rebounds and 11 assists . Jokic was n't the top scorer , however , as Will Barton ended with 31 points . Jamal Murray had 13 points with seven assists , and Paul Millsap had 15 points . Wilson Chandler added 13 points and seven boards . Mason Plumlee chipped in with 11 points off the bench . Six Clippers scored in double digits and as it has been the trend all season long , Lou Williams led the team 's offense with an impressive 24 - point effort coming off the bench . Tyrone Wallace had 18 points , and Tobias Harris had 16 points , four boards and four assists . DeAndre Jordan also had 16 points , but he also added 17 boards . Austin Rivers had 10 points and nine assists .
The New_Orleans Pelicans cruised past the Los_Angeles Clippers , 113 - 100 , at Staples_Center on Monday night . The win secured a spot in the playoffs for New_Orleans ( 47 - 34 ) . New_Orleans could still land anywhere from sixth to eighth in the crowded Western_Conference , as their seeding is pending the outcome of their final matchup of the season against San_Antonio on Wednesday . Due to the tie - breakers between the Pelicans , Spurs , Timberwolves , and Nuggets , the winner of San_Antonio versus New_Orleans will earn the sixth seed , while the loser will fall to eighth . Tuesday 's win could not have come in a more comfortable fashion for the Pelicans , as they jumped out to an early double - digit lead in the first quarter . Strong offense helped carry the team to the win , as they shot over 46 percent , hit 11 three - pointers , and dished out 34 team assists . The Clippers ( 42 - 39 ) , meanwhile , could not match New_Orleans ' production from deep . LA hit only two three - pointers in the loss . Pacing also proved to be a deciding factor , as the Pelicans were able to control the flow of the game with their up - tempo offense . This led to some crucial mistakes for the Clippers , who committed 15 turnovers on the night . Anthony Davis led his team in scoring , as has become customary for the 25 - year - old superstar . Davis scored 28 points on 50 percent shooting and also blocked five shots . Sharpshooting forward Nikola Mirotic , meanwhile , scored 24 points while grabbing a whopping 16 rebounds to lead the team . In the backcourt , Rajon Rondo dished out nine assists to go along with another 11 from Jrue Holiday . All in all , it was a commanding performance for the Pelicans , who have managed to excel late in the season despite the absence of injured All-Star DeMarcus Cousins , who tore his Achilles back in February . The highest - scoring Clippers starter was Tobias Harris , who had only 11 points in the loss . It was a poor night for LA 's opening five , who combined for just 46 points . Off the bench , veteran sixth man Lou Williams led the team with 20 points and seven assists . Montrezl Harrell added another 15 points to go with eight rebounds and six assists . On Wednesday , both teams will close out the regular season . The Clippers will face the Lakers at Staples_Center , while New_Orleans will host the San_Antonio Spurs at Smoothie King Arena .
The Los_Angeles Lakers took down the Los_Angeles Clippers , 115 - 100 , at Staples_Center on Wednesday , concluding the regular season for both teams . The tide started to shift in favor of the Lakers ( 35 - 47 ) towards the end of the first quarter , as five quick points from guard Gary Payton II helped the team open up a seven - point lead . That lead stuck around , as the Lakers never led by less than two possessions for the remainder of regulation . It was a relatively inconsequential game for both teams , though , as neither the Lakers nor the Clippers ( 42 - 40 ) will be heading to the postseason . Both teams gave key players limited minutes , as Julius Randle played only 17 minutes for the Lakers and DeAndre Jordan played only 23 minutes for the Clippers . Josh Hart was the game 's high scorer . The rookie guard led the Lakers with 30 points , also dishing out five rebounds and five assists . Off the bench , Payton II impressed with 25 points and a team - high 12 rebounds . As a whole , the Lakers impressed on offense , shooting almost 48 percent from the field and knocking down 17 three - pointers . For the Clippers , Tobias Harris led the way with 23 points in only 27 minutes of play . Off the bench , Montrezl Harrell added another 15 points . Once again , though , three - point shooting proved to be a problem for the Clippers . The team went just 6 - of - 18 from beyond the arc . The game was the season finale for both teams , who will not suit up again until the 2018 - 19 season begins .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 103 - 91 , at FedEx Forum on Wednesday night in the season opener for both teams . The Grizzlies ( 10 ) were ambushed early by the feisty Pelicans ( 0 - 1 ) , who came fast out of the gate and built a 34 - 27 lead after one quarter . As atypical a high - scoring open to the contest as that was , Memphis brought things back down to their pace over the next two periods in particular , yielding a miserly 36 points to New_Orleans over the second and third quarters combined . Meanwhile , the Grizzlies kept a consistent offensive pace , posting no fewer than 24 points in any period . However , the lack of scoring balance was disturbingly familiar , as only Mike Conley and Marc Gasol managed double - digit scoring on the first team . Nevertheless , a trademark defensive effort that saw the home team limit every Pelican outside of the virtually unstoppable duo of Anthony Davis and DeMarcus Cousins and also elicit 19 turnovers led the way to the double - digit win . Davis paced the visitors despite coming into the game battling an illness , posting 33 points , 18 rebounds and one block . Cousins followed closely behind with a 28 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and a game - high seven blocks . E'Twaun Moore totaled 11 points , four assists , two rebounds and one steal . Jrue Holiday notably struggled from the field , draining just two of 11 shots on his way to four points , six rebounds , four assists and one steal . Dante Cunningham mustered only seven points but did pull down nine boards and record a steal and a block apiece . Conley led the way for Memphis with 27 points , which he supplemented with five rebounds , three assists and two steals . Gasol contributed a 14 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and three blocks . The rest of the double - digit scorers came from the bench , beginning with 2017 second - round pick Dillon Brooks ' 19 points , which he supplemented with five rebounds , two assists , four steals and two blocks . Offseason acquisition Tyreke Evans generated 11 points , five rebounds and two assists , while Brandan Wright totaled 10 points four rebounds , two steals and a block . The Pelicans head back to the Big Easy for their home opener against the reigning NBA champion Golden_State Warriors on Friday night , while the Grizzlies tangle with the Warriors as well at home on Saturday night .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the visiting Dallas Mavericks , 96 - 91 , at FedEx Forum on Thursday evening . The Grizzlies ( 4 - 1 ) came out determined to extract revenge in the second half of this home - and - home series , after the Mavericks ( 1 - 5 ) stole the first game on Wednesday evening . The Grizz amassed a 28 - 14 lead after the first quarter and built on the lead in the second quarter , bringing the score to 54 - 35 heading into halftime . The Mavericks came out strong in the third quarter and outscored the Mavs 33 - 22 , cutting the Dallas lead to eight heading into the fourth quarter . However , the Grizzlies were sure to take care of business in the fourth , where they had to fight to the end and seal the deal with clutch foul shooting . Marc Gasol led the way for Memphis , with 25 points , 13 rebounds and three assists , in 33 minutes . Mike Conley followed up with 22 points and four assists , in 30 minutes . Tyreke Evans chipped in 19 points and six rebounds , in 22 minutes off the bench , while Mario Chalmers dished six assists , in 20 minutes off the bench . Meanwhile , Harrison Barnes led the Mavericks , with 22 points and 11 rebounds , in 37 minutes . The only other players to score in double digits for the Mavs were Wesley Matthews , with 18 points in 35 minutes , and Dirk Nowitzki with 14 points in 28 minutes . The Mavericks struggled shooting , hitting only 34 percent from the field . The Mavericks will look to bounce back on Saturday , when they play host to the 76ers . The Grizzlies play host to the Rockets on Saturday .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Houston Rockets , 103 - 89 , at FedEx Forum on Saturday night . The Grizzlies ( 5 - 1 ) were already responsible for the sole blemish Houston 's record coming in , having scored an eight - point road win against the Rockets ( 5 - 2 ) on Oct. 23 . The visitors therefore had some revenge on their mind ahead of Saturday 's contest , but once again , Memphis ' trademark suffocating defense led the way to victory . The home team limited the Rockets to 38 percent shooting and also goaded them into 17 turnovers , while committing only nine miscues of their own . Moreover , they were efficient offensively despite not seeing any starter log double - digit scoring , as they posted a 47 percent success rate from the field , including 42 percent from three - point range . Ryan Anderson surprisingly paced the Rockets , managing 22 points , seven rebounds and two blocks . James Harden had a quiet night by his lofty standards , tallying 20 points on just 6 - for - 19 shooting and adding eight assists , four rebounds and two steals . Clint Capela turned in a 12 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included one assist , one steal and one block . Trevor Ariza ( foot ) made a quicker - than - expected return to the court and supplied 10 points , seven rebounds and five assists . Bobby Brown led the bench with 11 points and added one steal . Chandler Parsons encouragingly led the Grizzlies with 24 points in 19 minutes off the bench , a total he supplemented with one rebound , one assist and one steal . Mario Chalmers registered 15 points , four assists , two rebounds and two steals in 25 reserve minutes . Tyreke Evans was the third member of the second unit to put together a productive night , providing 14 points , seven rebounds , four assists and one steal . Jarrell Martin led the starters with a modest nine points , three rebounds , one assist and two steals . Mike Conley and James Ennis III generated matching eight - point efforts , with the former adding three rebounds , three assists and a block while the latter brought down seven rebounds and dished out three dimes . Marc Gasol totaled six points , seven rebounds , five assists , four blocks and one steal . The Rockets head back home to take on the Philadelphia 76ers on Monday evening , while the Grizzlies remain home to tangle with the Charlotte Hornets on that same night .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the hosting Memphis Grizzlies , 104 - 99 , at FedEx Forum on Monday evening . Charlotte ( 4 - 3 ) managed to turn things around before it was too late , using a huge fourth - quarter comeback to defeat a Memphis ( 5 - 2 ) side that lost for the first time on their home court . The Hornets entered the final 12 minutes of action down by nine points , but won the final frame 31 - 17 to come away with a win that seemed highly unlikely throughout most of the game . Kemba Walker was the star of the game for Charlotte , as the star point guard finished the game with 27 points and six assists . Jeremy Lamb added 17 points with eight rebounds , while Michael Kidd-Gilchrist ( 10 points , seven rebounds ) and rookie Malik Monk ( 13 points , four rebounds and three assists off the bench ) helped the offense as well . The negative point for Charlotte was Dwight Howard 's performance , as the veteran center finished the game with just two points and seven rebounds . He totaled at least 10 rebounds in every game this season prior to Monday 's . The Grizzlies ' leading scorer came off the bench , as Tyreke Evans contributed with 19 points and 10 rebounds in 30 minutes of action . Mike Conley had 16 points with five assists , and Dillon Brooks added 11 points , eight rebounds , and three assists off the bench . Marc Gasol delivered a sub - par effort of just 10 points and seven boards in 33 minutes .
The Orlando Magic defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 101 - 99 , at FedEx Forum on Wednesday evening . The Grizzlies ( 5 - 3 ) took an early lead , up 26 - 23 after one quarter , but the game was destined to be a tight one , as the Magic ( 6 - 2 ) brought it to a 54 - point tie at halftime . Orlando got to business in the second half by pulling ahead with a strong third quarter . The Magic led 81 - 75 entering the fourth quarter and held the lead all the way until there was 1:45 left in the game , when the Grizzlies tied it up at 97 . The Grizzlies then took a two - point lead , but Aaron Gordon flipped the switch with a clutch three - pointer , followed up by solid team defense by the Magic to seal the win . Evan Fournier was the high - point man for the Magic , with 22 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting , to go with eight rebounds , three assists and one steal in 37 minutes . Aaron Gordon followed up with 19 points , seven rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block in 34 minutes , while Terrence Ross chipped in 15 points on 6 - of - 14 shooting . The Magic shot 50 percent from the field in the win . Meanwhile , Tyreke Evans had a monster game for the Grizzlies , with 32 points , four assists , three rebounds and two steals in 34 minutes . Marc Gasol totaled 22 points and nine rebounds in 36 minutes , while James Ennis III added 14 points , three rebounds , three assists and two steals . The Grizzlies have a couple of days off before they take on the Clippers in L.A . The Magic will look to continue their fantastic start as they play host to the Bulls on Friday .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 100 - 92 , at FedEx Center on Monday evening . The Trial Blazers had a slow start , going 1 - of - 9 from the field , before going on a 15 - 7 run to close the gap . They continued to apply pressure through out the second , where they outscored the Grizzlies , 32 - 22 , to take a 55 - 46 lead into the break . The Grizzlies bounced back with a 90 run in the third , that helped them bring it to a one - point game , 72 - 71 , heading into the fourth . The Blazers closed it out in the final quarter behind clutch shooting from C.J . McCollum and great hustle from Noah Vonleh . McCollum led the way for Portland ( 10 - 7 ) , with 24 points and eight rebounds , in 37 minutes . Vonleh gobbled up 18 rebounds , along with 11 points three blocks and one assist , in 31 minutes . Damian Lillard finished with 21 points , four assists and three rebounds , while Shabazz Napier tallied 16 points , four rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block , in 27 minutes off the bench . The Trail_Blazers shot only 40 percent from the field , but made up for it by hitting 28 - of - 32 free throws . Meanwhile , the Grizzlies ( 7 - 9 ) struggled from the field , hitting only 38 percent , including 27 percent from long range , an were badly out - rebounded , 60 - 35 . Mario Chalmers was the high - point man for Memphis , with 21 points , to go with six assists , six rebounds and one steal , in 32 minutes . Tyreke Evans followed up with 20 points , three rebounds , three assists and one block , in 31 minutes off the bench . Marc Gasol tallied a double - double with 19 points and 12 rebounds , along with seven assists , two blocks and one steal . The Grizzlies were without Mike Conley ( achilles ) . The Grizzlies look to bounce back as they play host to the Mavericks on Wednesday . The Trail_Blazers will be in Philadelphia to take on the 76ers on Wednesday .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 98 - 88 , at FedEx Forum on Sunday . These are two teams that are really struggling , as it was evident by the 98 - 88 scoreline . The third quarter was the difference in the game , as the Nets outscored the Grizzlies , 32 - 18 . Strangely enough , the Grizzlies led for the entirety of the first half , while the Nets led for the whole of the second half . Defense was key for Brooklyn , as they held Memphis to 40 percent from the field and 32 percent from three - point range . The Nets also won the rebounding battle , 43 - 35 . The Nets ( 7 - 12 ) were led by DeMarre Carroll , as he accumulated 24 points , six rebounds , two assists and two steals . Joe Harris got a rare start and produced 13 points and six rebounds , Trevor Booker was huge off the bench , as he collected 16 points , 11 rebounds and four assists . The Grizzlies ( 7 - 12 ) have now lost eight straight games , as this might be their worst defeat of the season . Marc Gasol led Memphis , as he tallied 18 points and five rebounds . Chandler Parsons accrued 12 points and six rebounds . JaMychal Green totaled 11 points and seven rebounds , Tyreke Evans was the only bench player in double figures , as he provided 18 points , six rebounds and three assists . On deck for Brooklyn is a road matchup versus the Houston Rockets on Monday . As for Memphis , they travel to play the San_Antonio Spurs on Wednesday .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 95 - 79 , at FedEx Forum on Friday . These are two teams going in opposite directions and the fact that San_Antonio either won or tied all four quarters here shows exactly which way they 're headed . In addition , Memphis led for all but three minutes , as they held their lead for the final 30 - plus minutes . Defense was key for the Spurs , as they held the Grizzlies to 41 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . San_Antonio 's bench dominated Memphis ' bench , outscoring them , 52 - 39 . The Spurs ( 15 - 7 ) were led by LaMarcus Aldridge , as he tallied 22 points and six rebounds . No other starter scored in double figures , as Pau Gasol amassed eight points and eight rebounds . Rudy Gay led the bench with 18 points and five rebounds . Manu Ginobili turned back the clock to provide 11 points , seven rebounds and six assists off the bench . The Grizzlies ( 7 - 14 ) have now lost 10 - straight games , as they are in their worst stretch since Marc Gasol joined this team . Gasol led Memphis in scoring , as he totaled 16 points , 13 rebounds and four assists . Ben McLemore got a rare start and collected 14 points , two rebounds and two steals . Chandler Parsons was the only other Memphis player in double figures , as he dropped 12 points off the bench . Things wo n't get any easier for Memphis , as they travel to face the Cleveland Cavaliers on Saturday for their next game . On deck for San_Antonio is a road matchup versus the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Sunday .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the visiting Minnesota Timberwolves , 95 - 92 , at FedEx Forum on Monday evening . The Grizzlies looked good from the start , jumping out to a 60 lead and maintaing a slight edge all the way until halftime , where they led 56 - 53 . They held on to a one - point lead , up 76 - 75 heading into fourth quarter and despite a hard push by the Timberwolves ( 14 - 11 ) , were able to come through in the clutch . This marks the end of an 11 - game losing streak for Memphis ( 8 - 15 ) , and their fifth home win of the season . Marc Gasol led the way for Memphis with 21 points , seven rebounds , five assists and one block , in 34 minutes . Tyreke Evans followed up with 16 points , nine assists , five rebounds , three blocks and one steal , in 33 minutes . JaMychal Green chipped in 14 points and collected nine rebounds , while James Ennis III added 13 points off the bench . The Grizzlies shot 47 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 21 from long range . Meanwhile , Jimmy Butler tallied a game - high 30 points on 11 - of - 21 shooting , in 40 minutes of action . Taj Gibson finished with 14 points , five rebounds and four assists , while Andre Wiggins added 12 points , five rebounds and two steals . Gorgui Dieng came up with 10 points and seven rebounds , in 20 minutes off the bench . The Timberwolves shot 44 percent from the field , including 4 - of - 17 from long range The Timberwolves will look to bounce back as they visit Los_Angeles to face the Clippers on Wednesday . The Grizzlies take on the Knicks in New_York on Wednesday .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 116 - 107 , at FedEx Forum on Friday night . The Grizzlies ( 8 - 17 ) came out of the gate determined to put an end to a forgettable stretch that had seen them lose 12 of 13 . They forged a 34 - 25 first - quarter lead , but the Raptors ( 16 - 7 ) began to claw back beginning in the second period . They 'd cut the deficit to 62 - 57 by halftime and closed the deal with an excellent defensive effort in the fourth quarter , limiting Memphis to just 14 points over the final 12 minutes . Both teams put together strong shooting performances , with Toronto sinking 47 percent of their 78 shot attempts and the Grizzlies posting a 50 percent success rate from the field . The home squad got a particularly productive night from their bench as well , as they compiled 48 points . DeMar DeRozan paced the Raptors with 26 points , a total he supplemented with seven rebounds , six assists and one steal . Serge Ibaka posted 21 points , two rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Kyle Lowry filled out the stat sheet with 16 points , eight assists , six rebounds and two steals . Fred VanVleet led the bench with 12 points . Jonas Valanciunas and OG Anunoby contributed matching eight - point tallies , with the former also hauling in eight boards and recording a block . Tyreke Evans paced the Grizzlies with 27 points and added four assists , three rebounds and one steal . Marc Gasol supplied 20 points , seven rebounds and four assists . Chandler Parsons led the bench with 15 points and also pitched in four rebounds , one assist , two blocks and one steal . Ben McLemore poured in 10 points and added two rebounds , one assist and one steal . Andrew Harrison tallied six points , seven assists , four rebounds and one steal . Deyonta Davis was productive on the second unit as well with nine points and four rebounds . The Raptors remain on the road and visit the Sacramento Kings on Sunday afternoon , while the Grizzlies remain home and tangle with the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Saturday night .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 96 - 94 , at FedEx Forum on Friday evening . The Grizzlies ( 9 - 20 ) have completely derailed since losing Mike Conley to an Achilles injury , as they came into Friday 's game with a five - game losing streak in tow , as well as a 1 - 16 record since Nov. 11 . However , they drew one of the few teams in worse shape than they are in the form of the Hawks ( 6 - 23 ) , who 'd notched wins in just three of 15 road games coming into Friday night . Perhaps unsurprisingly , the battle between two underachieving teams was actually an evenly matched one , with the the contest literally coming down to the last shot . After Mario Chalmers drained a 24 - foot three - point jumper with 1:44 remaining to knot the game at 94 , a Tyreke Evans go - ahead driving layup with 1:3 on the clock was the only other score the rest of the way . Atlanta nearly pulled off a miracle on their last possession , as Kent Bazemore narrowly missed a would - be game - winning three - pointer at the buzzer on a play in which he was tightly defended . Bazemore led the way for the Hawks with 19 points , a total he supplemented with five rebounds , five assists and three steals . Dennis Schroder produced an 18 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included five rebounds , two steals and one block . Taurean Prince followed with 17 points , four rebounds , one assist and two steals . Marco Belinelli was next with a bench - leading 14 points , which he complemented with three boards . Ersan Ilyasova contributed nine points , five rebounds , three assists and one steal . Tyreke Evans paced the Grizzlies with 22 points and added three assists , two rebounds and one steal . Chalmers led the second unit with 16 points and also supplied three rebounds , one assist and four steals . Marc Gasol generated 13 points , six rebounds , five assists , two blocks and one steal . Andrew Harrison totaled 10 points , four boards , two assists , two blocks and one steal . JaMychal Green mustered a modest eight points but also hauled in 12 rebounds and recorded an assist , a steal and a block apiece . Rookie Dillon Brooks matched Green 's scoring total and also offered three rebounds , one assist and one steal . The Hawks head back home to tangle with the Miami Heat on Monday night , while the Grizzlies remain home and await the Boston Celtics for a Saturday night showdown .
The Boston Celtics took down the Grizzlies in Memphis on Saturday , 102 - 93 . Boston ( 25 - 7 ) is in the midst of one of its worst stretches of the season , having dropped three of its last five before visiting Memphis . Still , the Eastern_Conference-leading Celtics seemed to have few issues dealing with a struggling Grizzlies team . With Boston on the second half of a back - to - back , head coach Brad Stevens managed minutes carefully , playing only the young duo of Jaylen Brown and Jayson Tatum more than 32 minutes . Tatum made the most of his featured role , scoring 19 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting to go with nine rebounds , two steals , and two blocks . While Tatum 's scoring touch was on full display , it was superstar guard Kyrie Irving who led the Celtics in the points column . Irving notched 20 points on the night , knocking down four three - pointers along the way . Memphis ( 9 - 21 ) is in the midst of a nightmarish stretch , having now lost 16 of its last 18 games . Star point guard Mike Conley ( Achilles ) remains sidelined , and the team has seemingly been unable to respond to his absence . The Grizz rank 29th in the NBA in points per game , and on Sunday , the team 's offensive impotence was apparent . Despite a 30 - point outing for All-Star center Marc Gasol , the team shot only 40 percent from the field in Sunday 's loss . Some of the struggle can be attributed to the efforts of the Celtics ' top - ranked defense , but poor shooting nights have become the norm for the Grizzlies recently as they continue to plummet in the standings . Next up for the Celtics is a trip to Indiana to face the surprisingly strong Pacers . Boston came back from down 12 to beat Indiana in their last matchup , but the Pacers were playing without red - hot shooting guard Victor Oladipo . The Grizzlies , meanwhile , have a tough matchup coming up , as they visit the defending champion Golden_State Warriors on Thursday . Memphis managed a win over the Warriors in their last matchup , though , and Golden_State will be without two - time MVP Steph Curry .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 115 - 112 , at FedEx Forum on Saturday evening . The Grizzlies ( 10 - 23 ) and the Clippers ( 13 - 19 ) engaged in quite a battle that was only decided towards the final seconds of the game . Memphis built a decent lead during the second and third quarters , and entered the fourth with a healthy nine - point advantage . It seemed as if Memphis was going to close things out , but the Clippers stormed back and actually won the final 12 minutes , 31 - 25 . But it was simply too late for them , and the Grizzlies escaped with a huge win at home . Tyreke Evans was the star of the game for Memphis , as the talented combo guard finished with 30 points , 11 assists and seven rebounds . Marc Gasol added 17 points and 15 rebounds , while Andrew Harrison chipped in with 15 points and five assists . James Ennis III did a good job coming off the bench as well , contributing with 14 points on 6 - of - 8 from the field . Austin Rivers had one of the best games of his career for the Clippers , as the son of head coach 's Doc Rivers finished with 38 points on 14 - of - 20 from the field . Lou Williams once again was magnificent from the bench , and the veteran shooting guard contributed with 36 points . But no other Clipper scored on double digits . For instance , DeAndre Jordan grabbed 18 boards but only scored four points .
The Washington Wizards defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 102 - 100 , at FedEx Forum on Friday evening . The Wizards got out to an early start , with a 33 - 24 lead after one . The Grizzlies tightened up a bit in the second , but still trailed 58 - 50 at the half . It looked liked the Wizards ' game as they stretched their lead through the third quarter to take a 87 - 72 lead into the final frame . However , the Grizzlies mounted a huge comeback capped off by a clutch three - pointer by Tyreke Evans , which made it a one - point game , 98 - 97 , for Washington , with 18 seconds left . The Wizards managed to slip away with their fourth straight win by hitting their free throws in the final seconds . Bradley Beal led the way for Washington with 34 points on 9 - of - 18 shooting , in 37 minutes of action . John Wall followed up with 25 points , nine assists , four steals , three rebounds and one block , in 36 minutes . Markieff Morris finished with 12 points and 17 rebounds , while Mike Scott added 10 points on 4 - of - 6 shooting off the bench . The Wizards shot 39 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 27 from long range . Meanwhile , Tyreke Evans was the high - point man for Memphis , with 26 points on 10 - of - 24 shooting , in 31 minutes . Marc Gasol followed up with 17 points , 11 rebounds , five assists and five blocks , in 32 minutes . JaMychal Green added 11 points and five rebounds , while Mario Chalmers chipped in 13 points , four rebounds and three assists , in 27 minutes off the bench . The Grizzlies shot 41 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 30 from long range . The Grizzlies ( 12 - 27 ) will have a few days to get back on track before they play host to the Pelicans on Wednesday . The Wizards ( 23 - 16 ) will be right back in action on Saturday , as they play host to the Bucks .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 105 - 102 , at FedEx Forum on Wednesday evening . The Grizzlies ( 13 - 27 ) and the Pelicans ( 20 - 20 ) played a back - and - forth contest , but ultimately the hosts came out on top since they held on to their advantage in the final quarter . New_Orleans jumped ahead to a 38 - 29 lead in the first quarter , but Memphis flipped the script in the next two quarters to put them ahead by seven points heading into the fourth . The Pelicans woke up in the final minutes and tried to turn things around , but it was too late and Memphis secured a huge win , while the Pelicans dropped back to .500 with the loss . Marc Gasol was the star for the Grizzlies , as the Spanish center contributed with 21 points , 10 rebounds , and seven assists . JaMychal Green also contributed with a double - double since he finished with 20 points and 14 rebounds , including six offensive boards . Tyreke Evans was the top scorer for Memphis , as the versatile player chipped in with 28 points , six rebounds , three assists and two steals . The Pelicans did n't have Anthony Davis due to injury , but DeMarcus Cousins once again picked up the slack since he finished with 31 points and eight rebounds . E'Twaun Moore contributed with 16 points , and Rajon Rondo chipped in with 14 points and three assists . Jrue Holiday filled the stat sheet thanks to 12 points , seven rebounds , and six assists .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 123 - 114 , at FedEx Forum on Monday . Despite the fact that the Lakers got the first lead of the game , that was the only time they led as Memphis were in control from there . In fact , the Grizzlies led by seven points at the end of the first quarter , by 10 at the half and by 20 heading into the fourth quarter . Los_Angeles did respond with a 37 - 26 fourth quarter , but the closest they ever got the game was an eight - point margin . Defensive rebounding was a huge factor , with Memphis winning that battle , 42 - 32 . The shooting disparity was vast as well , with the Grizzlies hitting 51 percent from the field and 46 percent from three , while the Lakers shot under 40 percent from the field and 34 percent from long range . The Lakers ( 15 - 28 ) had to play this game without Lonzo Ball ( knee ) and Brandon Ingram ( ankle ) , as they simply did n't have enough to compete with the Grizzlies . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope did all he could though , as he led them with 27 points , seven rebounds , three assists and two steals . Kyle Kuzma led the bench with 18 points , seven rebounds and five assists . Larry Nance Jr. also played well off the bench , totaling 15 points , 11 rebounds , three steals and three blocks . The Grizzlies ( 14 - 28 ) got a near triple - double out of Tyreke Evans , as he collected 15 points , nine rebounds and 12 assists . Marc Gasol amassed 17 points , seven rebounds and four assists . Dillon Brooks led the team in scoring , accruing 19 points , four rebounds and two assists . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , with Memphis playing host to the New_York Knicks and Los_Angeles traveling to face the Oklahoma_City Thunder .
Thr Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Sacramento Kings , 106 - 88 , at FedEx Forum on Friday . Despite the fact that Sacramento got out to an early lead here , that was the only time they were really in this game . In fact , Memphis dominated the rest of the first quarter , thanks to a 26 - 6 run to end the first , as the Kings never got the lead back from there . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with the Grizzlies handing out six more assists than the Kings while committing eight fewer turnovers . The Kings ( 13 - 32 ) were led by De'Aaron Fox , as he tallied 16 points , two rebounds and six assists . Bogdan Bogdanovic was the only other starter in double figures , as he accrued 15 points , four rebounds and three assists . Vince Carter led the bench in scoring with 15 points , as Buddy Hield provided 13 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals of his own off the bench . The Grizzlies ( 16 - 28 ) got a career - high 22 points out of Dillon Brooks , as he also totaled three rebounds and three steals . Tyreke Evans accumulated 14 points , six rebounds and five assists . Ben McLemore was huge off the bench , amassing 21 points , two rebounds and two assists . On deck for Memphis is a road matchup versus the New_Orleans Pelicans on Saturday . As for Sacramento , they 're off until Monday when they travel to play the Charlotte Hornets .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the visiting Philadelphia 76ers , 105 - 101 , at FedEx Forum The Sixers got out to a great start on the road , with a 30 - 19 lead after the first quarter . They kept the pressure on beginning the second quarter , but the Grizzlies clawed back to cut the deficit to six by halftime . The Grizzlies made it a four - point game early in the third , but the 76ers pulled away again , carrying a double - digit lead for much of the quarter , before going into the fourth up , 83 - 74 . The Grizzlies started their comeback quickly in the fourth quarter , as they tied it up at 91 with 6:57 left in the game . The teams traded buckets for a few minutes , before Memphis pulled ahead by five , with three minutes to go . The Grizz were able to stay a couple steps ahead down the stretch and close out the win . Marc Gasol led the Grizzlies with 19 points , six rebounds and one steal , in 37 minutes . Tyreke Evans followed up with 18 points , eight assists , four rebounds and one steal , in 35 minutes . Mario Chalmers chipped in 17 points , three rebounds and three steals , in 21 minutes off the bench . The Grizzlies shot 42 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 26 from long range . Meanwhile , Dario Saric was the high - point man for the 76ers , with 22 points on 7 - of - 11 shooting , along with 10 rebounds , two assists and a block , in 34 minutes . Joel Embiid tallied 15 points and 14 rebounds , while Timothe Luwawu-Cabarrot finished with 20 points on 6 - of - 9 shooting , in 29 minutes . The 76ers shot 45 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 31 from long range . The Sixers ( 22 - 21 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Bulls on Wednesday . The Grizzlies ( 17 - 29 ) play host to the Spurs on Wednesday .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 108 - 85 , at FedExForum on Wednesday evening . The Spurs ( 32 - 18 ) entered into this game without some key players such as LaMarcus Aldridge , Kawhi Leonard and Manu Ginobili , but they still delivered an impressive , dominant performance on both ends of the court , and did n't have lots of problems to defeat a Grizzlies ( 17 - 30 ) team that looked drastically overmatched from start to finish . In fact , perhaps the best measure of how weak the Grizzlies were was the fact that San_Antonio won every single quarter in this game . They topped the first 22 - 21 , and by halftime the margin was 11 points . It extended to 13 after three , and it ended being a 23 - point differential . Memphis put up some fight in the first and third quarters , but it was n't enough and San_Antonio fully deserved the win as they dominated from start to finish . The Spurs had a very balanced effort on offense , as eight players ended scoring in double digits . Arguably the team 's top player was Pau Gasol , who came one assist shy of a triple - double ( 14 points , 15 rebounds and nine assists ) while Danny Green also added 14 points . Patty Mills led the way with 15 points off the bench , and Bryn Forbes had 14 as well . Davis Bertans had 11 points while starting in place of Aldridge , and the point guard duo of Dejounte Murray ( 11 points , seven assists ) and Tony Parker ( 12 points and four dimes off the bench ) once again worked perfectly . The Grizzlies did n't offer a lot of offense in this game , but Marc Gasol delivered a strong performance thanks to his 18 points and seven rebounds . Dillon Brooks had 10 points and seven boards . Deyonta Davis had 12 points and five rebounds off the bench , while Mario Chalmers filled the stat sheet thanks to eight points , four rebounds , and four assists . Andrew Harrison had nine points and six assists as the starting point guard .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 109 - 100 , at FedExForum on Friday evening . The Clippers ( 24 - 24 ) had a very good performance , and even though the scoreline looked closer than what expected , Los_Angeles ended dominating from start to finish on their way to a solid win against a Grizzlies ( 17 - 31 ) team that could not turn things around when it mattered the most . The Clippers grabbed a four - point after the first quarter , and they extended their advantage to eight points at halftime . Memphis fought back in the third made it close , but the Clippers once again won the final quarter and ended winning comfortably . As it has been the trend all season long , Lou Williams was the biggest star for the Clippers since he finished with 40 points and 10 assists coming off the bench . Blake Griffin delivered a strong performance as well , as he contributed 14 points , eight rebounds , and four assists . Milos Teodosic also delivered a solid effort thanks to 18 points and four assists . DeAndre Jordan added 15 points and nine boards . Six Memphis players scored in double digits , but it was n't enough . Jarell Martin ( 17 points ) and Mario Chalmers ( 17 points , 10 assists off the bench ) led the way for the Grizzlies on offense . However , Marc Gasol 's performance could not go unnoticed since the Spanish center delivered a triple - double of 13 points , 13 rebounds , and 10 assists . Dillon Brooks had 15 points .

The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 121 - 114 , at FedEx Forum on Wednesday . Seven ties and 14 lead changes in the first 20 minutes make this game look much closer than it actually was , as Oklahoma_City dominated in the second half . A 39 - 20 second quarter was the difference for the Thunder , as the Grizzlies never got the lead back in the second half . Oklahoma_City 's ability to get to the free - throw line was the difference in the game , as they connected on 24 - of - 35 while Memphis his just 12 - of - 15 . Strangely , Memphis won the field goal percentage , three - point percentage , free - throw percentage , rebounding and assisting differentials . The Thunder ( 33 - 26 ) were led by Paul George , as he tallied 28 points , six rebounds , four assists and two steals . Russell Westbrook accumulated 23 points , 13 rebounds and 15 assists en route to a triple - double . The Grizzlies ( 18 - 38 ) got a career - high 28 points out of Andrew Harrison , as he added two rebounds and three assists to his tally . Tyreke Evans collected 23 points , nine rebounds and seven assists . Marc Gasol totaled 10 points , six rebounds and nine assists . Memphis is off until February 23 , when they host the Cleveland Cavaliers .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 112 - 89 , at FedEx Forum on Friday . Despite the fact that Memphis led by seven points after the first quarter , Cleveland dominated from there . In fact , the Cavaliers won the other three quarters by at least eight points apiece , as the Grizzlies were never within single - digits in the fourth quarter . Defense was key for Cleveland , as they held Memphis to under 40 percent shooting while forcing 21 turnovers from them . Rebounding was also a huge factor , with Cleveland outrebounding Memphis , 46 - 37 . They also hit 21 - of - 22 free - throws while Memphis connected on just 14 - of - 18 . A 50 - 36 points in the paint advantage was big for the Cavaliers as well . The Cavaliers ( 35 - 23 ) got another triple - double out of LeBron James , as he collected 18 points , 14 rebounds and 11 assists . George Hill totaled 18 points , two rebounds and three blocks . Larry Nance Jr. led the bench with 15 points , eight rebounds , two assists , four steals and two blocks . The Grizzlies ( 18 - 39 ) had no player surpass 15 points scored , as Tyreke Evans led them with 15 points , four rebounds , 10 assists and four steals . JaMychal Green totaled 15 points and 10 rebounds . Marc Gasol accumulated 14 points , nine rebounds and four assists . On deck for Memphis is a road matchup versus the Miami Heat on Saturday . As for Cleveland , they play host to the San_Antonio Spurs on Sunday for their next fixture .

While there were only four ties and two lead changes in this game , it was n't decided until the final minutes . In fact , neither team ever lead by more than 14 points , despite the fact that the Suns led for the entirety of the second half . Defense was key for Phoenix , as they forced 20 turnovers from Memphis while holding them to 38 percent shooting . Much of that can be credited to the 12 steals recorded by the Suns , as a 48 - 34 advantage in the paint was critical as well . The Utah Jazz defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 95 - 78 , at FedEx Forum on Friday evening . The battle between two teams with defensive reputations was expected to be relatively low scoring , but only one of the squads appeared to be playing by the script in the first half . The clearly superior and healthier Jazz ( 36 - 30 ) jumped out to a 50 - 38 halftime lead , one forged in part with a dominant second quarter in which Utah compiled 26 points while limiting the Grizzlies ( 18 - 47 ) to 15 . The 12 - point advantage was more than enough to carry the visitors to a victory , as they continued to play strong defense throughout the second half . Ultimately , the Jazz limited their hosts to a 37 percent success rate from the floor , including 27 percent from distance . Only three players managed to score in double digits for the home squad , which also lost the rebounding battle by a 48 - 39 margin . Jae Crowder surprisingly led the Jazz with 22 points , a total he supplemented with three assists , one rebound , one steal and one block in 34 minutes off the bench . Joe Ingles provided 16 points , five boards , three assists and two steals . Ricky Rubio contributed a 15 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included five assists . Donovan Mitchell clawed his way to 12 points despite a rough shooting night ( 4 - 15 FG ) and also delivered six assists , five rebounds , two steals and one block . Derrick Favors managed 12 points , four boards , three blocks and one steal . Rudy Gobert produced only four points but hauled down 10 rebounds , dished out one assist and recorded a pair of steals and blocks apiece . Dillon Brooks paced the Grizzlies with 18 points , which he complemented with three rebounds and one assist . Ben McLemore followed with 14 points and four boards . Jarrell Martin led the bench with 13 points and also registered five rebounds and one steal . Marc Gasol totaled nine points , 11 rebounds , six assists , four blocks and one steal . Xavier Rathan-Mayes was productive again on the second unit with eight points , one assist , two steals and one block . Kobi Simmons turned in six points , three boards and three assists in another start at point guard . The Jazz remain on the road and next pay a visit to the New_Orleans Pelicans on Sunday afternoon , while the Grizzlies head to the Lone Star State for a Saturday night showdown with the Dallas Mavericks .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 121 - 103 , at FedEx Forum on Monday . The Bucks ( 36 - 31 ) were massive favorites ahead of this game against a struggling Grizzlies ( 18 - 49 ) team that came into this contest riding a 17 - game losing streak , and Milwaukee did n't have problems escaping with a comfortable win on the road . The Bucks quickly jumped to a 32 - 24 lead in the first quarter , and they never looked back . In fact , Milwaukee won the subsequent three quarters ( 32 - 26 , 26 - 23 and 31 - 30 , respectively ) and managed to start their two - game road trip on a positive note . As for Memphis , they extended their losing run to 18 games , and it seems it is not going to stop any time soon . Khris Middleton led the way for the Bucks with 24 points , five rebounds and four assists . Giannis Antetokounmpo added 20 points and five boards , but he also committed seven turnovers . Eric Bledsoe had 14 points , five rebounds and five assists . Tony Snell ( 12 points ) and John Henson ( 11 points and seven boards ) also scored in double digits . Brandon Jennings had a great effort off the bench , with 16 points , 10 assists and eight rebounds after recently signing a 10 - day contract . Marc Gasol was the best player for the Grizzlies , as he finished with 17 points and seven boards . Dillon Brooks and Jarell Martin each had 16 points , but the latter filled the stat sheet since he also added four rebounds and five assists . JaMychal Green chipped in with 11 points , seven boards and two steals . Ben McLemore contributed 16 points ( 6 - 9 FG ) off the bench .

The Bulls maintained the upper hand through the fourth quarter , until the Grizzlies tied it up at 103 with two minutes remaining . The Grizzlies then pulled ahead and held a one - point lead with 2 seconds left . However , Tyreke Evans was called for a foul on three - point shooter , sending Antonio Blakeney to the line , where he went 2 - of - 3 to secure the one - point win for Chicago . It remained tight the rest of the way , with the Grizzlies holding just a two - point advantage with 2:20 left in the game . The Lakers outscored the Grizzlies , 19 - 14 , in the low - scoring third quarter , to tie it up at 71 heading into the fourth .
