The Miami Heat defeated the New_York Knicks in overtime , 107 - 103 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Friday evening . The Heat ( 21 - 17 ) came into Friday 's contest looking to extend a hot streak that had seen them win five of their prior seven games . The first half lent credence to the notion that they 'd accomplish the feat , as they jumped out to a 51 - 45 halftime lead . However , the Knicks ( 18 - 21 ) turned the tables in the second half , producing an almost identical 52 - 46 advantage over that span and forcing overtime on a Doug McDermott 24 - foot three - point jumper with under a second remaining . The home squad then put the clamps on New_York in the extra period , limiting the Knicks to six points and scoring the last four points on free throws from Josh Richardson and James Johnson . Despite the loss , the visitors did outperform the Heat on the offensive side of the stat sheet , posting a 49 percent success rate from the floor - - including 38 percent from three - point range - - while limiting Miami to respective 40 percent and 29 percent tallies . Courtney Lee paced the Knicks with 24 points , a total he supplemented with three rebounds , one assist and two steals . Michael Beasley posted a 20 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and two steals . Kristaps Porzingis supplied 15 points , seven boards , one assist , three blocks and one steal . Enes Kanter registered 14 points , eight boards , two steals and two blocks . Kyle O'Quinn was productive off the bench with 10 points , three rebounds and one assist . Jarrett Jack provided eight points , five assists , two rebounds and one steal . Wayne Ellington led the Heat with a 24 - point total as well and added four rebounds and one steal . Goran Dragic pitched in 19 points , six rebounds and six assists . Richardson totaled 18 points overall , along with two assists , one rebound , three steals and one block . Hassan Whiteside accounted for 12 points , seven boards and two blocks . Kelly Olynyk remained in the starting five and mustered 10 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and one steal . The Knicks next head to the Lone Star State to take on the Mavericks on Sunday evening , while the Heat remain home to take on the Utah Jazz on Sunday afternoon .
The Miami Heat defeated the Utah Jazz , 103 - 102 , at AmericanAirlines Arena on Sunday afternoon . The Heat ( 22 - 17 ) and the Jazz ( 16 - 24 ) put their current streaks on the line in this game , and the contest was decided in the final seconds as both teams went back and forth during the entire game . The Heat jumped ahead 27 - 22 after the first quarter , but Utah won the two subsequent quarter by three points each , thus generating a one - point lead heading into the final 12 minutes . But the Heat stormed back in the fourth , and a lay - up from Josh Richardson with five seconds left secured a huge win at home that extended their winning streak to a season - best four games . Six Miami players scored in double figures , including the entire starting lineup . Josh Richardson not only scored the winning bucket for the Heat , but he also produced a strong display thanks to 14 points , six assists , three rebounds , and two blocks . Hassan Whiteside had 14 points with 11 rebounds . Both Goran Dragic and Tyler Johnson scored 16 points , while Kelly Olynyk chipped in with 12 . Donovan Mitchell missed a potential game - winning shot in the final seconds , but he still led the way offensively for Utah as he finished with 27 points . Derrick Favors had 11 points with 10 rebounds , and Thabo Sefolosha filled the stat sheet admirably after ending with 13 points , six rebounds , three steals , and two assists . Rodney Hood contributed with 17 points off the bench .
The Miami Heat defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 97 - 79 , at AmericanAirlines Arena on Sunday afternoon . The Heat ( 25 - 17 ) had to come from behind in this game against the Bucks ( 22 - 20 ) , but they used a strong second - half performance to cruise their way to a win that ended being harder than what anyone expected . Milwaukee jumped to a two - point advantage in the first quarter and maintained that lead until halftime , but the Heat turned things around in the second half . A 30 - 16 lead in the third quarter pushed Miami ahead , and they closed things out with a 26 - 20 win in the final 12 minutes . Miami kept their winning streak alive with that win , and now they have won their last seven straight games . Hassan Whiteside posted a strong effort for the Heat , as he made an impact on both ends of the court with 15 points , 10 rebounds , and four blocks . Goran Dragic was the team 's top scorer , though , as he finished with 25 points on 9 - of - 17 from the field . Tyler Johnson chipped in with 14 points and six rebounds , while Josh Richardson had 16 points and six boards . Giannis Antetokounmpo was the best player for the Bucks , as he finished with 22 points and six rebounds . Malcolm Brogdon had 15 points and six boards , while Eric Bledsoe contributed with 10 points , four assists , three rebounds and two steals . Khris Middleton ended with 16 points , but he struggled with his shooting after going 3 - of - 16 from the field .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the Miami Heat , 89 - 88 , at AmericanAirlines Arena on Thursday evening . The Kings ( 15 - 33 ) and the Heat ( 27 - 21 ) played a game that went down to the wire in Miami . In fact , as each quarter ended , the game became closer and closer . Sacramento led by two after the first , things were even ( 47 - 47 ) at halftime , and Miami held a one - point advantage ( 72 - 71 ) after three . All signs pointed towards a Miami win late in the fourth quarter , but De'Aaron Fox had other plans . The rookie point guard lifted Sacramento with a game - closing dunk with three seconds left , that allowed the Kings to win their second consecutive win . Meanwhile , Miami have now lost their past two games , and three out of their last four . De'Aaron Fox was the biggest star for Sacramento , as the point guard delivered 14 points , four assists and three rebounds aside from the winning basket . Buddy Hield thrived off the bench , as he scored 24 points while going 10 - for - 15 from the field . Zach Randolph contributed a double - double of 10 rebounds and 10 points . Bogdan Bogdanovic had 11 points , three rebounds , and three assists . Goran Dragic did an excellent job for the Heat , as he finished with 23 points to lead the team offensively . Most of the scoring came off the bench , however , as Wayne Ellington had 20 points with five rebounds , while Justise Winslow ( 11 points ) and Kelly Olynyk ( 10 points ) delivered strong performances as well . Hassan Whiteside had eight points , but added 13 boards .

Orlando won despite being dominated on the boards , being outrebounded , 53 - 39 . Despite the fact that Milwaukee led for the majority of the first half , Miami really took control in the third quarter . In fact , the Heat outscored the Bucks , 30 - 9 , in the third quarter , as that turned a four - point halftime deficit into a 17 - point lead . Rebounding was the difference for Miami , as they outrebounded Milwaukee , 51 - 37 . Much of that rebounding was on the offensive end , with the Heat winning that battle , 13 - 2 . Miami 's bench was also a big factor , as they outscored Milwaukee 's bench 38 - 24 . The Miami Heat defeated the visiting Philadelphia 76ers , 102 - 101 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Tuesday evening . The Sixers got out to a good start on the road , as they led for most of the first quarter and held on to lead 24 - 17 heading into the second . They expanded their lead to 10 early in the second quarter , however the Heat began chipping away and tied it up at 34 with 4:44 left in the half . However , the 76ers did not fold , and took a 48 - 45 lead into the half . The 76ers maintained a small advantage through most of the third quarter , but the Heat kept it close , and ended up outscoring Philadelphia 28 - 27 in the quarter to narrow the deficit to two , 75 - 73 , heading into the final frame . The Sixers made another push to start the fourth , expanding their lead to 10 once again , however the Heat used an 11 - 1 run to tie it up at 87 with just under five minutes to go . The game stayed tight down to the wire , tied at 100 with 23 seconds left . Ben Simmons knocked down one - of - two free throws to take a one - point advantage , setting the stage for vintage Dwyane Wade to come through in the final seconds with a game - winning jumper . Wade led the Heat with 27 points on 10 - of - 16 shooting , in 25 minutes off the bench . Goran Dragic followed up with 21 points , six rebounds and five assists , in 33 minutes , while Hassan Whiteside tallied 15 points , 11 rebounds , three assists , three steals and three blocks , in 33 minutes . The Heat shot 44 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 27 from long range . Meanwhile , Joel Embiid led Philly with 23 points , eight rebounds , four assists and one steal , in 30 minutes . Dario Saric followed up with 21 points , seven rebounds , two assists and one steal , while J.J. Redick tallied 15 points , four assists , three rebounds and one steal . The Sixers shot 42 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 31 from long range . The 76ers ( 32 - 27 ) will look to bounce back , as they take on the Cavaliers in Cleveland on Thursday . The Heat ( 32 - 29 ) play host to the Lakers on Thursday .

The game started out close and was tight for most of the first quarter , with the Heat breaking out to a 10 - point lead before the Suns closed the gap to trail 30 - 27 entering the second . The Heat pulled ahead to a seven - point lead four minutes into the second quarter and kept the advantage for the rest of the quarter , expanding to a 13 - point lead by halftime . The Heat stayed on top through the third quarter and expanded their lead to as many as 20 , before settling on a 93 - 80 lead entering the final frame . The fourth quarter was no contest as Miami stayed on top , while outscoring the Suns 32 - 23 in the quarter to cruise to a much - needed win . Hassan Whiteside led the Heat with 24 points , 14 rebounds , three blocks , two assists and two steals , in 24 minutes of action . Goran Dragic followed up with 17 points , five assists and one rebound , while Justise Winslow added 12 points , 12 rebounds , five assists and four steals , in 31 minutes off the bench . Warren followed up with 19 points , four rebounds , two assists and one steal , while Marquese Chriss added 12 points , six rebounds , one assist and one block , in 27 minutes off the bench . The Heat ( 34 - 30 ) will be right back in action as they take on the Wizards in Washington on Tuesday .
The Miami Heat defeated the Philadelphia 76ers at American_Airlines_Arena on Thursday evening . The Heat ( 35 - 29 ) came into Thursday 's contest looking to notch their second win over the 76ers ( 35 - 29 ) in the last six games , but they likely figured Philadelphia would have some revenge on their minds after the narrow one - point loss they 'd suffered at Miami 's hands on their home court . The first quarter was as competitive as expected , with the hosts eeking out a 29 - 28 advantage . They 'd forged a 53 - 49 edge by intermission , but gave it all back in a third period where the visitors racked up 25 points to the Heat 's 20 . That gave Philadelphia the one - point lead heading into the final 12 minutes , but the home squad would quickly pull ahead and then ultimately hold off the Sixers when they got as close as 101 - 96 with 1:24 remaining . The Heat got it done with superior shooting and stingy defense on the other end , as they posted a 47 percent success rate while limiting Philly to a 40 percent figure . Goran Dragic had a rough shooting night ( 3 - 13 FG ) on his way to seven points , seven assists , five rebounds and three steals . Justise Winslow contributed nine points , six boards , two assists , two blocks and one steal in 27 minutes off the bench . The 76ers pay a visit to the Brooklyn Nets on Sunday evening , while the Heat remains home to tangle with the Washington Wizards on Saturday night .
The Miami Heat defeated the Denver Nuggets 149 - 141 in double overtime on Monday at American_Airlines_Arena . Four quarters were n't enough for these two teams fighting for a playoff spot Monday night . After a game - tying layup from Nikola Jokic sent the game into its first extra period , the Heat and Nuggets would go scoreless for the final minute of overtime and go to a second one . From there , the Miami was able to pull away , outscoring Denver 18 - 10 in the final five minutes . James Johnson put on a brilliant performance in the 58 - minute game , scoring a team - high 31 points on 13 - of - 17 shooting to go along with 11 rebounds and six assists . Kelly Olynyk was n't too far behind , with the big man coming off the bench to score 30 points in 41 minutes in addition to 11 rebounds and six assists . As a team , the Heat were absolutely on fire from behind the arc , and their sharp shooting allowed them to keep pace with the high - scoring Denver offense . Miami shot a scorching 20 - of - 36 from behind the arc Monday and 55 percent from the field overall . As for the Nuggets , they still managed to hit 18 threes as a team and shoot an impressive 47 percent from behind the arc , but it would n't be enough to keep up . Jokic accounted for four of those made threes and finishing with a game - high 34 points to go along with 14 rebounds in 48 minutes . Wilson Chandler had one of his best offensive performances of the season , ringing in 26 points on 11 - of - 16 shooting from the field . It was a decent outing from the team 's starting five overall , with the unit accounting for 119 of the Nuggets ' 141 points Monday .
The Miami Heat defeated the New_York Knicks , 119 - 98 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Wednesday evening . The Heat ( 39 - 33 ) came into the contest with a markedly better record than their opponent , but also likely with a wary eye . The Knicks ( 26 - 46 ) were likely to have at least a bit of a spoiler mentality , and they certainly would n't have minded extending a modest two - game winning streak , either . Whatever concerns Miami may have had seemed to play out in a first quarter where New_York hung with them bucket for bucket , but the home squad began to exert its will and superiority in the second . A 37 - point surge on their part afforded them a 17 - point halftime lead , an edge they 'd kicked up to 22 by the end of the third period . That guaranteed that simply treading water over the final 12 minutes would do the trick , and sure enough , the Heat finished with a 21 - point margin of victory . Despite having played a grueling double - overtime marathon against the Nuggets just two nights prior , the hosts still saw six players hit double digits in the scoring column , with the second unit contributing an impressive 62 points . Miami was also highly efficient , draining 56 percent of their 81 attempts . One player who always seems to bring the goods each night for the Knicks irrespective of circumstance is Enes Kanter , and accordingly , he led the way with a 23 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and two steals . Michael Beasley unsurprisingly played well against the team that originally drafted him , managing 22 points , seven rebounds , three assists and one steal . Trey Burke produced a bench - leading 16 points and supplemented them with seven boards and two assists . Tim Hardaway , Jr. poured in 12 points and also supplied three rebounds , one assist and one steal . Emmanuel Mudiay drew the start at point guard and shot just 3 - for - 10 on his way to eight points , four rebounds , four assists and two steals . Tyler Johnson and Kelly Olynyk paced the Heat with matching 22 - point tallies from the first unit and bench , respectively . Johnson also mustered two rebounds and two assists , while Olynyk dished out 10 assists , ripped down five rebounds and recorded one steal . Wayne Ellington generated 16 points , four boards , one assist and one steal . Justise Winslow finished with 15 points , two assists and one rebound . Goran Dragic registered 14 points , five assists and two rebounds . Josh Richardson delivered 12 points , five assists , three rebounds , three steals and one block . James Johnson could n't come anywhere near his 31 - point explosion against Denver on Monday , totaling just three points , six assists , five rebounds , one steal and one block . The Knicks return home and tangle with the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday evening , while the Heat pay a visit to the Oklahoma_City Thunder on that same night .
The Miami Heat defeated the Chicago Bulls , 102 - 93 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Thursday . The Heat ( 41 - 35 ) are quite close to clinch a playoff berth after this win , and all they require is either one more win , or one loss from the Detroit Pistons to secure their 20th playoff trip in 30 seasons . This time they did n't have problems to dominate the Bulls ( 24 - 51 ) , as they jumped to a 29 - 21 lead in the first quarter and never looked back . Chicago answered with a 25 - 22 second quarter , but Miami did n't slow down and won the remaining two quarters , 27 - 22 and 25 - 24 , to come away with a comfortable win that puts them on the verge of reaching the playoffs once again . Josh Richardson led the way for Miami with 22 points , while Goran Dragic added 17 points , five rebounds and five assists . Justise Winslow had 13 with nine rebounds and Kelly Olynyk registered 11 points , both coming off the bench . Hassan Whiteside had eight points , seven rebounds , and four assists so he filled the stat sheet quite nicely despite his low - scoring output . Six Chicago players scored in double digits , but it was n't enough and they ended losing either way . David Nwaba was the top scorer with 15 points , seven boards and four assists , while Noah Voleh had a strong double double of 14 points and 13 rebounds . Robin Lopez and Justin Holiday added 13 points , same tally that had Bobby Portis , although the latter also added 16 rebounds off the bench . Cameron Payne delivered 11 points and five assists .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the host Miami Heat , 110 - 109 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Saturday evening . The Heat got out to a solid start at home , as they led for almost the entire first quarter and amassed a 32 - 22 lead heading into the second . They led for most of the second quarter , until the Nets made it a two - point game with 3:44 left in the quarter . However , the Heat closed the quarter on a 10 - 5 run , to bring their lead to 55 - 48 at halftime . Brooklyn came out strong in the third and tied it up at 59 just four minutes into the quarter . They kept the pressure on and outscored the Heat 32 - 21 in the quarter , to take an 80 - 76 lead into the fourth . Brooklyn led for most of the fourth , but the Heat clawed back to make it a one - point game with 3:5 remaining . The teams exchanged baskets , culminating with Dwyane Wade sinking the game - tying free throw with 59 seconds left . There was no scoring for the final minute , sending the game to OT . They exchanged buckets once again in overtime , until Caris LeVert hit the go - ahead shot for the Nets with 34 seconds left , leaving the Nets to win it with their defense on the final possession . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson led the Nets with 20 points , 14 rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block , in 39 minutes . Caris LeVert followed up with 19 points , 12 rebounds , eight assists , two steals and one block , in 34 minutes off the bench . Jarrett Allen tallied 12 points , three rebounds , two blocks , one assist and one steal . The Nets shot 43 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 35 from long range . Meanwhile , Goran Dragic and James Johnson finished with 18 points each , while Hassan Whiteside tallied 14 points , eight rebounds , two blocks and one steal . Dwyane Wade chipped in 13 points , four rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block , in 27 minutes off the bench . The Heat shot 46 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 18 from long range . The Heat ( 41 - 36 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Hawks on Tuesday . The Nets ( 25 - 51 ) play host to the Pistons on Sunday .
The Miami Heat defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 101 - 98 , at AmericanAirlines Arena on Tuesday . The Heat ( 42 - 36 ) secured a winning record and a playoff spot in this huge win against a Hawks ( 22 - 56 ) team that made things complicated at times , but ultimately Miami managed to escape with the win thanks to a great performance during the second half . Miami jumped to a 30 - 25 lead in the first quarter , but Atlanta stormed back and with a 31 - 22 lead they jumped ahead at half time ( 56 - 52 ) . Miami responded with a 26 - 22 third quarter that left the game tied at 78 , but Miami came through in the clutch . A 23 - 20 fourth - quarter win gave the Heat not only the win , but also a much - deserved playoff spot . Goran Dragic was the top scorer for the Heat , as he finished with 22 points , 11 rebounds , three steals and two assists . Hassan Whiteside had a very good performance as well , as he chipped in with 18 points and 12 boards . Tyler Johnson had 12 points , three rebounds and three assists , and James Johnson delivered 10 points , six assists and three steals . Dwyane Wade had 11 points and six assists off the bench . Five Atlanta players scored in double digits , but that was n't enough to secure what would 've been an upset win over Miami . John Collins was the team 's top player with 19 points and 11 rebounds , and Damion Lee delivered 16 points , nine boards , four assists and three steals . Isaiah Taylor had 15 points with nine assists . Tyler Dorsey had 18 points , six rebounds , and four assists .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Miami Heat , 115 - 93 , at AmericanAirlines Arena on Monday . The Thunder ( 47 - 34 ) knew they were fighting for their playoff chances down the stretch , but that was n't clear right from tip - off . It was n't noticeable that the Heat ( 43 - 38 ) had already clinched a berth in the Eastern_Conference , either , as Miami had no problems to tame Oklahoma_City early on . The Heat quickly jumped to a 27 - 21 lead in the first quarter , and they managed to hold on to their lead after the second ( 25 - 28 ) and third quarters ( 29 - 27 ) . But Thunder turned things around with an awesome fourth quarter ( 39 - 12 ) that not only sealed them a huge road win , but also clinched a playoff spot in the Western_Conference . Paul George was the top scorer for the Thunder , as he finished with 27 points ( 7 - of - 19 FG ) and three rebounds . Russell Westbrook did his part too , and he finished with a strong triple - double of 23 points , 18 rebounds and 13 assists . Carmelo Anthony chipped in with 11 points , but he only went 4 - of - 11 from the field . Jerami Grant had 17 points and five boards in 21 minutes coming off the bench . Josh Richardson led the way for Miami with 18 points , three rebounds and three assists . Hassan Whiteside had 16 points and eight boards . Tyler Johnson delivered 12 points , four boards and four dimes . Justise Winslow chipped in with 12 points and nine rebounds in 34 minutes off the bench . Goran Dragic struggled , however , and only had four points on 2 - of - 10 from the field though he did add seven assists .
The Miami Heat defeated the Toronto Raptors in overtime , 116 - 109 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Wednesday . While there was n't a whole lot to play for between these Eastern_Conference playoff teams , they left it all on the line in this overtime thriller . In fact , there were 10 ties and 25 lead changes in total , as neither club led by more than 11 points . Miami really dominated the overtime session , outscoring Toronto , 11 - 4 . Rebounding was huge for the Heat , as they outrebounded the Raptors , 56 - 47 . Much of that came on the offensive end , with Miami winning that battle , 19 - 9 . Three-point shooting was also decisive , with the Heat hitting 11 - of - 26 and Toronto connecting on just 9 - of - 30 . The Raptors ( 59 - 23 ) got a near triple - double out of Kyle Lowry , as he collected 28 points , 10 rebounds and nine assists to lead the way . DeMar DeRozan totaled 19 points , six rebounds and three assists . Jonas Valanciunas amassed 12 points , seven rebounds , two assists and three blocks . Jakob Poeltl led the bench with 16 points , 12 rebounds , three steals and two blocks . The Heat ( 44 - 38 ) were led by Wayne Ellington , as he provided 32 points on 12 - of - 16 shooting off the bench . James Johnson led the starters with 11 points , six rebounds and four assists . Tyler Johnson accrued 11 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Hassan Whiteside generated 10 points , 12 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Toronto finished with the number - one seed in the Eastern_Conference while Miami finished seventh . The Heat will face the Boston Celtics in the playoffs while the Raptors will square off with the Washington Wizards .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Denver Nuggets , 110 - 93 , at Spectrum_Center on Wednesday evening . The Hornets ( 2 - 2 ) utilized the always effective combination of strong shooting and swarming defense to secure the comfortable win , one that saw them jump out to a 62 - 39 halftime lead on the strength of a particularly dominant second quarter . Charlotte held the Nuggets ( 1 - 3 ) to 38 percent shooting , including 26 percent from three - point range . The home squad also maximized its bench , as the second unit contributed 49 points to the victory . The highest scoring tally for any individual Charlotte player actually came from a reserve , as Frank Kaminsky led the way with 20 points , a total he supplemented with four rebounds , three assists and a block . Nikola Jokic and Gary Harris paced Denver with matching 18 - point contributions , with the former adding 11 rebounds and the latter supplying two rebounds , one assist and one steal . Jamal Murray followed with 16 points , five assists , three rebounds and one steal . Will Barton led the bench with nine points , seven rebounds , six assists and one steal . Mason Plumlee was productive on the second unit as well , posting eight points , 10 rebounds and three steals . Forwards Paul Millsap ( eight points , five rebounds ) and Wilson Chandler ( seven points , five rebounds , five assists ) could n't get much going offensively , going a combined 6 - for - 19 from the field . Kemba Walker followed Kaminsky with 19 points , five assists and four rebounds . Malik Monk poured in 17 off the bench , a total he complemented with two rebounds , two assists and two steals . Jeremy Lamb totaled 16 points , five assists , two rebounds , a steal and a block . Dwight Howard registered a 15 - point , 19 - rebound double - double that also included a pair of blocks . Marvin Williams pitched in with nine points , four rebounds and two steals . The Nuggets continue on the road and next head to Atlanta to do battle with the Hawks on Friday evening , while the Hornets remain home to face the Houston Rockets on that same night .
The Houston Rockets defeated the host Charlotte Hornets , 109 - 93 , at Spectrum_Center on Friday evening . The Hornets ( 2 - 3 ) got out to a promising start , leading by three after the first quarter , however the Rockets ( 5 - 1 ) fired back , outscoring the Hornets 29 - 16 in the second quarter and took a 56 - 46 lead into the half . The Hornets came out strong in the third and trimmed the deficit to four points heading into the final frame . The fourth quarter belonged to the Rockets , as they outscored the Hornets 31 - 19 with a barrage of three - point shooting . James Harden led the way for the Rockets by notching his first triple - double of the season with 27 points , 11 assists and 10 assists , in 36 minutes . Eric Gordon went 9 - of - 22 from the field and played a key role in the win , with 26 points , in 38 minutes . Ryan Anderson also came up large , as he poured in 21 points on 7 - of - 16 shooting . P.J . Tucker provided good energy off the bench , with nine points , 13 rebounds , two assists and one block , in 37 minutes . Meanwhile , Kemba Walker was the high - point man for the Hornets , with 26 points on 8 - of - 22 shooting . Dwight Howard went beast mode against his former team , with 19 points and 16 rebounds , in 31 minutes . Jeremy Lamb added 20 points , while Malik Monk chipped in 10 points in 27 minutes off the bench . The Hornets shot 37 percent from the field in the contest and despite Howard 's best efforts , were out - rebounded by the smaller opponent . The Hornets have a chance to bounce back when they play host to the Magic on Sunday . The Rockets will be right back in action as they take on the Grizzlies in Memphis on Saturday .
The host Charlotte Hornets defeated the visiting Orlando Magic , 120 - 113 , on Sunday afternoon . Charlotte ( 3 - 3 ) enjoyed what was easily its best offensive night of the season thus far . All-Star point guard Kemba Walker delivered his strongest outing of the new season , leading the team with 34 points and 10 assists . Walker 's early production helped the Hornets gain an early double - digit lead in the first quarter , which they were able to maintain to varying degrees for the remainder of the game . Despite never fully pulling away , the Hornets played consistently well throughout the game . Charlotte dominated Orlando on the glass , finishing with a 59 to 40 rebounding advantage . On offense , the team finished shooting over 54 percent from the floor and had all five starters score in double figures , including three who scored at least 20 points . Veteran center Dwight Howard entered the game averaging a league - best 18 rebounds per game . Though he posted his season low , pulling down only 10 , he was able to earn his sixth consecutive double - double as he scored 22 points . Howard and fellow veteran big man Marvin Williams were crucial to the win , as the duo combined for 35 points and 21 rebounds on 15 - of - 21 shooting . Orlando ( 4 - 2 ) , meanwhile , entered the matchup atop the Eastern_Conference thanks to what has been an unexpectedly successful start to the season . The Magic boasted the second - best offensive rating in the league before visiting Charlotte and continued to look strong on offense despite the loss . Orlando splashed home 11 three - pointers and knocked down 20 free - throws , excelling at reaching the line throughout the game . Breakout stars Evan Fournier and Aaron Gordon , who entered the game averaging over 22 points per game each , impressed once again . The duo combined for 40 points , while Gordon blocked two shots and came away with two steals . The Magic 's top performer , though , proved to be bench wing Jonathan Simmons . Simmons scored a whopping 27 points in just 32 minutes off the bench . Thanks to strong play from Simmons and the second unit , Charlotte 's lead was never able to remain safe despite the game 's final outcome . The Hornets will visit Memphis on Monday , while the Magic will visit New_Orleans .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 126 - 121 , at Spectrum_Center on Wednesday evening . The contest had the vibe of a shootout right from the opening quarter , with the Bucks ( 4 - 4 ) emerging from the period with a 32 - 25 advantage . The Hornets ( 5 - 3 ) turned the tables in the second period and forged a 60 - 57 halftime lead . The two teams began the fourth quarter deadlocked at 88 - 88 and a 13 - 4 run by Charlotte over the opening 3:12 of the period gave them a 101 - 92 lead . They owned a 113 - 98 edge with 5:23 remaining before a 23 - 13 run by Milwaukee made matters interesting . However , two clutch free throws by Jeremy Lamb with four seconds left and the home squad clinging to a three - point lead helped to seal the hard - fought win . As the final score implied , the game featured impressive shooting efforts by both clubs , with the Hornets ' 54 percent success rate ( including 56 percent from three - point range ) slightly outpacing the Bucks ' 50 percent overall figure , which included a 53 percent tally from long distance . Turnovers are the area in which Charlotte distanced itself , as it committed 18 but elicited 25 from Milwaukee . Khris Middleton led the Bucks with a game - high ( and career - high ) 43 points , along with seven assists and five rebounds . Malcolm Brogdon managed 20 points , four assists and one rebound . Tony Snell provided 17 points , three assists and two rebounds . Giannis Antetokounmpo turned in a 14 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included five assists , two steals and two blocks . Mirza Teletovic led the bench with 12 points , which he complemented with four rebounds and one assist . Kemba Walker paced the Hornets with 26 points , three assists , two rebounds and one block . Rookie Malik Monk followed with a career - high 25 points off the bench , a total he supplemented with two rebounds , one assist and one steal . Dwight Howard supplied a 17 - point , 11 - rebound double - double , along with three assists and one steal . Lamb poured in 16 points overall and also contributed four rebounds and two assists . Marvin Williams managed 15 points , four rebounds and one steal . Frank Kaminsky and Dwayne Bacon were productive on the second unit as well with 11 and 10 points , respectively . The Bucks next head to the Motor City to tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Friday night while the Hornets visit the San_Antonio Spurs on that same night .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 118 - 102 , at Spectrum_Center on Monday night . The Hornets ( 7 - 9 ) came into Monday 's contest having just emerged from a six - game losing streak and looking to start stringing together consecutive wins after a rather uneven start to their season . They faced an uphill battle despite being at home , considering the Timberwolves ( 10 - 7 ) had gotten off to a solid start on the strength of an impressive array of offseason acquisitions . The contest was unsurprisingly a hard - fought one throughout , but a 34 - point fourth quarter finally gave Charlotte some breathing room and ultimately led to a 16 - point margin of victory . Their work on the glass was pivotal , as they outrebounded the visitors by a 52 - 38 margin . Dwight Howard was the team MVP on the night in that regard and overall , as he led the way with a 25 - point , 20 - rebound double - double that also included four blocks . Jamal Crawford paced the Timberwolves with 19 points in 18 minutes off the bench , a total he supplemented with two rebounds and two assists . Jeff Teague provided 18 points , two rebounds , two assists , three steals and three blocks . Karl-Anthony Towns matched Teague 's point total and added 12 rebounds , two assists and one block . Jimmy Butler posted 14 points , seven rebounds and one steal . Andrew Wiggins supplied 11 points , two assists , one rebound and one steal . Taj Gibson notably scored just one point on a free throw and added six rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Frank Kaminsky was right behind Howard with 24 points in 22 minutes off the bench , and he added three rebounds and three assists . Nicolas Batum totaled 17 points , four rebounds , two assists and two steals . Jeremy Lamb was productive on the second unit as well , pouring in 16 points and complementing them with five rebounds , three assists and one steal . Kemba Walker managed 14 points , four rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Cody Zeller turned in 10 points , four rebounds and two assists . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist posted eight points , three boards , one assist and two blocks . The Timberwolves return home to face the Orlando Magic on Wednesday night , while the Hornets remain home to face the Washington Wizards on that same evening .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Washington Wizards , 129 - 124 , in overtime at Spectrum_Center on Wednesday night . The back - and - forth affair saw the Hornets ( 8 - 9 ) enter the fourth quarter trailing 88 - 84 and falling behind by as much as 111 - 102 with 3:32 remaining . However , a 12 - 3 Charlotte run to close out regulation - - capped by a pair of game - tying free throws from Kemba Walker with two seconds left - - sent the contest into overtime . A Walker 26 - foot three - pointer with 3:20 remaining in overtime gave the Hornets a 119 - 116 lead that they would n't relinquish , sending the Wizards ( 10 - 8 ) losers for the third time in the last four contests . Both teams enjoyed strong shooting nights , with Washington posting a 48 percent success rate from the field and the home squad draining 47 percent of their 91 shot attempts . John Wall led the Wizards with 31 points , a total he supplemented with 11 assists , one rebound , one steal and one block . Bradley Beal followed with 22 points , four rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Markieff Morris managed 14 points , eight boards , one assist and one block . Mike Scott tallied a bench - leading 13 points , along with four rebounds . Otto Porter , Jr. pitched in with 12 points , four rebounds and one assist . Marcin Gortat mustered a modest eight points but hauled in 11 rebounds , dished out three assists and recorded two blocks . Dwight Howard paced the Hornets with a 26 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and one block . Walker followed with 24 points , five rebounds and five assists . Jeremy Lamb matched Walker 's scoring total off the bench and added seven rebounds , five assists and three blocks . The forward duo of Michael Kidd-Gilchrist and Marvin Williams contributed matching 12 - point tallies , with the former also posting seven rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block , and the latter registering four rebounds , four assists and one steal . Frank Kaminsky was productive off the bench with 12 points , five boards and two assists . Michael Carter-Williams pitched in 11 points and three steals in 18 minutes . The Wizards next take the court on Saturday night at home against the Portland Trail_Blazers , while the Hornets visit the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday evening .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the host Charlotte Hornets , 106 - 86 , at Spectrum_Center on Saturday . Nine lead changes in the first half shows a competitive game , but San_Antonio really took control late in the second quarter . In fact , the Spurs turned a four - point deficit into an 11 - point lead in a five - minute span in the second quarter . Charlotte could never recover from there , as San_Antonio held a double - digit lead for the final 20 minutes . Defense was key for San_Antonio , as they held Charlotte to 37 percent from the field and 16 percent from three - point range . Defensive rebounding was a huge factor for the Spurs , as they outrebounded the Hornets , 37 - 28 . The Spurs ( 12 - 7 ) were led by Pau Gasol , as he tallied 17 points , seven rebounds , three assists and two blocks . LaMarcus Aldridge matched those 17 points , adding seven rebounds , four assists and two steals to his line . Kyle Anderson accrued 14 points , five rebounds and three assists . Rudy Gay led the bench with 15 points , six rebounds , four assists and two steals . The Hornets ( 8 - 11 ) had no player score more than 18 points , as they only had four players reach double figures in scoring . Kemba Walker was that player , as he totaled 18 points , three rebounds and five assists . Dwight Howard amassed 10 points and 11 rebounds . Frank Kaminsky and Jeremy Lamb each scored 12 points a piece off the bench . On deck for San_Antonio is a home matchup against the Dallas Mavericks . As for Charlotte , they 're off until Wednesday , when they travel to play the Toronto Raptors .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Orlando Magic , 104 - 94 , at Spectrum_Center on Monday evening . The Hornets ( 9 - 13 ) checked into Monday having lost four consecutive contests , but also buoyed by the good news that they would be getting All-Star point guard Kemba Walker ( shoulder ) back after a two - game absence . That return proved to be pivotal to their win , as Walker produced a game - high 29 points , a total he complemented with seven assists , two rebounds , three steals and one block . While his 7 - for - 16 tally from the field was actually slightly below average , Walker made up for it by successfully converting all 14 of his game - high free - throw attempts into points . Charlotte also enjoyed a significant 52 - 40 rebounding advantage over the Magic ( 10 - 15 ) , which posted no more than 23 points in three of four quarters despite seeing all five starters manage double digits in the scoring column . Orlando was paced by Evan Fournier , who poured in 18 points and added three boards and two assists . Jonathon Simmons followed with 15 points , six rebounds , one assist and one steal . Aaron Gordon was next with 14 points , six boards , three assists , one steal and one block . D.J . Augustin generated a bench - leading 13 points , along with five rebounds , two assists and one steal . Elfrid Payton supplied 11 points , seven assists , four rebounds and one block . Nikola Vucevic filled out the stat sheet with 10 points , eight rebounds , five assists , two steals and two blocks . Frank Kaminsky was a distant second behind Walker with a 14 - point total that led the second unit . He also registered nine boards , one assist and one steal . Dwight Howard fell just short of a double - double with 12 points , nine rebounds , one assist and one steal . Jeremy Lamb matched Howard 's scoring total off the bench and also provided two rebounds , one assist and one steal . Nicolas Batum and Michael Kidd-Gilchrist produced matching 11 - point tallies , with the former adding 11 boards , five assists , one steal and one block , and the latter collecting eight rebounds , a pair of steals and a block . The Magic head back home to face the Atlanta Hawks on Wednesday night , while the Hornets remain home to tangle with the Golden_State Warriors on Wednesday evening as well .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the hosting Charlotte Hornets , 101 - 87 , at Spectrum_Center on Wednesday evening . The Warriors ( 20 - 6 ) were forced to make adjustments in this game due to Stephen Curry 's ankle injury , but his absence was n't felt in this game . The reigning NBA champions dominated once again , and cruised their way against a Hornets ( 9 - 14 ) team that failed to get things going throughout the entire contest . Golden_State built a 15 - point lead at half time , and even though Charlotte came close to 11 after three and at seven points during the fourth , the Dubs pulled away for good late in the game , and ended winning comfortably . As a result , the Warriors won for the fifth straight time during their current road trip . Kevin Durant was the star for Golden_State in the absence of Curry , as the all - star forward finished with a triple - double of 35 points , 11 rebounds , and 10 assists . Klay Thompson added 22 points while shooting 4 - of - 7 from three - point range , and both players did the heavy lifting for Golden_State 's offense . Nick Young finished with 10 points off the bench , while Quinn Cook contributed with eight points starting in place of Curry . Kemba Walker led the way for the Hornets with 24 points , eight rebounds , and five assists . Dwight Howard added 14 points and seven boards , while Nicolas Batum contributed with 15 points , five rebounds , four assists , and two steals , making an impact on both ends of the court . But the bench failed to appear , as they only tallied 21 points as a unit between eight players .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the Charlotte Hornets in overtime , 119 - 111 , at Spectrum_Center on Friday night . The Bulls ( 4 - 20 ) came into Friday 's contest with a 10 - game losing streak in tow , and the prospects of snapping it considerably low against a Hornets ( 9 - 15 ) squad that had secured eight of their nine wins at home . However , they ultimately defied the odds , although it was n't without difficulty . After erasing a 79 - 75 deficit at the beginning of the fourth quarter with an 80 run , Chicago ultimately traded the lead back and forth with Charlotte throughout the final period and fouled Kemba Walker with five seconds remaining in regulation , setting up a pair of game - tying free throws by the latter . However , the Bulls buckled down in the extra period and outscored their hosts by a 6 - 1 margin over the final 1:56 of overtime to secure the win . They snapped their inauspicious streak with some excellent shooting and rebounding , as they posted a 48 percent success rate from the field and hauled in 56 boards . Lauri Markkanen paced Chicago with a 24 - point , 12 - rebound double - double . Kris Dunn supplied 20 points , 12 assists , six rebounds and three steals . Robin Lopez provided a 19 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and one block . Justin Holiday filled out the stat sheet with 17 points , eight rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks . David Nwaba led the bench with 11 points , six rebounds , four assists and three blocks . Bobby Portis was productive on the second unit with nine points and four boards . Dwight Howard exploded for a 25 - point , 20 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , six blocks and one steal . Walker followed with 20 points , five assists , two rebounds and one steal . Marvin Williams generated a near double - double of 17 points , nine boards , one assist , one steal and one block . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist registered 15 points , seven rebounds , two assists and one block . Troy Graham led the bench with 12 points , two rebounds and two assists . Nicolas Batum managed nine points , 10 assists , six rebounds , one steal and one block . The Bulls head back home to tangle with the New_York Knicks on Saturday night , while the Hornets remain home to tangle with the Los_Angeles Lakers on Saturday evening as well .
The Miami Heat defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 104 - 98 , at Spectrum_Center on Friday night . The Heat ( 14 - 14 ) came into Friday 's game looking to put a tough 102 - 95 home loss to the Portland Trail_Blazers on Wednesday night behind them . They got off to a fast start in that regard , forging a 24 - 19 lead in the first quarter that had grown slightly to 53 - 47 by halftime . Miami was able to get the job done with balanced contributions all throughout their roster , as the starters just edged out the reserves by a 53 - 51 margin in terms of scoring . They also were sharp from the field , posting a 50 percent success rate from the field overall while limiting the Hornets ( 10 - 18 ) to a 41 percent figure . Tyler Johnson co - led the Heat with 16 points , a total he supplemented with two rebounds , one assist and one block in 26 minutes off the bench . Dion Waiters led the first unit with 12 points and added six assists , four rebounds , one steal and one block . The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 93 - 91 , at Spectrum_Center on Saturday evening . The Trail_Blazers ( 16 - 13 ) were looking to continue building some momentum as December enters its second half , as they came into Saturday as winners of two straight after a pair of wins in the Sunshine State over the Heat and Magic . The Hornets ( 10 - 19 ) may have looked like relatively easy targets on paper , considering they 'd suffered an extended stretch of inept play . However , after a tightly contested first quarter , Portland appeared to pull away in the second to forge a 49 - 37 halftime advantage . Nevertheless , the home squad would n't be deterred , putting together an impressive second - half rally that saw them down by a razor - thin 92 - 91 margin with 1:18 remaining following a Kemba Walker step - back jumper . C.J . McCollum was able to drain the second of two free throws for the visitors with 16 seconds left , and Walker ultimately misfired on a would - be game - winning three - point attempt at the buzzer to seal the Trail_Blazers ' third straight win . McCollum led Portland with 25 points , a total he supplemented with three assists and two rebounds . Damian Lillard followed with an 18 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included seven rebounds and one steal . Jusuf Nurkic produced 14 points , five rebounds and one block . Evan Turner supplied nine points , seven rebounds and two assists . Al-Farouq Aminu mustered only two points , three rebounds and two blocks , and he missed two free throws with three seconds left that would have given the Trail_Blazers some much - needed breathing room . Shabazz Napier led the bench with nine points . Nicolas Batum paced the Hornets with 23 points and added five assists and four rebounds . Jeremy Lamb followed with a bench - leading 15 points , which he complemented with four rebounds . However , he missed a 29 - foot three - point jumper with four seconds left that would have given Charlotte a 94 - 93 lead . Walker provided 14 points , six rebounds , six assists and two steals . Marvin Williams tallied 10 points and four rebounds . Dwight Howard mustered nine points but also hauled in 15 rebounds , dished out four assists , recorded two steals and posted one block . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist matched Howard 's scoring total and added eight boards and one steal . The Trail_Blazers remain on the road and do battle with the Minnesota Timberwolves on Monday evening , while the Hornets remain home and await the New_York Knicks for a Monday night showdown as well .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the New_York Knicks , 109 - 91 , at Spectrum_Center on Monday evening . The Hornets ( 11 - 19 ) came into Monday 's contest in desperate need of a victory , as they 'd come up short in six of their previous seven games . They caught a break coming in , as the Knicks ( 16 - 14 ) declared star power forward Kristaps Porzingis out with a knee injury for the second consecutive game . That gave Charlotte a path of lesser resistance to the basket on offense , and one less seven - footer to worry about on the defensive end . The home squad came out and played inspired basketball overall from the opening tip , as they expanded a 29 - 23 first - quarter lead into a 60 - 42 halftime advantage . The Hornets essentially sealed the game with another strong effort in the third quarter , allowing them to cruise over the last 12 minutes . A team - high scoring total from Frank Kaminsky off the bench was key to the win , as was some impressive shooting ( 49 percent from the field ) and equally strong work on the glass ( 47 total rebounds , compared to the Knicks ' 37 ) . Michael Beasley drew the start for Porzingis and led the way with 23 points , a total he supplemented with nine rebounds , one assist and two blocks . Jarrett Jack was a distant second with 12 points and added seven assists and one rebound . Enes Kanter provided 11 points , three rebounds and three steals . Kyle O'Quinn and Frank Ntilikina led the bench with matching 10 - point tallies , with the former adding three rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block , and the latter supplying three assists , two rebounds and one steal . Kaminsky paced the Hornets by equaling his season high with 24 points and also contributed five rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist posted a 15 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , one steal and one block . Marvin Williams registered 12 points , three rebounds , one steal and one block . Dwight Howard managed an 11 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included three assists . Kemba Walker had an unusually quiet night with nine points on 4 - for - 13 shooting . He complemented that scoring total with six assists , one rebound and three steals . Nicolas Batum poured in nine of his own and also supplied four rebounds , four assists , two steals and two blocks . Johnny O'Bryant III chimed in with nine points , three rebounds , three assists and one steal in 16 minutes , while Jeremy Lamb 's full stat line included nine points , eight boards , four assists and one steal . The Knicks head back home and await the Boston Celtics on Thursday night , while the Hornets remain home and await the Toronto Raptors on Wednesday evening .

The Hornets ( 11 - 20 ) were facing a steep challenge in the form of the visiting Raptors ( 21 - 8 ) , but they came out of the gate seemingly up to the task . Charlotte jumped out to a 26 - 22 advantage after one quarter , but Toronto answered the bell for the second period in spectacular fashion , racking up 41 points to forge a 63 - 47 halftime lead . They kept the foot on the gas in the third and entered the final 12 minutes with a 99 - 79 advantage that allowed them to simply hold serve and cruise to the 18 - point win . The visitors reaped the benefit of three 20 - point - plus efforts on their starting five , as well as a blistering success rate of 54 percent from the floor , including 48 percent from three - point range . The Boston Celtics defeated the host Charlotte Hornets , 102 - 91 , at Spectrum_Center on Wednesday . These are two teams going in opposite directions and a dominating win by Boston shows just which way . In fact , it was a wire - to - wire win for the Celtics , as the Hornets never even tied the game . The shooting disparity was vast , as Boston hit 47 percent from the field , 44 percent from three - point range and a perfect 13 - of - 13 from the free - throw line . Charlotte went just 37 percent from the field , 30 percent from long range and 69 percent from the charity stripe . The fastbreak differential was decisive as well , with the Celtics winning that battle , 19 - 8 . The Celtics ( 28 - 10 ) were led by Kyrie Irving , as he tallied 21 points , two rebounds and eight assists . Al Horford recorded a double - double , totaling 20 points and 11 rebounds . Jayson Tatum accrued 18 points , five rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Terry Rozier led the bench with 15 points , four rebounds , four assists and two blocks . The Hornets ( 12 - 22 ) got another monster double - double out of Dwight Howard , as he amassed 12 points , 17 rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Kemba Walker collected 24 points and five assists . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist and Marvin Williams scored 13 points apiece . On deck for Boston is a home matchup versus the Houston Rockets on Thursday . As for Charlotte , they travel to play the Golden_State Warriors on Friday .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the host Charlotte Hornets , 115 - 111 , at Spectrum_Center on Wednesday evening . The Hornets got out to a great start on their home court , with a quick 11 - 2 run , and hung on to a 28 - 20 lead by the end of the first quarter . The Mavericks turned the tables in the second , taking the lead halfway through the quarter and owning a 59 - 52 lead heading to half . The teams fought to near stand still through the third , with the Mavericks hanging on to a six - point lead heading into the fourth . The fourth quarter was a shootout , where the Hornets tied it up within the first three minutes . It remained a close game the rest of the way , but Dallas came up bigger down the stretch to steal the win in Charlotte . Harrison Barnes led the Mavericks with 25 points on 9 - of - 13 shooting , 11 rebounds , two assists and one block , in 35 minutes . Yogi Ferrell followed up with 22 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting , while Dirk Nowitzki added 19 points on 8 - of - 16 shooting . The Mavs shot 47 percent from the field , including 15 - of - 37 from long range . Meanwhile , Kemba Walker was on fire for the Hornets , with 41 points on 16 - of - 28 shooting , in 37 minutes . Dwight Howard played well , with 15 points , 12 rebounds , four blocks , two assists and one steal , in 35 minutes . Jeremy Lamb added 12 points on 4 - of - 8 shooting , in 18 minutes off the bench . The Hornets shot 51 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 26 from long range . The Hornets ( 15 - 24 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Jazz on Friday . The Mavericks ( 15 - 28 ) play host to the Lakers on Saturday .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Utah Jazz , 99 - 88 , at Spectrum_Center on Friday evening . The Jazz ( 17 - 25 ) and Hornets ( 16 - 24 ) both came into the game with nearly identical and underwhelming records , but Utah 's chances of victory appeared to be somewhat handicapped even before tip - off . That outlook was a direct result of their unsightly road record , one that had seen them notch just four victories in 21 contests away from home . However , the visitors impressively hung with the home squad basket for basket through the first 12 minutes , and were even with Charlotte at 85 - 85 as late as the 5:58 mark of the fourth quarter . The Hornets took off from that point , however , finishing the game on a 14 - 3 run to seal the victory . Neither team shot particularly well in the defensive struggle , but Charlotte saw four of its starters manage double - digit scoring while only Utah starter , star rookie Donovan Mitchell , accomplished the feat . Mitchell compiled a game - high 35 points overall , a total he supplemented with five rebounds and two steals . OKC racked up 31 points in the first 12 minutes before seeing Charlotte bounce back with the same tally in the second to forge a 59 - 55 halftime edge . Defense was the order of the day in the third period , with both clubs combining for a modest 35 points . However , the fourth quarter belonged the visitors , which amassed 28 points while limiting the hosts to 15 on their way to the 10 - point win . With the Thunder and Hornets posting respective success rates from the floor of 40 and 40 percent , there were rebounds aplenty to be had . Oklahoma_City managed to win that battle by a 57 - 50 margin , another key to their victory . The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Sacramento Kings , 112 - 107 , at Spectrum_Center on Monday afternoon . The Hornets ( 19 - 26 ) have been on the upswing of late , and they hung on to their first - half differential to walk away with a hard - worked win against a resilient Kings ( 13 - 33 ) team that dropped their eighth straight contest . Charlotte jumped ahead in the first quarter 35 - 33 , but they established their biggest differential in the second quarter , as a 32 - 22 score gave the Hornets a 12 - point lead at halftime . That advantage increased to 17 points after three , and everything indicated the Hornets were set to cruise their way until the buzzer . But Sacramento fought back , and won the final 12 minutes by a 32 - 20 score . It was n't enough , however , and Charlotte ended winning their third game in their last four . Meanwhile , the Kings now have the worst record in the entire Association . Kemba Walker might be one of the hottest names in the trade market , and he proved his value with an enormous performance in this game since he finished with 26 points , nine assists , six rebounds , and two blocks . Jeremy Lamb delivered a strong effort off the bench as well , as he contributed 18 points in just 26 minutes . Nicolas Batum , Dwight Howard and Marvin Williams all ended with 14 points . The Charlotte Hornets defeated the New_York Knicks , 137 - 128 , in overtime at Spectrum_Center on Monday evening . Never underestimate the motivational power of playing spoiler . The Hornets ( 34 - 41 ) likely learned the lesson in spades Monday , as the pesky Knicks ( 27 - 48 ) stretched them to the limit in a five - quarter classic . What made the contest all the more remarkable was that a New_York squad devoid of any postseason aspirations - - and playing on the road , no less - - roared back from a 13 - point halftime deficit that they easily could have succumbed to . The value of fresh legs this late in the season was also on full display in the form of one Trey Burke , who rattled off a career - high 42 points and supplemented them with 12 assists , one rebound and one steal . The visitors put together a 68 - point second half to force the extra period , and they just missed stealing a win when one of Burke could n't find the net on a 26 - foot three - point attempt at the buzzer . Charlotte finally gained some separation with a game - clinching 8 - 2 run over the final 1:52 of overtime to seal the win and keep their postseason hopes alive . As the final score implies , both teams shot extremely well from in front of the arc , posting success rates of 51 percent ( Knicks ) and 55 percent ( Hornets ) . Michael Beasley followed Burke with 27 points and added eight boards , one assist and one steal . Tim Hardaway , Jr. provided 17 points , five boards , two assists and one steal . Enes Kanter posted a 15 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included two assists . Frank Ntilikina totaled a bench - leading 12 points and also dished out three assists , hauled in one rebound and recorded one steal . Luke Kornet had another productive game off the bench with eight points , five rebounds , one steal and one block over 27 minutes . Kemba Walker paced the Hornets with 31 points - - 11 of which came in overtime - - and seven assists , adding two rebounds as well . Dwight Howard generated a 23 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included one assist . Marvin Williams posted 13 points , four boards , one assist , two blocks and one steal . Willy Hernangomez mustered 12 points , five boards , one assist , one steal and one block . Jeremy Lamb tallied 12 points , six rebounds and six assists . Malik Monk finished with 11 points , one rebound and one assist . Frank Kaminsky contributed 10 points , four rebounds , one assist and one steal . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist and the returning Nicolas Batum ( Achilles ) produced matching nine - point efforts . The Knicks next pay a visit to the Philadelphia 76ers on Wednesday night , while the Hornets remain home and await a visit from the Cleveland Cavaliers on that same evening .

The Cavaliers ( 45 - 30 ) got off to a slow start against the Hornets ( 34 - 42 ) in this one , but they gained control of the game during the second quarter and they would never look back on route to their sixth win in their last seven games . Cleveland also won the third quarter ( 31 - 24 ) , and they entered the final 12 minutes with a huge 95 - 78 advantage . Charlotte won the final quarter by four points ( 27 - 23 ) but it was n't enough , and the Cavs cruised their way to a big win on the road .
