Guillermo Hernangomez had 15 points and 11 boards off the bench .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Denver Nuggets , 106 - 96 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Wednesday night in the season opener for both teams . In what proved to be a back - and - forth game , the hard - nosed defense of Utah ( 10 ) prevailed over the up - tempo offense of Denver ( 0 - 1 ) . Both teams were looking to debut a new lineup , as Denver acquired All-Star forward Paul Millsap over the offseason , while Utah dealt with the loss of star wing Gordon Hayward in free agency . Millsap 's first appearance for Denver got off to a solid start , as he picked up two early buckets and helped the Nuggets ' offense score 30 first quarter points . Ten of those points came from versatile bench wing Will Barton , who knocked down two three - pointers near the end of the first to help extend Denver 's lead . Unfortunately for the Nuggets , as the game went on , their offense began to lose steam . The stifling Jazz defense held the Nuggets to just 13 fourth quarter points and forced a field goal drought of over five minutes for Denver 's closing unit . For the Jazz , the season opener marked the Utah debut of two new starters in Ricky Rubio and Donovan Mitchell . Rubio , the former Minnesota point guard , facilitated the offense effectively in his first start with the Jazz , dishing out ten assists . Mitchell , the 13th overall pick in the 2017 NBA Draft , got the start in his first NBA appearance and tallied ten points despite shooting just 3 - of - 11 from the field . The biggest key to success for the Jazz , though , was First Team All-Defense center Rudy Gobert . Though Gobert committed an unfortunate six turnovers , he led the team with 18 points and pulled down ten rebounds . Denver came into the game with high hopes for the season . In addition to adding Millsap , third - year center Nikola Jokic has developed lofty expectations from fans and analysts thanks to his strong play in the 2016 - 17 season . Jokic showed off his trademark passing on Wednesday , leading the Nuggets with eight assists . However , he disappointed in the scoring column , posting just seven points on 3 - of - 10 shooting . The biggest scoring threat for the Nuggets proved to be sixth man Will Barton , who delivered a scoring spark of 23 points off the bench . The Jazz will next face the Timberwolves in Minnesota on Friday , while Denver will have two days off before hosting the Sacramento Kings on Saturday .
The host Utah Jazz took down the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 96 - 87 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Saturday . It was a defense - first game for Utah , as the Jazz ( 2 - 1 ) were able to take an early lead by clamping down OKC 's arsenal of offensive superstars . The Thunder ( 1 - 1 ) were held to just 14 points in the first quarter , and superstar and reigning MVP Russell Westbrook was particularly limited . Westbrook managed just three points through the game 's first three quarters and six points on the night . Though OKC mounted somewhat of a comeback effort in the final minutes of the fourth quarter , cutting the lead to single digits , Utah held a fairly solid lead for the majority of the game . Coming into the season , questions were raised about where Utah would find scoring after losing star wing Gordon Hayward in free agency . On Saturday , the Jazz appeared to score by committee , with five players scoring 12 or more . The team 's leading scorer was three - point marksman Joe Ingles , who had 19 points on the night while making five of the team 's nine three - pointers . Overall , the Jazz ran a fairly low - tempo offense and attempted few three - pointers , but the team still scored efficiently . Utah hit over 49 percent of its field goal attempts on the game . For the Thunder , offense did not come as easily . Despite boasting a lineup with plenty of star power , OKC struggled to find the bottom of the net on Saturday . The team hit just 41 percent of its shots from the field and scored only 34 first - half points . Reigning MVP Russell Westbrook struggled in particular , shooting just 2 - of - 11 from the field and committing seven turnovers on the night . New team members Carmelo Anthony and Paul George each scored at least 22 points , but shot just 40 percent between them . The Thunder will host the Timberwolves on Sunday , while the Jazz will visit the Los_Angeles Clippers on Tuesday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the visiting Dallas Mavericks , 104 - 89 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Monday evening . The Mavericks came out strong and took a 27 - 21 lead through the first quarter . The Mavericks kept the pressure on and took a 53 - 44 lead into halftime . However , the Jazz team would not be held down by Dallas , as they came out and dominated the second half . The Jazz outscored the Mavericks 60 - 36 in the second half in order to cruise to the win down the stretch . Five players scored in double digits for the Jazz ( 4 - 3 ) , led by Rodney Hood , who finished with a team - high 25 points on 9 - of - 15 shooting in 33 minutes . Ricky Rubio totaled 20 points , five assists , three steals and two rebounds . Rudy Gobert was a force in the middle , totaling 17 points , 12 rebounds , six assists and two steals in 37 minutes . Thabo Sefolosha chipped in 11 points in 19 minutes off the bench . Meanwhile , Dirk Nowitzki was the high - point man for the Mavericks ( 1 - 7 ) with 18 points on 7 - of - 11 shooting in 25 minutes . J.J. Barea followed up with 17 points in 25 minutes off the bench , while Devin Harris chipped in 15 points and six assists in 25 minutes off the bench . Dennis Smith Jr. was quiet with two points in 17 minutes . The Mavericks head to Los_Angeles to face the Clippers on Wednesday . The Jazz play host to the Trail_Blazers on Wednesday .
The Utah Jazz took down the Portland Trail_Blazers at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Wednesday , 112 - 103 , in overtime . Utah ( 5 - 3 ) remained undefeated on its home court , improving to 50 in Utah on the season . The team was led on Wednesday by an uncharacteristic performance from veteran point guard Ricky Rubio . Rubio led the team with a whopping 30 points , including three three - pointers . He also dished out only one assist , a career low . Rookie Donovan Mitchell also impressed , scoring 28 points off the bench on 9 - of - 21 shooting . The scoring outbursts were much needed for the Jazz , who have had issues finding a reliable first option on offense this season . The team has eclipsed 100 points only three times in eight games , including Wednesday 's overtime win . Still , though , the Jazz have posted a stellar record thanks to strong defensive play and rebounding . Center Rudy Gobert continues to be among the league 's more intimidating defensive presences . The French big man blocked three shots in Wednesday 's win . Portland ( 4 - 4 ) has relied heavily on star point guard Damian Lillard over the early portion of the season , Wednesday being no different . Lillard led the team with 33 points and eight assists while also pulling down ten rebounds . The All-Star point guard seemed to have a hand in every play , taking a team - high 27 shots on the night . Aside from Lillard , the Trail_Blazers saw encouraging play from big man Jusuf Nurkic . Nurkic excelled after being dealt to Portland midway through last season , but was slow to start this year . The third - year center entered the game averaging under one block per game and shooting just 40 percent while scoring 13 points per game . On Wednesday , he delivered his strongest outing of the season , scoring 19 points to go with 11 rebounds and three blocks . Portland will host the Los_Angeles Lakers on Thursday , while Utah will host the Raptors on Friday .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the host Utah Jazz , 109 - 100 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Friday evening . The Raptors ( 5 - 3 ) finished off their six - game road trip the right way , as they picked up a well - deserved win in Utah . After a strong first quarter from the Raptors , the score was 64 - 63 for the Jazz by halftime . However , the Raptors came out strong in the second half , outscoring the Jazz 36 - 28 in the third quarter , and hung on to seal the deal down the stretch . DeMar DeRozan had a big game for Toronto , with a team - high 37 points on 10 - of - 20 shooting in 37 minutes . Kyle Lowry followed up with a healthy 15 points and 10 assists in 35 minutes , while Norman Powell also chipped in 15 points . Serge Ibaka was the only other Raptors player to score in double digits , with 10 points . Meanwhile , Donovan Mitchell continued his strong play , leading the Jazz with 25 points in 31 minutes off the bench . Rodney Hood added 17 points , while Rudy Gobert chipped in 15 points , seven rebounds and two blocks . Ricky Rubio finished with 13 points and three assists in 30 minutes . This marked the end of Utah 's three - game winning streak . The Jazz will look to get back on track as they take on the Rockets in Houston on Sunday . The Raptors will return home to take on the Wizards on Sunday .
The Utah Jazz took down the visiting Brooklyn Nets , 114 - 106 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Saturday . The Jazz ( 6 - 7 ) saw a rare high - scoring game , delivering 114 points against the up - tempo Nets . The high point totals were due in part to strong play from rookie guard Donovan Mitchell , who led the team with 26 points on 10 - of - 18 shooting . Mitchell 's outburst continued what has been a season of highs and lows for the rookie , who entered the game with three previous performances of at least 22 points , but also shooting just 34 percent from the field . The game was also a bounceback performance from veteran power forward Derrick Favors . Favors , who has struggled with injuries over the previous two seasons , scored a season - best 24 points while leading the team with 12 rebounds in the win . The Nets ( 5 - 8 ) fell victim to the injury bug once again on Saturday , losing star point guard D'Angelo Russell to an apparent knee injury with just three minutes remaining in the game . Brooklyn had previously lost guard Jeremy Lin for the season with a knee injury of his own . Before Russell went down on Saturday , he delivered a team - high 26 points , shooting 10 - of - 17 for the night . With Lin , Russell , and bench guard Spencer Dinwiddie all sidelined , the team struggled to find guard depth in crunch time . Ultimately , Brooklyn was unable to come back despite cutting Utah 's lead to single digits in the final minutes . Brooklyn will host the red - hot Boston Celtics on Tuesday , while Utah will host the new - look Minnesota Timberwolves in a matchup of divisional rivals on Monday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the host Utah Jazz , 109 - 98 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Monday . This was a dominating victory for the Timberwolves , as they pulled out a wire - to - wire win . In addition , Minnesota held a double - digit lead for the final three quarters . The T'Wolves starters dominated the Jazz starters , outscoring them , 93 - 49 . The shooting disparity was vast , with Minnesota shooting 52 percent and Utah hitting just 44 percent of their shots . The rebounding differential was huge as well , with the Timberwolves winning it , 40 - 31 . The Timberwolves ( 8 - 5 ) have now won six of their last eight games , as they are one of the hottest teams in the league . Karl-Anthony Towns led Minnesota with 24 points , and 13 rebounds on 10 - of - 15 shooting . Jeff Teague collected 22 points , three rebounds and three assists . Jimmy Butler totaled 21 points , four rebounds and 10 assists . Taj Gibson recorded a 15 - point , 10 - rebound double - double . The Jazz ( 6 - 8 ) were led by Donovan Mitchell . who tallied 24 points , four rebounds , four assists and four steals . Jonas Jerebko started for Rudy Gobert ( knee ) and totaled 13 points and six rebounds . Derrick Favors amassed nine points and 10 rebounds . Rodney Hood led the bench , as he dropped 16 points in 21 minutes . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , with Minnesota hosting the San_Antonio Spurs and the Jazz traveling to play the New_York Knicks .
The host Utah Jazz blew out the visiting Chicago Bulls , 110 - 80 , on Wednesday evening at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena . Utah ( 8 - 11 ) needed a win badly , and earned one in emphatic style on Wednesday . The Jazz had dropped eight of their previous ten games , and have been struggling to adjust to the absence of star center Rudy Gobert , who is sidelined with a knee injury . However , the team showed no signs of struggle on Wednesday , as the team earned a 30 - point blowout win on the backs of six double - digit scoring performances . Utah 's bench performed exceptionally well in the win , accounting for 51 points . Sixth man Rodney Hood led the bench unit with 19 points , including three three - pointers . For the starters , big man Derrick Favors led the team with 23 points on impressive 8 - of - 11 shooting . Favors added seven rebounds , a block , and a steal . Chicago ( 3 - 13 ) owns the worst record in the Eastern_Conference and has won only one of its ten road games to this point . While the Bulls have many promising young players , Friday 's blowout loss far from exemplified that . Rookie lottery pick Lauri Markkanen had a season low of just three points while shooting 1 - of - 9 on the night . Point guard Kris Dunn , meanwhile , had four turnovers while dishing out only one assist . As a whole . Chicago shot an abysmal 37 percent overall from the field . The poor shooting was compounded by ice - cold perimeter play , as the team hit only five three - pointers on the night . On Friday , the Bulls will visit Golden_State , while Utah will host the Milwaukee Bucks on Saturday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the visiting Denver Nuggets , 106 - 77 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Tuesday evening . The first half was back - and - forth with 13 lead changes , before the Nuggets took a 49 - 48 lead into halftime . The Jazz turned it on in the third quarter , where they kicked things off with a 100 run and eventually took a 10 - point lead into the fourth . The Jazz took over in the fourth quarter , outscoring the Nuggets 30 - 11 , to complete the 29 - point win . This marks the third straight win for the Jazz ( 10 - 11 ) , as they wrap up their three - game home stand undefeated and move to 9 - 4 at home this season . They shot 48 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 33 from long range in the contest . Derrick Favors led the way for Utah , with 24 points , nine rebounds , five assists , three blocks and one steal , in 32 minutes . Jonas Jerebko added 15 points , eight rebounds , two assists and a block , while Donovan Mitchell finished with 16 points , three rebounds , two assists and two steals . Ricky Rubio also played well , with 13 points , five assists , four rebounds , one steal and one block . Meanwhile , the Nuggets ( 11 - 9 ) shot only 36 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 34 from long range . Gary Harris was the high - point man for Denver , with 18 points on 6 - of - 16 shooting , in 33 minutes . Kenneth Faried followed up with 11 points and eight rebounds , while the only other player to score in double digits for Denver was Jamal Murray , who finished with 10 points on 5 - of - 13 shooting . Juan Hernangomez finished with seven points and 10 rebounds , while Nikola Jokic was quiet with seven points , six rebounds , six assists , one steal and one block . The Nuggets will look to get back on track as they play host to the Bulls on Thursday . The Jazz take on the Clippers in L.A. on Thursday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 100 - 89 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Thursday . If it werent for a a one - point first quarter lead for the Spurs , this would have been a wire - to - wire win for the Jazz . In fact , Utah led for all but one minute , as they held the lead for the final three quarters . The difference in the game was free - throw shooting , with Utah hitting 20 - of - 24 and San_Antonio going just 11 - of - 16 from the charity stripe . It was an extremely slow - paced matchup , as there were just 150 shots taken combined in this game . The Spurs ( 22 - 11 ) had all five starters reach double figures , yet no one on the roster scored more than 12 points . That was Bryn Forbes , as he tallied 12 points and three rebounds . LaMarcus Aldridge totaled 11 points and six rebounds before fouling out . Kawhi Leonard played a season - high 20 minutes and amassed 10 points , five rebounds , two assists and two steals . The Jazz ( 15 - 18 ) were led by Rodney Hood , as he collected 29 points and three rebounds . Derrick Favors finished with 14 points and nine rebounds . Ricky Rubio accumulated 11 points , 11 rebounds and seven assists . On deck for San_Antonio is a road matchup versus the Sacramento Kings on Saturday . On deck for Utah is a home matchup versus the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Saturday as well .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the host Utah Jazz , 103 - 89 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Saturday evening . The Thunder got out to a great start , taking a 14 - 6 lead mid way through the first quarter . They led 28 - 22 at the start of the second and were able to stay a couple possessions ahead for the whole quarter . The Thunder started the second half leading 47 - 43 and stretched their lead to 12 through a great third quarter , where they outscored the Jazz 29 - 21 . The Thunder held strong through the fourth and left no doubts about this one , as they walked away with their fourth straight win . Russell Westbrook notched his 11th triple - double of the season , with 27 points , 10 rebounds and 10 assists . Paul George followed up with 26 points , six steals , five rebounds , two blocks and one assist , in 37 minutes , while Carmelo Anthony tallied 16 points , six rebounds and three assists , in 35 minutes . The Thunder shot 44 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 30 from long range . Meanwhile , Donovan Mitchell led the way for Utah , with 29 points on 12 - of - 16 shooting , five rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block , in 37 minutes of action . Derrick Favors added 11 points on 5 - of - 8 shooting , in 34 minutes , while Thabo Sefolosha chipped in 11 points on 4 - of - 9 shooting , in 15 minutes off the bench . The Jazz shot 46 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 26 from long range . The Jazz ( 15 - 19 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Nuggets in Denver on Boxing Day . The Thunder ( 18 - 15 ) play host to the Rockets on Christmas Day .
The Utah Jazz defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers , 104 - 101 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Saturday evening . The first quarter was close before the Cavs pulled ahead to take a 32 - 22 lead by the end of the quarter . Despite trailing for the entire second quarter , the Jazz picked up the intensity and cut the deficit to just five points by halftime . They carried the momentum into the third , where they pulled ahead early and hung on to take a 76 - 69 lead into the fourth . The Cavs did not take the lead in the fourth but did made it a one - point game with a minute to go , however Utah came up clutch to save the win . Donovan Mitchell led the way for the Jazz with 29 points on 10 - of - 17 shooting , along with six assists , four rebounds , three steals and one block , in 38 minutes of action . Ricky Rubio tallied 16 points , 10 rebounds , eight assists , one steal and one block , in 31 minutes , while Derrick Favors chipped in 19 points , six rebounds , three steals , one assist and one block , in 30 minutes . The Jazz shot 46 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , LeBron James led the Cavs with 29 points on 12 - of - 22 shooting , along with eight rebounds , six assists , two steals and one block , in 37 minutes . Kevin Love added 20 points and 10 rebounds , while Jeff Green chipped in 22 points and five rebounds , in 26 minutes off the bench . The Cavs shot 42 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 40 shooting from long range . The Cavs ( 24 - 12 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Trail_Blazers on Tuesday . The Jazz ( 16 - 21 ) play host to the Pelicans on Wednesday .

The Pacers got out to a great start on the road , taking control in the first quarter , and with a 31 - 21 lead heading into the second . The Jazz picked it up a bit in the second but the Pacers still managed to increase their lead to 11 by halftime , ahead 58 - 47 . The Pacers carried the momentum into the third quarter , where they quickly pushed their lead to 20 , and maintained that cushion heading into the final frame . The Pacers were able to cruise to the finish , keeping the lead in double digits the rest of the way . This marks the third straight win for Indiana . Thaddeus Young followed up with 17 points , four rebounds , two assists and two blocks , while Domantas Sabonis added 15 points , eight rebounds and four assists , in 29 minutes . The New_York Knicks defeated the host Utah Jazz , 117 - 115 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Friday evening . The Knicks started out well and led for most of the first quarter , until the Jazz pulled ahead 25 - 22 in the final minute . The Jazz maintained an edge through the second quarter , pushing their lead to 10 before settling on a 55 - 49 lead at halftime . The Knicks turned up the intensity in the third quarter and quickly tied things up . They carried on to outscore the Jazz 36 - 23 in the quarter and take a 85 - 78 lead into the final frame . The Jazz battled back and had it tied up at 93 , with 7:30 remaining . However , the Knicks pulled ahead once again and were able to maintain the slight edge the rest of the way . Tim Hardaway Jr. was the high - point man for New_York , with 31 points on 11 - of - 17 shooting , in 27 minutes of action . Courtney Lee and Kristaps Porzingis tallied 18 points each , while Enes Kanter added 12 points and nine rebounds . The Knicks shot 49 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 20 from long range . Meanwhile , Rudy Gobert led the Jazz with 23 points , 14 rebounds , three blocks and one assist , in 29 minutes . The Utah Jazz took down the Los_Angeles Clippers , 125 - 113 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Saturday evening . Once again , the Jazz ( 19 - 27 ) leaned heavily on rookie sensation Donovan Mitchell for offense . Mitchell led the team with 23 points and added seven assists . His performance added more to what is becoming an impressive rookie resume , as he is averaging 23 points per game over his last 10 games . While Mitchell stood out , the Jazz as a whole played well on the offensive end . Every Utah starter scored at least 12 points , and the team managed to shoot 55 percent from the field . Star center Rudy Gobert , who played in just his second game back from a knee injury , scored 16 points and blocked three shots . Los_Angeles ( 23 - 22 ) was carried by its star players but could not get the job done on Saturday . Breakout sensation Lou Williams had a ridiculous double - double with 31 points and 10 steals . The 10 steals were the most by any player across the NBA this season . It continues to be a career year for Williams , who is averaging 31 points per game over his last 10 . Blake Griffin , meanwhile , scored 25 points to go with eight rebounds . The Clippers had no trouble getting to the line , as the team attempted 38 free - throws on the night . Still , general inefficiency from the field hurt the team . LA shot just 44 percent from the field in the loss . Los_Angeles will host the Minnesota Timberwolves on Monday . Utah , meanwhile , will square off against the Atlanta Hawks .
The Utah Jazz defeated the visiting Golden_State Warriors , 129 - 99 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Tuesday evening . The Jazz were hot right from the start , as they took an early lead an never looked back . They pushed their lead to 10 midway through the first quarter and settled on a five - point lead heading into the second . The Jazz held the lead through the entire second quarter and were able to take a 69 - 56 lead into halftime . The Jazz did not stop there , as they kept up the pressure in the third quarter and pushed their lead to 103 - 85 going into the final frame . They held a 20 - point lead with 9:50 left in the fourth , but that was not enough . The Jazz outscored the Warriors 26 - 14 in the fourth , to seal the 30 - point win . This marks the third straight win for Utah . Ricky Rubio was the high - point man for the Jazz , with 23 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting . Rubio also tallied 11 assists , five rebounds and one steal , in 35 minutes of action . Donovan Mitchell and Joe Ingles followed up with 20 points each , while Derrick Favors chipped in 18 points and 10 rebounds . The Jazz shot 58 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 28 from long range . Meanwhile , Klay Thompson led the Warriors with 27 points on 12 - of - 17 shooting , in 30 minutes of action . Kevin Durant followed up with 17 points , while Stephan Curry and JaVale McGee finished with 14 points each . The Warriors shot 46 percent from the field , including 5 - of - 25 from long range . The Utah Jazz defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 106 - 94 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Friday . Utah has been rolling for weeks now , as they led for over 40 minutes of this matchup . In fact , they held the lead for the entirety of the fourth quarter , as it was a double - digit margin for the final seven minutes . Rebounding was the difference , with Utah outrebounding Charlotte , 49 - 33 . The shooting disparity was vast as well , with the Jazz hitting 49 percent of their shots while holding the Hornets to just 41 percent from the field . A 29 - 17 assisting differential was also critical for Utah , as they also outscored Charlotte in the paint , 58 - 30 . The Hornets ( 23 - 32 ) were led by Kemba Walker , as he tallied 19 points , three rebounds and five assists . Marvin Williams amassed 11 points and five boards while Nicolas Batum totaled 13 points and two assists . Jeremy Lamb was the best player off the bench , providing 10 points , four rebounds , two assists and four steals . The Jazz ( 27 - 28 ) got an all - around gem out of Joe Ingles , as he collected 23 points , five rebounds and six assists . Donovan Mitchell led the team with 25 points , six rebounds and three assists . Rudy Gobert finished with 20 points , 11 rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Both teams return to action on Sunday , with Charlotte hosting the Toronto Raptors and Utah traveling to face the Portland Trail_Blazers .
The Utah Jazz defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 101 - 99 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Monday . Despite the fact that both of these teams had double - digit leads , this matchup was n't decided until the final seconds . In fact , there were nine ties and 17 lead changes in total , as there were four lead changes alone in the final 100 seconds . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with the Jazz connecting on 11 - of - 24 and San_Antonio hitting just 6 - of - 25 . Aside from that , the Spurs won the field goal percentage , assisting and rebounding differentials . The Spurs ( 35 - 23 ) got an all - around gem out of Pau Gasol , as he collected 15 points , 15 rebounds , six assists and two blocks . Kyle Anderson accrued 16 points , six rebounds and three assists . Dejounte Murray returned from his ankle issue to total 12 points , three rebounds and four assists . The Jazz ( 29 - 28 ) were led by Donovan Mitchell , as he tallied 25 points , seven rebounds , five assists and three steals on 9 - of - 28 shooting . Joe Ingles accumulated 20 points , seven rebounds and five assists . Derrick Favors amassed 19 points , eight rebounds and four blocks . Rudy Gobert provided 10 points , 11 rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks . San_Antonio will have to play again on Tuesday , as they travel to face the Denver Nuggets . As for Utah , they play their final game before the all - star break on Wednesday , as they play host to the Phoenix Suns .
The Utah Jazz extended their league - best win streak to 11 games on Wednesday as they defeated the Phoenix Suns , 107 - 97 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena . Both teams got a revamp at the trade deadline , but the Jazz ( 30 - 28 ) were the ones who saw it pay off on Wednesday . Newly-acquired wing Jae Crowder came through in the fourth quarter , scoring four early points to give Utah a lead it never relinquished . Crowder , who struggled heavily for the first half of the season in Cleveland , was Utah 's top bench scorer with 15 points . Phoenix ( 18 - 41 ) , meanwhile , saw its new addition , Eflrid Payton , have a third straight huge game with the team . Payton recorded a triple - double , scoring 13 points to go with 11 rebounds and 12 assists . The outing follows a team - high 29 points for Payton on Monday . It was ultimately rookie Donovan Mitchell who carried Utah 's offense on Wednesday , though . Mitchell led the team with 24 points and dished out seven assists . Forward Joe Ingles had an uncharacteristic off night , shooting just 4 - of - 16 from the field . Ingles entered the game as the league 's best three - point shooter at 46 percent , but went only 3 - of - 9 from beyond the arc . Phoenix , meanwhile , saw the much - anticipated return of star shooting guard Devin Booker . Booker missed four games with a hip injury , and the Suns averaged only 92 points per game without him . In his return , though , he made a big contribution , leading the team with 28 points . Rookie forward Josh Jackson scored 22 points off the bench . Both teams will gear up for the All-Star Break this weekend .
The visiting Portland Trail_Blazers took down the Utah Jazz on Friday , 100 - 81 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena . The game brought Utah 's league - best 11 - game win streak to an end . Throughout its win streak , Utah ( 30 - 29 ) had been solid defensively , holding opponents to an average of just 98 points per game . While their defense remained as strong as ever , cold shooting caused the Jazz to founder , especially in the second half . After a blazing - hot 30 point first quarter , the Jazz slowed down for the remainder of the game . The team hit only six three - pointers on the night and scored only 34 points in the second half . Portland ( 33 - 26 ) , on the other hand , maintained a solid perimeter attack thanks to a combined 50 points from its backcourt of Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum . The Blazers were led by an electric performance from star guard C.J . McCollum . McCollum led the team with 26 points on 11 - of - 21 shooting . Portland held the edge in almost every shooting area , shooting 2 percent better from the field than Utah and hitting three more three - pointers . The team was also helped by a stellar defensive effort from veteran Moe Harkless , who came away with six steals . Utah , meanwhile , was led once again by rookie sensation Donovan Mitchell . Mitchell scored a team - high 21 points and hit four of the team 's six three - pointers . As a whole , though the team struggled immensely . They reached the free - throw line only 11 times and shot a brutal 24 percent from beyond the three - point arc . Portland will visit Phoenix on Saturday , while Utah will host the Dallas Mavericks .
The Houston Rockets defeated the host Utah Jazz , 96 - 85 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena , This gives Houston 12 - straight victories , as this was one of their most impressive in that stretch . Not only did they play without Ryan Anderson , Eric Gordon and Clint Capela , they overcame a 15 - point deficit . Almost all that ground was made up in the third quarter , with Houston outscoring Utah 31 - 19 . Both teams really struggled offensively , with neither team cracking 45 percent from the field or 30 percent from three - point range . The only noticeable difference in the stat sheet was turnovers , with the Rockets committing just 16 while forcing 22 from the Jazz . The Rockets ( 47 - 13 ) were led by James Harden , as he collected 26 points , 11 rebounds , five assists and three steals . Chris Paul finished with 15 points , six rebounds , six assists and three steals . Luc Mbah_a_Moute was the only other Rocket in double figures , as he provided 17 points and three rebounds on 7 - of - 7 shooting off the bench . The Jazz ( 31 - 30 ) had no player reach 20 points , as Rudy Gobert led them with 17 points , six rebounds and two blocks . Donovan Mitchell did accrue 16 points , four assists and three steals but went just 1 - of - 9 from three - point range and committed eight turnovers . Ricky Rubio totaled 14 points , three rebounds and five assists while Jae Crowder led the bench with 12 points , six rebounds and five assists . On deck for Houston is a road matchup versus the surging Los_Angeles Clippers on Wednesday . As for Utah , they 're off until Friday when they play host to the Minnesota Timberwolves .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 116 - 108 , in a tense game at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Friday . Three players were ejected in Friday 's game , including Jeff Teague , who was thrown out following a flagrant foul on Utah 's Ricky Rubio . All-Star center Karl-Anthony Towns , meanwhile , was ejected after receiving two technical fouls before halftime . On Utah 's end , Jae Crowder was ejected following a tiff with Minnesota Coach Tom Thibodeau . Utah entered halftime with an 11 - point lead , which it was able to maintain through the second half . Utah ( 32 - 30 ) has won eight of its last ten games . Star center Rudy Gobert recorded a season - high 26 points to go along with 16 rebounds . Rookie sensation Donovan Mitchell added another 26 points , shooting 10 - of - 18 on the night . Six Jazz players scored in double digits on the night . Minnesota ( 38 - 28 ) , meanwhile , was led by guards Jeff Teague and Andrew Wiggins . Wiggins had a team - high 27 points , while Teague scored 25 points before his ejection . Rebounding proved to be an issue for the team , though . The Wolves had only two offensive rebounds on the night and were out - rebounded 44 - 27 in total . The Jazz will visit Sacramento on Saturday , while the Timberwolves will host Boston on Wednesday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the visiting Detroit Pistons , 110 - 79 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Tuesday evening . The Jazz got out to a great start at home , as they raced out to a 42 - 21 lead through the first quarter . They maintained a solid lead through the second and were able to push their lead to 64 - 39 by halftime . They came out strong once again in the third quarter and pushed their cushion to a 27 - point lead heading into the final frame . The Jazz remained in total control through the fourth , as they cruised to their seventh straight win . Rudy Robert led Utah with 22 points , 12 rebounds , two blocks and one assist , in 31 minutes . Joe Ingles followed up with 17 points , seven rebounds , seven assists and one steal , in 27 minutes of action . Jae Crowder added 14 points , four rebounds , two assists and two steals , in 24 minutes off the bench . The Jazz shot 55 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 34 from long range . Meanwhile , Luke Kennard led the Pistons with 18 points , four rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 36 minutes off the bench . Andre Drummond tallied 13 points , 11 rebounds and one steal , while Blake Griffin finished with 13 points , two rebounds and two assists . The Pistons shot 38 percent from the field , including 5 - of - 25 from long range . The Pistons ( 30 - 37 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Nuggets in Denver on Thursday . The Jazz ( 38 - 30 ) play host to the Suns on Thursday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Pheonix Suns , 116 - 88 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Thursday . Utah came into this game as a sizable favorite and they showed why as this marked their 20th win in their last 22 games . The second quarter was the difference , with the Jazz outscoring the Suns , 36 - 20 . Phoenix simply could n't respond from there , as Utah held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the difference in the game , with Utah recording 29 assists to seven turnovers while Phoenix committed 22 turnovers to just 14 assists . The 12 steals and eight blocks were also huge for the Jazz , as the Suns had just eight combined blocks and steals . The Suns ( 19 - 51 ) were led by T.J. Warren , as he tallied 19 points and six rebounds . Devin Booker was the only other starter in double figures , as he accrued 12 points , five rebounds and two assists . Josh Jackson was a nice spark off the bench , providing 17 points and nine boards . The Jazz ( 39 - 30 ) were led by Donovan Mithcell , as he totaled 23 points , five rebounds and four assists . Rudy Gobert amassed 21 points , 13 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Joe Ingles collected 17 points , two rebounds , three assists and two steals while Ricky Rubio finished with 12 points , five rebounds , 11 assists and four steals . Jae Crowder led the bench with 15 points , eight rebounds , two assists and two steals . Both teams play home games on Saturday for their next outings , with Utah welcoming the Sacramento Kings and Phoenix playing host to the Golden_State Warriors .
The Utah Jazz defeated the visiting Sacramento Kings , 103 - 97 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Saturday evening . The game started out close , as the Jazz and Kings battled through the first quarter , with the Jazz emerging with a 32 - 27 lead entering the second . The Kings turned up the intensity in the second and pulled ahead within the first couple minutes of the quarter . The Kings stayed in control until halftime , where they led 54 - 50 . The Jazz answered back in the third quarter , where they pulled ahead early in the quarter and held on the outscore the Kings , 30 - 25 in the quarter and take an 80 - 79 lead into the final frame . The fourth quarter was a tight battle , as the Kings pulled ahead once again and led 88 - 87 with 3:51 to go . However , the Jazz responded down the stretch and closed out very strong , to earn their ninth straight win . Donovan Mitchell led the way for the Jazz with 28 points on 11 - of - 21 shooting , three assists , two steals and two rebounds , in 39 minutes . Rudy Gobert followed up with 22 points , 13 rebounds and four blocks , while Joe Ingles and Ricky Rubio added points each . The Jazz shot 45 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 24 from long range . Meanwhile , Buddy Hield led the Kings with 23 points , six assists , six rebounds and one steal , in 28 minutes off the bench . Bogdan Bogdanovic followed up with 12 points , while De'Aaron Fox and Garrett Temple chipped in 11 points each . The Kings shot 43 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 21 from long range . The Kings ( 23 - 48 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Pistons on Monday . The Jazz ( 40 - 30 ) play host to the Hawks on Tuesday .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the host Utah Jazz , 99 - 94 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Tuesday evening . The Jazz got out to a good start , as they led for most of the first quarter and held on to a 27 - 21 lead heading into the second . They did not hold up as well in the second as they went scoreless for three minutes , and only mustered 15 points in the quarter , while the Hawks put up 20 points in the quarter to cut the deficit to just one point by halftime . The Jazz stayed ahead through most of the third quarter , before the Hawks tied it up at 63 with two minutes left . However , the Jazz pulled ahead with a quick 40 run to take 67 - 63 lead into the final frame . The game stayed tight for most of the fourth quarter . The Jazz led at first , but the Hawks came back to tie it up in the final few minutes and outscored the Jazz , 7 - 2 in the last two minutes to seal the road win . Dennis Schroder led the Hawks with 41 points , seven assists and five rebounds , in 34 minutes . Dewayne Dedmon finished with 15 points , 14 rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block , while Taurean Prince added 11 points , three rebounds , two steals and two assists . The Hawks shot 40 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 33 from long range . Meanwhile , Donovan Mitchell led the Jazz with 24 points , six rebounds , four assists and one steal , in 40 minutes . Ricky Rubio followed up with 23 points , three rebounds , three assists , two steals and one block . Rudy Gobert tallied 15 points , 16 rebounds and two blocks , while Joe Ingles added 16 points , eight rebounds , seven assists and one steal . The Jazz shot 37 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 34 from long range . The Jazz ( 40 - 31 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Mavericks in Dallas on Thursday . The Hawks ( 21 - 50 ) take on the Kings in Sacramento on Thursday .
The Boston Celtics defeated the host Utah Jazz , 97 - 94 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Wednesday evening . The Jazz started out well at home , as they took a 24 - 18 lead after a low scoring first quarter . The Celtics bounced back as they started the second on a 10 - 4 run to tie it up at 28 with 7:27 left in the half . They then went on to outscore the Jazz , 20 - 11 , through the rest of the quarter , to take a 48 - 39 lead into halftime . The Jazz turned the tables in the third quarter , as they outscored the Celtics , 32 - 19 , in the quarter to take a 71 - 67 lead heading into the final frame . The Jazz pushed their lead to eight early in the fourth quarter , however the Celtics pushed back to make it a one - point game at the 5:45 mark . Still , the Jazz held on to a small advantage for most of the quarter , until the Celtics tied it up at 94 with one minute remaining . After a couple missed shots by either team , Jaylen Brown sunk the game - winner , with 1 seconds left on the clock to earn Boston it 's fifths straight win . Jaylen Brown led the Celtics with 21 points , five rebounds , three assists and two steals , in 30 minutes . Jayson Tatum followed up with 16 points , three assists , two rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Terry Rozier tallied 13 points , seven rebounds and one assist , while Aron Baynes chipped in 13 points , six rebounds and one assist . The Celtics shot 44 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 21 from long range . Meanwhile , Donovan Mitchell led the Jazz with 22 points , six assists and one steal , in 39 minutes . Ricky Rubio tallied 14 points , 10 assists , eight rebounds and three steals , while Jae Crowder added 16 points , four rebounds , two steals and one block , in 29 minutes off the bench . The Jazz shot 42 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 33 from long range . The jazz ( 42 - 33 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Grizzlies on Friday . The Celtics ( 52 - 23 ) play host to the Raptors on Saturday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the visiting Memphis Grizzlies , 107 - 97 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Friday evening . The Jazz got out to an excellent start at home , as they jumped out to an early lead and then held the Grizzlies scoreless for about five minutes , on their way to a 29 - 14 advantage heading into the second . However , the Grizzlies answered back in the second quarter , cutting it to an eight - point game halfway through the quarter . The Grizzlies kept the pressure on and cut the deficit to just five , as they trailed 52 - 47 by halftime . The Grizzlies carried their strong effort into the third quarter , where they managed to take a four - point lead mid way through the quarter . The Jazz fought back though , and held on to an 80 - 76 lead heading into the fourth . The Grizzlies were able to get close , within one possession , but the Jazz kept their foot on the gas and did not let up , as they pushed their lead to 11 , with 2:38 to go , and were able to cruise to the much - needed win from there . Donovan Mitchell led Utah with 22 points , four assists , three rebounds and one steal , in 38 minutes . Dante Exum added 21 points , three rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 27 minutes off the bench , while Joe Ingles added 17 points , 10 assists , five rebounds and one block , in 37 minutes . The Jazz shot 54 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Marc Gasol led Memphis with 28 points on 11 - of - 12 shooting , three rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 23 minutes . Dillon Brooks added 10 points and five rebounds , while MarShon Brooks came up large with 24 points , two assists , two steals and one rebound , in 18 minutes off the bench . The Grizzlies shot 48 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 23 from long range . The Grizzlies ( 21 - 55 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Trail_Blazers in Portland on Sunday . The Jazz ( 43 - 33 ) take on the Timberwolves in Minnesota on Sunday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the visiting Los_Angeles Lakers , 117 - 110 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Tuesday evening . The Lakers got out to a good start on the road , with an early 11 - 3 lead , and managed to stay ahead for the rest of the quarter , with a 31 - 24 lead heading into the second . The Lakers led for the first seven minutes of the quarter , before the Jazz took over the lead . The Jazz closed the quarter strong and earned a 65 - 60 lead by halftime . The Jazz built a double - digit advantage and held it for most of the third quarter , but the Lakers made a run to make it a six - point game heading into the final frame . The Jazz stayed in from through the fourth quarter , and owned a 10 - point lead with two minutes remaining so that they could cruise to their third straight win . Ricky Rubio led the Jazz with 31 points , eight assists and six rebounds , in 33 minutes . Donovan Mitchell followed up with 26 points , six rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 35 minutes . Rudy Gobert had a big night as well , with 12 points , 16 rebounds , five assists , three blocks and two steals , in 36 minutes .
