The Utah Jazz defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 117 - 95 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Thursday . In a game with huge playoff complications for both of these teams , Utah prevailed with a dominating wire - to - wire victory . In fact , the Jazz led by 10 points after the first quarter , by 16 points at the half and by 27 heading into the fourth quarter . In addition , Los_Angeles never got the game within 20 points for the final 20 minutes of action . The shooting disparity was huge , with the Jazz connecting on 53 percent of their shots while holding the Clippers to just 44 percent from the field . Much of that was attributed to the fact that Utah out - assisted Los_Angeles , 27 - 18 . In addition , the Jazz forced 16 turnovers from the Clippers while committing just nine on their end . The Clippers ( 42 - 37 ) were led by Austin Rivers , as he tallied 19 points and three assists . Tobias Harris was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 11 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . Montrezl Harrell led the bench with 17 points , three rebounds and two assists . The Jazz ( 46 - 33 ) had seven players reach double figures in scoring , as Donovan Mitchell led them with 19 points , five rebounds and five assists . Derrick Favors amassed 16 points and three rebounds . Rudy Gobert went a perfect 6 - of - 6 from the field to accrue 15 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and three blocks . Jonas Jerebko and Alec Burks each led the bench with 13 points apiece . On deck for the Clippers is a home matchup versus the Denver Nuggets on Saturday . As for Utah , they travel to face the Los_Angeles Lakers on Sunday for their next outing .
The Utah Jazz defeated the visiting Golden_State Warriors , 119 - 79 , at Vivint_Smart_Home_Arena on Tuesday evening . The Jazz got out to a great start at home , as they jumped out to a 33 - 14 lead through the first quarter . They kept their foot on the gas and almost doubled their lead through the second quarter , where they outscored the Warriors , 29 - 17 , to take a 62 - 33 lead by halftime . The third quarter was more of the same , as the Jazz did not concede any ground and push their up to 40 during the quarter and took a 93 - 56 lead into the final frame . The Warriors made a slightly better effort in the fourth , but were still outscored 26 - 23 in the quarter , as the Jazz cruised to their sixth straight win . Donovan Mitchell led the Jazz with 22 points on 8 - of - 12 shooting , three rebounds , two steals and one assist , in 26 minutes of action . Derrick Favors followed up with 16 points , nine rebounds , one assist and one block , while Ricky Rubio and Rudy Gobert added 13 points each . The Jazz shot 53 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 35 form long range . Meanwhile , Klay Thompson led the Warriors with 23 points on 9 - of - 27 shooting , in 35 minutes . Kevin Durant followed up with 13 points , four rebounds and one assist , while the only other player to score in double digits for Golden_State was Kevon Looney , who added 12 points , five rebounds and two steals , in 21 minutes off the bench . The Warriors shot 30 - of - 86 from the field , including 5 - of - 19 from long range . The Warriors ( 59 - 23 ) are done for the season and will be ready for round one of the playoffs . The Jazz ( 48 - 33 ) take on the Trail_Blazers in Portland on Wednesday , for their last game of the season .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Sacramento Kings , 114 - 106 , on Thursday at Golden_1_Center . The Pelicans ( 2 - 3 ) earned the much needed win in Sacramento , where star center DeMarcus Cousins made his first appearance since being traded from the Kings last season . Cousins was introduced to heavy applause from the home crowd , and was welcomed back with a tribute video that played during the first quarter . It was more than an emotional game for the star center , however . With fellow All-Star big man Anthony Davis missing the contest due to a knee injury , New_Orleans leaned heavily on Cousins throughout the night . Cousins more than rose to the occasion , delivering a whopping 41 points , 23 rebounds , and six assists while shooting 14 - of - 25 from the field . The big man came through in the clutch as well , knocking down a late three - pointer to help seal the game . The massive offensive load shouldered by Cousins allowed the rest of the New_Orleans squad to enjoy more space despite Davis 's absence . Point guard Jrue Holiday had his strongest outing of the season thus far , scoring 20 points and dishing out seven assists . Overall , the Pelicans shot just under 49 percent from the field and knocked down 13 three - pointers in what was an impressive offensive outing . Sacramento ( 1 - 4 ) held a 19 - point lead in the third quarter , but quickly fell victim to a massive run by New_Orleans . While the team clicked in the first half , scoring a whopping 70 points , containing DeMarcus Cousins and the Pelicans ' wing players proved a struggle for Sacramento down the stretch . Over the course of ten minutes in the third quarter , the Pelicans were able to whittle Sacramento 's lead down to zero , leaving the Kings scrambling to recover from the run as the teams entered the fourth . Despite the heartbreaking blown lead , Sacramento was able to see strong play from some of its more promising young players . Point guard De'Aaron Fox delivered a 14 - point outing in 25 minutes off the bench , continuing to fuel his hype as one of the year 's top rookies . Sophomore big man Skal Labissiere also delivered double - digit scoring , posting 11 points and two blocks in only 15 minutes . Sacramento will host the Wizards on Monday , while New_Orleans will see the Cavaliers on Sunday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the host Sacramento Kings , 110 - 83 , at Golden One Center on Sunday . This game was quite lopsided , as the Wizards held a double - digit lead for the final 42 minutes . In addition , the Kings could never get the game within 26 points for the entirety of the second half . Defense was key for Washington , as they held Sacramento to 39 percent from the field and 27 percent from three - point range . Assists were a huge factor as well , with Washington handing out 28 assists and the Kings recording just 13 assists on their end . The Wizards ( 4 - 2 ) had 12 players featured in this game . John Wall accrued 19 points , nine assists and two rebounds to lead the team . Otto Porter amassed 16 points and five rebounds . Bradley Beal collected 15 points , four assists and three rebounds . Mike Scott led the bench with 13 points and four rebounds . The Kings ( 1 - 5 ) were led by Bogdan Bogdanovic , who tallied 15 points , four steals and three rebounds . De'Aaron Fox went just 1 - of - 8 from the field , but still accumulated two points , five assists and four rebounds starting for George Hill ( rest ) . No other players for Sacramento had more than 11 points or two assists . The Kings will look to rebound on Tuesday when they travel to play the Indiana Pacers for their next game . The Wizards will host the Phoenix Suns for their next fixture on Wednesday .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers on Friday , 86 - 82 , at Golden_1_Center . Sacramento ( 4 - 11 ) bounced back from a tough 46 - point loss at the hands of the Atlanta Hawks with Friday 's win . The Kings benefited from a sub - par night from Portland , as the Blazers hit just 37 percent of their shots from the field on the night . However , the young Sacramento squad also demonstrated plenty of promise en route to the win . Center Willie Cauley-Stein led the team with a double - double , scoring 22 points to go along with ten rebounds . The big man , who came off the bench , also had a block and a steal . Overall , the Kings relied heavily on their bench in the victory . Sacramento 's second unit contributed 46 points , accounting for more than half of the team 's points on the night . Portland ( 8 - 7 ) took the loss despite strong play from star point guard Damian Lillard . Lillard was one of only two Blazers players to score in double figures in the win . He led the team with 29 points and also contributed four assists . However , the All-Star shot just 9 - of - 25 on the night , contributing to an overall poor shooting night for Portland . The other Blazer to contribute double figure scoring was C.J . McCollum , who added 19 points and knocked down 8 - of - 15 shots from the field . Despite the backcourt 's efforts , the team shot only 37 percent from the field and hit just seven shots from behind the arc . Portland will host Sacramento in a rematch on Saturday night .
The visiting Denver Nuggets took down the Sacramento Kings , 114 - 98 , on Monday night . Denver ( 10 - 7 ) bounced back from a tough loss on Sunday in which both of the team 's star big men were forced to exit early . All-Star veteran Paul Millsap left Sunday 's game with a wrist sprain , which also forced him to sit out on Monday . Nikola Jokic , meanwhile , returned to action on Monday after being ejected from Sunday 's loss due to a technical foul . Jokic had a major impact on the glass in Monday 's win , recording a team - high 14 rebounds along with 16 points . For the fourth time in five games , meanwhile , sophomore point guard Jamal Murray scored at least 18 points . Murray went 6 - of - 10 from the field , helping lead the Nuggets to an efficient 6 - of - 10 night from the field . Sacramento ( 4 - 13 ) has now dropped two straight and continues to sit at 14th in the Western_Conference . The Kings struggled to compete with Denver on the glass in Monday 's loss , being out - rebounded 48 - 32 on the night . No player recorded more than six rebounds for Sacramento . Third-year big man Willie Cauley-Stein , meanwhile , scored just two points after leading the team in scoring in Sacramento 's previous two games . The center came off the bench and shot only 1 - of - 7 en route to the season - low performance . For the Kings , their offense was boosted by strong play from veteran guard George Hill , who had 16 points on 6 - of - 10 shooting . The Kings will host the Lakers on Wednesday , while Denver will see the Memphis Grizzlies on Friday .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the visiting Los_Angeles Lakers , 113 - 102 , at Golden_1_Center in Sacramento on Wednesday . The Kings ( 5 - 13 ) lost five of their previous six games before facing off against LA . However , the team was able to handily defeat the surging Lakers , thanks in large part to stellar play from their big men . Sacramento held a massive 44 - 32 advantage in the rebounding column and was fueled by strong performances from Zach Randolph and Willie Cauley-Stein . Randolph led the Kings ' starters with 22 points , adding seven assists and three steals . Off the bench , meanwhile , Cauley-Stein had a team - high 26 points , leading the Kings in scoring for the third time in four games . Six Kings players finished the game with double digit scoring totals , as the team shot an impressive 56 percent from the field . Los_Angeles ( 8 - 11 ) snapped its quick two - game win streak with Wednesday 's loss . Offense was not the issue for the Lakers , as the team shot 50 percent from the field and drained 15 three - pointers on the night . Ultimately , the team had trouble containing the red - hot Kings on the defensive end . The Lakers ' duo of rookies , Kyle Kuzma and Lonzo Ball , played well in the loss . Kuzma scored 17 points , a team high , while Ball scored 11 points to go with 11 assists . The league - worst shooter managed to maintain efficiency on Wednesday , shooting 4 - of - 8 from the field as he recorded the double - double . Sacramento will host the LA Clippers on Friday , while the Lakers will take on the Clippers at Staples_Center on Monday .
The visiting Los_Angeles Clippers took down the Sacramento Kings on Saturday , 97 - 95 , at Golden_1_Center . Los_Angeles ( 7 - 11 ) has now won two straight games after coming off a nine - game losing streak . Saturday 's win came in the narrowest of fashions , as a 10 - 2 run for Sacramento in the game 's final two minutes cut the Clippers ' margin of victory down to just two . The severely shorthanded Clippers , who have lost starting guards Patrick Beverly and Milos Teodosic each to injuries , relied heavily on All-Star big man Blake Griffin in the win . Griffin attempted a team - high 25 shots , hitting 13 en route to 33 points . Griffin knocked down all five of his free - throws as well , and dished out five assists on the night . Sacramento ( 5 - 14 ) lost the game but put in a valiant comeback effort in the final minutes . Sophomore guard Buddy Hield scored 27 points off the bench , including a massive game - tying three - pointer in the final minute of the game . However , Hield also missed the potential game - winning shot towards the end of the clock . Still , Hield impressed , hitting a season - high seven three - pointers on the night . Also off the bench , big man Willie Cauley-Stein had a stellar outing . The Kentucky alum blocked three shots and came away with two steals . However , Cauley-Stein finished with just nine points on 40 percent shooting . The Kings will visit Golden_State on Monday , while the Clippers will host the Lakers at Staples_Center .
The Milwaukee Bucks trounced the host Sacramento Kings on Tuesday , 112 - 87 , at Golden One Center . The Bucks ( 10 - 9 ) gained control of the game early and never let the lead slip away . The team scored 29 points while holding Sacramento to just 11 in the second quarter . Milwaukee was put in a strong position thanks to an incredible outing for 22 - year - old Greek superstar Giannis Antetokounmpo . The `` Greek Freak `` led the team with 32 points in just 26 minutes of play . His impact extended well beyond the points column , as he came away with five steals on the defensive end and also dished out four assists . Recently-acquired point guard Eric Bledsoe also made a major contribution , scoring 21 points to go with five rebounds and five assists in just 24 minutes . The win ended a short cold stretch for Milwaukee , as the team had lost three of its previous four games . Tuesday 's offensive outburst was long overdue , as the team was averaging under 92 points per game over the tough four - game stretch . The 25 - point blowout was Milwaukee 's largest margin of victory yet this season and just the second double - digit win for the middling team . Sacramento ( 5 - 15 ) saw plenty of missed shots , as the team simply struggled from the field in Tuesday 's loss . The Kings shot only 41 percent on the night and hit just five three - pointers . Though Sacramento started a three - guard lineup , including rookie De'Aaron Fox , veteran George Hill , and sharpshooter Garrett Temple , spacing still proved an issue . Temple was the only Sacramento starter to hit a three - pointer , and the team attempted only 17 , well below the league average . The Kings did , however , see some success on the interior , as big man Willie Cauley-Stein delivered a double - double off the bench . Cauley-Stein shot 5 - of - 10 from the field and finished with a 10 - point , 10 - rebound double - double . The Bucks will visit Portland on Thursday , while the Kings will take on the Bulls in Chicago .
The host Sacramento Kings took down the Phoenix Suns , 99 - 92 , at Golden One Center on Tuesday . Sacramento ( 9 - 18 ) escaped with a relatively narrow win , thanks in large part to strong defensive play . The Kings held Phoenix to just 41 percent from the field and allowed only 14 free - throw attempts on the night . Kings guard George Hill was a menace on the defensive end , stealing the ball three times . On the other end , Hill was wildly efficient , scoring 18 points on only nine shot attempts . Veteran big man Zach Randolph also made a major contribution to the winning effort . Randolph , who had averaged over 23 points per game over his previous five games , scored 17 points and pulled down seven rebounds . The veteran duo was able to push the Kings to victory despite each playing under 28 minutes . The remaining play time was filled by Sacramento 's deep young bench , including league - best three - point shooter Buddy Hield . Hield poured in 14 points and knocked down two three - pointers on the night . The Suns ( 9 - 20 ) were shorthanded on Tuesday , as star shooting guard Devin Booker remains sidelined by a groin injury . For the second straight game , his missing scoring was filled in by undrafted rookie point guard Mike James and forward T.J. Warren . Warren led the team in scoring , pouring in 18 points but going a shaky 9 - of - 25 from the field . James , however , was more efficient , scoring his 17 points on just 12 shot attempts . Outside of the two leading scorers , the Suns were starved for viable scoring options . The team shot just over 40 percent from the field and only 21 percent from three - point range on the night . Phoenix will host the Toronto Raptors on Wednesday , while the Kings will visit Minnesota on Thursday .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Sacramento Kings , 108 - 99 , at Golden One Center on Saturday . San_Antonio ( 23 - 11 ) was without superstar forward Kawhi Leonard , who has sat out several games recently as part of his slow re - integration to the lineup after a quad injury that cost him the season 's first 27 games . Still , the Spurs were able to power through his absence and earn the convincing win . A strong second - quarter showing helped fuel the victory , as the Spurs held a 13 - point advantage in the quarter . San_Antonio leaned heavily on its big men in the win , a necessity against a Sacramento team that often favors interior play . The starting frontcourt of Pau Gasol and LaMarcus Aldridge did not disappoint , as Gasol recorded his 10th career triple double with 14 points , 11 rebounds , and 10 assists . Aldridge , meanwhile , delivered a massive scoring night , pouring in 29 points to go with 10 rebounds . Sacramento ( 11 - 21 ) snapped a quick two - game win streak with Saturday 's loss . The Kings did , however , enjoy a showcase of its promising young talent . Sophomore shooting guard Buddy Hield led the team with 24 points , shooting 4 - of - 7 from beyond the arc . Hield has been lights - out from three - point range this season , shooting 44 percent on three - point attempts thus far . Big man Willie Cauley-Stein also impressed , scoring 22 points to go with a team - high 11 rebounds . Cauley-Stein delivered on the offensive end despite struggling to match up with San_Antonio 's more experienced big men defensively . On Tuesday , the Spurs will host the Nets and the Kings will visit the Clippers .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the host Sacramento Kings , 131 - 111 at Golden_1_Center on Tuesday evening . The Hornets got out to a good start and earned a solid 32 - 25 lead after one quarter . They carried the momentum into the second quarter where they poured in 40 points to expand their lead to 72 - 52 by halftime . The second half was more evenly matched but that was not enough for the Kings to cut into the 20 - point deficit . The Hornets cruised to their fourth road win of the season . Nicolas Batum lead the way for Charlotte with 21 points on 8 - of - 12 shooting , in 30 minutes of action . Dwight Howard tallied 20 points and eight rebounds , while Kemba Walker finished with 12 points , 10 assists , four rebounds and two steals . Jeremy Lamb added 16 points , five assists and three steals , in 23 minutes off the bench . The Hornets shot 57 percent from the field , including 15 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Zach Randolph led the Kings with 24 points and 10 rebounds , in just 25 minutes of action . Skal Labissiere tallied a double - double as well , with 17 points and 15 rebounds , in 28 minutes . De'Aaron Fox tallied 17 points , four assists and three rebounds in his first game back form injury . The Kings shot 52 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 17 from long range . The Kings ( 12 - 25 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Nuggets on Saturday . The Hornets ( 14 - 23 ) head to L.A. to take on the Lakers Friday .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Sacramento Kings 121 - 115 on Thursday at Golden_1_Center . For the second straight game , Lou Williams was dominant offensively for the Clippers ( 20 - 21 ) , who have now rattled off three straight victories and are close to returning to .500 on the season . Williams scored a game - high 30 points and dished out six assists in 35 minutes . Blake Griffin also made his return from a concussion in impressive fashion , posting 18 points , 12 rebounds and six assists in 33 minutes . It was n't all good news for Los_Angeles , however , as DeAndre Jordan left in the second quarter with a sprained ankle and was unable to return . Fortunately , Montrezl Harrell managed to fill in admirably , posting 25 points ( 11 - 12 FG ) and six rebounds in 27 minutes off the bench . As a team , the Clippers were very efficient , hitting 42 percent of their shots from behind the arc and shot 51 percent from the field overall . As for the Kings ( 13 - 28 ) , they 've now lost three games in a row and six of their last seven . Offensively , it was one of Sacramento 's more high - powered performances of the season , as they had not reached 115 points in regular since the fourth game of the season against the Suns . Bogdan Bogdanovic led the way for the Kings with a game - high 22 points in 31 minutes off the bench , while George Hill , who missed the last three games due to the birth of his daughter , scored 21 points of his own . In the end , however , despite the strong offensive performance , Sacramento struggled to get a stop , allowing the Clippers to get favorable looks for most of the night . These two teams will meet again on Sunday in a rematch at Staples_Center .
The visiting Utah Jazz blew out the Sacramento Kings , 120 - 105 , at Golden_1_Center on Wednesday . Utah ( 18 - 26 ) was led by rookie Donovan Mitchell , who scored 34 points on highly efficient 14 - of - 19 shooting . Mitchell was the leader of a highly potent Jazz offense in the win . Utah shot 57 percent from the field on the night , including 12 made three - pointers . Sixth man and combo wing Rodney Hood scored 25 points off the bench , supplementing Mitchell 's stellar offensive production . The team also moved the ball effectively , notching 26 team assists in the win . Sacramento ( 13 - 31 ) played fairly effectively on the offensive end , but could not get the job done on defense in the blowout loss . The team allowed almost 57 percent of Utah 's shots to fall and forced only ten turnovers . Sacramento , meanwhile , shot over 52 percent from the field and over 61 percent from beyond the arc . However , the team 's 19 turnovers were a difference - maker in the loss . The team 's scoring leader was big man Willie Cauley-Stein , who scored 26 points to go with 10 rebounds . Utah will host the New_York Knicks on Friday , while the Kings will visit Memphis .
The host Sacramento Kings took down the Chicago Bulls , 104 - 98 , at Golden One Center on Monday evening . The game looked like a lost cause for Sacramento early on , as the team was outscored 28 - 9 in the first quarter . The Kings began the game shooting just 4 - of - 20 from the field , and were outscored single - handedly by Chicago 's Justin Holiday in the first . Things got on track , though , when Sacramento 's bench unit took the floor . The Kings ' bench combined for 55 points in the win , and the team was able to outscore Chicago by 25 over the ensuing three quarters to walk away victorious . For the Kings ( 17 - 36 ) , six players scored in double figures as the team took a balanced offensive approach . Despite their relatively high team score , the team 's leading scorer was shooting guard Bogdan Bogdanovic with only 15 points . Three of the team 's double - digit scorers came off the bench , including veteran point guard George Hill , who had 14 points and five assists . The Bulls ( 18 - 35 ) , on the other hand , relied more heavily on their starters throughout the game . Shooting guard Zach LaVine had a big night , recording a team - high 27 points . Justin Holiday , meanwhile , scored 20 points , 11 of which came in the first quarter . Despite the two big scoring nights from their guards , the team had trouble finding an offensive flow . The Bulls shot just 40 percent on the night , including 8 - of - 22 from their bench unit . Sacramento will host the Portland Trail_Blazers on Friday , while Chicago will host the Minnesota Timberwolves .
The visiting Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Sacramento Kings , 118 - 100 , at Golden_1_Center on Friday . Friday was simply Damian Lillard 's night , as he got off to a scorching hot start . Lillard had 28 points and five assists by halftime , and helped open up a 10 - point Trail_Blazers lead . While Portland ( 31 - 25 ) held that double - digit lead for much of the third quarter , Sacramento 's ( 17 - 37 ) second unit managed to help spark a quick run and cut the gap to just one point . Lillard responded accordingly , going on a 130 run single - handedly and putting Portland back ahead by double - digits . This time , the Blazers managed to maintain the lead , closing out the fourth quarter with ease . Lillard did his damage from all over the court , shooting 16 - of - 25 from the field , 10 - of - 10 at the free - throw line , and 8 - of - 13 from three - point range . His quick 13 - point outburst to close the third quarter showcased his scoring versatility , as he made two baskets at the rim , knocked down two three - pointers , and made three free - throws . No other Blazer player scored more than 15 points in the blowout win , but thanks to Lillard , it was not necessary . Big man Ed Davis contributed heavily on the boards , though , coming away with 14 rebounds in only 20 minutes of play . Sacramento , meanwhile , saw seven double - digit scorers but still could not get the job done . The team recently shook up its roster , trading veteran point guard George Hill at the deadline to make more room for its young stars . Rookie point guard De'Aaron Fox played 34 minutes in the game , scoring 13 points to go with nine assists and seven rebounds . Veteran big man Zach Randolph scored 17 points and pulled down nine rebounds . The Kings will visit Minnesota on Sunday , while Portland will play host to the Utah Jazz .
The visiting Los_Angeles Lakers took down the Sacramento Kings at Golden One Center on Saturday , 113 - 108 . Things got off to a shaky start for Los_Angeles ( 25 - 34 ) , as the team entered halftime trailing by six points . It took an explosive second half performance from shooting guard Kentavious Caldwell-Pope to help the team earn a win . After the Kings ( 18 - 41 ) went up by as much as 10 , Caldwell-Pope delivered a barrage of shots from long range , scoring 17 of his season - high 34 points in the third quarter . The game remained close throughout the early fourth quarter , with the Lakers eventually pulling away in the final minutes . Point guard Isaiah Thomas and rookie Josh Hart each knocked down free - throws with under a minute remaining to help cement a Lakers win . Caldwell-Pope was the game 's high scorer with 34 points on 12 - of - 20 shooting and 8 - of - 14 from three - point range . Sophomore forward Brandon Ingram flirted with a triple - double , finishing with 13 points , eight assists , and seven rebounds . Seven Lakers scored in double figures , including recently - acquired point guard Isaiah Thomas , who had 17 points off the bench . Rookie guard Lonzo Ball ( shoulder ) was held out of the lineup after he made his return to action in the first half of the team 's back - to - back on Friday . For Sacramento , offensive rebounding helped keep the team in the game until the very end . The team finished with 17 offensive boards in total . Six of those came from big man Willie Cauley-Stein , who had 18 points and 15 rebounds in total . Sophomore guard Buddy Hield delivered an impressive 21 points off the bench to lead the team . On Monday , the Lakers will travel to Atlanta while the Kings will host Minnesota .
The visiting Minnesota Timberwolves blew out the Sacramento Kings , 118 - 100 , at Golden_1_Center on Monday evening . Despite missing star forward Jimmy Butler ( knee surgery ) , the Timberwolves ( 38 - 26 ) won their second straight game without much question . The team came out strong in the second half , building a three - point lead into an 11 - point one within four minutes of the third quarter starting . Even with Butler absent , the Wolves have plenty of star power to fall back on . All-Star big man Karl-Anthony Towns led the team with 26 points and had a game - high 17 rebounds . Towns was able to out - perform the Sacramento ( 18 - 42 ) frontcourt , helping his team earn a 42 - 31 advantage in the rebounding column . Minnesota overall had six double digit scorers , including all five starters . Three players scored at least 20 : Towns , Andrew Wiggins , and Jeff Teague . Teague , despite going a dismal 4 - of - 14 from the field , made a huge impact at the free - throw line , where he went 11 - of - 12 . Despite Teague 's shaky shooting , the Wolves shot the ball at a very efficient clip on Monday . The team knocked down over 52 percent of its shots from the field . While Sacramento also shot the ball fairly well , hitting over 47 percent of its shots , the team struggled to get to the line . While Minnesota attempted 36 free - throws , Sacramento reached the line only 13 times on the night . Rebounding also proved to be a major problem area for the Kings . No Kings player recorded more than five rebounds in the loss . Skal Labissiere was the team 's leading scorer with 20 points on 8 - of - 11 shooting . The Kings will visit Portland on Tuesday , while the Timberwolves will play there on Thursday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the host Sacramento Kings , 98 - 91 , at Golden_1_Center on Saturday night . Rookie star Donovan Mitchell had 27 points to lead the Jazz ( 33 - 30 ) to their 14th win in 16 games . Utah has developed itself as a defensive juggernaut since the return of center Rudy Gobert from injury in late January . On Friday , the Jazz built a quick lead thanks to its stifling defense , holding Sacramento ( 19 - 44 ) to 17 first - quarter points . Utah was able to maintain the lead thanks to consistent offensive play , scoring 73 points through the ensuing three quarters . Five Jazz players scored in double digits in the win . Mitchell led the way with 27 points , while sixth man Jae Crowder had 14 points to lead the bench unit . Gobert had a double - double , posting 16 points and 12 rebounds . His defense also played a critical role in disrupting the interior - focused Kings offense . Gobert finished the game with three steals and three blocks . Sacramento also saw a rookie point guard take the lead , as De'Aaron Fox had a team - high 17 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting . As a team , though , it was a tough offensive night for the Kings . Facing the tough Jazz defense , Sacramento shot only 38 percent from the field and 30 percent from beyond the arc . Off the bench , sophomore big man Skal Labissiere led the second unit with 12 points . Sacramento will host the New_York Knicks on Sunday , while Utah will host Orlando on Monday .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the host Sacramento Kings , 114 - 101 , at Golden_1_Center on Wednesday evening . The first quarter started off close , until the Pelicans went on a 14 - 5 run to close the quarter and create some separation with a 32 - 21 lead heading into the second . They pushed their lead to 20 five minutes into the second and held on to a significant lead for the rest of the quarter , to take a 62 - 44 lead into halftime . The Pelicans maintained a 20 - point lead through most of the third quarter , but ultimately did not gain any ground , as they Kings matched them with 23 points in the quarter . The Kings made a push in the fourth , were they cut the deficit to 10 , but it was too little , too late , as they Pelicans cruised to the 10th straight win . Nikola Mirotic led New_Orleans with 26 points on 10 - of - 12 shooting , and 10 rebounds , in 31 minutes off the bench . Jrue Holiday followed up with 23 points , eight assists , three rebounds , three steals and one block , while Anthony Davis tallied 17 points , five rebounds , five blocks , two steals and one assist . The Pelicans shot 57 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 26 from long range . Meanwhile , Buddy Hield was the high - point man for Sacramento with 20 points on 7 - of - 18 shooting , in 30 minutes off the bench . Zach Randolph was solid with 19 points , five rebounds and two steals , while Frank Mason chipped in 16 points , six assists , one rebound , one steal and one block , off the bench . The Kings shot 42 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 28 from long range . The Kings ( 20 - 45 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Magic on Friday . The Pelicans ( 38 - 26 ) will look to continue the winning streak , as they play host to the Wizards on Friday .
The Detroit Pistons took down the Sacramento Kings , 106 - 90 , at Golden_1_Center on Monday Evening . A big start to the second half helped Detroit ( 31 - 39 ) earn its first win on its current road trip . The Pistons had dropped three straight games but looked revitalized against the Kings . Detroit went on a quick third - quarter run to establish a nine - point lead heading into the fourth . All-Star big man Blake Griffin had 11 points in the third quarter , as he provided the offensive spark needed for the team to pull away . Griffin led the team with 26 points on 9 - of - 18 shooting . He added nine rebounds and seven assists in what was one of his strongest outings since being traded to the Pistons in February . While Andre Drummond went just 2 - of - 7 from the field and did not hit a free - throw , he made an impact with 16 rebounds . Ish Smith added another 18 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting . Sacramento , meanwhile , saw 20 points from Buddy Hield to lead the team . Rookie point guard De'Aaron Fox also had a strong showing , scoring 16 points on 8 - of - 11 shooting and dishing out four assists . As a whole , though , offense was tough to come by for Sacramento . The team hit just six three - pointers and fared even worse at the free - throw line , where it went a dismal 4 - of - 9 . The Pistons will visit Phoenix on Tuesday , while Sacramento hosts the Atlanta Hawks on Thursday evening .
The Sacramento Kings took down the Atlanta Hawks , 105 - 90 , in a game that was affected by mass protests outside Golden_1_Center on Thursday . Only a few hundred fans were allowed inside the building before tip - off , as crowds gathered in mass outside the arena to protest the police killing of Stephon Clark this Sunday . With only the lower bowl filled , Sacramento ( 24 - 49 ) still looked comfortable on its home court . The Kings jumped out to a double - digit lead in the third quarter . The team saw a strong performance from its bench , which totaled 59 points on the night . The Hawks ( 21 - 51 ) , meanwhile , saw a reasonable balance between starters and bench , despite the absence of star starting point guard Dennis Schroder ( rest ) . Sacramento was led by rookie forward Justin Jackson , who had 20 points on 7 - of - 8 shooting . Off the bench , big man Kosta Koufos delivered a double - double with 14 points and 11 rebounds . The team took only nine free - throws in total , but made all nine . The Kings made up for their low free - throw total with strong shooting , including 10 made three - pointers . Atlanta , meanwhile , ran a deep rotation in which no player totaled more than 27 minutes of play . The Hawks were led by backup point guard Isaiah Taylor , who had 18 points while filling in for Schroder . Center Dewayne Dedmon added a double - double with 13 points and 10 rebounds . The Hawks shot just 39 percent from the field and 33 percent from beyond the arc . The Hawks will visit Golden_State on Friday , while Sacramento will host the Boston Celtics on Sunday .
The Boston Celtics defeated the host Sacramento Kings , 104 - 93 , at Golden_1_Center on Sunday evening . The Kings got out to a good start at home , as they held on to a 27 - 24 lead after the first quarter . They kept up the strong play and led for most of the second quarter , expanding their lead to 60 - 52 by halftime . The Celtics came out strong in the third and pulled ahead by two halfway through the quarter . They kept pushing and took an 80 - 78 lead into the fourth quarter . The Celtics kept the momentum through the fourth quarter , where they pulled ahead by 10 with 3:40 left in the game and held on to earn their third straight win . Terry Rozier led Boston with 33 points , five rebounds , five steals and three assists , in 35 minutes . Jaylen Brown followed up with 19 points , two rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block , while Al Horford finished with 14 points , eight assists , five rebounds and one block . The Celtics shot 56 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 22 from long range . Meanwhile , Buddy Hield led the Kings with 21 points , six rebounds , three steals and one assist , in 25 minutes off the bench . Willie Cauley-Stein and Skal Labissiere finished with 14 points , while De'Aaron Fox added 11 points . The Kings shot 46 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 26 from long range . The Kings ( 24 - 50 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Mavericks on Tuesday . The Celtics ( 50 - 23 ) will be right back in action as they take on the Suns in Phoenix on Monday .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the host Sacramento Kings , 103 - 97 , at Golden_1_Center on Tuesday . While Dallas held the lead for the final 45 minutes of this game , it was tight throughout . In fact , the game was within a single - digit margin for nearly 40 minutes of play . The key run for Dallas was a 23 - 8 stretch in the middle of the fourth quarter , as that game - high 18 - point lead was too much for Sacramento to overcome . Defense was key for Dallas , as they held Sacramento to 41 percent from the field and 26 percent from long range . The Mavericks ended up connecting on 45 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range . The Mavericks ( 23 - 51 ) were led by Harrison Barnes , as he tallied 20 points , five rebounds and six assists . Dennis Smith Jr. amassed 19 points and six assists . The Kings ( 24 - 51 ) were led by Skal Labissiere , as he accrued 19 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Willie Cauley-Stein accumulated 13 points , six rebounds , two assists and four steals . De'Aaron Fox went just 2 - of - 10 from the field but finished with five points , three rebounds and six assists . Buddy Hield and Kosta Koufos combined for 29 points off the bench . On deck for Dallas is a road matchup versus the Los_Angeles Lakers on Wednesday . As for Sacramento , they play host to the Indiana Pacers on Thursday for their next outing .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Sacramento Kings , 112 - 96 , at Golden_1_Center on Saturday evening . The game 's outcome was overshadowed by an unfortunate injury to Warriors wing Patrick McCaw . In the third quarter , McCaw was inadvertently undercut by Kings veteran Vince Carter while coming down from a layup attempt . McCaw was unable to get up for several minutes following the fall , and was carried out of the arena on a stretcher . Both teams joined together in a moment of prayer on the court as McCaw was taken out for medical attention . Carter , who was in tears after the injury , approached Steve Kerr and the Warriors coaching staff to apologize further for the incident after the game . The game itself was an almost wire - to - wire win for Golden_State ( 55 - 21 ) , as the team held a lead for almost the entirety of the second quarter and grew that lead to double - digits in the third . All-Star guard Klay Thompson returned to the lineup after missing eight games with a thumb injury , joining Kevin Durant and Draymond Green who each returned from their own injuries in the Warriors ' last contest . Thompson scored 25 points in his return , while Durant led the team with 27 points and 10 rebounds . As a whole , the Warriors shot an impressive 49 percent from the field . The team 's offense was firing on all cylinders , despite superstar point guard Steph Curry ( knee ) still remaining sidelined . Sacramento ( 24 - 53 ) , meanwhile , had a relatively mediocre offensive night . The team saw only four players score in double digits , with the top scorer being Buddy Hield , who had 19 points off the bench . As a whole , the Kings shot only 42 percent from the field and 29 percent from three - point range . The Warriors will visit Phoenix on Sunday , while the Kings will travel to Los_Angeles .
The New_York Knicks lost to the visiting Detroit Pistons , 111 - 107 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Saturday . The Pistons were coming off a tough 115 - 111 loss against the Washington Wizards on Friday , but they managed to bounce back with a solid win over the Knicks on the road . The Knicks looked like the better team during the first half , but Detroit improved their play when it mattered the most . The Pistons ( 2 - 1 ) won the second half 60 - 43 , and that was enough to secure a harder - than - expected win on the road . Tobias Harris was one of the best players for Detroit once again . The small forward led the Pistons ' offense with 31 points on 13 - of - 24 shooting , and also added six rebounds to his account . Andre Drummond secured a double - double with 21 points and 12 rebounds , and Reggie Jackson contributed with 16 points , seven assists , and three rebounds . Ish Smith did a nice job coming off the bench as well , as the point guard added 10 points and three assists in 22 minutes of action . Kristaps Porzingis once again led the Knicks offensively , as the Latvian star finished with 33 points and five rebounds . Enes Kanter ( 17 points and 10 rebounds ) and Ramon Sessions ( 10 points , seven rebounds and five assists ) provided help on the starting lineup , but it was not enough . Kyle O'Quinn contributed off the bench with 15 points ( on 6 - of - 7 from field ) and seven rebounds .
The host New_York Knicks defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 107 - 86 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Friday . New_York was looking for their first win of the season and a 21 - point victory is all fans could hope for . Separation was made in the second and third quarters , with New_York outscoring Brooklyn , 60 - 38 , in that 24 - minute span . Defense was key for the Knicks , as they held the Nets to 41 percent shooting , while forcing 16 turnovers . Rebounding was also a huge factor , with New_York winning the rebounding battle , 55 - 34 . The Knicks starters outscored the Nets starters , 74 - 40 . The Nets ( 3 - 3 ) only starter in double figures was D'Angelo Russell , who dropped 15 points in 17 minutes . Quincy Acy led the bench by providing 12 points and four rebounds . Spencer Dinwiddie scored just four points , but dished out 10 assists off the bench . The Knicks ( 1 - 3 ) were led by Kristaps Porzingis , who accrued 30 points , nine rebounds and three blocks . Enes Kanter totaled 12 points , six rebounds and two blocks in just 16 minutes of play . Jarrett Jack started and accumulated eight points , seven rebounds and five assists . On deck for New_York is a road matchup against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Sunday . As for Brooklyn , they 'll host the Denver Nuggets for their next game on Sunday as well .
The New_York Knicks lost to the visiting Houston Rockets , 119 - 97 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Wednesday evening . The Knicks ( 3 - 4 ) were looking for their fourth straight win , but the Rockets ( 6 - 3 ) offense was just too much for them . New_York ended the first quarter leading 27 - 24 , but Houston responded with a 76 - 47 lead over the next two quarters . Coach Jeff Hornacek 's men could not bounce back from that hole , as the Rockets were simply too good and ended up cruising their way to an easy win on the road . Unsurprisingly , James Harden led Houston 's offense with a strong performance of 31 points , nine assists , and five rebounds . Ryan Anderson contributed with 21 points , while sharpshooter Eric Gordon added 17 of his own . All five starters in Houston scored in double digits . They also got help from Luc Mbah_a_Moute , who chipped in with 10 points and nine rebounds off the bench . Tim Hardaway Jr. was the top scorer for the Knicks after finishing the game with 23 points , but he looked solid on both ends of the court since he also added seven rebounds , four assists , and two steals . Kristaps Porzingis had 19 points with five rebounds , while Enes Kanter provided some help with 12 points and six boards . Frank Ntilikina once again came off the bench , once again showing his incredible court vision after finishing with eight assists in 26 minutes .
The New_York Knicks defeated the Phoenix Suns , 120 - 107 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Friday night . The Knicks ( 4 - 4 ) came into Friday 's contest with some wind in their sails , given that they 'd notched victories in three of their previous four games . Kristaps Porzingis ' play has often been elite in the early going as he takes the reins of the offense with Carmelo Anthony out of town , but the big man came into the night questionable to take the court due to an illness . He ultimately suited up and shook off the cobwebs to post a game - high 37 points , which he complemented with seven rebounds , three blocks and one steal . New_York jumped on the Suns ( 4 - 5 ) early , building a 32 - 19 advantage after the first 12 minutes . They withstood some surges by the visitors throughout the remaining three quarters , but they played strong defense throughout . The Knicks limited their visitors to a 35 percent success rate from the field , including just 28 percent from three - point range . Meanwhile , several of their own players had the hot hand , as they drained 52 percent of their 87 shot attempts on the night and also posted an 88 percent success rate from the free - throw line . Devin Booker was the one Suns player who made his mark , managing 34 points , two rebounds , one assist and two steals . Tyson Chandler posted a 15 - point , 10 - rebound double - double . Josh Jackson followed with a bench - leading 13 points , which he complemented with two rebounds , one assist and one steal . T.J. Warren exited after only 10 minutes with a head injury and finished with just six points and three rebounds . Marquese Chriss mustered a modest five points but brought down nine rebounds . Troy Daniels and Alex Len provided matching nine - point tallies off the bench . Tim Hardaway Jr. totaled 21 points in support of Porzingis and added three rebounds , three assists and one steal . Enes Kanter supplied a 16 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and one block . Doug McDermott led the bench with 12 points and added a rebound . Michael Beasley poured in 11 points off the second unit as well , while also bringing in four boards . Courtney Lee filled out the stat sheet with 10 points , five rebounds , three assists and two steals . The Suns next head to the Lone Star State to tangle with the San_Antonio Spurs on Sunday night , while the Knicks are home against the Pacers on that same evening .
The New_York Knicks defeated the visiting Indiana Pacers , 108 - 101 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Sunday evening . The Pacers ( 5 - 5 ) started strong , leading 33 - 25 after one quarter and building the lead to 62 - 49 by halftime . Still things got worse before they got better for the Knicks ( 5 - 4 ) , who trailed by as many as 19 and entered the final quarter down by 12 . However , Kristaps Porzingis put New_York on his back , willing them to the win with a career - high 40 points and six devastating blocks . This marks the seventh time in his last nine games that Porzingis has topped 30 points . Enes Kanter was a big factor for the Knicks , with 18 rebounds , nine points and two assists , while Tim Hardaway Jr. tallied 16 points , four assists and two steals . Frank Ntilikina contributed in 10 points , seven assists , three steals and two rebounds , in 24 minutes off the bench , including a crucial three - pointer that brought the Knicks within three late in the game . Meanwhile , five players scored in double digits for the Pacers , including Thaddeus Young , who finished with 18 points , five rebounds and three assists , while shooting 4 - of - 4 from long range . Darren Collison added 15 points , 10 assists , five rebounds , and two steals , while Victor Oladipo finished with 17 points , five rebounds and three assists . The Pacers fell apart in the fourth quarter , where they were outscored 36 - 17 . The Pacers will look to bounce back when they play host to the Pelicans on Tuesday . The Knicks will be looking for their third straight win when they play host to the Hornets on Tuesday .
The New_York Knicks defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 118 - 113 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Tuesday night . The Knicks ( 6 - 4 ) have made things exciting in the late stages of games on multiple occasions already this season , and they were at it again on Tuesday night . New_York entered the fourth quarter facing a 94 - 83 deficit , but a 35 - point surge in the final 12 minutes ultimately sealed the comeback win . Kristaps Porzingis , who contributed a team - high 28 points , scored 13 of them in the fourth quarter . Perhaps no two were more crucial than his layup that put the Knicks up by three with 11 seconds remaining , giving them a lead they would n't relinquish . Lance Thomas also played a crucial role in the closing moments , forcing Kemba Walker into an errant pass that went out of bounds and gave the ball back to the Knicks with five seconds remaining . New_York earned the win with some lights - out shooting , as they posted a blistering 60 percent success rate from the field , a number that dwarfed a solid 46 percent figure on the part of the Hornets ( 5 - 6 ) . Dwight Howard , Kemba Walker and Malik Monk led the way for Charlotte with a trio of 21 - point efforts . Howard added nine rebounds , one steal and one block , Walker provided seven assists , five rebounds and one steal , and Monk supplemented his bench - leading scoring total with three assists and two rebounds . Jeremy Lamb managed 15 points , five boards and four assists . Marvin Williams produced 12 points , three rebounds , two assists and two steals . Porzingis added five boards , one assist and three blocks . Doug McDermott was next with 20 points , a total that led the second unit . Tim Hardaway , Jr. supplied 19 points , five rebounds and one steal . Enes Kanter turned in 14 points , six boards , one assist and three steals . Kyle O'Quinn had a productive night off the bench with 12 points , five rebounds , four assists , two blocks and one steal . Thomas registered 10 points and five boards . Courtney Lee mustered a modest six points , but he also dished out a season - high nine assists and brought down three rebounds . The Hornets head to Boston to do battle with the Celtics on Friday night , while the Knicks head down to Central Florida for a Wednesday night date with the Orlando Magic .
The New_York Knicks defeated the Sacramento Kings , 118 - 91 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Saturday night . The Knicks ( 7 - 5 ) have surprised many in the early going , and Kristaps Porzingis has been a big reason why . The 2015 fourth overall pick has stepped up to take the reins of the offense firmly in hand following the departure of Carmelo Anthony in the offseason , upping his scoring average from last season 's 18 to 30 . His dominance was on display again Saturday , as he led all scorers with 34 points , a total he supplemented with five rebounds , two assists and two blocks . He helped spearhead a momentous first half for the home squad , one that saw them build a 64 - 49 halftime edge over the Kings ( 3 - 9 ) . New_York played swarming defense as well , limiting Sacramento to a 38 percent success rate from the field , including 32 percent from three - point range . The Kings saw only two players manage double - digit scoring , and both were on the second unit . Skal Labissiere paced them with 19 points , along with six rebounds , one assist and two steals . Buddy Hield was next with 17 points , to which he added seven rebounds and four assists . Bogan Bogdanovic led the first unit with nine points , two rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block . Rookie De'Andre Fox supplied eight points , two assists , one rebound and one steal in 25 minutes off the bench . Garrett Temple ( seven points , three rebounds , one assist ) , Zach Randolph ( six points , three rebounds , two assists ) and Willie Cauley-Stein ( five points , three rebounds , three assists ) all turned in lackluster efforts . Courtney Lee backed up Porzingis ' effort with 20 points , three assists and two rebounds . Enes Kanter turned in a 17 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and one steal . Damyean Dotson led the second unit with 14 points , one rebound and one assist . Michael Beasley registered 10 points , four rebounds , one assist and three blocks off the bench . Tim Hardaway , Jr. had a rough 2 - for - 11 shooting night which included an 0 - for - 6 tally from three - point range and resulted in a modest four - point total . The Kings head to the Nation 's Capital to take on the Washington Wizards in their next contest on Monday night , while the Knicks remain home to tangle with the Cleveland Cavaliers on Monday evening as well .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the host New_York Knicks , 104 - 101 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Monday . The Knicks looked like they were going to run away with this one early on , but they were unable to hold a 23 - point lead . The fourth quarter is when Cleveland completed their comeback , as they outscored the Knicks , 43 - 25 . Despite the fact that there was a big comeback , there were eight ties and nine lead changes in this competitive matchup . Both teams struggled shooting , with New_York shooting 43 percent and Cleveland hitting just 40 percent of their shots . The Cavaliers ( 7 - 7 ) were led by LeBron James , as he tallied 23 points , nine rebounds , 12 assists and three blocks . Jae Crowder was the only other starter in double figures , as he dropped 13 points . Kyle Korver was huge off the bench , as he accrued 21 points and five rebounds , with 19 of those coming in the fourth quarter . Dwyane Wade also played well off the bench , amassing 15 points , eight rebounds , three assists and two steals . The Knicks ( 7 - 6 ) had four players score at least 15 points , but the other six players combined for just 19 points . Tim Hardaway Jr. led the team with 28 points , 10 rebounds and five assists . Enes Kanter recorded a 20 - point , 16 - rebound double - double . Kristaps Porznigis collected 20 points and seven rebounds . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , as the Knicks host the Utah Jazz and the Cavaliers travel to face the Charlotte Hornets .
The New_York Knicks defeated the visiting Utah Jazz , 106 - 101 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Wednesday evening . These two teams came into this game with streaks on opposite directions , because while the Knicks ( 8 - 6 ) had won five of their last seven games , the Jazz ( 6 - 9 ) had dropped five of their past six . And even though at one point it seemed Utah were set to come away with a huge win on the road , the Knicks had other plans and used a big comeback in the fourth quarter to escape with the win . The Knicks entered the final 12 minutes of action down 82 - 77 , but New_York responded with a 29 - 19 win in the final 12 minutes to put themselves on top after the buzzer . Tim Hardaway Jr. was the star of the game for the Knicks , as the former Atlanta Hawks guard finished with 26 points , six rebounds and six assists , while Kristaps Porzingis also contributed with 22 points and seven rebounds . Four of five New_York 's members of the starting lineup finished with at least 10 points . On the other hand , Rodney Hood led the way for the Jazz since he contributed with an impressive tally of 30 points ( on 10 - of - 20 from the field ) coming from the bench . Rookie sensation Donovan Mitchell added 19 points , while Ricky Rubio and Joe Ingles each added 13 points of their own . Derrick Favors was quite a disappointment for Utah , however , as he only finshed with six points in 3 - of - 10 from the field .
The New_York Knicks defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 107 - 85 , on Monday at Madison_Square_Garden . After a tight first quarter , the Knicks ( 8 - 7 ) used a 140 run in the second quarter to build a 12 - point lead heading into the halftime break . From there , New_York never looked back as it continued to poor it on the Clippers ( 5 - 10 ) in the final 24 minutes . All five Knicks starters managed to score in double figures , with Kristaps Porzingis leading the way yet again with a game - high 25 points to go along with seven rebounds , two blocks and two steals in 29 minutes . Enes Kanter was a force down low , posting a double - double of 12 points and 16 rebounds ( six offensive ) . As a team , New_York earned its win Monday night at the free throw line , hitting 24 - of - 25 shots from the charity stripe . As for the Clippers , they 've now lost eight games in a row and 10 of their last 11 , as they 've fallen off a bit after a 40 start to the regular season . Blake Griffin led the way for Los_Angeles with 21 points , four rebounds , fives assists and two steals in 33 minutes , while Wesley Johnson ended up being the next highest scorer for the team with just 13 points . As a team , the Clippers shot a miserable 38 percent from the field and failed to take care of the basketball , posting 21 turnovers to 20 assists . Up next , the Knicks will remain home Wednesday to take on the Raptors , while the Clippers will look to put an end to their losing streak Wednesday in Atlanta .
The New_York Knicks defeated the visiting Toronto Raptors , 108 - 100 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Wednesday evening . The Knicks ( 10 - 7 ) moved to three games over .500 with another strong display at home , as they controlled Toronto ( 11 - 6 ) thanks to a huge performance in the second half . Toronto actually built a 59 - 48 at half time , but the Knicks answered with a huge 41 - 10 win during the third quarter that put them on top for good . The Knicks never looked back , and survived the Raptors ' come back in the fourth to escape with a huge win against a potential playoff opponent in the East . New_York now has won four of their last five home contests , and moved to a 9 - 3 mark at Madison_Square_Garden while the Raptors saw a four - game winning streak come to an end . Tim Hardaway Jr. led the way for the Knicks in this one . The talented shooting guard finished with a career - high of 38 points in 13 - of - 26 from the field , but he also added six rebounds and six assists . Kristaps Porzingis added 22 points and 12 rebounds , while Courtney Lee contributed with 15 points and seven assists . Enes Kanter continued with his strong play of the past two weeks , as the big man finished with 11 points , four rebounds , and five assists . On the other hand , DeMar DeRozan and Kyle Lowry led Toronto scoring - wise , but they lacked help from his teammates in this one . Lowry was Toronto 's highest scorer with 25 points and 10 rebounds , while DeRozan chipped in with 18 points . But they were the only two Toronto players who scored in double figures , and the rest of the starting lineup combined for 20 points . That kind of effort is not going to cut it on a nightly basis .
The New_York Knicks handily defeated the Miami Heat , 115 - 86 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Wednesday evening . Both teams received news about their key big men down earlier in the day , but the details were of a markedly different nature . While the Knicks ( 11 - 10 ) were buoyed by the fact that Enes Kanter ( back ) was ready to return from a back injury , the Heat ( 10 - 11 ) got word that Hassan Whiteside would miss the contest with left knee soreness . That pair of developments ultimately represented a major swing in New_York 's favor , as Miami looked positively overmatched early and often . Unsurprisingly , their biggest disadvantage was reflected on the boards , as the Knicks outrebounded them by a 52 - 31 margin without star seven - footer Kristaps Porzingis , who played only three minutes before suffering an ankle injury that sidelined him for the remainder of the contest . The home squad complemented their excellent work down low with an elite effort from the field , as they shot a blistering 60 percent on 73 attempts . Kelly Olynyk unexpectedly led the Heat in scoring over 25 minutes off the bench , posting 18 points . He complimented the total with five rebounds , two assists and one block . Tyler Johnson and Josh Richardson provided matching 13 - point tallies off the second unit and starting five , respectively . The former added three assists , one rebound , two steals and one block , while the latter supplied three rebounds , one assist , three steals and one block . Bam Adebayo , a 2017 first - round pick , drew the start for Whiteside and totaled nine points , five rebounds and two steals . James Johnson matched Adebayo 's total in 19 minutes off the bench and also mustered four boards , one assist and one steal . Kanter 's 22 - point , 14 - rebound double - double led the Knicks . He also managed an assist and a steal . Courtney Lee registered 17 points , five rebounds , two assists , three steals and one block . Tim Hardaway , Jr. collected 12 points , two assists and one steal . Doug McDermott poured in 12 points of his own and also contributed two boards , one assist and one block . Kyle O'Quinn , who moved back to the bench with Kanter 's return , still pitched in a solid nine points , seven rebounds , one assist and one steal in just 14 minutes , while Ramon Sessions , Willy Hernangomez and Lance Thomas supplied a trio of eight - point efforts . The Heat return home to tangle with the Charlotte Hornets on Friday night , while the Knicks remain home and await the Orlando Magic on Sunday afternoon .

The Knicks ran away with the game in the fourth , however , and as a result , the Celtics dropped their second straight game and continue to struggle on both ends of the court . The Chicago Bulls defeated the host New_York Knicks , 122 - 119 , in double overtime , at Madison_Square_Garden on Wednesday evening . It was a tight game the whole way with the Bulls holding the slight edge through the first . The tide turned in favor of New_York in the second , as they Knicks took a four - point lead into the half . The two teams poured in 30 points each in the third , with the Knicks carrying their four - point lead into the fourth . The Bulls picked it up in the fourth and pulled ahead by four point with 1:47 to go , however the Knicks tied it up on the next two possessions , leading to a tie game at 105 . Neither team scored for the final 1:21 leading to overtime . It looked like the Bulls would finish it , with a two - point lead with four second left in OT , but the Knicks executed a great side - inbounds play to pull off a game - tying dunk . The Bulls set the tone in the second overtime period , taking the first lead and staying one step ahead , to earn the much - deserved win in New_York . Lauri Markkanen led the way for the Bulls with 33 points and 10 rebounds , in 46 minutes of action . The epic battle fittingly featured a bit of everything , including the Pelicans ( 22 - 20 ) overcoming a 14 - point deficit that they opened the fourth quarter with . Anthony Davis , who led all scorers with 48 points , ultimately capped the rally by netting a layup with under three seconds remaining in regulation . In the extra period , a Jrue Holiday jumper with 1:52 left gave New_Orleans a 118 - 117 lead over the Knicks ( 19 - 24 ) , and both he and Davis would go on to add another five points to seal the hard - fought victory . The fourth - quarter surge was n't the only one of the game for the visitors , which also had to chip away from an early 29 - 13 first - quarter deficit . Both teams finished with identical 47 percent success rates from the field , but the Knicks were guilty of committing 22 of the game 's 41 turnovers . The New_York Knicks defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 111 - 95 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Tuesday evening . The Knicks ( 23 - 28 ) likely came into Tuesday 's contest with an extra air of confidence , given that they 'd already prevailed over the Nets ( 18 - 33 ) in their first three meetings this season . That self - assurance was validated from the opening tip , as New_York raced out to a 30 - 22 first - quarter advantage that had morphed into a dominating 61 - 41 lead by halftime . The 20 - point cushion was more than enough for the hosts to essentially tread water in the second half and still emerge with a relatively easy win . The Knicks did n't score under 25 points in any period on their way to 44 percent shooting night , which included an impressive 50 percent tally from long distance . They were effective on the other end of the floor as well , eliciting 17 turnovers from the Nets while limiting them to 42 percent shooting , a figure partly comprised of an unsightly 25 percent success rate from three - point range . DeMarre Carroll led the way for the Nets with a modest 13 points , which he supplemented with seven boards , two assists and two steals . Courtney Lee registered 12 points , two assists and one rebound . Michael Beasley matched Lee 's scoring total and hauled in 13 rebounds , leading the second unit in both categories . Jarrett Jack only tallied two points , four assists and one rebound while starting at point guard against his old squad . The Nets make the short trip back home and tangle with the Philadelphia 76ers on Wednesday night , while the Knicks hit the road and pay a visit to the Boston Celtics for a Wednesday evening showdown as well .

The Golden_State Warriors defeated the New_York Knicks 125 - 111 on Monday at Madison_Square_Garden . The Knicks ( 24 - 38 ) managed to stay competitive through the first half of the game , and they even went into halftime with a one - point lead over the defending champions . But then , the Warriors ( 47 - 14 ) , as they have done all season , kicked it up a notch in the third quarter . They went on to win the third period 39 - 18 , and there was no looking back from there . Every Golden_State started scored in double figures , with Klay Thompson 's 26 points leading the way . Kevin Durant and Steph Curry were n't too far behind , scoring 22 and 21 points respectively . In the end , it was a just another terrific shooting performance from the Warriors , who shot a scorching 48 percent from three and 52 percent from the field overall . For New_York , it was their newest member , Emmanuel Mudiay , who led the way scoring with 20 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting to go along with seven assists . His backups , rookie Frank Ntilikina and Trey Burke were also impressive off the bench , with Burke posting 18 points and five assists , while Ntilikina dropped 13 points of own . It was actually the Knicks ' bench that carried a majority of the offensive load Monday , with the reserves accounting for 65 of the team 's points . In the end , it was a pretty strong effort offensively for New_York , as they shot 40 percent from behind the arc and 49 percent from the field overall , but the Knicks just were n't able to keep pace with the NBA 's top team Monday night .
