The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the New_York Knicks , 118 - 110 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Thursday evening . The absence of postseason aspirations can sometimes lead to some surprise performances , as teams without a concern for playoff positioning can at times play a lot looser than they would otherwise . Moreover , the motivation of the spoiler role can also coax some unexpectedly strong efforts out of teams with unsightly records , and such was the dynamic that appeared to be at play in the first half Thursday . The Knicks ( 24 - 45 ) matched the postseason - hopeful 76ers ( 37 - 30 ) bucket for bucket in the first quarter before putting 36 more on the board in the second , resulting in a surprising 68 - 60 halftime lead . After New_York held serve in the third , Philadelphia had 12 minutes left to try and avoid the upset defeat . The light seemed to finally come on for the visitors after finding themselves down by six with 5:30 remaining following an Emmanuel Mudiay jumper . A 15 - 2 Sixers run over the ensuing 3:32 flipped the entire game script at a critical juncture and provided them with sufficient cushion to secure the critical win . Joel Embiid led the way for the Sixers with a 29 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and two blocks . Dario Saric followed with a 21 - point , 12 - rebound double - double of his own that also included one assist and one steal . J.J. Redick poured in 18 points and also supplied three rebounds , one assist and one steal . Robert Covington finished with 15 points , five rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Ben Simmons contributed a 13 - point , 12 - assist , 10 - rebound triple - double that also included one steal . Marco Belinelli tallied a bench - leading 10 points and added one rebound , one assist and two steals . Michael Beasley drew the start at power forward and paced the Knicks with 24 points , a total he supplemented with 13 rebounds , seven assists , one steal and one block . Courtney Lee supplied 16 points , one rebound , one steal and one block . Trey Burke matched Lee 's scoring total while leading the bench and also registered three assists , two rebounds and one steal . Kyle O'Quinn chipped in a 15 - point , 10 - rebound double - double and also pitched in one assist , three steals and one block . Enes Kanter delivered a 15 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included one assist . Mudiay accounted for 12 points , four assists and two steals . The Sixers head back home to take on the Brooklyn Nets on Friday evening , while the Knicks remain home and await a Saturday night visit from the Charlotte Hornets .
The Orlando Magic defeated the New_York Knicks , 97 - 73 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Tuesday evening . Both clubs presumably came into the contest looking to get another game in the home stretch of a miserable season over with , but ultimately , the Magic ( 23 - 54 ) proved to be the much more motivated squad . That was n't the case in the first half , however , as the Knicks ( 27 - 51 ) virtually matched them bucket for bucket and only trailed by one at intermission . The visitors pulled away after halftime , though , as they outscored New_York by a 51 - 28 margin over the third and fourth periods . As the final score implies , Orlando played some stifling defense , limiting their hosts to a 35 percent success rate from the floor , including an appalling 15 percent from distance . Mario Hezonja led the way for the Magic with 19 points , a total he supplemented with six rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Jamel Artis followed with 16 points and complemented it with six boards , two assists and one steal . Shelvin Mack provided a full stat line of 12 points , eight rebounds , eight assists and one steal . Nikola Vucevic generated an 11 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and one block . Khem Birch matched Vucevic 's scoring and rebounding totals while also dishing out two assists and recording three blocks . D.J . Augustin accounted for nine points , five assists , one rebound and one steal . Aaron Gordon endured a nightmarish shooting night , going 3 - for - 15 from the field , including 0 - for - 8 from behind the arc . That led to a modest line of seven points , four boards , three assists and two steals . Tim Hardaway , Jr. paced the Knicks with 16 points and added eight rebounds , two assists and one steal . Trey Burke poured in 15 points and also dished out four assists , ripped down one rebound and recorded one steal . Kyle O'Quinn drew another start for Enes Kanter ( back ) generated a 13 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and posted five blocks . Courtney Lee matched O'Quinn 's scoring total and also threw in a steal and a block . Lance Thomas produced six points , six rebounds , one assist and two steals . The Magic head back home and await a Wednesday night visit from the Dallas Mavericks , while the Knicks remain home and take on the Miami Heat in a Friday night battle .
The New_York Knicks defeated the Miami Heat , 122 - 98 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Friday . The Knicks ( 28 - 51 ) delivered an impressive performance in this game , dominating a playoff - bound team like the Heat ( 43 - 36 ) from start to finish on route to a huge win . New_York jumped ahead 34 - 23 in the first quarter and they never looked back , to the point that they ended winning all four quarters , 34 - 23 , 29 - 27 , 33 - 28 and 26 - 20 , respectively . The Knicks looked sharp on both ends of the court since they shot for 51 percent from the field and 47 percent from three - point range , while limiting Miami to 40 and 26 percent , respectively . Who would have thought that Damyean Dotson would be the Knicks ' top scorer ? He came off the bench and paced the Knicks ' offense with 30 points and 11 rebounds . Trey Burke had 17 points and four assists , while Tim Hardaway Jr. filled the stat sheet thanks to 15 points , five assists , four rebounds and two steals . Kyle O'Quinn added 14 points , 14 rebounds , and three blocks . The Heat could n't muster a lot of offense , but Goran Dragic had a solid performance since he finished with 15 points on 6 - 10 from the field . Hassan Whiteside had 14 points and six rebounds , while James Johnson had 12 points and four assists . Wayne Ellington came off the bench and chipped in with 10 points . No other Miami player scored in double digits .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the New_York Knicks , 115 - 102 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Saturday evening . The Bucks ( 43 - 37 ) found out earlier in the day that team MVP Giannis Antetokounmpo would miss the contest due to an ankle sprain , which automatically equated to a healthy heaping of extra offensive responsibility on the shoulders of the likes of fellow Big Three members Khris Middleton and Eric Bledsoe . Ultimately , all five members of the Milwaukee starting five enjoyed productive nights , and the second unit delivered a solid complementary total of 30 points . The visitors shot an impressive 48 percent overall and saved their best for last , compiling a game - high 35 points in the final period to seal the win over a competitive Knicks ( 28 - 52 ) squad . Middleton and Bledsoe did in fact lead the way with a pair of 22 - point tallies . The former added six rebounds , four assists and one block , while the latter chipped in 10 assists , three rebounds , one steal and one block . Jabari Parker drew the spot start in Antetokounmpo 's absence and delivered a 16 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included five assists and one steal . John Henson posted a 15 - point , 12 - rebound double - double and added one assist and three blocks . Even Tony Snell got in on the act , pouring in 10 points and supplementing them with four rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Jason Terry paced the second unit with nine points . Jarrett Jack was the surprise scoring leader for the Knicks , churning out 18 points , seven assists and five rebounds . Kyle O'Quinn turned in a 15 - point , 16 - rebound double - double while also dishing out five assists and recording four blocks . Courtney Lee accounted for 14 points and four rebounds . Michael Beasley supplied 13 points , six boards , two assists and one block . Damyean Dotson registered 11 points , three rebounds , two assists and three steals . Trey Burke mustered eight points , eight assists and four rebounds . Frank Ntilikina generated seven points , four assists and two rebounds . The Bucks return home and face off with the Orlando Magic on Monday night , while the Knicks remain home and await a Monday evening visit from the Cleveland Cavaliers .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the host New_York Knicks , 123 - 109 , at Madison_Square_Garden on Monday . Cleveland came into this game as a monster favorite and a 14 - point win shows just why . The second quarter really made the difference , as Cleveland rode a 35 - 24 second quarter to victory , leading by at least five points for the entirety of the second half . Free-throw shooting was huge , with Cleveland connecting on 24 - of - 28 and New_York hitting just 6 - of - 12 . Three-point shooting was also big , with the Cavaliers hitting 19 - of - 45 and New_York connecting on just 11 - of - 30 . The Cavaliers ( 50 - 31 ) were led by Kevin Love , as he tallied 28 points , five rebounds and two steals . LeBron James collected 26 points , six rebounds and 11 assists . J.R. Smith led the bench with 16 points , seven rebounds , four assists and two steals . Jordan Clarkson provided 16 points and three assists off the bench as well . The Knicks ( 28 - 53 ) were led by Michael Beasley , as he accrued 20 points , four rebounds , three assists and three steals . Frank Ntilinka totaled 17 points , six rebounds and five assists . Trey Burke accumulated 12 points and eight assists . Courtney Lee led the bench with 17 points and six rebounds . These teams will both play their season finale on Wednesday , as they have a rematch in Cleveland for their final outings of the year .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 108 - 92 , in Thursday 's season opener at Staples_Center . Strong frontcourt play helped push the Clippers to an easy win from the game 's early minutes , as Blake Griffin helped the team to a 70 run within the first six minutes . Griffin was able to dominate from all over the floor , scoring a game - high 29 points including three three - pointers . The Clippers ended up delivering punishing big man play throughout the game , as All-NBA center DeAndre Jordan tallied a whopping 24 rebounds in only 31 minutes of play . The new - look Clippers ( 10 ) enjoyed an ideal start to their season , as the team appeared to fire on all cylinders on both sides of the ball . Though the team lost superstar point guard Chris Paul to Houston over the offseason , LA still relied heavily on star power in Thursday 's win . Griffin not only scored a game - high 29 points , but delivered a double - double with 12 rebounds . Jordan , meanwhile , knocked down all four of his free - throw attempts , not allowing his weakness to be exploited as he dominated the boards . The game also saw the debut of a number of new faces for the Clippers . European rookie point guard Milos Teodosic got the start , logging 21 minutes of play and dishing out six assists . Teodosic looked more aggressive as the game progressed , attacking the lane and relying on kick - out passes more heavily in the second half . Newly acquired sixth man Lou Williams , meanwhile , enjoyed a 12 - point outing as he found a groove with the retooled Clippers second unit . For the Lakers ( 0 - 1 ) , Thursday 's season debut marked the first appearance by highly - touted rookie point guard Lonzo Ball . The debut did not go as planned , with Ball scoring only three points and shooting just 1 - of - 6 . Ball struggled with a tough matchup against First Team All-Defense point guard Patrick Beverly , who played aggressive and physical defense on the rookie all night . Still , Ball was able to contribute , as he pulled down nine rebounds and made a number of sharp outlet passes . The more impressive Lakers debut came from veteran center Brook Lopez , who led the team with 20 points . Lopez found a scoring groove in the second half and played effectively alongside ultra - athletic power forward Larry Nance Jr. , who had a 14 - point , 12 - rebound double - double . The Lakers will host the Suns on Friday , while the Clippers will see them on Saturday .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the host Los_Angeles Lakers , 119 - 112 , at Staples_Center on Sunday evening . The Pelicans ( 1 - 2 ) got out to a great start , scoring 68 points by halftime and accumulating a 21 - point lead late in the third quarter . The Lakers ( 1 - 2 ) , however , managed to bounce back with an incredible 34 - 8 run that took them to a 106 - 101 lead with 5:48 left in the game . Still there was time for one more swing , as the Pelicans rallied back with the help of some huge buckets down the stretch by E'Twaun Moore , to take back the win . Anthony Davis led the way for the Pelicans with 27 points , 17 rebounds , four steals , three blocks and three assists , in 39 minutes . DeMarcus Cousins offered a solid complement with 22 points , 11 rebounds , eight assists and two blocks , in 35 minutes . Moore finished the night with 19 points on 8 - of - 9 shooting . Jrue Holiday also put on a good show , with 14 points , six assists , five rebounds and four steals . The Pelicans hit 56 percent of their shots from the field and tallied 15 steals in the contest . Meanwhile , the Lakers fell just short of an amazing comeback despite three players scoring at least 20 points . Jordan Clarkson was the high - point man for the Lakers , with 24 points on 10 - of - 18 shooting . Kyle Kuzma continued to impress , finishing with 20 points , six rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 30 minutes off the bench . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope dropped 20 points on 7 - of - 11 shooting , in his first game of the season . Lonzo Ball had a tough shooting night , going 3 - of - 13 from the field , but finished with eight rebounds , 13 assists and a steal to go along with his measly eight points . The Lakers have some time to look things over before they are back in action on Wednesday , playing host to the Wizards . The Pelicans visit Portland to take on the Trail_Blazers on Tuesday .
The visiting Toronto Raptors took down the Los_Angeles Lakers , 101 - 92 , at Staples_Center on Friday . For the Raptors ( 3 - 2 ) , the game was perhaps somewhat too close for comfort . The Lakers were able to hold a lead with under five minutes remaining in the fourth quarter , but were quickly taken out of the game by a late Toronto run . As is often the case for the star - powered Raptors , the backcourt duo of Kyle Lowry and DeMar DeRozan helped fuel the offense to victory . DeRozan led the team with 24 points while also notching five assists . Lowry , meanwhile , earned a triple - double , finishing with 11 points , ten rebounds , and 12 assists . With center Jonas Valanciunas still sidelined by an ankle injury , the team once again slid sophomore Paskal Siakim into the starting five . Siakim lived up to the pressure , scoring an efficient 18 points in just 26 minutes of play time . Los_Angeles ( 2 - 3 ) , meanwhile , looked to be minutes from its second straight upset win before its late collapse . While much of the hype surrounding the Lakers rests on second - overall picks Lonzo Ball and Brandon Ingram , the rookie and sophomore duo disappointed on Friday . Ball 's shooting woes continued , as he shot just 2 - of - 7 from the field and 1 - of - 4 from beyond the arc . Ball did dish six assists , but finished with four turnovers as well . Ingram , meanwhile , earned only 23 minutes of playing time after shooting just 3 - of - 9 from the floor and committing three turnovers . Coach Luke Walton chose not to let either of the young prospects close the game , instead opting for older rookies Josh Hart and Kyle Kuzma . Kuzma , one of the rookie class 's biggest surprises , delivered an impressive double - double and was the team 's second scoring option throughout , finishing with 15 points on 13 attempted field goals . The Lakers will face the Jazz in Utah on Saturday , while Toronto will play the Portland Trail_Blazers on Monday .
The host Los_Angeles Lakers handily defeated the Detroit Pistons , 113 - 93 , on Tuesday at Staples_Center . Los_Angeles ( 3 - 4 ) relied on a balanced offensive approach to earn the win . Seven players scored in double figures for LA , with Julius Randle posting a team high of 17 in just 17 minutes of play . Los_Angeles made use of its depth , playing only one player more than 27 minutes in the game . The winning effort started early , as quick transition offense helped Los_Angeles go on an early 70 run to open up a lead against the slower - paced Pistons . Big man Larry Nance Jr. contributed four early fast - break points , finishing the game with 14 points and a team - high 12 rebounds . Rookie Lonzo Ball was also effective , scoring 13 points on 6 - of - 13 shooting . The reasonable efficiency was an improvement for Ball , who has struggled with his shooting to open the season . Detroit ( 5 - 3 ) had been among the league 's hottest teams before being blown out in LA . The Pistons fell to third in the East with the loss . Early in the game , turnovers proved an issue for Detroit . With Los_Angeles 's length and athleticism , the lack of motion in the Pistons offense led to a number of intercepted passes that turned into transition points . However , the bigger downfall for Detroit was a lack of aggressiveness around the rim . The Pistons were seemingly unable to get to the line on Tuesday , attempting just two free - throws on the game . The Pistons ' only made free - throw came from Reggie Jackson , who led the team with 18 points and five assists . The Lakers will visit Portland on Thursday , while Detroit will host the Bucks on Friday .
The host Los_Angeles Lakers took down the Brooklyn Nets , 124 - 112 , at Staples_Center on Friday . The Lakers ( 4 - 5 ) have looked relatively strong over their past three games , going 2 - 1 over that stretch with the single loss coming at the buzzer against Portland . On Friday , Los_Angeles delivered another stellar performance , earning a double - digit win over the Brooklyn Nets . It was the first time the two teams have squared off since the trade that sent All-Star center Brook Lopez to L.A. in exchange for promising young guard D'Angelo Russell . Lopez got the better of his former team in the matchup , scoring a game - high 34 points while also pulling down ten rebounds and blocking three shots . Lopez 's frontcourt production came at an important time for the Lakers , as the team recently lost big man Larry Nance Jr. to a hand fracture that is expected to sideline him for at least four weeks . While L.A. was able to earn the win , it saw another unfortunately poor outing from highly - touted rookie Lonzo Ball . Ball finished the game with just six points on 3 - of - 15 shooting , dropping his overall field goal percentage to just over 30 percent on the season . The reigning second overall pick will hope to improve his shooting as the Lakers go forward . On the Nets ' ( 3 - 6 ) side , D'Angelo Russell did not deliver the showing he may have hoped against his former team . Russell delivered 17 points , seven rebounds , and seven assists , but shot just 8 - of - 24 on the night . The team could have used improved efficiency from Russell , as he shot just 42 percent from the field on the night . Brooklyn also struggled from beyond the arc , shooting just 9 - of - 38 from deep . New addition Allen Crabbe , meanwhile , delivered a team - high 25 points while shooting 6 - of - 11 from the field . Crabbe played just 28 minutes off the bench , but delivered a significant spark to Brooklyn 's offense . Los_Angeles will host the Memphis Grizzlies on Sunday , while the Nets will visit Phoenix on Monday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the visiting Memphis Grizzlies 107 - 102 at Staples_Center on Sunday . The Lakers ( 5 - 5 ) rode the hot hand of Brandon Ingram through the first half and continued to see efficient play from rookie Kyle Kuzma , as they were able to hold off a late rally by the Grizzlies to come away with the home victory . A slight scare occurred for Kentavious Caldwell-Pope after it looked like he injured his hip , however , a brief stint in the locker room was all it took for the offseason acquisition to return to the floor . Caldwell-Pope went on to log 15 points across 35 minutes . Down 18 points to begin the fourth quarter , Memphis ( 6 - 3 ) brought it within three points with under one minute remaining after a Mike Conley three pointer and a flagrant foul from Brook Lopez put Dillon Brooks on the free throw line . Brooks put Lopez on the free throw line just a few seconds later which iced the game after Marc Gasol missed a three pointer on the ensuing possession . Ingram cooled off in the second half , but still finished with 20 points and seven rebounds on 7 - of - 14 shooting , while Lopez led the team in scoring with 21 points , five assists and two blocks . Jordan Clarkson was the bright spot off a bench that only ran four players deep , as he finished with 15 points , five assists and four boards across 20 minutes . Mike Conley led the way for the Grizzlies starters and added 23 points , five rebounds and three dimes on 9 - of - 17 shooting , while Tyreke Evans led all scorers with 26 points on 10 - of - 16 shooting off the bench . Next up , the Grizzlies will visit the Portland Trail_Blazers on Tuesday , while the Lakers head to Boston to face the Celtics on Wednesday .
The Philadelphia 76ers took down the host Los_Angeles Lakers , 115 - 109 , at Staples_Center on Wednesday . Philadelphia ( 8 - 6 ) was fueled by a monstrous career night from sophomore big man Joel Embiid . Embiid dominated all aspects of the game , finishing with a career - best 46 points to go with 15 rebounds , seven assists , and seven blocked shots . The star center drew non - stop attention from the Los_Angeles defense , earning 19 trips to the line in the game . Embiid scored his points on unbelievable efficiency , shooting 14 - of - 20 from the field and 16 - of - 19 from the free - throw line . Embiid and rookie big man Ben Simmons led the charge for the 76ers , who saw struggles from their perimeter shooters . The team shot only 22 percent from three - point range , but still racked up 115 points on the night and shot 49 percent from the field . Simmons added 18 points , nine rebounds , and ten assists to Philly 's winning effort . Los_Angeles ( 6 - 9 ) saw a relatively strong showing thanks to their own sophomore star . Second-year forward Brandon Ingram led the team with 26 points , 11 rebounds , and two blocks . Rookie Kyle Kuzma added another 24 points while starting alongside Ingram at the other forward slot . The duo shot a combined 20 - of - 36 from the field , bolstering a Lakers offense that hit just 38 percent of its shot overall on the night . A large part of that was rookie point guard Lonzo Ball , who struggled heavily on Wednesday . Ball was forced to sit the fourth quarter due to poor play , as he shot just 1 - of - 9 from the field and committed two turnovers while dishing just two assists . The rookie remains in the bottom five in the league in field goal percentage . Los_Angeles will host the Phoenix Suns on Friday , while Philadelphia hosts the Golden_State Warriors on Saturday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Chicago Bulls , 103 - 94 , at Staples_Center on Tuesday evening . The battle of two young squads began with a tightly - contested first quarter that the Bulls ( 3 - 12 ) emerged from with a slim 27 - 23 lead . Chicago impressively continued to pour it on in the second , leading to a 56 - 42 halftime edge . However , the Lakers ( 8 - 10 ) seemed to have gotten a wake - up call at intermission , as they exploded for 61 second - half points . In all , the visitors enjoyed a much more balanced effort from their first unit , as each starter posted double - digit scoring . In comparison , the Lakers saw only three first - string players manage the feat , but that was offset by a combined 22 points from Jordan Clarkson and Julius Randle off the bench . Both teams notably finished in a 54 - 54 deadlock on the glass for the night . The emerging Denzel Valentine led the way for the Bulls with 17 points , nine rebounds , four assists and two steals . Antonio Blakeney contributed a bench - leading 15 points and supplemented them with two boards and one assist . Robin Lopez posted 14 points , three boards , two assists and one block . Standout rookie Lauri Markkanen pitched in with a 13 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and one block . Kris Dunn poured in 12 points and added six assists , five rebounds , one steal and one block . Justin Holiday rounded out the starting five 's impressive night with a 10 - point , 10 - rebound double - double . Kyle Kuzma paced the Lakers with 22 points , a total he complemented with five assists and three rebounds . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope continued to flash much more well - rounded production than he 's been known for thus far in his career , supplying a near double - double of 21 points , nine rebounds , four assists and three steals . Brandon Ingram registered 17 points , five assists , five rebounds , two blocks and one steal . Clarkson tallied 12 points , while Randle , who posted a 10 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also featured two assists and two blocks , scored eight of his points in the pivotal third period . Lonzo Ball continued to struggle from the field ( 3 - 13 FG , 2 - 8 3Pt ) , but he finished with a respectable line of eight points , 13 rebounds , four assists and one steal . Brook Lopez mustered a modest four points but brought down nine rebounds . The Bulls continue their road trip with a visit to the Utah Jazz on Wednesday night , while the Lakers tangle with the Sacramento Kings on the road Wednesday as well .
The Houston Rockets demolished the host Los_Angeles Lakers , 118 - 95 , on Sunday night . Houston ( 18 - 4 ) has won seven straight and sits atop the Western_Conference standings , holding a one - game lead on the Golden State Warriors for first place . Since the return of star point guard Chris Paul , the Rockets own the number one offensive and defensive rating in the NBA . On Sunday , the team showcased its abilities on both sides of the ball , shooting over 50 percent while holding LA to just 38 percent from the field . League-leading scorer James Harden had a team - high 36 points on 13 - of - 22 shooting . Harden also dished out nine assists . Two other Rockets guards scored over 20 points , as Chris Paul and Eric Gordon poured in 21 and 22 respectively . As a team , Houston , which is currently shattering the all - time three - point attempts per game record , had 14 three - pointers on 37 attempts . Los_Angeles ( 8 - 15 ) fell to 3 - 10 in its last 13 games with Sunday 's loss . The team struggled to find any offense against the powerhouse Rockets on Sunday , shooting just 38 percent from the field . Still , it was a strong game from rookie forward Kyle Kuzma . Kuzma came off the bench , scoring 22 points and pulling down 12 rebounds . Sophomore Brandon Ingram scored 18 points and came away with nine rebounds and six assists , continuing a strong stretch of play for the former second overall pick . It was not as strong an outing for the reigning second overall pick , Lonzo Ball , who shot 0 - of - 4 and finished the night with just two points and one rebound . Ball now ranks dead last in the league in just about every shooting category , posting just 38 percent true shooting and 25 percent from three - point range . The Lakers will play the Philadelphia 76ers on Thursday , while the Rockets will face off against the Utah Jazz .
The Golden_State Warriors took down the Lakers , 116 - 114 , in overtime at Staples_Center on Monday . Both of the matchups between the two teams this season have now been won by Golden_State in OT . While Monday 's action was close until the very end , much of the attention at Staples_Center was not directed towards the players on the floor . Monday night marked the formal retirement of Lakers legend Kobe Bryant 's number 8 and number 24 jerseys , and both teams had a chance to stay out on the floor to watch the festivities at halftime . Bryant , the former MVP , became the first Laker to have multiple jersey numbers retired . The night did not exactly have a storybook ending for Kobe , though , as Kevin Durant and the Warriors ( 24 - 6 ) handed a heartbreaking loss to his former team . With superstar Steph Curry ( ankle ) and defensive stalwart Draymond Green ( rest ) sidelined , Durant carried a heavy workload throughout the night . Things got off to a rocky start for the former MVP , as he began the game just 5 - of - 23 from the field and allowed the Lakers to hold leads as late as the fourth quarter . Durant , though , bounced back in a big way . He hit five of his final six shots and scored 12 points in overtime to put the game away for Golden_State . Durant finished the night with a game - high 36 points and a team - best 11 rebounds and eight assists . The superstar 's performance nearly single - handedly led the Warriors to victory , as the team 's next - highest scorer was Klay Thompson with just 17 points on 6 - of - 24 shooting . Los_Angeles ( 10 - 18 ) may be having flashbacks to its most recent game against Golden_State , another narrow overtime loss at home . Once again , it was young players that allowed the Lakers to push the defending champs to the edge . Rookie forward Kyle Kuzma was the team 's leading scorer , pouring in 28 points on the night . Small forward Brandon Ingram , meanwhile , scored 19 points and hit multiple shots to help tie the game late in regulation . Ultimately , though , the Lakers were unable to contain Durant and could not match the tough effort put up by the Warriors on the boards . The Lakers were out - rebounded 60 - 46 on the night . The Lakers will visit Houston on Wednesday , while Golden_State will host the Memphis Grizzlies .
The Portland Trail_Blazers edged the Los_Angeles Lakers , 95 - 92 , at Staples_Center on Saturday . Portland ( 17 - 16 ) earned a much - needed win thanks to strong crunch - time play . The team was again without star point guard Damian Lillard ( hamstring ) , who likely could have helped the Blazers breathe easier down the stretch . Still , Portland came out on top of what wound up being a one - quarter game , as the two teams entered the fourth tied at 70 . With Lillard out , shooting guard C.J . McCollum took a leading role in the offense , attempting a team - high 23 field goals . It was not McCollum 's best performance , though , as he made just seven of those shots and missed two jumpers in the game 's final minutes . With McCollum struggling , bench wing Mo Harkless stepped up to the plate , scoring a team - high 22 points including a go - ahead and - one basket with just over 20 seconds remaining . Harkless was complemented by another unlikely hero , point guard Shabazz Napier , who exploded for 21 points in the game . The duo helped push a Lillard-less Blazers over the top despite a nerve - wracking final few minutes . Los_Angeles ( 11 - 20 ) lost a heartbreaker on Saturday , with poor late - game shooting making the difference . Shooting guard Kentavious Caldwell-Pope missed multiple three - pointers in the game 's final seconds , giving Portland the chance to pull away with the win . Despite the team 's shooting woes down the stretch , the Lakers saw stellar clutch play from a few of its young stars . Lonzo Ball in particular had a terrific end to the game , coming up with two blocked shots and a three - pointer in the final stretch of the game . Ball finished the night with a double - double , notching 10 points and 11 assists . Still , a win was not in the cards for the Lakers . Poor free - throw shooting was among the factors that cost the team on Saturday , as they went just 12 - of - 20 from the line . The tough performance at the stripe was far from uncharacteristic for LA , as the team ranks last in the league in free - throw percentage at just over 69 percent . The Lakers will host the Timberwolves on Christmas Day , while Portland will square off with the 76ers next Thursday .
The visiting Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 121 - 104 , in a Christmas matchup at Staples_Center . Though the final score did not reflect it , it was a back - and - forth game for most of the night . Minnesota ( 21 - 13 ) held only a one - point lead at halftime , but pulled ahead significantly in the fourth quarter . Star center Karl-Anthony Towns helped jump - start the Timberwolves ' run , personally scoring eight points in the first three minutes of the fourth . Towns finished with 21 points and a team - high 10 rebounds . Towns also came up big on the defensive end with three blocks and two steals . Veteran big man Taj Gibson helped close the game out effectively , knocking down a dagger three - pointer with under two minutes remaining . Gibson finished 11 - of - 13 from the field en route to 23 points , tied for the team high with All-Star Jimmy Butler . Los_Angeles ( 11 - 21 ) was shorthanded on Monday , as rookie Lonzo Ball ( shoulder ) , sophomore Brandon Ingram ( quad ) , and veteran Brook Lopez ( ankle ) were all sidelined by injuries . With many of LA 's top scoring options out , rookie forward Kyle Kuzma led the Lakers ' offense , scoring 31 points . Kuzma has been a dominant force for LA recently , scoring 18 or more points in his last seven games . Outside of Kuzma , though , offense was hard to come by for the Lakers . The rest of the team shot just 4 - of - 19 from beyond the arc on the night and reached the free - throw line only seven times . It was a particularly tough night for guard Kentavious Caldwell-Pope . Caldwell-Pope , who missed two potential game - saving shots in the Lakers ' last game , shot just 3 - of - 14 from the field in Monday 's loss . On Wednesday , Minnesota will host the Denver Nuggets , while Los_Angeles will host the Memphis Grizzlies .
The Los_Angeles Clippers took down the Los_Angeles Lakers , 121 - 106 , at Staples_Center on Friday night . After a season filled with injuries , the Clippers ( 15 - 19 ) were the healthiest they have been since October on Friday night . All-Star big man Blake Griffin , who missed 11 games with a knee injury , returned to the starting lineup in the game . Griffin did n't skip a beat in his comeback , as he logged 32 minutes of play and led his team with 24 points . His return will certainly have an impact on the Clippers going forward , as they are just 4 - 7 with Griffin out of the lineup this season . The re - vitalized Clippers got off to a hot start on Friday , opening the game on a 90 run and establishing a double - digit lead within the first three minutes of the game . From there , it was smooth sailing for the Clippers , as there was little fluctuation in the team 's well - established lead . Guard Austin Rivers was a spark for his team , scoring 10 of their first 14 points . He finished the night with just 13 , though . Off the bench , sixth man Lou Williams helped maintain the lead , scoring 23 points . On the other hand , the Lakers ( 11 - 23 ) are dealing with a variety of injuries across the roster . Rookie guard Lonzo Ball ( shoulder ) and veteran big man Brook Lopez ( ankle ) both sat out of Friday 's action . Lopez 's stellar three - point shooting would have been appreciated on Friday , as his team had its worst night of the season from three - point territory . The Lakers shot just 3 - of - 19 from beyond the arc on the night . Rookie forward Kyle Kuzma had a particularly poor shooting night , going just 1 - of - 7 from three . He has now hit just two of his last 18 three - point attempts . With the three - ball not falling for the starters and injuries forcing a shallow eight - man rotation , the Lakers were unable to mount much of a comeback effort through the game 's final three quarters . Guard Jordan Clarkson did provide some offense off the bench , scoring a team - high 20 points . Still , it was a wire - to - wire win for the Clippers , who led for all 48 minutes of action . The Clippers will host the Charlotte Hornets on Sunday , while the Lakers will visit the Houston Rockets .
The visiting Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 133 - 96 , at Staples_Center on Wednesday . Oklahoma_City ( 21 - 17 ) made quick work of the struggling Lakers , jumping out to a double - digit lead in the second quarter and never giving it up . The team 's early offensive onslaught was largely thank to its `` big three `` of Russell Westbrook , Paul George , and Carmelo Anthony . All three scored at least 20 points in the win . Westbrook was particularly dominant , dishing out 12 assists to go with his scoring total despite just 28 minutes of playing time . Center Steven Adams also delivered a solid outing in limited playing time . In just 26 minutes , Adams had 12 points and six rebounds , three of which came on the offensive end . Adams leads the NBA with 5 offensive rebounds per game . Los_Angeles ( 11 - 26 ) owns a league - high eight game losing streak and the worst record in the Western_Conference . On Wednesday , things looked as bleak as ever for the struggling team . The Lakers shot just 41 percent from the field and 9 - of - 15 at the free - throw line in the 37 - point loss . Wednesday 's win did , though , see the return of veteran center Brook Lopez . Lopez had suffered an extended absence due to an ankle sprain , but played 16 minutes off the bench . He had 10 points and five rebounds in his return to action . The team 's high scorer was rookie Kyle Kuzma , who shot 7 - of - 14 en route to 18 points . The Thunder will stay in LA to take on the Clippers on Thursday , while the Lakers will play host to the Charlotte Hornets on Friday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 132 - 113 , at Staples_Center on Sunday to end a nine - game losing streak . The Lakers ( 12 - 27 ) put the game away with a strong second quarter . Early in the second , LA 's offense got red - hot , allowing the team to go on a whopping 23 - 3 run . Eight points on the run came from rookie point guard Lonzo Ball , who also assisted on multiple baskets during the hot stretch . He finished the game with 13 points on 5 - of - 13 shooting and six assists . Rookie forward Kyle Kuzma also broke a longstanding cold streak to contribute heavily to the team 's second quarter run . He had multiple baskets in the second quarter and shot 6 - of - 12 on the night to score 14 points off the bench . Sophomore forward Brandon Ingram led the team overall with 20 points . Atlanta ( 10 - 29 ) now has the league 's worst record by a two - game margin , despite entering Sunday 's game having gone 3 - 3 in its last six . On Sunday , point guard Dennis Schroder was able to have a strong game despite his team 's lack of success . Schroder scored 27 points and had five assists on the night . The team seemed to struggle without him on the floor creating offense . Backup point guard Malcolm Delaney posted a team - worst plus - minus of - 24 . As a whole , the Hawks shot an inefficient 44 percent on the night . The Hawks will stay in Los_Angeles to play the Clippers on Monday . The Lakers , meanwhile , will host the Sacramento Kings on Tuesday .
THe Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the visiting Sacramento Kings , 99 - 86 , at Staples_Center on Tuesday evening . The Lakers got out to a great start on their home court , with a 22 - 6 lead just five minutes into the game . The Kings were able to retaliate and make it a four - point game heading into the second , trailing 31 - 27 . The Kings carried their momentum into the second quarter , where they hung tight with the Lakers , until the half , where Los_Angeles led 53 - 52 . The Kings came out strong in the third , quickly taking the lead , however the Lakers turned it on down the stretch , as they went on a 120 run and took a 10 - point lead into the fourth . The Lakers maintained control the rest of the way , earning their second straight win . Julius Randle led the way for the Lakers , with 22 points , 14 rebounds , six assists and one steal , in 30 minutes . Brook Lopez tallied 18 points on 6 - of - 9 shooting , in 22 minutes , while Lonzo Ball finished with five points on 2 - of - 10 shooting , 11 rebounds , 11 assists , five steals and one block , in 36 minutes . The Lakers shot 48 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 35 from long range . Meanwhile , Bogdan Bogdanovic was the high - point man for the Kings , with 19 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting , in 32 minutes off the bench . De'Aaron Fox followed up with 15 points , four steals , three assists , one rebound and a block , in 32 minutes , while Buddy Hield added 13 points on 4 - of - 11 shooting . The Kings shot 34 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 22 from long range . The Kings ( 13 - 27 ) will look to bounce back , as they play host to he Clippers on Thursday . The Lakers ( 13 - 27 ) play host to the Spurs on Thursday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the visiting San_Antonio Spurs , 93 - 81 , at Staples_Center on Thursday evening . The Spurs were at a disadvantage , without Kawhi Leonard , Rudy Gay , Tony Parker or Danny Green , who were all sidelined with injuries . Nonetheless , it was a hard - fought game most of the way . The Lakers got out to a 20 - 15 lead after one . They expanded their lead through the second to take a 49 - 38 lead into the half . The Spurs woke up in the third quarter and cut the deficit by five . The Spurs continued to fight and trailed by just two points , with 6:2 left in the fourth . However , the Lakers picked up the intensity and sprinted to a 16 - 6 run to close out the contest and notch their first three - game winning streak of the season . Brandon Ingram led the way for the Lakers with 26 points on 11 - of - 21 shooting , in 36 minutes of action . Lonzo Ball stuffed the stat sheet with 18 points , 10 rebounds , six assists and four steals , while Larry Nance Jr. almost matched him , with 14 points , 10 rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block , off the bench . The Lakers shot 42 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 37 from long range . Meanwhile , LaMarcus Aldridge led the Spurs with 20 points on 6 - of - 15 shooting , in 35 minutes . Dejounte Murray had a solid game , with 14 points , 11 rebounds , five assists , three steals and one block , in 26 minutes . Bryn Forbes tallied 18 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting , in 37 minutes . The Spurs shot 41 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 20 from long range . The Spurs ( 28 - 15 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Nuggets on Saturday . The Lakers ( 14 - 27 ) head to Dallas to take on the Mavericks on Saturday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers took down the Indiana Pacers , 99 - 86 , at Staples_Center on Friday . The Lakers ( 16 - 29 ) became the first team in NBA history to win a game while shooting below 20 percent from the free - throw line . The poor free - throw shooting was on - brand for the Lakers , who rank last in the league in free - throw percentage this season . Despite going a dismal 2 - of - 14 at the charity stripe , the team was fairly potent on the offensive end . LA shot 55 percent from the field and enjoyed a dominant performance from combo guard Jordan Clarkson . Clarkson scored 33 points on 14 - of - 19 shooting from the field . The win was LA 's first this season without point guard Lonzo Ball , who missed the contest with a knee injury . Sophomore Brandon Ingram ( ankle ) was also sidelined . Indiana ( 24 - 22 ) , on the other hand , struggled heavily on the offensive end . The team shot just 2 - of - 25 from three - point range and 38 percent overall from the field . Indiana also struggled with turnovers , committing 18 on the night . It was altogether one of the team 's worst offensive nights of the season . Still , star shooting guard Victor Oladipo was able to excel individually . He scored 25 points to go with five rebounds and four assists . LA will host the New_York Knicks on Sunday , while the Pacers will visit San_Antonio .
The Los_Angeles Lakers took down the Boston Celtics , 108 - 107 , at Staples_Center on Tuesday . Early on in the game , Boston flexed its top - ranked defense , holding the Lakers to just 15 first - quarter points . Things were especially solid with defensive anchor Al Horford in the game , as the Lakers scored just nine points on 19 percent shooting while the newly - named All-Star was on the floor in the first quarter . Horford subbing out , though , marked a turning point . The Lakers scored 22 points in the next eight minutes of play and regained the lead . While Boston was able to suppress them and take an eight - point lead into the half , LA came out strong in the third quarter and managed to take the lead for much of the remainder of the game . The team 's free - throw woes nearly cost them the game , though , as Boston was able to cut the lead from six points with 26 seconds remaining to just one with 7 seconds left . Luckily for the Lakers , a bad buzzer - beater attempt from Marcus Smart did not fall , and they were able to hang on to the upset . The big story of the night for Los_Angeles ( 18 - 29 ) was Kyle Kuzma , who had a team - high 28 points off the bench in the win . 17 of those points came in the fourth quarter , as the rookie electrified the Staples_Center crowd with a series of clutch three - pointers and flashy passes . Jordan Clarkson joined Kuzma as one of two Lakers to score 20 or more off the bench . He finished with 22 in the game . Boston ( 34 - 14 ) has made its identity on the defensive end this season , but has seen that fall apart somewhat over the last four games . The team is on a four - game losing streak and seemed unable to contain the Lakers on Tuesday night . The saving graces were the team 's two All-Stars , Kyrie Irving and Al Horford . Irving was lights - out late in the game and finished with a game - high 33 points . Horford , who was named an All-Star earlier in the day , finished with 13 points , 12 rebounds , six assists , and two blocks . The Celtics will stay in Los_Angeles to face the Clippers on Wednesday . The Lakers , meanwhile , will hit the road to square off with Chicago on Thursday .
The host Los_Angeles Lakers beat the Phoenix Suns , 112 - 93 , at Staples_Center on Tuesday . It has been an incredible turnaround for the Lakers ( 22 - 31 ) this season . After falling to last place in the Western_Conference , Los_Angeles has gone 11 - 4 in its last 15 games and has won seven of nine after Tuesday 's win . The team dominated the second half on Tuesday , with its young wings leading the way . Brandon Ingram had a team - high 26 points , while Josh Hart had a 15 - point , 11 - rebound double - double . The Lakers closed out the game with strong defense , holding Phoenix ( 18 - 37 ) to just 14 fourth quarter points . Five Lakers players scored in double digits , including Ingram and Hart . Forward Julius Randle was the leading scorer for the second unit with 21 points . One of the biggest areas for the Lakers in the win was free - throw shooting . While the team has shot under 70 percent from the line this season , it managed to go 23 - of - 26 from the charity stripe in Tuesday 's win . For Phoenix , meanwhile , nothing came easy on offense . The team shot just 38 percent from the field and had only two players score more than 10 points . One of those players , though , was rookie wing Josh Jackson . Jackson has been dynamic recently , averaging 20 points and seven rebounds over his last five games . On Tuesday , he scored 16 points and pulled down 10 boards . Phoenix will host the San_Antonio Spurs on Wednesday , while the Lakers will host the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Thursday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers took down a shorthanded Oklahoma_City Thunder , 106 - 81 , at Staples_Center on Thursday . With ankle injuries keeping reigning MVP Russell Westbrook and veteran forward Carmelo Anthony out of the lineup , offense was hard to come by for the Thunder ( 31 - 25 ) . This was particularly pronounced in the second half , as OKC scored only 35 points over the third and fourth quarter . The Thunder had an unusually inefficient night , shooting just 36 percent from the floor in the absence of their two stars . The Lakers ( 23 - 31 ) , meanwhile , came out strong in the second half and scored 31 third - quarter points . The team had five double - digit scorers in the win and knocked down 10 three - pointers . The 25 - point win marked their largest margin of victory this season . This was all despite the team being shorthanded following a deadline - day trade . Los_Angeles agreed to ship Jordan Clarkson and Larry Nance , Jr. to Cleveland in exchange for Channing Frye , a first - round pick , and former Boston Celtics star Isaiah Thomas . Neither of the Lakers ' new additions were able to join the team for Thursday 's win , but the team earned the easy win nonetheless . LA 's top scorer was Kentavious Caldwell-Pope , who had 20 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting . Brandon Ingram scored 19 points and dished out six assists . Julius Randle , whose name was tossed around in trade rumors before the deadline , scored another 17 . For OKC , All-Star forward Paul George had a green light with Westbrook and Anthony absent . George scored a team - high 29 points and attempted 25 shots to get there . While the team missed the majority of its shots , center Steven Adams did provide them with plenty of second chances . He had seven offensive rebounds on the night . The Lakers will visit Dallas on Saturday , while OKC will host the Memphis Grizzlies on Sunday .
The host Los_Angeles Lakers took down the Dallas Mavericks , 124 - 102 , at Staples_Center on Friday . It was a wire - to - wire win for the Lakers ( 24 - 34 ) , who never trailed in the game . LA got off to a blistering start , outscoring Dallas ( 18 - 41 ) by 15 points in the first quarter . The team never took its foot off the gas , as it scored at least 29 points in all four quarters . The Lakers shot a phenomenal 52 percent from the field and hit 13 three - pointers in the win . It was a stellar game from recently - acquired point guard Isaiah Thomas . Thomas , whose tenure in LA got off to a shaky start before the All-Star Break , scored 17 points off the bench in the win . Rookie point guard Lonzo Ball made his return to action as well , scoring nine points off the bench in 17 minutes of play . It was forward Julius Randle who stole the show , though . Randle scored 18 points to go with 12 rebounds and 10 assists , good for his fourth career triple - double . Dallas was unable to bounce back from its numerous off - the - court scandals with a win on Friday . The team shot remarkably well from three - point range , hitting 19 three - pointers on over 45 percent shooting . Still , the team was weighed down by shooting just 41 percent overall . The Mavericks had seven double - digit scorers , but the team shot only 37 - of - 91 from the floor in the game . The Mavericks will visit Utah on Saturday , while the Lakers will travel to Sacramento .
The visiting Portland Trail_Blazers erased a double - digit fourth quarter deficit to defeat the Los_Angeles Lakers , 108 - 103 , at Staples_Center on Monday evening . After a tight first half , Portland ( 38 - 26 ) fell behind by double figures after getting into foul trouble . The Blazers committed 10 third - quarter fouls , allowing the Lakers ( 28 - 35 ) to hold a 10 - point edge in the quarter . All-Star point guard Damian Lillard was able to lead a comeback effort in the fourth , though . Lillard led the team with 39 points on the night , including four straight three - pointers in the fourth quarter . Lillard gave the Blazers the ultimate lead by hitting a three - pointer to go ahead 106 - 103 late in the game . C.J . McCollum missed two potentially game - sealing free - throws with 8 seconds remaining , but Shabazz Napier was able to finish the win with a game - icing block on LA 's Isaiah Thomas . In addition to Lillard 's 39 , McCollum scored 22 points and hit two three - pointers . Big man Jusuf Nurkic had 16 points and 16 rebounds for a double - double . The Blazers now have a one - game edge on the New Orleans Pelicans for third place in the Western_Conference . Los_Angeles , meanwhile , saw a dismal performance from Isaiah Thomas . Thomas shot just 5 - of - 21 from the field , including 1 - of - 9 from three - point range . Outside of Thomas , the team was relatively efficient . Julius Randle led the team with 21 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting . As a whole , LA hit 11 three - pointers . Portland will host the New_York Knicks on Tuesday , while Los_Angeles will see the Orlando Magic on Wednesday .
The host Los_Angeles Lakers took down the Orlando Magic , 108 - 107 , at Staples_Center on Wednesday . Wednesday 's game came down to the wire and finished in unorthodox fashion . Orlando ( 20 - 45 ) took a last - second lead thanks to a go - ahead layup from Aaron Gordon with just five seconds remaining . However , Los_Angeles ( 29 - 35 ) took the lead back with under a second remaining on a pair of free - throws from Brook Lopez . With 1 seconds left , Orlando had the chance to run an inbounds play , but a shot clock error ran time out before the ball entered play . The referees controversially chose to resolve this by declaring a jump ball , leaving Orlando with no chance to get a shot off . In addition to his game - winning free - throws , Lopez led the Lakers with 27 points . Lopez played 35 minutes and recorded no rebounds , making him the first center ever to have 25 or more points while not recording a rebound , as well as the first center to ever play 35 minutes without a rebound . Six LA players scored in double digits , including all five starters . Rookie forward Kyle Kuzma scored 20 points to go with 10 rebounds . For Orlando , meanwhile , Gordon led the team with 28 points . He added a team - high 14 rebounds , including four on the offensive end . Nikola Vucevic also had a double - double , scoring 24 points to go with 12 rebounds . As a team , the Magic shot well from the field , finishing over 50 percent of their field goal attempts . However , Orlando went just 11 - of - 19 from the free - throw line . The Lakers will visit Denver on Friday , while the Magic will travel to Sacramento .
The visiting Miami Heat took down the Los_Angeles Lakers , 92 - 91 , in a nail - biter at Staples_Center on Friday night . Miami ( 37 - 33 ) led for much of the game but needed a last - minute bucket to pull out the victory . After Kyle Kuzma gave the Lakers ( 31 - 38 ) a one - point lead with just under 90 seconds remaining , both teams went scoreless for over a minute . All-Star Miami guard Goran Dragic finally broke the drought with a game - winning 10 - foot shot with just 15 seconds remaining . The basket gave Dragic a game - high 30 points on the night . Dragic shot 10 - of - 18 from the field and his efficient scoring was much needed . Miami shot only 38 percent from the field as a team , and only one other Heat player scored more than 12 points . That was bench big man Kelly Olynyk , who chipped in 17 and managed a pair of blocks on former teammate Isaiah Thomas . What the Heat lacked on offense , though , they made up for on the other end . The team combined for 14 steals and forced 20 LA turnovers . Julius Randle led the Lakers in both scoring and rebounding for the fourth straight game . Randle had 25 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting to go with 12 rebounds . Veteran center Brook Lopez added another 18 points for the Lakers . Unfortunately for LA , the team saw little production from its bench . Sixth man Isaiah Thomas had a particularly poor night , shooting 1 - of - 9 for just five points . Thomas also committed three turnovers . On Monday , the Heat will host the Denver Nuggets while the Lakers will travel to Indiana .
The Los_Angeles Lakers took down the Dallas Mavericks , 103 - 93 , at Staples_Center on Wednesday night . The Lakers ( 33 - 41 ) suffered an unfortunate injury on Wednesday , as starting point guard Lonzo Ball limped off the court in the third quarter with a knee injury . Ball did not return to the game , reportedly suffering from a knee contusion . The loss comes at a bad time for the Lakers , as backup point guard Isaiah Thomas was recently declared out for the remainder of the season with a hip injury . Despite Ball 's absence , Los_Angeles was able to close the game in strong fashion . Defense was the key to the win for the Lakers , though the Mavericks ( 23 - 52 ) did themselves no favor with their shooting . Dallas scored only seven points in the first 10 minutes of the fourth quarter . The Mavericks could not take the lid of the basket all night , shooting just 39 percent from the field . Power forward Julius Randle helped the Lakers with 20 points and 10 rebounds . Randle has been electric recently , averaging over 20 points per game since the All-Star Break . He was a key force on the glass in Wednesday 's win as well , grabbing three offensive rebounds . Veteran center Brook Lopez was the team 's top scorer , pouring in 22 points in the win . For Dallas , meanwhile , scoring was not as easy . The team 's top scorer was veteran forward Harrison Barnes , who had 17 points . Rookie point guard Dennis Smith , Jr. , added another 14 points , but shot only 5 - of - 13 . Smith dished out a team - high eight assists . On Friday , Dallas will host the Minnesota Timberwolves , while Los_Angeles will see the Milwaukee Bucks .
The Milwaukee Bucks took down the Los_Angeles Lakers , 124 - 122 , in overtime at Staples_Center on Friday night . Eric Bledsoe dominated throughout , helping Milwaukee ( 41 - 35 ) to an overtime victory . Bledsoe scored 39 points , 11 of which came in the overtime period . The win helped the Bucks come back after ceding a major lead in the third quarter . The Bucks led by 19 points in regulation , but allowed a high - powered LA ( 33 - 42 ) offense to launch a comeback effort . Still , Bledsoe and the Bucks were able to hold the edge in overtime . Giannis Antetokounmpo added 27 points and 16 rebounds in the win . Antetokounmpo was particularly strong on the offensive glass , where he had six of his boards . Khris Middleton scored another 28 , contributing two of the team 's 11 three - pointers . Bledsoe , though , was the team 's leader , shooting 7 - of - 12 from three - point range and tallying a whopping 39 points in the win . The Lakers , meanwhile , saw a commanding performance from rookie forward Kyle Kuzma . Kuzma scored 27 points , recorded 12 rebounds , and dished out six assists . Julius Randle also had a double - double , finishing with 18 points and 10 rebounds . The team as a whole shot over 51 percent from the field . However , they knocked down only eight three - pointers on 30 percent from beyond the arc . On Sunday , the Bucks will visit Denver , while Los_Angeles will host the Sacramento Kings .
The Sacramento Kings narrowly escaped the Los_Angeles Lakers , 84 - 83 , at Staples_Center on Sunday evening . The game proved to be a brutal slog , as neither team could seem to buy a basket for the duration of the game . The Lakers ( 33 - 43 ) held an edge in overall efficiency despite shooting just 40 percent from the field and 64 percent at the free - throw line . Sacramento ( 25 - 53 ) , though , was able to overcome that deficiency by holding a slight edge in offensive rebounding and forced turnovers . The game was back - and - forth until the final minute , when De'Aaron Fox sealed the win with a floater that gave Sacramento a two - possession lead with just 10 seconds remaining . Fox had 14 points , six assists , and just one turnover in Sunday 's win , although he shot only 6 - of - 18 from the field . His performance was reflective of Sacramento 's offense as a whole , as the team shot just 38 percent but limited itself to only 10 turnovers . Sophomore guard Buddy Hield came off the bench to lead the team with 19 points . Hield shot 8 - of - 15 from the field , including three three - pointers , making him one of the Kings ' most efficient players on the night . The Lakers , meanwhile , were led by forward Julius Randle with 19 points . Randle has taken a leadership role in the team 's offense , averaging over 21 points per game since the All-Star Break . With Isaiah Thomas ( hip ) and Brandon Ingram ( concussion protocol ) out on Sunday , Randle 's offense was especially important for the team . He shot 5 - of - 8 from the field and 9 - of - 14 at the free - throw line . Only two other Lakers scored more than nine points , though , as the team struggled to find offensive production across the roster . On Tuesday , the Lakers will visit Utah while the Kings will travel to Sacramento .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 122 - 112 , in overtime at Staples_Center on Wednesday night . After a back - and - forth regulation , the Lakers ( 34 - 44 ) took a 108 - 106 edge when James Ennis scored a go - ahead layup with under 45 seconds remaining . San_Antonio ( 45 - 34 ) was able to answer , though , with a game - tying floater from sophomore point guard Dejounte Murray . While regulation had been closely contested , the overtime period was anything but close . The Lakers hopped out to a quick lead and did not look back , led by six overtime points from rookie forward Kyle Kuzma . Kuzma finished the game with a team high of 30 points . Shooting guard Kentavious Caldwell-Pope added 21 points , six rebounds , and six assists for the victorious Lakers , shooting 7 - of - 9 from the field along the way . As a whole , LA scored with immense efficiency , shooting over 54 percent from the field and a whopping 13 - of - 24 from beyond the three - point arc . Five Lakers players scored in double digits in the win . The Spurs , meanwhile , shot only 43 percent from the field . However , what the team lacked in efficiency , it made up for in offensive rebounding . The Spurs grabbed 15 offensive boards while holding LA to only four on the night . All-Star big man LaMarcus Aldridge grabbed three of those offensive rebounds , adding to a team - high scoring night . He had 28 points and dished out four assists . Dejounte Murray also grabbed three offensive rebounds and finished with a team high of 10 rebounds in addition to 23 points and six assists . Murray scored one of San_Antonio 's only two baskets in overtime . Los_Angeles will host the playoff - hungry Minnesota Timberwolves on Saturday . San_Antonio , meanwhile , will see the Portland Trail_Blazers on Sunday evening .
The visiting Minnesota Timberwolves took down the Los_Angeles Lakers , 113 - 96 , at Staples_Center on Friday night . All-Star wing Jimmy Butler made his return to action on Friday , following a nearly two - month absence due to a meniscus injury . Butler played only 23 minutes in his first game back , but he was still one of the five Minnesota ( 45 - 35 ) players to score in double digits . The Timberwolves took the lead with a strong third quarter effort , in which the Wolves nearly doubled Los_Angeles 's score . Minnesota enjoyed a 29 - 15 edge in the third quarter , which it followed with a 33 - point fourth quarter . Jeff Teague led the Timberwolves with a 25 - point performance . Minnesota as a whole recorded a whopping 18 rebounds , including four from veteran big man Taj Gibson . Gibson had a double - double with 18 points and 10 rebounds . All-Star center Karl-Anthony Towns scored 14 points to go with a team - high 11 rebounds . Los_Angeles ( 34 - 45 ) , meanwhile , was shorthanded , playing without Brandon Ingram ( concussion ) , Lonzo Ball ( knee ) , or Isaiah Thomas ( hip ) . The injuries took their toll , as only two LA starters scored in double digits in the loss . One of those starters was Julius Randle , who led the team with 20 points and also pulled down 10 rebounds . Randle has been LA 's top scorer since the All-Star Break , scoring over 21 points per game in that time frame . The Lakers will host the Utah Jazz on Sunday , while Minnesota will see the Memphis Grizzlies on Monday night .
The Utah Jazz defeated the host Los_Angeles Lakers , 112 - 97 , at Staples_Center on Sunday evening . The Jazz got out to a great start on the road , as they jumped out to a 19 - 4 lead within the first six minutes of the game . The Lakers made a push but the Jazz held on to lead 30 - 21 heading into the second . The Jazz were able to keep the lead through the second , leading by double digits most of the way , before the Lakers cut it to a six - point deficit by halftime . The Lakers make it a four - point game early in the third , but the Jazz took off from there , as they outscored the Lakers 32 - 23 in the quarter , to take an 82 - 67 lead into the fourth . They Jazz expanded their lead to 20 early in the fourth quarter and cruised to the win from there . With their fifth straight win , the Jazz clinched a spot in the playoffs . Donovan Mitchell led the Jazz with 28 points on 9 - of - 18 shooting , nine rebounds , eight assists , one steal and one block , in 38 minutes . Joe Ingles followed up with 22 points , 10 assists , four rebounds , one steal and one block , in 33 minutes . Jae Crowder came up big off the bench , with 18 points , three assists , two rebounds and one steal , in 29 minutes . The Jazz shot 51 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 36 from long range . Meanwhile , Josh Hart led the Lakers with 25 points on 10 - of - 18 shooting , four rebounds , two steals , two blocks and one assist , in 41 minutes . Tyler Ennis followed up with 22 points , six rebounds , three steals and two assists , in 29 minutes off the bench , while Julius Randle added 17 points , seven rebounds and four assists , in 24 minutes . The Lakers shot 40 percent from the field , including 5 - of - 25 from long range . The Lakers ( 34 - 46 ) play host to the Rockets on Tuesday . The Jazz ( 47 - 33 ) play host to the Warriors on Tuesday .
The visiting Houston Rockets took down the Los_Angeles Lakers , 105 - 99 , at Staples_Center on Tuesday night . The game had little bearing on either team , as Houston ( 65 - 16 ) has first place in the Western_Conference locked up , while the Lakers ( 34 - 47 ) are eliminated from playoff contention and do not own their own first - round draft pick . With the stakes low , many usual starters for both teams were either absent or played limited minutes . For Los_Angeles , Lonzo Ball ( knee ) and Brandon Ingram ( concussion ) both sat out Tuesday 's tilt , while Julius Randle and Brook Lopez both saw under 20 minutes of play . On Houston 's end , only two players saw more than 30 minutes on the court . The absence of familiar faces allowed a new one to earn attention , though . Guard Andre Ingram made his NBA debut for the Lakers on Tuesday , an event that had been years in the making . Ingram , a 32 - year - old American University product , had spent the last 10 years in the G-League but had never played a minute in the NBA until Tuesday 's game . The rookie made an immediate splash , scoring 11 points in his first six minutes and hearing MVP chants from the Staples_Center crowd . Ingram finished the game with 19 points and three blocks in 29 minutes of action . Despite Ingram 's inspiring performance , the Rockets were able to pull out a win with a strong second half . All-Star point guard Chris Paul led the team with 22 points in 27 minutes on the court . MVP contender James Harden added another 21 points while leading the team with 10 assists . The Rockets characteristically got the job done from beyond the arc , where they hit 16 three - pointers . Los_Angeles , meanwhile , saw a team - high 20 points from rookie guard Josh Hart . Julius Randle , meanwhile , had 17 points and eight rebounds despite playing only 18 minutes in the late - season game . Both teams will close out the season on Wednesday , with the Lakers taking on the Clippers and the Rockets visiting Sacramento .
The Orlando Magic defeated the visiting Miami Heat , 116 - 109 , at Amway_Center on Wednesday evening . The Heat started out strong and led 37 - 32 after the first quarter , but the Magic fought back to take a 58 - 55 lead into halftime . The Magic came out strong in the third and added to their lead . The Heat trailed by as many as 17 points before they battled back to bring it to a three - point game , with two minutes left . However , the Magic were able to close it out , in part thanks to a couple clutch plays by Evan Fournier . Fournier was the high - point man for Orlando ( 10 ) with 23 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting . Nikola Vucevic followed up with 19 points and 11 rebounds , while Terrence Ross chipped in 15 points , seven rebounds and four assists . Magic 's rookie Jonathan Isaac came up big with some hustle plays and finished with four points and seven rebounds in his NBA debut . Hassan Whiteside was massive for Miami ( 0 - 1 ) , with 26 points and 22 rebounds , in 36 minutes . The double - double marked the 122nd of his career with the Heat , putting him fourth on their all - time double - doubles list . Goran Dragic finished with 17 points , six assists and four rebounds , but shot only 6 - of - 19 from the field . Kelly Olynyk added 10 points , five rebounds and two assists in his Heat debut .
The Orlando Magic defeated the visiting Brooklyn Nets , 125 - 121 , at Amway_Center , on Tuesday evening . The Magic ( 3 - 1 ) came back from behind to pull an improbable win based on what we had seen in the first three quarters . The Nets had a nine - point advantage entering the final 12 minutes of action , but Orlando did n't give up and won the fourth quarter 38 - 25 . Aaron Gordon sealed the deal with a clutch three - pointer with only 36 seconds left , and the Nets missed three shots in the final 15 seconds to bury themselves in a game they failed to close out in the final minutes . Gordon had one of his best performances in his NBA career so far . The forward finished with a career - high 41 points ( on 14 - of - 18 shooting , 5 - of - 5 from three , and 8 - of - 10 from the charity stripe ) and added 14 rebounds as well . Evan Fournier chipped in with 28 points , six rebounds , five assists and three steals , while Nikola Vucevic added 12 points , nine rebounds , and two blocks . D.J . Augustin ( 19 points , seven assists ) and Jonathon Simmons ( 12 points off the bench ) contributed in double figures as well . As for the Nets ( 2 - 2 ) , D'Angelo Russell led the offense once again with 29 points , but was n't the facilitator the team needed as he only recorded one assist . Caris LeVert added 15 points , eight rebounds and five assists , while DeMarre Carroll chipped in with 17 points and six rebounds . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson contributed with 18 points , and all 11 Brooklyn players who saw action scored at least four points .
The Orlando Magic defeated the visiting San_Antonio Spurs 114 - 87 , at Amway_Center on Friday evening . The Magic ( 4 - 1 ) stunned the Spurs ( 4 - 2 ) by jumping out to a 32 - 18 lead through the first quarter . The Magic did not let up and expanded their lead to as many as 27 in the second quarter and up to 31 heading into the fourth quarter . The Spurs only managed to score more than 25 points in one of the four quarters , while the Magic did so in three of the quarters . Evan Fournier was on fire , with 25 points on 10 - of - 12 shooting , along with five rebounds , two assists and one steal , in only 26 minutes . Aaron Gordon chipped in 16 points , while Nikola Vucevic went 3 - of - 3 from long range , on his way to 15 points . Jonathan Simmons brought it against his former team , as he poured in 17 points on 8 - of - 13 shooting , in 22 minutes off the bench . Meanwhile , LaMarcus Aldridge led the Spurs with 24 points and 11 rebounds , in 29 minutes . Pau Gasol was the only other starter to score in double digits , with 12 points and 11 rebounds , in 25 minutes . Patty Mills was the only other Spurs player to score in double digits , with 12 points on 4 - of - 14 shooting , in 20 minutes off the bench . Rudy Gay had four blocks , seven points and four assists , in 23 minutes off the bench . The Spurs will look to bounce back , as they take on the Pacers in Indiana on Sunday . The Magic take on the Hornets in Charlotte on Sunday .
The Orlando Magic defeated the visiting New_York Knicks , 112 - 99 , at Amway_Center on Wednesday evening . The Knicks ( 6 - 5 ) were without their star player , Kristaps Porzingis , who was sidelined with a couple bumps and bruises from his previous outing . Nonetheless they managed to get out to a good start , and led 28 - 27 after the first quarter . However , the Magic ( 7 - 4 ) turned the tables in the second quarter and kept the pressure on the rest of the way , outscoring the Knicks in the second , third and fourth quarters . The Magic played a great team game , with three players topping the 20 - point mark and five scoring in double figures all together . Nikola Vucevic was the high - point man for Orlando , with 24 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting . Evan Fournier followed up with 23 points , five assists , five steals and two rebounds , in 33 minutes . Aaron Gordon added 21 points on 8 - of - 11 shooting , in 36 minutes . The Magic shot 53 percent from the field , including 46 percent from long range , and dished 31 assists on 43 field goals . Meanwhile , Tim Hardaway Jr. was the high - point man for New_York , with 26 points on 11 - of - 21 shooting , along with 11 rebounds , in 37 minutes . Courtney Lee added 12 points , while Enes Kanter chipped in 10 points . The only other player to score in double digits for the Knicks was Doug McDermott , who finished with 13 points . The Knicks shot 52 percent from the field and tallied 26 assists , yet saw their three - game winning streak come to an end . The Knicks go on to play host to the Kings on Saturday . The Magic will look to carry on the momentum as they head to Phoenix to take on the Suns on Friday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the host Orlando Magic , 125 - 85 , at Amway_Center on Saturday . Utah have been struggling over recent weeks , but a 40 - point win may be what they need to get out of it . The second and third quarters is where the Jazz got their separation , as they outscored the Magic , 68 - 41 . Defense really carried Utah , as they held Orlando to 39 percent from the field and 28 percent from three - point range . The Jazz also did that while winning the assist differential , 31 - 13 and the rebounding battle , 54 - 45 . The Jazz ( 7 - 10 ) were led by Rodney Hood , as he provided 31 points , five rebounds and two assists off the bench , going 7 - of - 13 from three - point range . Derrick Favors led the starters , as he tallied 25 points , 11 rebounds , three assists and two blocks on 10 - of - 12 shooting . Donovan Mitchell amassed 12 points , six rebounds , three assists and three steals . Jonas Jerebko got a rare start and totaled 15 points and six rebounds . The Magic ( 8 - 8 ) had only one player score more than 12 points , as Aaron Gordon led the team with 18 points and nine rebounds . Nikola Vucevic accumulated eight points , two rebounds , three steals and two blocks . Both teams return to action on Monday , with Orlando hosting the Indiana Pacers and Utah traveling to play the Philadelphia 76ers .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the host Orlando Magic , 105 - 97 , at Amway_Center on Monday evening . The Magic ( 8 - 9 ) started out strong , fighting hard through a close first quarter , before closing the half on a 110 run , to up 55 - 50 at the break . The Pacers ( 10 - 8 ) returned the favor in the third quarter , where they outscored the Magic 28 - 17 , thanks to a 14 - 3 run , and took the lead , 78 - 72 , heading into the final frame . Victor Oladipo left the game late in the fourth after getting hit in the head , but the Pacers were able to close it out , especially thanks to some clutch shooting from Bojan Bogdanovic , who finished with 26 points on 9 - of - 15 shooting , in 35 minutes . This marks the fourth straight win for the Pacers . Victor Oladipo came up huge against his former team , with 29 points , nine rebounds , seven assists , seven steals and two blocks , in 34 minutes . Thaddeus Young chipped in 17 points and five rebounds , while Darren Collison dished eight assists . The Pacers grabbed a ridiculous 17 steals in the contest and forced the Magic in 22 turnovers . Meanwhile , Nikola Vucevic led the way for the Magic with 25 points , 12 rebounds , two assists , one block and one steal , in 29 minutes . Evan Fournier followed up with 16 points , while Jonathan Simmons and D.J . Augustine chipped in 10 points each off the bench . Aaron Gordon notched a double - double with 13 points and 12 rebounds , in 35 minutes . This marks the fifth straight loss for the Magic . The Magic will look to end the slide when they take on the Timberwolves in Minnesota on Wednesday . The Pacers play host to the Raptors on Friday .
The Orlando Magic defeated the visiting Atlanta Hawks on overtime , 110 - 106 , at Amway_Center on Wednesday evening . In what was their first overtime of the season for both teams , the Magic ( 11 - 15 ) pulled a huge win out of nowhere . The game went back and forth through the first three quarters , and the Hawks ( 5 - 19 ) had a five - point lead entering the fourth quarter . But Orlando did n't give up , and a clutch three - pointer from D.J . Augustin sent the game to overtime . The Magic were the better side after regulation , and ended winning thanks to a massive comeback . Both franchises will meet again on Saturday night . Evan Fournier led the way for the Magic offensively with 27 points and four rebounds , although he left the game early during overtime with what appeared to be a right ankle sprain , so further tests will be needed to determine the severity of the injury . Nikola Vucevic picked up the slack , however , and the big man finished with 22 points , 16 rebounds , four assists and four blocks . Aaron Gordon also contributed with a double - double of 24 points and 15 rebounds . As it has been the trend all game long , Dennis Schroder led the way for Atlanta since he finished the game with 26 points and seven assists . Taurean Prince contributed with 19 points as well , but the rest of the starting lineup went silent for most of the game . Fortunately for Atlanta , Tyler Cavanaugh ( 13 points ) and Mario Belinelli ( 12 points ) did a good job off the bench .

Aaron Gordon was forced to leave the game in the second half due to a possible concussion . The Nuggets went on to cruise the win and snap their road losing streak at four games . Kenneth Faried stepped up big time , as he led the Nuggets with 20 points and 10 rebounds , in 30 minutes off the bench .
