The Orlando Magic defeated the Detroit Pistons , 102 - 89 , at Amway_Center on Thursday evening . The Magic ( 12 - 24 ) got a rare bit of good news earlier in the day , as Aaron Gordon was deemed ready to return from an eight - game absence due to a calf injury . Coupled with Evan Fournier 's active status , Orlando was able to sport a more formidable starting five than they 'd had in a while , despite the fact they were still without Nikola Vucevic ( hand ) down low . They got off to a fast start as well , compiling an impressive 33 points in the first quarter before the Pistons ( 19 - 15 ) came back in the second to forge a 50 - 50 halftime tie . Ultimately , the home squad gained separation in the final 12 minutes , outscoring Detroit by a 25 - 16 margin during the period to secure the double - digit home win . Defense was the order of the day for the Magic , as they limited the visitors to sub - 40 percent success rates from the field and three - point range . Tobias Harris paced the Pistons with 21 points and added three rebounds , two assists and one steal . Ish Smith drew the start for Reggie Jackson ( ankle ) and contributed 18 points , seven rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block . Andre Drummond posted a 17 - point , 18 - rebound double - double that also included five assists , three blocks and one steal . Elfrid Payton led the way for the Magic with 19 points , eight rebounds , eight assists and one steal . Fournier registered 17 points , five assists , three rebounds and two steals . Marreese Speights paced the reserves with 16 points , five rebounds , one assist and one block . Gordon pitched in 14 points , seven rebounds , two assists and one block . Bismack Biyombo managed a 12 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included one steal and one block . The Pistons head home to take on the San_Antonio Spurs on Saturday night , while the Magic remain home and await the Miami Heat on Saturday evening as well .

This was as lopsided of a result as you 'll see from a road team in the NBA , as Houston won this game in wire - to - wire fashion . Shooting was key , with the Rockets hitting 47 percent of their shots , while holding the Magic to under 39 percent from the field . Three-point shooting was also huge , with Houston going 15 - of - 34 and Orlando hitting just 6 - of - 31 from long range . Seven ties and seven lead changes show just how many swings there were in this game , as Cleveland nearly blew a monster lead . The third quarter was key to obtaining that big lead , as they outscored the Magic , 40 - 23 . Orlando then responded with a 40 - 24 fourth quarter of their own , as they got a 23 - point deficit all the way down to a four - point final margin . Three-point shooting was the only noticeable difference , as Cleveland went 15 - of - 34 from long range , while Orlando went 14 - of - 37 from long range . The Magic also struggled taking care of the ball , as the Cavaliers recorded 11 steals to Orlando 's five . The Orlando Magic defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 108 - 102 , at Amway_Center on Tuesday evening . Based on records and recent performances , the outlook was n't exactly bright for the Magic ( 13 - 31 ) heading into Tuesday 's home contest . Not only were they in the midst of a seven - game losing streak , but the visiting Timberwolves ( 29 - 17 ) had also notched five consecutive victories of their own . However , in a testament to why the games are ultimately decided on the court , a usually moribund Orlando squad came out of the gates hot , virtually matching their talented visitors basket for basket in the first half . Minnesota ultimately entered the final period clinging to a 75 - 73 lead and opened the quarter with two quick buckets . However , a furious 21 - 12 run by the home squad over the ensuing 6:47 gave them a 94 - 87 advantage . Although the Timberwolves were able to narrow the gap to as close as 96 - 92 with 3:15 remaining , Orlando still managed to outscore them by a 12 - 10 margin the rest of the way to seal the win . Jimmy Butler paced the Timberwolves with 28 points , a total he supplemented with seven rebounds , four assists , five steals and two blocks . Taj Gibson followed with 18 points , seven rebounds , three steals and one block . Karl-Anthony Towns turned in a 15 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and three blocks . Jeff Teague provided 13 points , six assists , two rebounds and two steals . Andrew Wiggins mustered nine points , four rebounds , four assists and one block . Evan Fournier led the Magic with 32 points and added three assists and two rebounds . D.J . Augustin followed with a bench - leading 18 points and complemented them with six rebounds and six assists . Aaron Gordon registered 14 points , seven boards , one assist and one block . Khem Birch made the most of his opportunity with Marreese Speights ( personal ) out of action , pitching in with a 12 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and four blocks . Bismack Biyombo was a force in his own right , collecting 10 points , 16 boards , two assists , five blocks and one steal . Mario Hezonja matched Biyombo 's scoring total and also tallied three assists , one rebound and one steal . The Timberwolves ' next stop is the Lone Star State , where they 'll face off with the Houston Rockets on Thursday evening . The Magic pack their bags and head to the Midwest , where they 'll tangle with the Cleveland Cavaliers on Thursday night as well .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the Orlando Magic , 105 - 99 , at Amway_Center on Tuesday evening . The Kings ( 14 - 33 ) came into Tuesday 's contest having notched just six road victories in 25 tries , a tally that did n't inspire much confidence on the surface , even against the equally struggling Magic ( 14 - 33 ) . The first half turned out be as dead - even as the two teams ' records , with Orlando holding a slim 53 - 52 advantage at intermission . The home squad then gained slightly more separation by outscoring their visitors , 29 - 25 , in the third period . However , Sacramento 's 110 run over a period of 3:53 late in the fourth quarter propelled them to victory , with Garrett Temple accounting for nine of those points . The Kings were effective on both ends of the floor , posting a 49 percent success rate on their 87 shot attempts while also eliciting 17 turnovers from their hosts . Temple exploded for 34 points on an outstanding 14 - for - 17 shooting tally to lead the Kings , a total he supplemented with five assists and two rebounds . He saw extended action when De'Andre Fox was forced to exit the game in the first half with an abdomen injury . Willie Cauley-Stein followed with 21 points , nine rebounds , four assists , five blocks and one steal . Buddy Hield poured in 13 points and also supplied five boards , two assists , four steals and one block in 28 minutes off the bench . Skal Labissiere turned in 10 points , nine rebounds , three assists and three blocks . Bogdan Bogdanovic registered eight points , four rebounds and four assists . Fox totaled seven points and one rebound in 11 minutes before exiting . Evan Fournier paced the Magic with 22 points and added four assists and two rebounds . Elfrid Payton collected 21 points , seven boards , seven assists and three steals . Aaron Gordon posted a 16 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and one steal . Jonathon Simmons offered 14 points , four rebounds and two assists . D.J . Augustin led the second unit with 10 points and also pitched in three assists , two rebounds and two steals . The Kings next make the downstate trip to South Florida to take on the Miami Heat on Thursday evening , while the Magic are off until Saturday evening when they take on the Indiana Pacers in a road showdown .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 116 - 98 , at Amway_Center on Tuesday evening . As strange seasons go , this one is leaning heavily towards downright bizarre territory for the defending Eastern_Conference champion Cavaliers ( 30 - 22 ) . The last month - plus has seen them go into one of the more shocking freefalls for a team considered a Finals contender to start the season , as Cleveland came into Tuesday 's game having dropped 13 of their previous 20 games . However , on paper they stood a very good chance of getting right against a reeling Magic ( 17 - 36 ) squad that had notched only nine victories in 23 tries on their home court . The first half followed that script , as the visitors looked to be in top form while racking up 43 points in the first 12 minutes . While they slowed down somewhat in the second , the Cavs still entered intermission with a 67 - 51 advantage , but the team that came out of the halftime locker room much more closely resembled the hapless unit that has found victories at a premium for multiple weeks . Orlando overcame a deficit that got as high as 21 by throttling them for 41 points in the third quarter , a period in which Jonathon Simmons collected 22 of his game - and career - high 34 points . They then flummoxed Cleveland by limiting them to a jaw - dropping nine points in the final quarter , leading to a surprisingly comfortable double - digit win . Rebounding and shooting both made a major difference for the Magic , as they posted a 53 percent success rate from the field while winning the battle on the glass by a 50 - 35 margin . LeBron James paced the Cavaliers with 25 points , 10 rebounds , five assists and one steal . Tristan Thompson generated a near double - double with 12 points and nine boards . J.R. Smith matched Thompson 's scoring total and added one rebound , one assist and one steal . Jeff Green poured in 12 of his own to lead the bench and also supplied four rebounds and one block . Isaiah Thomas turned in 11 points , eight assists , one rebound and one steal . Dwyane Wade posted 11 points , four rebounds , one assist and one block . Jae Crowder mustered just two points , two rebounds and one block . Simmons added seven boards , two assists , one steal and one block to his aforementioned scoring total . Evan Fournier poured in 19 points and also registered six rebounds , three assists and one steal . Bismack Biyombo tallied 11 points , eight boards , two assists and two blocks . Elfrid Payton collected 10 points , eight assists , two rebounds , two blocks and one steal . Mario Hezonja contributed 10 points of his own and also contributed six rebounds and two assists . D.J . Augustin and Khem Birch generated matching eight - point efforts to lead the bench . The Cavaliers head back home to face the Minnesota Timberwolves on Wednesday night , while the Magic remain home to tangle with the Atlanta Hawks on Thursday evening .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 100 - 98 , at Amway_Center on Thursday evening . The Magic ( 18 - 36 ) had some notable news transpire before the opening tip , as point guard Elfrid Payton was dealt to the Phoenix Suns for a 2018 second - round pick . Coupled with the sixth consecutive absence of Aaron Gordon ( hip ) and the ongoing sabbatical of Nikola Vucevic ( hand ) , the Orlando squad that took the court against the Hawks ( 17 - 38 ) was certainly a makeshift unit to say the least . Despite the shallow roster , the Magic came out ready to compete on their home court , and the two clubs battled to a 39 - 39 halftime tie . The contest continued to be just as competitive throughout the second half , with leads being traded back and forth . The hosts finally gained the slightest bit of distance late , when a pair of Jonathon Simmons free throws gave them a 98 - 92 advantage with 25 seconds remaining . Even so , it took two additional buckets from the charity stripe by D.J . Augustin - - who drew the start for Payton at point guard - - with 8 seconds left to establish a five - point lead that proved to be too much for Atlanta to overcome . Taurean Prince and Dennis Schroder led the way for the Hawks with matching 19 - point efforts . The former added five assists , one rebound and one steal , while the latter provided five rebounds and five assists . Malcolm Delaney and Tyler Dorsey followed with 11 points apiece off the bench . Delaney also hauled in three rebounds and dished out one assist , while Dorsey posted five boards and handed out three assists as well . No other Atlanta players managed double - digit point totals . John Collins registered nine points , 12 rebounds , two blocks and one steal in 26 minutes on the second unit . Dewayne Dedmon generated eight points , three assists , two rebounds and one block . Kent Bazemore contributed six points and supplemented it with four rebounds , four assists , two blocks and one steal . Ersan Ilyasova mustered five points and four rebounds . Evan Fournier paced the Magic with 22 points and complemented them with three rebounds and three assists . Augustin finished with 18 points , nine assists , three rebounds and two steals . Marreese Speights tallied a bench - leading 14 points and added two rebounds , one assist and two blocks . Simmons poured in 13 points but only added one rebound and one assist . Bismack Biyombo accounted for 10 points , seven rebounds and three steals . Mario Hezonja collected eight points , 10 rebounds , two assists and three steals . The Hawks head back home to take on the new - look Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday night , while the Magic remain home and await a visit from the Milwaukee Bucks on Saturday evening .

The Bucks ( 31 - 24 ) were coming off a loss the last time out and looked a bit sluggish during the first half in this game against the Magic ( 18 - 37 ) , but they managed to bounce back in the second half and ended cruising their way to a huge win on the road . After Orlando grabbed a 54 - 50 lead at halftime it seemed as if Milwaukee was going to lose for the second straight night , but they flipped the script in the second half and with 28 - 20 and 33 - 30 wins in the third and fourth quarters , respectively , they ended winning rather comfortably . Augustin had 11 points , five assists and four rebounds as the starting point guard . The Charlotte Hornets defeated the host Orlando Magic , 104 - 102 , at Amway_Center on Wednesday . Despite the fact that there were only three ties and eight lead changes in this game , it came down to the final seconds . In fact , it was a single - digit margin for all but two minutes , as there were six lead changes alone in the fourth quarter . The middle quarters were key for Charlotte , as they outscored Orlando , 65 - 52 . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the decisive statistic , with Charlotte recording 26 assists to 12 turnovers while Orlando had 21 assists and 20 turnovers . That was evident by the fact that the Hornets recorded 14 steals and four blocks while the Magic had just seven steals and no blocks . The Hornets ( 24 - 33 ) got a double - double out of Dwight Howard , as he totaled 22 points , 13 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . The Orlando Magic defeated the Detroit Pistons , 115 - 106 in OT , on Friday . The Magic ( 19 - 43 ) and the Pistons ( 29 - 33 ) played an incredibly tight game that needed an extra five minutes to find a winner . Neither side managed to grab control of the contest during the first half , and the Magic had a one - point advantage after the first 24 minutes of action . Things finished even in both the third and fourth quarter , so an OT was needed to determine which team would take home the win . Orlando were far superior during that span , however , and won 11 - 2 to walk away with a huge win in front of their crowd , while Detroit 's playoff chances took another blow with this loss . Aaron Gordon was the best player for the Magic in this game , as the power forward finished the game with 27 points and 13 rebounds . Nikola Vucevic had 22 points , 12 rebounds and six assists across 38 minutes . D.J . Augustin added 20 points , nine assists , and five boards . Evan Fournier chipped in with 17 points , five assists and four rebounds . Shelvin Mack added 10 points off the bench . Reggie Bullock and James Ennis III each scored 21 points for the Pistons , although the latter filled the stat sheet quite nicely since the added four rebounds and two steals as well . Blake Griffin came quite close to a triple - double since he finished with 12 points , 10 rebounds , and nine assists . Andre Drummond delivered another strong double - double thanks to 10 points and 15 boards .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 107 - 100 , at Amway_Center on Saturday evening . Both clubs came into the contest with zero postseason aspirations and unsightly records , but the Grizzlies ( 18 - 44 ) appeared to especially be behind the proverbial eight - ball due to a rash of key injuries . The starting backcourt of Andrew Harrison ( wrist ) and Tyreke Evans ( ribs ) had been ruled out earlier in the day , and head coach J.B. Bickerstaff also opted to sit center Marc Gasol for rest purposes . To their credit , the short - handed squad had no shortage of feistiness , however , as they matched the Magic ( 20 - 43 ) basket for basket to forge a 52 - 52 halftime stalemate . Memphis then proceed to gain a two - point edge heading into the final 12 minutes , but that 's when the home squad took it up a notch . Orlando would end up compiling a game - high 30 points in the fourth period while limiting their visitors to 21 , sealing the win . Their superior shooting was key , as they posted a 50 percent success rate from the field while limiting the Grizzlies to a 41 percent figure . Ben McLemore drew the start with Evans out and led the way for Memphis with 20 points , to which he added seven rebounds , four assists and one steal . Jarell Martin followed with 19 points , 11 rebounds and two assists . Mario Chalmers started at point guard and provided 15 points , three assists , one rebound and two steals before exiting in the fourth quarter with a hamstring injury . Kobi Simmons generated a bench - leading 15 points and supplemented them with two assists , one rebound and one steal . JaMychal Green turned in a 10 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included seven assists , three steals and two blocks . All five members of the Magic 's first unit scored in double digits , led by Nikola Vucevic , who delivered 19 points , six rebounds , two assists and one block . Evan Fournier matched his scoring and added three rebounds , three assists and one steal . D.J . Augustin supplied 16 points , five assists and three rebounds . Mario Hezonja registered 16 of his own to lead the bench and also hauled down two rebounds , dished out two assists , recorded three blocks and posted one steal . Aaron Gordon managed a full line of 14 points , eight rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks . Jonathon Simmons rounded things out with 11 points , six boards and one assist . The Grizzlies remain on the road and head west , as they take on the San_Antonio Spurs on Monday evening . The Magic pack their bags and tangle with the Utah Jazz in a road showdown on Monday night as well .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 126 - 117 , at Amway_Center on Wednesday . The Bucks ( 36 - 32 ) were big favorites entering this game against the Magic ( 21 - 48 ) based on both team 's current records , but Orlando managed to pull away a big upset in front of their own crowd . Orlando jumped to a huge 36 - 20 lead in the first quarter , and they never looked back . Milwaukee answered back with a big 32 - 25 effort in the second quarter , but Orlando held on in the second half after winning the third quarter ( 30 - 28 ) and losing the fourth ( 37 - 35 ) . One of the reasons why Orlando secured a huge win was their accuracy shooting the ball , as they shot over 50 percent from the field and from three - point range , while hitting 87 percent of their attempts from the charity stripe . Jonathon Simmons was the best player for the Magic , as he finished with 35 points , four rebounds , and three assists . D.J . Augustin added 32 points with four assists and three boards , while Nikola Vucevic chipped in with 22 points , nine assists , eight rebounds and three steals . No other player scored in double digits , however , which means these three players did most of the heavy lifting on offense . Giannis Antetokounmpo had 38 points , 11 rebounds , seven assists and three steals . Khris Middleton had 22 points , five assists , and three boards . Eric Bledsoe filled the stat sheet nicely , as he contributed 20 points , seven assists , four steals and two rebounds . Jabari Parked added 14 points coming off the bench , while John Henson came close to a double - double thanks to eight points and nine rebounds .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Orlando Magic , 93 - 86 , at Amway_Center . The Raptors ( 53 - 18 ) and the Magic ( 21 - 50 ) played a game that happened to be tighter than expected , as Toronto were massive favorites but ended needing a huge fourth quarter to seal the win against one of the worst teams in the Eastern_Conference . The Magic actually jumped to a 25 - 24 lead in the first quarter , but Toronto responded and secured a one - point advantage at the break . Orlando seemed to run away with the game in the third thanks to a huge third period ( 25 - 16 ) , but Toronto once again responded in the final 12 minutes and a 25 - 10 win in the final period give them a huge victory . The Raptors did n't have DeMar DeRozan in this game , but Kyle Lowry picked up the slack and led the team offensively with 25 points , eight assists and five rebounds . Serge Ibaka had 13 points and six rebounds . Jonas Valanciunas contributed nine points , eight rebounds , two assists and one block . Delon Wright had a solid performance as well , adding 10 points and five boards coming off the bench . Aaron Gordon was Orlando 's best player since he finished with 16 points , six rebounds , and three assists . D.J . Augustin chipped in with nine points and 10 assists . Nikola Vucevic had 15 points , nine rebounds , three assists and three steals . Jonathan Isaac finished with 10 points , five rebounds and five steals . Shelvin Mack had a great performance off the bench since he finished with 17 points and four assists .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Orlando Magic , 111 - 104 , at Amway_Center on Wednesday . The Nets ( 24 - 51 ) and the Magic ( 22 - 52 ) played a very tight game that went down to the wire , but in the end , Brooklyn ended coming out on top since they managed to hold on to the lead they built in the first half . Brooklyn jumped to a 36 - 33 lead in the first quarter , and a 22 - 18 second period put them up 58 - 51 at the break . Orlando won the third quarter ( 30 - 27 ) but Brooklyn answered back in the fourth ( 26 - 23 ) and they ended closing things in a battle that evidenced why these two teams are near the bottom of the Eastern_Conference . The Nets had a balanced scoring effort in this game , as they had seven players who scored in double digits in this one . D'Angelo Russell was the best player after finishing with 16 points , 12 assists and five rebounds . Jarrett Allen delivered 15 points with eight boards , and DeMarre Carroll had a strong double - double of 14 points and 12 rebounds . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson also had 14 , and Caris LeVert led the bench with 16 points and six assists . The Magic had Nikola Vucevic as their best player , since he finished with 24 points , 15 rebounds and five assists . Mario Hezonja added 23 points with seven rebounds . Aaron Gordon had 15 points , and D.J . Augustin chipped in with 14 points . Shelvin Mack filled the stat sheet coming off the bench , thanks to 13 points , six assists and four boards .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 105 - 100 , at Amway_Center on Wednesday evening . Neither team naturally came in with any postseason aspirations , but both had notched relatively rare victories in their most recent games , with the Mavericks ( 24 - 55 ) notably having upset the Portland Trail Blazers . However , they 'd notched only nine wins away from their home floor in 29 tries , putting them at a theoretical disadvantage heading into the contest . Ultimately , both squads played a more competitive and entertaining game than might have initially been expected , especially considering their makeshift first units . Dallas impressively bounced back from an early 33 - 22 first - quarter deficit to cut Orlando 's advantage down to a more manageable 56 - 51 by halftime . The two clubs then played to a 49 - 49 draw in the second half , which gave the home squad the same five - point margin of victory . Both benches played particularly well , as they each tallied 48 points . Jalen Jones led the way for the Mavericks with 16 points , a total he supplemented with seven rebounds and one block . Dorian Finney-Smith provided 14 points , six rebounds and two assists . Johnathan Motley went for 14 points , eight rebounds , one assist and one steal . Aaron Harrison supplied 13 points , four rebounds , two assists and one steal . Kyle Collinsworth matched Harrison 's scoring total off the bench and also collected nine rebounds , six assists and one steal . Maxi Kleber poured in 12 points and added four boards and one assist . J.J. Barea drew the start for Dennis Smith , Jr. ( knee ) but only played 10 minutes , mustering four points , four assists and two rebounds . Aaron Gordon paced the Magic with 20 points , a total he supplemented with four rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Jamel Artis led the bench with 18 points and added one block . Shelvin Mack contributed 13 points , nine assists and three rebounds in 27 minutes off the bench . Mario Hezonja finished with 12 points , eight rebounds , four assists , three blocks and two steals . Bismack Biyombo drew the start for a resting Nikola Vucevic and generated a 12 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included five assists , one steal and one block . D.J . Augustin played just 18 minutes despite drawing the start , totaling eight points , two boards and one assist . The Mavericks remain on the road and head to Motown , where they 'll face off with the Detroit Pistons on Friday night . The Magic remain home and await a visit from the Charlotte Hornets that same evening .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Washington Wizards , 101 - 92 , at Amway_Center on Wednesday evening . The Wizards ( 43 - 39 ) had an opportunity to vault themselves out of the eighth seed with a win and losses by either the Heat or Bucks in front of them , but injury management issues took priority over everything else . John Wall was sat as planned for the second game of the back - to - back , while Otto Porter , Jr. was also held out to a calf injury suffered in Tuesday 's contest against the Celtics . That left Washington considerably short - handed against the Magic ( 25 - 57 ) , which were trying to close the season out on a positive note . Orlando took advantage of the depleted state of the visitors to forge a 55 - 45 halftime lead , but the Wizards bounced back in the third to cut the deficit to one entering the final 12 minutes . However , the home squad was determined to close out a difficult season in the win column , outscoring Washington by eight in the fourth quarter to seal their 17th home victory of the season . Jodie Meeks led the Wizards with 18 points over 19 minutes off the bench , and he added two rebounds and one assist . Markieff Morris followed with 15 points , eight rebounds , two assists and one steal . Bradley Beal and Tomas Satoransky contributed matching 13 - point efforts , with the former supplying five rebounds , four assists and one steal , , and the latter registering nine rebounds and four assists . Mike Scott tallied 10 points , five boards and two assists . Marcin Gortat pitched in nine points , 10 rebounds , one assist and one block , while Kelly Oubre , Jr. contributed a modest nine points and one assist in his spot start . Rodney Purvis paced the Magic with 16 points , a total he complemented with five rebounds and one assist . Mario Hezonja went for 15 points , eight rebounds , six assists and two steals . Khem Birch had a near double - double of 13 points , nine rebounds , one assist and two blocks . Arron Afflalo compiled 12 points and one assist , while Aaron Gordon pitched in 11 points , three rebounds and one block . The Magic call it a season , while the Wizards head into a first - round playoff matchup against the top - seeded Toronto Raptors .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 93 - 88 , at American_Airlines_Center on Friday night . The Kings ( 1 - 1 ) were fortunate to face a team missing its top point guard for the second time in as many games , as Dennis Smith , Jr. , Dallas ' 2017 first - round pick , was a late scratch due to a knee issue . While Sacramento had come close to parlaying the absence of the Rockets ' Chris Paul into a victory in the season opener , they ultimately fell just short . However , that was n't the case Friday , as an impressive defensive effort that saw Sacramento limit the Mavericks ( 0 - 2 ) to 37 points over the second and third periods helped lead the way to the five - point win . The Kings were also outstanding on the glass through all four quarters , outrebounding Dallas by a 57 - 36 margin and seeing seven players record at least five boards . Veteran George Hill paced the visitors with 21 points , five rebounds , two assists and two steals . Buddy Hield and Zach Randolph , the latter making his Kings regular - season debut after missing the opener with a dental issue , posted matching 13 - point tallies . Hield added six rebounds and three assists , while Randolph also hauled in six boards , dished out one assist and recorded two steals . Willie Cauley-Stein drew the start at center once again and managed a 10 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and one block . The Sacramento second unit enjoyed a productive night by scoring a combined 34 points , with first - round pick De'Aaron Fox leading the way with nine points , 10 assists , six rebounds and one steal . Skal Labissiere ( eight points , five rebounds , one block ) and Garrett Temple ( eight points , six boards , three assists and two steals ) also made their presences felt . Harrison Barnes led the way for Dallas with 24 points , which he supplemented with four rebounds and one assist . Dorian Finney-Smith and Yogi Ferrell were next with matching 14 - point efforts off the bench . The former added two rebounds and an assist , while the latter provided four rebounds , two assist and one steal . Dirk Nowitzki totaled 10 points , nine rebounds and two assists . J.J. Barea drew the start in Smith 's stead and offered nine points , 10 assists , one rebound , one steal and one block . Nerlens Noel entered the starting lineup but supplied a modest seven points , six rebounds , three steals and two blocks over 27 minutes . Wesley Matthews notably went scoreless over 34 minutes , going 0 - for - 7 from the field . The Kings continue on the road and face off with the Denver Nuggets on Saturday night , while the Mavericks will look for their first win once again in a Saturday evening road tilt against the in - state rival Houston Rockets .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the host Dallas Mavericks , 133 - 103 , at American_Airlines_Center on Monday evening . The Warriors ( 2 - 2 ) looked like they would make short work of this one as they burst out of the gate with a 40 - 24 first quarter . However , the young Dallas team rebounded in the second quarter , outscoring the Warriors 38 - 25 , to bring the score to 65 - 62 in favor of Golden_State heading into the half . The Warriors came out refocused in the second half and outscored the Mavericks 68 - 41 , to cruise to the win . Stephen Curry led the way for the Warriors with 29 points on 7 - of - 15 shooting and eight assists , in 31 minutes . Kevin Durant followed up with 25 points , eight rebounds and six assists , in 33 minutes . Draymond Green scored in double digits for the first time this season , with 10 points , to go along with eight assists , seven rebounds , two steals and a block , in 29 minutes . Meanwhile , the Mavericks ( 0 - 4 ) showed a great team effort with six guys scoring in double figures . Unfortunately it was not enough to beat the reigning champs , as the Mavs remain winless this season . Wesley Matthews was the high - point man for the Mavs , with 19 points . Yogi Ferrell , J.J. Barea and Harrison Barnes chipped in 13 points each , while Dennis Smith Jr. added 10 points and six rebounds . The Mavs will look for their first win of the season when they play host to the Grizzlies on Tuesday . The Warriors play host to the Raptors on Wednesday .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the visiting Memphis Grizzlies , 103 - 94 , at American_Airlines_Center on Wednesday evening . The Mavericks ( 1 - 4 ) completed one of the most unlikely upsets of the early season , as they came into this game winless in their four games prior , and up against a Memphis squad that was 30 , with wins over the Warriors , Rockets and Pelicans . Nonetheless , the young Dallas team came out strong and hit first with a 32 - 18 lead after the first quarter . The Grizzlies ( 3 - 1 ) clawed back but the Mavs were able to hold on long enough to run away with a big confidence booster . This marked the first game of a home - and - home series between the Mavs and Grizzlies . Rookie Dennis Smith Jr. led the way for the Mavs , with 19 points on 8 - of - 12 shooting and five assists , in 28 minutes . Harrison Barnes followed up with 15 points , six rebounds and three assists , while Wesley Matthews added 16 points on 5 - of - 9 shooting . J.J. Barea chipped in 14 points , five rebounds , four assists and two steals , in 19 minutes off the bench . Meanwhile , Marc Gasol led the Grizzlies , with 26 points , 11 rebounds , four assists and two steals , in 36 minutes . Mike Conley added 21 points , five rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 36 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Grizz was Tyreke Evans , with 13 points on 5 - of - 8 shooting , in 25 minutes off the bench . The Grizzlies will look to extract revenge when they take on the Mavericks in Memphis on Thursday .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 112 - 110 , at American_Airlines_Center on Saturday night . The Sixers ( 2 - 4 ) got off to a fast start by taking the first period by a 32 - 23 margin , but the Mavericks managed to turn the tables over the following 12 minutes and got to within 57 - 56 by halftime . The second half saw the exact same pattern repeat itself , with the both teams alternating successful quarters . The see - saw battle literally came down to the wire , as Yogi Ferrell stood at the free - throw line with less than one second remaining and a chance to knot the score up at 112 . After misfiring on his first attempt , the second - year point guard purposely missed the second in order to give his teammates a chance at a last - gasp shot attempt that never came to fruition . Both teams put on a proverbial shooting clinic , with Philadelphia posting a 49 percent success rate from the field and Dallas countering with a 51 percent tally . Joel Embiid and Ben Simmons led the way with matching 23 - point tallies , with the former adding nine rebounds and four assists and the latter supplying eight assists , seven rebounds , three steals and a block . T.J. McConnell followed with a bench - leading 15 points , a total he complemented with eight assists , four rebounds and one steal . Jerryd Bayless registered nine points and three boards . The Mavericks were paced by Harrison Barnes , who collected 25 points , four rebounds and one steal . Wesley Matthews posted 19 points , six rebounds , two assists and three steals . Ferrell led the second unit with 17 points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals . J.J. Barea contributed 15 points , three boards and two assists in 24 minutes off the bench . Dennis Smith , Jr. pitched in with 12 points , eight assists , two rebounds and one steal . Dirk Nowitzki turned in 11 points , five assists and two blocks . The Sixers remain in the Lone Star State to tangle with the Rockets on Monday night , while the Mavericks head to Utah to face the Jazz on the sam evening .

New_Orleans was in control for the first three quarters , as they led by 17 at times in the fourth quarter . While Dallas did make a late run to cut the lead to five , it was n't enough to overcome the monster deficit . Both teams really struggled shooting , with Dallas hitting 39 percent from the field and 27 percent from three , while New_Orleans went just 40 percent from the field and 24 percent from three - point range . The Pelicans dominated down low , winning the rebounding differential and points in the paint battle . The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the host Dallas Mavericks , 97 - 91 , at American_Airlines_Center on Tuesday . In this Texas battle , it took six ties and 13 lead changes to decide a winner . In addition , neither team ever led by more than 12 points , as it was a single - digit margin for all but two minutes . The key for San_Antonio was defense , as they held Dallas to 41 percent from the field and 29 percent from three - point range . They also controlled the glass , winning the rebounding differential , 47 - 40 . The Spurs ( 9 - 5 ) got a season - high 32 points out of LaMarcus Aldridge , as he also provided five rebounds , four assists and two blocks . Patty Mills started and accrued 19 points , three rebounds , two assists and four steals . The other three starters combined for just 13 points . Manu Ginobili and Dejounte Murray each scored in double figures off the bench . The Mavericks ( 2 - 13 ) were led by rookie Dennis Smith Jr. who dropped a career - high 27 points , with 18 of those coming in the fourth quarter . He also added six rebounds and two assists to his line , despite committing six turnovers . Harrison Barnes totaled 16 points , eight rebounds , two assists and three steals . Dirk Nowitzki accumulated 16 points , seven rebounds and six assists . J.J. Barea led the bench with 16 points , six rebounds and four assists . On deck for San_Antonio is a road matchup against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Wednesday . Dallas will also play the Timberwolves for their next game , as they play host to them on Friday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Dallas Mavericks 111 - 87 on Friday at American_Airlines_Center . Things looked to be going smoothly for the Mavericks ( 2 - 14 ) early on , as they managed to build a solid 12 - point lead over their opposition in the first half . The next 24 minutes , however , ended up being nothing like the second . The Timberwolves ( 10 - 5 ) went on to outscore Dallas 68 - 32 in the second half , as they managed to take advantage of a miserable shooting performance from the Mavericks on Friday night . Dallas shot just 21 percent from three and 37 percent from the field overall , and the worst of it came from the team 's starting backcourt of Dennis Smith Jr. and Wesley Matthews , as the pairing combined to shoot just 6 - of - 23 from the field Friday and score only 16 points . Harrison Barnes led the way scoring for the Mavericks , scoring 18 points and grabbing six rebounds in 34 minutes , while Dirk Nowitzki stayed close behind , shooting 6 - of - 12 from the field en route to scoring 15 points of his own . For the Timberwolves , all five starters scored in double figures with Jimmy Butler 's 21 leading the way . Andrew Wiggins was n't too far behind with 19 points , while Karl-Anthony Towns and Jeff Teague each dropped 15 points of their own . As a team , Minnesota had much better success than its opponent shooting the ball , as they hit a scorching 43 percent from behind the arc and 46 percent from the field overall . Up next , the Timberwolves will look to extend their winning streak to four games at home Sunday against the Pistons , while the Mavericks will attempt to end their four - game losing skid Saturday against the Bucks .

This marked the second game of a back - to - back for the Mavericks ( 3 - 14 ) , however it did not cause them any disadvantage , as they pounced on the Bucks ( 8 - 7 ) early . Dallas led 33 - 24 after the first quarter and expanded their lead to 56 - 44 by halftime . The Mavericks did not lose focus in the second half , rather improved on their amazing first half by outscoring the Bucks , 55 - 35 , to close out the game . J.J. Barea followed up with 20 points , seven assists and three rebounds , in just 23 minutes off the bench . The Boston Celtics defeated the host Dallas Mavericks in overtime , 110 - 102 , at American_Airlines_Center on Monday . Boston was looking for their 16th - straight win here and it took an extra session to get to that gaudy number . They had to do it in comeback fashion too , as the Celtics outscored the Mavericks , 27 - 19 , in the fourth quarter to get to overtime . Strangely , that comeback happened after the Celtics led , 34 - 22 , after the first quarter . The key for Boston was defense , as they held Dallas to 41 percent from the field and 21 percent from three - point range . A 21 - 8 fastbreak differential was decisive as well , with Boston also winning the rebounding battle , 53 - 45 . The Celtics ( 16 - 2 ) got a season - high 47 points and six assists out of Kyrie Irving , as he did that damage on 16 - of - 22 shooting . Jaylen Brown amassed 22 points and nine rebounds . Jayson Tatum accrued 15 points and nine rebounds as well . Al Horford scored just three points , but still provided eight rebounds , seven assists and two blocks . The Mavericks ( 3 - 15 ) were led by Harrison Barnes , as he collected 31 points , six rebounds and two assists , Wesley Matthews totaled 18 points , six rebounds , three assists and four steals . Dirk Nowiztki recorded his first double - double of the year , tallying 13 points and 12 rebounds . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , with Boston traveling to play the Miami Heat and Dallas playing the Memphis Grizzlies on the road as well .

The Mavericks came out very strong in the third as well , outscoring the Thunder , 26 - 18 , to push their lead to 78 - 55 heading into the final frame . The Thunder ( 8 - 11 ) gave a push in the fourth but it was not nearly enough to make up for their early missteps . The Mavericks shot 49 percent from the field , including 15 - of - 36 from long range . Carmelo Anthony followed up with 16 points , while Paul George struggled shooting , going 1 - of - 12 from the field , and finishing with only two points . However , the Nets responded in the second quarter , outscoring the Mavericks 27 - 20 to take a one - point , 48 - 47 , lead into halftime . The Nets held strong and managed to push their lead to 80 - 76 heading into the fourth quarter . The game stayed tight right down to the wire , where Devin Harris made it a two - point game with 10 seconds left . The Mavericks then fouled Joe Harris , putting him on the line , where he hit the first and missed the second free throw . However , the Mavericks ( 5 - 17 ) were not able to recover the rebound , allowing the Nets ( 8 - 13 ) to seal it with a couple more free throws . The Dallas Mavericks toppled the Los_Angeles Clippers , 108 - 82 , at American_Airlines_Center on Saturday afternoon . The Mavericks ( 6 - 17 ) built on a 24 - 17 first - quarter lead with a 35 - point second period that led to a 59 - 38 halftime lead . Dallas produced an excellent all - around effort , posting a 46 percent success rate from the field ( including 46 percent from three - point range ) while limiting the Clippers ( 8 - 13 ) to 35 percent shooting . The home team also dominated on the glass , winning the rebounding battle by a 54 - 38 margin . With a comfortable lead in the second half , the Mavericks ' bench saw plenty of run and compiled 59 points overall . Lou Williams was one of the few bright spots for Los_Angeles , tallying 18 points and six assists . DeAndre Jordan was the only other Clipper with double - digit scoring , managing a 14 - point , 17 - rebound double - double that also included two blocks . Austin Rivers had a difficult time finding the net , supplying nine points on 4 - for - 15 shooting and adding three rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Wesley Johnson provided seven points , two rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Sindarius Thornwell led the second unit with nine points , one assist and one steal in 16 minutes . J.J. Barea paced the Mavericks with 21 points , 10 assists and four rebounds in 24 minutes off the bench . Dirk Nowitzki led the first unit with 16 points and added three rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Devin Harris registered 15 points , three rebounds , three assists and one steal . Dennis Smith , Jr. supplied 12 points , five rebounds , three assists and one block . Wesley Matthews totaled 10 points , three assists , two rebounds and one block . Harrison Barnes endured a rough shooting day ( 2 - for - 10 FG ) that led to just eight points , but he was able to haul in 10 rebounds and dish out two assists . The Clippers continue on the road and face off with the Minnesota Timberwolves on Sunday night , while the Mavericks remain home and face the Denver Nuggets on Monday evening .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the visiting San_Antonio Spurs , 95 - 89 , at American Airlines Arena on Tuesday evening . The Mavericks were hot from the jump , taking an early 10 - 4 lead and holding on to a 30 - 23 lead after one quarter . The Spurs answered back in the second quarter , where they narrowed the deficit to two but still trailed 46 - 44 at halftime . They carried the momentum into the third quarter battling to take a two - point lead heading into the fourth . However , the Mavericks unleashed an 80 to start the fourth quarter that put them up 75 - 69 with eight minutes to go . The Mavericks stayed hot the rest of the way and although the Spurs came within three points with six minutes to go , Dallas controlled the pace and closed it out . This snapped a three - game losing streak for Dallas . Harrison Barnes led the Mavericks with 17 points on 8 - of - 17 shooting , in 34 minutes . Wesley Matthews , Yogi Ferrell and J.J. Barea tallied 16 points each . Dwight Powell added 12 points and 12 rebounds , in 17 minutes off the bench . The Mavericks shot 43 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 24 from long range . Meanwhile , Kawhi Leonard made his return to the line up for San_Antonio , finishing with 13 points and six rebounds , in 15 minutes of action . LaMarcus Aldridge led the Spurs with 23 points on 9 - of - 23 shooting , and 13 rebounds , in 38 minutes , while Rudy Gay followed up with 21 points on 8 - of - 11 shooting , in 26 minutes . The Spurs shot 41 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 27 from long range . The Spurs ( 19 - 9 ) go on to Houston , where they take on the Rockets on Friday . The Mavericks ( 8 - 20 ) head to Golden_State to take on the Warriors on Thursday .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the Dallas Mavericks 97 - 91 on Monday at American_Airlines_Center . Things were looking good for the Mavericks ( 8 - 23 ) when they entered the fourth quarter of Monday 's game with a seven - point lead , but what they did n't see coming in the last 12 minutes of the contest was the strong play of Suns ( 11 - 21 ) point guard Isaiah Canaan , who just signed with Phoenix last Wednesday . Canaan opened up the final period scoring nine of the team 's first 11 points and scored 11 points total in the fourth quarter . He finished with 17 points in 27 minutes off the bench , which was the second highest mark on the team to T.J. Warren 's 19 . As a team , five Suns players scored in double figures and the team shot an impressive 40 percent from behind the arc . As for the Mavericks , they shot a pretty poor 36 percent from the field and 30 percent from behind the arc . Harrison Barnes put together a strong performance , scoring a game - high 26 points on 11 - of - 21 shooting from the field . The starting backcourt of Yogi Ferrell and Wesley Matthews combined to match Barnes ' 26 points , but they shot a poor 9 - of - 26 from the field . Their backups were n't able to find any more success , as guards Devin Harris and J.J. Barea shot just 5 - of - 20 from the field and combined for 24 points off the bench . No one 's night was as uneventful as Dirk Nowitzki 's , though , as the 39 - year - old shot just 2 - of - 6 and scored five points in 25 minutes .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the visiting Detroit Pistons , 110 - 93 , at American_Airlines_Center on Wednesday evening . The Pistons started out strong and led 25 - 22 after one quarter , however that was the last they saw of their chances , as the Mavericks turned things up in the second . The Mavs shot 15 - of - 20 from the field , including 5 - of - 7 from deep , to outscore the visitors 43 - 28 in the second quarter and take a 65 - 53 lead at the half . The second half picked up where the first left off , as the Mavericks pushed it to a 23 - point lead heading into the fourth . Despite the Pistons outscoring them in the fourth , the Mavs were able to cruise to the 17 - point win and snap their three - game losing streak . Harrison Barnes led the way for Dallas , with 25 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting , seven rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 31 minutes . Dennis Smith Jr. followed up with 15 points , five rebounds and five assists , in 21 minutes . Dirk Nowitzki chipped in 12 points on 4 - of - 9 shooting . The Mavericks shot 53 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 30 from long range . Meanwhile , Anthony Tolliver was the high - point man for the Pistons , with 18 points on 5 - of - 7 shooting , in 30 minutes . Andre Drummond tallied 11 points and 13 rebounds , while Stanley Johnson added 16 points on 4 - of - 7 shooting , in 28 minutes off the bench . The Pistons shot 43 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 24 from long range . The Pistons ( 17 - 14 ) will look to get back on track as they play host to the Knicks on Friday . The Mavs ( 9 - 23 ) take on the Heat in Miami on Friday .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the host Dallas Mavericks , 127 - 124 , at American_Airlines_Center on Friday . This was a matchup full of swings , as it took a shot at the buzzer to determine a winner . In fact , Yogi Ferrell had a chance to tie the game at the buzzer with a tough three - pointer , but was unable to capitalize despite a mad fury by the Mavericks in the final minute . Chicago had to win in comeback fashion , as they outscored Dallas , 47 - 36 , in the fourth quarter . The Bulls offense was unstoppable , as they hit 56 percent from the field and 50 percent from long range . Rebounding was also key , with Chicago outrebounding Dallas , 42 - 34 . The Bulls ( 14 - 25 ) got a career night out of Kris Dunn , as he scored a career - high 32 points on 12 - of - 17 shooting to add to his nine assists and four steals . Justin Holiday finished with 23 points and three rebounds . Lauri Makkanen amassed 16 points and nine rebounds . The New_York Knicks defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 100 - 96 , at American_Airlines_Center on Sunday evening . The Knicks ( 19 - 21 ) came into the contest looking to put an end to what had become a dangerously prolonged stretch of losing . New_York had fallen in seven of their previous eight games coming into Sunday , and they faced what was a tougher challenge than might have appeared on the surface against a Mavericks ( 13 - 28 ) squad that had notched nine of their victories at home . However , the visitors laid a solid foundation by generating a 33 - point first quarter and eventually forging a 56 - 52 halftime advantage . Both teams then notably matched each other point for point in the second half , which was enough to afford the Knicks a four - point victory . New_York got it done with their big men , as Enes Kanter , Kristaps Porzingis and Kyle O'Quinn brought in 37 of the team 's 59 boards . Porzingis paced the Knicks with 29 points , which he supplemented with eight rebounds , one assist and one block . O'Quinn followed with a 15 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included three assists , one steal and one block . Kanter posted 13 points , 18 boards , one assist and one steal . Jarrett Jack accounted for 12 points , eight dimes , three rebounds and one block . Courtney Lee poured in 11 points and added five rebounds and two assists . Harrison Barnes tallied 25 points , seven rebounds and three assists to pace the Mavericks . Wesley Matthews supplied 14 points , one rebound , one assist , two steals and one block . Dennis Smith , Jr. registered 11 points , five assists , three rebounds and two steals . Salah Mejri , J.J. Barea and Devin Harris all matched Smith 's scoring total while coming off the bench . Mejri also had seven rebounds and one assist , Barea posted three assists , two rebounds and one steal , and Harris mustered six assists , five rebounds and one steal . The Knicks head back home to face the Chicago Bulls on Wednesday evening , while the Mavericks remain home to tangle with the Orlando Magic on Tuesday night .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Orlando Magic , 114 - 99 , at American_Airlines_Center on Tuesday . Despite the fact that Orlando led for much of the first half , Dallas took control in the second half . In fact , the Mavericks outscored the Magic , 71 - 51 , in the second half . Turnovers were the difference in the game , as Dallas forced 13 from Orlando , while committing just four on their end . That led to the Mavericks hitting 52 percent from the field , while holding the Magic to under 46 percent shooting . The production from the starters was a huge factor too , with Dallas ' starters outscoring Orlando 's starters , 73 - 53 . The Magic ( 12 - 29 ) benched Aaron Gordon for disciplinary reasons , but he still led the team with 19 points and eight rebounds off the bench . Mario Hezonja led the starters with 14 points , four rebounds and four assists . Evan Fournier finished with 12 points , four rebounds and two assists . D.J . Augustin provided 18 points , three rebounds and five assists , while Marreese Speights totaled 13 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and two blocks off the bench . Barea dished out 12 assists off the bench , while Yogi Ferrell led the bench with 15 points , eight rebounds and four assists . On deck for Orlando is a road matchup versus the Milwaukee Bucks on Wednesday . As for Dallas , they play on the road on Wednesday as well , as they face the Charlotte Hornets .

The Dallas Mavericks defeated the visiting Los_Angeles Lakers , 130 - 123 , at American_Airlines_Center on Saturday evening . It was a high - scoring game right from the start , tied at 21 just 6:30 into the game , before the Lakers went on to hold a 36 - 34 lead at the end of the first quarter . The second quarter was more of the same , as the teams battled neck and neck at a high pace , with the Mavericks narrowing the deficit to 66 - 65 by halftime . The Mavs came out strong in the third quarter , with a 12 - 5 to start things off , which put them ahead 77 - 71 just two minutes into the quarter . They held on to take a 100 - 95 lead into the final frame . Things got tense in the fourth , as the Lakers pulled ahead 115 - 114 , with 5:50 left . The teams traded the lead for the next couple minutes , until the Mavs pulled ahead in the last few minutes thanks to some big plays by newcomer Doug McDermott . Six players scored in double digits for Dallas , led by Dirk Nowitzki , who finished with 22 points on 8 - of - 11 shooting , in 24 minutes . Harrison Barnes followed up with 21 points , six rebounds and two assists , while Dwight Powell added 19 points , seven rebounds , two steals and one assist , in 23 minutes off the bench . Doug McDermott , chipped in eight points , three rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 21 minutes off the bench . The Mavericks shot 54 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 27 from long range . Meanwhile , Julius Randle led the Lakers with 26 points , eight rebounds and seven assists , in 37 minutes . Brandon Ingram and Isaiah Thomas added 22 points , each , while Kyle Kuzma tallied 12 points , 15 rebounds , three assists and two steals . The Lakers shot 55 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 34 from long range . The Lakers ( 23 - 32 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Pelicans in New_Orleans on Wednesday . The Mavericks ( 18 - 38 ) will be right back in action , as they take on the Rockets in Houston on Sunday .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Indiana Pacers 109 - 103 on Monday at American Airlines Arena . The win ended what was a four - game losing streak for the Mavericks ( 19 - 42 ) , and they managed to do so with a complete team effort . Six Dallas players in total scored in double figures , with Harrison Barnes leading the way with a team - high 21 points . Off the bench , J.J. Barea was n't too far behind , shooting 7 - of - 11 from the field en route to scoring 19 points . Doug McDermott also continued his strong play in a Mavericks uniform , hitting all four of three - point attempts and scoring 15 points . As a team , Dallas shot a solid 46 percent from the field overall and 38 percent from behind the arc . As for the Pacers ( 34 - 26 ) , the loss put an end to a four - game winning streak , and it came despite two productive outings from their two stars . Myles Turner had a monster game with a game - high 24 points on 10 - of - 14 shooting to go along with 11 rebounds in 36 minutes , while Victor Oladipo shot 8 - of - 13 from the field en route to posting 21 points , five rebounds and four assists . Bojan Bogdanovic even added 19 points and eight rebounds of his own , but unfortunately for Indiana , they were unable to get anything from its second unit , as the four reserves combined to score just 23 points on 9 - of - 25 shooting from the field . In the end , it was the Pacers ' poor shooting from outside that prevented them from pulling out the victory Monday night , as they shot a miserable 5 - of - 20 from downtown .

Despite the fact that there were four ties and four lead changes in the first eight minutes , New_Orleans dominated from there . Defensive rebounding was also a critical factor , with New_Orleans winning that battle , 41 - 33 . A 56 - 40 points in the paint battle and a 27 - 19 fastbreak advantage was huge as well . The Pelicans ( 36 - 26 ) have now won eight - straight games , as they are within one game of the three - seed in the west . The Brooklyn Nets defeated the visiting Orlando Magic , 126 - 121 , at Barclays_Center on Friday evening . Brooklyn ( 1 - 1 ) once again showed it can score at will , but unlike its season - opening loss against the Indiana Pacers on Wednesday , this time the Nets came out on top against a resilient Orlando team . The game went down to the wire , as it settled in the final seconds of the fourth quarter when a missed three - point attempt from Evan Fournier with three seconds left on the game put the Nets over the top . D'Angelo Russell was the star of the game for the Nets . The former Los Angeles Lakers guard will have to carry a heavier load following the season - ending injury from Jeremy Lin this past Wednesday , but he came through when the team needed him the most against the Magic . Russell finished the game with 17 points , six assists , three steals , and three rebounds . DeMarre Carroll chipped in with 17 points and eight rebounds , while Spencer Dinwiddie ( 16 points , five rebounds and five assists ) and Trevor Booker ( 17 points and 11 rebounds ) helped coming off the bench . Orlando might have lost the game , but Nikola Vucevic ca n't be the one to blame for the loss . The 26 - year - old big man had one the best games of his career , as he finished with 41 points ( on 17 - of - 22 from the field ) and 12 rebounds . Fournier 22 points and nine rebounds , while Jonathon Simmons and D.J . Augustin each had 10 points off the bench .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Atlanta Haws , 116 - 104 , at Barclays_Center on Sunday afternoon . The Nets ( 2 - 1 ) are n't exactly renowned for their defense , but that aspect of their game stepped to the forefront against the Hawks ( 1 - 2 ) on Sunday . Brooklyn allowed only two Atlanta starters to tally double - digit scoring and limited the visitors to a paltry success rate of 34 percent from the field , including 26 percent from three - point range . The Nets did their part offensively as well , particularly in the middle periods , during which they scored a combined 72 points . The home squad managed to drain 47 percent of their 87 shot attempts and saw five players hit double digits in the scoring column . Their overall success extended to the second unit , which scored a combined 52 points . Marco Belinelli , who 's proven to be an excellent offseason acquisition thus far , paced the Hawks with 19 points , three assists and two rebounds in 31 minutes off the bench . Dennis Schroder followed with 17 points , eight assists , four rebounds and two steals , but had to be carried off the floor due to an ankle injury . Kent Bazemore provided 16 points , three rebounds , three assists and one block . Rookie John Collins generated a 14 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included one block . Ersan Ilyasova and Taurean Prince managed matching nine - point tallies , with the former adding seven rebounds and two steals and the latter supplying one rebound , one assist and one steal . Dewayne Dedmon contributed seven points and seven rebounds . Allen Crabbe led the Nets with 20 points , five rebounds , one steal and one block . DeMarre Carroll posted 17 points , three rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks . DeAngelo Russell and Caris LeVert each poured in 16 points . Russell added 10 assists , seven rebounds and one steal , while LeVert also had six rebounds , four assists and three steals . Trevor Booker pitched in 14 points , six rebounds , four assists and one steal . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson supplied nine points , seven rebounds and one steal . The Hawks continue on the road and head down to South Florida to face the Miami Heat on Monday night , while the Nets visit the Magic in Orlando on Tuesday evening .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the host Brooklyn Nets , 124 - 111 , at Barclays_Center on Sunday evening . The Nets ( 3 - 4 ) started out strong and poured in 36 points to get up by seven through the first quarter . However , the Nuggets ( 3 - 3 ) regrouped and rallied back with strong second and third quarters , outscoring the Nets 71 - 48 during that time . The Nuggets started the fourth quarter ahead 100 - 84 and were able to cruise to their second straight win . Jamal Murray was the hero for the Nuggets , as he led the way with 26 points on 8 - of - 14 shooting and five assists in 31 minutes . Nikola Jokic notched a double - double with 21 points and 14 rebounds in 28 minutes . Emmanuel Mudiay provided a boost off the bench , pouring in 15 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting , along with five assists and three rebounds in 19 minutes . The Nuggets assisted on 23 of their 47 field goals and shot 50 percent from the field . Meanwhile , the Nets were a bit shaky , shooting 40 percent from the field and giving up 15 turnovers . Spencer Dinwiddie was the scoring leader for the Nets with 22 points , along with four rebounds , four assists and three steals in 20 minutes off the bench . D'Angelo Russell went 3 - of - 12 from the field and finished with 12 points , eight assists and three rebounds in 24 minutes . DeMarre Carroll sat this one out with a sore ankle , while Allen Crabbe started in his place . Crabbe was quiet with eight points on 3 - of - 8 shooting in 27 minutes . The Nets will look to avoid a third straight loss when they play host to the Suns on Tuesday . The Nuggets will face the second night of a back - to - back when they take on the Knicks in New_York on Monday .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the host Brooklyn Nets , 122 - 114 , at Barclays_Center on Tuesday evening . The Suns got out to a strong start , taking a 30 - 24 lead after the first quarter , and managed to hold their lead until halftime . The Nets came out of the locker room with a purpose and outscored the Suns 35 - 28 in the third , bringing the deficit to only one , with the score 88 - 87 for the Suns heading into the final frame . Phoenix managed to hang on down the stretch , earning a solid road win . Devin Booker led the way for the Suns with 30 points on 11 - of - 22 shooting in 35 minutes . Mike James helped the Suns get out to their great start , finishing with 24 points , five assists , four steals and three rebounds in 28 minutes . T.J. Warren followed up with 20 points and 10 rebounds in 24 minutes . Alex Len was solid in 25 minutes off the bench , with six points and 15 rebounds . Meanwhile , despite five players scoring in double digits , the Nets still came up short . D'Angelo Russell led the way for Brooklyn with 33 points , on 11 - of - 20 shooting in 28 minutes , along with six rebounds and four assists . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson contributed 21 points , seven rebounds and two blocks in 30 minutes . The Nets shot only 41 percent from the field and 29 percent from long range and were out - rebounded 56 - 37 . The Nets will have a couple days off before they take on the Lakers in Los_Angeles on Friday . The Suns will face the second night of a back - to - back when they take on the Wizards in Washington on Wednesday .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 109 - 102 , at Barclays_Center on Tuesday night . The Celtics ( 13 - 2 ) came into Tuesday 's contest looking to extend their NBA-best winning streak to 13 games , and with Kyrie Irving returning from a facial fracture , the task figured to be that much more attainable . That ultimately proved to be true , as Irving paced all scorers with 25 points on the night and supplemented the total with five assists , three rebounds and one steal . The All-Star point guard played a modest 29 minutes and only shot 8 - for - 20 from the field , but his impact was undeniable . The key to Boston 's victory was the third quarter , as they pulled ahead by nine points with a suffocating defensive effort in which they limited the Nets ( 5 - 9 ) to 19 points . The Celtics ' starters put in the majority of the work Tuesday , as they were responsible for all but 13 of the team 's points on the night . The visitors also won the battle down low by a 49 - 42 margin , with both Al Horford and Marcus Morris turning in double - doubles . Morris ' final line consisted of 21 points , 10 rebounds and one assist . Jayson Tatum followed with 19 points , four rebounds , two steals and one block . Horford provided a 17 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and one steal . Jaylen Brown poured in 14 points and added four rebounds , three assists and three steals . Marcus Smart 's six points , five rebounds and two assists led the second unit . Joe Harris led the Nets from the bench , posting 19 points and three rebounds in 20 minutes . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson provided 16 points , nine rebounds and one assist . Allen Crabbe and Caris LeVert managed matching 15 - point efforts , with the former adding four assists , two rebounds and two steals , and the latter registering four assists , one rebound and one steal . Spencer Dinwiddie excelled in his start for D'Angelo Russell ( knee ) , compiling 12 points , 11 assists , four rebounds and one block . Trevor Booker matched Dinwiddie 's scoring total and added eight rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . The Celtics will have to earn it if they 're to extend their streak to 14 games , as they next take the court Thursday night at home against the defending NBA champion Golden_State Warriors . The Nets remain home and await the Utah Jazz on Friday evening .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Utah Jazz , 118 - 107 , at Barclays_Center on Friday night . The Jazz ( 6 - 10 ) came into the contest with the odds stacked against them , despite a matchup against the defensively challenged Nets ( 6 - 9 ) . Ricky Rubio ( Achilles ) was ruled out for the game earlier in the day , while standout center Rudy Gobert ( knee ) also remained sidelined . Brooklyn took advantage of their short - handed guests early on , jumping out to a 39 - 25 lead after one quarter . To their credit , Utah did their best to keep pace , battling back to cut the deficit to 89 - 80 by the start of the final period . However , the Nets had enough to close out the victory , utilizing a strong 51 percent team shooting effort and a career - high 25 points from Spencer Dinwiddie to seal the deal . With Rubio sidelined , Raul Neto led the way for the visitors with 22 points , three rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block in 20 minutes off the bench . Rodney Hood followed with 17 points , two assists and one rebound . Joe Ingles , Derrick Favors and Donovan Mitchell turned in a trio of 15 - point efforts . Ingles added four rebounds , four assists and one block , Favors hauled in seven boards , dished out one rebound and recorded a block , and Mitchell also supplied eight assists , seven rebounds , one steal and one block . Alec Burks registered 10 points , six rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block in 28 minutes off the bench . Dinwiddie added eight assists , five rebounds and two steals to his aforementioned scoring total . Allen Crabbe totaled 18 points , five rebounds and three assists . DeMarre Carroll followed with 17 points , three assists , two rebounds and two steals . Trevor Booker posted 14 points , five rebounds and three assists . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson had a relatively quiet night with seven points , four rebounds , three assists and one steal . Caris LeVert paced the second unit with 10 points , four boards and two assists . The Jazz continue on the road to Central Florida , where they tangle with the Orlando Magic on Saturday night . The Nets remain home and await the defending NBA champion Golden_State Warriors on Sunday evening .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the host Brooklyn Nets , 118 - 111 , at Barclay 's Center on Sunday . Despite the fact that Golden_State led by 28 at times in the second half , Brooklyn did a fantastic job of making this a game . In fact , the Nets outscored the Warriors , 69 - 54 , in the second half , despite trailing by 22 at the half . The shooting disparity was vast , with Golden_State hitting 51 percent of their shots , while holding Brooklyn to just 36 percent from the field . Defensive rebounding was also a huge factor , with the Warriors outrebounding the Nets , 51 - 39 . They also recorded 14 blocks , as the Nets could only muster up two blocks on their end . The Warriors ( 13 - 4 ) had to play without Kevin Durant ( ankle ) , as Stephen Curry led the team with 39 points , 11 rebounds , seven assists and three steals before fouling out . Klay Thompson recorded a 23 - point , 10 - rebound double - double . Draymond Green collected five points , seven rebounds , eight assists , two steals and two blocks . The Nets ( 6 - 10 ) were led by Allen Crabbe , who tallied 25 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Spencer Dinwiddie got another start and provided 21 points , two rebounds and eight assists . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson accumulated 16 points , 12 rebounds and five assists . DeMarre Carroll amassed 15 points , 11 rebounds and three assists . Brooklyn will be off until Wednesday , when they travel to face the Cleveland Cavaliers . As for Golden_State , they travel to play the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Wednesday as well .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 127 - 125 , at Barclays_Center on Friday afternoon . The Trail_Blazers ( 11 - 8 ) ultimately emerged victorious in the wildly entertaining contest , but they endured an inauspicious beginning . The Nets ( 6 - 12 ) jumped out to a 32 - 23 lead after one quarter before Portland began to chip away . They 'd cut their deficit down to 53 - 51 by halftime , and the teams entered the final period deadlocked at 92 . However , the Blazers had fallen behind again by as much as 121 - 115 with as little as 2:20 remaining following an Allen Crabbe floating jump shot , but an 80 Portland run vaulted them into a 123 - 121 lead with 55 seconds left . A Jusuf Nurkic layup and successful free throw gave the visitors the room they needed to withstand a subsequent Spencer Dinwiddie basket , and C.J . McCollum 's free throw at the 11 - second mark provided the final margin of victory . As the final score implied , the stat sheet was virtually even across the board , with both teams posting identical 50 percent tallies from the field and 40 percent from three - point range . Damian Lillard led the way for the Blazers with 34 points , nine assists , four rebounds , one steal and one block . Nurkic put together a monster double - double consisting of 29 points , 15 rebounds , three assists , four blocks and one steal . C.J . McCollum bounced back from a nightmarish shooting performance in his last contest to supply 26 points , five assists , two rebounds , one block and one steal . Evan Turner turned in a bench - leading 13 points , which he supplemented with four assists , three rebounds and one steal . Noah Vonleh registered seven points , seven rebounds and one block . Spencer Dinwiddie paced the Nets with 23 points , six assists , four rebounds , one steal and one block . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson poured in 17 points and added four rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Caris LeVert led the second unit with 14 points and added six rebounds and two assists . Joe Harris was productive off the bench as well with 13 points , five assists and two rebounds . Allen Crabbe turned in 12 points , three rebounds and one assist . Tyler Zeller drew another start at center and provided 10 points , three rebounds , one assist and one block . DeMarre Carroll matched Zeller 's scoring and also registered nine rebounds , three assists and one block . The Trail_Blazers remain on the road and next head to the Nation 's Capital , where they 'll take on the Washington Wizards on Saturday night . Meanwhile , the Nets head south to take on the Memphis Grizzlies on Sunday evening .
The Atlanta Hawks traveled to Barclays_Center and defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 114 - 102 , on Saturday afternoon . The Hawks ( 5 - 17 ) entered this game in the midst of a two - game losing streak while dropping five of the last six games , but they left those problems behind with a strong performance against the Nets ( 8 - 14 ) . Atlanta built a 54 - 45 lead at the half , but the Nets came back and put themselves down by six entering the third quarter . However , the Hawks did n't rattle and used a strong fourth quarter to pull away for good . With the result , Brooklyn improved to 3 - 9 on the road , while the Nets fell to 4 - 6 at home . Dennis Schroder led the way for Atlanta with 24 points , six assists and three rebounds . He was the only starter to score in double digits for Atlanta , but the bench picked up the slack and contributed with 56 points in total . Luke Babbitt chipped in with 20 points , while DeAndre Bembry ( 12 points and five rebounds ) and Isaiah Taylor ( 11 points ) did a good job off the bench as well . Spencer Dinwiddie led the way for Brooklyn offensively with a strong effort on both ends of the court , as the point guard chipped in with 15 points , nine assists , and six rebounds . Allen Crabbe added 12 points , while Joe Harris ( 13 points ) , Jarrett Allen ( 12 points with six boards ) and Sean Kilpatrick ( 12 points ) emerged as viable scoring threats in the second unit .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder 100 - 93 on Thursday in Mexico_City . Just when things were starting to get better for the Thunder ( 11 - 3 ) , they lay an egg in the fourth quarter against the Nets ( 10 - 14 ) to put an end to their three - game winning streak . After opening up a 13 - point lead in the first quarter , Oklahoma_City slowly let Brooklyn back into Thursday 's contest and ultimately got outscored by 10 points in the final period . The Nets ' Caris LeVert came off the bench to have a great game , scoring a team - high 21 points to go along with 10 assists and five rebounds in 30 minutes as a reserve . LeVert also managed to hit four straight free throws in the final minutes that helped ice the game . Overall , it was n't a great shooting night for the Nets , as they shot 44 percent from the field and 63 percent from the free throw line , but they stepped up on the defensive side of the ball and allowed less than 100 points for the second straight game . As for the Thunder , while they were without Paul George ( calf ) and Jerami Grant ( hip ) , it was a miserable shooting night for the team , as OKC shot just 39 percent from the field , 29 percent from behind the arc and a very poor 48 percent from the free throw line . Carmelo Anthony , who had a double - double of 11 points and 11 rebounds , shot just 1 - of - 6 from the charity stripe . Russell Westbrook did all he could to will his team to victory , posting 31 points , eight rebounds and six assists , but the Thunder 's shooting woes were just too much to overcome in the end .

The Nets tried to come back , but the Hets were clicking at all cylinders and a huge performance in the fourth quarter clinched them a 101 - 89 victory .
