The Brooklyn Nets defeated the visiting Washington Wizards , 119 - 84 , at Barclays_Center on Friday evening . The Nets had the edge for just about the whole way in this one . They led 26 - 23 after one quarter and pushed it to a 53 - 43 lead by halftime . The Nets took full control in the third quarter , where they kicked things off with a 14 - 4 run , sparked by 11 straight points by Spencer Dinwiddie . The Nets took an 88 - 61 lead into the final quarter and cruised to the win , ending a four - game losing streak . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson led the way for Brooklyn , with 21 points , 11 rebounds , six assists and one block , in 23 minutes . Dinwiddie tallied 15 points on 5 - of - 7 shooting , while DeMarre Carroll added 15 points , six rebounds , four assists and one steal , in 22 minutes . Caris LeVert came up large off the bench , with 17 points on 7 - of - 9 shooting , six rebounds and three assists , in 23 minutes . The Nets shot 50 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 39 from long range . Meanwhile , the Wizards had a really tough time scoring the ball , with only two players hitting double figures , as Kelly Oubre Jr. led the way with 13 points in 28 minutes off the bench . John Wall followed up with 10 points , four assists and two rebounds , while Markieff Morris added nine points and four rebounds . The Wizards shot 37 percent from the field , including 5 - of - 20 from distance . The Wizards ( 17 - 15 ) will be right back in action as they play host to the Magic on Saturday . The Nets ( 12 - 19 ) will also be in action on Saturday , as they visit Indiana to take on the Pacers .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 87 - 85 , at Barclays_Center on Saturday evening . The Celtics ( 33 - 10 ) came into what figured to be fairly challenging road matchup riding a hot streak , as they 'd secured victories in five straight games . They were facing a similarly surging squad in the Nets ( 15 - 24 ) , which had notched wins in three of the previous four contests and had been able to forge a respectable 9 - 9 record at home . Brooklyn got off on the right foot as well , as they jumped out to a 22 - 16 edge after one quarter . They eventually lost that lead and entered the fourth period with a slim 64 - 61 deficit . However , they hung tough throughout the final quarter , even managing multiple ties and one - point advantages . They appeared to have a clear - cut shot to force overtime at a minimum after Joe Harris ' basket with 36 seconds remaining left them trailing by just an 87 - 85 margin . That 's when Boston 's renowned defense clamped down , as Spencer Dinwiddie , Harris and Rondae Hollis-Jefferson all missed opportunities to knot the game up and send it to the extra period . As the final score implied , both offenses struggled to garner much consistency , as each team posted sub - 40 percent success rates from the field . Additionally , despite the loss , the home squad handily won the rebounding battle by a 55 - 43 margin . Kyrie Irving led the way for the Celtics with 21 points , which he supplemented with six rebounds , four assists and one block . Jayson Tatum totaled 14 points , six rebounds , three steals and an impressive six blocks . Marcus Smart followed with a bench - leading 11 points and added three rebounds , three assists , three steals and one block . Aron Baynes drew the start with Al Horford ( knee ) sidelined and contributed 10 points , six boards , one assist and one block . Marcus Morris was also in the starting five after resting in Boston 's last contest and posted eight points , four rebounds , one assist and one block . Daniel Theis was productive off the bench with eight points , 10 rebounds , two blocks and one steal . Spencer Dinwiddie paced the Nets with 20 points , three rebounds , three assists and one steal . Jahlil Okafor continued to work his way into Brooklyn 's rotation and led the bench with 12 points , five rebounds and two blocks . DeMarre Carroll registered 10 points , seven rebounds , one assist and one block . Harris poured in 10 points and also brought in 12 rebounds , dished out two assists and recorded one block . Allen Crabbe produced nine points , five boards and one assist , while Hollis-Jefferson pitched in eight points , seven rebounds , one assist and one block . The Celtics are now off until Thursday afternoon , when they 'll take on the Philadelphia 76ers at home . The Nets remain home and await a visit from the Toronto Raptors on Monday night .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 114 - 80 , at Barclays_Center on Wednesday evening . The Pistons ( 22 - 18 ) went into Wednesday 's contest looking to right the ship after having lost four of their previous six games , and they appeared to have a potentially soft target in a struggling Nets ( 15 - 26 ) squad . Brooklyn had the additional handicap of being without the services of DeMarre Carroll , who was sidelined with a knee injury . They kept matters competitive in the first quarter , but despite their best efforts , they still trailed 34 - 26 going into the second quarter . The situation quickly unraveled from there , as Detroit outscored the Nets by a 56 - 35 margin over the second and third quarters to essentially seal the win at that point . As the final score implied , the stat sheet was decidedly tilted in the visitors ' favor , as the Pistons ' 52 percent success rate from the floor and 54 rebounds significantly outpaced the 36 percent figure and 34 boards that Brooklyn tallied . The dynamic duo of Andre Drummond and Tobias Harris led the way for the Pistons with 22 points apiece . Drummond added 20 rebounds , five assists , two steals and two blocks , while Harris provided four boards and one assist . Dwight Buycks followed with a bench - leading 17 points , a total he supplemented with three assists , two rebounds and one steal . Avery Bradley supplied 13 points , five assists and two rebounds , while Luke Kennard matched Bradley 's scoring total off the bench and added six rebounds and one steal . Ish Smith registered eight points , five assists and four rebounds . The Nets saw only three players post double - digit point totals , with Allen Crabbe 's 20 points serving as the team high . He complemented that total with three rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson filled out the stat sheet with 15 points , seven rebounds , three assists and three steals . Caris LeVert led the bench with 12 points and also hauled in five boards , dished out three assists and recorded one block . Joe Harris accounted for nine points , two rebounds , one assist and one steal . Tyler Zeller collected seven points , three rebounds and two assists , while Spencer Dinwiddie had a rare clunker with just two points , three rebounds and three assists . The Pistons remain on the road and next pay a visit to the Chicago Bulls on Saturday night , while the Nets head south to tangle with the Atlanta Hawks on Friday evening .
The New_York Knicks defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 119 - 104 , at Barclays_Center on Monday afternoon . Both teams came into the contest looking to end multi - game skids that were progressively endangering any Eastern_Conference postseason aspirations each may have had . Each squad looked ready to play in a tightly - contested first quarter , but the Knicks ( 20 - 24 ) gained some separation in the second to establish a 52 - 42 halftime edge . The respective defenses failed to answer the call coming out of intermission , however , as a combined 70 points were scored in the third period . The Nets ( 16 - 28 ) accounted for 39 of those to close their deficit to 83 - 81 heading into the final quarter . New_York promptly squashed any designs of a comeback with an 110 run to open the period , setting the foundation for the comfortable double - digit win . The Knicks outperformed their hosts in most categories on the stat sheet and shot a blistering 51 percent , including 56 percent from three - point range . They also won the battle on the glass , outrebounding Brooklyn by a 51 - 45 margin . Kristaps Porzingis led the way for the Knicks with 26 points , a total he supplemented with nine rebounds and two blocks . Michael Beasley followed with a bench - leading 23 points and added 10 boards , two assists and two blocks . Doug McDermott managed 13 points , four boards and one assist in 29 minutes off the bench . Kyle O'Quinn turned in a productive effort on the second unit as well , registering 11 points , seven rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Courtney Lee and rookie Frank Ntilikina generated matching 10 - point tallies , with the former adding two assists , one rebound and one block , and the latter dishing out 10 assists , hauling in seven rebounds , recording two blocks and notching one steal . DeMarre Carroll paced the Nets with 22 points , eight rebounds , three assists and one steal . Caris LeVert was next with a 20 - point haul that led the bench . He also contributed seven rebounds , one assist and one steal . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson accounted for 16 points , six boards , one assist and one steal . Quincy Acy supplied 13 points , four rebounds and one block . Joe Harris was the third Brooklyn reserve with double - digit scoring , as he posted 10 points and also registered five rebounds , one assist and one steal . The starting backcourt had a quiet afternoon , as Spencer Dinwiddie ( eight points , five assists and four rebounds ) and Allen Crabbe ( six points , three rebounds , three assists and one block ) both turned in underwhelming efforts . The Knicks remain on the road and head to the Volunteer State , where they 'll take on the Memphis Grizzlies on Wednesday evening . The Nets remain home to tangle with the San_Antonio Spurs that same night .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Miami Heat , 101 - 95 , at Barclays_Center on Friday evening . The Nets ( 17 - 29 ) did n't exactly come into Friday 's contest at their sharpest , having lost six of their previous seven games . The Heat ( 26 - 19 ) were their polar opposite , considering they were riding a torrid stretch that had seen them win eight of nine . However , records were ultimately thrown out the window in the back - and - forth contest , one that saw Brooklyn fall behind by a 53 - 45 margin in the first half before bouncing back with a combined 58 points over the third and fourth quarters . The final 12 minutes featured multiple lead changes , with the home squad finally separating themselves beginning at the 1:38 mark . Spencer Dinwiddie snapped a 91 - 91 tie at that point with a diving dunk , and Caris LeVert netted the next four points with a driving layup and 14 - foot pullup jump shot . The Nets would n't relinquish the 97 - 91 lead they 'd forged at that point , with Dinwiddie adding a pair of free throws and a layup to put an exclamation point on the victory . Hassan Whiteside paced the Heat with a 22 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and four blocks . Goran Dragic posted 17 points , four rebounds , four assists and one block . Josh Richardson filled out the stat sheet with 12 points , seven assists , four rebounds and three steals . Kelly Olynyk matched Richardson 's scoring total to lead the bench and added five boards , three assists and one block . Wayne Ellington produced 10 points , three rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block in 33 minutes off the bench . Bam Adebayo turned in nine points , three boards and two assists , while James Johnson generated eight points , four boards , two assists and one steal . DeMarre Carroll led the Nets with 26 points and added six boards , one assist , two steals and one block . Dinwiddie finished with 15 points , six rebounds and three assists . LeVert and Joe Harris paced the reserves with 12 - point efforts , with the former adding five assists , four rebounds , three steals and one block , and the latter registering one rebound and one assist . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson tallied seven points , six rebounds , four assists and two blocks . Quincy Acy matched his scoring total and also collected four rebounds and one block . The Heat remain on the road and head to the Carolinas , where they 'll take on the Charlotte Hornets on Saturday night . The Nets make their own trip to Motown , where they 'll tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Sunday afternoon .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 102 - 99 , at Barclays_Center on Friday evening . The Lakers ( 20 - 31 ) and the Nets ( 19 - 34 ) played an absolute thriller on Barclays_Center , as the game went down to the wire and it was n't until the final seconds that it was decided . Brooklyn grabbed the lead 26 - 24 in the first , but the Lakers answered back and put themselves ahead by two at halftime . The Nets evened things up after three , so things were going to be decided in the final quarter . The Lakers were far more accurate in the final 12 minutes , and escaped with a three - point win on the road . Brandon Ingram was the best player for the Lakers and he came quite close to register a triple - double after finishing with 16 points , 10 assists and eight rebounds . Julius Randle and Brook Lopez lead the team scoring wise , however , as both finished with 19 points . Randle added 12 rebounds as well . Josh Hart added 15 points and 14 rebounds . Jordan Clarkson finished with 11 points off the bench . Spencer Dinwiddie was the top scorer for the Nets , as the talented guard ended with 23 points , nine assists , and seven rebounds . Jarrett Allen added 20 points , and Joe Harris had 11 points and seven rebounds . D'Angelo Russell did n't have his best game against his former teammates , and ended with 15 points coming off the bench .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 138 - 128 , at Barclays_Center on Saturday evening . The Pelicans ( 29 - 26 ) and the Nets ( 19 - 38 ) played one of the most intense games of the season , and in fact these teams needed two overtime periods to determine who would come out on top . The Pelicans were close to lose the game , though , as they built a 20 - point lead at halftime just to see Brooklyn bounce back with a 15 - point lead in the fourth quarter . They could n't decide who would win after the first OT , and the Pelicans were just too much for Brooklyn in the second OT , grinding it out on route to a 10 - point win after a 14 - 4 advantage in the final five minutes of action . Anthony Davis filled the stat sheet nicely for the Pelicans , as he contributed on both ends of the floor thanks to 44 points , 17 rebounds , six steals , three blocks and two assists . Rajon Rondo finished with a triple - double of 25 points , 12 assists and 10 rebounds . Nikola Mirotic had 21 points and 16 boards , and Jrue Holiday chipped in with 22 points , seven rebounds , and five assists . Allen Crabbe was the top scorer for the Nets after finishing with 28 points and six rebounds . Spencer Dinwiddie had 24 points and 10 assists . Joe Harris added 12 points with 10 boards , and DeMarre Carroll contributed 12 points , nine boards and five assists . D'Angelo Russell had a productive effort off the bench , since he had 21 points , nine rebounds and five assists .
The Indiana Pacers toppled the Brooklyn Nets , 108 - 103 , at Barclays_Center on Wednesday evening . The Pacers ( 33 - 35 ) got the Nets ' ( 19 - 40 ) best efforts right from the opening tip , as the hosts matched them basket for basket on the way to a 54 - 54 halftime deadlock . Brooklyn then gained separation in the third with a 25 - point haul , allowing them to enter the final period with a 79 - 73 advantage . However , that edge was short - lived thanks to Indiana 's 70 run to open the fourth quarter , and the two teams then proceeded to trade the lead back and forth on multiple occasions throughout the subsequent six - plus minutes . A Thaddeus Young dunk at the 2:55 mark put the visitors back on top for good , although the home squad would get as close as within two with 1:4 remaining thanks to a pair of Spender Dinwiddie free throws . Rebounding and turnovers were both key factors in the Pacers ' favor , as they won the battle on the glass by a 52 - 44 margin and took the ball away from the Nets on 13 occasions while only committing eight such infractions themselves . Victor Oladipo led the Pacers with 25 points and also supplied four assists , three rebounds and three steals . Cory Joseph snapped out of a funk with a 15 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included three assists , two steals and two blocks . Bojan Bogdanovic produced 14 points , five boards , one assist and two steals . Young tallied 13 points , seven rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Al Jefferson matched Young 's scoring total to lead the bench and also provided three rebounds , one assist and two blocks . Myles Turner turned in an 11 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included one assist , one steal and one block . Allen Crabbe poured in 24 points to pace the Nets , and he added eight boards and one assist . DeMarre Carroll delivered a 21 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included four assists , one steal and one block . D'Angelo Russell managed a bench - leading 18 points , dished out nine assists and hauled down three rebounds . Jarrett Allen collected 10 points and six rebounds . Joe Harris was productive on the second unit as well with nine points and two rebounds . Quincy Acy drew a start at power forward and went on to account for eight points , four assists and two rebounds . The Pacers are now off for the All-Star break until Friday , Feb. 23 , when they 'll face the Atlanta Hawks in a home date . The Nets get back into action on Thursday , Feb. 22 in a road tilt against the Charlotte Hornets .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the visiting Chicago Bulls , 104 - 87 , at Barclays_Center on Monday evening . The game started out close , as the teams traded buckets through most of the first quarter , until the Nets pulled away with a 15 - 5 run to end the quarter and take a 28 - 19 lead into the second . The Bulls battled back early in the second and cut the deficit to just two halfway through the quarter . They continued to rally and managed to take the lead , 51 - 49 , by halftime . The third quarter belonged entirely to Brooklyn , as the Nets jumped out to a 90 to retake the lead . They stayed in control through the rest of the quarter , where they outscored the Bulls , 35 - 19 , to take a convincing 84 - 70 lead into the final frame . The Nets did not look back , as they cruised the rest of the way to the 17 - point win , to snap an eight - game losing streak . Allen Crabbe was the high - point man for Brooklyn , with 21 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting , in 23 minutes . DeMarre Carroll came up large with 18 points , six rebounds , five assists and one block , while Jarrett Allen finished with 18 points , nine rebounds , three blocks and two assists . The Nets shot 44 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 42 from long range . Meanwhile , Kris Dunn led the Bulls with 23 points , four assists , three rebounds , two steals and two blocks , in 30 minutes of action . Lauri Markkanen followed up with 19 points , and six rebounds , while Denzel Valentine tallied 11 points , 13 rebounds , three assists and one steal . The Bulls shot 36 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 22 from long range . The Bulls ( 20 - 40 ) will be right back in action , as they take on the Hornets in Charlotte on Tuesday . The Nets ( 20 - 41 ) will also be back in action on Tuesday , as they take on the Cavs , in Cleveland .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the host Brooklyn Nets , 120 - 97 , at Barclays_Center on Sunday evening . The 76ers got out to a great start on the road with a 10 - 2 just three minutes into the game . They kept pushing until they led 37 - 25 entering the second quarter . The Sixers pushed their lead to 17 mid way through the second , but the Nets cut it to a 10 - point , 70 - 60 lead by halftime . The Nets came out fighting in the third , but the Sixers were able to stay in control and take a 96 - 83 lead into the final frame . The 76ers turned it up in the fourth , as they pushed their lead to 20 just a couple minutes into the quarter , and were able to cruise to the finish from there . Joel Embiid led the 76ers with 21 points , eight rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block , in 26 minutes . Robert Covington followed up with 19 points , five assists , four rebounds , two blocks and one steal , while Dario Saric added 18 points , six rebounds , three assists , two blocks and one steal . The Sixers shot 53 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 26 from long range . Meanwhile , D'Angelo Russell led the Nets with 26 points , four rebounds and four assists , in 28 minutes . Spencer Dinwiddie followed up with 13 points , six assists , three rebounds and one steal , while Rondae Hollis-Jefferson added 12 points , six rebounds , one assists and one block . The Nets shot 39 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 28 from long range . The Nets ( 21 - 46 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Raptors on Tuesday . The Sixers ( 36 - 29 ) play host to the Pacers on Tuesday .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 116 - 102 , at Barclays_Center on Tuesday evening . Despite their perch at the top of the Eastern_Conference , the Raptors ( 50 - 17 ) do n't have the luxury of letting their guard down , as the No . 2 - seeded Boston Celtics remain within striking distance . That kind of mindset should eliminate the possibility of any `` trap `` games during the stretch run , but sometimes , an opponent with an unsightly record does n't necessarily equate to a walk in the park , no matter how prepared one 's team might be . Such appeared to be the case during the first half Tuesday , as the feisty Nets ( 21 - 47 ) , which have given their fair share of quality opponents a hearty battle even in losing efforts , ambushed Toronto to the tune of 67 first - half points . Luckily for the visitors , Brooklyn 's defense was n't in shutdown mode by any means , allowing the Raptors to keep their halftime deficit to a manageable 10 points . That laid the groundwork for a momentous second - half surge , as Toronto turned up the heat on both ends of the floor . They tallied a robust 59 on the scoreboard over the final 24 minutes while limiting their hosts to 35 , leading to their relatively comfortable margin of victory . The Eastern_Conference pace - setters ultimately got it done with both strong shooting and rebounding , as they drained 48 percent of their attempts while handily winning the battle on the glass , 53 - 38 . Jonas Valanciunas led the way for the Raptors with a 26 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and one block , becoming yet another big man to give the Nets significant problems down low . DeMar DeRozan poured in 15 points and added seven rebounds , two assists and one steal . Fred VanVleet matched DeRozan 's scoring total to lead the bench and also delivered four assists , one rebound and two steals . C.J . Miles generated 12 points and three boards . Kyle Lowry turned in an 11 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included three rebounds and one steal . Delon Wright was productive off the bench with 10 points , four assists , three rebounds and one steal . Serge Ibaka managed nine points , nine boards , one assist , one steal and one block . D'Angelo Russell continued a recent surge by pacing the Nets with 32 points , a total he supplemented with seven rebounds , two blocks and one steal . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson led the second unit with 19 points and seven rebounds , while also supplying two assists , one steal and one block . Caris LeVert finished with 11 points , seven assists , three rebounds and three steals . Dante Cunningham drew the start for Jarrett Allen ( foot ) and registered 10 points , four rebounds , one assist and one steal . DeMarre Carroll ( nine points , six rebounds and one assist ) , Allen Crabbe ( six points , six rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block ) and Spencer Dinwiddie ( seven points , five assists , three rebounds , two steals and one block ) all turned in modest efforts . The Raptors remain on the road and head to the Midwest , where they 'll face the Indiana Pacers on Thursday evening . The Nets pack their bags and make the short trip Philadelphia , where they have a Wednesday night date with the 76ers .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 114 - 106 , at Barclays_Center on Saturday evening . As their record implies , the Nets ( 22 - 48 ) have n't exactly experienced an overwhelming amount of success this season , but a good portion of what they 've enjoyed has come on their home floor . Brooklyn had notched 12 of their 21 wins coming into Saturday 's contest at Barclays_Center , while the Mavericks ( 22 - 48 ) had been successful in only eight of 33 road tilts . Despite the disparity , it was the visitors who took a slim 89 - 88 advantage into the fourth quarter following a tightly contested first three periods . That lead grew to four less than a minute in , but the hosts would draw even just two possessions later and eventually take a lead that they would n't relinquish . An ankle injury to Dennis Smith , Jr. , who was in the midst of a stellar effort that consisted of 21 points , five assists , two rebounds , two blocks and one steal , was pivotal , as it robbed Dallas of a key component of its offense . Both teams shot well in the high - scoring affair , with the Mavericks posting a 45 percent success rate from the field - - including an impressive 54 percent from distance - - and the Nets draining 51 percent of their 84 attempts . Dwight Powell followed Smith in the scoring column with 18 points , which he supplemented with five boards , two assists and one steal . Jalen Jones saw extended time , posting 16 points , seven rebounds , one assist and one steal over 29 minutes . Dirk Nowitzki tallied 13 points , seven boards , two assists and one steal . Yogi Ferrell provided a 12 - point , 12 - assist double - double that also included five rebounds . Johnathan Motley and Maxi Kleber produced matching eight - point tallies off the bench . Doug McDermott drew the start and mustered just six points and five rebounds despite playing a game - high 42 minutes . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson managed 23 points , five rebounds , four assists and one steal . D'Angelo Russell generated 22 points , six assists and four rebounds . DeMarre Carroll collected 19 points , 12 rebounds , three assists and one steal . Spencer Dinwiddie turned in 12 points , five boards , four assists , one steal and one block . Joe Harris and Caris LeVert each finished with 11 points . The former ripped down three rebounds and dished out one assist , while the latter registered four rebounds and three assists . Quincy Acy was productive off the bench with nine points , three assists , two rebounds and one block . The Mavericks remain on the road and head to New_Orleans for a Tuesday evening showdown with the Pelicans , while the Nets remain home to take on the Memphis Grizzlies on Monday night .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 121 - 114 , at Barclays_Center on Sunday . The Cavaliers ( 44 - 29 ) and the Nets ( 23 - 51 ) delivered a tightly - contested battle that saw the hosts come out on top early , but the reigning Eastern_Conference champions did not give up and ended winning thanks to an impressive performance during the second half . Brooklyn jumped to a 30 - 28 lead after the first quarter , and that advantage maintained through the subsequent two quarters ( 32 - 32 and 27 - 27 , respectively ) , meaning the Nets held a two - point advantage entering the fourth quarter . However , Cleveland woke up and ended winning after topping Brooklyn 34 - 25 in the final 12 minutes of action . With the win , Cleveland won their fifth straight contest and are getting hotter at the right time . LeBron James was the best player for the Cavaliers , as he came close to another triple - double since he finished with 37 points , nine rebounds , and eight assists . Kevin Love had 20 points and 15 rebounds , while George Hill contributed 17 points , five assists and two steals . Jordan Clarkson added 18 points off the bench , while Rodney Hood chipped in with 16 in 33 minutes . Joe Harris led the way for the Nets thanks to a career - high of 30 points and seven rebounds in just 27 minutes coming off the bench . DeMarre Carroll had 18 points , six rebounds , four assists and two steals . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson had 15 points , six boards , and five assists . D'Angelo Russell ended with 12 points , but he shot 4 - 11 from the field .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the host Brooklyn Nets , 108 - 96 , at Barclay 's Center on Sunday . While there were seven ties and seven lead changes in the first half , that was the only time this game was competitive . A 29 - 20 second quarter really set the tone , as Brooklyn trailed by at least six points for the entirety of the second half . Rebounding was the difference for Detroit , as they won the rebounding battle , 53 - 40 . Three-point shooting was also huge , with the Pistons connecting on 7 - of - 19 and Brooklyn hitting just 12 - of - 43 . In addition , the Pistons went 25 - of - 32 from the free - throw line while the Nets connected on just 10 - of - 15 . The Pistons ( 37 - 40 ) were led by Reggie Jackson , as he tallied 29 points , four rebounds and three assists . Stanley Johnson accrued 17 points , four rebounds , four assists and four steals . Andre Drummond collected 13 points and 14 rebounds . Anthony Tolliver also double - doubled , totaling 10 points , 12 rebounds and two steals . Ish Smith led the bench with 17 points on 7 - of - 8 from the field . The Nets ( 25 - 52 ) had no player score more than 15 points , as Jarrett Allen led the starters with 15 points , six rebounds and three blocks . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson accumulated 14 points , eight rebounds and three assists . D'Angelo Russell generated 13 points , four rebounds , seven assists and two steals . Joe Harris led the bench with 15 points and five boards . On deck for Brooklyn is a road matchup versus the Philadelphia 76ers on Tuesday . As for Detroit , they also face the 76ers in their next game , as they play host to them on Wednesday .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Chicago Bulls , 114 - 105 , at Barclays_Center on Monday evening . The Nets ( 28 - 53 ) had just disposed of the Bulls ( 27 - 54 ) on Saturday night on their home court , walloping them by a 124 - 96 margin . That alone made Brooklyn the favorite in the rematch on their floor Monday , but Chicago had different ideas . The visitors hung tough throughout the first half , although they still trailed by a 62 - 55 margin at halftime . That was n't anywhere near enough to make them throw in the towel , however , as they had whittled their deficit down to three heading into the final 12 minutes . The hosts then put their foot on the gas late in the fourth , going on an 80 run beginning at the 3:8 mark to gain enough separation for the victory . Both teams shot well in the high - scoring affair , with the Nets draining 50 percent of their 82 attempts and the Bulls generating a 48 percent success rate from the floor . Sean Kilpatrick continued his strong play by leading the Bulls with 16 points , a total he supplemented with three rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block . Cameron Payne tallied 15 points , six assists , three rebounds and two steals . Bobby Portis managed 14 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Justin Holiday poured in 13 points and added four boards and four assists . David Nwaba produced an 11 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included one assist . Lauri Markkanen returned to the lineup after missing Saturday 's game for rest and accounted for 10 points , six rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Cristiano Felicio supplied 10 points , five boards , two assists and one steal . Ryan Arcidiacono totaled nine points , four assists and two rebounds . Allen Crabbe paced the Nets with a spectacular shooting performance , compiling 41 points , five rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . He drained a jaw - dropping 12 of 15 attempts , including eight of 11 tries from distance . D'Angelo Russell posted a 21 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included six rebounds and two steals . Spencer Dinwiddie delivered 20 points , seven assists and three rebounds . Jarrett Allen mustered eight points , five rebounds , four blocks and one steal . Milton Doyle led the bench with eight points , three rebounds and one block . The Bulls finish off their season against the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday night , while the Nets close their campaign out against the Celtics in Boston .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the Sacramento Kings , 94 - 79 , at Pepsi_Center on Saturday . Defense has been lacking for Denver over recent years , but this was one of their best defensive performances in recent memory . In fact , they held Sacramento to just 37 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range . In addition , they held Sacramento to 18 points or less in the first three quarters . Rebounding was a glaring difference , with Denver winning that battle , 58 - 38 . The 25 assists recorded by the Nuggets were also huge , as they held the Kings to just 15 assists on their end . The Kings ( 1 - 2 ) really struggled in this game , as their five starters combined for just 25 points in total . Zach Randolph was the only starter in double figures , as he totaled 11 points and nine rebounds . Buddy Hield struggled mightily , scoring three points on 1 - of - 10 shooting . Rookie De'Aaron Fox was a bright spot off the bench , accumulating 18 points and five rebounds . Skal Labissiere also played well off the bench , totaling 13 points , four rebounds and four assists . The Nuggets ( 1 - 1 ) came into this game as a double - digit favorite and they proved why in this dominating result . Paul Millsap led the starters by accruing 18 points , nine rebounds and two assists . Kenneth Faried matched those 18 points , adding eight rebounds to lead the bench . Wilson Chandler went just 2 - of - 8 from the field , but still collected five points , 12 rebounds and four assists . Nikola Jokic went scoreless , but did provide nine rebounds and seven assists . Both teams return to action on Monday , with Denver hosting the Washington Wizards and Sacramento traveling to face the Phoenix Suns .
The Washington Wizards defeated the host Denver Nuggets , 109 - 104 , at Pepsi_Center on Monday night . The Nuggets and the Wizards battled hard during the entirety of Monday 's contest , as the game was quite close throughout . However , Washington was able to finish on top , and they managed to close things out with a solid performance in the second half . Washington entered the final quarter with a one - point advantage , but won the final period 31 - 27 to seal the deal . The Wizards ( 30 ) had six players score in double figures in this one . Bradley Beal led the offense with 20 points , and Otto Porter Jr. added 17 points with 10 rebounds . John Wall shot poorly from the field as he converted just three of his 14 shots , but went 13 - of - 15 from the charity stripe to round a decent line of 19 points , 12 assists and two steals . Kelly Oubre Jr. ( 14 points ) , Marcin Gortat ( 13 points on 6 - of - 7 from the field ) and Tim Frazier ( 10 points in 14 minutes ) did their part as well . Denver ( 1 - 2 ) enjoyed a great solo effort from Nikola Jokic , but it was n't enough and dropped the contest in front of their home crowd . The Serbian big man contributed with 29 points , eight rebounds , and five assists , while Paul Millsap had 17 points and eight rebounds . The rest of the starting lineup ( Gary Harris , Wilson Chandler , and Jamal Murray ) only combined for 17 points , but Will Barton and Emmanuel Mudiay picked up the slack from the bench . Barton had 12 points , and Mudiay added 15 of his own .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting Miami Heat , 95 - 94 , at Pepsi_Center on Friday evening . This one was a nail - biter , with five lead changes in the last minute of play . The Heat led by one with a minute left , while a crucial missed free throw by Goran Dragic , with 23 seconds left , prevented the Heat from taking a three - point advantage . In a turn of the most unfortunate circumstances for the Heat , Paul Millsap made it to the foul line for three free throws with 11 seconds left to take the one - point advantage and steal the game . Five players scored in double digits for the Nuggets ( 5 - 4 ) , led by Paul Millsap , who finished with 27 points , nine rebounds , five assists , two steals and one block in 34 minutes . Nikola Jokic came up large , with 19 points , 14 rebounds , four steals , two assists and one block in 33 minutes . Emmanuel Mudiay continued his strong play , with 12 points , four assists and three rebounds in 25 minutes off the bench . Jamal Murray was quiet , with only three points on 1 - of - 6 shooting . Meanwhile , Goran Dragic was the high - point man for the Heat ( 3 - 5 ) , with 23 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting in 34 minutes . Dion Waiters chipped in 15 points in 30 minutes , while James Johnson added 15 points , 10 rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block in 30 minutes off the bench . The Heat gave up 23 turnovers in the contest , while shooting 46 percent from the field . The Heat will look to bounce back when they take on the Clippers in Los_Angeles on Sunday . The Nuggets face the second game of a back - to - back when they play host to the Warriors on Saturday .
The visiting Golden_State Warriors took down the Denver Nuggets , 127 - 108 , at Pepsi_Center on Saturday night . The Warriors ( 7 - 3 ) are now 5 - 1 on the road this season and have bounced back from a somewhat slow start to the season . Golden_State has won three straight , including wins over the Clippers and Spurs . A huge part of the team 's success has been former two - time MVP Steph Curry , who entered Saturday 's matchup averaging a team - high 27 points per game along with 6 assists . On Saturday , Curry provided a huge boost to the team , scoring 22 points and dishing 11 assists in just three quarters of play . Golden_State 's offense fired on all cylinders once again in Denver , as the team shot almost 55 percent from the field en route to 127 points . Thanks to a hearty lead , all four Warriors All-Stars were able to sit out the fourth quarter . The Warriors are averaging a league - best 121 points per game after the win . Denver ( 5 - 5 ) had a two - game win streak snapped at home on Saturday . Things quickly went south for Denver , as the team 's starting five struggled to match up with the star - powered Warriors . The Nuggets ' starters gave up a quick lead - - all five finishing with a plus/minus between - 16 and - 37 . No Denver starter scored in double - digits . The night was particularly disappointing for veteran All-Star Paul Millsap . Millsap , who joined Denver this offseason , shot just 3 - of - 8 while committing four turnovers . He saw just 15 minutes on the floor . Golden_State will host the Heat on Monday , while Denver hosts the Nets on Tuesday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting Brooklyn Nets , 112 - 104 , at Pepsi_Center on Tuesday night . The Nuggets ( 6 - 5 ) cruised their way in this game , as they built a decent first - quarter lead and never looked back . Denver led 28 - 21 in the first quarter , 57 - 46 at the half - time break , and 93 - 73 after three quarters . The Nets ( 4 - 7 ) tried to turn things around in the final quarter and they led the game on stats such as three - point percentage and free - throw percentage , but that was n't enough and they still ended settling with the loss . Brooklyn lost their fifth game out of the past six , while Denver have won three of the past four . Denver held on to the result , and there is no question their best player was Nikola Jokic in this game . The towering big man once again delivered as the team 's first - scoring option , since he finished with 41 points , 11 rebounds , five assists and five steals . Paul Millsap contributed with 17 points , and the return of Will Barton should definitively boost the offense a bit in the future . Barton finished the game with 17 points and eight boards off the bench . As for Brooklyn , they always counted with the presence of D'Angelo Russell , although the point guard was n't able to repeat past performances in this game . The former Lakers star finished with 12 points , five rebounds and six assists , while Tyler Zeller clearly made his presence felt off the bench with 21 points as he was the only Brooklyn player who went over the 20 - point plateau .
The host Denver Nuggets defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 102 - 94 , in a matchup of divisional rivals at Pepsi_Center on Thursday . Denver ( 7 - 5 ) has been a pleasant surprise early in the season . On Thursday , the Nuggets took down a star - powered OKC team thanks to its tremendous depth . Denver saw 49 points off the bench , including a team - high 21 points from point guard Emmanuel Mudiay . Mudiay , who struggled in his first two seasons in the league , has been a breakout performer for Denver early on this year . He is now averaging over 13 points per game while shooting over 45 percent from beyond the arc . The Nuggets also benefited from all - around play from All-Star Paul Millsap . Millsap has taken time to adjust to his new team , but on Thursday , he delivered a well - rounded performance . The veteran blocked six shots on defense and dished out five assists on the offensive end . He also led the starting five with 17 points . Oklahoma_City ( 4 - 7 ) , meanwhile , has been one of the most surprising slow starters in the league . Fresh off a 47 - win season and adding two All-Star wings , the Thunder looked poised to be a major threat in the Western_Conference this season . Still , the team has dropped four straight and is struggling to find an offensive rhythm . On Thursday , veteran forward Carmelo Anthony faced off against his original team , dropping 28 points in the return to Denver . Melo 's 28 led the Thunder , who had issues finding other sources of offense . Reigning MVP Russell Westbrook shot 6 - of - 22 and scored just 13 points , as did All-Star wing Paul George . It was ultimately a brutally inefficient night across the board , as the team shot only 42 percent from the field and went just 7 - of - 14 at the free - throw line . Oklahoma_City will host the LA Clippers on Friday , while the Nuggets will face off against the Magic in Denver on Sunday .
The host Denver Nuggets defeated the red - hot Orlando Magic , 125 - 107 , on Saturday night at Pepsi_Center . Both teams have been early surprises this season , jumping out to winning records despite being lottery teams last year . While both teams have enjoyed early success , it was Denver ( 8 - 5 ) that easily controlled Saturday 's matchup . The Nuggets jumped out to a quick double - digit lead thanks to a 39 - point onslaught in the first quarter . Denver held a 23 - point lead by halftime , maintaining easy control of the scoring - heavy game . Denver saw strong play from its starting five , allowing it to get off to an early start . All five Nuggets starters scored at least 12 points , as sophomore guard Jamal Murray led the way with 32 . Murray knocked down six three - pointers on the night , accounting for half of Denver 's makes from beyond the arc on the night . Guard Will Barton added another four of those makes en route to 26 points on the night . Star center Nikola Jokic , meanwhile , was the team 's leading rebounder , pulling down 17 boards to go along with eight assists . As a team , the Nuggets dished out 29 assists in the game . Orlando ( 8 - 5 ) , meanwhile , entered the game as the league leader in three - point percentage . The Magic again succeeded from beyond the arc , hitting 11 three - pointers while shooting over 35 percent . Shooting from deep was not Orlando 's issue , as the team enjoyed a solid offensive outing . The team struggled , instead , to contain Denver 's high - powered offense . The Nuggets shot 53 percent from the field on the night and knocked down 12 three - pointers of their own . The Magic proved unable to manage the Nuggets ' barrage of shooting and ball movement in the first half . The Magic will visit Golden_State on Monday night , while the Nuggets will play in Portland .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting Memphis Grizzlies , 104 - 92 , at Pepsi_Center on Friday evening . Nuggets get off to a good start , ending first quarter on a 14 - 6 run , to go up 27 - 18 , heading into the second . They carried the lead to halftime , where they led 61 - 445 at the break . The Grizzlies ( 7 - 11 ) came roaring back in the third quarter , with a 22 - 9 run that brought it to a two - points game , 76 - 74 , heading into the fourth . However , the Nuggets ( 11 - 8 ) would not give it up , led by Nikola Jokic , who poured in 14 points in the fourth quarter to help the Nuggets notch their fifth straight home win . Jokic finished with a team - high 28 points , along with 13 rebounds , eight assists and one steal , in 35 minutes . Jamal Murray and Gary Harris added 15 points each , while Kenneth Faried chipped in 14 points and nine rebounds , in 31 minutes . The Nuggets were without Paul Millsap ( wrist ) , who remains out indefinitely . The Nuggets shot 50 percent from the field , including going 9 - of - 21 from long range . Meanwhile , this marks the seventh straight loss for the Grizzlies , who shot 48 percent from the field and hit 9 - of - 26 from long range , with 27 assists in the contest . The Grizzlies continue to struggle without Mike Conley ( achilles ) . JaMychal Green led the way with a season - high 21 points , in 32 minutes . Marc Gasol tallied 15 points and a career - high 14 assists , to go along with six rebounds and two steals , in 38 minutes . The Grizz are back in action on Sunday , when they play host to the Nets . The Nuggets have a few days off before they take on the Jazz in Utah on Tuesday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the Chicago Bulls 111 - 110 Thursday at Pepsi_Center . While the Nuggets ( 12 - 9 ) likely did n't expect to get into a shootout with the team with the NBA 's worst record Thursday night , Denver 's Will Barton likely did n't have any complaints after dropping a game - high 37 points , including the game - winner with just three seconds left . Barton was on fire all night , hitting 13 - of - 19 shots from the field overall and going 6 - of - 9 from behind the arc , and he ended up scoring the last six points in an effort to will his team to victory . Gary Harris ended up being the team 's next highest scorer with 21 points , while Kenneth Faried added 14 points of his own . As for the Bulls ( 3 - 17 ) , point guard Kris Dunn thought he had the game won when he hit a go - ahead layup with just nine seconds remaining , giving him 19 points for the night to go along with five rebounds and five assists in 37 minutes . But , in the end , Chicago ended up dropping its seventh straight game as the team continues to sit at the bottom of the standings in the Eastern_Conference . As a team , however , the Bulls ended up putting together one of their best offenses performances of the season , shooting an impressive 54 percent from the field . The starting frontcourt of Robin Lopez and rookie Lauri Markkanen managed to each post 20 points , while Justin Holiday added 16 points in 37 minutes . Up next , the Nuggets will remain home Saturday to take on the Lakers , while the Bulls look to put an end to the losing streak Friday against the Kings .
The host Denver Nuggets narrowly escaped the New_Orleans Pelicans , 117 - 111 , in a thrilling overtime showdown on Friday . Denver ( 16 - 13 ) dove deep into its bench on Friday , allowing 11 players to see action throughout the game . The deep rotation ultimately paid dividends , as the Nuggets saw almost half their points come from the bench in the win . Sophomore big man Trey Lyles was the leading scorer for the productive Denver second unit , pouring in 19 points . Star center Nikola Jokic also came off the bench , scoring 13 points in his first game back from an ankle injury that cost him seven games . Jokic also recorded 11 rebounds , good for a double - double in just 22 minutes of play . In the overtime , though , it was sixth man Will Barton who led the team to victory . Barton came alive in the extra period , scoring 11 of the Nuggets ' 13 overtime points . Barton knocked down two three - pointers in the OT period , helping him to single - handedly outscore the Pelicans in crunch time . The veteran finished the night with 19 points . New_Orleans ( 16 - 14 ) , meanwhile , relied primarily on their `` Big Three `` to make things happen on Friday . Anthony Davis , DeMarcus Cousins , and Jrue Holiday scored at least 25 points each on Friday , giving the Pelicans a massive offensive spark despite the eventual loss . Davis delivered a particularly strong showing , finishing with 28 points , 12 rebounds , and five blocks . It was more of a mixed night for his partner in crime , Cousins , as the former Sacramento big man struggled down the stretch . Cousins committed nine turnovers on the night and had some crucial unforced errors late in the game . Additionally , the All-Star center was fairly soft on the glass , finishing with only four rebounds . On Monday , Denver will visit Oklahoma_City , while the Pelicans will see Washington on Tuesday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting Utah Jazz , 107 - 83 , at Pepsi_Center on Tuesday evening . The first quarter went back and forth before the Nuggets created some separation with a 28 - 20 lead heading into the second . They carried the momentum through the second quarter and pushed the lead to 50 - 34 at halftime . The Jazz came out stronger in the third quarter but could not make up any ground , trailing 76 - 59 heading into the final frame . The Nuggets cruised to their third straight win and improved to 12 - 3 at home this season . Jamal Murray led the way for Denver with 22 points on 9 - of - 15 shooting , eight rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 35 minutes . Trey Lyles followed up with 16 points , eight rebounds and one steal , in 27 minutes off the bench , while Gary Harris and Wilson Chandler tallied 15 points each . The Nuggets shot 48 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 30 from long range . Meanwhile , Derrick Favors was the high - point man for the Jazz , with 20 points on 6 - of - 14 shooting , in 28 minutes of action . Jonas Jerebko and Donovan Mitchell added 13 points each , while Rodney Hood finished with 10 points and six rebounds off the bench . The Jazz shot 32 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 35 from long range . The Jazz ( 15 - 20 ) will be right back in action as they take on the Warriors in Golden_State on Wednesday . The Nuggets ( 19 - 15 ) will also be in action on Wednesday as they take on the Timberwolves in Minnesota .
The visiting Atlanta Hawks defeated the Denver Nuggets , 110 - 97 , at Pepsi_Center on Wednesday to snap a four - game losing streak . Atlanta ( 11 - 30 ) saw a rare strong night from top to bottom on the offensive end , as the team shot 50 percent from the field in the win . Perhaps more impressively , the Hawks hit 44 percent of their three - pointers and went a perfect 18 - of - 18 at the free - throw line . Star point guard Dennis Schroder was a key factor in the win , as he led the team with 19 points and 10 assists . He was one of four Hawks starters to score in double digits in the win . The Hawks got off to a hot start , establishing a double - digit lead in the first quarter thanks to the starting five 's strong shooting . Denver ( 21 - 20 ) , on the other hand , could not seem to buy a basket in Wednesday 's loss . It was a season - worst shooting night for star center Nikola Jokic , who went just 4 - of - 21 from the field , including 0 - of - 8 from three - point range . The face - up big man was largely responsible for Denver shooting 40 percent on the night and just 9 - of - 37 from beyond the arc . Denver 's bench big men fared no better . Trey Lyles , who is averaging over 17 points per game in the month of January , shot just 2 - of - 8 off the bench in the loss . Atlanta will host the Brooklyn Nets on Friday , while Denver will host the Memphis Grizzlies .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting Memphis Grizzlies , 87 - 78 , at Pepsi_Center on Friday evening . The Nuggets started out slow and were outscored , 26 - 16 , in the first quarter . They came alive in the second quarter , and chipped away at the Grizzlies ' lead until it was tied at 38 with 4:32 left in the half . However , the Grizzlies closed the half strong and took a four - point lead into halftime . The Nuggets turned it up in the third quarter , where they outscored the Grizzlies 24 - 13 to take a seven - point lead into the fourth . The Nuggets led 67 - 60 at the start of the fourth and were able to maintain the advantage the rest of the way , and end a three - game losing streak . Will Barton was the high - point man for Denver , with 17 points on 5 - of - 12 shooting . Trey Lyles followed up with 16 points and five rebounds , in 28 minutes off the bench , while Nikola Jokic tallied 14 points , seven rebounds and three assists , in 28 minutes . The Nuggets shot 39 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 22 from long range . The Denver Nuggets defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 105 - 102 , at Pepsi_Center on Tuesday . This was a dominating victory for the Nuggets , as they led by 13 at the half and 17 headed into the fourth quarter . In fact , Denver never trailed after the first quarter , as a huge fourth quarter by Dallas is the only thing that made the final scoreline respectable . Rebounding was the difference in the game , with Denver outrebounding Dallas , 47 - 35 . Scoring down low was also huge , with the Nuggets outscoring the Mavericks in the paint , 58 - 42 . The Mavericks ( 15 - 30 ) were led by Dennis Smith Jr. as he tallied 25 points , two rebounds and five assists . Harrison Barnes totaled 17 points , six rebounds and two steals . Wesley Matthews finished with 10 points , four rebounds , two assists and two steals . Yogi Ferrell was big off the bench , providing 13 points , two rebounds and seven assists . The Nuggets ( 23 - 21 ) got a gem out of Nikola Jokic , as he collected 20 points , 18 rebounds and seven assists . Gary Harris amassed 25 points , four assists and four steals . Will Barton accumulated 22 points , five rebounds and six assists . On deck for Denver is a road matchup versus the Los_Angeles Clippers on Wednesday . As for Dallas , they 're off until Saturday when they play the Portland Trail_Blazers on the road as well .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the host Denver Nuggets , 108 - 100 , at Pepsi_Center on Friday . Denver came into this game as a sizable favorite but Phoenix was in control for the majority of this game . In fact , the Suns held the lead for the final 34 minutes , as Denver never got within three points after the opening minutes of the second quarter . Bench production was the difference , with the Suns ' bench outscoring the Nuggets bench , 44 - 23 . The assist - to - turnover ratio was also a decisive statistic , with Phoenix recording five more assists than Denver while committing five fewer turnovers . The Suns ( 17 - 29 ) were led by Devin Booker , as he collected 30 points , five rebounds and five assists . T.J , Warren amassed 25 points , three rebounds and two steals on 11 - of - 17 from the field . Isaiah Canaan and Josh Jackson each provided 16 points apiece to lead the bench . The Nuggets ( 23 - 23 ) best player was Jamal Murray , as he accrued 30 points , five rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Nikola Jokic amassed 14 points , 17 rebounds and five assists . Gary Harris finished with 16 points , five rebounds and four assists . Trey Lyles totaled 15 points and seven boards . Both teams return to action on Monday , with Denver hosting the Portland Trail_Blazers and Phoenix traveling to face the Milwaukee Bucks .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the New_York Knicks 130 - 118 on Thursday at Pepsi_Center . It was a complete team effort f1rom the Nuggets ( 25 - 23 ) on Thursday night with seven different players , including all five starters , scoring in double figures . Gary Harris led the way with a game - high 23 points , while Trey Lyles came off the bench to add 21 points of his own . Nikola Jokic and Jamal Murray each added 18 points . As a team , Denver could not have had a much better shooting night , as the Nuggets shot a scorching 50 percent from behind the arc and 60 percent from the field overall , and they dished out 36 total assists on their 48 made field goals . The Knicks ( 21 - 28 ) , on the other hand , while they had an impressive offensive night themselves , they just could n't get enough stops on the defensive end to pull out the road victory . New_York shot 38 percent from three and 55 percent from downtown , with both Kristaps Porzingis and Michael Beasley each scoring 21 points to lead the way . Enes Kanter added 20 points of his own , while Trey Burke came off the bench to put together a surprise performance of 18 points and 11 assists in 29 minutes as a reserve . Up next , the Nuggets will remain home Saturday to take on the Mavericks , while the Knicks will head to Phoenix on Friday to play the Suns .
The Denver Nuggets narrowly defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 91 - 89 , at Pepsi_Center on Saturday evening . Dallas had multiple chances at the end of the game , as the team pulled down an offensive rebound with three seconds left to earn a second chance at a shot to potentially tie or win . Unfortunately for the Mavericks , even a second try was n't enough , as Wesley Matthews missed the potential game - winning three off of an inbounds play . The loss was made all the more heartbreaking by the fact that Dallas led by nine late in the third quarter . Denver was able to claw its way back through the late third and fourth quarters thanks to strong play from star big man Nikola Jokic . Jokic led Denver ( 26 - 23 ) with 16 rebounds and 11 assists as he completed a triple - double in Saturday 's win . He offset a relatively inefficient 5 - of - 13 shooting night with his solid all - around production . Gary Harris was the team 's leading scorer , pouring in 24 points in the win . Harris hit three of the Nuggets ' 12 total three - pointers , which helped the team overcome a fairly shaky shooting night inside the three - point line . Dallas ( 16 - 34 ) gave the green light to rookie point guard Dennis Smith , Jr. , who struggled a bit in the loss . Smith , Jr. shot just 5 - of - 18 from the floor on Saturday . He did , though , finish the game with six assists and six rebounds . The only player to shoot more than Smith was Harrison Barnes , who went 9 - of - 19 en route to a team - high 22 points . Denver will host the Boston Celtics on Monday , while Dallas will see the Miami Heat .
The visiting Boston Celtics narrowly defeated the Denver Nuggets , 111 - 110 , at Pepsi_Center on Monday . Boston ( 36 - 15 ) entered the game having gone 1 - 5 in its previous six contests . Early in the game , it looked as though the Celtics had shaken off the rust , as they went up 49 - 29 midway through the second quarter . That quickly changed , though , as the Nuggets ' duo of big men , Nikola Jokic and Mason Plumlee , helped the team fight its way back . Denver ( 26 - 24 ) started the third quarter by making its first seven shots in the paint , and the Nuggets were able to lead by two by the start of the fourth quarter . Ultimately , though , Kyrie Irving and the Celtics were one step ahead of Denver . Jaylen Brown knocked down a three - point shot with 33 seconds remaining to give Boston the final advantage . While Jamal Murray was able to cut the lead to just one with a layup , Denver neglected to call a timeout on the game 's final possession , forcing the team into a rushed heave at the buzzer that was not on - line . For the Celtics , Irving led the team with 27 points on 11 - of - 17 shooting . He also had six assists , as he was able to exploit the Denver defense collapsing on him while he drove to the hoop . It was a strong game from rookie forward Jayson Tatum as well . Tatum scored 20 points to go with six rebounds and four assists . Jaylen Brown had just nine points despite coming up with the big three in crunch time . For the Nuggets , star big man Nikola Jokic took on the role of offensive leader once again on Monday . Jokic scored a team - high 24 points while dishing out five assists . His frontcourt partner , Mason Plumlee , scored 16 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting . Unfortunately , Plumlee was forced to exit the game in the fourth quarter after suffering an apparent lower leg injury . Boston will return home to host the New_York Knicks on Wednesday . The Nuggets , meanwhile will travel to San_Antonio for the second half of a back - to - back on Tuesday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 127 - 124 , in a thriller at Pepsi_Center on Thursday night . The stars were shining brightly in Denver , as Nikola Jokic , Paul George , and Russell Westbrook all turned in electrifying performances . The game ended in an equally electrifying fashion . After Westbrook and George helped the Thunder ( 30 - 22 ) claw back from a double - digit fourth - quarter deficit , George tied the game with a three - pointer with one second remaining . While all signs pointed to the game heading towards overtime , Denver 's Gary Harris knocked down an incredible last - second buzzer - beater to end the game in Denver 's favor . Harris finished the game with 25 points , but it was Jokic 's stat line that truly stood out . Jokic recorded a triple - double with 29 points , 13 rebounds , and 13 assists . He also blocked two shots . It was a stellar game for sophomore point guard Jamal Murray as well . Murray scored a team - high 33 points on 14 - of - 23 shooting . For the Thunder , Paul George had 43 points and Russell Westbrook dished out 21 assists . The incredible performances from the stars was not enough to propel the team to a win , though . Westbrook was at the helm of OKC 's late - game push , scoring 10 of his 20 points in the fourth quarter . As a whole , though , the team was not especially successful from downtown . The Thunder went just 9 - of - 28 from beyond the arc in the loss . Denver will host Golden_State on Saturday , while the Thunder see the New_Orleans Pelicans on Friday .

The Nuggets got out to a great start at home , as they outscored the Hornets 13 - 7 to close out the first quarter with a 36 - 25 lead . The Hornets began chipping away at the lead in the second quarter and used an 110 run to take a slight advantage before the end of the quarter , however , the Nuggets hit a three - pointer in the final seconds of the first half to reclaim the lead , 63 - 62 . The Nuggets came back strong in the second half and reclaimed a double - digit lead halfway through the third quarter . They kept the pressure on and held a 97 - 84 lead heading into the final frame . The Nuggets did not look back , as they cruised to their third straight win . The host Denver Nuggets took down the visiting San_Antonio Spurs , 117 - 109 , at Pepsi_Center on Tuesday . Nikola Jokic recorded his fourth triple - double of the season to help lead Denver to the win . What started as a tightly - contested game quickly slipped away from San_Antonio in the fourth quarter , where Denver held a 30 - 19 edge . Gary Harris was a key spark for the Nuggets , as he scored 10 fourth - quarter points . The Nuggets took a double - digit lead with just over three minutes to go , pulling away in the game 's final stretch . Jokic scored 23 points to go with 13 rebounds and 11 assists , all of which were team highs for Denver ( 31 - 26 ) . While Jokic stole the show , all five of Denver 's starters impressed . Every Nuggets starter scored at least 15 points . Team-oriented offense was clearly a focus for Denver , as the team notched 29 total assists on the night . Denver has now won five of its last six games . San_Antonio ( 35 - 24 ) , meanwhile , was without its two star players . Kawhi Leonard ( shoulder ) and LaMarcus Aldridge ( back ) were both out on Tuesday . While Aldridge 's absence may have hurt the team 's chances , it certainly provided more opportunity for big man Joffrey Lauvergne . Lauvergne , a former Denver Nugget , scored a career - high 26 points to lead the team . Veteran point guard Tony Parker , who has dealt with his own injuries this season , scored 17 . Denver will take on Milwaukee on Thursday , while the Spurs are off through the All-Star break .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the visiting San_Antonio Spurs , 122 - 119 , at Pepsi_Center on Friday evening . The Spurs got out to a quick 8 - 2 lead , but from there the first quarter tightened up as the teams the Nuggets quickly came back and ended up with a 32 - 30 lead heading into the second . It remained a one - possession game through most of the second quarter as the Nuggets and Spurs played to a tie , with the Nuggets holding a 63 - 61 lead at the half . The Spurs came out strong in the third and pulled ahead to hold a lead for most of the quarter . However , the Nuggets went on a 13 - 6 run to close the quarter and take a 96 - 89 lead into the final frame . The Nuggets held strong for most of the fourth quarter , but the Spurs battled hard to finally tie it up at 112 , with 4:27 to go . Nonetheless , the Nuggets managed to come up big down the stretch , especially thanks to a couple big plays by Gary Harris that helped them seal their fourth straight win . This marks the fourth straight loss for San_Antonio . Harris finished with 23 points , three rebounds , three assists and two steals , while Nikola Jokic led the Nuggets with yet another triple - double , including 28 points , 11 rebounds and 11 assists , in 34 minutes . The Denver Nuggets edged the Milwaukee Bucks , 128 - 125 , in overtime at Pepsi_Center on Sunday evening . Both the Nuggets ( 42 - 35 ) and Bucks ( 41 - 36 ) came into the contest with plenty of motivation , as the two clubs are integral parts of the playoff picture in their respective conferences . However , Denver arguably had just a bit more riding on the game , considering they were still on the outside looking in with respect to the Western_Conference 's eighth seed . The battle between the two evenly matched teams with plenty of incentive was quite the rollercoaster in the first half , with each team dominating a quarter and the home squad forging a 63 - 54 halftime lead . The visitors then obliterated that deficit in the third , outscoring their hosts by a 38 - 16 margin to take a 92 - 79 advantage into the fourth . The Nuggets would turn the tables yet again in the final period , however , and ultimately sent the game into overtime with an 80 run over the final 58 seconds . In the extra period , a pair of Malik Beasley free throws with 7 seconds remaining would serve as the clincher , as Jabari Parker 's would - be game - tying three - point attempt from 27 feet could n't find the net . Parker paced the Bucks with 35 points , a total he supplemented with 10 rebounds , two assists and two steals . Eric Bledsoe followed with 31 points and added six assists , five rebounds , one steal and one block . Giannis Antetokounmpo managed an 18 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included six assists and one steal . However , he fouled out after 33 minutes . Khris Middleton contributed 15 points , nine boards , three assists and one steal . Tyler Zeller matched Middleton 's scoring total and also registered five boards and one assist . Nikola Jokic led the Nuggets with a 35 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included five assists and three blocks . Jamal Murray totaled 27 points , seven assists , two rebounds and one steal . Paul Millsap managed 26 points , 13 boards , five assists , one steal and one block . Will Barton posted an 11 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included four assists . Trey Lyles led the bench with nine points , nine rebounds , three assists and two blocks . The Bucks head back home to take on the Boston Celtics on Tuesday evening , while the Nuggets remain home and await a Tuesday night visit from the Indiana Pacers .

In a battle between two young and talented teams , Portland showed why they are the superior squad . In fact , the Trail_Blazers led by 10 points at the half and by 19 headed into the fourth quarter . Rebounding was the key to victory , with Portland winning that battle , 51 - 38 . The Trail_Blazers also shot 48 percent from the field and 47 percent from three - point range . Shots were n't falling for Indiana , as they went 4 - of - 18 from three - point range and 22 - of - 33 from the free - throw line . The Blazers ( 20 ) have been one of the most impressive teams in the league thus far , as this marks their second double - digit road win in as many games . C.J . McCollum made his season debut , leading the way with 28 points and six rebounds on 12 - of - 18 shooting after missing the opener due to a suspension . Leaf played well off the bench , dropping 17 points in 19 minutes .
