The Indiana Pacers defeated the Sacramento Kings , 101 - 83 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Tuesday evening . The Pacers ( 4 - 3 ) jumped on the visitors quickly , building a 24 - 13 first - quarter lead that had grown to 55 - 30 by halftime . The second half was truly a tale of two periods , with defense dominating the first 12 minutes and both teams putting on an offensive display in the final quarter . The Kings ( 1 - 6 ) also endured a rough night from long distance , posting an unsightly 14 percent success rate from three - point range . Indiana won the battle on the boards as well , outrebounding Sacramento by a 53 - 46 margin . The Kings were paced by rookie De'Aaron Fox 's 18 points in 28 minutes off the bench , a total he complemented with five assists , four rebounds and one steal . Zach Randolph was not just the only Sacramento starter to post double - digit scoring , he was the only other player on the team to accomplish the feat altogether . The veteran big man compiled 12 points and five rebounds . George Hill followed with eight points , six rebounds and two assists . Bogdan Bogdanovic tallied seven points , two rebounds , two assists and a block . Willie Cauley-Stein and Buddy Hield posted matching four - point efforts , with the former adding seven rebounds , one assist , two steals and two blocks and the latter supplying two rebounds and one steal . Skal Labissiere was productive off the bench as well , providing eight points , eight rebounds and one steal . Bojan Bogdanovic led Indiana with 17 points , a total he complemented with four assists , three rebounds and one steal . Thaddeus Young managed 15 points , four boards and four steals . Victor Oladipo registered 14 points , four rebounds , two assists , one block and one steal . Domantas Sabonis generated a 12 - point , 16 - rebound double - double that also included five assists . Cory Joseph led the bench with 13 points and three boards . The Kings are back in action in Boston on Wednesday night , while the Pacers head to Cleveland to battle the Cavaliers on Wednesday evening as well .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the host Indiana Pacers , 117 - 112 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse . The Pacers ( 5 - 6 ) started out strong and led 75 - 61 at halftime . However the Pelicans ( 6 - 5 ) outscored the Pacers 35 - 19 in the third quarter to take a two - point lead into the fourth quarter . They continued the fight through the fourth and managed to come out with their third straight win , thanks especially to a few clutch plays from DeMarcus Cousins and Anthony Davis . Anthony Davis led the way for the Pelicans with 37 points and 14 rebounds , in 41 minutes . DeMarcus Cousins backed him up with 32 points and 13 rebounds , in 37 minutes . Cousins and Davis did their parts on the defensive end with two blocks each . Jrue Holiday chipped in 10 points and five assists . The Pelicans shot 50 percent from the field and 40 percent from long range . Meanwhile , six players scored in double digits for the Pacers . Myles Turner was the high - point man , with 21 points to go with 12 rebounds , in 35 minutes . Victor Oladipo tallied 15 points , in 28 minutes , while Bojan Bogdanovic and Lance Stephenson chipped in 14 points each . This marks the third straight loss for the Pacers . The Pacers will be right back in action as they take on the Pistons in Detroit on Wednesday . The Pelicans take on the Raptors in Toronto on Thursday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Detroit Pistons , 107 - 100 , at Little Caesars Arena on Friday night . The Pacers ( 8 - 8 ) had suffered a 17 - point loss at the hands of the Pistons ( 10 - 5 ) in the one prior meeting between the teams this season , a game in which they 'd been dominated on the glass and had seen Detroit center Andre Drummond post a 17 - point , 21 - rebound double - double . They apparently were intent on turning the tables in the rematch in front of their home crowd , but that did n't become apparent until the final period . The visitors jumped out to a 32 - 23 lead through the first 12 minutes and were able to maintain their advantage through the first three quarters . However , a furious fourth - quarter rally changed the complexion of the contest , as Indiana nearly erased an 84 - 71 deficit in just over three minutes at the beginning of the period with a 120 run . They would go on to outscore their guests by a 36 - 19 margin to close out the game , and this time around , they were the victors down low . The Pacers won the rebounding battle , 51 - 43 , and also drained 54 percent of their 28 three - point attempts . The Pistons were led by matching 16 - point efforts on the part of Avery Bradley and Reggie Jackson . The former added six rebounds , while the latter supplied seven assists and two rebounds . Tobias Harris registered 15 points , five boards , two assists , one steal and one block . Drummond contributed an 11 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included five assists , three blocks and one steal . Ish Smith led the bench with his own 15 - point effort , while Luke Kennard was productive on the second unit as well with 13 points , three rebounds and two steals . Victor Oladipo paced Indiana with a 21 - point , 15 - rebound double - double . He also pitched in four assists , one steal and one block . Thaddeus Young was right behind him with 18 points , five rebounds , four assists and one steal . Darren Collison tallied 16 points , six assists , one rebound , one steal and one block . Bojan Bogdanovic poured in 15 points and added three assists and one rebound . Lance Stephenson led the bench with 13 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Domantas Sabonis supplied 12 points , 10 rebounds and a steal in 24 minutes off the bench . The Pistons continue on the road and next head to Minnesota for a Sunday evening date with the Timberwolves , while the Pacers visit the Heat on Sunday afternoon in South Florida .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the visiting Toronto Raptors , 107 - 104 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Friday evening . The Pacers ( 11 - 8 ) and the Raptors ( 11 - 7 ) animated a highly - contested game , although in the end the Pacers came out on top and managed to extend their winning streak up to five games , further confirming their place as one of the hottest teams in the Eastern_Conference right now . Toronto grabbed a 10 - point lead entering halftime , but Indiana erased the deficit with an 11 - point lead during the third quarter . The Pacers seemed to be running away with the game in the fourth , but Toronto mounted a comeback in the final minutes . They fell short , though , and Indiana won a vibrating game that could easily happen during the playoffs next year . As it has been the case all season long , Victor Oladipo led the way for the Pacers with 21 points . Bojan Bogdanovic chipped in with 19 , and Darren Collison added 17 to go along with eight assists . Six Indiana players scored in double - digits in this one , including Lance Stephenson ( 18 points on 7 - of - 9 from the field ) and Domantas Sabonis ( 13 points and six rebounds ) . Myles Turner struggled a bit , however , as he finished with 10 boards but only added seven points . Kyle Lowry was the main offensive weapon for Toronto , as the veteran point guard finished with 24 points , 10 rebounds , eight assists and three steals . But the rest of the starting lineup struggled , as evidenced by DeMar DeRozan 's awful shooting night ( 13 points on 6 - of - 16 from the field ) and Serge Ibaka 's 10 points . The bench provided a scoring outburst , however , as both Norman Powell and Fred VanVleet registered 16 points each .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Indiana Pacers , 108 - 98 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Saturday evening . The Celtics ( 18 - 3 ) have been playing with abundant confidence , and with good reason , considering they 've already rattled off 16 wins in a row this season and had been able to bounce back from seeing that streak conclude with a decisive 15 - point victory over the Orlando Magic on Friday . However , matters were looking a bit dire for them through two quarters Saturday , as a short - handed Pacers ( 11 - 9 ) squad missing star guard Victor Oladipo ( knee ) built a 54 - 45 halftime lead . Boston responded with a third - quarter effort befitting of their record , however , outscoring their hosts by a 37 - 16 margin during the period to go into the fourth quarter with an 82 - 70 advantage . They were able to essentially hold serve from that point , leading to the double - digit victory . The Celtics got the job down with the help of some superior shooting , as they recorded a 56 percent success rate from the field , including 40 percent from three - point range . Kyrie Irving led the way for the visitors with 25 points , a total he supplemented with six assists , four rebounds and one steal . Al Horford managed 21 points , six assists , five rebounds and three blocks . Terry Rozier followed with a bench - leading 17 points , a total he supplemented with two assists , one rebound and one steal . Marcus Smart filled out the stat sheet with 15 points , six rebounds , five assists and two steals . Jayson Tatum turned in 11 points and two rebounds for the second straight night . The Pacers saw six players hit double digits in the scoring column and were led by Myles Turner , who supplied 19 points , six boards and one block . Domantas Sabonis was next with 17 points , a total he complemented with eight rebounds , one assist and one steal . Lance Stephenson drew the start for Oladipo and registered 16 points , eight rebounds and five assists . Darren Collison and Thaddeus Young produced matching 11 - point tallies . The former added five rebounds , five assists and four steals , while the latter generated six rebounds , three assists , two steals and one block . Bojan Bogdanovic poured in 10 points and added one rebound . The Celtics return home to face the Detroit Pistons on Monday night , while the Pacers remain home and face the Orlando Magic on that same evening .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the visiting New_York Knicks , 115 - 97 , at BankersLife Fieldhouse on Monday evening . The Pacers ( 13 - 11 ) were coming off three losses in their past four games , but they bounced back nicely with a strong effort that saw them cruise over a Knicks ( 11 - 12 ) that did n't have two of their best players in Tim Hardaway Jr. and Kristaps Porzingis due to injury . In fact , the Pacers jumped to a 31 - 19 lead in the first quarter and they never looked back until the fourth quarter when the game was already decided . The Pacers had built a 95 - 65 advantage after three periods , so they essentially cruised their way in the fourth towards a comfortable win . Thaddeus Young was the main scorer for Indiana , as the power forward ended the game with 20 points and six rebounds , while Darren Collison produced a double - double thanks to 10 points and 10 assists . Bojan Bogdanovic added 19 points , and all five starters for Indy contributed with at least 10 points . Even Domantas Sabonis and Cory Joseph produced off the bench with 12 points each . On the other hand , the Knicks struggled without Porzingis and Hardaway , and their offense looked lackluster through much of the contest . Guillermo Hernangomez led the way for New_York with 14 points , 10 rebounds and three assists coming off the bench , while Michael Beasley chipped in with 13 points . No other starter for the Knicks reached the 10 - point mark .
The Indiana Pacers edged the Chicago Bulls , 98 - 96 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Wednesday night . The Pacers ( 14 - 11 ) may have been guilty of taking their seemingly lowly opponents too lightly to start the game , as the Bulls ( 3 - 20 ) jumped out to a 30 - 20 lead after one quarter that had grown to 55 - 39 by halftime . The shock apparently wore off during intermission , as Indiana was able to outscore Chicago by a 59 - 41 margin over the third and fourth periods . A clutch three - pointer by Victor Oladipo with 31 seconds remaining gave the Pacers their first lead at 97 - 96 , and he added a free throw for a minuscule amount of breathing room with 13 seconds left . As the final score indicated , the stat sheet was fairly close across the board , and the Bulls actually outperformed their hosts in both shooting ( 47 percent to 45 percent ) and rebounding ( 46 to 39 ) . Kris Dunn led the way for the Bulls with 18 points , a total he complemented with six rebounds , six assists , one steal and one block . Robin Lopez followed with 16 points , five rebounds , one assist and one block . Denzel Valentine posted 15 points , eight rebounds , three assists and one block . Bobby Portis tallied 12 points and seven boards to lead the bench . Rookie Lauri Markkanen managed 11 points , six boards and two assists . David Nwaba matched his scoring total and added three rebounds , one steal and one block . Oladipo 's 27 points paced Indiana , and he added eight rebounds , two assists and three steals . Bojan Bogdanovic contributed 17 points , three assists , two rebounds and one steal . Darren Collison supplied 14 points , two assists and one rebound . Myles Turner registered 11 points , seven rebounds , six assists and four blocks . Thaddeus Young had a near double - double with 10 points , nine rebounds , three assists and one block . Cory Joseph led the second unit with seven points , three rebounds , three assists and three steals . The Bulls next visit the Charlotte Hornets on Friday night , while the Pacers remain home and face off with the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday evening as well .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the visiting Denver Nuggets , 126 - 116 , in overtime at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Sunday evening . Despite being in the midst of a six - game road trip , the Nuggets came out strong , taking a 35 - 22 lead after one quarter . The Pacers answered back in the second quarter , closing the gap to seven , with the Nuggets ahead 66 - 59 , heading into halftime . The Pacers carried the momentum into the second half , where they battled back - and - forth with the Nuggets until the final seconds , when Thaddeus Young finished a put - back layup to send the game to overtime . The Pacers absolutely dominated the overtime , outscoring the Nuggets 12 - 2 , to run away with their fourth straight win , and their fifth straight at home , where the Pacers are now 10 - 4 this season . Victor Oladipo led the way for Indiana with a career - high 47 points on 15 - of - 28 shooting , seven rebounds , six assists , two steals and one block , in 45 minutes of action . Myles Turner followed up with 24 points , eight rebounds , three assists , two steals and one block , in 40 minutes . Thaddeus Young added 18 points , six rebounds and one steal , in 39 minutes , while Lance Stephenson added 12 points , six rebounds and six assists , in 35 minutes . The Pacers shot 53 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 25 from long range . Meanwhile , Trey Lyles led the way for the Nuggets , with 25 points on 9 - of - 15 shooting , in 26 minutes off the bench . Will Barton and Gary Harris finished with 21 points each , while Wilson Chandler added 18 points , eight rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block , in 37 minutes . The Nuggets shot 45 percent from the field , including17 - of - 42 from long range . The Nuggets ( 14 - 12 ) continue their road trip with a stop in Detroit on Tuesday . The Pacers ( 16 - 11 ) play host to the Thunder on Wednesday .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the host Indiana Pacers , 104 - 98 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Friday . Despite the close final scoreline , Detroit actually dominated for the majority of this game . In fact , they led for all but five minutes , as they never trailed for the final 22 minutes of action . Defense was key for Detroit , as they held Indiana to 40 percent shooting , while winning the turnover differential , 13 - 9 . In addition , the Pistons recorded 10 blocks , while the Pacers only swatted away four shots . The Pistons ( 16 - 13 ) were led by Andre Drummond , as he tallied 23 points , 13 rebounds and three blocks . Reggie Bullock started and amassed 15 points and three steals . Luke Kennard also got a rare start , as he accrued nine points , five rebounds and four assists . Stanley Johnson led the bench with 13 points , six rebounds and four assists . The Pacers ( 16 - 13 ) got another gem out of Victor Oladipo , as he accumulated 26 points , eight rebounds and four assists . Myles Turner finished with 24 points , eight rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Darren Collison provided 10 points , five rebounds and four assists , while Thaddeus Young totaled 12 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Both teams return to action on Sunday , with Indiana traveling to play the Brooklyn Nets and Detroit playing host to the Orlando Magic .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Indiana Pacers , 112 - 111 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Monday evening . The Celtics ( 26 - 7 ) and the Pacers ( 17 - 14 ) engaged on a battle that went down to the wire . A game that could have gone either way was only seconds away from going to the Pacers , as Indiana managed to storm a furious comeback in the fourth quarter and they found themselves leading the game into the final seconds of the fourth quarter . But Indiana committed nearly one mistake during the whole contest , and it cost them big time . A tipped pass near the halfway logo was tipped by Terry Rozier , and Boston 's guard went all to make a dunk with less than two seconds left in the game . The Pacers ' final three - point attempt did not go in , and the Celtics escaped with a huge win on the road even if were just seconds away from losing . Kyrie Irving led the way for the Celtics , as the former Cleveland Cavaliers guard finished with 30 points and four assists . Al Horford nearly missed on a triple - double , since he contributed on both ends of the court with 14 points , 10 rebounds and nine assists . Jayson Tatum added 16 points , five boards and four assists , while Marcus Smart finished with 15 points , five assists and four boards off the bench . Rozier finished with nine points and the game - winning basket . Victor Oladipo had another impressive performance for the Pacers , as the shooting guard finished with 38 points , five rebounds , and three steals . Thaddeus Young added 13 points with seven rebounds , and Domantas Sabonis was one of the biggest surprises of the night since he contributed with 18 points and seven rebounds off the bench . Myles Turner was disappointing , though , and only finished with two points while not making a single field - goal attempt .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Indiana Pacers , 98 - 94 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Wednesday evening . The Mavericks ( 11 - 25 ) came into Wednesday 's contest fresh off a Tuesday night upset of the Toronto Raptors , a game in which they snapped the Eastern_Conference playoff contender 's six - game win streak . While that development was certainly encouraging , it also left them ripe for a potential letdown . However , Dallas impressively managed to avoid a lackluster performance , even mounting a comeback from an early 29 - 22 first - quarter deficit and then playing stellar second - half defense for the second straight night . The Mavericks limited the Pacers ( 19 - 16 ) to 40 total points after halftime and erased the 78 - 71 deficit they found themselves in early in the fourth quarter by finishing the game with a 27 - 16 run from the 10:43 mark onward . That included a 9 - 4 advantage over the final 3:18 , as Harrison Barnes , Yogi Ferrell and Dennis Smith , Jr. all made clutch contributions . Dirk Nowitzki led the Mavericks with 15 points and added seven rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Barnes finished with 13 points , two rebounds and two assists . Ferrell matched his scoring total off the bench and complemented it with four assists , three rebounds and one block . Wesley Matthews poured in 12 points and added four boards , three assists and two steals . Dwight Powell pitched in with 12 of his own , along with three boards and one steal . Devin Harris posted 10 points , three rebounds , two assists and one block . Smith collected nine points , four rebounds , one assist and one steal , and his key basket with 25 seconds remaining gave Dallas some breathing room at 97 - 94 . The Pacers , which found themselves without the services of Victor Oladipo ( knee ) were led by a trio of 16 - point efforts from Myles Turner , Darren Collison and Lance Stephenson , the latter which drew the start in Oladipo 's stead . Turner also posted six rebounds , two steals and two blocks , Collison provided seven assists , three rebounds and one steal and Stephenson tallied 15 rebounds , five assists and two steals . Bojan Bogdanovic followed with 13 points , four boards and two assists . Thaddeus Young rounded out the starting five 's successful night with 11 points , three assists , one rebound and two steals . Cory Joseph paced the reserves with 10 points , which he supplemented with six assists , one rebound and one block . The Mavericks remain on the road and head to the Big Easy , where they 'll tangle with the New_Orleans Pelicans on Friday night . The Pacers also pack their bags for the short trip to the Windy City , where they 'll face off with the Chicago Bulls on Friday evening as well .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the hosting Indiana Pacers , 107 - 90 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Sunday afternoon . The Timberwolves ( 23 - 14 ) delivered one of their best performances of the season , and took advantage of the absence of Victor Oladipo to defeat the Pacers ( 19 - 18 ) with absolute ease . Minnesota built a huge lead in the first quarter after winning the first 12 minutes 23 - 13 , and they never looked back . A 26 - 25 win in the second quarter , and a commanding 38 - 20 advantage during the third pushed Minnesota to an advantage they would never relinquish . Indiana never gave up and battled as hard as they could in the fourth , but it was n't enough and Minnesota clinched their fifth win in the last six games . Meanwhile , Indiana extended their losing streak to four games . Four of Minnesota 's starters scored in double digits , led by Jimmy Butler who carried the offense with 26 points , six rebounds , and five assists . Karl-Anthony Towns was quite a weapon on both ends of the court , as the talented big man contributed with 18 points , 14 boards , four assists , six blocks , and two steals . Taj Gibson had 17 points and nine rebounds , and Andrew Wiggins chipped in with 14 points . The Pacers struggled offensively in this game , to the point that Bojan Bogdanovic was the only starter that scored in double digits after finishing with 13 points . Myles Turner had just one point ( on 0 - for - 5 from the field ) so the bench picked up the slack . Joseph Young had 20 points , Domantas Sabonis had eight points with 11 rebounds , and Cory Joseph added 10 points of his own .

Despite the fact that there were three ties and three lead changes in the first five minutes , that was the only time this game was competitive . The Indiana Pacers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 105 - 96 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Monday evening . The Pacers ( 28 - 23 ) and the Hornets ( 20 - 29 ) looked quite evenly matched during the first quarter as the first 12 minutes ended with a 23 - 23 draw , but Indiana began to pull away at half time with a one - point lead . Their advantage increased to three points after three , however , so the Hornets still had a decent chance to turn things around in the fourth but Indiana stopped all of their attempts , and ended cruising their way to a 105 - 96 win at home . It was Indiana 's second straight win and fourth in their last five , while Charlotte has now dropped two straight and three of their last four . Victor Oladipo was the star for Indiana , as he finished with 25 points , five rebounds , and three assists . Myles Turner came off the bench and thrived , registering 22 points , five rebounds , three assists and four three - pointers in just 20 minutes . Thaddeus Young chipped in with 16 points , while Darren Collison had 13 points and six assists . Domantas Sabonis contributed 11 points and 10 rebounds . Kemba Walker led the way for the Hornets with 23 points , four assists , three rebounds and two steals . Nicolas Batum had 22 points and four rebounds , while Dwight Howard chipped in with a double - double of 22 points , 11 rebounds and two blocks . However , the rest of the offense did not help , and no other player scored in double digits . The whole bench scored 21 points while going 9 - for - 26 from the field .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 100 - 92 , at Bankers LIfe Fieldhouse on Saturday evening . The Pacers ( 30 - 24 ) were looking to get past a high - scoring loss against the Hornets just 24 hours prior , one that saw them accomplish the unlikely feat of racking up 126 points and still go down in defeat . Indiana looked ready to take the bad taste out of their mouth right from the onset , jumping out to a 33 - 27 first - quarter lead and 62 - 57 halftime advantage . Both defenses then clamped down coming out of intermission , as only a combined 32 points went on the scoreboard during the third period . A 9 - 2 run by Indiana over the first 3:20 of the fourth quarter finally gave them the separation they needed over the 76ers ( 25 - 25 ) , leading to their 19th home win of the campaign . The hosts played suffocating defense throughout the contest , holding Philadelphia to a mediocre 38 percent success rate from the field while also eliciting 18 turnovers . Joel Embiid , playing in a back - to - back set for the first time in his career , led the Sixers with a 24 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included three assists , two steals and one block . Dario Saric produced 16 points , five rebounds and two assists . Robert Covington followed with 12 points , eight boards , three assists , three steals and one block . Ben Simmons managed a 10 - point , 11 - rebound double - double and added six assists and one steal . Jerryd Bayless led the bench with 11 points , while J.J. Redick endured a rough 1 - for - 8 shooting night that led to just six points . He added three rebounds , two assists and two steals . Victor Oladipo and Bojan Bogdanovic paced Indiana with matching 19 - point efforts . Oladipo also supplied nine rebounds , four assists , three steals and one block , while Bogdanovic registered four boards , one assist and two steals . Lance Stephenson tallied 14 points to lead the second unit and supplemented them with nine boards , four assists , two blocks and one steal . Darren Collison managed 11 points , four assists , two rebounds , two steals and one block . Thaddeus Young contributed 10 points , three rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one steal . Domantas Sabonis matched Young 's scoring total off the bench while also posting eight rebounds , six assists , one steal and one block . The 76ers head back home to face the Washington Wizards on Tuesday evening , while the Pacers remain home and also face the Wizards on Monday night .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 116 - 93 , at Banker 's LIfe Fieldhouse on Friday evening . The Pacers ( 34 - 25 ) have the postseason firmly in mind , and rightfully so , considering they came into Friday 's contest slotted fifth in the Eastern_Conference . Meanwhile , the Hawks ' ( 18 - 42 ) situation is such that they are essentially playing out the string . Both clubs played the first half accordingly , with Indiana establishing a dominating 61 - 44 halftime advantage . The third quarter was a 22 - 22 draw , and the home squad put their foot on the gas again in the fourth , pulling away even further to cruise to an easy win . The biggest advantage outside of the scoreboard for the hosts was in the rebounding column , as they handily prevailed in the battle on the glass by a 57 - 40 margin . The visitors also came up considerably short in ball security , turning it over on a whopping 22 occasions . Isaiah Taylor led the way for the Hawks with 17 points off the bench , a total he supplemented with six assists and two steals . Taurean Prince provided 14 points , seven rebounds , two assists and three steals . Kent Bazemore followed with 12 points , five boards , two assists and one block . Tyler Dorsey accounted for 11 points , two rebounds , one assist and one steal . Dennis Schroder mustered just nine points on 3 - for - 12 shooting and complemented them with two rebounds , two assists and one steal . John Collins matched Schroder 's scoring total and added nine boards and two blocks . DeAndre ' Bembry posted eight points , six rebounds , one assist and one block in 26 minutes off the bench . Domantas Sabonis spearheaded the Pacers with a 21 - point , 13 - rebound double - double in 30 minutes off the bench . He added three assists . Thaddeus Young was right behind him with 20 points , four rebounds , one assist , five steals and one block . Cory Joseph poured in 15 points and added four rebounds , four assists and four steals . Victor Oladipo had a modest 14 points on 5 - for - 16 shooting , but he stuffed the rest of the stat sheet with nine assists , seven rebounds , four steals and two blocks . Lance Stephenson delivered 13 points , eight rebounds , eight assists and two steals on the second unit . Bojan Bogdanovic turned in 12 points , three rebounds , one assist and one steal . Myles Turner supplied seven points , eight rebounds and two assists in 22 minutes . The Hawks head back home and await a Monday night visit from the Los_Angeles Lakers , while the Pacers hit the road and tangle with the Dallas Mavericks on that same evening .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 92 - 89 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Monday . The Pacers ( 37 - 27 ) and the Bucks ( 34 - 30 ) gave fans the preview of a potential playoff series with a nail - bitting , thrilling contest that went down the wire and was only decided in the final shot of the game when a three - point attempt for the Bucks came up short from the corner . Indiana jumped ahead in the first quarter by three points ( 20 - 17 ) , but Milwaukee fought back with a 29 - 24 lead in the second period . Indiana crawled back with a 29 - 23 third quarter that put them up 73 - 69 , and they sealed the deal despite the fact they lost the final quarter by one point . It was a thrilling contest worthy of a first - round playoff series . Bojan Bogdanovic was the top scorer for the Pacers , as he finished with 29 points ( 5 - 7 3PT ) , four rebounds and three assists . Victor Oladipo had 14 points , five rebounds and five assists , but also committed 10 turnovers . Thaddeus Young added 10 points with seven rebounds . Domantas Sabonis and Lance Stephenson came up big from the bench , as each one contributed 11 points . Eric Bledsoe contributed 26 points despite the fact he went 10 - of - 22 from the field and 2 - 10 from three - point range . Giannis Antetokounmpo chipped in with 18 points , 12 rebounds and five blocks . Jabari Parker had 15 points and five rebounds coming off the bench . Khris Middleton did n't have a good game , as he finished with six points on 1 - 7 from the field .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Indiana Pacers , 104 - 84 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Wednesday . The Jazz ( 35 - 30 ) extended their positive run and now they have won 16 of their last 18 games as they cruised their way from start to finish against a struggling Pacers ( 37 - 28 ) team that never got it going . Utah jumped to a 32 - 20 in the first quarter , and they never looked back . Despite the fact they lost 22 - 24 in the second quarter and finished the third with a 25 - 25 stalemate , Utah closed things out in the fourth with another dominant effort ( 25 - 15 ) and completed another impressive performance as they keep fighting for a playoff spot in a tightly - contested Western_Conference . Rudy Gobert led the way for the Jazz with 23 points , 14 rebounds and one block . Donovan Mitchell added 20 points , six assists and three rebounds , but he also committed six turnovers . Joe Ingles had 11 points and 10 assists , while Ricky Rubio filled the stat sheet admirably : 18 points , seven assists , six rebounds and three steals . Jae Crowded delivered 16 points coming off the bench . Myles Turner was the best player for the Pacers after finishing with 24 points on 10 - 14 from the field . Cory Joseph contributed 12 points and six boards . Domantas Sabonis chipped in with eight points and nine boards off the bench .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Indiana Pacers , 106 - 99 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Thursday . The Raptors ( 51 - 17 ) and the Pacers ( 40 - 29 ) engaged on a game that went down to the wire , but ultimately Toronto managed to escape with a huge win thanks to their better execution late in the fourth quarter , although they also showed resiliency and an ability to come from behind given how the game happened . Indiana jumped ahead to a 27 - 25 lead in the first quarter and made it an eight - point game at the break . However , the Raptors came from behind and won both the third ( 28 - 22 ) and fourth ( 29 - 20 ) quarter , completing the comeback late in the game with some key defensive plays . It was a stunning performance from Toronto that once again proved why they are one of the top teams in the NBA this season . DeMar DeRozan led the way for Toronto with an impressive effort of 24 points , six assists and four rebounds . Kyle Lowry had 13 points , six assists and six rebounds . Jonas Valanciunas had a strong double - double of 16 points and 16 rebounds , and Serge Ibaka also had a double double with 13 points and 11 boards . Pascal Siakam thrived off the bench , thanks to 12 points and eight rebounds . Darren Collison was the top scorer for the Pacers , as he finished with 22 points and four assists in just 28 minutes coming off the bench . Al Jefferson also had a dominating performance coming off the bench since he contributed 20 points and 12 rebounds . Victor Oladipo chipped in with 18 points , five rebounds , and three steals . Thaddeus Young added 13 points and six boards .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 109 - 104 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Friday evening . The Pacers ( 42 - 31 ) knew they 'd likely be in for a wire - to - wire challenge from the Clippers ( 38 - 34 ) , who needed to keep piling up wins to have a chance to secure a Western_Conference playoff spot . As would be expected in a battle between two evenly matched clubs with postseason aspirations , the contest was a nip - and - tuck battle throughout , and fittingly , the scoreboard reflected a 102 - 102 tie at the 1:40 mark of the fourth quarter following a Bojan Bogdanovic pull - up jump shot . It was at that point that the home squad went on a 60 run that gave them enough of a cushion to seal the win . Despite the defeat , Los_Angeles outshot Indiana , 55 percent to 46 percent . Lou Williams paced the Clippers with 27 points off the bench , a total he supplemented with 10 assists , four rebounds and three steals . Tobias Harris provided 18 points , three rebounds , one assist and two blocks . Montrezl Harrell collected 16 points and three rebounds . DeAndre Jordan generated a 14 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included one assist . Milos Teodosic and Austin Rivers pitched in matching 10 - point efforts , with the former hauling in three rebounds and dishing out three assists , and the latter registering eight assists and one steal . Wesley Johnson posted five points , three rebounds and one block . Bogdanovic led the Pacers with 28 points and added five rebounds and three assists . Victor Oladipo poured in 18 points and also logged six rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block . Thaddeus Young produced a 16 - point , 10 - rebound double - double . Darren Collison accounted for 13 points , 10 assists , two rebounds and one steal . Lance Stephenson matched Collison 's scoring total and also posted four rebounds , two assists and one steal in 17 minutes off the bench . The Clippers continue on the road and pay a visit to the Toronto Raptors on Sunday evening , while the Pacers remain home and face the Miami Heat on Sunday night as well .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Miami Heat , 113 - 107 , in overtime at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Sunday afternoon . A matchup between two postseason - minded teams this late into the season is bound to be hotly contested , but the Pacers ( 43 - 31 ) and Heat ( 39 - 35 ) put on a particularly entertaining show Sunday . Miami , playing without head coach Erik Spoelstra , who remained in South Florida awaiting the birth of his child , stood tall in the first and final periods , while Indiana dominated the middle quarters . The visitors ultimately overcame an eight - point deficit in the fourth quarter , and the extra period was assured when Victor Oladipo 's 28 - foot would - be game winner could n't find the net . In overtime , the hosts quickly erased an early Heat lead by putting together a 13 - 4 run that left them in possession of what would prove to be an insurmountable seven - point lead with 23 seconds remaining . The Pacers ' biggest advantage came on the glass , as they outrebounded Miami by a 51 - 39 margin . Tyler Johnson paced the Heat with 19 points and added four assists and three rebounds . James Johnson followed with 15 points , nine boards and three assists . Bam Adebayo turned in 14 points , five rebounds and one block . Dwyane Wade led the bench with 13 points and supplemented them with seven assists , four rebounds and two blocks . Kelly Olynyk filled out the stat sheet with 12 points , nine rebounds , nine assists and three steals in 32 minutes off the bench . Josh Richardson produced 10 points , three boards , two assists and two steals . Goran Dragic mustered a modest nine points , six assists , four rebounds and two steals . Oladipo led the Pacers with 23 points , to which he added five assists , two rebounds and three steals . Thaddeus Young delivered 22 points , nine rebounds and five steals . Bojan Bogdanovic accounted for 18 points , eight boards and one assist . Darren Collison registered 12 points , four assists , two rebounds and one steal . Cory Joseph finished with nine points , 10 rebounds and seven assists . Glenn Robinson III and Lance Stephenson generated matching eight - point tallies off the bench , with the former also posting four boards and one assist , and the latter compiling two rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . The Heat returns home for a Tuesday night showdown with the Cleveland Cavaliers , while the Pacers head to the West Coast to tangle with the Golden_State Warriors that same evening .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Golden_State Warriors , 126 - 106 , at Bankers_Life_Fieldhouse on Thursday . The Pacers ( 47 - 32 ) had one of their best performances of the season in this game , as they managed to defeat the reigning NBA champions , the Warriors ( 57 - 22 ) , with a solid effort on both ends of the court . The first quarter was quite even but Indiana held a slight one - point lead ( 27 - 26 ) , but they pulled away in both the second ( 35 - 25 ) and third ( 35 - 26 ) quarters . As such , Indiana entered the fourth quarter 97 - 77 advantage . The Warriors tried to turn things around in the final 12 minutes of action , but the Pacers closed things out with ease and the final quarter ended 29 - 29 , so Indiana cruised their way to a huge victory at home . As it has been the trend all season long , Victor Oladipo had a versatile performance since he had 21 points , seven assists , six rebounds and three steals in just 33 minutes . Bogdan Bogdanovic was the top scorer , however , as he ended with 28 points while going 11 - 13 from the field . Thaddeus Young had 16 points , eight rebounds , and five assists . Darren Collison finished with 15 points , five boards , and five dimes . Kevin Durant led the way for the Warriors after finishing with 27 points , seven assists , five rebounds and three steals . Klay Thompson had 16 points with seven rebounds , and Draymond Green contributed nine points , five assists and three boards . Quinn Cook finished with 12 points and six assists . No other Golden_State played reached the 10 - point plateau .
The Golden_State Warriors came back from an early deficit to defeat the New_Orleans Pelicans , 128 - 120 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Friday . The game got off to a rough start for the defending champs , as the Pelicans ( 0 - 2 ) were able to begin the game on a 23 - 9 run . While New_Orleans kept a 13 - point lead to the end of the first quarter , Golden_State ( 1 - 1 ) had whittled its deficit down to just three points by halftime . The Warriors flexed their championship - caliber muscle as soon as the second half started , outscoring the Pelicans by 11 in the third quarter thanks in large part to a barrage of three - pointers from Steph Curry and Klay Thompson . Thompson finished the night with a team high of 33 points , while Curry tacked on another 28 . The win for the Warriors helped them even their record after a heartbreaking opening night loss to Houston in which a Kevin Durant buzzer - beater was waved off at the end of the fourth . All-Star forward Draymond Green experienced an injury scare in the opener , missing the fourth quarter with a knee strain . Green was able to suit up and help fuel the Warriors ' win on Friday , although he looked a tad rusty . Green shot just 3 - of - 11 on the night and struggled to contain the big man duo of Anthony Davis and DeMarcus Cousins . Off the bench , veteran shooting guard Nick Young followed up his astounding 23 - point Warriors debut with a quiet three points . For the Pelicans , Friday 's loss was the same story as their tough opening night . Despite impressive play from star big men DeMarcus Cousins and Anthony Davis , the team was unable to pull out a win . Both Cousins and Davis delivered 35 - point double - doubles , but the team still struggled to keep ahead of Golden_State in the second half . The team still had plenty of positives to take away from the game , though , as they sunk 16 three - pointers and dished out 27 assists . The Warriors will visit Memphis on Saturday , while the Pelicans will see the Los_Angeles Lakers on Sunday .
The Orlando Magic defeated the host New_Orleans Pelicans , 115 - 99 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Monday evening . The Magic ( 5 - 2 ) led for most of the first half , but the Pelicans ( 3 - 4 ) turned it up late and took a 64 - 60 lead going into halftime . The teams exchanged runs in the third quarter , though the Magic ended up emerging with an 88 - 84 lead heading into the final frame . The Magic dominated the fourth quarter , outscoring the Pelicans 28 - 15 to cruise to the win . The Magic continue to enjoy success thanks to a balanced attack . On Monday , five players scored in double digits , including three guys with 20 or more points . Nikola Vucevic was the scoring leader for Orlando , with 21 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting , along with eight rebounds and three assists in 27 minutes . Evan Fournier and Jonathan Simmons chipped in 20 points each , while Marreese Speights exploded for 18 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting in 21 minutes off the bench . Meanwhile , Anthony Davis was in a world of his own as he totaled 39 points on 13 - of - 20 shooting , 10 rebounds and four blocks in 41 minutes . DeMarcus Cousins was relatively quiet with only nine points to go along with 12 rebounds , five assists , one block and one steal in 39 minutes . Jrue Holiday was the only player other than Davis to score in double digits , finishing with 11 points , seven assists and four rebounds in 36 minutes . The Pelicans will look to bounce back as they play host to the Timberwolves on Wednesday . The Magic take on the Grizzlies in Memphis on Wednesday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves took down the New_Orleans Pelicans , 104 - 98 , in a dramatic game at Smoothie_King_Center on Wednesday . Minnesota ( 5 - 3 ) was able to overcome one of the worst games of star center Karl-Anthony Towns ' career en route to the victory . Towns posted a career low of just two points in the win . It was a bizarre off night for the normally elite center , as he shot just 1 - of - 7 and committed four turnovers while grabbing just five rebounds . Still , Minnesota was able to ride its star talent to victory . Wing duo Andrew Wiggins and Jimmy Butler combined for 42 points , with Butler earning a team high of 23 . Butler also came up big in the clutch , hitting a jumper while being fouled to give Minnesota a three - point lead with 34 seconds remaining . Strong mid - range shooting helped keep the Wolves ' high - powered offense on the mark , as the team struggled a bit from beyond the arc and at the line . The Wolves made only six three - pointers and went just 16 - of - 24 at the free - throw line . New_Orleans ( 3 - 5 ) has struggled early despite strong play from its All-Star frontcourt duo of Anthony Davis and DeMarcus Cousins . Once again , it was tough to fault either star for the loss , as the two big men combined for 59 points , 19 rebounds , 12 assists , and nine steals . Cousins led the team with 35 points , shooting 10 - of - 21 and burying five three - pointers . Despite both Cousins and Davis scoring efficiently and at a high volume , the team struggled to find consistent offense , as only one other Pelican scored more than ten points and the team shot only 43 percent from the field on the night . Turnovers also proved problematic , as the team gave up the ball 19 times on the night . The Pelicans will visit Dallas on Friday , while Minnesota will host the Mavericks on Saturday .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 114 - 107 , on Monday at Smoothie_King_Center . Things did n't start out so great for the Pelicans ( 9 - 8 ) , as they fell behind 25 - 6 within the first six minutes . However , New_Orleans managed to slowly chip away at that margin , and after only being down five heading into halftime , the Pelicans ended up dominating the second half en route to victory . Anthony Davis led the way with a big night , scoring a game - high 36 points and grabbing 15 rebounds . And a big night was needed from Davis , as DeMarcus Cousins was ejected in the second half after throwing an elbow to the temple of Russell Westbrook . Cousins still finished with 18 points and nine rebounds of his own in 26 minutes . As for the Thunder ( 7 - 9 ) , they 've now dropped two straight games after rattling off their first three - game win streak of the season . Russell Westbrook had an impressive triple - double with 22 points , 16 rebounds and 12 assists , while Paul George scored a team - high 26 points , and Carmelo Anthony posted 19 points of his own . In the end , it as the Thunder 's lack of a strong defensive effort that led to them blowing their lead and losing the game , as they allowed the Pelicans to shoot an impressive 51 percent from the field . Up next , the Thunder will return home Wednesday to take on the Warriors , while the Pelicans will remain home Wednesday to play the Spurs .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 107 - 90 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Wednesday . There were some major swings in this game , as both teams approached 20 - point leads in the middle quarters . In fact , New_Orleans turned a 15 - point first quarter deficit into a 30 - point fourth quarter lead . It 's evident when looking at the middle quarters , considering the Pelicans outscored the Spurs , 68 - 30 , in the second and third quarters . In addition , there was a 43 - point swing from the first minute of the second quarter to the final minute of the third quarter . Rebounding was huge for New_Orleans , as they outrebounded San_Antonio , 45 - 39 . The shooting disparity was vast as well , with the Pelicans hitting 48 percent of their shots , while holding the Spurs to just under 40 percent from the field . The Spurs ( 11 - 7 ) best player came off the bench , as Rudy Gay provided 19 points and three rebounds on 8 - of - 14 shooting . Pau Gasol amassed 16 points , nine rebounds and three blocks . Kyle Anderson collected 12 points , five rebounds and four assists . The Pelicans ( 9 - 9 ) were led by Anthony Davis , as he tallied 29 points , 11 rebounds and four assists on 11 - of - 17 shooting . DeMarcus Cousins was n't far behind , totaling 14 points , 15 rebounds , three assists and two blocks . No one else on the roster had more than 13 points , five rebounds or four assists . On deck for New_Orleans is a road matchup versus the Phoenix Suns . San_Antonio will return to action on Saturday as they travel to play the Charlotte Hornets .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the visiting Denver Nuggets , 123 - 114 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Wednesday evening . It started out a close game , tied after one quarter , with the Pelicans taking a one - point 67 - 66 lead into halftime . New_Orleans was strong in the third quarter and created some separation heading into the fourth ahead 97 - 91 . The Pelicans took to a 13 - 5 run early in the fourth to build a cushion that they could rely on the rest of the way . The Pelicans were without Anthony Davis ( groin ) , but DeMarcus Cousins pulled an extra share of the weight as he logged his second 40 - point , 20 - rebound game of the season , to lead the Pelicans to a big win . Cousins finished with 40 points on 12 - of - 25 shooting , 22 rebounds , four assists and four blocks , in 40 minutes of action . Jrue Holiday followed up with 27 points eight assists , one steal and one rebound in 35 minutes , while E'Twaun Moore added 14 points . The Pelicans shot 54 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Gary Harris led the way for the Nuggets , with 24 points on 8 - of - 19 shooting , in 37 minutes . The New_Orleans Pelicans took down the Philadelphia 76ers , 131 - 124 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Sunday . New_Orleans ( 14 - 13 ) saw a well - balanced approach to offense in Sunday 's win , as six players scored in double figures . Leading the team with 29 points was superstar big man Anthony Davis , who shot an impressive 11 - of - 19 from the field . The team as a whole was highly efficient , shooting a stunning 58 percent from the floor on the night . The game was also one of veteran point guard Rajon Rondo 's strongest showings in a Pelicans uniform , as he recorded a season - high 18 assists to go along with 13 points and five steals . Rondo took charge of the Pelicans offense effectively , contributing to the team 's impressive 33 total assists . Philadelphia ( 13 - 14 ) was without star big man Joel Embiid , who was a late scratch due to back tightness before the game . Despite Embiid 's absence , the team still managed to excel on the offensive end . Rookie ball handler Ben Simmons took on a large role on offense , scoring 27 points and dished out ten assists . Veteran sharpshooter J.J. Redick added an additional 28 points and shot a stellar 8 - of - 14 from the field . That included three three - pointers , making up a third of the nine made by the team on the night . The Pelicans will visit Houston on Monday , while the 76ers will see Minnesota on Tuesday .

Despite the fact that New_Orleans led for the majority of the fourth quarter , New_York took the lead when it mattered most . In fact , they overcame an eight - point deficit with three minutes left to come back and eek out a win , ending the game in a 14 - 4 run . Taking care of the ball was key for the Knicks , as they committed just six turnovers , while forcing 10 from the Pelicans . Offensive rebounding was also huge , with New_York winning that battle , 9 - 4 . Bench production was the difference in the game though , with the Knicks bench outscoring the Pelicans bench , 42 - 10 . The Knicks ( 17 - 19 ) were led by Kristaps Porzingis , as he scored seven of his 30 points in the final 90 seconds . He also added seven rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks to his tally . The Pistons ( 22 - 17 ) found out earlier in the day that they 'd have some muscle down low back in the lineup , as Andre Drummond was deemed healthy enough to return from the rib contusion that had cost him two of the previous three games . They figured to need his size against the imposing frontcourt duo of DeMarcus Cousins and Anthony Davis , but they eventually caught a break when the latter was forced from the contest with a right ankle sprain after logging a productive 28 minutes . Despite his key absence , the game was close wire to wire , and the Pelicans ( 19 - 20 ) were able to secure the victory after Avery Bradley missed a last - gasp three - point attempt as time expired . New_Orleans enjoyed an excellent shooting night , posting a 56 percent success rate from the floor while seeing all five starters generate double - digit point totals . Tobias Harris paced the Pistons with 25 points , five rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . Chicago looked in control halfway through the fourth quarter , but New_Orleans rode a 23 - 6 run to end regulation to send the game into overtime . It was a game of runs though , as it took 12 ties and 13 lead changes to determine a winner . Three-point shooting was the difference , with New_Orleans hitting 14 - of - 40 and Chicago going just 8 - of - 26 . Turnovers really killed the Bulls too , as they committed 19 of them while forcing just 11 from the Pelicans . Jerian Grant matched those 22 points , as he also provided five rebounds , 13 assists and two steals on 6 - of - 7 from the field . Zach LaVine put in 19 points , five rebounds and two assists . The Sacramento Kings defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 114 - 103 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Tuesday evening . The Kings ( 16 - 34 ) had to come from an early deficit in the first quarter against the Pelicans ( 27 - 23 ) but once they adjusted , they did not have many problems to close things out against a team that continues to adjust to life without DeMarcus Cousins . New_Orleans grabbed a four - point lead after the first quarter and they were up by one at halftime , but the Kings ran away with the game in the second half . A six - point lead in the third quarter put them in front by five , and then Sacramento closed things out winning 24 - 18 in the final 12 minutes . It ended being a relatively easy win for the Kings thanks to their second - half dominance . Zach Randolph was the best player for the Kings , as the veteran power forward finished with 26 points , 13 rebounds , and two assists . Kosta Koufos also finished with a double - double , as he chipped in with 17 points and 16 rebounds . De'Aaron Fox added 13 points , six rebounds and four assists , while Garrett Temple had 15 points and six assists . George Hill contributed 14 points off the bench . The Utah Jazz defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans 133 - 109 on Monday at Smoothie_King_Center . The Jazz ( 24 - 28 ) managed to put together as strong an offensive performance as you 'll see in the NBA this season on Monday night , pouring in a season - high 133 points en route to a dominating victory over the Pelicans . Rodney Hood embodied that near - perfect offensive performance with a near - perfect night shooting from the field . Hood shot 12 - of - 14 from the field overall , including 4 - of - 4 from three , en route to scoring 30 points in just 27 minutes off the bench . Ricky Rubio added a double - double of 20 points and 11 assists , while four other Jazz players also managed to score in double figures . As a team , Utah shot a ridiculous 58 percent from the field and a scorching 66 percent from behind the arc . The Jazz have now won six games in a row and have done so thanks to their offensive output , as they have scored at least 120 points in four straight contests . As for the Pelicans ( 28 - 25 ) , it was n't that poor of an offensive effort from them , as they hit 50 percent of their shots from the field , but they simply could n't get any stops on the defensive end . Jrue Holiday led the way with a team - high 28 points on 13 - of - 21 shooting to go along with five rebounds and three assists , while Anthony Davis struggled to get anything going offensively , shooting just 6 - of - 16 from the field en route to scoring just 15 points and grabbing 11 rebounds . The newest Pelican , Nikola Mirotic , also struggled from the field , going 0 - of - 4 from behind the arc and 2 - of - 8 overall on his way to scoring just five points in 33 minutes .
The New_Orleans Pelicans blew out the Los_Angeles Lakers , 139 - 117 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Wednesday . The game got out of hand quickly for Los_Angeles ( 23 - 33 ) , as the Pelicans ( 31 - 26 ) got off to a scorching hot start . New_Orleans finished the fourth quarter with 46 points , thanks largely to the massive offensive impact of superstar big man Anthony Davis . Davis , who will be representing New_Orleans at the All-Star Game this weekend , scored 31 points in the first half of the game alone . `` The Brow `` scored with brutal efficiency , going 15 - of - 18 from the field and finishing with a game - high 42 points . Things got controversial in the first half , as both teams saw their point guards ejected . After a tense exchange between the Pelicans ' Rajon Rondo and the Lakers ' Isaiah Thomas , both were removed from the game . A subsequent technical foul led to the ejection of Lakers head coach Luke Walton . The ejection marks the third time in Thomas 's career in which he has been ejected within three games of joining a new team . Even discounting Davis 's monstrous output , the Pelicans were impressive . The team shot over 53 percent from the field and knocked down 14 three - pointers . Jrue Holiday pitched in 24 points , while the Pelicans ' bench combined to score 52 . Los_Angeles , meanwhile , had three 20 - point scorers in what was a decent offensive night for the surging team . Brandon Ingram scored 21 points , while rookie forward Kyle Kuzma led the team with 23 off the bench . Defense was where the Lakers struggled , as the team had only five steals and could not manage to contain Davis 's commanding offensive presence . The Lakers will visit Minnesota on Thursday , while New_Orleans enters the All-Star Break .

The Utah Jazz defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 116 - 99 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Sunday afternoon . The Jazz ( 37 - 30 ) rightfully owns a stellar defensive reputation , but an under - the - radar aspect of their solid season thus far has been their emerging offense . The offseason addition of Ricky Rubio and his evolution into much more of an aggressive scorer combined with the development of rookie Donovan Mitchell and holdovers Joe Ingles and Rudy Gobert has served to make Utah a much more balanced squad . Sunday 's game ultimately served as a fitting example , as the visitors clamped down on the Pelicans ( 38 - 28 ) in the second half while the aforementioned quartet all played a key role in overcoming a 51 - 48 halftime deficit . The Jazz compiled 68 points over the third and fourth quarters , finished with a whopping 55 - 38 advantage on the glass and were near - perfect from the charity stripe , draining 24 of their 25 free - throw attempts . Rubio paced Utah with a 30 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included seven assists . Mitchell followed with 27 points , four assists , three rebounds and one steal . Ingles produced 20 points , five assists , three rebounds and one steal . Gobert turned in a 19 - point , 16 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and two blocks . Derrick Favors was the only member of the starting five to not reach double figures in the scoring column , totaling just six points . However , he added seven boards and three assists . Raul Neto paced the second unit with a modest six points . Anthony Davis overcame his ankle injury to take the floor and lead New_Orleans with 25 points , 11 rebounds , three assists , an eye - popping 10 blocks and three steals . Jrue Holiday tallied an 18 - point , 10 - assist double - double that also featured six rebounds , two steals and one block . Ian Clark followed with a bench - leading 14 points , a total he supplemented with two rebounds . Emeka Okafor and Darius Miller managed matching 11 - point efforts . Okafor hauled in six rebounds and posted one block , while Miller dished out four assists , ripped down three rebounds and delivered a steal and a block apiece . E'Twaun Moore finished with 10 points , two rebounds and one assist . Rajon Rondo mustered just four points but also distributed eight dimes and collected three rebounds . The Jazz return home and await a Tuesday night visit from the Detroit Pistons , while the Pelicans remain home and face off with the Charlotte Hornets on Tuesday night as well .

In addition , there were eight ties and nine lead changes in total . Ball movement was the difference in the game , with the Pelicans handing out 33 assists and the Hornets dishing out just 22 assists . Transition offense was also key , with New_Orleans outscoring Charlotte in fastbreak points , 28 - 15 . They also did a ton of damage down low , winning the points in the paint battle , 78 - 64 . The Hornets ( 29 - 39 ) were led by Dwight Howard , as he tallied 22 points , 11 rebounds , two assists and three blocks . Kemba Walker finished with 22 points , three rebounds and seven assists . Nicolas Batum accrued 20 points , five rebounds , eight assists , four steals and three blocks . Frank Kaminsky led the bench with 21 points .
