Both teams play road games on Thursday for their next outings , with Charlotte traveling to face the Atlanta Hawks and New_Orleans playing the San_Antonio Spurs .
The Houston Rockets defeated the host New_Orleans Pelicans , 107 - 101 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Saturday . Despite the fact that Houston led for the majority of this game , New_Orleans made it close at the end . In fact , the Rockets led for well over 40 minutes , as the Pelicans got it down to a four - point margin in the final minute thanks to a 29 - 23 fourth quarter . Three-point shooting was key for Houston , as they connected on 15 - of - 41 while New_Orleans hit just 8 - of - 24 . Turnovers were also a huge factor , with the Rockets committing eight turnovers while forcing 14 from the Pelicans . Much of that can be attributed to the 10 steals recorded by Houston . The Rockets ( 55 - 14 ) got a near triple - double out of James Harden , as he collected 32 points , 11 rebounds , eight assists and two steals . Chris Paul totaled 21 points , eight rebounds , five assists and three steals . Trevor Ariza amassed 17 points , four rebounds and two assists while Clint Capela accrued 13 points , 11 rebounds and three blocks . The Pelicans ( 39 - 30 ) were led by Anthony Davis , as he generated 26 points and 13 rebounds . Jrue Holiday accumulated 19 points , six rebounds , eight assists , three steals and two blocks . Ian Clark led the bench with 17 points , two rebounds and three assists on 8 - of - 9 from the field . New_Orleans will have to play again on Sunday , as they play host to the Boston Celtics . As for Houston , they travel to play the Portland Trail Blazers on Tuesday for their next fixture .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Boston Celtics , 108 - 89 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Sunday evening . The Celtics ( 47 - 23 ) came into the contest with an increasing sense of dread regarding their chances of securing the top spot in the Eastern_Conference , as they 'd fallen behind the Toronto Raptors by a full five games heading into Sunday 's action . A rare loss earlier in the day by the conference pacesetters gave Boston an opportunity to make up a game in the standings , but they were faced with having to do it in a tough road environment against a quality opponent and with the continued absences of Kyrie Irving ( knee ) , Jaylen Brown ( concussion ) and Marcus Smart ( thumb ) . That made their stellar first half all the more enjoyable - - one that led to a 49 - 47 advantage by intermission . However , the Pelicans ( 40 - 30 ) made sure that deficit was short - lived , garnering a four - point lead by the end of the third quarter courtesy of a 35 - point haul , and following that up with a final period in which they outscored the visitors by a 26 - 13 margin . Jayson Tatum led the way for the Celtics with 23 points - - a total he supplemented with five rebounds , one assist and two steals . Marcus Morris provided 17 points , six boards and one steal . Terry Rozier contributed 13 points , seven rebounds , five assists and one steal . Greg Monroe delivered a bench - leading 12 points and added six boards , two assists and two steals . Al Horford shot just 3 - for - 11 on his way to six points - - a total he complemented with four boards , three assists and one block . Abdel Nader finished with eight points , three boards and two steals . Anthony Davis once again paced the Pelicans with a 34 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included three assists , one steal and one block . Cheick Diallo led the second unit with 17 points , ripped down six rebounds and dished out one assist . Nikola Mirotic tallied a 16 - point , 10 - rebound double - double and also had three assists , three steals and two blocks . E'Twaun Moore chimed in with 11 points , five assists , three rebounds and one steal . Emeka Okafor 's line consisted of eight points , seven rebounds and one block . Jrue Holiday had a rare down performance , posting just seven points , four assists , three rebounds and one steal . Rajon Rondo mustered just four points but handed out 11 assists and notched a steal . The Celtics head back home for a Tuesday night showdown with the Oklahoma_City Thunder , while the Pelicans remain home and await a visit from the Dallas Mavericks on that same night .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 128 - 125 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Thursday . This was one of the tightest games of the season , as it took 19 ties and 22 lead changes to determine a winner . A big fourth quarter capped off the comeback for New_Orleans , as they overcame an 11 - point deficit thanks to a 31 - 17 fourth quarter . The assist - to - runover ratio was key , with the Pelicans recording 28 assists to seven turnovers while the Lakers committed 16 turnovers with 19 assists . The 13 steals recorded by New_Orleans was a huge part of that , as Los_Angeles recorded just two steals . The Pelicans also dominated down low , outscoring the Lakers in the paint , 80 - 48 . The Lakers ( 31 - 40 ) were led by Kentavious Caldwell-Pope , as he tallied 28 points , four rebounds and two assists . Brook Lopez amassed 23 points and six rebounds . Julius Randle accrued 23 points , 10 rebounds and two assists while Kyle Kuzma totaled 22 points , five rebounds and two assists . Lonzo Ball accumulated six points , 13 rebounds and nine assists but went 1 - of - 12 from three - point range . The Pelicans ( 42 - 30 ) got another gem out of Anthony Davis , as he collected 33 points , nine rebounds , three steals and two blocks . Jrue Holiday finished with 26 points , three rebounds and six assists . Rajon Rondo generated 24 points , 10 assists and three steals . Those three combined to go 35 - of - 54 from the field . Both teams play road games on Saturday for their next outings , with New_Orleans playing the Houston Rockets and Los_Angeles facing the Memphis Grizzlies .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 107 - 103 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Tuesday evening . The Trail_Blazers ( 46 - 28 ) came into Tuesday 's contest a lot more secure in their playoff positioning than the conference - rival Pelicans ( 43 - 32 ) , despite just two slots separating them . New_Orleans found itself just two games out of the ninth seed coming into Tuesday 's action - - even while currently sitting in the fifth spot - - meaning that they needed continue piling up the wins . The two similarly talented teams unsurprisingly engaged in a hard - fought battle through three quarters , with the home squad heading into the final 12 minutes holding a slim 75 - 71 advantage . Portland eventually battled back and held a precarious 105 - 103 lead with 24 seconds remaining after an Anthony Davis driving layup . E'Twaun Moore subsequently missed a pair of would - be go - ahead three - point jumpers - - the second with three seconds remaining - - sinking New_Orleans ' final chances for a win . Damian Lillard , who led all scorers with 41 points , sunk a pair of free throws to give Portland their final margin of victory . Lillard added nine rebounds , six assists and four steals to his aforementioned scoring total . Jusuf Nurkic followed with a 21 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included four blocks and one steal . Evan Turner finished with 14 points , six rebounds and two assists . Al-Farouq Aminu supplied 10 points , 10 boards , two assists , three steals and one block . Shabazz Napier registered eight points , three rebounds , one assist and two steals . C.J . McCollum endured a nightmarish 3 - for - 19 shooting effort and was consequently able to muster just seven points , five assists , four rebounds , two blocks and one steal . Anthony Davis paced the Pelicans with 36 points and supplemented them with 14 rebounds , four assists , six blocks and two steals . Jrue Holiday tallied a 21 - point , 11 - rebound , 11 - assist triple - double that also included two blocks . Moore accounted for 11 points , seven assists , three rebounds and one block . Ian Clark drew the start at point guard and totaled eight points and two assists . Solomon Hill led the bench with nine points and four assists . He added three rebounds and one steal . The Trail_Blazers next head to Memphis to tangle with the Grizzlies on Wednesday night , while the Pelicans hit the road and face off with the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday evening . '
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the host New_Orleans Pelicans , 109 - 104 , at Smoothie_King_Center on Sunday evening . The game went scoreless for nearly the first two minutes , before Anthony Davis broke the ice for New_Orleans . The Thunder then jumped out to an 11 - 4 lead , but the Pelicans fought back and used a 14 - 5 run in the last couple minutes to earn a 28 - 20 lead heading into the second . The Thunder turned it up in the second and took over the lead three minutes in . They held the lead the rest of the quarter and took a 53 - 50 lead into halftime . The Thunder stayed in control through the third quarter . The Pelicans cut the deficit to just one , mid way through the quarter , but fell back to trail 80 - 75 heading into the final frame . The Thunder remained in control , with a 10 - point lead with just 3:39 left in the game . The Pelicans made a final push but could not avoid taking their fourth straight loss . Russell Westbrook led the Thunder with 26 points , 15 rebounds , 13 assists and two steals , in 36 minutes . Paul George followed up with 27 points , eight rebounds , three steals and two assists , while Carmelo Anthony added 16 points , six rebounds and one assist . The Thunder shot 43 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Anthony Davis led the Pelicans with 25 points , 11 rebounds , three assists , three steals and two blocks , in 39 minutes . E'Twaun Moore added 15 points , four rebounds , two steals and one assist , while Ian Clark tallied 16 points on 6 - of - 7 shooting off the bench . The Pelicans shot 46 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 32 from long range . The Pelicans ( 43 - 34 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Grizzlies on Wednesday . The Thunder ( 45 - 33 ) play host to the Warriors on Tuesday .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the visiting Charlotte Hornets , 102 - 90 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Wednesday . In a battle between two teams with playoff hopes entering the season , the Pistons cruised their way to a relatively easy win against Charlotte on the season opener . Stan van Gundy 's team looked in control throughout the entire game , and after winning the second quarter 27 - 18 , the team never looked back . Detroit ( 10 ) dished out 24 assists in this game , led by Reggie Jackson who had eight . The talented point - guard also added 13 points and five rebounds to his account . Tobias Harris led the scoring for Detroit with 27 points and 10 rebounds , Andre Drummond contributed with eight points , 13 boards , four assists and two blocks and , as if that was n't enough , Langston Galloway ( 16 points on 6 - for - 11 from the field ) and Henry Ellenson ( 13 points ) left their mark with strong performances coming off the bench . On the other hand , the Hornets ( 0 - 1 ) received decent contributions from Kemba Walker and Dwight Howard . Walker finished the game with 24 points , while Howard chipped in with 10 points , 15 rebounds and two blocks . But they were the only two notable performances on a sloppy effort from the Hornets , as they committed 17 turnovers and only shot 30 percent from three - point range as a team .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Detroit Pistons , 97 - 86 , on Monday at Little Caesar 's Arena . It was the first win of the season for the 76ers ( 1 - 3 ) , as they managed to lead the Pistons ( 2 - 2 ) from wire - to - wire Monday night . After building its lead to as much as 21 points in the first half , however , Philadelphia allowed Detroit to come crawling back in the third period , with the margin shrinking to as low as three . The team never let go of the lead in the end , though , thanks to their two young stars Ben Simmons and Joel Embiid . Simmons finished with a triple - double of 21 points ( 8 - 11 FG , 5 - 6 FT ) , 12 rebounds and 10 assists in 34 minutes , while Embiid posted a game - high 30 points to go along with nine rebounds and two steals in 28 minutes . Robert Covington ended up being the only other 76ers player to score in double figures with 13 points . As for the Pistons , they were lead by point guard Reggie Jackson , who had a solid all - around game with a team - high 16 points , six rebounds and seven assists across 31 minutes . Andre Drummond posted a double - double of 14 points and 14 rebounds , while Avery Bradley scored 15 points of his own . In the end , the Pistons could n't get anything going from behind the arc Monday , as they shot a brutal 6 - of - 30 ( 20 percent ) from long range , including a fourth quarter where they went just 1 - of - 6 from three . Up next , the 76ers will head home Wednesday to take on the Rockets , while the Pistons will remain home to play the Timberwolves on the same day .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Sacrament Kings , 108 - 99 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Saturday . This was one of the cleanest offensive games of the season , as both of these teams exceeded 50 percent shooting . The third quarter is where Detroit really separated themselves , outscoring Sacramento , 33 - 25 . The Pistons did n't shoot well from the free - throw line , but they did a good job of getting there , as they took 22 free - throws , while holding the Kings to just 13 free - throw attempts . The Pistons did a great job of boxing out as well , limiting the Kings to just three offensive rebounds . The Kings ( 1 - 8 ) were led by Zach Randolph , as he amassed 19 points , four rebounds and four assists . De'Aaron Fox started for George Hill ( personal ) , accruing 14 points and four assists . Bogdan Bogdanovic finished with 14 points on 6 - of - 7 shooting . Buddy Hield led the bench with 13 points and eight rebounds . The Pistons ( 7 - 3 ) got another monster double - double out of Andre Drummond , as he totaled 16 points , 19 rebounds , four assists and three steals . Avery Bradley led the team in scoring , tallying 24 points , two rebounds and three assists . Tobias Harris collected 20 points , five rebounds and five assists . Reggie Jackson provided 15 points and seven assists as the starting point guard . Sacramento 's next game will be on Tuesday , when they host the Oklahoma_City Thunder . As for Detroit , they do n't play until Wednesday , when they host the Indiana Pacers for their next game .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 111 - 104 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Friday night . After a closely contested first period , the Pistons ( 9 - 3 ) pulled away in the second , building a 57 - 41 halftime lead . The Hawks ( 2 - 10 ) came out of the halftime locker room a much more focused squad , however , prevailing in the third quarter by a 28 - 19 margin close the gap to 76 - 69 . They were even better offensively in a 35 - point fourth quarter , but Detroit matched them basket for basket to secure the hard - fought win . Atlanta actually outpaced the home squad shooting - wise , posting a 49 percent success rate from the field was notably better than the Pistons ' 44 percent figure . However , Detroit won the rebounding battle by a 51 - 45 margin and benefitted from a pair of 20 - point efforts from their starting backcourt . Kent Bazemore led the way for the Hawks with 22 points , five rebounds , five assists , three steals and one block . Dennis Schroder provided 17 points , 11 assists , four rebounds and two steals . Impressive rookie John Collins followed with a bench - leading 16 points , which he supplemented with eight rebounds , one assist and two blocks . Marco Belinelli supplied 14 points , one rebound , one assist and two steals . Dewayne Dedmon managed 13 points , nine rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Luke Babbitt tallied 11 points , eight boards , three assists and two steals . Reggie Jackson spearheaded the Pistons ' attack with 22 points , which he complemented with six assists , three rebounds and two steals . Avery Bradley registered 20 points , four rebounds and one steal . Ish Smith led the second unit with 17 points and added five assists , three rebounds and one steal . Andre Drummond turned in a momentous 16 - point , 20 - rebound double - double that also included seven assists and two blocks . Tobias Harris matched Drummond 's scoring total while also bringing down eight rebounds and dishing out an assist . The Hawks next head to the Nation 's Capital for a date with the Washington Wizards on Saturday night , while the Pistons remain home and await the Miami Heat on Sunday afternoon .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Detroit Pistons , 91 - 81 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Sunday afternoon . The Celtics ( 23 - 5 ) quickly bounced back from their previous loss against the San Antonio Spurs and delivered an impressive effort on both ends of the court . The Pistons ( 14 - 12 ) were held to under 90 points for the third time this season , and they did n't have answers to compete with a Boston team that dominated from start to finish . The Celtics built an eight - point lead after the first quarter , and they never looked back on their way to their 11th win in 14 contests on the road . Meanwhile , the Pistons dropped to 8 - 4 at home , but it 's clear they lack confidence at the moment . The team struggled as a whole when it comes to their shooting since they shot 33 percent from the field , and 30 percent from three - point range . Al Horford was the most prolific player for the Celtics in this one , as he finished with 18 points , nine rebounds , six assists , and two blocks . Kyrie Irving added 16 points , and both Jaylen Brown ( 12 points ) and Jayson Tatum ( 11 ) scored in double figures as well . Marcus Smart had a great performance off the bench as well , as he ended with 12 points . Tobias Harris led the way for the Pistons offensively with 19 points and eight boards , but he did n't have a lot of help here . Avery Bradley added 12 points and Anthony Tolliver chipped in with 15 off the bench , but the star duo of Reggie Jackson and Andre Drummond did not perform as expected . Jackson finished with two points in 0 - for - 9 from field , while Drummond scored six points but grabbed 15 boards .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Orlando Magic , 114 - 110 , Little_Caesars_Arena on Sunday afternoon . The Pistons ( 17 - 13 ) and the Magic ( 11 - 20 ) engaged in quite a battle that went down to the wire thanks to a huge comeback from Orlando during the final 12 minutes of action . Even though the Pistons entered the fourth quarter with a 17 - point advantage , the Magic never backed down and came quite close to turn things around , but did n't have enough time and ended dropping their fifth straight game . Their reaction during the final minutes was encouraging , though . But the Pistons closed things out when they needed to , and extended their winning streak to three games as a result . Reggie Bullock led the way for the Pistons offensively , as he finished with 20 points and five rebounds . Reggie Jackson and Tobias Harris each added 17 points , and so did Anthony Tolliver who was deadly from long - range ( 5 - of - 7 from three - point territory ) coming off the bench . Andre Drummond made an impact as well , finishing with 12 points , six rebounds , two blocks , and two assists . Langston Galloway added 11 from the bench . Surprisingly , Mario Hezonja was Orlando 's top scorer with 28 points on 10 - of - 18 from the field and 8 - of - 12 from three - point range . Nikola Vucevic added 24 points with 14 rebounds and seven assists , while Jonathon Simmons contributed with 22 points , seven assists , and six boards . Elfrid Payton added 15 points with seven assists .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the visiting New_York Knicks , 104 - 101 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Friday evening . The Pistons ( 18 - 14 ) came from behind in the fourth quarter to defeat a Knicks ( 17 - 15 ) team that was coming off a back - to - back following their win over the Boston Celtics this past Thursday . It was a very even game right until the final minutes , but Detroit came from behind to secure a huge win that put them four games over .500 . New_York had a one - point lead entering the final quarter , but Detroit never gave up and were rewarded for their attitude . In fact , New_York had a two - point lead with 1:18 left , but Detroit closed it out with some clutch buckets from Reggie Jackson . Reggie Jackson was the star of the game for the Pistons since he scored the final points and came through in the clutch , but overall he only contributed with 10 points and eight assists . Andre Drummond posted a huge double - double of 18 points and 15 rebounds , while Tobias Harris carried with the offense after scoring 24 points . Stanley Johnson added 12 points coming off the bench . Porzingis bounced back from his one - point performance against the Celtics , and contributed with 29 points and nine rebounds . Enes Kanter registered a second straight double - double , as he finished with 22 points and 16 boards . Courtney Lee had 16 points , five boards and four assists , while Michael Beasley only had six points following a monster game against the Celtics less than 24 hours ago .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Detroit Pistons , 118 - 107 , at Little Ceasars Arena on Monday afternoon . The Hornets ( 17 - 25 ) had to come from behind in this game and managed to pull quite an upset against a Pistons ( 22 - 20 ) team that has looked quite solid at home during the current season . Both teams looked evenly matched after the first quarter ended 27 - 27 , and Detroit jumped ahead in the second with a six - point advantage . Everyone thought Detroit would cruise their way in the second half , but Charlotte came out of nowhere to turn things around . A 34 - 24 pushed Charlotte on top by four , and they closed things out in the fourth quarter with a 34 - 27 win over the final 12 minutes . Charlotte 's reaction was impressive , and they were rewarded for their efforts with a comfortable win . Dwight Howard was the absolute star of this game for Charlotte , as he finished with a strong double - double of 21 points , 17 rebounds , and four blocks . Kemba Walker contributed with 20 points and nine assists , and Marvin Williams also chipped in with 21 points of his own . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist contributed with 11 points , and Nicolas Batum filled the stat sheet thanks to 14 points , eight rebounds , five assists , and two steals . Tobias Harris and Reggie Bullock each contributed with 20 points to lead the Pistons ' offense . Ish Smith had a strong performance leading the offense , as the veteran point guard had a double - double of 19 points and 10 assists . Avery Bradley contributed with 15 points , and Anthony Tolliver had 17 points coming off the bench . Andre Drummond struggled , however , and only had three points .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Detroit Pistons , 122 - 112 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Friday evening . The Wizards ( 26 - 20 ) and the Pistons ( 22 - 22 ) played a very intense game that went back and forth at times , but in the end , the Wizards managed to hold on to their lead following an impressive performance in the second half . Detroit jumped ahead in the first quarter thanks to a 10 - point lead , but Washington tied things up at halftime . The third quarter ended being decisive and those 12 minutes were the big differential on the game , as the Wizards outscored the Pistons 45 - 28 over those 12 minutes . Detroit tried to fight back in the final quarter and made things interesting for a while , but Washington held on and secured a big win on the road . Meanwhile , the Pistons lost their fourth straight and fell to .500 thanks to a 22 - 22 record . Six Wizards players scored in double digits , but undoubtedly the star was Kelly Oubre Jr. after he scored 26 points with five rebounds coming off the bench . Bradley Beal had 26 points as well . John Wall contributed a strong double - double of 16 points and 11 assists , and Otto Porter Jr. filled the stat sheet thanks to 16 points , seven rebounds , four steals , and three assists . Markieff Morris added 13 points and nine boards . Detroit had a balanced offense since six players scored over 10 points , but Andre Drummond was an absolute star . The big man finished with a line of 14 points , 21 rebounds , eight assists , two steals and two blocks before fouling out in the final minute of the game . Tobias Harris had 17 points , Ish Smith added 15 points with seven assists , and Luke Kennard had 16 points off the bench .
The Utah Jazz defeated the host Detroit Pistons , 98 - 95 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Wednesday evening . The first quarter was tight and finished with the score tied at 24 heading into the second . The Pistons picked it up in the second quarter , where they quickly got to a five - point lead and were able to hold on to take a 49 - 43 lead into halftime . The Pistons maintained control for most of the third quarter , until the Jazz tied it up at 61 with two minutes left in the quarter . The game remained close until the last seconds , where the Pistons led by two , with four seconds left in the game . However , the Jazz were able to pull off a quick bucket on an inbound play , that would send the game to overtime . The Jazz carried the momentum into OT , where they knocked down three three - pointers in the first 1:30 , to give themselves the cushion they needed to carry out the road win . Donovan Mitchell led the way for the Jazz with 15 points , five assists , four rebounds , two steals and a block , in 43 minutes . Rudy Gobert finished with 15 points , eight rebounds , four blocks and one assist , while Ricky Rubio tallied 11 points , 10 rebounds , five assists and one steal . The Jazz shot 40 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Andre Drummond had a massive game for Detroit , with 30 points on 11 - of - 17 shooting , 24 rebounds , six blocks , four assists and three steals , in 39 minutes . Tobias Harris finished with 13 points on 6 - of - 17 shooting , while Ish Smith chipped in 14 points , in 32 minutes off the bench . The Pistons shot 40 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 30 from long range . The Pistons ( 22 - 24 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Thunder on Saturday . The Jazz ( 20 - 28 ) take on the Raptors , in Toronto on Friday .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 125 - 114 , at Little Cesar 's Arena on Tuesday . Despite the fact that there were seven ties and eight lead changes , Detroit was in control for the majority of this game . Aside from a 36 - 26 second quarter , the Pistons outscored the Cavaliers by 21 points in the other three quarters , winning all three by at least six points . The key stat was scoring down low , with Detroit winning the points in the paint battle , 68 - 38 . The Pistons defense was also crucial , as they recorded 12 steals while Cleveland could only muster up two . They did that while shooting 53 percent and the Cavaliers hitting just 45 percent of their shots . The Cavaliers ( 29 - 20 ) suffered a devastating loss here , as Kevin Love left after four minutes with a broken left hand . LeBron James did all he could in his absence , as he collected 21 points , six rebounds and seven assists . Isaiah Thomas had one of his best games of the season , accruing 19 points , three rebounds and five assists . Channing Frye led the bench with 20 points while Dwyane Wade provided 18 points , eight rebounds and five assists . The Pistons ( 23 - 26 ) got a gem out of Andre Drummond , as he collected 21 points , 22 rebounds , seven assists , three steals and three blocks . Stanley Johnson scored a career - high 26 points to go along with 10 rebounds , four assists and two steals . Ish Smith finished with 19 points , two rebounds , seven assists and two steals while Anthony Tolliver amassed 20 points , four rebounds , four assists and two steals . Cleveland will have to play again on Wednesday , as they host to the Miami Heat . As for Detroit , Blake Griffin will make his debut on Thursday against the Memphis Grizzlies .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Miami Heat , 111 - 107 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Saturday evening . The Heat ( 29 - 24 ) were already facing adversity before the opening tip , as star big man Hassan Whiteside was ruled out with an illness earlier in the afternoon . His absence pushed Kelly Olynyk into the starting lineup , which actually did n't result in too much of a downgrade when it was all said and done . Miami came out of the gates strong as well , essentially matching the Pistons ( 25 - 26 ) basket for basket in the first quarter . The see - saw nature of the game endured straight through the fourth period , and following a 27 - foot three - point jumper by Wayne Ellington with 4:16 remaining , the visitors held a 99 - 96 lead . That 's when Detroit mounted the push that would lead them to victory , as they outscored Miami by a 15 - 8 margin from that point forward . The Heat would get as close as 108 - 105 with 32 seconds on the clock , but a relatively rare Ish Smith three - pointer off a Blake Griffin assist with 14 seconds left put the final nail in the coffin . Goran Dragic led the way for the Heat with 33 points , a total he supplemented with six assists , two rebounds , two steals and one block . Olynyk chipped in 19 points , eight rebounds , five assists and one steal , and his night could have been even bigger had he not gone 1 - for - 8 from three - point range . Josh Richardson matched Olynyk 's scoring total and added six assists , one rebound , three steals and one block . James Johnson poured in a bench - leading 18 points and complemented them with seven assists , five rebounds and two steals . Ellington tallied 11 points , five rebounds , one assist and two steals . Justise Winslow drew the start and was held scoreless , but he also pitched in six rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block over 24 minutes . Smith paced the Pistons with 25 points and also provided seven assists , four rebounds and one steal over 40 minutes . Andre Drummond followed with a 23 - point , 20 - rebound double - double that also included one assist , four steals and four blocks . Griffin managed 16 points , nine rebounds , seven assists and one steal . Stanley Johnson accounted for 13 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Anthony Tolliver and Langston Galloway both matched Johnson 's scoring total to co - lead the bench , with the former also hauling in five rebounds and dishing out one assist and the latter registering four assists and one block . The Heat head back home to face the intrastate rival Orlando Magic on Monday evening , while the Pistons remain home and await a visit from the Portland Trail_Blazers on Monday night as well .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers , 111 - 91 , at Little Ceasars Arena on Tuesday . The Pistons ( 26 - 26 ) did n't have problems to secure a huge win against the Blazers ( 29 - 25 ) to extend their winning run to four games , in what was an absolutely dominant performance from Detroit . They won the first quarter by two , and extended their advantage to six points by halftime . The Pistons pulled away for good in the third winning by six , and closed things out in the fourth with an eight - point advantage in the final 12 minutes . One of the biggest reasons why Detroit came away with the win was their accuracy from the field since they shot 51 from the field and 50 percent from three , as opposed to Portland 's 39 and 30 percentages , respectively . Blake Griffin delivered another strong performance on both ends of the court , as he finished with 21 points , nine rebounds , and six assists . Andre Drummond had 17 points , 17 rebounds , five assists and three blocks . Reggie Bullock had 13 points , six rebounds , three assists and three steals . Anthony Tolliver ( 15 points , seven boards ) and Langston Galloway ( 13 points , six assists ) had good outings off the bench as well . Damian Lillard led the Trail_Blazers with a 20 - point , five - rebound , five - assist performance . C.J . McCollum had 14 points , but he only shot 6 - of - 15 from the field . Al-Farouq Aminu had nine points and 13 rebounds . Jusuf Nurkic had 10 points , and Pat Connaughton contributed 11 points off the bench , and Ed Davis thrived on the glass after grabbing 10 rebounds in just 17 minutes .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 115 - 106 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Wednesday evening . The Pistons ( 27 - 26 ) remain one of the hottest teams in the NBA right now , and they have extended their winning run up to five games thanks to another convincing display against the Nets ( 19 - 37 ) who have dropped their last four right now . The Pistons grabbed a 26 - 21 lead after the first quarter , but Brooklyn made things closer with a 29 - 27 lead in the second quarter that made it a three - point game at the break . However , Detroit did not remove the foot off the gas , and won the remaining two quarters by three points each . Detroit destroyed Brooklyn on the paint , as they scored 60 points near the rim against Brooklyn 's 38 . Once again the duo of Blake Griffin and Andre Drummond led the way for the Pistons ; while the former Clippers star finished with 25 points and seven assists , Drummond owned the paint thanks to a 17 - point , 26 - rebound , four - steal , two - block performance . Stanley Johnson had 19 points , and Ish Smith filled the stat sheet thanks to 15 points , six rebounds , and four assists . The entire starting lineup of Brooklyn scored in double digits , although the main star was Allen Crabbe who finished with 34 points on 13 - of - 21 from the field and 6 - of - 13 from three - point range . Jarrett Allen chipped in with 13 points and 14 rebounds , while DeMarre Carroll had 14 points and 12 boards . Joe Harris added 18 points , five rebounds , and four assists . Spencer Dinwiddie contributed 12 points and 11 assists .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Detroit Pistons , 108 - 95 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Friday evening . This game between the Clippers ( 28 - 25 ) and the Pistons ( 27 - 27 ) marked the first time that Blake Griffin faced his former teammates , and for the most part it seemed as if Griffin was going to remain undefeated as a member of the Pistons . Both teams kept things close during the first three quarters , and the game headed into the final 12 minutes with a three - point advantage for the home team . But Los_Angeles came out of nowhere to record a 31 - 15 advantage in the fourth . That was enough to give them a huge win on the road , while putting Detroit back to .500 in a game they simply failed to close out . As it has been the trend all season long for the Clippers , Lou Williams led the way after scoring 26 points with six assists and four rebounds coming off the bench . Montrezl Harrell added 18 points in the second unit as well . Danilo Gallinari and Austin Rivers each had 16 points , while DeAndre Jordan was his usual self near the rim . He scored just four points , but grabbed 17 boards . Andre Drummond had a strong effort for the Pistons , finishing with 12 points , 17 rebounds and three blocks . Blake Griffin once again filled the stat sheet , and contributed 19 points , eight rebounds and six assists . Reggie Bullock had 19 points and five rebounds , while Ish Smith chipped in with 15 points and four assists . Anthony Tolliver had 12 points off the bench .

That gave them a solid foundation for a comfortable home victory if they simply held serve in the second half , which is precisely how the script played out . Both clubs came into the contest with designs on the postseason , but the Pistons ( 35 - 40 ) needed the win just a bit more . That 's because they actually remain on the outside of the Eastern_Conference playoff picture looking in for the moment , meaning that every victory they amass is of utmost importance . As was to be expected , the first half was hotly contested , ending in a 49 - 49 tie . The game turned in the third period , however , as Detroit outscored the Wizards ( 41 - 34 ) by a 32 - 17 margin . That allowed them to simply hold serve in the fourth quarter and emerge with a double - digit home victory . Team shooting played a pivotal part in the final outcome , as the Pistons ' 49 percent success rate comfortably outpaced Washington 's 42 percent figure . Bradley Beal led the Wizards with a modest 15 points and added five rebounds , one assist and two steals . Otto Porter , Jr. played only 16 minutes due to an in - game ankle sprain and produced seven points , two rebounds , two assists and one block . Andre Drummond paced the Pistons with a 24 - point , 23 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and one block . Anthony Tolliver drew the start for Blake Griffin ( ankle ) and tallied 14 points , two rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Reggie Bullock matched Tolliver 's scoring total and dished out three assists , hauled in one rebound and recorded one steal . Reggie Jackson contributed 13 points , eight assists and two rebounds . Stanley Johnson filled out the stat sheet with nine points , five rebounds , two assists and four steals . Henry Ellenson led the bench by matching Johnson 's scoring total and also delivered five rebounds and one assist . The Toronto Raptors defeated the Detroit Pistons , 108 - 98 , at Little_Caesars_Arena on Monday evening . The Raptors ( 59 - 22 ) came into Monday 's contest with the best of both worlds - - the top spot in the conference already sewn up and late - season momentum that was successfully warding off any complacency . The question was whether Toronto would be able to keep their motivation levels strong over the final two games , beginning with a road clash against the Pistons ( 38 - 43 ) . Early on , it appeared Detroit wanted it a bit more , as they forged a 60 - 57 halftime lead after an entertaining , back - and - forth first half . However , the visitors appeared to regroup at halftime , erasing their deficit with a 28 - point third quarter that left them holding a five - point lead entering the final period . The Raptors then used stellar defense to keep their hosts to just 18 points in the fourth , securing the victory . Toronto enjoyed a sizable advantage in shooting ( 53 percent - 45 percent ) and rebounding ( 48 - 33 ) on their way to the win . Eric Moreland pitched in 11 points , seven rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block . The Toronto Raptors defeated the Chicago Bulls , 117 - 101 , at Air Canada Center on Thursday . Toronto ( 10 ) was a double - digit favorite in this matchup against the depleted Bulls ( 0 - 1 ) and they showed why in this dominating victory . In fact , the Raptors had a 21 - point lead at the half and never allowed the Bulls to get within single - digits from there . They did most of that damage in the second quarter , outscoring Chicago , 33 - 14 . The difference in the game was rebounding , with Toronto winning that battle , 49 - 39 . The Raptors defense also came to play , holding the Bulls to 42 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . Free-throw shooting was also huge for Toronto , as they hit 26 - of - 28 in the victory . Injuries are really hurting Chicago right now , as they had no player score more than 18 points in this defeat . That was Robin Lopez , who led the way with 18 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Lauri Markkanen started in his rookie debut , amassing 17 points and eight rebounds . Justin Holiday finished with 15 points , four rebounds and two assists . Jonas Valanciunas led the way for Toronto , as he tallied 23 points and 15 rebounds . C.J . Miles finished second on the team in scoring , dropping 22 points off the bench . Kyle Lowry accrued 12 points , four rebounds and nine assists , while DeMar DeRozan totaled 11 points , sic rebounds and five assists . Both teams next game will be on Saturday , with Toronto hosting the Philadelphia 76ers and Chicago hosting the San_Antonio Spurs .

Washington won the first 12 minutes by a 32 - 17 score and even though the rest of the game was close , the Raptors ( 5 - 4 ) ultimately fell short of a comeback in front of their own fans . Washington managed to overcome the absence of John Wall , who missed the game with a shoulder injury , and gave Toronto their first home loss of the current campaign . Bradley Beal was the biggest star of the game for the Wizards . The Heat ( 23 - 17 ) came into the contest knowing they 'd be facing a short - handed Raptors ( 28 - 11 ) squad that would be without Kyle Lowry due to the All-Star guard 's back spasms . However , Miami had health issues of their own , as Tyler Johnson was announced as being out with a shoulder strain shortly before tipoff . The two teams would ultimately suffer further attrition to their respective troops when James Johnson and Serge Ibaka would get ejected for fighting in the third quarter . The visitors managed their adversity a bit better through the first three periods , as they entered the final 12 minutes holding a 72 - 64 lead . However , the home squad mounted a furious comeback , drawing closer with a 9 - 4 run over the first 3:31 of the fourth quarter and eventually taking an 89 - 88 lead with three seconds left . Miami 's Wayne Ellington put a crimp on any designs of a victory , though , driving in for a layup with less than one second on the clock . DeMar DeRozan , who took a whopping 29 shots in Lowry 's absence , then misfired on a potential game - winning three - pointer at the buzzer to seal the Heat 's upset win . Miles led the bench with nine points , brought in two rebounds and dished out one assist . The Heat remain on the road and tangle with the Indiana Pacers on Wednesday night , while the Raptors remain home and await a visit from the Cleveland Cavaliers on Thursday evening .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Toronto Raptors , 127 - 125 , at Air Canada Center on Saturday . This game was full of swings , as Golden_State looked like they would cruise after a dominant first half . In fact , the Warriors scored 81 points on 71 percent shooting in the first half , as they led by 27 points . Toronto then responded with a 71 - 46 second half to get the game down to the final seconds . The Warriors were able to hold off though , as Toronto never captured the lead or tied in the second half . The shooting disparity was the difference , with the Warriors shooting 59 percent , while holding the Raptors to just 49 percent shooting . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Golden_State recording six more assists than Toronto , while committing five fewer turnovers . The Warriors ( 35 - 9 ) leading scorer was Klay Thompson , as he amassed 26 points , three rebounds and two steals on 11 - of - 16 from the field . Kevin Durant finished with 25 points , six rebounds and five assists . Stephen Curry accrued 24 points , six rebounds and nine assists . Draymond Green collected 14 points , three rebounds and eight assists . The Raptors ( 29 - 12 ) were led by DeMar DeRozan , as he tallied 42 points , five rebounds and three assists . O.G . Anunoby totaled 17 points , three rebounds and two assists . Serge Ibaka accumulated 14 points and five rebounds , while Fred VanVleet led the bench with 13 points , five rebounds and four assists .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Detroit Pistons , 96 - 91 , at Air_Canada_Centre on Wednesday evening . The Raptors ( 30 - 13 ) were hitting on all cylinders early , jumping out to a 31 - 18 first - quarter lead . However , the Pistons ( 22 - 21 ) had the light come on for them in the second period , as they nearly clawed all the way back and trailed by a manageable 54 - 51 margin at the half . Detroit ultimately overtook Toronto and held a 79 - 75 advantage with 10:2 remaining in the contest following a Langston Galloway 24 - foot three - point jumper . However , the home squad then mounted a spirited comeback of their own , one that saw them on a 21 - 12 run the rest of the way to secure the victory . The stat sheet was close in a number of categories , but the Raptors did manage to win the rebounding battle by a 49 - 42 margin despite the Pistons ' Andre Drummond enjoying another dominant night on the glass . The big man paced Detroit with a 25 - point , 17 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and four steals . Avery Bradley posted 19 points , three rebounds , two assists and two steals . Tobias Harris supplied 12 points , four rebounds , three assists and three blocks . Galloway poured in 11 points and added one rebound , one assist and four steals . Ish Smith ( three points , five rebounds , five assists and one steal ) and Reggie Bullock ( two points , one rebound , one assist , two steals and one block ) both turned in underwhelming efforts . C.J . Miles led the Raptors with 21 points in 26 minutes off the bench . He added four rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block . Kyle Lowry turned in a full stat line of 18 points , nine boards , five assists and one steal . DeMar DeRozan registered 17 points , five assists and two rebounds . Jonas Valanciunas matched DeRozan 's scoring total and also hauled in 16 rebounds , dished out three assists and recorded one block . Serge Ibaka mustered only two points , three rebounds and one assist , while OG Anunoby matched his teammate 's line and tacked on one block . The Pistons head back home to take on the Washington Wizards on Friday night , while the Raptors remain home to face off with the San_Antonio Spurs on Friday evening as well .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 86 - 83 , at Air_Canada_Centre on Friday evening . The Raptors ( 31 - 13 ) have partly forged their stellar record through stalwart defense , particularly at home . Toronto had held two of their previous three opponents at Air_Canada_Centre to under 100 points , and with the Spurs ( 30 - 17 ) having less firepower than usual as a result of Kawhi Leonard 's absence due to his quadriceps injury , matters appeared to be looking up coming into Friday 's contest . The first quarter bore out that prognosis , although both offenses actually appeared stuck in neutral . However , Toronto was able to break through on the scoreboard in the second , leading to a 44 - 37 halftime lead . San_Antonio was able to bounce back offensively to an extent in the second half , but they never scored more than 23 points in any period . Bryn Forbes was able to get the visitors to within three with a spectacular 30 - foot bucket at the six - second mark , but the Raptors survived despite DeMar DeRozan missing two subsequent free throws . LaMarcus Aldridge paced the Spurs with a 17 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , two blocks and one steal . Pau Gasol produced 15 points , nine boards , three assists and one steal . Patty Mills followed with a bench - leading 13 points , a total he supplemented with four rebounds and one assist . Dejounte Murray and Forbes generated matching 10 - point tallies , with the former adding seven rebounds and dishing out one assist , and the latter supplying one rebound and one assist . Kyle Anderson mustered five points but also hauled in 11 rebounds and posted three assists , three blocks and two steals . Kyle Lowry led the Raptors with 24 points and added three rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . DeRozan registered 21 points , seven rebounds , six assists and one steal . Jonas Valanciunas managed a 15 - point , 11 - rebound double - double while also recording one steal . Serge Ibaka posted four points , seven rebounds and two assists . Pascal Siakam and C.J . Miles co - led the reserves with matching six - point efforts . OG Anunoby was held scoreless over 19 minutes but contributed five rebounds and recorded a pair of steals . The Spurs head back home to tangle with the Indiana Pacers on Sunday evening , while the Raptors hit the road to pay a Saturday night visit to the Minnesota Timberwolves .
The Utah Jazz defeated the host Toronto Raptors , 97 - 93 , at Air Canada Center on Friday evening . The Jazz got out to a great start on the road , as they took the lead right away and were up 30 - 24 after one . The Jazz maintained their lead for most of the second quarter , until the Raptors made a push in the final few minutes to take a 48 - 45 advantage heading into halftime . The Raptors came out strong in the third and pushed their lead to 10 , just 4 minutes into the quarter . However , the Jazz battled back to tie it up at 67 with two minutes left in the third , and then went on an 8 - 2 run to close out the quarter . The fourth quarter was back and forth , as the Raptors came back again and the teams exchanged small leads . Toronto had a six - point lead with two minutes remaining , but the Jazz made a final comeback capped by a clutch three - pointer by Ricky Rubio with five seconds left put them up by two and seal their second straight win . Donovan Mitchell led the Jazz with 26 points on 9 - of - 20 shooting , in 37 minutes . Rudy Gobert came up big with 18 points , 15 rebounds , three assists , two blocks and one steal , in 31 minutes . Rubio finished with 14 points , six assists , six rebounds and two steals . The Jazz shot 41 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 21 from long range . Meanwhile , Jonas Valanciunas led the way for the Raptors , with 28 points , 14 rebounds , four blocks , two assists and one steal , in 27 minutes of action . DeMar DeRozan tallied 19 points , eight assists , six rebounds and two steals , while Serge Ibaka added 10 points and 10 rebounds . Kyle Lowry had a rough shooting night , going 2 - of - 14 from the field . The Raptors shot 39 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 27 from long range . The Raptors ( 32 - 15 ) will look to bounce back when they play host to the Lakers on Sunday . The Jazz ( 21 - 28 ) play host to the Warriors on Tuesday .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the visiting Los_Angeles Lakers , 123 - 111 , at Air Canada Center on Sunday evening . The Raptors got out to a good start at home as they built up a 10 - point lead during the first quarter , before the Lakers tightened the gap to a 28 - 21 Toronto lead , heading into the second . The Lakers continued to battle but could not overtake the lead , as the Raptors pushed their lead back to double digits and hung on to take a 59 - 49 lead into halftime . The Raptors carried their dominance into the second half , as they expanded their lead through the third quarter and into the fourth , where they went up by 20 , with 7:20 left in the game . From there , the Raptors cruised to 18th home win of the season . DeMar DeRozan led the Raptors with 19 points on 7 - of - 18 shooting , seven assists , one rebound and a steal , in 29 minutes . Jonas Valanciunas tallied 13 points and 10 rebounds , while Kyle Lowry added 14 points , 11 rebounds , three assists and one steal . The Raptors shot 50 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Julius Randle led the Lakers with 17 points , 10 rebounds and five assists , in 24 minutes of action . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope finished with 16 points on 5 - of - 13 shooting , while Brandon Ingram added 14 points , six rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block . Larry Nance Jr. chipped in 15 points , eight rebounds , two assists and two steals , in 25 minutes of the bench . The Lakers shot 44 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 26 from long range . The Lakers ( 19 - 30 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Magic in Orlando on Wednesday . The Raptors ( 33 - 15 ) play host to the Timberwolves on Tuesday .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Boston Celtics , 111 - 91 , at Air_Canada_Centre on Tuesday evening . The battle of the two top teams in the Eastern_Conference projected to be a heavyweight fight on paper , but it ended up resembling more of a third - round technical knockout , even with the return of All-Star point guard Kyrie Irving ( thigh ) . The game did live up to its billing early , as the Raptors ( 37 - 16 ) forged a modest 22 - 18 first - quarter lead . However , the second period proved to be their launchpad , as they racked up an impressive 36 points while also limiting the Celtics ( 39 - 16 ) to just 19 . The 21 - point cushion Toronto entered halftime with proved to be more than enough , as the hosts played suffocating defense for all four quarters . Boston only managed to drain 40 percent of their 83 attempts , and the Raptors also goaded them into 17 turnovers while limiting their highest individual scoring tally to 18 . Terry Rozier was the Celtics player responsible for that point total , and he added five rebounds , four assists and two steals in 24 minutes off the bench . Irving managed 17 points and three assists over 22 minutes . Marcus Morris produced 12 points , two rebounds and one assist . Jaylen Brown poured in 11 points and also supplied six boards , two assists and one block . Daniel Theis registered 10 points , two rebounds and one assist . Jayson Tatum and Al Horford had surprisingly unproductive efforts , with the former posting four points and one rebound , and the latter accounting for just two points , six rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Aron Baynes turned in six points , eight boards and one assist . Kyle Lowry paced the Raptors with 23 points , eight rebounds , four assists and two steals . C.J . Miles followed with a bench - leading 20 points , which he complemented with two assists and one rebound . DeMar DeRozan went for 15 points , six assists , three rebounds and one steal . Delon Wright led the second unit with 14 points and also totaled three assists , two rebounds and three steals . Fred VanVleet was productive off the bench as well with 10 points , eight assists , three rebounds and one steal . Serge Ibaka scored eight points , hauled in five rebounds and dished out one assist . Jonas Valanciunas mustered just two points but brought down seven boards , dished out one assist , recorded one steal and posted one block . The Celtics remain on the road and head to the Nation 's Capital to face off with the Washington Wizards on Thursday evening , while the Raptors remain home and tangle with the New_York Knicks on Thursday night as well .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Detroit Pistons , 123 - 94 , at Air Canada Center on Monday . This was as lopsided of a result as you 'll see in the NBA , as Toronto led by at least 20 points for the final 20 minutes of action . In addition , Toronto won all four individual quarters , as a 64 - 39 second half really put the game away . The shooting disparity was huge , with the Raptors connecting on 53 percent from the field while the Pistons hit just 38 percent of their shots . Much of that damage was done through ball movement , with Toronto handing out 31 assists and Detroit recording just 20 . Defensive rebounding was also critical , with the Raptors winning that battle , 41 - 29 . The Pistons ( 29 - 31 ) got a double - double out of Andre Drummond , as he collected 18 points , 18 rebounds , two assists , four steals and three blocks . Ish Smith totaled 16 points , three rebounds and two assists . Blake Griffin finished with just 12 points , one rebound and five assists . Dwight Buycks led the bench with 12 points , four rebounds and four assists . The Raptors ( 42 - 17 ) were led by DeMar DeRozan , as he tallied 20 points , seven assists and two steals . Kyle Lowry matched those 20 points , adding six rebounds and four assists to his line . Serge Ibaka amassed 19 points , nine rebounds and two steals . Pascal Siakam led the bench with 11 points , five rebounds , six assists and two blocks . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , with Detroit playing host to the Milwaukee Bucks and Toronto traveling to face the Orlando Magic .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 103 - 98 , at Air_Canada_Centre on Sunday evening . The Raptors ( 45 - 17 ) knew they 'd have an opportunity to put a little more distance between themselves and the No . 2 - seeded Boston Celtics with a win , which they 'd come into Sunday 's play leading by 2 games for the top spot in the Eastern_Conference . Toronto figured they 'd have to fend off what would likely be an increasingly desperate Hornets ( 28 - 36 ) squad that was trying to stop a modest two - game losing skid that nevertheless threatened their already thin playoff hopes . Sure enough , Charlotte played a scrappy first half , but the hosts ' superior level of talent helped them forge a 52 - 45 lead . The visitors continued to nip at their heels in the third period , but a 30 - 26 advantage for the home squad during the quarter gave them an 11 - point edge heading into the final 12 minutes . An impressive 12 - 3 Hornets run over the first 5:4 that shrunk their deficit to a mere four points caught the attention of the Raptors , which were able to outscore Charlotte by a razor - thin 18 - 17 margin the rest of the way to secure the hard - fought home victory . The Hornets were largely done in by some substandard shooting , as they managed a mediocre 38 percent success rate from the field while yielding a 42 percent figure to the Raptors . Kemba Walker frequently overcame Kyle Lowry 's stingy defense to lead the way for Charlotte with 27 points , a total he supplemented with six rebounds , four assists and one steal . Jeremy Lamb followed with a bench - leading 16 points and added two assists , one rebound , one steal and one block . Frank Kaminsky tallied 15 points , four boards and one steal . Dwight Howard posted a 10 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and one block . Nicolas Batum filled out the stat sheet with 10 points , eight assists , six rebounds , one steal and one block . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist provided eight points and four rebounds . DeMar DeRozan paced the Raptors with 19 points and eight assists , while also hauling in four rebounds and recording one steal . Jonas Valanciunas managed an 18 - point , 13 - rebound double - double and also registered two blocks and one steal . Serge Ibaka poured in 17 points and ripped down eight rebounds . He also compiled three blocks and one steal . Kyle Lowry turned in 14 points , 10 rebounds and five assists . C.J . Miles and Fred VanVleet co - lead the bench with matching 12 - point efforts , with the former also generating two rebounds and one assist and the latter also accounting for three rebounds and three assists . The Hornets head back home and take on the Philadelphia 76ers on Tuesday evening , while the Raptors remain home and await a visit from the Atlanta Hawks on Tuesday night as well .

This game was extremely competitive until the final minutes , as a 30 - 13 fourth quarter gave the Raptors an easy win . Until the middle of the fourth quarter , there were 11 ties and 17 lead changes in total , with neither team leading by more than eight points . Bench production was the difference for Toronto , as they outscored Atlanta 's bench , 47 - 30 . Turnovers were a huge factor for the Raptors , as they forced 22 from the Hawks while committing just 12 on their end . Free-throw shooting was also a decisive statistic , with Toronto connecting on 28 - of - 33 and Atlanta hitting just 16 - of - 21 . The Hawks ( 20 - 45 ) had no player reach 15 points , as Kent Bazemore led the team with 14 points , five assists and two steals . The Toronto Raptors defeated the Houston Rockets , 108 - 105 , at Air_Canada_Centre on Friday . The Raptors ( 48 - 17 ) knew they needed a perfect performance to dismantle the Rockets ( 51 - 14 ) and that 's exactly what happened this Friday . Thanks to an impressive first quarter where Toronto jumped to a comfortable 32 - 16 advantage , the Canadian franchise managed to control the rest of the game and ended winning against one of the hottest teams in the entire Association . Houston won the remaining three quarters ( 27 - 26 , 32 - 25 and 30 - 25 , respectively ) but their shooting struggles ( 33 percent from deep and 70 percent from the charity stripe ) conspired against them and Toronto sealed the deal with a couple of key defensive plays late in the fourth quarter . Kyle Lowry led the way for the Raptors with an impressive performance of 30 points , six assists , and three rebounds . DeMar DeRozan contributed with 23 points , seven boards , and two assists . Jonas Valanciunas chipped in with 14 points , 10 rebounds , three assists and two steals . Clint Capela and Trevor Ariza each had 13 points , although the Swiss big man also added 13 boards and two steals . Eric Gordon had 14 points coming off the bench despite shooting just 5 - 14 from the field .

In fact , there were 12 ties and 12 lead changes in total , with neither team leading by more than 11 points . A late run capped it off for Toronto , as they ended the game on a 13 - 3 spurt . Rebounding was critical for the Raptors , as they outrebounded the Mavericks , 45 - 36 . Free-throw shooting was equally as important , with Toronto connecting on 26 - of - 31 and Dallas hitting just 13 - of - 18 . The Toronto Raptors defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 116 - 112 , at Air_Canada_Centre on Friday . The Raptors ( 54 - 19 ) had an impressive come - from - behind performance in this game against a combative Nets ( 23 - 50 ) team that never gave up . In fact , Brooklyn had a one - point lead ( 32 - 31 ) after the first quarter , a five - point ( 64 - 59 ) lead at the break , and a seven - point advantage ( 91 - 84 ) heading into the final minutes . It seemed the Nets were on their way to escape with a huge win against the top - seeded team in the Eastern_Conference , but Toronto came out of nowhere to pull a comeback . In fact , the Raptors won the final quarter ( 32 - 21 ) and that was enough to secure the win in a tougher - than - expected game . Kyle Lowry delivered a huge triple - double for the Raptors , as he finished with 25 points , 12 assists and 10 rebounds . The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the Toronto Raptors , 117 - 106 , at Air_Canada_Centre on Sunday evening . The Clippers ( 39 - 34 ) came into Sunday 's contest in desperation mode with respect to their postseason aspirations . They 'd dug themselves a hole by dropping five of six games , and they were facing a team in the Raptors ( 54 - 20 ) that had dropped only six of 36 home dates coming in . After Toronto forged a solid 60 - 53 halftime advantage , it appeared all it might take to put Los_Angeles away was a strong third quarter . However , it was the visitors who turned the tables , erasing their deficit to head into the final period knotted up at 80 - 80 . They kept coming , ultimately racking up 37 points in what was their best quarter of the game and surging to an impressive 11 - point win . A pivotal factor was ball security , as the Clippers won the turnover battle by a 14 - 8 margin . Lou Williams paced the Clippers with 26 points in 35 minutes off the bench , and he added seven assists , two rebounds , one steal and one block . Tobias Harris followed with 20 points , five boards , two assists and one block . Montrezl Harrell poured in 19 points and added six rebounds . Milos Teodosic registered 15 points , four rebounds and one assist . Austin Rivers delivered 11 points , four assists , one rebound and four steals . DeAndre Jordan mustered nine points and ripped down 14 rebounds . He also recorded an assist and a steal . Wesley Johnson matched his scoring total and also posted three rebounds , one steal and one block . Jonas Valanciunas and Fred VanVleet co - led the Raptors with matching 16 - point tallies . The former added 10 rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block , while the latter also recorded two assists off the bench . Pascal Siakam generated 15 points , six rebounds and one assist . Serge Ibaka finished with 12 points , eight rebounds and one block . Kyle Lowry and DeMar DeRozan pitched in matching 11 - point efforts . Lowry also handed out eight assists , recorded six rebounds and posted one steal , while DeRozan added seven assists and two rebounds while shooting just 3 - for - 12 . C.J . Miles matched their scoring totals off the bench and also pulled in one board . The Clippers head back home for a Tuesday night battle with the Milwaukee Bucks , while the Raptors remain home and await a visit from the Denver Nuggets that same evening .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Denver Nuggets , 114 - 110 , at Air_Canada_Centre on Tuesday . The Nuggets ( 40 - 35 ) and the Raptors ( 55 - 20 ) played a very intense game that went down to the wire , and in fact this one was n't decided until the final minutes . Toronto jumped ahead to a 25 - 23 advantage in the first quarter , but Denver answered back and they won the upcoming two quarters , 35 - 33 and 27 - 24 , respectively . This led to a three - point advantage for the Nuggets heading into the final frame , but Toronto answered back when it mattered the most and a 32 - 25 edge in the final 12 minutes lifted them to a key four - point win that solidified their position at the top of the Eastern_Conference standings . Meanwhile , the Nuggets lost a key game in their path to make the postseason in the East . Toronto had seven players scoring in double digits in this game . Three players led the way with 15 points , as DeMar DeRozan , Jonas Valanciunas and Fred VanVleet each reached that tally . Serge Ibaka had 13 points with six rebounds , while Kyle Lowry added 11 points , eight assists and four rebounds . Pascal Siakam ( 12 points ) and Jakob Poeltl delivered 12 points and eight rebounds . Paul Millsap added 20 points , but only grabbed three rebounds . Will Barton had 10 points , but only made four of his 15 shooting attempts . Trey Lyles added 13 points and five rebounds coming off the bench . Jamal Murray also added 17 points .

It was Toronto 's defense that won the game , as they held Boston to just 33 percent from the field and 14 percent from three - point range . In addition , the Raptors forced 16 turnovers from the Celtics , while out - assisting them 23 - 10 . The second quarter really set the tone , with Toronto winning it 29 - 13 and holding at least a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half . The Celtics ( 53 - 25 ) were led by Al Horford , as he tallied 16 points and four rebounds . The Toronto Raptors defeated the Indiana Pacers , 92 - 73 , at Air Canada Center on Friday . Toronto won this game in wire - to - wire fashion , as a 26 - 14 first quarter really set the tone for the Raptors . In fact , Indiana never got the game within a nine - point margin for the entirety of the second half , in addition to Toronto holding at least a 15 - point lead for the whole of the fourth quarter . Defense was key for the Raptors , as they held the Pacers to under 30 percent from the field . Toronto ended up connecting on 43 percent of their shots while out - assisting Indiana , 27 - 16 . Defensive rebounding was also a huge factor , with the Raptors winning that battle , 43 - 32 . The Raptors ( 57 - 22 ) have now secured homecourt advantage throughout the Eastern_Conference playoffs , as this will be their first time ever landing the top - seed in the east . Serge Ibaka led the way in this one , as he amassed 25 points and eight rebounds on 10 - of - 13 from the field . DeMar DeRozan accrued 12 points , five rebounds , eight assists and two steals . Kyle Lowry collected nine points , five rebounds and nine assists . The Pacers ( 47 - 33 ) had no starter score more than five points , as Victor Oladipo finished with just five points , three rebounds , two assists , three steals and two blocks . Glenn Robinson III led the team with 12 points on 4 - of - 7 shooting off the bench . Trevor Booker also provided 11 points and six rebounds off the bench as well . Both teams return to action on Sunday , with Toronto playing host to the Utah Jazz and Indiana traveling to face the Charlotte Hornets .

The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the host Houston Rockets , 115 - 107 , at Toyota_Center on Monday . Philly held the lead from start to finish during Monday 's contest . The first and third quarters were decisive , with Philly outscoring Houston 71 - 51 in those 24 minutes . The shooting disparity was huge , with the Sixers hitting 55 percent of their shots while holding the Rockets to just 40 percent shooting . Philadelphia also outrebounded Houston 48 - 35 , while winning the assist differential 28 - 17 . The Sixers ( 3 - 4 ) were led by Ben Simmons , who accumulated 24 points , seven rebounds and nine assists . Joel Embiid tallied 22 points , nine rebounds , five assists and two steals . The Houston Rockets defeated the Utah Jazz , 137 - 110 , at Toyota_Center on Sunday . This game was over early , as Utah could n't get within an eight - point margin for the final three quarters . In fact , Houston led by 11 at the end of the first quarter , 18 at the half and 30 points headed into the fourth quarter , James Harden was the star of the show , as he dropped a career - high 56 points on 19 - of - 25 shooting . No one on Houston could be stopped , as they hit 59 percent from the field ( 48 - of - 81 ) and 59 percent from three - point range ( 23 - of - 39 ) . Rebounding was a big factor as well , with the Rockets winning that battle , 42 - 33 . The Jazz ( 5 - 5 ) had all five starters score in double figures , but none of them surpassed 13 points . That was Rudy Gobert , who tallied 13 points and five rebounds . Derrick Favors accrued 12 points , two rebounds and three steals . Donovan Mitchell was their best player , as he accumulated 17 points , four rebounds and four assists off the bench .
