Utah are hosting the Philadelphia 76ers on Tuesday for their next game , while Houston host the Cleveland cavaliers on Thursday for their next matchup .
The Houston Rockets defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers , 117 - 113 , at Toyota_Center on Thursday night . The Rockets ( 9 - 3 ) played a bit sloppy and their shooting was far from accurate , but they still managed to come out on top against a resilient Cleveland ( 5 - 7 ) team that refused to surrender despite being down for the majority of the game . The Cavaliers held a 67 - 65 at the break , but the Rockets answered with a 35 - 26 lead in the following 12 minutes to build a seven - point advantage heading into the fourth . They would never relinquish that lead and even though the Cavs fought back , Houston came out on top in the end in one of the most contested games of the regular season so far . James Harden led the Rockets with a stellar offensive effort , as the All-Star guard finished with 35 points , 13 assists and 11 rebounds . Clint Capela added a double - double of 19 points and 13 boards , while Eric Gordon chipped in with 20 points . P.J . Tucker ( 11 points ) and Nene ( 10 points ) produced nicely off the bench as well . Meanwhile , LeBron James paced Cleveland 's offense with 33 points , seven assists and four boards , but his strong effort was n't enough . Jeff Green displayed a solid effort off the bench with 27 points and five rebounds , while Kevin Love ( 17 points ) and J.R. Smith ( 15 ) scored in double digits as well . Dwyane Wade was a disappointment , however , as he only accounted for eight points . Cleveland 's next game will be against the Dallas Mavericks on Saturday , while the Rockets will take on the Indiana Pacers on Sunday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 111 - 96 , at Toyota_Center on Saturday . In a battle between two title contenders , Houston showed Memphis who the superior team is . In fact , this was a wire - to - wire win for the Rockets , as they led by at least 13 points for the final 20 minutes , The first and third quarters is where Houston made their money , as they outscored the Grizzlies , 64 - 42 . Three-point shooting really carried Houston , as they went 16 - of - 45 from three - point range , while holding the Grizzlies to just 6 - of - 20 . The Grizzlies ( 7 - 5 ) were led by Tyreke Evans , as he provided 22 points , five rebounds , six assists and three steals off their bench . Marc Gasol led the starters with 12 points , nine rebounds and three assists . Mike Conley accrued 12 points and five assists . The Rockets ( 10 - 3 ) got another vintage performance out of James Harden , as he collected 38 points , four rebounds and eight assists . Eric Gordon totaled 26 points , two rebounds and two assists . Clint Capela scored just seven points , but still amassed 14 rebounds , three assists , two steals and three blocks . Houston will have to play again on Sunday , as they travel to face the Indiana Pacers . As for Memphis , they travel to face the Milwaukee Bucks on Monday ,
The Houston Rockets lost to the visiting Toronto Raptors , 129 - 113 , at Toyota_Center on Tuesday evening . The Raptors ( 8 - 5 ) put on a show on Houston , and surprisingly managed to outscore one of the best offensive teams in the entire league . Even though the Rockets ( 11 - 4 ) never stopped trying and only gave up when the game was out of reach , most of the win should be credited directly to Toronto 's impressive performance on the offensive end of the court . The main difference in the game came in the second quarter , when a 45 - 31 scoring run from the Raptors gave them a 76 - 64 lead at the break . They would never relinquish that lead , and ended pulling quite an upset on the road as a result . DeMar DeRozan led the Raptors ' offense with an impressive scoring output of 27 points , six rebounds and five assists . Kyle Lowry contributed with a double - double of 19 points and 10 assists , and Jonas Valanciunas added 12 points and seven boards . Two other players contributed heavily off the bench , as C.J . Miles ( 19 points ) and Delon Wright ( 14 points ) did a good job with the second unit . On the other hand , James Harden was the absolute star for the Rockets as he almost finished with a triple - double thanks to 38 points , 11 assists and six rebounds , although he also committed nine turnovers . Trevor Ariza added 20 points with eight boards , and Tarik Black added 13 points off the bench . Eric Gordon chipped in with 12 points , although he went 0 - for - 7 from three - point range .
The Houston Rockets made short work of the Denver Nuggets , 125 - 95 , at Toyota_Center on Wednesday evening . The Rockets ( 14 - 4 ) played the role of schoolyard bully from the jump , building a 36 - 15 lead after one quarter and extending that to a 75 - 40 advantage by halftime . As the final score implied , Houston enjoyed advantages across the stat sheet , but perhaps nowhere more pronounced than in the shooting categories . The home squad drained 55 percent of their 82 field - goal attempts , including 44 percent from behind the arc . Meanwhile , they limited the Nuggets ( 10 - 8 ) , who earlier in the day learned they 'd be without star forward Paul Millsap ( wrist ) for an indefinite period , to just 39 percent shooting overall . Will Barton paced Denver with 20 points , a total he supplemented with six rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks . Nikola Jokic posted 17 points , six rebounds , three assists , two steals and one block . Gary Harris provided 13 points , one rebound and four steals . Juancho Hernangomez , Mason Plumlee and Malik Beasley generated a trio of nine - point tallies off the bench . Wilson Chandler shifted over to power forward in Millsap 's stead but only mustered two points , five rebounds , one assist and one block . Trevor Ariza 's 25 points led the Rockets , and he added two rebounds and two steals . Chris Paul enjoyed his best game in a Rockets uniform thus far , contributing a 23 - point , 12 - assist double - double that also included two rebounds and three steals . James Harden registered 21 points , nine assists and eight rebounds . P.J . Tucker totaled a modest seven points but also hauled in 11 rebounds . Luc Mbah_a_Moute and Nene Hilario each posted 13 points off the bench , with the former adding five rebounds , one assist and four steals , and the latter supplying five assists , four rebounds , one steal and one block . The Nuggets will try to shake off the blowout loss in a home date against the Memphis Grizzlies on Friday night , while the Rockets are home against the New_York Knicks on Saturday night .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Brooklyn Nets 117 - 103 on Monday at Toyota_Center . The Rockets ( 16 - 4 ) managed to take advantage of banged up and undermanned Brooklyn squad and dominated Monday 's contest from start to finish . The first quarter could n't have gone any better for Houston , as James Harden shot 100 percent from the field and scored 20 points in the first 12 minutes , and that helped open up a 17 - point lead after the first period . Harden and the Rockets never let up from there , and Harden finished with a game - high 37 points , 10 rebounds and eight assists in 36 minutes . As a team , Houston shot an incredible 50 threes and managed to make 20 of them , and they continue to be one of the most effective three - point shooting teams in the league . As for the Nets ( 7 - 13 ) , they came into Monday 's game with a plethora of injuries , as Rondae Hollis-Jefferson ( ankle ) , DeMarre Carroll ( illness ) , Allen Crabbe ( back ) and D'Angelo Russell ( knee ) all inactive . Five Brooklyn players still managed to score in double figures , with Isaiah Whitehead leading the way off the bench with a surprise outing . The former Seton Hall star shot an impressive 10 - of - 16 from the field en route to scoring a team - high 23 points in 28 minutes . It was the first time all season that the guard played more than 15 minutes , and he took full advantage of the opportunity . As a team , the Nets shot a solid 46 percent from the field , but hit just 25 percent of their shots from downtown . Up next , the Rockets will look to extend their winning streak to six games Wednesday against the Pacers , while the Nets will head to Dallas on Wednesday to take on the Mavericks .
The Houston Rockets defeated the visiting New_Orleans Pelicans , 130 - 123 , at Toyota_Center on Monday evening . The Rockets ( 21 - 4 ) pushed their winning streak to 10 games with a huge win over a Pelicans ( 14 - 14 ) team that made things difficult for Houston . In fact , the Pelicans came into the fourth quarter with a seven - point advantage , but Houston erased that lead with a strong comeback in the final 12 minutes to keep their winning run alive . The Rockets won the final quarter 34 - 20 , once again proving they can perform on crunch time regardless of the opponent . James Harden was the biggest star for the Rockets with a huge offensive performance , as the All-Star guard finished with a strong double - double of 26 points and 16 assists . Clint Capela added 28 points with eight rebounds and five blocks , and Chris Paul made a strong impact on both ends of the court since he finished with 20 points , eight rebounds , six assists , and four steals . Eric Gordon added 27 points off the bench , too . The Pelicans did n't have Anthony Davis , but the scoring came from other sources in this one . Jrue Holiday scored 37 points with five assists , four rebounds and five steals , while and E'Twaun Moore added 36 points . Rajon Rondo contributed with a triple - double of 13 points , 12 assists and 12 boards , and DeMarcus Cousins also came close to one . He finished with 24 points , 13 rebounds , and eight assists .
The Houston Rockets rolled past the visiting Charlotte Hornets , 108 - 96 , at Toyota_Center on Wednesday night . Houston ( 22 - 4 ) owns the league 's best record as well as an impressive 11 - game win streak . On Wednesday , the team showcased its first - place offense , scoring 108 points while knocking down 17 three - pointers . Veteran point guard Chris Paul delivered what was arguably his best performance in a Rockets uniform , scoring 31 points while dishing out 11 assists . Paul headed up a solid Rockets guard rotation , including MVP candidate James Harden and reigning Sixth Man of the Year Eric Gordon . Harden contributed 21 points in the win , despite having a relatively inefficient night at just 8 - of - 22 from the field . Gordon came off the bench for an additional 17 points . Charlotte ( 10 - 17 ) has disappointed early in the season , and has now lost five of its last seven games . The Hornets struggled again on Wednesday , falling behind by a wide margin fairly early in the game . Houston had pulled ahead by 15 by the end of the first quarter , and held a double - digit lead for almost the entirety of the remainder of the game . While Charlotte saw strong play from starting center and former Rocket Dwight Howard , the team still struggled to make anything happen on offense . Howard had an impressive eight offensive rebounds and 26 points , but the team could not follow his lead . The Hornets shot just 41 percent from the field and had only 12 total offensive boards . Charlotte will host the Miami Heat on Friday , while Houston will play host to the San_Antonio Spurs .
The Houston Rockets breezed by the powerhouse San_Antonio Spurs at Toyota_Center on Friday , winning 124 - 109 . Houston ( 23 - 4 ) has been a seemingly unstoppable force since superstar point guard Chris Paul made his return to the lineup in mid - November . The team not only holds the league 's best record , but also owns an NBA-best 12 - game win streak . The Rockets have yet to lose a game with Paul in the lineup . On Friday , the team showed why , cruising past the always - tough San_Antonio Spurs thanks to 28 - point performances from both Paul and MVP contender James Harden . In addition to his explosive scoring output , Paul tallied eight assists and a season high of seven steals . Paul and Harden were key components of a dominant first quarter for Houston , as the team was able to hop out to a double - digit lead within the first 10 minutes of play . Houston never relinquished the lead , despite allowing 37 points in the fourth quarter . The Spurs hold the best record of any opponent yet beaten by Houston on their current win streak . San_Antonio ( 19 - 10 ) still sits at third in the Western_Conference , but was beaten handily on Friday night . Superstar Kawhi Leonard , who recently returned from a quad injury , was active in the game but saw only 17 minutes of play . Still , the two - time Defensive Player of the Year was unable to slow down an early onslaught from the top - ranked Houston offense . Leonard finished with 12 points , two blocks , and two steals , but was minus - nine in his time on the floor . Only two Spurs saw more than 21 minutes of play on the night , and only bench guard Bryn Forbes eclipsed 30 . Veteran All-Star LaMarcus Aldridge led the starting five with 27 minutes of play and 16 points . Houston will face Milwaukee on the second half of a back - to - back this Saturday . San_Antonio , meanwhile , will complete their Texas series by hosting the Dallas Mavericks .
The Houston Rockets defeated the visiting Milwaukee Bucks , 115 - 111 , at Toyota_Center on Saturday evening . This marks the 13th straight win for the Rockets , who have yet to lose since Chris Paul 's return to the lineup weeks ago . After a back and forth first quarter the Rockets came out ahead 28 - 25 . The teams traded baskets through the second quarter until the score was all tied up at 55 at halftime . The Rockets led by as many as 11 in the third but the Bucks cut that lead to 84 - 79 heading into the final frame . The Rockets pulled away quickly , expanding their lead to 10 , five minutes into the quarter . From there they were able to maintain their lead to the finish . This marks the third straight loss for Milwaukee . James Harden led the way for the Rockets with 31 points on 8 - of - 21 shooting , six rebounds , five assists and one block , in 39 minutes . Chris Paul followed up with 25 points , six assists , five rebounds and one steal , in 36 minutes . P.J . Tucker added 10 points , 10 rebounds , two steals and one assist , in 37 minutes , while Trevor Ariza chipped in 13 points and seven rebounds . The Rockets shot 46 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 35 from long range . Meanwhile , Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for the Bucks with 28 points on 10 - of - 22 shooting , nine rebounds , five assists and four steals , in 42 minutes . Khris Middleton added 23 points , six rebounds , two assists and two steals , in 34 minutes , while Eric Bledsoe finished with 19 points , three rebounds , one assists , one steal and one block . The Bucks shot 46 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 27 from long range . The Bucks ( 15 - 13 ) have a couple of days off before they go on to play host to the Cavs on Tuesday . The Rockets ( 24 - 4 ) play host to the Jazz on Monday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Houston Rockets , 122 - 116 , at Toyota_Center on Wednesday . The Lakers ( 11 - 18 ) delivered one of their best performances of the season against arguably the top team in The Association , and once again they showed they can compete with any team in the league when they are clicking . The Lakers jumped to a 15 - point advantage after the first quarter , but the Rockets ( 25 - 5 ) stormed back and made it a four - point game heading into halftime . Los_Angeles held on , however , and won the remaining two quarters by one point each to close things out . Houston never gave up , but the Lakers secured a huge win that should boost the team 's confidence going forward , while the Rockets saw their winning streak come to an end at 14 games . Kyle Kuzma stood out for the Lakers , as the rookie led the offense with a spectacular 38 - point , seven - rebound , four - assist performance that also represented his career high scoring - wise . Lonzo Ball contributed with 16 points , nine rebounds and five assists , while Brandon Ingram added 13 points , six boards , and six dimes . Corey Brewer did a good job off the bench as well , as the veteran finished with 21 points in 25 minutes . James Harden did everything he could to avoid Houston 's loss , but his impressive performance ( 51 points and nine assists ) simply was n't enough for the Rockets . Eric Gordon added 21 points despite the fact he shot 8 - of - 21 from the field , and Trevor Ariza chipped in with 18 points , 11 rebounds , and four steals . Chris Paul struggled , however , as the veteran point guard finished with just eight points and five assists .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 148 - 142 , in double overtime at Toyota_Center on Sunday evening . The Rockets ( 26 - 9 ) likely got more than they bargained for from a feisty Lakers ( 11 - 24 ) squad , as they saw a 44 - 37 first - quarter lead evaporate and turn into a 72 - 65 halftime deficit . Houston found itself in an even deeper 101 - 90 hole entering the fourth quarter , but a 10 - 4 run over the first 5:13 of the period helped them get within striking distance . Ultimately , Gerald Green , who entered the game for an injured James Harden ( hamstring ) at the 44 - second mark , drained a 24 - foot three - point jumper with 17 seconds remaining to knot the score at 122 and send the contest into overtime . Brandon Ingram drained two clutch free throws with less than one second remaining in the first overtime following a P.J . Tucker foul to send the game to a second extra period . Tucker then made up for his gaffe with go - ahead basket that snapped a 142 - 142 tie with five seconds left in the second overtime , and followed it up with a block of a Kyle Kuzma three - point attempt on the subsequent possession to help snuff out the Lakers ' last hope . Julius Randle paced the Lakers with a 29 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included six assists and one block . Josh Hart drew the start and generated 26 points , six rebounds , one assist and one steal before fouling out after 37 minutes . Kuzma managed 23 points , five boards , three assists and two blocks . Tyler Ennis supplied a 20 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included four rebounds and two steals . Ingram registered 12 points , six rebounds , four assists and one steal . Corey Brewer led the second unit with nine points , six rebounds , four assists and one block . Harden managed 40 points , 11 assists , two boards , two steals and two blocks before his exit . Chris Paul posted a 28 - point , 10 - assist double - double that also included six rebounds . Trevor Ariza pitched in a season - high 26 points and supplemented it with four boards , three assists and two steals . Eric Gordon paced the bench with 14 points , while Green poured in 10 and added three rebounds and two steals in 22 minutes on the second unit . Clint Capela totaled seven points , seven rebounds , two assists and three blocks in 32 minutes before fouling out . The Lakers head north to kick off 2018 against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Monday night , while the Rockets head to the Sunshine State to face off with Orlando Magic on Wednesday evening .

The Warriors ( 31 - 8 ) and the Rockets ( 27 - 10 ) were set to play one of the most interesting games of the season , and the game lived up to the expectations . Houston jumped ahead in the first quarter , and they actually got a one - point advantage at halftime . However , the Warriors answered back in the third quarter , and they never looked back . Golden_State grabbed the lead in the third quarter , and sealed the deal in the fourth with a 10 - point lead over the final 12 minutes . Golden_State 's impressive second - half performance pulled them to a huge win on the road . Draymond Green registered a triple - double , as he finished with 17 points , 14 rebounds , and 10 assists . Klay Thompson added 28 points , and the bench played a huge role as well . David West chipped in with 12 points , while Nick Young added 11 points . The Rockets did n't have James Harden , but several players picked up the slack on the offensive end . Eric Gordon got the start at shooting guard , and he delivered a 30 - point , seven - assist performance . Chris Paul did n't get a triple - double , but he filled the stat sheet properly after registering 28 points , nine assists , and seven boards . The Houston Rockets defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers , 121 - 112 , at Toyota_Center on Wednesday evening . The Rockets ( 29 - 11 ) apparently are learning how to play without James Harden ( hamstring ) , and they delivered a solid performance at home in what was a must - game win for them considering their recent struggles . In fact , Houston cruised their way during the first half , jumping to a six - point lead after the first quarter and a 10 - point advantage at half time . Even though the Trail_Blazers ( 22 - 19 ) decided to fight back in the second half and made things difficult for Houston at times , in the end the Rockets survived and secured the win , ending Portland 's three - game winning streak . The Rockets enjoyed a great performance from Chris Paul , as the veteran point guard had a vintage game with 37 points , 11 assists , and seven rebounds . The Houston Rockets defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves 116 - 98 on Thursday at Toyota_Center . While James Harden 's return from a hamstring injury did n't go as smoothly as planned for the All-Star guard , the Rockets ' supporting cast did more than enough to carry the team to victory . Mainly , Eric Gordon was unstoppable from the perimeter , hitting 7 - of - 13 shots from behind the arc en route to scoring a game - high 30 points in 35 minutes off the bench . Four other Rockets managed to score in double figures , including Clint Capela , who scored 20 points in 26 minutes . Harden , meanwhile , shot just 3 - of - 15 from the field and scored just 10 points in 26 minutes in what was his first start after a seven - game absence . In the end , it was business as usual for the Rockets on the offensive side of the ball , as they hit a scorching 44 percent from behind the arc . The Timberwolves ( 29 - 18 ) were unable to have the same offensive success Thursday night , and their record away from home dropped to 11 - 12 . Jimmy Butler led the way scoring with a team - high 23 points , while Karl-Anthony Towns recorded yet another double - double with 22 points and 16 rebounds . Only two other Minnesota players managed to score in double figures , with Andrew Wiggins adding 16 points on just 5 - of - 12 shooting from the field and Tyus Jones adding another 13 off the bench . Up next , the Rockets will remain home Saturday to take on the Warriors again , while the Timberwolves will look to end their two - game slide on Saturday against the Raptors .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Phoenix Suns , 113 - 102 , at Toyota_Center on Sunday afternoon . The Rockets ( 35 - 13 ) came in as the clear favorites on paper , but the Suns ( 17 - 33 ) were seemingly ready to match them blow for blow in the first quarter . Houston lost Trevor Ariza to a left leg injury after he 'd logged just one minute on the court , but they still emerged from the first 12 minutes with a 28 - 24 lead . The feisty visitors continued nipping at their heels in the second period , allowing them to keep their halftime deficit to a manageable 60 - 53 margin . However , the home squad generated a second straight 32 - point quarter in the third while limiting Phoenix to 24 points , allowing them to build what would prove to be an insurmountable 15 - point cushion heading into the final quarter . The Suns had an early exit of their own , as center Greg Monroe got the hook after being whistled for a second technical foul in the third quarter . Despite the 11 - point margin of victory for the hosts , both teams were virtually even across the major categories on the stat sheet , with each hauling in 43 rebounds and committing 12 turnovers apiece . The most notable disparity came in bench production , as the Rockets second unit outscored the Suns reserves , 44 - 31 . Devin Booker bounced back from a couple of underwhelming outings to lead the way for the Suns with 31 points , a total he supplemented with 10 assists and three rebounds . T.J. Warren followed with 24 points and added five rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Isaiah Canaan generated a bench - leading 12 points along with two assists and one rebound . Tyson Chandler produced an 11 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included one assist . Monroe accounted for eight points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals in 16 minutes before his ejection . Troy Daniels ( three points , two rebounds ) and Marquese Chriss ( two points , five rebounds , two steals and one block ) both underachieved on the first unit . James Harden paced the Rockets with a near triple - double of 27 points , 10 rebounds , eight assists , two steals and one block . Chris Paul supplied 17 points , five assists and two rebounds . Ryan Anderson registered 13 points and two boards . Luc Richard Mbah_a_Moute and Eric Gordon had matching 13 - point tallies off the bench themselves , with the former also contributing two rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block , and the latter pitching in five boards , two assists and one steal . Clint Capela posted a 10 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included one steal . Gerald Green and Nene Hilario were productive off the bench with matching eight - point efforts . The Suns remain on the road and head to the Volunteer State for a Monday night showdown with the Memphis Grizzlies , while the Rockets remain home and await a Tuesday evening visit from the Orlando Magic .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Orlando Magic , 114 - 107 , at Toyota_Center on Tuesday evening . The Rockets ( 36 - 13 ) and the Magic ( 14 - 35 ) played a game that was far more contested than what anyone would have expected before tip - off . In fact , Orlando managed to grab the lead after the first quarter , and the game was pretty close to the point that Houston had a two - point advantage heading into the final 12 minutes . The Rockets showed their experience in the final 12 minutes , and managed to close things out effectively although they needed a record - breaking performance from James Harden to pull away against a notoriously inferior opponent . James Harden stole the show with a 60 - point , 11 - assist and 10 - rebound performance , but he also broke a few records in the process since he became the first player in NBA history to record a triple - double with 60 points , and also broke the franchise 's record for points in a single game . Harden had some help , however , as Ryan Anderson ( 10 points ) , Clint Capela ( 12 points and 13 rebounds ) and Gerald Green ( 13 points ) did a good job as well . Six Orlando players scored in double digits , but unfortunately that was n't enough to win . Mario Hezonja and Marresse Speights led the way with 17 points , while Shelvin Mack and Jonathon Simmons had 15 points each . Mack added six rebounds and four assists as well . D.J . Augustin had 13 points , and Evan Fournier had 12 points with five assists .
The Houston Rockets defeated the visiting Denver Nuggets , 130 - 104 , at Toyota_Center on Friday evening . The Rockets took control right from the start , as they got out to an early 11 - 4 lead , before closing out the first quarter ahead 35 - 23 . They maintained the upper hand through the second quarter , where they were able to expand their lead to 17 , up 63 - 46 by halftime . The Nuggets could not catch a break , as the Rockets came out on fire again in the third , and expanded their lead yet again , so that the led 97 - 70 heading into the final frame . The Nuggets actually outscored the Rockets by one in the fourth , but by that point it was far too little , too late , as the Rockets made off with their seventh straight win . James Harden led the way for the Rockets with 28 points , 11 assists and seven rebounds , in just 27 minutes . Clint Capela came up large with 23 points , 25 rebounds and two blocks , in 28 minutes , while Chris Paul was quiet with 11 points , seven assists and two steals , in 22 minutes . The Rockets shot 50 percent from the field , including 19 - of - 41 from long range . Meanwhile , Trey Lyles was the high - point man for the Nuggets , with 24 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting , in 27 minutes off the bench . The Houston Rockets defeated the Sacramento Kings , 100 - 91 , at Toyota_Center on Wednesday evening . If one had been going solely on statistics , an argument could have been made for the Kings ( 18 - 39 ) not even bothering to show up Wednesday . The Rockets ( 44 - 13 ) came in not only tied for the top spot in the Western_Conference , but with an impressive 22 wins in 28 home dates as well . Meanwhile , Sacramento limped into the contest having lost four of their previous six games and ranked near the bottom of the NBA in several key categories . None of that seemed to matter once tip - off occurred , however , as the visitors jumped out to a surprising 25 - 20 first - quarter lead . That seemed to slap the hosts back to reality , as they responded with a 35 - point second period to take a 55 - 45 advantage into halftime . Such a surge would normally have put away a team like the Kings on the road , but to their credit , they clamped down on defense in the third , holding the home squad to a stingy 17 points during the period while putting a modest one - point dent into their deficit . They ultimately matched Houston bucket for bucket in the final 12 minutes as well , yet that only left them with the same nine - point deficit they 'd entered the quarter with at the final buzzer . Sacramento even managed to outshoot their superior opponents by a 44 percent - 40 percent margin , but they commited 17 turnovers to the Rockets ' 13 . Bogdan Bogdanovic 's 20 points , which he supplemented with five assists , four rebounds and two steals , paced the Kings . Garrett Temple managed a bench - leading 13 points and also supplied seven boards and four assists . Willie Cauley-Stein generated 12 points , eight rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block . Justin Jackson matched Cauley-Stein 's point total and also registered five boards , four assists and two blocks . Buddy Hield accounted for 12 points of his own while also hauling down four rebounds , dishing out one assist and recording one steal . De'Andre Fox tallied nine points , three assists , two rebounds and one steal . Jakarr Sampson produced seven points , seven rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . James Harden paced the Rockets with 28 points , a total he complemented with nine rebounds , nine assists , two steals and one block . Chris Paul was next with 19 points , seven assists , four rebounds and two steals . Clint Capela posted a 13 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included one assist , two blocks and one steal . Luc Richard Mbah_a_Moute poured in 11 points and added three boards , one assist and one block . P.J . Tucker rounded out a successful night for the starting five with 10 points , seven rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block . Newly-signed Joe Johnson led the bench with nine points . The Kings will resume play following the All-Star break with a home date against the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Thursday , Feb. 22 . The Rockets are back on the court the following night against the Timberwolves at Toyota_Center .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Boston Celtics , 123 - 120 , at Toyota_Center on Saturday . This game was full of swings , as it came down to the buzzer to determine a winner . In fact , neither team ever attained a double - digit lead , as there were nine ties and 14 lead changes in total . Houston executed when it mattered most , as they finished the game on a 16 - 7 run . Defense was the difference for the Rockets , as they recorded 10 steals and five blocks while forcing 12 turnovers from the Celtics . Houston 's ability to get to the free - throw line was critical as well , as they hit 26 - of - 30 while Boston connected on 19 - of - 21 . Fastbreak points was also a huge factor , with the Rockets winning that battle , 20 - 2 . The Celtics ( 44 - 20 ) had all four bench players reach double figures , with Marcus Morris leading the team with 21 points , four rebounds and three steals . Greg Monroe provided 18 points , six rebounds and two blocks while Terry Rozier amassed 17 points and three rebounds . Kyrie Irving led the starters with 18 points , three rebounds and six assists . Al Horford accrued 10 points , six rebounds and three assists . This marks the Rockets ( 49 - 13 ) 15th - straight win , as they continue to remain tops in the Western_Conference . Eric Gordon led Houston in scoring , as he tallied 29 points and three rebounds on 7 - of - 11 from three - point range . James Harden was the player of the game , as he collected 26 points , seven rebounds , 10 assists and five steals . Trevor Ariza accumulated 21 points , three rebounds , two assists and three steals . Clint Capela scored just eight points but grabbed a team - high 17 boards . On deck for Boston is a road matchup versus the Chicago Bulls on Monday . As for Houston , they travel to play the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Tuesday for their next fixture .
The Houston Rockets defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 109 - 93 , at Toyota_Center on Monday evening . The Spurs ( 37 - 30 ) came into Monday 's contest facing even more of an uphill climb than teams entering Toyota_Center usually do . San_Antonio knew it would be without offensive linchpin LaMarcus Aldridge , who was sitting out the contest with a sore knee . They 'd be challenged to make up for the offensive vacuum created by his absence , but knew that savvy veteran Rudy Gay had the tools to provide a strong performance in the sidelined star 's stead . As it turned out , while the visitors were able to keep it reasonably close in the first half , they were systematically worn down by a superior Rockets ( 53 - 14 ) unit that got James Harden back after he 'd sat out the previous night 's contest due to his own knee issue . The game essentially turned for good in the third quarter , as the hosts expanded what had been a 54 - 45 halftime lead to a 19 - point advantage heading into the final 12 minutes . They got it done on both ends of the floor , limiting San_Antonio to 41 percent shooting while draining 49 percent of their own shots . Derrick White and Bryn Forbes paced the Spurs with matching 14 - point efforts off the bench , with the former adding four rebounds , one assist and one block , and the latter supplying three assists , two rebounds and one steal . Gay was serviceable while registering 13 points and five boards . Dejounte Murray mustered seven points , four rebounds , three assists and one steal . Kyle Anderson produced six points , one rebound and one assist . Pau Gasol could n't step up in Aldridge 's absence , managing just four points , four rebounds and one assist . Harden led the way for the Rockets with 28 points , a total he supplemented with six rebounds and six assists . Chris Paul poured in 18 points and also dished out nine assists , hauled in three rebounds and recorded one steal . Trevor Ariza tallied 15 points , five rebounds and one assist . Gerald Green totaled a bench - leading 14 points and also brought down nine rebounds , recorded one steal and posted one block . Clint Capela had a near double - double of 13 points , nine rebounds , one steal and one block . P.J . Tucker drew another start at power forward and contributed four points , seven rebounds and three steals . The Spurs return home and tangle with the Orlando Magic on Tuesday night , while the Rockets remain home and await a Thursday night visit from the Los_Angeles Clippers .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 101 - 96 , at Toyota_Center on Thursday evening . The Rockets ( 54 - 14 ) have made losing a rarity with their stellar play this season , but they knew they 'd likely have their hands full Thursday with a Clippers ( 37 - 30 ) squad that had already dealt them two of their 14 defeats on the season , including one on Houston 's home floor . The first half played out accordingly , as the Clippers parlayed a 28 - 26 first - quarter lead into a 51 - 47 halftime advantage . The deficit seemed to wake up the home squad , which bounced back with a game - high 31 points in the third period to take a four - point edge of their own into the final period . Los_Angeles clawed back to tie it at 80 - 80 within the first two minutes of the fourth , but the Rockets would n't relinquish the lead again after that point . The visitors actually shot better ( 45 percent , as compared to Houston 's 39 percent ) and won the turnover battle by an 11 - 9 margin , but a 39 - point effort by the hosts ' second unit - - which included 23 from sixth man extraordinaire Eric Gordon - - made a key impact . Tobias Harris paced the Clippers with another strong performance , posting 29 points , eight rebounds , three assists and one block across 40 minutes . Austin Rivers provided 20 points , three rebounds and three assists . Lou Williams tallied 14 points , six boards , three assists and one steal . Montrezl Harrell poured in 10 points to lead the bench and also delivered five rebounds . DeAndre Jordan mustered a modest eight points but ripped down 18 rebounds , dished out two assists and recorded a pair of blocks . James Harden led the way for the Rockets with 24 points , seven assists , five rebounds , one steal and one block . Gordon added six rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block to his aforementioned bench - leading scoring haul . Clint Capela shook off a thumb injury to offer a 19 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included one steal and a game - high six blocks . Chris Paul collected 11 points , four rebounds and three assists . Luc Richard Mbah_a_Moute was productive off the second unit as well with 10 points , four boards , two assists and one block . Trevor Ariza and P.J . Tucker could only tally five and three points , respectively , but they helped make up for it with eight rebounds apiece . The Clippers remain on the road and head to Oklahoma_City for a Friday night date with the Thunder , while the Rockets visit the New_Orleans Pelicans for a Saturday night showdown .
The Houston Rockets defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 114 - 91 , at Toyota_Center on Saturday . Houston took control early on in this game , as it was a wire - to - wire victory . In fact , the Rockets took a 29 - 16 lead after the first quarter and carried a 27 - point lead into the half . Defensive rebounding was a huge factor for the Rockets , as they outrebounded the Pelicans on that end , 43 - 34 . The shooting disparity was critical as well , with Houston hitting 48 percent of their shots while holding New_Orleans to under 40 percent from the field . Three-point shooting was a huge part of that , with the Rockets connecting on 18 - of - 47 and the Pelicans hitting just 6 - of - 21 . The Pelicans ( 43 - 31 ) were led by Anthony Davis , as he tallied 25 points , eight rebounds , two steals and four blocks . Jrue Holiday accrued 10 points , four rebounds , four assists and two steals . E'Twaun Moore totaled eight points , six rebounds , two assists and four steals . Cheick Diallo led the bench with 15 points , nine rebounds and two assists . The Rockets ( 59 - 14 ) were led by James Harden , as he collected 27 points , six rebounds and eight assists . Eric Gordon finished with 19 points , four rebounds , four assists and two steals . Clint Capela accumulated 18 points , 16 rebounds , three steals and six blocks . Gerald Green and Ryan Anderson combined for 30 points to lead the bench . On deck for Houston is a home matchup versus the Atlanta Hawks on Sunday . As for New_Orleans , they return to action on Tuesday when they play host to the Portland Trail_Blazers .
The Houston Rockets breezed by the Atlanta Hawks , 118 - 99 , at Toyota_Center on Sunday . It was a wire - to - wire win for the Rockets ( 60 - 14 ) , who clinched the first 60 - win season in the history of their franchise with Sunday 's win . Superstar guard James Harden was , per usual , the driving force behind the win . Harden had 18 points , 15 assists , and 10 rebounds while playing only three quarters thanks to Houston 's commanding lead . The Rockets poured in a whopping 20 three - pointers in Sunday 's blowout . High-volume three - point shooting has become the norm for Houston , as the team is on pace to shatter the all - time record for three - pointers in a single season . Chris Paul was sidelined by hamstring soreness for the second straight game , but Houston 's offense still fired on all cylinders . Six players scored in double digits in the win , including all five starters . Veteran wing Gerald Green led the team with 25 points in 32 minutes on the floor . Reigning Sixth Man of the Year Award winner Eric Gordon contributed another 22 points to the comfortable win . Atlanta ( 21 - 53 ) , meanwhile , did not see the same level of success from three - point range . The team went just 11 - of - 40 from beyond the arc and struggled to find reliable offense . Taurean Prince led the team with 28 points , and Isaiah Taylor added another 26 . Still , it was a below - average offensive night for the Hawks , who shot only 44 percent overall . Houston will host the Chicago Bulls on Tuesday , while the Hawks will visit Minnesota on Wednesday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the visiting Chicago Bulls , 118 - 86 , at Toyota_Center on Tuesday evening . The Rockets got out to a good start at home , leading for just about the entire first quarter and building a 31 - 23 lead heading into the second . They kept a double - digit cushion through the second quarter and pushed their lead to 21 by halftime , where they led 60 - 39 . The third quarter was more of the same , as Houston cruised along to expand their lead to 30 , 87 - 57 , entering the final frame . The Bulls poured in 29 points in the fourth quarter , but were still outscored by the Rockets , 31 - 29 , in the quarter . This marks the 10th straight win for the Rockets , and their 61st win of the season . Eric Gordon led the way for Houston , with 31 points on 11 - of - 17 shooting , in 26 minutes . Chris Paul tallied 13 points , 10 assists , four rebounds and four steals , in 27 minutes , while Trevor Ariza finished with 21 points , six rebounds , four steals , two assists and one block , in 26 minutes . The Rockets shot 44 percent from the field , including 18 - of - 57 from long range . James Harden ( rest ) did not participate in the contest . Meanwhile , Lauri Markkanen led the Bulls with 22 points , four rebounds , two assists and one block , in 27 minutes . Noah Vonleh added 10 points , 12 rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 26 minutes off the bench . Denzel Valentine chipped in 12 points , four rebounds , three assists and two steals , in 29 minutes off the bench . The Bulls shot 38 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 37 from long range . The Bulls ( 24 - 50 ) will look to avoid a seventh straight loss , as they take on the Heat in Miami on Thursday . The Rockets ( 61 - 14 ) play host to the Suns on Friday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Phoenix Suns , 104 - 103 , at Toyota_Center on Friday . The Suns ( 19 - 58 ) were only seconds away from pulling a major upset against the top team in the NBA , the Houston Rockets ( 62 - 14 ) but they fell short in their attempt after Houston won the game in the final play of the fourth quarter . Phoenix got off to a better start and led 25 - 22 after one and 57 - 40 at the break , but the Rockets did n't give up . A 35 - 29 third quarter made things close , and Houston ended rallying to secure the win following a 29 - 17 fourth - quarter performance . Houston was down 101 - 103 with only 1 seconds left on the clock , but a corner three - pointer from Gerald Green paved the way for a huge Houston win . James Harden had a huge performance and he fell just two rebounds away from a triple - double , since he finished the game with 28 points , 10 assists , and eight rebounds . P.J . Tucker had 18 points , while Gerald Green delivered 15 points aside from the game - winning bucket . Joe Johnson did a great job off the bench , finishing with 16 points , six rebounds and three assists in just 21 minutes of action . Rookie sensation Josh Jackson had another great performance and he paced Phoenix 's offense with 27 points , six rebounds , and two steals . Troy Daniels had a strong performance since he had 23 points and four boards . Marquese Chriss finished with a strong double - double of 12 points and 11 rebounds . Tyler Ulis also had a double - double after racking up 16 points and 12 assists .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Washington Wizards , 120 - 104 , at Toyota_Center on Tuesday . This was yet another dominating victory for the Rockets , as they won this game in wire - to - wire fashion . In fact , Houston led by 22 points at the half , as Washington never got the game within a single - digit margin in the second half . Defense was key for Houston , as they recorded 13 steals and three blocks while winning the turnover differential , 17 - 9 . Rebounding was also critical , with the Rockets winning the rebounding battle , 46 - 36 . Houston also dominated down low , outscoring Washington in the paint , 48 - 28 . The Wizards ( 42 - 36 ) were led by Bradley Beal , as he tallied 27 points , four rebounds and three assists on 10 - of - 15 from the field . Markieff Morris amassed 14 points , six rebounds and four assists . John Wall did collect nine points , four rebounds and 10 assists , but committed eight turnovers and went just 3 - of - 10 from the field . The Rockets ( 63 - 15 ) got another near triple - double out of James Harden , as he accumulated 38 points , 10 rebounds and nine assists on 12 - of - 18 from the field . Clint Capela was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 21 points , 10 rebounds and two blocks on 9 - of - 10 shooting . Luc Richard Mbah a Moue scored just nine points but recorded a game - high six steals . Gerald Green led the bench with 16 points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals . Both teams return to action on Thursday , with Houston playing host to the Portland Trail_Blazers and Washington traveling to face the Cleveland Cavaliers .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the host Houston Rockets , 108 - 102 , at Toyota_Center on Saturday . In a game that meant much more to the Thunder than the Rockets , Oklahoma_City was able to prevail late in comeback fashion . In fact , the Thunder rode a 28 - 19 fourth quarter to victory , as they held the Rockets to just 40 points in the second half . There were eight ties and 12 lead changes in total though , as neither club led by more than 11 points . Offensive rebounding was huge for the Thunder , as they won that battle , 15 - 6 . Turnovers were also huge , with Houston committing 17 of them while forcing just 11 from Oklahoma_City . The Thunder went 26 - of - 33 from the free - throw line as well while the Rockets hit just 16 - of - 23 . The Rockets ( 64 - 16 ) were led by James Harden , as he collected 26 points , four rebounds and nine assists . Chris Paul amassed 17 points , four rebounds and nine assists . P.J . Tucker generated 16 points , 10 rebounds and three assists . Gerald Green led the bench with 14 points , four rebounds and two blocks . The Thunder ( 46 - 34 ) were led by Russell Westbrook , as he tallied 24 points , seven rebounds , 10 assists and four steals . Paul George accrued 24 points , six rebounds , four assists and two steals . Carmelo Anthony finished with 22 points and six boards . Steven Adams totaled 12 points , eight rebounds and three assists . On deck for Oklahoma_City is a road matchup versus the Miami Heat on Monday . As for Houston , they travel to face the Los_Angeles Lakers on Tuesday for their next outing .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Minnesota Timberwolves 107 - 99 at AT & T Center on Wednesday . The Spurs rallied behind LaMarcus Aldridge in the season opener , as Kawhi Leonard ( quad ) starts the season on the sideline nursing an injury leftover from last season . Aldridge powered San_Antonio ( 10 ) in the first half against the new look Timberwolves ( 0 - 1 ) , who re - tooled by adding Jimmy Butler , Jeff Teague and Jamal Crawford in the offseason . Aldridge finished with 25 points , 10 rebounds , four assists and two blocks on 9 - of - 21 shooting . The Timberwolves were playing from behind in the second half , but received some life from Crawford , who made a handful of driving layups and aided the scoring by getting to the foul line , making the contest close down the stretch . Crawford logged 24 minutes and scored 10 points off the bench , while Andrew Wiggins , fresh off a newly signed 5 - year contract extension , led the starters with 26 points on an efficient 9 - of - 14 shooting . Karl-Anthony Towns was a force on the glass , posting 18 points and 13 rebounds , while Jimmy Butler tallied 12 points , four rebounds and three assists in his Wolves debut . Next up , the Timberwolves will host the Utah Jazz on Friday , while the Spurs visit the Chicago Bulls on Saturday .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Toronto Raptors , 101 - 97 , at AT & T Center on Monday evening . The game was tight the whole way , as the Spurs ( 30 ) and Raptors ( 2 - 1 ) exchanged the lead multiple times . However , the Spurs were able to take advantage of 20 Toronto turnovers to help them take the edge . Both teams struggled shooting from beyond the arc , but the Spurs dominated the glass , out - rebounding the Raptors , 56 - 33 . Five players scored in double digits for San_Antonio , led by LaMarcus Aldridge , who finished with 20 points , eight rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block , in 36 minutes . Danny Green hit some big shots on his way to 17 points , in 33 minutes , while Dejounte Murray made a big impact with 16 points , 15 rebounds and six assists , in 28 minutes . Rudy Gay added 11 points off the bench . Meanwhile , DeMar DeRozan led the way for the Raptors with 28 points , on 10 - of - 20 shooting , in 36 minutes . The next highest scorers for the Raptors were Serge Ibaka and C.J . Miles , with 13 points each . Kyle Lowry shot only 3 - of - 11 from the field , and finished with eight points , three assists and two rebounds , in 34 minutes . Jakob Poeltl was solid off the bench , with 10 points , 12 rebounds and three blocks . The Raptors will have their work cut out for them once again as they take on Golden_State for a contest on Wednesday . The Spurs will be in Miami to play the Heat on Wednesday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the host San_Antonio Spurs , 112 - 92 , at AT & T Center on Thursday . Despite the fact that San_Antonio got out to a 19 - point lead in the first quarter , the Warriors showed why they 're champs by coming back in dominating fashion . In fact , Golden_State outscored San_Antonio , 88 - 59 , across the final three quarters . Defense was key for Golden_State , as they held San_Antonio to 39 percent shooting , while the Warriors ended up shooting 52 percent from the field . Ball movement was also huge for the Warriors , as they out - assisted the Spurs , 30 - 19 . A 24 - 7 fastbreak differential was also important for Golden_State . The Warriors ( 7 - 3 ) got another vintage performance from Kevin Durant , who accrued 24 points , eight rebounds , five assists and three blocks . Klay Thompson led the team in scoring , totaling 27 points , three rebounds and two assists . Stephen Curry collected 21 points , eight rebounds , four assists and three steals . Draymond Green accumulated 16 points , five rebounds and seven assists . The Spurs ( 4 - 4 ) were led by LaMarcus Aldridge , who tallied 24 points , 10 rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks . Kyle Anderson amassed 16 points , seven rebounds , four assists and two blocks . No other player on the roster had more than 11 points . San_Antonio will remain home to play the Charlotte Hornets on Friday for their next game . As for Golden_State , they travel to play the Denver Nuggets on Saturday for their next fixture .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Charlotte Hornets , 108 - 101 , at AT & T Center on Friday evening . Hornets led by six with 5:20 left in the third quarter but the Spurs turned the tables with a 22 - 7 run late in the quarter to take a nine - point lead into the final frame . San_Antonio managed to hang on to the lead for the entire fourth quarter , ending their four - game losing streak . The Hornets saw their three - game winning streak come to an end . The Spurs ' ( 5 - 4 ) bench accounted for 64 points on the night , as Bryn Forbes led the way with a team - high 22 points in 22 minutes off the bench . Rudy Gay followed up with 20 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals in 27 minutes off the bench , while Manu Ginobili and Dejounte Murray added 10 points each . Meanwhile , four starters scored in double digits for the Hornets ( 5 - 4 ) , as Jeremy Lamb led the way with 27 points on 10 - of - 15 shooting , along with nine rebounds , six assists and two steals in 35 minutes . Dwight Howard followed up with 20 points and 13 rebounds in 31 minutes , while Kemba Walker finished with 13 points on 4 - of - 12 shooting . The Hornets will take on the Timberwolves in Minnesota on Sunday . The Spurs play host to the Suns on Sunday .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Phoenix Suns , 112 - 95 , at AT & T Center on Sunday evening . The Spurs ( 6 - 4 ) woke up right when they needed to , and even though they cuised their way in the second half , things were not as easy as the scoreline indicated . The Suns ( 4 - 6 ) were in control of the game through the majority of the first half and they held a 55 - 51 at the halftime break . But the Spurs bounced back in the third quarter , and after winning that period 34 - 13 they never looked back . Phoenix could not get close in the fourth , and San_Antonio ended winning rather easily to push their winning streak to two . As it has been the case during the entire campaign , LaMarcus Aldridge once again paced the Spurs ' offense with 21 points ( on 9 - of - 13 from the field ) and eight rebounds . Patty Mills added 17 points , and Danny Green finished with 14 . Four San_Antonio bench players scored in double digits , so it was a true team effort in this one . The second - unit contributions were highlighted by the play of Rudy Gay ( 12 points ) and Dejounte Murray ( 13 points and six rebounds ) . On the other end , T.J. Warren was the Suns ' leading scorer with 17 points and five rebounds . Rookie Mike James had 10 points , and Troy Daniels added 14 off the bench . But the biggest disappointment was the play of Devin Booker , as the star guard could n't do much against the Spurs ' stingy defense and only finished with nine points on 3 - of - 11 from the field .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Los_Angeles Clippers , 120 - 107 , at AT & T Center on Tuesday evening . The Spurs ( 7 - 4 ) conquered their third straight win on the heels of an impressive shooting performance from long range . San_Antonio hit 54 percent of their three - pointers , and ultimately that made a difference against a Clippers ( 5 - 5 ) team that lost their third straight contest . Meanwhile , the Spurs are quietly building a decent winning streak of their own , since they registered their third straight win after dropping four straight a few days ago . The Clippers lost their fifth game out of their last six contests . As it has been the trend all season long , LaMarcus Aldridge led the offense for San_Antonio . The veteran power forward finished with 25 points ( on 10 - of - 19 from the field ) and also added six rebounds . Pau Gasol came close to add a double - double thanks to 19 points , eight rebounds and six assists , while Danny Green contributed with 24 points . Rudy Gay added 22 off the bench , giving the Spurs a much - needed scoring threat in the second unit . On the other hand , the Clippers featured Austin Rivers as their top scorer . The guard finished with 24 points , while Blake Griffin chipped in with 15 points , 10 rebounds and six assists . DeAndre Jordan finished with 11 points and seven boards . Lou Williams added a nice scoring output off the bench , finishing with 17 points in 28 minutes of action .
The San_Antonio Spurs dominated the Chicago Bulls on route to an easy 133 - 94 win at AT & T Center on Saturday night . San_Antonio ( 8 - 5 ) entered this game as massive favourites and they lived up to the expectations with a dominating effort against a struggling Bulls ( 2 - 9 ) that did n't have answers to what the Spurs offered . Gregg Popovich 's men jumped to a 37 - 15 lead after the first quarter , and they would never relinquish that advantage . Chicago tried to make it a close game at half time as the score read 63 - 47 for San_Antonio , but the Spurs pushed the tempo in the second half and ended winning with absolute ease . Eight Spurs players scored in double figures in this one , as San_Antonio was clicking on all cylinders during the entire game . Pau Gasol led the way with a strong 21 - point , 10 - rebound effort , while LaMarcus Aldridge added 14 points with seven rebounds and Kyle Anderson had 13 points . Dejounte Murray produced nicely off the bench with 17 points , five assists and four rebounds , while Davis Bertans ( 16 points ) , Rudy Gay ( 15 ) and Brandon Paul ( 15 points , five boards and four assists ) did a good job as well . On the other hand , Robin Lopez led the way for Chicago with 17 points and four rebounds , although the rest of the starting lineup failed to make much of an impact . Some of the Bulls ' top scoring production came off the bench thanks to Bobby Portis ( 17 points and six rebounds ) and Kris Dunn ( 15 points ) . But the team struggled overall , as they only shot 26 percent from three while commiting 13 turnovers and grabbing 28 boards against San_Antonio 's 44 .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Oklahoma_City Thunder , 104 - 101 , at AT & T Center on Friday night . This comeback win will surely go down as one of the best wins for San_Antonio ( 10 - 6 ) not only during the current season , but of the past few years as well . The Spurs lost the first quarter by 17 points and were down by 23 at one point in the second , but they never backed down . They reduced the difference to seven points at the half , evened things up after three , and pulled away late in the fourth despite a few sloppy defensive mistakes . The win allowed the Spurs to reach double - digit wins , while the Thunder ( 7 - 8 ) once again fell below the .500 mark . LaMarcus Aldridge was the star of the game for the Spurs , as the power forward carried the team offensively and finished with 26 points and eight rebounds . Danny Green added 17 points with six boards and four assists , while Pau Gasol contributed with 14 points , eight rebounds , and four assists of his own . Kyle Anderson did a good job as well since he contributed with 10 points , six assists , and three boards . On the other hand , Carmelo Anthony led the Thunder with 20 points , six rebounds and three assists , while Russell Westbrook came quite close from reaching another triple - double since he ended the game with 15 points , nine boards , and nine assists . Paul George left his mark as well after adding 18 points , eight rebounds and five assists . Steven Adams had 16 points and seven boards .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 96 - 85 , at AT & T Center on Monday evening . After a tight first quarter , the Spur led 24 - 22 , thanks to the go - ahead , buzzer - beating two - pointer by Manu Ginobili . The momentum carried over , as the Spurs expanded their lead through the second quarter , bringing their lead to 46 - 38 , by halftime . The Hawks battled back and managed to close the gap to make it a five - point game heading into the fourth . The Spurs closed out strong by tightening their defense and reaping the benefits of come clutch three - point shooting by Danny Green . LaMarcus Aldridge was the high - point man for San_Antonio , with 22 points , 11 rebounds , two assists and one block , in 39 minutes . Kyle Anderson finished with 13 points , six rebounds , one block , and a career - high 10 assists , in 27 minutes . Manu Ginobili tallied 16 points , three assists , two rebounds and one steal , in 26 minutes off the bench . The Spurs shot 45 percent from the field , including 31 percent from long range , and went 6 - of - 6 from the free throw line , however gave up and uncharacteristic 18 turnovers . Meanwhile , the Hawks gave up 15 turnovers themselves , and struggled just as well from the field , hitting 44 percent , including 27 percent from downtown , and only went 3 - of - 8 from the foul line . John Collins was the high - point man for Atlanta , with 21 points , nine rebounds and two blocks , in 36 minutes off the bench . Taurean Prince finished with 18 points , eight rebounds , one steal , one block and one assist , in 39 minutes . Dennis Schroder added 14 points , nine assists , three rebounds and one steal , in 27 minutes . The Hawks will look to bounce back when they play host to the Clippers on Wednesday . The Spurs take on the Pelicans in New_Orleans on Wednesday .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 115 - 108 , at AT & T Center on Monday . While there were only three ties and four lead changes in this game , neither team ever led by more than 13 points in this competitive matchup . Despite the fact that Dallas led by seven at the half , San_Antonio rode a 69 - 55 second half to come back and win . San_Antonio 's offense was extremely efficient , as they recorded 28 assists , while hitting 52 percent of their shots from the field . The five blocks by the Spurs were crucial as well , especially considering Dallas did n't record a single swat . The Spurs ended up going 19 - of - 21 from the free - throw line , while the Mavericks hit just 12 - of - 17 . The Mavericks ( 5 - 16 ) were led by Wesley Matthews , as he tallied 19 points , two rebounds and two assists . Dennis Smith Jr. amassed 19 points and five assists . Harrison Barnes went just 3 - of - 14 from the field to total 13 points , eight rebounds and four assists . J.J. Barea led the bench with 16 points , four rebounds , seven assists and three steals . The Spurs ( 13 - 7 ) had LaMarcus Aldridge reach 3,0 points in a San_Antonio uniform , as he led the team with 33 points , 10 rebounds , four assists , two steals and three blocks in their win . Pau Gasol finished with 25 points and six rebounds . Danny Green accumulated 12 points , five rebounds and six assists . Kyle Anderson collected 12 points , 10 rebounds , five assists and two steals . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , with Dallas hosting the Brooklyn Nets and San_Antonio playing host to the Memphis Grizzlies .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the struggling Memphis Grizzlies , 104 - 95 , at AT & T Center on Wednesday evening . The Spurs ( 14 - 7 ) have excelled despite the absence of superstar wing Kawhi Leonard . The two - time Defensive Player of the Year has been sidelined all season with a quad injury , but the Spurs have still won 10 of their last 13 games . A huge part of San_Antonio 's success has been veteran All-Star LaMarcus Aldridge , who is posting his best numbers as a Spur , with averages of over 22 points and eight rebounds per game . On Wednesday , that trend continued in a major way , as Aldridge scored a season - high 41 points to lead the team . The big man was simply lights out from the field , shooting 17 - of - 24 and 3 - of - 3 from beyond the arc . Aldridge was the undeniable focal point of the team 's offensive attack , as no other Spur scored more than 13 or attempted more than eight shots . While Aldridge was the engine of San_Antonio 's offense , strong team defense helped them earn the homecourt win . The Spurs forced 17 Memphis turnovers , including nine which came off steals . San_Antonio played with immense discipline , sending Memphis to the line only 16 times while shooting 24 free - throws of its own . Memphis ( 7 - 13 ) also has an injured star , but has been trending in the opposite direction of San_Antonio . The Grizzlies have now lost nine straight games and remain without veteran point guard Mike Conley , who is sidelined indefinitely with Achilles discomfort . Amidst the team 's free - fall , head coach David Fizdale was fired , leaving assistant coach J.B. Bickerstaff to take the reigns until a replacement is named . Bickerstaff 's tenure did not get off to a promising start , as the team struggled to put up points on Wednesday despite a solid shooting night . The team shot 46 percent from the field and went an admirable 11 - of - 22 from beyond the three - point line . Still , the Grizzlies were unable to reach 100 points on the night , and the team saw only two players score more than 13 points . The high scorer was veteran ball - handler Tyreke Evans , who has seen a minor career resurgence this season , even amidst the Grizzlies ' struggles . The former Rookie of the Year winner scored 22 points on Wednesday , now averaging 18 points per game on impressive shooting splits of 49 percent from the field and 42 percent from three - point territory . Evans , who started the year as a sixth man , has slid comfortably into the starting lineup in Conley 's absence . He provided a valuable offensive spark on Wednesday . The two teams will rematch in Memphis on Friday night .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Miami Heat , 117 - 105 , at American Airlines Arena on Wednesday evening . The Heat came in on a mission , taking a 35 - 27 lead by the end of the first quarter . The Spurs responded in the second and cut the gap to one , with the Heat leading 58 - 57 at halftime . The Spurs were all about business as they came out strong in the third to set the tone for the second half , where they outscored the Heat 60 - 47 , to earn their second straight win , and sixth win in their last seven games . The Spurs exhibited a true team effort , as eight players scored in double digits in order to earn the win . LaMarcus Aldridge was the high - point man with 18 points on 7 - of - 16 shooting . Danny Green and Pau Gasol added 12 points each , while Bryn Forbes added 17 points off the bench . The Spurs shot 53 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 26 from long range , and dished 29 assists . Meanwhile , the Heat only had three players score in double digits . Tyler Johnson led the way with 25 points on 9 - of - 12 shooting . Dion Waiters followed up with 22 points and five assists , while Josh Richardson tallied 19 points , in 31 minutes . The Heat shot 54 percent from the field , including 18 - of - 34 from long range , and dished 28 assists . The Heat ( 11 - 13 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Nets in Brooklyn on Saturday . The Spurs ( 17 - 8 ) have a tough job ahead of them as they play host to the Celtics on Friday .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Boston Celtics , 105 - 102 , at AT & T Center on Friday evening . The Celtics got out to a great start with a quick 110 lead , however the Spurs responded closing the gap to five points by the beginning of the second quarter . The Spurs outscored the Celtics 30 - 24 in the second , to take a 56 - 55 into halftime . The Celtics took the advantage once again , with a strong third quarter where they outscored the Spurs 27 - 21 , to go up 82 - 77 heading into the final frame . Things got exciting in the fourth , where the Spurs battled back to tie it up at 102 with 1:30 left . The teams battled back and forth but only one more bucket was scored in the game , and it was the game - winning three by Manu Ginobili . Ginobili finished with 11 points , four rebounds and three assists , in 24 minutes off the bench . LaMarcus Aldridge was the high - point man for San_Antonio , with 27 points on 11 - of - 20 shooting , in 34 minutes . Pau Gasol tallied a double - double with 14 points and 11 rebounds , while Rudy Gay finished with 15 points , eight rebounds , two assists and one block . The Spurs shot 47 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 27 from distance . Meanwhile , Kyrie Irving led the way for the Celtics with 36 points on 13 - of - 21 shooting , in 36 minutes . Jayson Tatum followed up with 20 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting , while Jaylen Brown added 15 points and five rebounds . The Celtics shot 46 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 38 from long range . The Celtics ( 22 - 5 ) will look to bounce back when they take on the Pistons in Detroit on Sunday . The Spurs ( 18 - 8 ) will be right back in action , as they take on the Suns in Phoenix on Saturday .
The San_Antonio Spurs took down the visiting Dallas Mavericks , 98 - 96 , at AT & T Center on Saturday . The Spurs ( 20 - 10 ) barely avoided dropping their third straight game thanks to late - game heroics from their closing lineup . With just over four minutes remaining , Dallas held an 11 - point lead at 96 - 85 . San_Antonio looked like a different team on both sides of the ball during the final four minutes , though , squeaking out the win by holding the Mavericks scoreless over the remainder of the game . The Spurs scored the game 's last 13 points , including clutch shots from star players LaMarcus Aldridge and Manu Ginobili . Aldridge hit a game - tying fadeaway shot over Dallas 's Maxi Kleber before Ginobili ultimately gave the team the win with a last - second layup . Ginobili 's clutch bucket fell with just 3 seconds left and marked the 40 - year - old veteran 's second game - winner in the last two weeks . Overall , it was Aldridge who led the Spurs ' offense , as superstar forward Kawhi Leonard sat out the game . Leonard , who recently returned from a quad injury that cost him the first quarter of the season , is still transitioning back to full minutes and did not see action in the second half of a back - to - back on Saturday . In his absence , Aldridge continued to step up , scoring a team - high 22 points to go with 14 rebounds . Ginobili also impressed , scoring 12 points in just under 23 minutes of play . Dallas ( 8 - 22 ) has had a tough season to this point , and Saturday 's heartbreaking loss certainly did not help . The Mavericks remain at the bottom of the Western_Conference and are riddled with injuries , as Dennis Smith , Jr. , Seth Curry , and Nerlens Noel were all forced to miss Saturday 's game due to various lingering health issues . Nevertheless , the Mavericks were able to keep the game competitive against a powerhouse San_Antonio team . German forward Maxi Kleber was a huge factor throughout , scoring 21 points , which led the team . The better - known of the Mavs ' German big men , Dirk Nowitzki , also played well , scoring 19 points on the night . Next up on the schedule for the Spurs will be the Clippers , who visit San_Antonio on Tuesday . Dallas , meanwhile , will play host to the struggling Phoenix Suns .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 109 - 91 , at AT & T Center on Monday . If it were n't for an early lead for the Clippers , this would have been a dominant wire - to - wire win for the Spurs . In fact , San_Antonio led for the final 45 minutes , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 20 minutes . Shooting was key , with the Spurs hitting 49 percent of their shots , while holding Los_Angeles to 44 percent from the field . Free-throw shooting was key as well , with the Spurs hitting 20 - of - 25 and the Clippers going just 8 - of - 16 . The Clippers ( 11 - 18 ) were led by DeAndre Jordan , as he tallied 13 points and 14 rebounds . Austin Rivers accumulated 12 points , three rebounds and three assists . Jamil Wilson got a rare start and provided 13 points , two rebounds and two steals . The Spurs ( 21 - 10 ) got 19 points and eight rebounds out of LaMarcus Aldridge to lead the way . Pau Gasol amassed eight points , 12 rebounds and three assists . Tony Parker finished with 16 points , seven assists and two steals . Kawhi Leonard played 15 minutes and accrued seven points and four rebounds . Manu Ginobili led the bench with 13 points , three rebounds and five assists . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , with San_Antonio traveling to face the Portland Trail_Blazers and Los_Angeles playing host to the Phoenix Suns .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Brooklyn Nets , 109 - 97 , at AT & T Center on Tuesday evening . Kawhi Leonard helped get things started for San_Antonio with seven points in the first quarter . The Spurs led 19 - 16 at the end of the first and maintained a slight edge through the second , where they expanded their lead to six , 50 - 44 , by halftime . The Spurs carried the momentum into the third , where they expanded their lead to as many as 16 , before settling on an 11 - point advantage heading into the final frame . The Nets were hardly able to make a dent in the deficit , resulting in their second straight loss . Caris LeVert led the way for Brooklyn with 18 points , five assists and two steals , in 27 minutes off the bench . Allen Crabbe followed up with 15 points , five rebounds and one assist , in 31 minutes , while Rondae Hollis-Jefferson finished with 13 points , six rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 27 minutes . The Nets shot 42 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 32 from long range . Meanwhile , Kawhi Leonard led the way for the Spurs with 21 points on 8 - of - 17 shooting , in 26 minutes of action . Pau Gasol came up huge with 15 points , 12 rebounds , five assists and one block , in 28 minutes . LaMarcus Aldridge tallied 20 points , nine rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block , while Tony Parker added 14 points on 6 - of - 10 shooting . The Spurs shot 51 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 16 from long range . The Spurs ( 24 - 11 ) will look to keep rolling as they play host to the Knicks on Thursday . The Nets ( 12 - 21 ) will be right back in action as they take on the Pelicans in New_Orleans on Wednesday .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting New_York Knicks , 119 - 107 , at AT & T Center on Thursday evening . The Spurs were in control right from the start . They took an early 10 - 2 lead and held on to lead 32 - 24 by the end of the first . The Knicks put up a better fight in the second quarter , tying it up at 49 , before trailing 54 - 53 at halftime . The third quarter once again belonged to the Spurs , as they were able to expand their lead to as many as 13 before settling on a seven - point advantage heading into the fourth . In the final quarter , the Spurs quickly pushed their lead to 10 and rode the cushion to the finish . This marks the third straight win for San_Antonio and the fourth straight loss for New_York . All five starters scored in double digits for the Spurs , led by LaMarcus Aldridge , who finished with 25 points on 8 - of - 19 shooting , in 35 minutes . Pau Gasol followed up with 17 points , 11 rebounds and seven assists , while Kyle Anderson added 16 points and eight rebounds . The Spurs shot 51 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 20 from long range . Meanwhile , Michael Beasley was the high - point man for New_York , with 23 points on 9 - of - 13 , along with 12 rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block , in 32 minutes off the bench . Kristaps Porzingis and Courtney Lee tallied 18 points each , while Frank Ntilikina tallied nine points , 11 assists , three rebounds and three steals , in 31 minutes off the bench . The Knicks ( 17 - 18 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Pelicans in New_Orleans on Saturday . The Spurs ( 25 - 11 ) head to Detroit to take on the Pistons on Saturday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the host San_Antonio Spurs , 94 - 86 , at AT & T Center on Sunday evening . The score was tight through the first quarter , with the Spurs leading , 23 - 22 , after one . The Pacers continued to grind and managed to take a three - point , 46 - 43 lead by halftime . The Pacers carried the momentum into the second half , where they held the Spurs to only 16 points in the quarter , and took a 71 - 59 lead into the fourth . The Pacers held on to a double - digit lead for most of the quarter , and while the Spurs made a push towards the end , the Pacers held strong to end a two - game losing streak . Victor Oladipo was the high - point man for Indiana , with 19 points on 8 - of - 14 shooting , in 36 minutes of action . Darren Collison followed up with 15 points , four assists , three steals , and two rebounds , while Thaddeus Young tallied 14 points , seven rebounds , four assists , three steals and a block . The Pacers shot 45 percent from the field , including 4 - of - 19 from long range . Meanwhile , Pau Gasol led the Spurs with 14 points , nine rebounds , four assists and three blocks , in 31 minutes . LaMarcus Aldridge tallied 10 points , 10 rebounds , one assist and a block , while Kyle Anderson finished with 10 points , eight rebounds , five steals , three blocks and three assists , in 34 minutes . The Spurs shot 43 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 34 from long range . The Spurs ( 30 - 18 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Cavs on Tuesday . The Pacers ( 25 - 22 ) play host to the Suns on Wednesday .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 114 - 102 , at AT & T Center at on Tuesday . Despite the fact that Cleveland led for the majority of the first half , San_Antonio took control in the second half . In fact , a 38 - 26 second quarter really turned things around , as the Spurs held the lead for the entirety of the second half . Defense was key for San_Antonio , as they recorded 11 steals in their victory . to Cleveland 's six That allowed them to win the turnover differential , 18 - 10 . San_Antonio also did work in transition , winning the fastbreak differential , 24 - 10 . The Cavaliers ( 27 - 19 ) were led by LeBron James , as he tallied 28 points , nine rebounds and seven assists . Isaiah Thomas amassed 14 points and two assists . Kevin Love totaled 10 and 11 rebounds . Dwyane Wade led the bench with 12 points , six rebounds , two assists and two steals . The Spurs ( 31 - 18 ) got a gem out of LaMarcus Aldridge , as he accrued 31 points , eight rebounds , three assists and two steals on 12 - of - 18 from the field . Dejounte Murray got another start and provided 19 points , 10 rebounds , three assists and seven steals . Kyle Anderson put in 10 points , 12 rebounds and five assists . Tony Parker led the bench with 14 points and six assists . On deck for San_Antonio is a road matchup versus the Memphis Grizzlies on Wednesday . Cleveland will play host to the Indiana Pacers on Friday for their next fixture .
The visiting Philadelphia 76ers took down the San_Antonio Spurs , 97 - 78 , at AT & T Center on Friday . For the first time since 2004 , the Sixers are leaving San_Antonio victorious . Friday 's game was almost never up in the air , as San_Antonio never found its rhythm offensively .
