The Spurs ' 78 points were their lowest total of the season , and not even newly - named All-Star LaMarcus Aldridge was able to bust the team out of its slump . The Spurs shot only 40 percent from the field and hit just three three - pointers . The offensive stagnation led to a dismal 31 - point first half for the normally potent team . Philadelphia ( 24 - 21 ) has now won nine of its last 11 games . The team has the league 's third - ranked defense and flexed it in San_Antonio , holding the powerhouse Spurs to a season - low . Rookie phenom Ben Simmons continued his Rookie of the Year push , scoring 21 points on 10 - of - 11 shooting . In addition to being the game 's high scorer , Simmons had seven assists and two steals . San_Antonio ( 32 - 19 ) is still missing Kawhi Leonard ( shoulder ) , whose shooting touch would have proved useful in Friday 's blowout loss . Aldridge was the only Spur to score more than 11 points , as he finished with 18 in the loss . Though the Spurs were able to keep turnovers low and assists high , the team simply could not get its shots to fall . San_Antonio shot just 3 - of - 24 from beyond the arc . Philadelphia will visit the red - hot Oklahoma_City Thunder on Sunday . San_Antonio , meanwhile , squares off against the Kings on Sunday night .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Sacramento Kings , 113 - 98 , at AT & T Center on Sunday . After a shaky first half left San_Antonio trailing , the Spurs looked locked in defensively to start the third quarter . The hard - nosed Spurs defense led to the team opening up a double - digit lead in the quarter , which they maintained thanks to strong bench play . Bryn Forbes was the team 's leading scorer off the bench , pouring in 23 points on 9 - of - 15 shooting . San_Antonio ( 33 - 19 ) remains the third seed in the Western_Conference , despite the fact that Kawhi Leonard is still sidelined by injuries to his shoulder and quad . In his absence , the Spurs have scored by committee . On Sunday , five players put up double digit scoring numbers , including sophomore point guard Dejounte Murray . Murray had 14 points on 6 - of - 6 shooting in Sunday 's win , and he added 10 rebounds and six assists . Sacramento ( 15 - 34 ) snapped a quick two - game win streak with Sunday 's loss . The team unfortunately owns the league 's 30th - ranked defense , and it showed on Sunday . The Kings allowed San_Antonio to hit 50 percent of its shots from the field and gave up 11 three - pointers . It was a breakout night on the offensive end , though , for rookie point guard De'Aaron Fox . Fox went 6 - of - 6 from beyond the three - point line en route to a season - high 26 points . Fox added three assists . The Kings will visit New_Orleans on Tuesday . The Spurs , meanwhile , will host Denver .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Denver Nuggets , 106 - 104 , at AT & T Center on Tuesday evening . The teams traded the lead a couple times in the first quarter , before they entered the second tied at 30 . The Nuggets pulled ahead by five early in the second quarter , but the Spurs responded with a 10 - 2 run and eventually took a five - point advantage into halftime . The Spurs maintained their lead until the halfway mark in the third , when the Nuggets tied it up at 68 . The Nuggets continued the pressure and managed to take the lead , 81 - 80 , heading into the final frame . The game stayed close the rest of the way , until the Spurs came up huge in crunch time , especially thanks to Manu Ginobili who scored five points in the final 2:30 . LaMarcus Aldridge led the way for San_Antonio with 30 points on 14 - of - 23 shooting , in 38 minutes . Kyle Anderson and Pau Gasol tallied 18 points each , while Dejuonte Murray finished scoreless , but tallied 13 rebounds , seven assists and two blocks , in 25 minutes . The Spurs shot 50 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 24 from long range . Meanwhile , Jamal Murray was the high - point man for the Nuggets , with 18 points on 5 - of - 12 shooting . Gary Harris followed up with 17 points on 5 - of - 12 shooting , while Will Barton and Nikola Jokic added 13 points each . Emmanuel Mudiay chipped in 14 points , four assists and two rebounds , off the bench . The Nuggets shot 46 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 23 from long range . The Nuggets ( 26 - 25 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Thunder on Thursday . The Spurs ( 34 - 19 ) play host to the Rockets on Thursday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the San_Antonio Spurs 102 - 91 on Thursday at AT & T . It was a wire - to - wire victory for the Rockets ( 37 - 13 ) , who are having the best start in the franchises history through 50 games . And while the Spurs ( 34 - 20 ) managed to close the gap to as low as six points in the fourth quarter , individual runs from Chris Paul and James Harden helped Houston pull away and ice the game . Harden scored a game - high 28 points to go along with 11 assists , while Paul did n't really get going until that final period , as he finished with just 10 points on 5 - of - 14 shooting and two assists in 30 minutes . Clint Capela posted a solid double - double of 14 points and 13 rebounds , and Gerald Green stepped up in the absence of Eric Gordon ( back ) , coming off the bench to score 15 points and grab five rebonds in 30 minutes . As for San_Antonio , it was a miserable shooting night for the team from outside , as the Spurs shot just 25 percent from behind the three - point line , which led to them having their worst offensive outing since scoring just 86 points against the Pacers in Jan. 21 . Only three players scored in double figures , with Danny Green leading with the way with 22 and LaMarcus Aldridge adding 16 points of his own . The other three starters , Pau Gasol , Kyle Anderson and Dejounte Murray , combined to score just 19 points . The Spurs were also uncharacteristically slopping with the basketball , committing 16 turnovers to just 21 assists .
The Utah Jazz defeated the host San_Antonio Spurs , 120 - 111 , at AT & T Center on Saturday evening . The Spurs jumped out to a quick 60 lead , but the Jazz quickly responded by outscoring the Spurs 33 - 18 though the rest of the first quarter . The Jazz carried the momentum into the second quarter , where they pushed their lead to double digits , to take a 61 - 49 lead into halftime . The Spurs came out strong in the third quarter , but were matched , as the Jazz held their ground . Still the Spurs cut the deficit to just nine heading into the final frame . The Spurs made a strong push to start the fourth quarter , and cut Utah 's lead to just one , 94 - 93 , however , the Jazz responded by sticking to it and slowly building their lead back up , especially in the last few minutes , where they pulled away for good , en route to their fifth straight win . Ricky Rubio led the way for Utah with 34 points on 11 - of - 14 shooting , nine assists and three rebounds , in 34 minutes of action . Rudy Gobert chipped in 11 points , 10 rebounds , three assists and three blocks , while Derrick Favors added 14 points , six rebounds and one assist . Royce O'Neale came up big off the bench for Utah , with 18 points , five rebounds , five assists and three steals , in 32 minutes . The Jazz shot 56 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 23 from long range . Meanwhile , LaMarcus Aldridge led the Spurs with 31 points on 12 - of - 19 shooting , in 34 minutes . Manu Ginobili followed up with 13 points on 5 - of - 9 shooting , in 24 minutes off the bench , while Tony Parker and Patty Mills added 11 points each . Pau Gasol chipped in eight points , 11 rebounds and two assists , in 20 minutes off the bench . The Spurs shot 48 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 26 from long range . The Spurs ( 35 - 20 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Suns in Phoenix on Wednesday . The Jazz ( 24 - 28 ) will look to keep rolling as they take on the Pelicans in New_Orleans on Monday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the host San_Antonio Spurs , 116 - 112 , at AT & T Center on Saturday . San_Antonio looked well in control headed into the fourth quarter , but a monster comeback gave Los_Angeles a huge comeback win . In fact , the Lakers first and only lead came in the final five minutes , as a 36 - 21 fourth quarter capped off a double - digit comeback . In addition , Los_Angeles finished the game on a 25 - 9 run across the final six minutes . Three-point shooting was the only major difference in the stat sheet , with the Lakers connecting on 15 - of - 34 and the Spurs hitting just 7 - of - 30 . The Lakers ( 28 - 34 ) were led by Julius Randle , as he tallied 25 points , six rebounds and three assists . Lonzo Ball accumulated 18 points , seven rebounds , 11 assists and two blocks . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope totaled 18 points , 13 rebounds and three steals . Isaiah Thomas led the bench with 21 points and seven assists . The Spurs ( 36 - 27 ) got a near triple - double out of Pau Gasol , as he collected 19 points , 10 rebounds , eight assists and three steals . Patty Mills amassed 14 points , two rebounds and three assists . Dejounte Murray finished with 12 points , seven rebounds and three steals . Rudy Gay led the bench with 15 points and eight boards . Both teams play home games on Monday for their next outings , with San_Antonio welcoming the Memphis Grizzlies and Los_Angeles playing host to the Portland Trail_Blazers .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 100 - 98 , at AT & T Center on Monday . This has been a tightly - contested series over recent years , as this game was no different . In fact , neither team ever attained a double - digit lead , as there were 17 ties and 18 lead changes in total . It took a big fourth quarter for the Spurs to prevail , as they outscored the Grizzlies , 30 - 26 , holding the lead for the final eight minutes . Bench production was the difference for San_Antonio , as they outscored Memphis ' bench , 67 - 25 . Turnovers were also a critical factor , with the Spurs committing 11 turnovers while forcing 20 from the Grizzlies . The Grizzlies ( 18 - 45 ) were led by Marc Gasol , as he tallied 23 points , 10 rebounds and four assists . JaMychal Green amassed 14 points , 15 rebounds , five assists and two blocks . Dillon Brooks started and totaled 21 points and four boards . Kobi Simmons was the only the player with more than six points , as he accrued 13 points , four rebounds and three assists . The Spurs ( 37 - 27 ) three leading scorers came off the bench , as Tony Parker led the team with 23 points and four assists on 10 - of - 14 shooting . Davis Bertans accumulated 17 points , four rebounds and three assists . Kyle Anderson was the only starter in double figures , collecting 11 points , two rebounds , four assists and five steals . On deck for Memphis is a road matchup versus the Chicago Bulls on Wednesday . As for San_Antonio , they return to action on Thursday in a road matchup versus the Golden_State Warriors .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Orlando Magic , 108 - 72 , at AT & T Center on Tuesday evening . The Magic got out to a good start , before the Spurs pulled away in the last minutes of the first quarter to take a 24 - 18 lead into the second . The Spurs carried the momentum into the second , where they outscored the Magic 38 - 19 , to take an impressive 62 - 37 lead into halftime . The Spurs then took over in the third quarter , where they outscored the Magic 34 - 20 to build a 96 - 57 lead heading into the final frame . They were able to cruise to the finish through a low - scoring fourth quarter . LaMarcus Aldridge led the Spurs with 24 points , seven rebounds and two assists , in 24 minutes of action . Patty Mills followed up with 13 points on 4 - of - 8 shooting , while Danny Green , Dejounte Murray and Pau Gasol tallied 11 points each . The Spurs shot 48 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 19 from long range . Meanwhile , Nikola Vucevic led the Magic with 10 points , 10 rebounds and one assist , in 24 minutes . Jonathan Simmons finished with 10 points and one rebound . D.J . Augustin added nine points , while Jonathan Isaac , Shelvin Mack and Arron Afflalo chipped in seven points each . The Magic shot 34 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 23 from long range . The Magic ( 20 - 48 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Bucks on Wednesday . The Spurs ( 38 - 30 ) play host to the Pelicans on Thursday .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the New_Orleans Pelicans , 98 - 93 , at AT & T Center on Thursday . In a battle between two teams battling for a playoff berth , San_Antonio was able to prevail thanks to a big start . In fact , they held the lead for the final three quarters , as a 37 - 26 first quarter was too much for the Pelicans to overcome . The only true advantage for the Spurs were turnovers , as they forced 16 from the Pelicans while committing just 11 on their end . Neither team shot higher than 40 percent from the field or from three - point range . Much of that defense can be attributed to the 10 steals and 11 blocks recorded by San_Antonio . The Pelicans ( 39 - 29 ) were led by Jrue Holiday , as he collected 24 points , eight rebounds , seven assists , two steals and three blocks . Anthony Davis finished with 21 points , 14 rebounds , two assists and two blocks before fouling out . Ian Clark led the bench with 16 points and three rebounds . The Spurs ( 39 - 30 ) got a double - double out of Dejounte Murray , as he accrued 18 points , 12 rebounds and four steals . LaMarcus Aldridge led the team in scoring , generating 25 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Danny Green accumulated five points , seven rebounds , two assists and six blocks . Both teams return to action on Saturday , with New_Orleans playing host to the Houston Rockets and San_Antonio welcoming the Minnesota Timberwolves to AT & T Center .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Minnesota Timberwolves , 117 - 101 , at AT & T Center on Saturday evening . The Timberwolves got out to a good start and led for most of the first quarter , before taking a one - point , 24 - 23 , advantage into the second . The Spurs took over in the second quarter , as they outscored the Timberwolves 38 - 26 , to take a 61 - 50 lead into halftime . The Spurs stayed in control through the third quarter , as they held a double digit lead for most of the quarter and owned a 90 - 81 advantage heading into the final frame . The Spurs managed to stay comfortably ahead the rest of the way and pulled away for good with a 7 - 2 run late in the fourth . This marks the third straight win for the Spurs and brings them to a tie with the Timberwolves in the standings . LaMarcus Aldridge led the way for the Spurs with 39 points on 14 - of - 22 shooting , 10 rebounds , two assists and two blocks , in 35 minutes . Rudy Gay followed up with 14 points , four rebounds , four blocks and one steal , while Pau Gasol and Patty Mills added 12 points each . The Spurs shot 51 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 26 from long range . Meanwhile , Karl-Anthony Towns led Minnesota with 23 points , nine rebounds , two assists and one block , in 39 minutes . Andrew Wiggins followed up with 21 points , five rebounds and five assists , in 33 minutes . Jeff Teague tallied 16 points , eight assists , two rebounds and two steals , in 31 minutes . The Timberwolves shot 48 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 12 from long range . The Timberwolves ( 40 - 30 ) will be right back in action as they play host to the Rockets on Sunday . The Spurs ( 40 - 30 ) play host to the Warriors on Monday .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Golden_State Warriors , 89 - 75 , at AT & T Center on Monday evening . The Spurs got out to a good start at home , with a 20 - 6 lead halfway through the first quarter , and held on to lead 30 - 21 entering the second . The Spurs pushed their lead to 15 mid way through the second , but the Warriors managed to cut the deficit to eight , and trail 49 - 41 at halftime . The Warriors continued to claw their way back in the game through the third quarter , where they outscored the Spurs 22 - 12 , to take a 63 - 61 by the start of the final frame . The fourth quarter belonged to the Spurs , as they started off with an 11 - 2 run to jump back ahead . They kept up the pressure and outscored the Warriors 28 - 12 in the quarter to complete the home win . LaMarcus Aldridge led the Spurs with 33 points , 12 rebounds , two blocks , one assist and one steal , in 34 minutes . Patty Mills tallied 12 points , three rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block , in 34 minutes . Danny Green was the only other player to score in double digits for the Spurs , as he finished with 11 points , while Kyle Anderson finished with no points , 10 rebounds , four assists and one steal . The Spurs shot 40 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 23 from long range . Meanwhile , Quinn Cook led the Warriors with 20 points on 8 - of - 18 shooting , five rebounds and five assists , in 37 minutes . Nick Young and Andre Iguodala finished with 10 points each , while Kevon Looney finished with 12 points , eight rebounds , three steals one block . Draymond Green left the game with an injury to his midsection after just 11 minutes of action and did not return . The Warriors shot 40 percent from the field , including 3 - of - 19 from long range . The Warriors ( 53 - 18 ) will have a few days to recover before they play host to the Hawks on Friday . The Spurs ( 41 - 30 ) play host to the Wizards on Wednesday .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Washington Wizards , 98 - 90 , at AT & T Center on Wednesday night . San_Antonio ( 42 - 30 ) has now won five straight games . The Spurs came out red - hot in the second half , going on a 16 - 4 run in the early part of the third quarter to take control of the game . Veteran All-Star LaMarcus Aldridge was the driving force for the Spurs offense , leading the team with 27 points . Aldridge was one of three Spurs players to pull down at least three offensive rebounds , helping the team grab 12 total offensive boards . Kyle Anderson was the only other Spur to score more than 10 points , as he finished with 16 . Despite the absence of many big performances , the Spurs were reasonably strong on the offensive end , shooting over 49 percent as a team . San_Antonio has now won 18 straight matchups at home against the Wizards . Washington ( 40 - 31 ) saw only 45 total points from its starting five in what was a forgettable offensive night for the team . All-Star Bradley Beal shared the team high in scoring with bench forward Kelly Oubre , Jr. , as both poured in 21 points . No other Washington player scored more than 12 , though , and the team had an overall inefficient night . They shot just 42 percent from the field and went only 12 - of - 16 at the free - throw line . On Friday , Washington will host the Denver Nuggets while San_Antonio will see the Utah Jazz .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Utah Jazz in overtime , 124 - 120 , at AT & T Center on Friday . These are two teams battling to remain in the playoffs in the Western_Conference and the fact that this game went an extra session shows just how important it was for both teams . In fact , there were seven ties and 12 lead changes in total , as neither team led by more than 11 points . Rebounding was the difference for San_Antonio , as they outrebounded Utah , 47 - 33 . Rim protection was huge as well , with the Spurs recording seven blocks and the Jazz collecting just three blocks . San_Antonio 's bench also outscored Utah 's bench , 40 - 17 . The Jazz ( 41 - 32 ) were led by Donovan Mitchell , as he accrued 35 points , two rebounds , three assists and four steals on 14 - of - 35 shooting . Derrick Favors amassed 22 points , eight rebounds and two blocks on 8 - of - 10 from the field . Ricky Rubio collected 20 points , three rebounds , eight assists and two steals . The Spurs ( 43 - 30 ) got a gem out of LaMarcus Aldridge , as he tallied a career - high 45 points , nine rebounds , two assists and three blocks . Patty Mills started and amassed 25 points , two rebounds and four assists . None of the other three starters scored more than five points . Manu Ginobili led the bench with 18 points , five rebounds and three assists . Both teams play road games on Sunday for their next outings , with San_Antonio playing the Milwaukee Bucks and Utah facing off with the Golden_State Warriors .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 103 - 99 , at AT & T Center on Thursday . In a matchup between two teams battling for playoff positioning , they left it all on the floor in this critical game . In fact , there were seven ties and 10 lead changes in total , as neither team ever led by more than 10 points . While San_Antonio did n't dominate any statistic , they won almost everyone by a small margin . The Spurs won the rebounding differential , 48 - 43 , and out - assisted the Thunder , 22 - 19 . San_Antonio also recorded 13 steals and six blocks while Oklahoma_City mustered up 11 steals and three blocks . Free-throw shooting really hurt the Thunder as well , as they connected on just 14 - of - 21 while the Spurs hit 22 - of - 30 . The Thunder ( 44 - 32 ) were led by Paul George , as he tallied 26 points , seven rebounds , six assists and four steals . Russell Westbrook collected 19 points , 11 rebounds , five assists and three steals . Corey Brewer amassed 14 points , two rebounds , three assists and two steals while Steven Adams totaled 10 points and 13 boards . The Spurs ( 44 - 32 ) were led by LaMarcus Aldridge , as he accrued 25 points , 11 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Pau Gasol led the team in rebounding , as he finished with six points , 12 rebounds and three assists . Dejounte Murray accumulated seven points , eight rebounds , seven assists and five steals . On deck for Oklahoma_City is a home game against the Denver Nuggets on Friday . As for San_Antonio , they play host to the Houston Rockets on Sunday for their next outing .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the Houston Rockets , 100 - 83 , at AT & T Center on Sunday . The Spurs ( 45 - 32 ) had one of their best performances in recent weeks against a red - hot Rockets ( 62 - 15 ) team that looks all but set to earn home - field advantage throughout the entire postseason if they can finish the season on a strong note . San_Antonio limited Houston 's impact thanks to their stingy defense , as they limited them to a 34 percent from the field and an even - worse 23 percent from three - point range . San_Antonio jumped to a 26 - 17 lead in the first quarter , and they never looked back . Houston might have won the second quarter ( 21 - 20 ) , but the Spurs won the remaining two quarters ( 29 - 28 and 25 - 17 ) to walk towards a huge win at home . As it has been the trend during the entire season , LaMarcus Aldridge led the way for San_Antonio with 23 points , 14 rebounds , and three blocks . Patty Mills had 14 points , five boards , and four assists . Dejounte Murray chipped in with 13 points and six rebounds , while Danny Green contributed 12 points and seven rebounds . Rudy Gay had a great outing off the bench since he scored 21 points on 9 - 13 shooting . James Harden was the best player for the Rockets in this game since he finished with 25 points , eight assists and three rebounds , but he also committed five turnovers . Eric Gordon had 18 points , but he made just seven of his 15 attempts from the field . Clint Capela contributed with a strong double - double of 11 points and 10 rebounds . Gerald Green had 11 points off the bench .
The Portland Trail_Blazers dominated the Phoenix Suns , 124 - 76 , at Arena in Wednesday 's season opener . Though Wednesday 's game was the first of the season for both Phoenix and Portland , it could be the least competitive game each plays this season . The 48 - point blowout was the second - largest imargin of victory in team history for the Trail_Blazers , and the largest opening - day blowout in league history . At points , the Blazers led by as much as 58 , making the blowout among the most crushing in recent league history . The Suns were held to just 31 percent shooting from the field throughout the game and made only seven three - pointers . Interestingly , Portland was without one of its star players , C.J . McCollum . McCollum missed the game after being suspended by the league for leaving the bench during an on - court altercation in preseason . His teammates were able to more than make up for his absence , though , as the Blazers coasted to the easy victory . Star point guard Damian Lillard had a team - high 27 points in just 29 minutes . Meanwhile , bench wing Pat Connaughton scored a career - high 24 points to help build the historic lead . For the Suns , the game quickly got out of hand , as the team managed only 35 first - half points . The team shot just over 30 percent , and managed only ten assists in total . It was a particularly tough night for the starting backcourt of Eric Bledsoe and Devin Booker , who combined to shoot just 11 - of - 35 and made only one three - pointer as a duo . The Blazers visit Indiana on Friday , while Phoenix will host the Los_Angeles Lakers .
The visiting Los_Angeles Lakers narrowly beat the Phoenix Suns , 132 - 130 , in Arizona on Friday . Los_Angeles ( 1 - 1 ) bounced back from a dismal showing against the Clippers on Thursday with solid performances from rookie Lonzo Ball and sophomore Brandon Ingram . Ball wowed with 29 points , 11 rebounds , and nine assists , while Ingram delivered a solid 25 points on 9 - of - 14 shooting . The showings come after Ingram shot just 3 - of - 15 in the season opener and Ball recorded only three points in his debut while being pestered by defensive menace Patrick Beverly . Despite the solid showings , though , the Lakers were only able to eke out a two - point victory over the struggling Suns . Los_Angeles had a tough night on defense , allowing the Suns to hit over 50 percent of their shots and giving up three separate 20 - point performances . Phoenix ( 0 - 2 ) lost in a less embarrassing fashion on Friday than in its season opener . Fresh off the largest opening - day defeat in league history , the Suns looked vastly sharper on the offensive end . Three players scored at least 24 points , with third - year phenom Devin Booker and athletic point guard Eric Bledsoe as the team 's top two scorers . One of the team 's biggest issues wound up being at the free - throw line , where they missed 11 foul shots en route to just a 70 percent clip at the charity stripe . The Suns will face off against the Clippers in LA on Saturday , while the Lakers host the Pelicans on Sunday .
The host Phoenix Suns narrowly pulled out a 117 - 115 win over the Sacramento Kings at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Monday . The Suns ( 1 - 3 ) needed the win desperately after posting the worst three - game point differential in league history to open the season . The team started out with a 48 - point opening night loss to Portland , and was soon after blown out by nearly the same margin at the hands of the Clippers . Phoenix 's tumultuous start took a turn for the worse as star point guard Eric Bledsoe tweeted out `` I do n't want to be here `` on Saturday , the same day the Suns parted ways with head coach Earl Watson . Things looked better for the new - look Phoenix team on Monday , however , as Bledsoe sat out the game and interim head coach Jay Triano took over the reigns for the first time . The Suns ' offense fired on all cylinders , as the team shot over 55 percent from the field while knocking down 10 three - pointers . The team came out of the gate running , establishing a 19 - point lead in the fourth quarter . Though Sacramento mounted a valiant late - game comeback effort , Phoenix ultimately held on to the lead . Third-year guard Devin Booker led the offensive charge , scoring 22 points on an efficient 8 - of - 16 shooting . The Suns also saw the most promising performance thus far from reigning fourth overall pick Josh Jackson . Jackson delivered 15 points on 6 - of - 8 shooting in 24 minutes off the bench . The Kings ( 1 - 3 ) , meanwhile , dropped their second straight game despite a tough comeback effort . The game ended in a series of free - throws for each team , with veteran point guard George Hill hitting two straight to pull the Kings within a single point . Sacramento also saw clutch play from rookie phenom De'Aaron Fox . Fox had a late - game bucket to tie the score and an ensuing steal , but was unable to capitalize on the opportunity . Still , Fox was the bright spot for the Kings in the win , as he delivered a highly - impressive 19 points , four assists , and three steals off the bench . Fox has scored 14 or more points in three of his four games thus far and is averaging over five assists per game as well . Sacramento will host the Pelicans on Friday , while Phoenix will play host to the Jazz on Wednesday .
The host Phoenix Suns took down the Utah Jazz , 97 - 88 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Wednesday . Phoenix ( 2 - 3 ) started off the season in unfortunate fashion , posting the worst three - game point differential in NBA history to open the new year . At the end of that three - game stretch , the Suns saw the firing of head coach Earl Watson and a public trade demand from star point guard Eric Bledsoe . However , since firing Watson and benching Bledsoe , Phoenix has won two straight games . On Wednesday , the Suns got off to a hot start , establishing a double - digit first - half lead and holding onto it for the remainder of the game . On offense , the team was led by an efficient performance from young wing T.J. Warren . Warren shot 12 - of - 20 from the floor and scored a game - high 27 points . Bench big man Alex Len also showed promise , delivering a 13 - point , 12 - rebound double - double . Utah ( 2 - 3 ) , meanwhile , has dropped two games on back - to - back nights . The Jazz have seen some struggles on the offensive end following the departure of All-Star Gordon Hayward in free agency . Utah has eclipsed 100 points just once in its first five games of the new season . Wednesday night saw the team struggle especially , as the Jazz scored only 88 points on 41 percent shooting against a relatively weak Suns defense . The team 's top scorer differed for the fifth straight game , as combo wing Rodney Hood led the team with 22 points on 7 - of - 16 shooting . It was a strong outing from star center Rudy Gobert as well , as the French big man finished with 16 points , 14 rebounds , and four blocks . However , the Jazz still appear to be finding their groove with their new `` offense by committee `` strategy . The Jazz will host the Los_Angeles Lakers on Saturday , while the Suns will visit Portland .
The Orlando Magic defeated the hosting Phoenix Suns , 128 - 112 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Friday evening . Orlando ( 8 - 4 ) have extended their impressive start to the season and now they have won four of their past six contests . Meanwhile , the Suns ( 4 - 9 ) are 0 - 3 during their current six - game homestand and remain one of the worst teams in the Western_Conference this season . The Magic cruised their way from start to finish , as they jumped off to a 36 - 32 lead in the first quarter and never looked back . Orlando used a huge third quarter to pull away , however , as they won that period 33 - 20 to generate a 14 - point advantage heading into the final quarter . Phoenix could n't bounce back , and Orlando sealed the deal rather comfortably . Aaron Gordon led the way for the Magic , as the power forward shined while leading Orlando 's attack thanks to a double - double of 22 points and 11 rebounds , although he also added three assists , two steals and two blocks to fill the stat sheet properly . Nikola Vucevic added 19 points , and Terrence Ross added 17 . Jonathon Simmons also scored 17 points , although the former San Antonio Spurs small came off the bench and only needed 26 minutes to leave a mark in this game . On the other end , T.J. Warren picked up the slack offensively for the Suns and finished the game with 20 points , while Alex Len registered a double - double thanks to 22 points , 13 rebounds , and two blocks . Devin Booker struggled from the field , and only finished with nine points while making just three of his 10 shots .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the Phoenix Suns 100 - 93 on Monday at Talking Sick Resort Arena . The Lakers ( 6 - 8 ) managed to put together a solid team effort on their way to ending their three - game losing streak , as five different players managed to score in double figures Monday night . Jordan Clarkson led the way with an efficient 25 points in just 26 minutes off the bench , while Kentavious Caldwell-Pope and Brook Lopez each notched 15 points of their own , with Lopez adding a team - high 10 rebounds . Los_Angeles was ultimately able to bury the its opponent thanks to its hot three - point shooting , shooting 14 - of - 33 from behind the arc . As for the Suns ( 5 - 10 ) , they were unable to have the same success shooting the basketball , as they shot just 27 percent from behind the arc and 39 percent from the field overall . Just three Phoenix players score in double figures Monday night , but one of them , Devin Booker , put on a brilliant offensive performance , shooting 14 - of - 27 from the field en route to scoring a game - high 36 points in 38 minutes . T.J Warren was also impressive , scoring 23 points and grabbing eight rebounds in 35 minutes . Second-year forward Dragan Bender was the only other Suns player who managed to reach double figures , scoring 15 points in 20 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Lakers will head home Wednesday to take on the 76ers , while the Suns , who have lost six of their last seven , will play the Rockets on Thursday .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the visiting Chicago Bulls , 113 - 105 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Sunday evening . It seemed as if the Bulls ( 3 - 11 ) were set to come away with a win considering how good they looked during the first quarter , but the Suns ( 7 - 11 ) did n't rattle and managed to pull away thanks to a huge second quarter in which they won 31 - 19 . Knowing they had a one - point advantage heading into the fourth quarter , Phoenix decided to close things out and limited Chicago to just 21 points in the final 12 minutes . The Suns now started a two - game winning streak thanks to this victory , while the Bulls ' bad season continues with their 11th defeat of the campaign . T.J. Warren led the way for Phoenix with a stellar 27 - point , seven - rebound effort that saw him score 13 of his 20 shot attempts during the game . Devin Booker contributed with 15 points despite the fact he only shot 5 - for - 15 from the field , and Greg Monroe added 10 points , five rebounds and four assists across 21 minutes of action . Phoenix 's bench also joined the party and the second unit as a whole provided 50 points . Mike James ( 15 points ) and Alex Len ( 10 points , eight rebounds ) led the scoring off the bench . Chicago 's undisputed star in this game was no other than Lauri Markkanen . The rookie once again looked sensational and even though his efforts were not enough for the Bulls , he still finished the game with 26 points and 12 rebounds . Robin Lopez contributed with a double - double of his own since he finished with 16 points and 10 boards , while Kris Dunn ( 17 points , six rebounds , six assists ) provided quite a spark off the bench .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the host Phoenix Suns in overtime , 113 - 107 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Wednesday . This was a competitive game between two teams who have recently traded pieces , as there were 12 ties and 10 lead changes in total . Turnovers really killed Phoenix , as they committed a season - high 29 of them , while forcing just 14 from Milwaukee . The Bucks won despite being outrebounded , 60 - 42 . Milwaukee 's starters really put it to Phoenix 's starters , as they outscored them , 105 - 63 . Phoenix were just 1 - of - 7 from the field in the overtime , as they also committed four turnovers . The Bucks ( 9 - 8 ) were led by Khris Middleton , as he accrued 40 points , nine rebounds , three assists and four steals . Eric Bledsoe collected 30 points , six rebounds , seven assists and two steals against his former team . Thon Maker amassed 16 points , eight rebounds and three blocks . Malcolm Brogdon totaled 14 points , three rebounds , three assists and two blocks . The Suns ( 7 - 12 ) best player was Devin Booker , as he tallied 23 points , four rebounds , four assists and three blocks . T.J , Warren produced 20 points , 11 rebounds and three steals . Greg Monroe provided 22 points and 15 rebounds off the bench against his former team .
The Washington Wizards defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 109 - 99 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Thursday . Despite the fact that there were only two ties and three lead changes in total , this was a close game throughout . In fact , neither team led by more than 12 points , as it was a single - digit margin for all but but a few minutes . With that said , the Wizards actually held their led for the final 30 minutes . The assist - to - turnover ratio was a huge factor , with Washington recording three more assists than Phoenix , while committing three less turnovers , The Wizards also hit 50 percent of their shots , while holding the Suns to just 46 percent shooting . The Wizards ( 14 - 11 ) were led by Bradley Beal , as he tallied 34 points , two rebounds and four assists . Markieff Morris was the only other starter in double figures , as he amassed 21 points , six rebounds and two steals . Kelly Oubre Jr. led the bench with 12 points , seven rebounds and three assists . The Suns ( 9 - 18 ) best player was T.J. Warren , as he accrued 23 points and eight rebounds . Greg Monroe started at center and totaled 15 points , seven rebounds and five assists . Tyler Ulis collected 13 points , four rebounds and six assists . On deck for Phoenix is a road matchup versus the San_Antonio Spurs on Saturday . As for Washington , they travel to face the Los_Angeles Clippers on Saturday as well .
The Minnesota Timberwolves took down the host Phoenix Suns , 115 - 106 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Saturday . Minnesota ( 20 - 13 ) escaped a tough comeback effort from the Suns in the second half . The Wolves ' 21 - point halftime lead was cut to just six by the end of the third , as Phoenix exploded for 37 points in the quarter . Still , a hard - nosed effort from Minnesota 's stars helped them to prevail . Jimmy Butler , who led the team with 32 points , had two clutch free - throws to help put the game out of reach in the final minute . The Wolves also benefited from a double - double from third - year big man and former Rookie of the Year winner Karl-Anthony Towns . Towns shot an efficient 6 - of - 10 and pulled down 14 rebounds in the game . With the win , Minnesota has now won six of its last eight games and maintains its two - game lead on the fourth seed in the Western_Conference . Phoenix ( 12 - 23 ) is down its star player , Devin Booker , who is out with a groin injury . Still , the team entered Saturday 's game having won three of its previous four contests . Against Minnesota , the team was able to make up for Booker 's missing scoring production with balanced team play . Five players scored in double figures , and the team shot 46 percent from the field while knocking down 11 three - pointers on the night . Forward T.J. Warren led the team with 24 points , adding nine rebounds and two steals . The bench proved a key ingredient in the comeback effort as well , as 51 of Phoenix 's points came from the second unit . Ultimately , though , Minnesota 's star - powered offense won out against the shorthanded Phoenix lineup . The Timberwolves will visit the Lakers for a Christmas Day showdown at Staples_Center on Monday . Phoenix , meanwhile , will gear up for a game against Memphis on Tuesday .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Phoenix Suns , 123 - 110 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Sunday . Despite the fact that Philadelphia led for all but a few minutes and won by 13 , it was close until the final minutes . In fact , Philly turned a one - point lead into a 13 - point win by finishing the game on an 18 - 6 run over the final five minutes . Rebounding was a huge factor , with Philadelphia outrebounding Phoenix , 44 - 34 . The shooting disparity was huge as well , as the Sixers hit 56 percent of their shots , while holding the Suns to under 43 percent shooting . The Sixers ( 17 - 19 ) were led by Dario Saric , as he tallied 27 points , four rebounds , two assists and three steals . J.J. Redick amassed 22 points and three assists . Joel Embiid finished with 22 points , nine rebounds , five assists and two steals . Ben Simmons collected 21 points , 10 rebounds , six assists , three steals and three blocks . The Suns ( 14 - 24 ) were led by Devin Booker , as he totaled 32 points , five rebounds and six assists . T.J. Warren accrued 28 points and three rebounds . Tyson Chandler recorded a 10 - point , 11 - rebound double - double . On deck for Phoenix is a home matchup versus the Atlanta Hawks on Tuesday . As for Philadelphia , they play host to the San_Antonio Spurs on Wednesday .
The visiting Houston Rockets pummeled the Phoenix Suns , 112 - 95 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Friday . Despite the absence of superstar James Harden ( hamstring ) , Friday 's game was smooth sailing for the Rockets ( 30 - 11 ) . While Phoenix got off to a relatively hot start , the Rockets were able to take the lead by the end of the first quarter and hold it for the remainder of the game . Even with Harden out , Houston 's starting five made a big splash . The Rockets opted for what was an essentially seven - man rotation , with Briante Weber getting just six minutes of play as the third man off the bench . Houston 's starters capitalized on the heavy playing time , scoring 92 combined points and knocking down 12 three - pointers . Chris Paul was the team 's top scorer with 25 points . Clint Capela , meanwhile , posted a double - double with 17 points and 16 rebounds . The Suns ( 16 - 27 ) were also missing a few key players , as forwards Marquese Chriss ( hip ) and Josh Jackson ( hip ) were both sidelined on Friday . Their absence was unfortunate for Phoenix , as the team needed all the help it could get on what was a rough night for the final three quarters . Turnovers were a factor in the Suns ' poor showing , as the team committed 19 on the night . Another issue was Phoenix 's seeming inability to draw contact . The team attempted only nine free - throws on the night . On Sunday . Phoenix will host the Indiana Pacers . The Rockets , meanwhile , will continue their road trip with a visit to Los_Angeles to take on the Clippers on Monday .
In a battle of two of the league 's rising young teams , the New_York Knicks defeated the Phoenix Suns , 107 - 85 . It was not exactly a crowd - pleaser at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Friday , as New_York ( 22 - 28 ) jumped out to a double - digit lead within 10 minutes of the game beginning . While Phoenix ( 17 - 32 ) was able to claw its way back a bit in the second quarter , the Knicks stayed focused and delivered an even more dominant second - half performance . Star shooting guard Devin Booker did not help Phoenix 's case by being ejected in the third quarter of the game . Booker , who had already been assessed a flagrant foul earlier in the game , was removed after pushing New_York center Enes Kanter . With Booker out and Phoenix 's offensive options limited , the Knicks cruised to a much - needed victory . While Kanter 's most valuable play may have been taking a shove from Booker , he also led the Knicks with 20 points and 10 rebounds . Kanter was wildly efficient , shooting 8 - of - 10 from the floor in the win . In the surprise of the night , Knicks guard Trey Burke scored 18 points in just 17 minutes of play off the bench . The former University of Michigan star shot 8 - of - 14 while leading the Knicks ' bench unit in scoring . Phoenix , meanwhile , was limited offensively thanks largely to Booker 's early absence . With their number one option sidelined for a large portion of the game , the Suns shot just 35 percent from the field on the night . One positive sign , though , was a strong performance off the bench from rookie wing Josh Jackson . Jackson finished with 18 points and eight rebounds to lead the second unit . The Suns will visit Houston this Sunday , while New_York host the Brooklyn Nets on Tuesday .
The Utah Jazz defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 129 - 97 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Friday . These are teams going in opposite directions , as this result shows exactly which way . Not only did Utah win all four individual quarters , the Jazz really dominated in the second and fourth quarters , outscoring the Suns , 69 - 41 . Rebounding was a huge factor , with Utah outrebounding Phoenix , 51 - 32 . The Jazz ended up shooting 57 percent from the field while holding the Suns to just 41 percent shooting . Three-point shooting was a big part of that , as Utah hit 15 - of - 29 and Phoenix connecting on just 9 - of - 33 from long range . The Jazz ( 23 - 28 ) have now won five of their last six games , as they 're fighting their way back into playoff contention . Donovan Mitchell had a gem , as he led the team with 40 points , five rebounds , six assists and two steals on 14 - of - 19 shooting . Ricky Rubio accrued 14 points , six rebounds , nine assists and two steals . Derrick Favors amassed 12 points and 10 rebounds , while Rudy Gobert totaled 10 points , nine rebounds and five blocks . The Suns ( 18 - 35 ) were led by Josh Jackson , as he collected 20 points , four rebounds and two blocks . Devin Booker accumulated 18 points , four rebounds and six assists . Dragan Bender led the bench with 16 points , nine rebounds and five assists . On deck for Utah is a road matchup versus the San_Antonio Spurs on Saturday . As for Phoenix , they play host to the Charlotte Hornets on Sunday .
The visiting Charlotte Hornets overcame the Phoenix Suns , 115 - 110 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Sunday . After three quarters of strong play , Phoenix ceded its double - digit lead to the Hornets in the fourth quarter . Though the Suns led by as much as 21 , turnovers proved costly late in the game . The team committed the bulk of their 19 turnovers in the second half , allowing Charlotte to quickly erase the lead and turn the tables . Guard Treveon Graham helped spark the run with his strong play off the bench , as he notched a career - high 15 points and two steals in 23 minutes off the bench . Charlotte ( 23 - 29 ) has now won four straight and is heating up after a horrendous start to the season . Though the team remains 11th in the East , it has seen promising play recently . Though Sunday was arguably his poorest game since being snubbed from the All-Star Game , Kemba Walker still scored 18 points in the win . The team 's offensive leaders in the game , though , were Dwight Howard , who had 18 points and 14 rebounds , and Nicolas Batum , who shot 7 - of - 15 en route to a team - high 22 points . Phoenix ( 18 - 36 ) saw promising play from rookie Josh Jackson , despite the team 's less - than - inspiring result . Jackson led the team with 23 points , which came on 10 - of - 14 shooting . Star shooting guard Devin Booker also excelled , scoring 18 points to go with five rebounds and a team - high nine assists . Next up for Phoenix is the Los_Angeles Lakers , who will host the Suns on Tuesday . The Hornets , meanwhile will visit Denver on Monday .
The San_Antonio Spurs demolished the Phoenix Suns , 129 - 81 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Wednesday . It did not take long for Wednesday 's game to get out of hand for the Suns , as San_Antonio 's stifling defense held them to just nine first - quarter points . While their offense got back on track a bit in the second quarter , the team 's defense collapsed . The Spurs scored 41 second - quarter points to take a 38 - point lead at the half . The game was effectively out of reach for the Suns , who only allowed the deficit to grow in the second half . The Spurs led by as much as 53 . San_Antonio ( 35 - 21 ) earned their largest win of the season despite the absence of star player Kawhi Leonard ( shoulder ) . The win was never really in jeopardy , as the team 's 50 percent shooting and 16 three - pointers allowed them to stay well ahead of the lackluster Suns offense . All-Star big man LaMarcus Aldridge led the team with 23 points and 13 rebounds in only 28 minutes of play . Patty Mills was the top scorer off the bench with 18 points . Phoenix ( 18 - 38 ) was without its own star player , as Devin Booker ( hip ) sat out his second straight contest . Still , the Suns are no stranger to enormous deficits . Of the six games across the NBA that have been decided by 40 or more points this season , Phoenix has been on the losing end of three of them . The team shot only 34 percent from the floor and went a dismal 3 - of - 32 from beyond the arc in the loss . The leading scorer was bench big man Alex Len with 14 points , many of which came in garbage time . The Spurs will visit Golden_State on Saturday , while Phoenix will host the Denver Nuggets .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 123 - 113 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Saturday . While this was a competitive game throughout , Denver had a late run to decide things . In fact , Denver went on a 22 - 8 run after the game was tied 87 - 87 late in the third quarter , as Phoenix never got the game within six points from there . Prior to that big run , no team ever obtained a double - digit lead , as there were five ties and six lead changes in total . While most of the statistics were even , free - throw shooting really decided things . In fact , Denver went 20 - of - 22 from the free - throw line while Phoenix hit just 14 - of - 25 . The Nuggets ( 30 - 26 ) got a season - high 26 points out of Wilson Chandler , as he did that on 11 - of - 15 from the field . Will Barton finished with 25 points , five rebounds and five assists on 10 - of - 14 shooting . Nikola Jokic collected 21 points , nine rebounds and seven assists . The Suns ( 18 - 39 ) were led by T.J. Warren , as he tallied 31 points , five rebounds and two assists on 13 - of - 17 from the field . Dragan Bender amassed 23 points , eight rebounds , four assists and two blocks . Josh Jackson accrued 20 points , seven rebounds , five assists and four blocks . Elfrid Payton made his Suns debut and provided 19 points , six rebounds and nine assists . On deck for Phoenix is a road matchup versus the Golden_State Warriors on Monday . As for Denver , they play host to the San_Antonio Spurs on Tuesday for their next fixture .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 128 - 117 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Friday . The final scoreline makes this game look much closer than it actually was , as Los_Angeles won in wire - to - wire fashion . In fact , they led 40 - 18 after the first quarter , as the final scoreline was the closest margin since the middle of the first quarter . The shooting was the true difference , with the Clippers hitting 52 percent from the field , 44 percent from three - point range and 75 percent from the free - throw line . The Suns finished 44 percent from the field , 29 percent from long range and 58 percent from the charity stripe . The Clippers ( 31 - 27 ) were once again led by Lou Williams off their bench , as he provided 35 points , three rebounds and four assists . Tobias Harris finished with 30 points , 12 rebounds , four assists and two blocks . Austin Rivers accrued 17 points , two rebounds and six assists . DeAndre Jordan amassed 11 points , 13 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . The Suns ( 18 - 42 ) were led by T.J. Warren , as he tallied 27 points , eight rebounds and two steals . Devin Booker totaled 27 points and four assists . Alex Len accumulated 14 points and 13 rebounds . Josh Jackson led the bench with 19 points , seven rebounds and three assists . On deck for Phoenix is a home matchup versus the Portland Trail_Blazers on Saturday . As for Los_Angeles , they 're off until Tuesday when they travel to face the Denver Nuggets .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 106 - 104 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Saturday evening . The Trail_Blazers got out to a good start but the Suns would not let them get away that easy , as they fought to keep it tight through the first quarter . The Trail_Blazers took a 28 - 24 lead into the second , and maintained a slight edge as they pushed their lead to 55 - 50 by halftime . Things took a turn in the third , as the Suns went on a 12 - 1 run to take a 10 - point advantage with two minutes left in the quarter , and held on to an 81 - 71 lead heading into the fourth . The Suns kept the pressure on and held an 11 - point lead with just 5:45 left in the contest . However , the Trail_Blazers were not finished as they went on a 13 - 2 run to tie it up at 97 with 2:38 remaining . The teams went back and forth over the last couple minutes , with the game tied at 104 with just 20 seconds left , setting the scene for Damian Lillard to execute in the clutch and seal the game for Portland with a game - winning drive and layup at the buzzer . The marks the third straight win for Portland and the ninth straight loss for Phoenix . Lillard led the Trail_Blazers with a game - high 40 points on 13 - of - 27 shooting , along with 10 rebounds , five assists and one steal , in 38 minutes of action . C.J . McCollum followed up with 21 points , four assists and three rebounds , while Jusuf Nurkic finished with 14 points , 13 rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one steal . The Blazers shot 39 percent from the field , including just 6 - of - 30 from long range . Meanwhile , Devin Booker led the Suns with 30 points , nine rebounds , three assists and two blocks , in 39 minutes . T.J. Warren followed up with 19 points , three rebounds , three blocks , one steal and one assist , while Elfrid Payton tallied 13 points , 11 assists , six rebounds and one steal . Alex Len had a solid night with 11 points and 13 rebounds . The Suns shot 45 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 26 from long range . The Suns ( 18 - 43 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Pelicans in New_Orleans on Monday . The Trail_Blazers ( 34 - 26 ) play host to the Kings on Tuesday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Phoenix Suns , 129 - 107 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Tuesday evening behind a triple - double from LeBron James . James recorded 28 points , 13 rebounds , and 11 assists , all of which were team highs for Cleveland ( 39 - 28 ) . The triple - double was the 69th of James ' career and his 14th this season . Tuesday 's game was never really in question , as the Cavaliers scored 38 points in the first quarter to jump out to an almost instant 20 - point lead . While Phoenix ( 19 - 50 ) managed to rack up 107 points on the night , that total was actually the lowest the Cavs ' defense has allowed in their last six games . The Suns foundered in part due to poor three - point shooting . Phoenix went just 6 - of - 32 from beyond the arc . Kyle Korver shot 6 - of - 7 from the field and had 22 points as he joined the starting lineup for Cleveland on Tuesday . Korver replaced J.R. Smith as the team 's starting shooting guard , a change that head coach Ty Lue indicated may be long - term . Smith had a nice night of his own off the bench , scoring 14 points while going 5 - of - 12 from the field , including two three - pointers . The long ball in general was falling for Cleveland , as the team hit 17 three - pointers on over 48 percent shooting from beyond the arc . Phoenix , meanwhile , struggled to find reliable offense when not at the free - throw line . While the Suns racked up points at the foul line , where they went 25 - of - 30 , they also shot just 39 percent from the field and could not seem to buy a bucket from beyond the arc . Forward T.J. Warren was one of the lone bright spots for the Suns , as he scored 19 points to go with 10 rebounds . Both teams will take to the road on Thursday , as the Cavaliers will visit Portland while the Suns will travel to Utah .
The Golden_State Warriors took down the Phoenix Suns , 124 - 109 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Saturday Evening . Golden_State ( 53 - 17 ) saw Quinn Cook and Nick Young step up big time to fill the holes in their shortened lineup . All-Stars Steph Curry , Klay Thompson , and Kevin Durant all missed Saturday 's tilt with various injuries . In their absence , Cook and Young combined for 48 points to lead a high - powered Warriors offense to a commanding victory . Golden_State shot 53 percent from the field en route to 124 points . The Warriors led by double digits for much of the fourth quarter . Draymond Green scored 25 points , coming up big with his fellow All-Stars on the bench . Green added 11 rebounds and eight assists . Cook was the team 's leading scorer with 28 points , which included five three - pointers . Off the bench , big man Kevon Looney delivered a whopping seven blocks to help lead a strong defensive effort for Golden_State . Phoenix ( 19 - 52 ) , meanwhile , lost by a decisive margin but saw a promising game from rookie forward Josh Jackson . Jackson , the reigning fourth overall pick , scored a career - high 36 points in the loss . He shot 14 - of - 24 from the field , including 2 - of - 4 from three - point range , and had seven rebounds and four assists . Sharpshooter Troy Daniels added another 18 points for the Suns . Next up for the Warriors is a trip to San_Antonio on Monday . The Suns , meanwhile , will host the Detroit Pistons on Tuesday .

However , the Suns answered back in the second , by outscoring the Celtics , 30 - 17 , to cut the deficit to just three by halftime , where they trailed 48 - 45 . The Suns came out strong in the third quarter and took a three - point lead just a couple minutes in . However , the Celtics regained control , as they got back on top by the halfway point in the quarter and hung on to take a 77 - 65 lead into the final frame . The Celtics were able to maintain a double - digit lead for most of the fourth quarter , as they cruised to their fourth straight win . Jayson Tatum led the Celtics with 23 points , six rebounds and two steals , in 32 minutes of action . The Los_Angeles Clippers breezed by the Phoenix Suns , 111 - 99 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Wednesday evening . The Clippers ( 41 - 34 ) held the Suns ( 19 - 57 ) scoreless for the first six minutes of the fourth quarter , going on a 150 run that allowed them to run away with the game . LA carved up Phoenix 's weak defense , shooting 54 percent on its shot attempts from the field . The Suns , meanwhile , were playing without star shooting guard Devin Booker , and his absence showed . The team capitalized on just 44 percent of its attempts and struggled to find scoring towards the end of the game . The win was crucial for the Clippers , who now sit just one game behind the Utah Jazz for the final playoff spot in the Western_Conference . Tobias Harris led the team with 27 points in the important win . Harris was one of six Clippers to score in double digits , including All-Star big man DeAndre Jordan . Jordan posted a double - double , tallying 13 points and 15 rebounds . The loss may have been a good thing for the Suns , who own the league 's worst record , and thus the best chance at the number one draft pick this June . The team was without its top two scorers for the season , Devin Booker and T.J. Warren , who have been sidelined with injuries over the season 's closing stretch . The Suns dove deep into their roster to find scoring on Wednesday , managing five double digit scorers despite the bare bones lineup . Sophomore guard Tyler Ulis led the team with 23 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting , while bench guard Shaquille Harrison had another 17 . Both teams will take to the road on Friday . The Clippers will visit Portland , while the Suns will travel to Houston .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the Sacramento Kings , 97 - 94 , at Talking_Stick_Resort_Arena on Tuesday evening . Sacramento ( 25 - 54 ) nearly caught up to the Suns ( 20 - 59 ) at the end , going on an 80 run in the final three minutes of the game to cut Phoenix 's lead from 11 to just three . However , the Suns managed to escape defeat and ended their franchise - worst losing streak at 15 games . The Suns benefited from a poor shooting night from the Kings , who shot just 37 percent from the field . Rookie forward Josh Jackson led the Suns on the offensive end , scoring 28 points on a team - high 23 shot attempts . Jackson 's big night has become the new norm for the first - year stud , who is averaging over 17 points per game since the All-Star Break . Big man Alex Len also turned in a stellar performance for Phoenix . He delivered 17 points and 15 rebounds off the bench in the win . Sacramento saw its own rookies lead the way . Bogdan Bogdonavic scored a team - high 22 points in the loss . Justin Jackson added 19 points along with eight rebounds and four assists . However , star rookie De'Aaron Fox was one of the biggest causes of the Kings ' offensive woes . Fox shot just 3 - of - 14 from the field en route to 14 points on the night . He did , however , contribute nine rebounds and five assists with only one turnover . On Friday , the Kings will visit Memphis while Phoenix will host the New_Orleans Pelicans .

The Suns ( 20 - 61 ) , meanwhile , were without guards Devin Booker and Elfrid Payton , which made mounting a comeback even more difficult . Phoenix struggled on the offensive end immensely , shooting just 42 percent from the field and 28 percent from three - point range . The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the host Oklahoma_City Thunder , 115 - 113 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Sunday . Despite the fact that Minnesota led for over 45 minutes of this game , it came down to the final seconds . In fact , no one led by more than seven points for the final nine minutes , as there were numerous late shots to decide the game . Karl-Anthony Towns started the chaos by hitting a floater with 10 seconds left to take a two - point lead for Minnesota . Carmelo Anthony then responded by hitting a three with four seconds left to take a one - point lead . On a hectic inbound , Andrew Wiggins took it the length of the floor and banked in a three - pointer at the buzzer to escape with the win . The Thunder made quite a fury to fight back , as they outscored the T'Wolves , 38 - 27 , in the fourth quarter . The key for Minnesota was rebounding , as they won that battle , 45 - 36 . In addition , the Timberwolves dominated the fastbreak differential , 20 - 6 . The Timberwolves ( 2 - 1 ) got 27 points , seven rebounds and four assists from Wiggins . Towns finished with 27 points of his own , adding 12 rebounds to his line . Jeff Teague had his best game in Minnesota , accumulating 19 points , six rebounds and nine assists . Jimmy Butler amassed 15 points , six rebounds and six assists . The Thunder ( 1 - 2 ) had six players score in double figures , but had the other four players who played combine for just four points in total . Russell Westbrook led the way , as he tallied 31 points , five rebounds and 10 assists . Anthony 's late three led to his 23 points , two rebounds and two assists . Paul George accrued 14 points , six rebounds and eight assists , while Steven Adams recorded a 17 - point , 13 - rebound double - double . Both teams will host the Indiana Pacers for their next game , with Minnesota hosting them on Tuesday and Oklahoma_City playing them on Wednesday .

The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 120 - 117 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Friday evening . The Thunder ( 17 - 15 ) came into Friday 's game with an impressive 11 - 4 home record and far more star power than the visiting Hawks ( 7 - 25 ) , but that perceived advantage meant little early on . Atlanta matched Oklahoma_City point for point in the first quarter , but the home squad was able to pull away in the second quarter to forge a 64 - 50 halftime advantage . However , the visitors came out of halftime refocused , as they enjoyed a 31 - 18 edge in the third period and entered the final 12 minutes trailing by a single point . A back - and - forth fourth quarter came to a critical juncture with 11 seconds remaining , as Ersan Ilyasova knotted the game at 117 - 117 with a pair of free throws . Russell Westbrook then scored the most important three points of his game - high 30 on a 27 - foot jumper that found the net with under two seconds remaining , providing the Thunder with the final margin of victory . As the final score implied , both teams put on a shooting clinic , with the Hawks posting a 52 percent success rate from the field and OKC draining 54 percent of their 82 shot attempts . The home team did enjoy a clear rebounding advantage , winning the battle on the glass by a 40 - 27 margin . Marco Belinelli started for Dennis Schroder ( ankle ) and spearheaded the Hawks with 27 points , a total he supplemented with five assists , one rebound , one steal and one block . Ilyasova followed with 22 points , three boards , one assist and one steal . Malcolm Delaney was next with a bench - leading 20 points and added six assists , two rebounds and one steal . John Collins registered 16 points , nine rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block across 27 minutes off the bench . Kent Bazemore supplied 11 points , six assists , three rebounds and four steals . Taurean Prince managed eight points , three boards , three assists and one steal . Westbrook complemented his aforementioned scoring total with 15 assists , seven rebounds , two steals and one block . Carmelo Anthony tallied 24 points , one rebound , one assist , one steal and one block . Paul George pitched in 17 points , five rebounds , two assists , three steals and one block . Steven Adams posted a 16 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and two steals . Raymond Felton led the bench with 10 points , two assists and one rebound . Andre Roberson mustered eight points and nine rebounds . The Hawks head back home to face off with the Dallas Mavericks on Saturday night , while the Thunder hit the road and tangle with the Utah Jazz on Saturday evening as well .

Dallas bounced back from a 63 - 57 halftime deficit to outscore OKC by a 59 - 50 margin in the second half . Dynamic first - round pick Dennis Smith , Jr. came through in the clutch as well to stave off a Thunder comeback , as he drained a 25 - foot three - point jumper and a 26 - foot jump bank shot to overcome a one - point deficit and snap a 108 - 108 tie inside of two minutes . He subsequently scored the Mavericks ' last five points to provide the necessary cushion for the rare road win . Harrison Barnes led the way for the visitors with 24 points , a total he supplemented with four rebounds , two assists and one block . Barea provided a 12 - point , 11 - assist , seven - rebound effort to lead the bench . Wesley Matthews tallied nine points , six assists , two rebounds and one block . The Oklahoma_City Thunder ( 24 - 20 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 13 - 30 ) 95 - 88 on Monday at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena . The Kings started the game strong , opening up a lead as large as 15 points in the first half , but a late run by the Thunder in the second quarter carried over into the third , and from that point on , there was no looking back for Oklahoma_City . The Thunder ended up winning the third quarter by 15 points and then never allowed Sacramento to get back into the game . Carmelo Anthony led the way scoring for Oklahoma_City on Monday , posting a team - high 20 points , while Russell Westbrook fell an assist shy of a triple - double with 19 points , 16 rebounds and nine assists , but he also recorded 10 turnovers . Paul George added 18 points , while Steven Adams recorded a double - double of 13 points and 13 rebounds . As for the Kings , five players managed to score in double figures with Buddy Hield 's 16 points leading the way . As a team , however , Sacramento had a miserable shooting night . The Kings hit just 24 percent of their shots from behind the arc and shot just 40 from the field overall . On top of that , they hit just 15 of their 25 shots from the free throw line . In the end , what really hurt Sacramento was how the team got dominated on the glass , as the Thunder managed to grab 18 offensive rebounds and out - rebounded the Kings 58 - 37 . Up next , the Thunder will take on the Lakers at home on Wednesday , while the Kings will look to put an end to their current five - game losing streak Wednesday against the Jazz .

The second quarter was a different story , as the Thunder only scored two points over the first 5:30 , allowing the Lakers a chance to get back in it . However , the Thunder still led 60 - 54 at halftime . The Lakers opened the third with a three , to make it a possession game , but the Thunder quickly pulled away , expanding the lead to double digits , to take a 93 - 72 lead into the fourth . The Thunder stayed in control through the final frame , en route to their third straight win . The Thunder shot 48 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 35 from long range . Meanwhile , Julius Randle led the Lakers with 16 points on 8 - of - 11 shooting . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope was the only other player to score in double digits for L.A. , as he finished with 10 points on 3 - of - 5 shooting . Josh Hart chipped in nine points , three rebounds , two assists and two steals , in 26 minutes off the bench . The Lakers shot 47 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 26 from long range . The Lakers ( 15 - 29 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Pacers on Friday . The Thunder ( 25 - 20 ) will look to keep rolling , as they take on the Cavs in Cleveland on Saturday .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Brooklyn Nets 109 - 108 on Tuesday at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena . Things were n't looking too great for the Thunder 24 minutes into Tuesday 's contest , as OKC went into the locker room down by 12 points to the visiting Nets ( 18 - 30 ) and were still down 11 heading into the final period . However , a monster comeback over the last 12 minutes that was capped off by a game - winning layup from Russell Westbrook allowed the Thunder to extend their winning streak to five games . Westbrook finished with a game - high 32 points to go along with five rebounds , six assists and two steals , while Paul George was close behind him , scoring 28 points and grabbing nine rebounds in 37 minutes . In the end , Oklahoma_City was able to overcome a very poor shooting night from outside , as the team hit just 28 percent of its shots from behind the arc . As for Brooklyn , it was a complete team effort , with six different players scoring in double figures . The surprise , however , was that Joe Harris led the way scoring for the Nets , as the reserve shooting guard came off the bench on fire . Harris finished with a game - high 19 points while hitting all five of his shots from downtown . Harris ' hot shooting was contagious too , as Brooklyn as a team shot an impressive 42 percent from three - point range . Harris also led a strong effort from the team 's second unit Tuesday , with the Nets ' bench accounting for 55 of the team 's 108 points .
The New_Orleans Pelicans defeated the host Oklahoma_City Thunder , 114 - 100 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Friday evening . The Pelicans started out strong with an early 10 - 4 lead , however the Thunder came roaring back , outscoring the Pelicans 28 - 12 the rest of the quarter , to take a 32 - 22 lead into the second . The Thunder led by 11 mid way through the second quarter , but the Pelicans made a run to tighten the gap , so that they trailed 58 - 54 , by halftime . The third quarter belonged to the Pelicans , as they overtook the lead within the first couple of minutes . They maintained the lead for the rest of the quarter and took a 90 - 83 lead into the final frame . The Pelicans did a great job to maintain a safe cushion the rest of the way , as the Thunder were not able to get back within striking distance . Anthony Davis led the way for the Pelicans with 43 points on 17 - of - 34 shooting , 10 rebounds , three steals and one block , in 37 minutes . E'Twaun Moore followed up with 26 points on 10 - of - 14 shooting , four rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 32 minutes . Jrue Holiday tallied 11 points , 11 assists , two rebounds and a steal , while Rajon Rondo finished with seven points , seven rebounds , 13 assists and four steals . The Pelicans shot 51 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 24 from long range . Meanwhile , Steven Adams was the high - point man for the Thunder , with 23 points on 8 - of - 13 shooting , and also tallied 12 rebounds and two blocks , in 37 minutes . Russell Westbrook notched a triple - double with 16 points , 14 assists and 10 rebounds , in 36 minutes of action , while Paul George chipped in 15 points on 4 - of - 16 shooting . The Thunder shot 38 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 36 from long range . The Thunder ( 30 - 23 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Lakers on Sunday . The Pelicans ( 28 - 23 ) will be right back in action as they take on the Timberwolves in Minnesota on Saturday .
The Los_Angeles Lakers defeated the host Oklahoma_City Thunder , 108 - 104 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Sunday . It took eight ties and 14 lead changes to determine a winner , as Los_Angeles held off for a close win . They really took control in the final quarter , as they held the lead for the entirety of the fourth quarter . Three-point shooting was a huge factor , with the Lakers hitting 13 - of - 30 and the Thunder going just 7 - of - 25 from long range . Ball movement was also critical , with Los_Angeles outassisting Oklahoma_City , 24 - 17 . The Lakers ( 21 - 31 ) were led by Brook Lopez , as he tallied 20 points , five rebounds and five assists .
