The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the visiting Orlando Magic , 112 - 105 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Monday evening . The Magic got out to a strong start on the road , as they led for most of the first quarter , before taking a 38 - 31 lead into the second . They held strong to start the second and expanded their lead to 10 , five minutes into the quarter . However , the Thunder used an 80 run to close the gap , so that they trailed by just one , 62 - 61 , at halftime . The Thunder turned up the intensity in the third , where they quickly overtook the lead . The Magic tied it up again and the score stayed close until the final minutes of the quarter , where they Thunder pulled away to take an 84 - 77 lead into the fourth . The Thunder pushed their lead to 10 mid way through the fourth and were able to hang on the rest of the way for the crucial win . Paul George led the Thunder with 26 points on 9 - of - 20 shooting , eight rebounds , three assists and one steal , in 36 minutes . Steven Adams finished with 16 points , eight rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one steal , while Russell Westbrook tallied eight points , 12 rebounds , 11 assists and one steal . The Thunder shot 48 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 25 from long range . Meanwhile , five players scored in double digits for the Magic , led by Jonathan Simmons and Evan Fournier , who tallied 19 points each . Arron Gordon tallied 18 points , seven rebounds , three blocks , two steals and one assist . Nikola Vucevic added 15 points , seven rebounds , three assists , two blocks and one steal . The Magic shot 46 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 29 from long range . The Magic ( 18 - 42 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Raptors on Wednesday . The Thunder ( 35 - 27 ) take on the Mavs in Dallas on Wednesday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 122 - 112 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Tuesday evening . The Rockets ( 50 - 13 ) likely came into the contest with a bit of revenge on their minds , considering the Thunder ( 37 - 29 ) had handed them a rather rare 112 - 107 defeat in their only other meeting this season . Fighting to keep the Golden State Warriors at bay for the top spot in the Western_Conference , Houston came out of the gates focused and forged a 54 - 45 halftime lead . They emerged from intermission ready to handle any type of OKC surge as well , as they withstood their hosts ' best quarter until that point by countering their 29 points with 33 of their own . With a 13 - point advantage heading into the final period , the Rockets were able to essentially tread water to seal the 10 - point road win , their 25th of the campaign . Superior shooting on Houston 's part helped them offset 21 turnovers , as they drained 54 percent of their 71 attempts , including 52 percent of their 33 tries from distance . Chris Paul paced the Rockets with 25 points , a total he supplemented with five assists , four rebounds and three steals . James Harden followed with a 23 - point,11 - assist double - double that included five rebounds , four steals and one block . However , he also was guilty of a game - high 10 turnovers . Trevor Ariza supplied 15 points , three rebounds , two assists , three steals and one block . Eric Gordon produced a bench - leading 14 points and added five boards , one assist , one steal and one block . Luc Mbah_a_Moute tallied 11 points , three boards and two assists . Clint Capela generated 10 points , three rebounds , one assist and two blocks , and P.J . Tucker matched Capela 's scoring total while also supplying six boards and three assists . Russell Westbrook led the Thunder with a game - high 32 points and also dished out seven assists , hauled in four rebounds , recorded one steal and posted one block . He was an impressive 15 - for - 27 from the field . Carmelo Anthony managed 23 points , four rebounds and one steal . Paul George registered 17 points , five assists , four rebounds and three steals . Steven Adams delivered 16 points , eight boards , one assist and three steals . Corey Brewer led the bench with 10 points over 23 minutes . The Rockets remain on the road and take on the Milwaukee Bucks on Wednesday night , while the Thunder remains home and awaits a Thursday evening visit from the Phoenix Suns .
The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Sacramento Kings , 106 - 101 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Monday . Despite the fact that Oklahoma_City led for the majority of this game , it was close throughout . In fact , the Thunder never led by more than 10 points despite the Kings being down for all but two minutes of the contest . Shooting was the difference in the game , with Oklahoma_City hitting 45 percent from the field and 44 percent from three - point range . Sacramento connected on just 41 percent from the field and 36 percent from long range . The Thunder starters really dominated the Kings starters as well , outscoring them 81 - 61 . The Kings ( 21 - 47 ) were led by Bogdan Bogdanovic , as he tallied 19 points , eight rebounds and three assists . De'Aaron Fox accrued 11 points and 10 assists . Garrett Temple led the bench with 15 points , seven rebounds and two steals . Zach Randolph finished with 10 points , five rebounds , two assists and two steals . The Thunder ( 40 - 29 ) got another triple - double out of Russell Westbrook , as he collected 17 points , 10 rebounds and 11 assists . Paul George led the team in scoring , totaling 21 points , six rebounds and five assists . Carmelo Anthony matched those 21 points , adding six rebounds to his tally . Corey Brewer amassed 16 points , six rebounds and two steals . Oklahoma_City will play again on Tuesday , as they travel to face the Atlanta Hawks . As for Sacramento , they play host to the Miami Heat on Wednesday for their next fixture .

The Oklahoma_City Thunder defeated the Miami Heat , 105 - 99 , at Chesapeake_Energy_Arena on Friday evening . The Thunder ( 44 - 30 ) were coming off a heartbreaking loss to the Boston Celtics on Tuesday night in which their six - game winning streak came to a screeching halt . OKC was looking to refocus and continue fortifying their Western_Conference playoff seeding , and early on against the Heat ( 39 - 34 ) , they appeared well on track to do so . They established a 24 - 18 advantage after 12 minutes , and despite Miami making a bit of a push in the second period , the home squad still held a four - point edge at halftime . The visitors clawed back to take a slim two - point edge into the final period , but Oklahoma_City turned on the offense at that point . Ultimately , a 12 - 5 run by the home squad over the first 4:1 of the fourth quarter proved to be a pivotal point , as the Heat got close several times afterwards but never quite regained the lead . James Johnson led the way for the Heat with 23 points , a total he supplemented with four boards and two assists . Goran Dragic managed 20 points , five assists , four rebounds and one steal . Justise Winslow supplied 14 points , six rebounds , one steal and one block . Wayne Ellington finished with 14 of his own and added four boards and two assists . Kelly Olynyk delivered nine points , five rebounds and three assists . Tyler Johnson registered eight points , six rebounds and one assist . Russell Westbrook unsurprisingly led the Thunder with a 29 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included eight assists and one steal , notably notching 17 of his points in the fourth quarter . Steven Adams put up 24 points , hauled in 12 rebounds , dished out one assist and recorded one steal . Paul George had a relatively modest but full line of 12 points , five rebounds , four assists and two steals . However , he shot just 3 - for - 16 from the field . Raymond Felton followed with a bench - leading 10 points and also had one rebound , one assist and one steal . Carmelo Anthony mustered six points , six rebounds and one assist . The Heat remain on the road and pay a visit to the Indiana Pacers on Sunday evening , while the Thunder remain home for a showdown with the Portland Trail_Blazers on Sunday night as well .

In a matchup between two Western_Conference teams battling to get into the playoffs , it took an extra session to determine a winner . In fact , there were 13 ties and 15 lead changes in total , as neither team led by more than six points for the final 15 minutes of action . Free-throw shooting was also huge , with the Nuggets hitting 18 - of - 21 and the Thunder connecting on just 15 - of - 26 . Denver also dominated down low , winning the rebounding differential , 59 - 50 , and outscoring the Thunder in the paint , 33 - 13 . The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Utah Jazz , 100 - 97 , at Target_Center on Friday night . A nip - and - tuck battle throughout four quarters fittingly came down to the wire , and a Jamal Crawford three - pointer with 28 seconds remaining proved pivotal . The ageless veteran 's long - range basket gave the Timberwolves ( 1 - 1 ) a 98 - 96 lead that they would n't relinquish . Jimmy Butler , another offseason acquisition , drained a pair of free throws with five seconds left to officially seal the narrow win . Neither team was able to prevail in any one period by more than three points and both shot the ball well , with the Jazz ( 1 - 1 ) actually outpacing Minnesota by a 48 percent to 44 percent spread . All five members of Utah 's first team managed double - digit scoring , with Rodney Hood leading the way . After surprisingly coming off the bench in the season opener , the promising two - guard was back with the first unit and posted 20 points , four assists , one rebound and one steal . Ricky Rubio , facing his old squad for the first time , chipped in with a 19 - point , 10 - assist double - double that also included five boards and two steals . Derrick Favors contributed 16 points , four rebounds , three assists and a block . Joe Ingles managed 14 points , three rebounds , two assists and two steals , draining four of five three - point attempts in the process . Rudy Gobert contributed a 10 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included two steals and two blocks . Veteran Thabo Sefolosha paced the bench with nine points , five rebounds and a steal . Andrew Wiggins produced his second strong performance in as many games to open the campaign , tallying 21 points and five rebounds . Karl-Anthony Towns followed with 20 points , 10 rebounds , one assist , two blocks and a steal . Crawford was next with a 17 - point contribution in 20 minutes off the bench . Butler stuffed the stat sheet with 13 points , seven boards , three assists and five steals . Jeff Teague and Nemanja Bjelica generated matching 10 - point tallies off the first and second units , respectively . Teague added four assists , two rebounds and two steals , while Bjelica also brought down five boards . Taj Gibson was the only member of the starting five that did n't hit double digits in the scoring column ( four points ) , but he made up for it by hauling in nine rebounds , dishing out one assist and recording a pair of steals . The Jazz head back home to tangle with the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Saturday night , while the Timberwolves travel to Oklahoma_City to face the Thunder on Sunday evening .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the host Minnesota Timberwolves , 130 - 107 , at Target_Center on Tuesday . Indiana 's offense was clicking on all levels , as their 67 percent shooting in this game will likely be the best mark for the season . In addition , they shot 46 percent from the field , while recording 31 assists . Rebounding was a huge factor for the Pacers as well , outrebounding the T'Wolves , 42 - 27 . The Indiana starters absolutely dominated the Minnesota starters , outscoring them , 86 - 57 . The first and third quarters were a big reason Indiana won the game , as they outscored Minnesota , 70 - 43 , in that 24 - minute span . The Pacers ( 2 - 2 ) were led by Victor Oladipo , who tallied 28 points , three rebounds , three assists and two steals . Bojan Bogdanovic had his best game as a Pacer , totaling 19 points and five rebounds . Darren Collison accumulated 15 points , five rebounds and 16 assists . Domantas Sabonis started for Myles Turner ( concussion ) and accrued 15 points , 11 rebounds and five assists . Cory Joseph led the bench with 21 points , five rebounds , two assists and three steals . The Timberwolves ( 2 - 2 ) had to play this game without Jimmy Butler , as the stars ' illness clearly hampered his team . Jamal Crawford came off the bench to amass 18 points and nine assists . Indiana has a quick turnaround , as they travel to face the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Wednesday . Minnesota will also play Wednesday , as they travel to face the Detroit Pistons .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the visiting Dallas Mavericks , 112 - 99 , at Target_Center on Saturday evening . This game was expected to be one - sided right from that start , which is exactly what happened . The Timberwolves ( 6 - 3 ) looked in absolute control of the game from start to finish , and they never looked back after winning the first quarter 27 - 18 . The Mavericks ( 1 - 10 ) once again looked overmatched on both ends of the court , and they lacked weapons to contain the Wolves throughout the entire contest . This dominant performance from Minnesota extended their winning streak to four games , while Dallas became the first team to reach the double - digit mark in losses this season . Karl-Anthony Towns led the Timberwolves ' offense in this game , as the big man excelled on both ends of the court to the tune of 31 points and 12 rebounds . Andrew Wiggins added 23 points and Taj Gibson collaborated with a double - double of 12 points and 11 boards . Jimmy Butler struggled with his shooting ( going 1 - for - 7 from the field ) and only scored four points , but filled the stat sheet quite nicely , adding six rebounds and seven assists . On the other hand , Dennis Smith Jr. once again was the best player for the Mavericks on the offensive end of the court . The first - year point guard led his team with 18 points , but only assisted once and committed three turnovers . Harrison Barnes contributed with 15 points , while both Devin Harris ( 15 points ) and J.J. Barea ( 14 points ) produced coming off the bench .

The Timberwolves ( 12 - 8 ) cruised their way against the Suns ( 7 - 14 ) , and did n't have many problems to come out on top against a Phoenix team that now is riding a three - game losing streak . Minnesota got on top 33 - 27 in the first quarter , and they never looked back . They established a five - point lead , 63 - 58 , at the break , and extended it to a 13 - point advantage after three when the score read 93 - 80 . Phoenix won the final 12 minutes 28 - 26 , but it was too late , and the Timberwolves sealed the deal with relative ease . They out - rebounded Phoenix 48 - 37 , registered five less turnovers ( 10 to 15 ) , and bullied them in the paint ( 64 - 50 ) . By all accounts , Minnesota dominated the entire game . Karl-Anthony Towns led the way for Minnesota after scoring 32 points and adding 12 rebounds . Taj Gibson added a double - double of 16 points and 14 boards , and Jimmy Butler finished with 25 points , five assists , four rebounds , and three steals . Andrew Wiggins registered 21 points , and big man Gorgui Dieng produced a solid effort off the bench with 11 points and six rebounds . On the other hand , Mike James led the way for the Phoenix Suns after finishing with 26 points , seven assists , and five rebounds coming off the bench . The rookie point guard carried the team 's offense in absence of Devin Booker ( toe ) , but it was n't enough . T.J. Warren finished with 18 points , and veteran Tyson Chandler added 12 points with seven rebounds .
The Washington Wizards defeated the host Minnesota Timberwolves , 92 - 89 , at Target_Center on Tuesday . This was a competitive game throughout , as it came down to the final shot to determine a winner . In addition , neither team led by more than 13 points , as it was a single - digit margin for the entirety of the fourth quarter . That 's where Washington won the game , as they finished the game on a 20 - 9 run to come back and win . Both teams really struggled on the offensive end , as they both failed to crack 43 percent from the field , 35 percent from three - point range and 64 percent from the free - throw line . The only noticeable difference was transition defense , as the Wizards doubled up the T'Wolves in fastbreak points , 20 - 10 . The Wizards ( 11 - 9 ) had to play this game without John Wall ( knee ) , as Otto Porter led the team with 22 points and eight rebounds . He was actually the only starter in double figures , as Bradley Beal totaled just eight points and six assists on 2 - of - 11 shooting . Kelly Oubre Jr. was huge off the bench , as he provided 16 points , four rebounds , two assists and two steals . The Timberwolves ( 12 - 9 ) were led by Karl-Anthony Towns , as he tallied 20 points and 17 rebounds . Jimmy Butler collected 17 points , seven rebounds and 10 assists . Taj Gibson amassed 16 points and 11 rebounds en route to a double - double . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , as the Wizards travel to face the Philadelphia 76ers and the T'Wolves play the New_Orleans Pelicans on the road .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 112 - 106 , at Target_Center on Sunday evening . The Timberwolves ( 14 - 10 ) came into Sunday 's game having dropped five of their previous eight games , but a matchup against an equally reeling Clippers ( 8 - 14 ) squad appeared to be the recipe for a resurgence . However , short - handed Los_Angeles had other plans , and both teams played a competitive and high - scoring first half . The visitors entered the final period trailing by a razor - thin 78 - 76 margin and led by a 92 - 91 score with 6:54 remaining before Minnesota sealed the victory with a 21 - 14 run the rest of the way . The Clippers were actually the more accurate team from the field , sinking 51 percent of their 73 attempts while limiting the Timberwolves to a 44 percent figure . However , the home squad took much better care of the ball , committing only seven turnovers while eliciting 16 from Los_Angeles . Austin Rivers led the way for the Clippers with 30 points , a total he supplemented with five rebounds , five assists and one steal . Lou Williams returned to the bench and led the second unit with 23 points , 10 assists and five rebounds . DeAndre Jordan turned in a 17 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included two blocks . Montrezl Harrell also was back with the reserves and contributed 10 points and four rebounds . Jamil Wilson drew the start and posted nine points , one rebound and one assist . Jimmy Butler paced the Timberwolves with 33 points and added eight rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block . Taj Gibson supplied a 20 - point , 11 - rebound double - double . Karl-Anthony Towns generated 15 points , 12 rebounds , one assist and one steal . Andrew Wiggins poured in 12 points and also managed three boards , one assist and one steal . Jamal Crawford matched his scoring total and added one assist . Jeff Teague mustered a modest nine points but also dished out 10 assists and recorded three steals . The Clippers and Timberwolves reconvene at Staples_Center on Wednesday night for the second game of their home - and - home series .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 97 - 92 , at Target_Center on Sunday . This was one of the tightest games of the season , as neither team led by more than six points . In fact , this was the first time all season in the NBA that the margin stayed that close for the whole game . In addition , there were 12 ties and 21 lead changes in total , with an eight - point run being the longest in the game . Rebounding was key for Minnesota , as they outrebounded Dallas , 43 - 33 . The Timberwolves ended up shooting 50 percent from the field , while Dallas shot under 47 percent . The Mavericks ( 7 - 20 ) best player was Harrison Barnes , as he tallied 19 points , three rebounds and two assists . Max Kleber finished with 16 points and five rebounds . Wesley Matthews accrued 14 points , four rebounds and four assists . J.J. Barea led the bench with 16 points and four assists . The Timberwolves ( 16 - 11 ) were led by Karl-Anthony Towns , as he amassed 28 points , seven rebounds , three assists and three steals . Jimmy Butler collected 22 points , seven rebounds , six assists and two steals . Taj Gibson totaled six points and 10 rebounds . Jamal Crawford led the bench with 16 points . Both teams return home on Tuesday , with Dallas hosting the San_Antonio Spurs and Minnesota facing the Philadlephia 76ers .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the visiting Sacramento Kings , 119 - 96 , at Target_Center on Thursday evening . The Timberwolves came out strong and took a 10 - point lead after one quarter . The Kings came to life in the second quarter but only managed to outscore the Timberwolves by one , 33 - 32 , so that Minnesota led 64 - 55 heading into the half . The Timberwolves took control in the third quarter , where they outscored the Kings 31 - 16 , blowing the game open so that they could cruise through the fourth quarter , while the Kings could not get back within 10 points . This marks the 10th home win of the season for the Timberwolves . Karl-Anthony Towns led the way for Minnesota , with 30 points , 14 rebounds , five assists , five blocks and one steal , in 34 minutes . Andrew Wiggins followed up with 22 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting , while Jimmy Butler added 21 points , nine assists , seven rebounds , two blocks and two steals , in 35 minutes . The Timberwolves shot 56 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 21 from long range . Meanwhile , tough luck for Sacramento as De'Aaron Fox was forced to leave the game late in the first half , due to a quad contusion , and did not return . George Hill was the high - point man for the Kings , with 16 points on 5 - of - 9 shooting , in 29 minutes . Zach Randolph finished with 15 points , nine rebounds , one steal and one assist , while Buddy Hield added 10 points on 4 - of - 9 shooting , in 21 minutes off the bench . The Kings shot 41 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 33 from long range . The Kings ( 9 - 19 ) head to Toronto to take on the Raptors on Sunday . The Timberwolves ( 17 - 12 ) play host to the Suns on Saturday .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the host Minnesota Timberwolves , 108 - 106 , at Target_Center on Saturday , Minnesota had not lost a home game to a Western_Conference team prior to this defeat , as it came against one of the worst teams in the conference . What makes it worse is the fact that Minnesota led for the first 40 minutes , as the Suns took their first lead in the final eight minutes . Rebounding was a glaring difference , with Phoenix outrebounding Minnesota , 52 - 31 . Three-point shooting was also a big factor , with Phoenix hitting 11 - of - 24 and Minnesota going just 9 - of - 27 from long range . The Suns won despite losing the turnover differential , 23 - 6 . The Suns ( 10 - 21 ) got just 39 points out of their starters , as T.J. Warren led them with 15 points and five rebounds . Alex Len was the player of the game , as he provided 12 points , 19 rebounds , six assists and two steals off the bench . Troy Daniels and Dragan Bender each scored 17 points off the bench as well , while Isaiah Canaan accumulated 15 points , five rebounds and seven assists . The Timberwolves ( 18 - 12 ) were led by Karl-Anthony Towns , as he tallied 28 points , 11 rebounds and four assists . Taj Gibson totaled 18 points , 10 rebounds and two blocks . Jeff Teague accrued 17 points , eight assists and three blocks . Andrew Wiggins and Jimmy Butler combined to go just 10 - of - 34 from the field to 23 total points . Both teams return to action on Monday , with Phoenix traveling to face the Dallas Mavericks and Minnesota playing host to the Portland Trail_Blazers .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers 108 - 107 on Monday at Target_Center . The Trail_Blazers ( 16 - 14 ) entered the final quarter with a comfortable nine - point lead and looked to be on their way to a fourth straight victory , but Jimmy Butler and the Timberwolves ( 18 - 13 ) had other plans . But scored eight of Minnesota 's last 11 points , which included the two game - winning free throws with just two seconds remaining , as the Timberwolves outscored their opponents by 10 over the last 12 minutes . Butler finished with a game - high 37 points to go along with six rebounds , four assists and three steals in 35 minutes . Butler came into Monday questionable with a back injury , but the All-Star shooting guard was able to shake it off and play arguably his best game since joining Minnesota . Jamal Crawford came off the bench to put up a terrific performance , scoring 23 points on 10 - of - 16 shooting and was the only reserve to score for the Timberwolves . As for the Trail_Blazers , they were unable to close out Monday 's game despite shooting an impressive 55 percent from the field . And they had to shoot such an accurate mark just to stay competitive , as they managed to get to the free throw line just five times with the Timberwolves committing just 14 total fouls . C.J . McCollum and Jusuf Nurkic each posted 20 points while shooting a combined 18 - of - 29 from the field , while Damian Lillard posted a solid stat line of 17 points , 13 assists and eight rebounds in 37 minutes . Shabazz Napier was impressive off the bench , scoring 15 points in 19 minutes .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the visiting Denver Nuggets , 128 - 125 , at Target_Center on Wednesday evening . The Timberwolves ( 22 - 13 ) and the Nuggets ( 19 - 16 ) played a very exciting game that needed an overtime period to decide the winner . Minnesota had a healthy 71 - 58 lead at halftime , but the Nuggets stormed back out of nowhere to turn things around in the second half and send the game into an extra period . It is worth noting that Denver did n't lead by more than two points during the entire regulation time , but always looked on top during OT until Minnesota recovered the lead with 1:14 left . Both Karl-Anthony Towns and Taj Gibson fouled out , and Jeff Teague left with an injury late in the fourth quarter , so the Timberwolves were forced to use their depth during overtime . But that did n't matter , and the Wolves pushed their winning streak to five with a huge win at home . Jimmy Butler carried Minnesota 's offense in this game , as the small forward finished with a season - high 39 points for the Timberwolves - including Minnesota 's first 11 points during overtime - as well as five assists and four rebounds . Towns had 14 points , 13 rebounds and six assists before fouling out , while Andrew Wiggins chipped in with 21 points . Gibson had 20 , and Jamal Crawford added 12 off the bench , including a key bucket in the last minute of overtime . Will Barton led Denver 's offense despite coming off the bench , as he finished with 28 points on 10 - of - 17 from the field . Trey Lyles contributed with a 23 - point , 10 - rebound double - double , while Nikola Jokic added 22 points , nine rebounds , and four assists . Jamal Murray had 21 points , eight assists , and seven rebounds .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the visiting Los_Angeles Lakers , 114 - 96 , at Target_Center on Monday evening . The Timberwolves got out to a fantastic start with an early 160 lead . The Lakers managed to muster up a big of a fight before the quarter finished with the Timberwolves ahead 30 - 18 . The second quarter was more competitive , as the two teams matched each other 's 30 - point efforts , leading to a 60 - 48 lead for the Timberwolves at half . The Lakers did their best to compete through the second half , however they could not cut far enough into Minnesota 's cushion to cause any real problems . This marks the second straight win for the Timberwolves and their third straight at home . It is the seventh straight loss for the Lakers . Jimmy Butler led the way for Minnesota with 28 points on 8 - of - 14 shooting , along with nine assists , three rebounds , three steals and one block , in 37 minutes . Andrew Wiggins followed up with 21 points , nine rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block , while Karl-Anthony Towns tallied 16 points and 13 rebounds . The Timberwolves shot 49 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 20 from long range . Meanwhile , Jordan Clarkson was the high - point man for Los_Angeles , with 20 points on 7 - of - 15 shooting , in 23 minutes . Julius Randle followed up with 15 points and 12 rebounds , while Brandon Ingram chipped in 14 points and five rebounds . The Lakers shot 45 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 26 from long range . The Lakers ( 11 - 25 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Thunder on Wednesday . The Timberwolves ( 24 - 14 ) head to Brooklyn to take on the Nets on Wednesday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves pummeled the visiting New_Orleans Pelicans at Target_Center on Saturday . In a game that featured three of the league 's premier big men , Minnesota 's Karl-Anthony Towns stole the show . Towns led the Timberwolves ( 25 - 16 ) with 21 points and 16 rebounds , shooting 7 - of - 11 on the night . The third - year big man was also uncharacteristically engaged on defense , coming away with a steal and a huge highlight - reel block on fellow Kentucky alum Anthony Davis . His strong interior play helped Minnesota jump out to a quick lead . The team took control early in the game , leading by 21 at halftime . Jimmy Butler and Andrew Wiggins contributed significantly to the team 's high scoring total as well . The wings scored 21 and 20 points respectively . The Pelicans ( 19 - 19 ) , meanwhile , continue to hang around .500 thanks to Saturday 's blowout loss . The game featured a chance for All-Star big men DeMarcus Cousins and Anthony Davis to square off with another elite Kentucky product , Karl-Anthony Towns . The duo did not make much of the challenge , though . While Cousins finished the game with 23 points and 15 rebounds , he committed four personal fouls and a ridiculous seven turnovers . Davis , meanwhile , played well below his season averages , scoring 16 points to go with eight rebounds . The team fell behind by double digits in the first quarter and was unable to recover for the remainder of regulation . On Monday , Minnesota will host the Cleveland Cavaliers , while New_Orleans will host the Detroit Pistons .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the visiting Cleveland Cavaliers , 127 - 99 , at Target_Center on Monday . The Timberwolves ( 26 - 16 ) delivered one of their best performances of the season , and managed to dominate a Cavaliers ( 26 - 14 ) squad that looked helpless on both ends of the court , but especially on defense . Minnesota quickly grabbed the lead as they jumped to a 14 - point lead in the first quarter , and they were up 69 - 42 by halftime . Cleveland tried to react during the second half , but Minnesota never slowed things down , and ended securing a dominant win against one of the biggest title contenders this season . With the win , Minnesota now has won nine of their last 12 , while Cleveland has dropped six of their past nine contests . Jimmy Butler had a monster game for the Timberwolves , as the All-Star forward finished with 21 points , eight rebounds , and nine assists . Andrew Wiggins was the team 's top scorer , however , as the former Cleveland first - round pick contributed with 25 points and six rebounds . Karl-Anthony Towns chipped in with 19 points and 12 boards , while Taj Gibson posted a double - double thanks to a 16 - point , 13 - rebounds effort . The Cavaliers struggled on both ends of the court , but Jeff Green had a good performance after finishing with 22 points . LeBron James only had 10 points with eight rebounds and five assists , and was the only starter for the Cavs that scored in double digits . Kevin Love had three points on 1 - of - 7 from the field , and Isaiah Thomas scored nine points in just 19 minutes .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 104 - 88 , at Target_Center on Wednesday evening . The Timberwolves ( 27 - 16 ) and Thunder ( 22 - 20 ) lived up to their respective billing as two of the Western_Conference 's better teams , matching each other in a first half that culminated in a 47 - 47 tie . However , Minnesota came out on a mission in the third quarter , ultimately racking up 29 points over the ensuing 12 minutes in order to build a 76 - 65 lead heading into the fourth period . While OKC managed to mount a modest rally in the final quarter , the home squad ultimately had enough to hold on for a relatively comfortable win . Russell Westbrook was the lone bright spot for the Thunder , as he led the way with 38 points , 10 rebounds , five assists and four steals . Carmelo Anthony poured in 15 points and added one rebound . Paul George managed a modest 13 points , six rebounds , four assists and one block . Steven Adams mustered eight points , eight rebounds and two steals . Raymond Felton contributed seven points , one rebound , one assist and one steal . Jimmy Butler paced the Timberwolves with 26 points and also dished out eight assists , seven rebounds , four steals and two blocks . Andrew Wiggins poured in 19 points and added three rebounds , two assists and one steal . Karl-Anthony Towns managed an 18 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included three assists . Taj Gibson produced nine points , five rebounds and one assist . Jeff Teague made his return after a seven - game absence due to a knee injury and totaled eight points , four rebounds , three assists , two steals and one block across 26 minutes . The Thunder next head south to face the Charlotte Hornets on Saturday night , while the Timberwolves remain home to tangle with the New_York Knicks on Friday evening .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the New_York Knicks , 118 - 108 , at Target_Center on Friday evening . The Timberwolves ( 28 - 16 ) have been one of the hottest teams in The Association in recent weeks , and delivered another impressive performance that saw them extend their winning streak up to four games . The Knicks ( 19 - 23 ) tried to fight back and they were right in the game after the third quarter , but they could n't handle Minnesota 's scoring output during the final 12 minutes . Minnesota was up 87 - 86 entering the fourth , but they won those final 12 minutes by a 31 - 22 score . As a result , Minnesota are now up a season - high 12 games over .500 , while the Knicks fell four games below that mark while dropping five of their last six . Karl-Anthony Towns was the star of the game for Minnesota , as the talented center fell one assist short of a triple - double after contributing with 23 points , 15 rebounds , nine assists , and one block . Taj Gibson had 17 points and six boards , while Andrew Wiggins chipped in with 16 points and six rebounds , and Jimmy Butler added 13 points . Eight Minnesota players scored in double digits in this one . Kristaps Porzingis did what he could for the Knicks , but his 17 - point , 10 - rebound , three - block performance was not enough . Jarrett Jack led the way for New_York with 18 points , while Tim Hardaway Jr. came off the bench and scored 16 points while going 6 - of - 13 from the field . Enes Kanter had 16 points and 12 rebounds . Michael Beasley contributed with 13 points off the bench .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the visiting Portland Trail_Blazers , 120 - 103 , at Target_Center on Sunday evening . The Trail_Blazers got out to a good start and led 33 - 31 after the first quarter of action . The Timberwolves answered back in the second quarter by outscoring the Trail_Blazers 26 - 10 , to take a 57 - 43 lead into halftime . The Timberwolves carried the momentum into the third quarter , where they maintained a substantial lead and even pushed their lead to 17 heading into the final quarter . The Timberwolves matched everything the Blazers had to give in the fourth and cruised to their fifth straight win . Jimmy Butler was the high - point man for Minnesota , with 24 points on 7 - of - 11 shooting , in 34 minutes . Jeff Teague followed up with 22 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting , while Karl-Anthony Towns came up large with 20 points and 11 rebounds , in 36 minutes . The Timberwolves shot 54 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 19 from long range . Meanwhile , Damian Lillard led the Trail_Blazers with 21 points , eight assists , six rebounds and one steal in 34 minutes . C.J . McCollum and Pat Connaughton were the only other players to score in double digits for Portland , with 18 point each . The Trail_Blazers shot 50 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 24 from long range . The Trail_Blazers ( 22 - 21 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Suns on Tuesday . The Timberwolves ( 29 - 16 ) will look to keep rolling as they take on the Magic in Orlando on Tuesday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the visiting Brooklyn Nets , 111 - 97 , at Target_Center on Saturday evening . The Timberwolves got out to a great start on their home court , as they held the Nets to only 11 points in the first quarter , and took a 30 - 11 lead into the second . The Nets did a much better job in the second quarter , where they battled to cut the deficit to 12 , by halftime . The Nets continued their push to start the second half , as they made it a five - point game just a couple minutes into the third quarter . However , the Timberwolves closed out the quarter strong by reclaiming a double - digit lead , up 78 - 65 , entering the final frame . The Timberwolves stayed in the driver 's seat the rest of the way , as they maintained a solid double - digit lead en route to the home win . Andrew Wiggins and Jimmy Butler tallied 21 points each for Minnesota , while Karl-Anthony Towns came up big , with 16 points , 19 rebounds , three blocks , one steal and one assist . Taj Gibson tallied 14 points and five rebounds . Jamal Crawford was solid in 20 minutes off the bench , with 16 points on 6 - of - 13 shooting , while Tyus Jones added 13 points and five assists . The Timberwolves shot 44 percent from the field , including 4 - of - 21 from long range . Meanwhile , Jahlil Okafor was the high - point man for the Nets , with 21 points on 9 - of - 14 shooting , in 23 minutes off the bench . Nik Stauskas followed up with 15 points , four rebounds , two assists , a steal and a block , in 32 minutes off the bench . DeMarre Carroll finished with 12 points , six rebounds , two assists and a block , in 29 minutes . The Nets shot 46 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 30 from long range . The Nets ( 18 - 32 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Knicks in New_York on Tuesday . The Timberwolves ( 32 - 20 ) head to Atlanta to take on the Hawks on Monday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Milwaukee Bucks , 108 - 89 , at Target_Center on Thursday . This was a lopsided win for Minnesota , as they captured their victory in wire - to - wire fashion . In fact , the T'Wolves rode a 37 - 22 second quarter to victory , as Milwaukee never got the game within a single - digit margin from there . Defense was key for Minnesota , as they held Milwaukee to 38 percent from the field and 21 percent from three - point range . The Timberwolves ended up shooting 54 percent from the field and 37 percent from long range . Rim protection was also a huge factor , with Minnesota recording seven blocks and Milwaukee swatting away just one shot . The Bucks ( 27 - 23 ) had to play this game without Eric Bledsoe ( ankle ) , as they also lost Malcolm Brogdon in the first half due to a quad issue . Giannis Antetokounmpo did all he could from there , as he tallied 17 points , 15 rebounds and six assists . Khris Middleton accrued 21 points , six rebounds , four assists and four steals . John Henson amassed 14 points , eight rebounds and two assists . The Timberwolves ( 33 - 22 ) were led by Jimmy Butler , as he collected 28 points , four rebounds and six assists . Karl-Anthony Towns amassed 24 points , 11 rebounds and three assists on 10 - of - 13 shooting . No other Minnesota player finished in double figures , as Jeff Teague provided nine points and eight assists . Milwaukee will have to play again on Friday , as they 'll host the New_York Knicks . As for Minnesota , they play host to the New_Orleans Pelicans on Saturday for their next fixture .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the visiting New_Orleans Pelicans , 118 - 107 , at Target_Center on Saturday evening . The Timberwolves got out to a great start at home , with a quick 90 run to start the game . They did not let up and maintained most of their cushion until the end of the first quarter , where they led 37 - 29 . The Timberwolves continued the pressure in the second quarter and pushed their lead to double digits , up 66 - 53 by halftime . The Pelicans came out stronger in the third quarter , but could only barely match the T-Wolves ' efficiency . The Pelicans trailed 95 - 81 heading into the final frame . They gave their best shot in the fourth , but every time the they came close to cutting the deficit to single digits , the Timberwolves answered right back . This marks the 12th straight home win for the Timberwolves . Jimmy Butler led the way for Minnesota , with 30 points on 11 - of - 21 shooting , in 36 minutes of action . Karl-Anthony Towns followed up with 22 points and 16 rebounds , while Taj Gibson chipped in 12 points and nine rebounds . The Timberwolves shot 50 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 21 from long range . Meanwhile , Anthony Davis led the Pelicans with 38 points on 16 - of - 30 shooting , nine rebounds , two steals , one block and one assist , in 36 minutes . The Timberwolves ( 34 - 22 ) take on the Cavaliers in Cleveland on Wednesday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Sacramento Kings , 111 - 106 , at Target_Center on Sunday . The fact that neither team ever led by more than 10 points shows just how tightly contested this matchup was , as there were 15 ties and 10 lead changes in total . Free-throw shooting was the difference in the game , with Minnesota hitting 28 - of - 32 and Sacramento going just 12 - of - 17 from the charity stripe . Ball movement was also critical , with the Timberwolves handing out 29 assists while the Kings could only muster up 17 dimes . The Kings ( 17 - 38 ) were led by De'Aaron Fox , as he tallied 23 points , two rebounds , two assists and three steals . Bogdan Bogdanovic accrued 13 points , three rebounds and eight assists . Zach Randolph totaled 12 points and six rebounds while Willie Cauley-Stein amassed 10 points and seven rebounds . Jimmy Butler accumulated 18 points , five rebounds , three assists and two steals . Andrew Wiggins finished with 16 points , eight rebounds and three assists while Jeff Teague provided 12 points , 10 assists and three steals . Both teams return to action on Tuesday , with Sacramento traveling to face the Dallas Mavericks and Minnesota playing host to the Houston Rockets .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers , 119 - 111 , at Target_Center on Thursday . Minnesota had quite the comeback here , as the 15 - point margin they trailed by in this game made this their biggest comeback win of the season . Most of that damage was done in the fourth quarter , with the Timberwolves outscoring the Lakers , 35 - 20 . Free-throw shooting was the difference in the game , with Minnesota connecting on 29 - of - 31 and Los_Angeles hitting just 18 - of - 26 . Rim protection was also a big factor , with the T'wolves recording 10 blocks and the Lakers swatting away only four shots . The Lakers ( 23 - 34 ) were led by Julius Randle , as he tallied 23 points , nine rebounds . two assists and two steals . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope amassed 17 points , 11 rebounds , six assists and two steals . Brandon Ingram finished with 17 points , four rebounds and five assists . Ivica Zubac led the bench with 19 points and 11 rebounds on a perfect 8 - of - 8 from the field . The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the visiting Chicago Bulls , 122 - 104 , at Target_Center on Saturday evening . Despite being without Jimmy Butler ( knee ) the Timberwolves got out to a strong start at home , with an early 14 - 6 lead . They stayed in control for the remainder of the quarter to take a 31 - 24 lead into the second . The Bulls answered in the second , as they rallied to take a one - point lead with 5:6 left in the half . They kept the pressure on through the rest of the quarter to take a 62 - 60 lead into halftime . The Timberwolves came out better once again in the second half , where they took control once again . They took a four - point , 86 - 82 lead into the fourth and then dominated the final frame , where they outscored the Bulls , 36 - 22 , to complete the blowout win . Jeff Teague was the high - point man for Minnesota , with 25 points on 8 - of - 17 shooting , in 33 minutes of action . Andrew Wiggins followed up with 23 points on 10 - of - 18 shooting , in 34 minutes . Karl-Anthony Towns tallied a double - double with 22 points and 13 rebounds , while Taj Gibson finished with 19 points and 10 rebounds . The Timberwolves shot 49 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 35 from long range . Meanwhile , Zach LaVine led the Bulls with 21 points , seven assists , six rebounds , one steal and one block , in 31 minutes . Bobby Portis followed up with 15 points , four rebounds and one assist , while David Nwaba added 14 points and nine rebounds . The Bulls shot 46 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 23 from long range . The Bulls ( 20 - 39 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Nets in Brooklyn on Monday . The Timberwolves ( 37 - 26 ) take on the Kings in Sacramento on Monday .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 117 - 109 , at Target_Center on Thursday evening . The Celtics ( 46 - 20 ) came into Thursday 's contest fighting to keep pace in their chase of the Toronto Raptors for the top spot in the Eastern_Conference . However , they knew they 'd have their work cut out for them against the Timberwolves ( 38 - 29 ) , which had also generated a 25 - 7 record on their home floor . Boston came out of the gates like a team on a mission , however , compiling 60 points in the first half on their way to a 14 - point lead at intermission . Although Minnesota would be much more successful on the scoreboard in the second half , they never got closer than within seven points in the final period , leading to an impressive and pivotal road victory for the Celtics . Both teams shot particularly well , with Boston edging the Timberwolves by a 49 percent to 47 percent margin . Kyrie Irving paced the Celtics with 23 points , a total he supplemented with eight assists , seven rebounds , two steals and one block . Al Horford followed with 20 points , eight rebounds , six assists and one block . Marcus Morris generated a bench - leading 17 points and added five boards and a pair of dimes . Jaylen Brown registered 14 points and five rebounds over 28 minutes before having to exit the game to be evaluated for a concussion after taking a hard fall following a dunk . Terry Rozier was productive off the bench with 13 points , four rebounds , one assist and two steals . Jayson Tatum managed 12 points and five rebounds . The Timberwolves were paced by Nemanja Bjelica 's career - high 30 points , which he complemented with 12 rebounds and two assists . Taj Gibson posted 18 points , four rebounds and one assist . Karl-Anthony Towns produced a 15 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and one block . Jeff Teague tallied 13 points , eight assists , five rebounds and one steal . Andrew Wiggins matched Teague 's scoring total although he only drained six of 21 attempts , but he added seven boards , four assists and two steals . Jamal Crawford led the bench with 15 points , four assists , one rebound and one block . The Celtics head back home and face off with the Indiana Pacers on Sunday evening , while the Timberwolves remain home for a Sunday afternoon showdown with the Golden_State Warriors .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Golden_State Warriors , 109 - 103 , at Target_Center on Sunday afternoon . The Warriors ( 51 - 16 ) came into Sunday knowing they faced an uphill battle on a couple of fronts . For starters , Stephen Curry was slated to miss his second consecutive game with an ankle injury . Additionally , they were up against a quality Timberwolves ( 39 - 29 ) squad that had prevailed in 25 of their 33 home dates , and that continues to push for playoff positioning . Throughout the first two quarters , it appeared that they were more than up to the task . Golden_State had forged a 62 - 55 lead by halftime , leaving them poised to potentially seal the deal with a big third period . That was n't to be , however , as Minnesota erased their deficit and the game headed into the final 12 minutes deadlocked at 84 . The hosts then took it up yet another notch over the final 2:8 after Kevin Durant had brought the visitors back to 104 - 103 with a 25 - foot three - pointer . Karl-Anthony Towns poured in the next four points with a pair of clutch buckets , and Jeff Teague closed out the scoring with a free throw at the 30 - second mark . The T-Wolves held the potent Warriors offense without a point after Durant 's aforementioned trey , a notable accomplishment considering their firepower . Durant once again spearheaded the Warriors ' offense in Curry 's absence , posting 39 points , 12 rebounds , four assists and three blocks . Klay Thompson supplied 21 points , five assists , four rebounds and one block . Zaza Pachulia surprised with a 16 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included three assists , two blocks and one steal . Draymond Green managed 10 points , eight rebounds , seven assists , three steals and one block . Shaun Livingston turned in eight points , four rebounds and one assist over 21 minutes off the bench . Quinn Cook drew the start in Curry 's stead and finished with four points , four rebounds and two assists , while JaVale McGee only mustered two points , three rebounds and one steal . Towns paced the Timberwolves with a 31 - point , 16 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and one steal . Andrew Wiggins registered 23 points , five rebounds and three assists . Jamal Crawford generated a bench - leading 12 points and added two boards , one assist and one steal . Taj Gibson produced an 11 - point , 13 - rebound double - double while also supplying two assists and one block . Nemanja Bjelica accounted for 10 points , seven rebounds , four assists , three steals and two blocks . Teague matched Bjelica 's scoring total and also dished out 10 assists and recorded two steals . The Warriors head back home and take on the Lakers in a Wednesday night showdown , a game that Curry is likely to be back for . The Timberwolves hit the road and take on the Washington Wizards in the Nation 's Capital on Tuesday evening .
The Houston Rockets defeated the host Minnesota Timberwolves , 129 - 120 , at Target_Center on Sunday . Houston was in control for the majority of this game , as they held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second and third quarters . A 38 - 23 first quarter in favor of the Rockets really set the tone , as Minnesota were never able to recapture the lead from there . With that said , Houston did lead by 21 at the half , as Minnesota rode a 29 - 22 fourth quarter to make it a respectable final margin . The key for the Rockets was rim protection , as they recorded eight blocks to the Timberwolves one block . Three-point shooting was also huge , with Houston connecting on 16 - of - 35 and Minnesota hitting 10 - of - 20 . The Rockets ( 56 - 14 ) got another gem out of James Harden , as he collected 34 points , four rebounds , 12 assists and two steals . Chris Paul tallied 18 points , eight rebounds and nine assists . Clint Capela finished with 16 points , 12 rebounds and three blocks . Ryan Anderson and Gerald Green combined for 26 points off the bench . The Timberwolves ( 40 - 31 ) were led by Jeff Teague , as he accrued 23 points , six rebounds , 11 assists and two steals . Karl-Anthony Towns totaled 20 points and 18 rebounds . Nemanja Bjelica accumulated 15 points , six rebounds and three assists while Andre Wiggins dropped 21 points . Jamal Crawford led the bench with 20 points and three assists while Derrick Rose provided 14 points and three assists . Both teams return to action on Tuesday , with Houston traveling to play the Portland Trail_Blazers and Minnesota welcoming the Los_Angeles Clippers to Target_Center .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Los_Angeles Clippers , 123 - 109 , at Target_Center on Tuesday . While there were 11 ties and 15 lead changes in the first half , Minnesota pulled away thanks to a 36 - 25 third quarter . In fact , the Timberwolves held the lead for the whole of the second half , as they held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the fourth quarter . While nearly every statistic was even , Minnesota really dominated through shooting . The Timberwolves connected on 52 percent from the field , 40 percent from three - point range and 96 percent from the free - throw line while Los_Angeles hit just 43 percent from the field , 33 percent from long range and 81 percent from the charity stripe . The Clippers ( 37 - 33 ) got another double - double out of DeAndre Jordan , as he totaled 18 points , 12 rebounds and three assists on 9 - of - 11 from the field . Lou Williams led the bench with 15 points and five assists . Sean Kilpatrick also provided 15 points off the bench , as no other player on the roster scored more than 11 points . In addition , no other player recorded more than six rebounds , three assists or one steal . The Timberwolves ( 40 - 31 ) were led by Karl-Anthony Towns , as he tallied 30 points , 10 rebounds , three assists and two steals . Andrew Wiggins amassed 27 points , three rebounds and three blocks . Jeff Teague accrued 20 points , four rebounds and 12 assists . Jamal Crawford led the bench with 20 points Los_Angeles will have to play again on Wednesday , as they travel to face the Milwaukee Bucks . As for Minnesota , they 're off until Friday when they play the New_York Knicks on the road .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 126 - 108 , at Target_Center on Wednesday evening . The Timberwolves ( 43 - 33 ) came into the contest knowing that their postseason lives are essentially on the line in each of their remaining games . Barely clinging to the eighth seed in the Western_Conference , Minnesota has to continue piling up wins , and a home matchup against the lowly Hawks ( 21 - 54 ) seemed like a good way to pick up one of those much - needed victories . After a tightly contested first half , the hosts gained some separation in the second to build a 65 - 57 halftime edge . To their credit , Atlanta did n't let up , but the T-Wolves progressively added to their cushion to finish with a 12 - point margin of victory . As the final score implied , both teams shot extremely well - - the Hawks drained 53 percent of their 77 attempts , while the home squad posted a 53 percent success rate . Karl-Anthony Towns ' dominance went a long way toward ensuring a Timberwolves victory , as he posed a career - high and franchise - record 56 points and supplemented them with 15 rebounds , four assists and one block . Mike Muscala led the Hawks with 24 points off the bench , a total he supplemented with two rebounds and one steal . Taurean Prince supplied 21 points , seven assists , four rebounds and one steal . Isaiah Taylor followed with 20 points and added eight assists , two rebounds and two steals . Dewayne Dedmon generated a 13 - point , 12 - rebound double - double . John Collins and Tyler Cavanaugh produced matching 10 - point tallies , with the former also registering five boards , one steal and one block , and the latter hauling in six boards . Damion Lee accounted for eight points , five assists , four rebounds , three steals and one block . Andrew Wiggins was a distant second behind Towns with 17 points , along with three assists , two rebounds and two steals . Nemanja Bjelica totaled 14 points , six rebounds , three assists and one steal . Jeff Teague poured in 11 points and also turned in eight assists and two steals . Jamal Crawford led the bench with 10 points and added four assists and a rebound . The Hawks head back home to tangle with the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday evening , while the Timberwolves pay a visit to the Dallas Mavericks on Friday night as well .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 121 - 97 , at Target_Center on Sunday evening . The Jazz ( 44 - 33 ) figured they 'd encounter a playoff - type atmosphere on the home court of the fellow postseason hopeful Timberwolves ( 44 - 34 ) , and earlier in the day , it appeared there was a chance that both clubs would have to take the court without their starting point guards . Ricky Rubio ( hamstring ) and Jeff Teague ( knee soreness ) , who 'd been involved in a dust - up in an earlier meeting that got the latter ejected , both shaped up as game - time decisions . Rubio was ultimately able to suit up and Teague was n't , giving Utah a key advantage from the start . After a tightly contested first quarter , the visitors pulled away some in the second to forge a 61 - 50 halftime lead . By adding five more points to their edge during the third , the Jazz essentially sealed the win , but they piled eight more points onto the deficit in the fourth to close things out in definitive fashion . They were greatly aided by red - hot shooting , as they drained a blistering 60 percent of their 76 attempts and saw three members of the first unit individually eclipse that mark . Rubio actually led the way for the Jazz with 23 points and also contributed seven rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Donovan Mitchell managed 21 points , four assists , three rebounds and two steals . Derrick Favors mustered 16 points , three rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Dante Exum continued his recent trend of strong play by pouring in 14 points and supplementing them with five assists , three rebounds and one steal . Jonas Jerebko totaled 13 points , one rebound and one assist . Jae Crowder tallied 10 points , two rebounds , one assist and two steals . Rudy Gobert contributed a modest six points but also ripped down 13 rebounds , dished out one assist and recorded four blocks . Andrew Wiggins paced the Timberwolves with 23 points , six rebounds , four assists and two steals . Karl-Anthony Towns followed with 20 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Tyus Jones drew the start for Teague and managed 15 points , four assists and four steals . Aaron Brooks led the bench with 12 points and also supplied two rebounds and two assists over 16 minutes . Nemanja Bjelica registered seven points , five rebounds , one assist and two steals , while Taj Gibson accounted for six points , six boards and one assist . The Jazz head back home and await a Tuesday night visit from the Los_Angeles Lakers , while the Timberwolves hit the road and face the Denver Nuggets on Thursday evening .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 113 - 94 , at Target_Center on Monday . While there were seven ties and six lead changes in the first half , that was the only time this game was competitive . In fact , Minnesota won each of the final three quarters by at least five points apiece , as a 57 - 41 second half really decided the game . Defense was key for the T'Wolves , as they held the Grizzlies to 41 percent from the field and 28 percent from three - point range . In addition , Minnesota outrebounded Memphis , 52 - 35 . Ball movement was also huge , with Minnesota out - assisting Memphis , 27 - 20 . The Grizzlies ( 22 - 59 ) were led by Ben McLemore , as he tallied 18 points and seven rebounds . Dillon Brooks totaled 15 points , four rebounds and four assists . MarShon Brooks led the bench with 14 points , five assists and two steals . Mario Chalmers provided eight points , four rebounds , four assists and four steals off the bench as well . The Timberwolves ( 46 - 35 ) were led by Jeff Teague , as he accrued 24 points , four rebounds , eight assists and three steals . Karl-Anthony Towns amassed 24 points , 18 rebounds and two assists . Jimmy Butler collected 15 points , two rebounds , three assists and two steals . Derrick Rose led the bench with 13 points and three assists . Minnesota essentially has a playoff game in their final outing , as they play host to the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday . As for Memphis , they travel to face the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Wednesday for their finale .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Denver Nuggets 112 - 106 on Wednesday at Target_Center . The Timberwolves led for nearly all of Wednesday 's play - in game before ultimately letting their lead go midway through the final period . After the team exchanged defensive stops for the final minute of the contest , the game went to overtime , where Minnesota hit six clutch free throws in a row to ice the contest and send the Nuggets packing . Jimmy Butler , who is fresh off a return from a serious knee injury , managed to play 42 minutes and put together a world - class effort in that time , scoring 31 points to go along with five rebounds and five assists . Karl-Anthony Towns was n't too far behind , posting a double - double of 26 points and 14 rebounds . As a team , it was n't the prettiest performance from the Timberwolves , especially given their 15 - point fourth quarter , but Butler and company managed to back enough plays in the end to clinch the playoff birth . As for the Nuggets , it 's a disappointing end to what was otherwise an extremely promising regular season , and they could n't have asked much more from their star players Wednesday night . Nikola Jokic posted a game - high 35 points to go along with 10 rebounds in 46 minutes , while Will Barton scored 24 points and Jamal Murray added 20 of his own . Denver , however , was left asking for more from some of its other talent , as Paul Millsap scored just 10 points in 36 minutes , and Wilson Chandler managed to not score a single point in 48 minutes of playing time . Overall , it was a strong effort from the Nuggets on the perimeter , as they shot 41 percent from behind the arc , but it was n't enough to get themselves back into the playoffs .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the visiting New_Orleans Pelicans , 103 - 93 , at Moda_Center on Tuesday evening . This marks the Trail_Blazers ' 17th consecutive win in their season home opener . They got out to a hot start , with a 29 - 19 lead after the first quarter , but the Pelicans ( 1 - 3 ) fought back to make it a close game , until the Trail_Blazers ( 3 - 1 ) finally pulled away down the stretch . Anthony Davis left the game in the first quarter with a sore knee and did not return . The Trail_Blazers shot only 35 percent from the field but were able to haul in 63 rebounds to give themselves the chance to win . Damian Lillard hit only 3 - of - 16 shots from the field , but one of those buckets was a timely three late in the fourth . C.J . McCollum was the high - point man for the Trail_Blazers , with 23 points on 7 - of - 15 shooting , in 36 minutes . Ed Davis notched his 50th career double - double , as he came up big off the bench with 12 points and 10 rebounds , in 21 minutes . Meanwhile , DeMarcus Cousins did all he could to lead the Pelicans , with a total of 39 points , 13 rebounds , three assists , three blocks and one steal , in 38 minutes . The only other players to score in double digits for the Pelicans were Jrue Holiday and Jameer Nelson . Holiday finished with 14 points , seven assists and five rebounds , while Nelson added 10 points , two rebounds and two assists , in 30 minutes off the bench . The Pelicans have a couple days off before they take on the Kings in Sacramento on Thursday . The Trail_Blazers play host to the Clippers on Thursday .
The Los_Angeles Clippers defeated the host Portland Trail_Blazers , 104 - 103 , at Moda_Center on Thursday . These two teams have played competitive games for years now , as seven ties and 17 lead changes shows just how close this matchup was . In addition , neither team ever led by more than 10 points , as there were multiple lead changes in the final minutes . Blake Griffin played hero , as he hit a contested three - pointer at the buzzer to win . Defense was key for the Clippers , as they held the Blazers to 39 percent shooting . Los_Angeles also dominated down low , outscoring Portland , 44 - 30 , in the paint . The Clippers ( 40 ) got 25 points , eight rebounds and five assists from Blake Griffin , who also added a game - winner to his resume ' . Danilo Gallinari finished with 15 points , three rebounds and three assists . DeAndre Jordan scored just seven points , but provided 18 rebounds and three blocks . Lou Williams and Patrick Beverley scored 13 points a piece . The Blazers ( 3 - 2 ) were led by Damian Lillard , who accrued 25 points , two rebounds and six assists . C.J . McCollum amassed 23 points , five rebounds and four assists . Al-Farouq Aminu tallied 19 points , six rebounds , two assists and three steals . The five bench players combined for just 11 points . Both teams return to action on Saturday , with Portland hosting the Phoenix Suns and Los Amgeles hosting the Detroit Pistons .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Phoenix Suns , 114 - 107 , at Moda_Center on Saturday . This was an extremely competitive game , as there were 11 lead changes , with neither team ever leading by more than eight points . A late run capped things off for Portland , as they finished the game on a 9 - 3 spurt over the final four minutes . Rebounding was huge for the Blazers , winning that battle , 53 - 46 . The assist - to - turnover ratio was also decisive , with Portland recording six more assists than Phoenix , while committing three less turnovers . The Suns ( 2 - 4 ) were led by Devin Booker , who accrued 34 points , six rebounds and six assists . T.J. Warren was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 12 points and seven rebounds . Alex Len led the bench with 12 points and eight rebounds . The Trail_Blazers ( 4 - 2 ) got 25 points from Damian Lillard , who also added seven rebounds and nine assists to his line . C.J . McCollum was n't far behind , amassing 23 points , five rebounds and six assists . Jusuf Nurkic finished with 17 points , nine rebounds and two assists . Al-Farouq Aminu , Evan Turner and Maurice Harkless all finished with 10 points a piece . On deck for Portland is a home matchup against the Toronto Raptors on Monday . Phoenix will be on the road for their next game , as they play the Brooklyn Nets on Tuesday .
The visiting Toronto Raptors defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers , 99 - 85 , at Moda_Center on Monday . Toronto ( 4 - 2 ) was able to pull away with the game in the second quarter , where the team outscored Portland 25 - 6 . Strong defensive effort coupled with cold shooting from the Blazers helped the Raptors enter halftime with a 19 - point lead . Much of the team 's first - half success came from All-Star DeMar DeRozan , who scored 21 points in the first two quarters of play . DeRozan finished the game with a team - high 25 points . With big man Jonas Valanciunas still out with an ankle injury and forward Serge Ibaka also sitting , the Raptors dove deep into their frontcourt rotation . Sophomore Paskal Siakim and backup center Lucas Nogueira got the start , both delivering efficient scoring performances . Nogueira was particularly effective , shooting 7 - of - 8 from the field and blocking five shots . Portland ( 4 - 3 ) broke an unfortunate franchise record on Monday , delivering its lowest - scoring second quarter in team history . The team shot a dismal 1 - of - 17 in the quarter , seeing its lone field goal come on a finish at the rim from sixth man Evan Turner . Overall , Portland shot 39 percent from the field while knocking down eight three - pointers on the night . Star point guard Damian Lillard recorded what may have been his strongest performance of the season , leading the team with 36 points on 12 - of - 23 shooting . Still , the shadow of the team 's awful second quarter loomed over the game , making it difficult for Portland to recover in the second half . The Raptors will visit Denver on Wednesday , while the Blazers will see Utah .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Los_Angeles Lakers 113 - 110 on Thursday at Moda_Center . It was a back - and - forth affair Thursday night , but , ultimately , Damian Lillard and the Trail_Blazers ( 5 - 4 ) would have the last laugh . After a three from Kentavious Caldwell-Pope with 18 seconds left tied the game at 110 for the Lakers ( 3 - 5 ) , Portland elected to wind the clock down with the ball in the hands of one of the most clutch players in the league . With the lengthy Brandon Ingram on him , Lillard stepped back on the right wing from deep range and drained the eventual game winner with 1 seconds remaining . Los_Angeles ' Kyle Kuzma had a chance to tie it at the end , but the shot was short . Lillard finished with a game - high 32 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 14 - 14 FT ) , six rebounds and five assists , while center Jusuf Nurkic was n't too far behind with 28 points and five rebounds of his own in 29 minutes . C.J . McCollum was the only other Portland player to reach double - digit scoring , hitting five threes en route to scoring 22 points . As for the Lakers , their valiant effort was lead by center Brook Lopez , who had his best game Friday night as a member of his new team , scoring a team - high 27 points and grabbing three rebounds in 29 minutes . Rookie Kyle Kuzma was terrific off the bench , scoring 22 points on 10 - of - 17 shooting from the field in 29 minutes of his own . Unfortunately for the Lakers , they lost starting power forward Larry Nance Jr. to a broken thumb in the third quarter , and he could be out for as long as a month .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers , 98 - 97 , in a nail - biter at Moda_Center on Tuesday . Memphis ( 7 - 4 ) broke out of a minor slump thanks to Tuesday 's win . Before visiting Portland , Memphis had dropped three of its previous four games . The team turned it around with a win over the red - hot Blazers , though , holding onto a narrow lead in the fourth quarter . A big part of the Grizzlies ' win was sixth man Tyreke Evans , who led the team with 21 points . Evans has been dynamic lately , averaging 24 points in Memphis 's last four games . Evans also attempted a team - high 15 shots . Aside from the Grizzlies ' solid bench performance , free - throw shooting helped the team earn the win . The Grizzlies shot 21 - of - 25 at the line , helping to push them over the top in a close game . Portland ( 6 - 5 ) , meanwhile , had won two straight before Tuesday 's heartbreaking loss . Shooting guard C.J . McCollum had his biggest night of the season on Tuesday , scoring a team - high 36 points while shooting an efficient 14 - of - 26 from the field . McCollum also shot 4 - of - 5 from the free - throw line , where the Trail_Blazers as a team excelled . The Blazers shot a whopping 19 - of - 20 on foul shots on Tuesday . However , the team had issues finding their stroke from beyond the arc . As a whole , Portland shot just 6 - of - 19 from three - point range . Portland will host the Nets on Friday , while the Grizzlies will visit Houston on Saturday .
The visiting Brooklyn Nets edged out the Portland Trail_Blazers , 101 - 97 , at Moda_Center on Friday night . Brooklyn ( 5 - 7 ) bounced back from five losses in six games with Friday 's narrow win . The game featured a point guard duel between Brooklyn 's third - year phenom D'Angelo Russell and Portland star Damian Lillard . Russell managed to lead the Nets to the win , scoring a team - high 21 points and nine assists . He came in clutch as well , hitting a free - throw to put the Nets up by four points with just eight seconds remaining . The Nets as a whole had to overcome a poor night at the free - throw line , as they shot just 11 - of - 19 at the charity stripe . Still , Brooklyn was able to hit 12 three - pointers to push the team over the edge . Portland ( 6 - 6 ) , meanwhile , kept the game close thanks to strong play from its star players . Damian Lillard scored 19 points and dished out six assists on the night . The team 's scoring leader was young big man Jusuf Nurkic , who had 21 points and attempted a team - high 20 shots . The Blazers started the game with a strong offensive showing , jumping out to an early double - digit lead . However , a poor third quarter caused Portland to fall behind . The Blazers saw a 31 - 18 deficit in the third quarter , and despite a comeback attempt in the fourth , Portland was not able to come back from the onslaught to start the second half . Portland will host the Nuggets on Monday , while the Nets will visit Utah on Saturday .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Denver Nuggets 99 - 82 on Monday at Moda_Center . It was a wire - to - wire victory for the Trail_Blazers ( 7 - 6 ) on Monday night , as the team ended a two - game losing streak to get back over .500 for the season . While their opposition managed to keep it close through two quarters , the Blazers used a dominant 30 - 17 third period to pull away for good . C.J . McCollum and Jusuf Nurkic , who was traded from the Denver to Portland last season , both lead the way for the Trail_Blazers with 17 points each . Point guard Damian Lillard struggled shooting the ball Monday , going just 4 - of - 14 from the field en route to 14 points to go along with a team - high seven assists . Despite Lillard 's struggles form the field , Portland as a team still had a great shooting night , hitting a scoring 52 percent from its shots . As for the Nuggets ( 8 - 6 ) , they 've now lost 15 of their last 17 games against the Trail_Blazers , and they did so in an ugly fashion Monday night . As a team , Denver shot just 36 percent from the field and 28 percent from behind the arc . Additionally , the Nuggets posted 20 turnovers to just 13 team assists , making for a very inefficient night from the road team . Paul Millsap and Jamal Murray led the way with 18 points a piece , as the starters ended up carrying the load for all of Monday 's contest . The Nuggets ' bench accounted for just 14 total points in the loss despite six different reserves seeing action . Up next , the Trail_Blazers will remain home Wednesday to take on the Magic , while the Nuggets , who saw a three - game winning streak come to an end Monday , will have off until Friday , where they 'll play the Pelicans on their home floor .
The host Portland Trail_Blazers took down the Sacramento Kings , 102 - 90 , at Moda_Center on Saturday night . Portland ( 9 - 7 ) redeemed themselves after losing to the Kings in Sacramento on Friday . The Blazers looked far stronger on the offensive end at home , shooting 54 percent from the field in the game . Once again , the team was led by its star backcourt of Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum , who combined for 47 points on the night . McCollum was the team 's top scorer , pouring in 25 points to go along with four assists . It was also a strong showing for center Jusuf Nurkic . Nurkic , the third - year Euro big man , has struggled this season , currently ranking last among all qualified centers in True Shooting percentage . On Saturday , however , Nurkic scored 14 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting and also blocked three shots . Sacramento ( 4 - 12 ) was unable to finish the second half of the back - to - back against Portland on Saturday . For the second straight night , big man Willie Cauley-Stein was the team 's leading scorer . Cauley-Stein scored 18 points to go along with nine rebounds and three steals . While Cauley-Stein continued to fare well , the Kings as a whole struggled to find offense on Saturday . The team shot just over 38 percent from the field on the night . Two Kings in particular , Skal Labissiere and Garrett Temple , struggled heavily . The duo combined for 38 minutes of play and shot 0 - of - 17 for zero total points . The Trail_Blazers will visit Memphis on Monday , while Sacramento will host Denver .
The New_Orleans Pelicans took down the host Portland Trail_Blazers , 123 - 116 , at Moda_Center on Saturday . New_Orleans ( 12 - 11 ) trailed for much of the second half , but gained a three - point lead thanks to a quick 10 - 2 run to end the second quarter . That momentum carried over into the third , as the Pelicans quickly opened the lead up to 18 . Strong play from All-Star center DeMarcus Cousins helped fuel the run , as he scored a team - high 38 points . Cousins helped fill the void left by the absence of injured superstar Anthony Davis ( left pelvis ) . Veteran point guard Rajon Rondo was also integral to the Pelicans ' offensive success . Rondo gave the Pelicans the lead at the half by draining a three - pointer , and contributed multiple baskets to the team 's big third - quarter run . He finished with his second consecutive double - double , notching 10 assists and 12 points . Portland ( 13 - 10 ) saw some cold shooting nights on Saturday , but still put up a strong fight until the game 's end . Shooting guard C.J . McCollum went just 8 - of - 22 from the field , while center Jusuf Nurkic had just eight points on 4 - of - 11 shooting . Luckily for Portland , backups Meyers Leonard and Shabazz Napier delivered unusually strong performances off the bench . The duo combined for 32 points on 11 - of - 20 shooting . Per usual , though , it was star point guard Damian Lillard who truly led the team . Lillard had 29 points and eight assists , both team highs . New_Orleans will host the Golden_State Warriors on Monday , while Portland will host the Washington Wizards on Tuesday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the host Portland Trail_Blazers , 106 - 92 , at Moda_Center on Tuesday . Despite the fact that Portland led for the majority of the first quarter , Washington actually held the lead for the final three quarters in total . The second quarter was the only quarter decided by more than two points , with Washington outscoring Portland , 27 - 15 . Bradley Beal was the star , as he dropped a career - high 51 points to lead the Wizards to a big road win . Defense was key for Washington , as they held Portland to 41 percent shooting , while forcing them to commit 19 turnovers . In addition , the Wizards recorded 16 steals , while holding Portland to just two steals on their end . The Wizards ( 13 - 11 ) not only got a career - high 51 points out of Bradley Beal , he also added three rebounds and two assists to his line on 21 - of - 37 shooting . No other starter scored in double figures , as Marcin Gortat collected four points , seven rebounds , seven assists and two steals . Kelly Oubre Jr. was huge off the bench , providing 14 points , two rebounds , two assists and five steals . The Trail_Blazers ( 13 - 11 ) were led by Damian Lillard , as he tallied 30 points , eight rebounds and nine assists . Al-Farouq Aminu started and totaled 17 points and six rebounds .
