Jusuf Nurkic amassed 15 points , nine rebounds , two assists and three blocks . C.J . McCollum accrued 14 points , six rebounds and three assists .
The Houston Rockets took down the Portland Trail_Blazers , 124 - 117 , at Moda_Center on Saturday . Houston ( 20 - 4 ) trailed by as much as 14 , but launched a fourth - quarter comeback to earn their ninth straight win . The win was spearheaded by superstar guard James Harden , who had a whopping 48 points to go with eight rebounds and three assists . Harden took a team - high 29 shots , hitting 16 and knocking down four three - pointers . Despite a rare low - assist night for Houston ( 14 ) , the team had plenty of offensive firepower . The team shot 53 percent from the field and knocked down 10 three - pointers . During its fourth quarter comeback , Houston had a ridiculous 229 offensive rating as a team . Portland ( 13 - 12 ) held an impressive lead over the Rockets for much of the game . Much of the team 's offensive success was predicated on the performance of star point guard Damian Lillard . Lillard hit a game - high nine three - pointers , scoring 35 points in total on the night . Fellow guard C.J . McCollum , meanwhile , added 28 points . The Trail_Blazers struggled , though , on the defensive end . Portland let up 53 percent shooting from Houston , and struggled with fouls , as the team committed 27 fouls and allowed the Rockets to reach the free - throw line 40 times . Houston will host the Pelicans on Monday , while the Trail_Blazers will visit Golden_State .
The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the host Portland Trail_Blazers , 93 - 91 , at Moda_Center on Wednesday evening . The first quarter was a tight one , with the Spurs carrying the advantage just about the whole way . They continued to play with the edge through the second quarter and expanded their lead to 54 - 46 by halftime . The Trail_Blazers came out strong in the third quarter and managed to make it just a two - point game heading into the fourth . The Trail_Blazers led a one - point lead with six minutes to go , but that was the last they saw of the lead , as the Spurs pulled ahead for the final time , staying one step ahead the rest of the way . LaMarcus Aldridge led the way for the Spurs with 22 points on 10 - of - 17 shooting , eight rebounds , three blocks and one assist . Pau Gasol followed up with 20 points , 17 rebounds , five assists and two blocks , while Manu Ginobili added 10 points , three rebounds , three steals and one assist , in 25 minutes off the bench . The Spurs shot 52 percent from the field , including 38 percent from long range . Meanwhile , Damian Lillard led the way for Portland with 17 points , four rebounds , three assists and two steals , in 34 minutes . Jusuf Nurkic followed up with 15 points and six rebounds , while C.J . McCollum chipped in 13 points , six assists , five rebounds and one steal , in 38 minutes . The Trail_Blazers shot 40 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 25 from long range . The Blazers ( 16 - 15 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Nuggets on Friday . The Spurs ( 22 - 10 ) will be right back in action as they take on the Jazz in Utah on Thursday .
The Portland Trail_Blazers came back from a 13 - point fourth quarter deficit to beat the Philadelphia 76ers , 114 - 110 , at Moda_Center on Thursday night . It was a rough night early on for the Trail_Blazers ( 18 - 16 ) , as big man Jusuf Nurkic got into early foul trouble and the team struggled to find an offensive groove . The team trailed by double digits after a big Philadelphia run in the third quarter , falling behind by 13 by the end of the third . Nurkic wound up being a big piece of the Blazers ' fourth - quarter comeback , though , managing to stay in the game despite his five personal fouls . The Blazers scored a whopping 42 points in the fourth quarter , with free - throws playing a huge role in the comeback . The Blazers got to the line at an extremely high rate , shooting 19 free - throws in the quarter , more than they allowed the Sixers to attempt all game . C.J . McCollum led the Blazers with 34 points , including three free - throws to seal the game in the final seconds . Nurkic , meanwhile , had 21 points and 12 rebounds , a turnaround after a rough stretch recently . The team was again without star point guard Damian Lillard ( hamstring ) . Philadelphia ( 15 - 19 ) shot the lights out throughout the game , but struggled to control its fouls , especially down the stretch . The team shot an impressive 16 - of - 32 from beyond the arc , with three players knocking down four or more three - pointers . However , the Sixers were sunk by their foul trouble , as the team committed 26 personal fouls on the night . Joel Embiid led the team with 29 points , including five three - pointers for the big man . He added nine rebounds . Rookie Ben Simmons , meanwhile , had 17 points to go with a team - high eight assists . On Saturday , the Blazers will visit Atlanta while the Sixers will visit Denver .
The Portland Trail_Blazers blew out the Atlanta Hawks , 110 - 89 , at Moda_Center on Friday . Portland ( 20 - 18 ) held the lead for the final 42 minutes of the game , although it was not until the second half that Portland established a commanding double - digit lead . The Blazers came out strong to start the third quarter , extending their lead to as much as 15 at points . The hot start to the second half allowed the team to manage minutes carefully , as C.J . McCollum was the only Portland player to log more than 30 minutes of action . McCollum also led the team in scoring , notching 20 points on 8 - of - 13 shooting . McCollum was the top performer for Portland 's offense , as star point guard Damian Lillard struggled a bit in his second game back from a hamstring injury . Lillard shot just 6 - of - 15 for 14 points . He was the only Blazer to shoot under 50 percent while attempting at least four shots . Still , it was a strong night for Portland on the offensive end . As a whole , the team shot a respectable 54 percent . The team took a balanced approach on offense , spreading the ball around and notching 30 assists . Seven Portland players scored in double digits on the night . The league - worst Hawks ( 10 - 28 ) , meanwhile , have now lost eight straight road games in what has been a tough season so far . The team simply could not make it happen on offense on Friday , shooting just 37 percent from the field . Point guard Dennis Schroeder led the team with 14 points and was one of only two Hawks players to score in double figures . The team 's only reliable source of offense throughout the night was the free - throw line . Atlanta attempted 25 free - throws , making 21 . On Sunday , Portland will host the San_Antonio Spurs and the Hawks will visit the Los_Angeles Lakers .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the visiting Indiana Pacers , 100 - 86 , at Moda_Center on Thursday evening . The Blazers got out to a good start at home , with a 20 - 10 lead halfway through the first quarter , but the Pacers were able claw back and make it a one - point game heading into the second quarter . It stayed tight for most of the second quarter , with the game tied at 47 with a minute left , before the Trail_Blazers pulled ahead by five with a couple quick buckets before the half . The Pacers made a push in the third quarter , taking a five - point lead before beginning the fourth tied at 74 . However , they came unraveled in the fourth as the Trail_Blazers outscored the Pacers 26 - 12 in the final frame to secure the win . Damian Lillard was the high - point man for the Trail_Blazers , with 26 points on 8 - of - 21 shooting , along with eight assists , five rebounds and one block , in 39 minutes . Jusuf Nurkic had a solid outing , with 19 points , 17 rebounds , two steals and two blocks , in 31 minutes , while C.J . McCollum added 16 points on 6 - of - 18 shooting . The Blazers shot 39 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 32 from long range . Meanwhile , Victor Oladipo and Darren Collison tallied 23 points each for the Pacers . Domantas Sabonis added nine points , 10 rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block , while Thaddeus Young finished with 10 points , 14 rebounds , three assists and two steals . The Pacers shot 40 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 26 shooting . The Pacers ( 24 - 21 ) will be right back in action as they take on the Lakers in Los_Angeles on Friday . The Trail_Blazers ( 24 - 21 ) play host to the Mavericks on Saturday .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 123 - 114 , at Moda_Center on Wednesday . Early in the game , Minnesota had the upper hand . The Wolves held a single - digit lead for most of the first half , ultimately allowing Portland to tie the game up before the half . The Trail_Blazers , though , came out and put the game away in the third quarter with a quick run . A two - point shot from C.J . McCollum gave Portland its first double - digit lead of the game midway through the third quarter , and the team never took its foot off the gas from that point . The Blazers led for the final 23 minutes of action . In his first game since being named an All-Star for the first time in three years , Damian Lillard turned in a big performance for Portland ( 26 - 22 ) . Lillard led all scorers with 31 points , shooting 9 - of - 17 from the field in the game . His backcourt partner , C.J . McCollum , added another 28 points in what was a big offensive night for the team . The Blazers shot 55 percent from the field and knocked down 17 three - pointers . The Timberwolves ( 31 - 19 ) had two players named to the All-Star game on Tuesday , but only one took the floor in Portland . Jimmy Butler ( knee ) was sidelined for his third straight game with a lingering injury . Third-year big man and first - time All-Star Karl-Anthony Towns , though , followed up the selection by delivering an efficient 16 points on 6 - of - 9 shooting . Andrew Wiggins was the team 's high scorer with 24 . The limiting factor for the Wolves wound up being three - pointers , as the team hit only six on the night . Minnesota will square off against Golden_State on Thursday night . Portland , meanwhile , is scheduled to visit the Dallas Mavericks on Friday evening .
The Trail_Blazers defeated the Charlotte Hornets 109 - 103 on Thursday at Moda_Center . The Trail_Blazers ( 30 - 25 ) looked to be cruising right along and on their way to ending their three - game losing streak , as they carried a comfortable 14 - point lead into the final quarter Thursday night . But , a run from the Hornets ( 23 - 31 ) led by All-Star point guard Kemba Walker ultimately sent the game into overtime . From that point , however , it was all about Portland and C.J . McCollum , as the shooting guard 's dagger floater with 12 seconds remaining put his team up five and the game out of reach . McCollum finished with 22 points in 41 minutes , while Jusuf Nurkic had one of his best games of the season with a double - double of 24 points and 14 rebounds . Damian Lillard struggled shooting the ball Thursday , hitting just 6 - of - 22 shots from the field , but he still finished with 18 points and eight assists . Walker had a tremendous game in defeat for Charlotte , shooting 6 - of - 11 from behind the arc and 13 - of - 26 from the field overall en route to scoring a game - high 40 points in 39 minutes . Frank Kaminsky also served as a key contributor off the bench , scoring 17 points and grabbing six rebounds in 30 minutes as a reserve . Dwight Howard struggled getting the ball in the basket Thursday , scoring just seven points on 3 - of - 11 shooting , but he was dominant on the glass , snagging a game - high 15 rebounds .
The Utah Jazz took down the Portland Trail_Blazers , 115 - 96 , at Moda_Center on Sunday Night . The Jazz ( 28 - 28 ) are back up to .500 after nine straight wins . It was a blazing third quarter that propelled the Jazz to a win on Sunday . The team scored 38 points to start the second half , with rookie guard Donovan Mitchell leading the way . Utah was unstoppable from three - point range , shooting 13 - of - 26 on the night . The Jazz were also tough to match on the boards , as the team came away with 16 offensive rebounds in the win . Mitchell led Utah with 27 points , shooting 10 - of - 24 from the field . The team also saw 24 points from sharpshooter Joe Ingles , who went 8 - of - 12 from the field . Three different Utah players shared the team high with 11 rebounds . For Portland ( 31 - 26 ) , meanwhile , it was a tough shooting night . The team hit just 40 percent of its shots from the field and 30 percent from beyond the arc . Still , star point guard Damian Lillard was tough to stop on Sunday . Coming off the back of a 50 - point performance in his last game , Lillard scored 39 points on 12 - of - 25 shooting and 13 - of - 13 from the free - throw line . It was a tough night from the rest of the Trail_Blazers , though . In particular , center Jusuf Nurkic started and scored zero points on 0 - of - 4 shooting . Utah will host the San_Antonio Spurs on Monday , while Portland will see Golden_State on Wednesday .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Golden_State Warriors on Wednesday , 123 - 117 , behind Damian Lillard 's 44 points at Moda_Center . What started as a runaway night for the Portland offense quickly turned into a shootout between two of the league 's most potent scorers . Portland 's Damian Lillard got going early in the night , helping his team to a 40 - point first quarter . Lillard kept his strong showing going , exchanging bigtime shots with Golden_State forward Kevin Durant . Thanks to a 50 - point night from Durant , Golden_State clawed back to tie the game at 99 - 99 in the fourth quarter . The Warriors never took the lead , though , as C.J . McCollum quickly converted an and - one and Lillard continued his heroics to provide nine more points by the game 's end . The Blazers ( 32 - 26 ) saw a combined 73 points from their backcourt duo of Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum . Lillard was the star of the show , going 14 - of - 25 from the field and 12 - of - 12 from the free - throw line en route to 44 points . Big man Jusuf Nurkic also provided a much - needed interior presence in the win . Nurkic finished with 17 points and 13 rebounds . Golden_State ( 44 - 14 ) will enter the All-Star Break without the league 's best record for the first time since 2014 , as the team slipped behind Houston in the standings after Wednesday 's loss . The loss was particularly tough to swallow due to Kevin Durant 's huge performance . Durant set a new personal high for scoring in a Warriors uniform , dropping 50 points on 17 - of - 27 shooting and 10 - of - 10 from the free - throw line . While Durant excelled , fellow former MVP Steph Curry had a rare off night . Curry shot just 6 - of - 17 from the field and committed seven turnovers . Both teams will be off through the All-Star Break .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Sacramento Kings , 116 - 99 , at Moda_Center on Tuesday . This was a dominating performance for Portland , as they pulled out this win in wire - to - wire fashion . A 36 - 26 first quarter really set the foundation , as the Kings never got within six points after the halftime buzzer . Rebounding was a huge factor for the Trail_Blazers , as they outrebounded the Kings , 44 - 34 . Ball movement was also critical , with Portland handing out 26 assists and Sacramento recording just 19 . That led to the Blazers hitting 53 percent from the field and 43 percent from three - point range while Sacramento connected on just 45 percent from the field and 32 percent from long range . The Kings ( 18 - 43 ) were led by Zach Randolph , as he tallied 20 points , six rebounds and two assists . Willie Cauley-Stein accrued 17 points , nine rebounds and two steals . De'Aaron Fox collected 13 points , three rebounds , seven assists and three steals . The Trail_Blazers ( 35 - 26 ) got a gem out of Damian Lillard , as he totaled 26 points , 12 assists and two steals . Jusuf Nurkic amassed 17 points , nine rebounds , two assists and two steals . Shabazz Napier led the bench with 14 points , three assists and three steals . Ed Davis also played well off the bench , providing nine points and 12 rebounds . Both teams return to action on Thursday , with Sacramento welcoming the Brooklyn Nets and Portland playing host to the Minnesota Timberwolves .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 108 - 99 , at Moda_Center on Thursday evening . It was a back - and - forth game , with the lead changing hands four times in the second half . While Portland ( 36 - 26 ) entered the fourth quarter trailing , All-Star point guard Damian Lillard led a late - game push to give his team the win . The Trail_Blazers outscored Minnesota ( 38 - 27 ) by 11 points in the fourth quarter , thanks in part to two late - game dagger three - pointers from Lillard . He scored 35 points , out - dueling fellow All-Star Karl-Anthony Towns of Minnesota , who had 34 . Portland shot just 40 percent from the field and only 9 - of - 30 from three - point range . Still , the team was able to pull out a win thanks to its success at the free - throw line . The Blazers attempted 35 free - throws , 14 more than Minnesota . Six Portland players scored in double digits . Lillard 's 35 led the way , while backup point guard Shabazz Napier had 16 points off the bench . As poorly as Portland shot from three - point range , Minnesota 's shooting was worse . The Timberwolves went just 4 - of - 20 from beyond the arc , including 0 - of - 7 from the bench . Minnesota was once again without star wing Jimmy Butler , who will miss at least four more weeks after undergoing surgery for a meniscus injury . The Timberwolves will visit Utah on Friday , while Portland will host the Oklahoma_City Thunder on Saturday .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the New_York Knicks , 111 - 87 , at Moda_Center on Tuesday . A 35 - 28 first quarter really set the tone in this game , as Portland dominated from there . In fact , New_York never got the game within five points after the half and never got the game within single - digits in the fourth quarter . Much of that can be attributed to the Blazers outscoring the Knicks , 54 - 35 , in the second half . Three-point shooting decided the game , with Portland connecting on 20 - of - 33 and New_York hitting just 7 - of - 19 . Rebounding was also critical , with the Blazers outrebounding the Knicks , 51 - 39 . The Knicks ( 24 - 41 ) were led by Tim Hardaway Jr. , as he tallied 19 points , four rebounds and two steals . Enes Kanter was the only other starter with more than six points , as he amassed 18 points , 11 rebounds and three assists . Michael Beasley led the bench with 16 points , four rebounds and three assists . The Trail_Blazers ( 39 - 26 ) have now won eight - straight games , as they find themselves third in the west . Damian Lillard was the player of the game , as he tallied 37 points , two rebounds and two steals on 8 - of - 11 from three - point range . C.J . McCollum accrued 19 points , six rebounds and four assists . Jusuf Nurkic totaled 11 points , eight rebounds and four assists . Zach Collins and Ed Davis combined for 24 rebounds off the bench . Both teams return to action on Friday , with Portland playing host to the Golden_State Warriors and New_York traveling to face the Milwaukee Bucks .
The Portland Trail_Blazers took down the Detroit Pistons , 100 - 87 , at Moda_Center on Saturday night . The win was Portland 's 12th straight . The Trail_Blazers ( 43 - 26 ) came out hot on Saturday , scoring 31 first - quarter points to take an early double - digit lead . Portland was led , per usual , by a strong effort from star point guard Damian Lillard . Lillard had 24 points , eight assists , and seven rebounds in the wire - to - wire win . All five Blazers starters scored in double digits in the win , and although the team shot just 43 percent from the field , strong defensive play helped make it a commanding win for Portland . The Blazers grabbed eight steals as a team and held Detroit ( 30 - 39 ) to just 39 percent shooting on the night . Al-Faroq Aminu had a double - double with 10 points and 12 rebounds . C.J . McCollum added 16 points and six rebounds , and Jusuf Nurkic had 13 points on the night . Portland saw 27 points from its bench , relying primarily on its starters for production in the win . For Detroit , meanwhile , All-Star center Andre Drummond delivered a dominant performance . Drummond led the team with 18 points and 22 rebounds , but it was not enough to earn his team a win . Star scorer Blake Griffin went just 6 - of - 17 for 15 points , and the team shot only 39 percent in total from the field . Starting point guard Ish Smith logged 28 minutes and scored only six points on 2 - of - 8 shooting , contributing to Detroit 's overall ineffective offense . The Pistons will visit Sacramento on Monday while the Trail_Blazers will look to defend their streak in LA on Sunday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Portland Trail_Blazers , 115 - 111 , at Moda_Center on Tuesday , snapping Portland 's league - best 13 - game win streak . James Harden had 42 points to lead the Rockets ( 57 - 14 ) to their sixth straight win . The star 's enormous scoring output included a huge late - game three - pointer to give Houston a 113 - 104 edge . Portland ( 44 - 27 ) , though , rallied in the final two minutes , going on a 70 run to cut the deficit to just two points . Time , however , was not on the Blazers ' side . Houston was able to run down the clock to under six seconds , and Chris Paul managed to seal the game with an offensive rebound off his own miss . The Rockets put on a clinic from beyond the arc on Tuesday , knocking down 19 three - pointers . Three separate Rockets had three or more three - pointers in the win , including Paul , who notched 22 points . Sixth man Eric Gordon chipped in another 18 points . The team was able to use its efficient scoring to overcome a major turnover problem . Houston turned the ball over 23 times on the night despite pulling out the win . Portland , meanwhile , saw three players score 20 or more points . C.J . McCollum , however , was not one of those players . It was an uncharacteristically shaky night for the star guard , who went just 4 - of - 15 from the field for eight points . His fellow starting guard , Damian Lillard , was inefficient as well , shooting 5 - of - 16 from the field . Al-Farouq Aminu was the team 's leading scorer with 22 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting . Houston will host the Detroit Pistons on Thursday , while Portland will see the Boston Celtics on Friday .
The Portland Trail_Blazers took down the Los_Angeles Clippers , 105 - 96 , at Moda_Center on Friday evening . Damian Lillard returned to action for Portland ( 47 - 26 ) , making a big impact in his first game back since missing time due to the birth of his first child . Lillard scored 17 points and dished out 11 assists to help the Blazers earn a commanding win . Portland went on a run in the second quarter , establishing a double - digit lead which it maintained for nearly the duration of the game . Los_Angeles did mount a slight comeback effort , outscoring Portland by 12 in the fourth quarter , but it wound up being too little too late . Portland still held a nearly 10 - point lead by the final buzzer . Jusuf Nurkic had a double - double for the Trail_Blazers , scoring 21 points and pulling down 12 rebounds . Nurkic contributed five offensive rebounds , contributing to the team 's 12 overall . Rookie big man Zach Collins also had a big night , pitching in 15 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting . The Clippers ( 41 - 35 ) , meanwhile , were in desperate need of a win . LA now sits 2 games out of eighth place in the Western_Conference , and thus the playoff race . Poor shooting was the deciding factor in the loss for LA . The team hit just 40 percent of its shots overall and 57 percent of its free - throws . This was despite sixth man Lou Williams scoring 23 points on 10 - of - 22 shooting and going 3 - of - 3 at the free - throw line . On Sunday , both teams will host games . LA will see the Indiana Pacers , while Portland will host the Memphis Grizzlies .
The Portland Trail_Blazers took down the Memphis Grizzlies , 113 - 98 , at Moda_Center on Sunday evening . The Trail_Blazers ( 48 - 29 ) led for the entirety of the game , comfortably earning the win and moving one game closer to clinching third place in the Western_Conference . The Blazers capitalized on a high number of turnovers and fouls by the Grizzlies ( 21 - 56 ) in the loss . Portland was able to go to the line 25 times , while the Grizzlies only attempted 12 free - throws on the night . The Trail_Blazers also played characteristically tough defense , forcing 17 turnovers . Portland needs to win three of its remaining five games to clinch third place . All five Blazers starters scored in double digits in the win . All-Star point guard Damian Lillard led the team with 27 points , which came on 7 - of - 15 shooting from the field and a perfect 11 - of - 11 night at the free - throw line . Lillard added nine assists , which were matched by shooting guard C.J . McCollum , who dished out nine dimes and scored 20 points . Jusuf Nurkic recorded a double - double , scoring 17 points and pulling down a team - high 10 rebounds . Memphis , meanwhile , shot very efficiently from three - point range , but on a low volume . The team went 9 - of - 21 from beyond the arc and shot 46 percent overall from the field . Rookie forward Dillon Brooks was a major bright spot for the Grizzlies in the loss . Brooks exploded for a game - high 28 points along with six rebounds and four assists . The Trail_Blazers will visit Dallas on Tuesday , while the Grizzlies will travel to New_Orleans on Wednesday .
The host Golden_State Warriors took down the visiting Toronto Raptors , 117 - 112 , at Oracle_Arena on Wednesday . The Raptors ( 2 - 2 ) were able to establish a five - point lead with under 90 seconds remaining in the game , but quickly gave up points to the Warriors ' ( 3 - 2 ) All-Star offensive weapons . Kevin Durant hit a game - tying three - pointer with just over one minute remaining , and Steph Curry followed it up with another deep three to give Golden_State the lead . The Warriors were narrowly able to avoid dropping to below .500 , as the Raptors failed to capitalize on multiple final - minute offensive opportunities . Golden_State saw a significant offensive barrage from its star players , including two - time MVP Steph Curry . Curry scored a team - high 30 points , including four three - pointers . Despite going relatively cold in the fourth quarter , Curry was able to knock down a dagger three to put the game away as the clock ticked down . On defense , Curry looked engaged , delivering an impressive four steals . The rest of the Warriors ' `` big four `` delivered in similar fashion . Former MVP Kevin Durant added an additional 29 points , while All-Star shooting guard Klay Thompson scored 22 . Draymond Green had 15 points , 11 rebounds , and six assists . The team characteristically relied heavily on the three - point shot , knocking down 12 from beyond the arc on the night . Toronto , meanwhile , played a tight game throughout with the defending champions . Sophomore Paskal Siakam delivered a surprisingly strong performance , scoring 20 points while shooting a highly efficient 9 - of - 12 from the floor . With starting center Jonas Valanciunas sitting out the contest due to an ankle injury , the Raptors resorted to smaller lineups , allowing more time for Siakam and the rest of the Raptors ' frontcourt to take the floor . In addition to Siakam , sophomore big man Jakob Poeltl impressed , delivering a 12 - point , 12 - rebound double - double in just over 26 minutes of play . Per usual , though , the team 's leader was All-Star guard DeMar DeRozan . DeRozan scored a team - high 24 points and played uncharacteristically intense defense , coming away with six steals on the night . Golden_State will host Washington on Friday , while the Raptors will visit the Los_Angeles Lakers .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the visiting Washington Wizards , 120 - 117 , at Oracle_Arena on Friday night . The Warriors used an impressive second - half surge to turn things around . Everything looked bleak for the Warriors ( 4 - 2 ) in the first half , as Draymond Green and Bradley Beal got ejected and the reigning NBA champions were down 53 - 67 after the first two quarters . However , they won the second half , 67 - 50 , to complete a huge comeback that included a 33 - 20 win for Golden_State in the final 12 minutes of the contest . Kevin Durant paced Golden_State 's offense with 31 points , 11 rebounds and six assists . Stephen Curry added 20 points despite the fact he shot 7 - of - 19 from the floor and 3 - of - 13 from three - point range , and also contributed with eight assists . Klay Thompson finished with 18 points , and David West provided a huge spark coming off the bench with 16 points . As for the Wizards ( 3 - 2 ) , Otto Porter finished with 29 points ( on 11 - of - 16 from the field , including 7 - of - 9 from three - point range ) and 10 rebounds . John Wall added 20 points with 14 assists , and a total of six Washington players ended scoring in double figures . The Wizards shot 44 percent from the field and 46 percent from three , but could not close the game out in the final minutes and lost a game they could have easily won .
The visiting Detroit Pistons defeated the Golden_State Warriors 115 - 107 at Oracle_Arena on Sunday . The Pistons ' fast hands on defense forced the Warriors to cough up 25 turnovers . The resulting 31 points off those mistakes favored Detroit in grabbing a rare win at Oracle_Arena . The final three minutes of the game included drama , as a handful of foul calls were made , including one on Stephen Curry who was fighting through a screen . The result was two made free throws by Avery Bradley and a five - point lead . Aside from the ensuing dunk by Andre Iguodala to cut the lead to three points with 2:12 remaining , Tobias Harris followed up with a three - pointer a few possessions later , icing the game as the Warriors were unable to connect from deep down the stretch . Bradley and Reggie Jackson led the Pistons ( 5 - 2 ) with 23 points and 22 points , respectively - - both knocking down eight shots each . Andre Drummond was strong on the glass and finished with eight points and 18 rebounds . The bench was led by Ish Smith who logged 16 points and two assists across 18 minutes of action . The Warriors ( 4 - 3 ) boasted three players with at least 27 points , as Kevin Durant , Klay Thompson and Steph Curry all knocked down at least 10 shots . Thompson led all scorers with 29 points , while Curry finished with 27 points , eight assists and six rebounds . The starters combined for a crushing 22 turnovers . Next up , the Warriors travel to Los_Angeles to take on the Clippers on Monday , while the Pistons visit the Lakers on Halloween .
The host Golden_State Warriors defeated the visiting Miami Heat , 97 - 80 , at Oracle_Arena on Monday . Golden_State ( 8 - 3 ) won its fourth straight and has now won seven of its last eight games . The Warriors entered the game averaging a league - best 121 points per game , but were held to just 97 points on Monday . Golden_State also dished out only 19 assists in the game . Still , the team cruised easily to the victory . All four members of the team 's `` big four `` scored in double figures , with Kevin Durant notching a team - high 21 points . Fellow forward Draymond Green , meanwhile , was surprisingly efficient , scoring 18 points on 10 shot attempts . The key to the victory for the Warriors wound up being defense , as Miami was held to just 35 percent shooting from the field while hitting only six three - pointers . Miami ( 4 - 6 ) had its toughest offensive night of the season , scoring just 80 points on 35 percent shooting . The Heat struggled throughout the game , as only two players scored more than ten points . Star center Hassan Whiteside exacerbated the Heat 's struggles , shooting just 1 - of - 9 from the field for three points . Miami also turned the ball over 20 times as a team , struggling to control the ball . The lone bright spot was forward James Johnson , who scored a team - high 21 points to go with nine rebounds and six assists . Golden_State will host the Timberwolves on Wednesday , while the Heat will visit Phoenix .
The host Golden_State Warriors took down the Minnesota Timberwolves , 125 - 101 , at Oracle_Arena on Wednesday . What started as a close game quickly became anything but , as Golden_State ( 9 - 3 ) delivered an explosive third quarter to open up a double - digit lead . The Warriors dropped a staggering 44 points in the third , growing their lead from one point at halftime to 19 by the quarter 's end . Despite the absence of former MVP Kevin Durant , the Warriors offense looked as unstoppable as ever . Superstar point guard Steph Curry flirted with a triple - double , tallying eight assists and eight rebounds to go with his 22 points . However , Curry was able to sit out the entirety of the fourth quarter thanks to the Warriors ' sizable lead . Klay Thompson helped the Warriors maintain their lead through the early fourth quarter , knocking down multiple jumpers to help put the game out of reach . He finished with a team - high 28 points and knocked down six three - pointers . The victory marked Golden_State 's fifth straight win and its eighth in nine games . The Timberwolves ( 7 - 4 ) , meanwhile , lost a five - game win streak of their own in the blowout . The team was able to get off to a hot start while simultaneously containing the Warriors high - powered offense . A big piece of the Timberwolves ' early success was fourth - year wing Andrew Wiggins . Wiggins scored 13 first - half points and also came away with three steals . He finished the game with just 17 , though , as the Wolves struggled to match Golden_State in the second half . The team finished the game shooting only 41 percent from the field . Wiggins ' 17 points led the team , while star center Karl-Anthony Towns had a team - best 12 rebounds . On Saturday , Golden_State will host the 76ers , while the Timberwolves will visit Phoenix .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the visiting Philadelphia 76ers , 135 - 114 , at Oracle_Arena on Saturday evening . The 76ers ( 6 - 5 ) came out strong and kept things tight through the first two quarters . However , the Warriors ' ( 10 - 3 ) little 60 run to end the second quarter translated into a pure momentum shift in the second half . The Warriors outscored the Sixers 36 - 21 in the third quarter , to take a 101 - 85 lead into the fourth and cruise to their sixth straight win . Kevin Durant led the Warriors with 29 points , five rebounds , four assists , two steals and two blocks , in just 28 minutes . Klay Thompson followed up with 23 points , while Stephen Curry added 22 points and nine assists . Draymond Green filled the stat sheet with 10 points , 10 rebounds , seven assists , five blocks and two steals , in 31 minutes . The Warriors shot 58 percent from the field and hit 14 - of - 27 from long range . Meanwhile , all five starters scored in double digits for Philadelphia , in addition to Timothe Luwawu-Cabarrot , who chipped in 15 points in 23 minutes off the bench . J.J. Redick led the 76ers with 17 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting , and six rebounds , in 30 minutes . Dario Saric followed up with 16 points , while Ben Simmons finished with 13 points , eight assists , five rebounds and two steals , in 29 minutes . The Sixers assisted on 30 of their 44 - made field goals . The 76ers continue their road trip with a contest in Los_Angeles , against the Clippers , on Monday . The Warriors play host to the Magic on Monday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Orlando Magic , 110 - 100 , at Oracle_Arena on Monday night . The Warriors ( 11 - 3 ) came into the contest with one rather notable absence , as Stephen Curry was forced to sit out the game with a thigh contusion . That naturally heaped some extra responsibility on the trio of Kevin Durant , Draymond Green and Klay Thompson in particular , while also thrusting trusted veteran Shaun Livingston into the starting lineup . All four players had varying degrees of positive contributions , and although Golden_State found itself a bit less explosive on the offensive end , they made up for it with an above - average defensive effort . The defending NBA champs limited the Magic ( 8 - 6 ) to 42 percent shooting - - including 31 percent from three - point range - - and put the clamps on Orlando in a pivotal third quarter . After the two teams had battled to a 56 - 56 halftime deadlock , the Warriors limited the visitors to just 19 points in the ensuing 12 minutes while amassing 32 of their own , turning the contest in their favor . Nikola Vucevic led the Magic with 20 points , five rebounds , four assists and one steal . Evan Fournier followed with 16 points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals . Jonathon Simmons was next with a bench - leading 13 points , a total he supplemented with four boards , four assists and one steal . Terrence Ross managed 11 points , one rebound and three steals . Aaron Gordon produced a 10 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and one steal . Elfrid Payton drew the start after receiving the Magic 's last contest off for rest , but he was only able to generate four points , five assists and two rebounds over 25 minutes . Durant paced the Warriors with 21 points , eight assists and seven rebounds . Green followed with 20 points , five assists , four rebounds and two steals . Livingston excelled in his starting opportunity , supplying 16 points , six assists , two rebounds and one steal . Thompson poured in 15 points and added five assists and four boards . Nick Young led the reserves with nine points , while Kevon Looney ( eight points , five rebounds ) and David West ( four points , 11 rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block ) were productive off the second unit as well . The Magic continue their West Coast swing with a visit to the Portland Trail_Blazers on Wednesday evening , while the Warriors take the cross - country trip to Beantown to tangle with the Boston Celtics in a marquee matchup on Thursday night .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Chicago Bulls , 143 - 94 , at Oracle_Arena on Friday . Golden_State were expected to win this game easily , but a 49 - point margin shows just how lopsided of a matchup it was . The middle quarters were absurdly one - sided , with the Warriors outscoring the Bulls , 81 - 34 . Golden_State ended up shooting 58 percent from the field , while holding Chicago to just 35 percent shooting . That was buoyed by the fact that the Warriors doubled up the Bulls in assists , 36 - 18 . In addition , they won the defensive rebounding battle , 43 - 27 . The Bulls ( 3 - 14 ) were led by Jerian Grant , as he amassed 21 points , three rebounds and three assists on 8 - of - 10 shooting off the bench .. Lauri Markkanen led the starters with 14 points and six rebounds . Denzel Valentine was the only other starter in double figures , as he tallied 10 points , six rebounds and two assists . The Warriors ( 14 - 5 ) had to play this game without Kevin Durant ( knee ) and Draymond Green ( rest ) , but that clearly did n't matter . Stephen Curry was the player of the game , collecting 33 points , seven rebounds , four assists and two steals on 10 - of - 18 shooting . Curry actually scored 26 of those 33 points in the second quarter . Klay Thompson accrued 29 points and four rebounds on 12 - of - 17 from the field . Jordan Bell totaled seven points , six rebounds , four assists , two steals and six blocks in a rare start . Nick Young led the bench with 17 points and six rebounds . On deck for Golden_State is a home matchup versus the New_Orleans Pelicans . As for Chicago , they play host to the Miami Heat on Sunday .
The Sacramento Kings defeated the Golden_State Warriors , 110 - 106 , at Oracle_Arena on Monday evening . The Warriors ( 15 - 6 ) were without their two top players , as Kevin Durant ( ankle ) and Stephan Curry ( hand ) were sidelined for the contest . The game was tied at 27 after one quarter , with the Warriors taking a slight edge before halftime . However , Sacramento was not discouraged and fought right to the end , where they were able to sneak ahead , as Bogdan Bogdanovic banked in the game - winner over Draymond Green with about 10 seconds left . The Kings ( 6 - 14 ) outscored the Warriors 57 - 51 in the second half in order to steal the win in Golden_State . Willie Cauley-Stein was the high - point man for the Kings , with 19 points , along with eight rebounds , six assists , two blocks and one steal in 29 minutes off the bench . George Hill added 16 points , while Zach Randolph finished with 11 points , six rebounds , two assists and one steal in 21 minutes of action . The Kings shot 53 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 17 from long range . Meanwhile , Klay Thompson was the high - point man for the Warriors , with 21 points on 7 - of - 20 shooting in 32 minutes . Patrick McCaw finished with 16 points , seven assists , four steals , three rebounds and one block in 33 minutes . Draymond Green added 14 points , eight assists , four rebounds and one steal in 38 minutes . The Warriors shot 51 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 35 from long range , and dished 30 assists . The Warriors will look to get back in the win column as they take on the Lakers in Los_Angeles on Wednesday . The Kings will be right back in action , as they play host to the Bucks on Tuesday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the visiting Portland Trail_Blazers , 111 - 104 , at Oracle_Arena on Monday evening . The Trail_Blazers came out strong and held a one - point advantage after the first quarter . However , things took a major turn through the second and third quarters as the Warriors outscored the Trail_Blazers 66 - 47 , to take a 93 - 75 lead into the final frame . The Trail_Blazers gave it a solid push in the fourth , getting it to within eight points with just over three minutes to go , but the Warriors held on to earn their seventh straight win . This marks the fifth straight loss for Portland . Nick Young sparked the Warriors in the second quarter , scoring nine points in five minutes on a 4 - of - 4 shooting burst . Young finished with 12 points on 5 - of - 8 shooting , in 13 minutes off the bench . David West also provided a boost off the bench , with 10 points on 5 - of - 6 shooting , in 17 minutes . Kevin Durant was the high - point man for the Warriors , with 28 points , nine rebounds , five assists and three blocks , while Klay Thompson followed up with 24 points , three rebounds , three assists and one steal . The Warriors shot 56 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 20 from long range . Meanwhile , Damian Lillard poured in 39 points on 12 - of - 28 shooting , in 41 minutes to lead the Trail_Blazers . C.J . McCollum followed up with 21 points on 8 - of - 14 shooting , while the only other player to score in double digits for Portland was Evan Turner , with 10 points , in 30 minutes . The Trail_Blazers shot 42 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 28 from long range . The Trail_Blazers ( 13 - 13 ) head to Miami to take on the Heat on Wednesday . The Warriors ( 22 - 6 ) play host to the Mavericks on Thursday .
The Golden_State Warriors continued to dominate on Thursday , defeating the Dallas Mavericks , 112 - 97 , at Oracle_Arena . Golden_State ( 23 - 6 ) is without a two time - MVP in Stephen Curry ( ankle ) , but their play has hardly suffered in his absence . On Thursday , the team notched its eighth consecutive win , making things look easy against a struggling Mavericks team . Superstar forward Kevin Durant continued to shine with Curry sidelined , pouring in a team - high 36 points on 15 - of - 23 shooting . Durant , who has evolved his game to become a stellar rim protector , blocked three shots as well . Though the team held only a seven - point lead through three quarters , the Warriors were able to maintain a comfortable lead throughout the fourth to earn the win . All-Star guard Klay Thompson helped the team pull away with the game , knocking down four consecutive three - pointers in the quarter to expand the Warriors ' lead . Thompson was a perfect 5 - of - 5 from beyond the arc on the night . Dallas ( 8 - 21 ) was missing their own Curry brother , as well as a number of other key rotation players . Seth Curry ( leg ) , Dennis Smith , Jr. ( hip ) , and Dorian Finney-Smith ( knee ) were all sidelined for the loss . Even when healthy , though , this Mavericks team has seen its share of struggles . Dallas owns the Western_Conference 's worst record and the third - worst win total in the NBA . On Thursday , the team put up a strong effort through three quarters to limit the Golden_State lead to single digits . However , in the fourth quarter , perimeter defense proved to be a problem for the team , as a barrage of shots from deep sunk Dallas 's chances of winning . Veteran star Dirk Nowitzki led the team with 18 points in the game , and the German big man added nine rebounds . The Mavericks will face off against the San_Antonio Spurs on Saturday , while Golden_State will take on the Los_Angeles Lakers on Monday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 99 - 92 , at Oracle_Arena on Monday . In this epic Finals rematch , it came down to the final seconds to determine a winner . In fact , there were nine ties and seven lead changes in total , as neither team ever led by double - digits . Cleveland 's offense was dreadful , as they shot just 32 percent from the field , while recording 12 assists . Golden_State ended up shooting 46 percent from the field , while handing out 28 assists . Rim protection was also key , as the Cavaliers failed to record a block , while the Warriors swatted away eight shots . Golden_State also won the fastbreak differential , 33 - 9 and outscored Cleveland in the paint , 44 - 20 . The Cavaliers ( 24 - 10 ) were led by Kevin Love , as he tallied 31 points , 18 rebounds and two steals . LeBron James finished with 20 points , six rebounds and six assists . Jae Crowder amassed 15 points and six rebounds . Dwyane Wade was the only other Cleveland player in double figures , as he totaled 13 points , five rebounds and four assists off the bench . The Warriors ( 27 - 7 ) got another all - around gem from Kevin Durant , as he collected 25 points , seven rebounds , three assists , two steals and five blocks . Klay Thompson accrued 24 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Draymond Green accumulated 12 points , 12 rebounds and 11 assists en route to a triple - double . Both teams return to action on Wednesday , with Golden_State hosting the Utah Jazz and Cleveland traveling to play the Sacramento Kings .
The host Golden_State Warriors made quick work of the Utah Jazz at Oracle_Arena on Wednesday , winning 126 - 101 . While the game was back - and - forth for the first half , Golden_State ( 28 - 7 ) came out strong after halftime and almost immediately established an insurmountable lead . Warriors All-Star Klay Thompson was able to spark the run with five quick points in the opening minute of the second half . Golden_State 's lead grew from one point to 21 points over the course of the third quarter . The team closed out strong , scoring 36 points in the fourth . The win saw a more balanced approach than usual for the star - powered Warriors , as six players scored in double digits . Superstar Kevin Durant led the team with 21 points , while Thompson scored another 15 . Draymond Green flirted with a triple - double , finishing the game with 14 points , eight rebounds , and eight assists . Star point guard Steph Curry ( ankle ) remains sidelined with an ankle sprain and was not active for the win . Despite Curry 's absence , the Warriors have won nine of their last ten games and sit atop the Western_Conference standings . The loss was nothing new for the Jazz ( 15 - 21 ) , who are now losers of nine of their past 11 games . Utah was also without its star player , as Rudy Gobert is expected to miss another three weeks with a PCL sprain . Wednesday 's blowout loss continued Utah 's recent skid , but provided a chance for the team 's young stars to showcase their abilities . Rookie Donovan Mitchell finished with 17 points and seven rebounds , despite shooting just 6 - of - 17 . Fourth-year wing Rodney Hood , meanwhile , led the team off the bench with 26 points . Golden_State will host the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , while Utah will see the Cleveland Cavaliers on Saturday .
The visiting Charlotte Hornets stunned the red - hot Golden_State Warriors on Friday , winning 111 - 100 at Oracle_Arena . Charlotte ( 13 - 22 ) had been struggling leading into Friday 's game , as the team was just 3 - 7 in its last ten contests . Friday was a different story , though , as a vintage night from veteran center Dwight Howard helped the team to upset the defending champs . Howard , a 13 - year veteran with eight All-Star selections to his name , set a new career high of seven assists in the win . Howard shot 10 - of - 15 to score a team - high 29 points and also pulled down 12 rebounds . His defensive presence was a huge boost to the team down the stretch , as strong defense helped Charlotte gain its ultimate lead in the fourth quarter . While they entered the fourth with just a four - point lead , the Hornets limited Golden_State to just eight points over the first 6:55 of the quarter , allowing them to open up a 15 - point lead . Kemba Walker had eight points in the final four minutes of the game to help seal a much - needed win for his team . Walker finished with 16 points on the night . Golden_State ( 28 - 8 ) was 9 - 1 in its last ten games before Friday 's unexpected double - digit loss . In typical fashion , superstar forward Kevin Durant led the team with 27 points , while Klay Thompson trailed not far behind with 24 . Despite strong play from its stars , Golden_State had trouble matching Charlotte early in the fourth quarter and ultimately did not have the time to mount a comeback . Thompson was one of the key factors in Golden_State 's slowdown , as he did not score a point in the fourth quarter . The typically small - ball oriented team also had trouble containing Dwight Howard in the post , allowing him to shoot 10 - of - 15 and sending him to the free - throw line 12 times . Golden_State will host Memphis on Saturday night , while Charlotte will travel to LA to face the Clippers on Sunday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the visiting Memphis Grizzlies , 141 - 128 , at Oracle_Arena on Saturday evening . The Warriors jumped out to a quick 10 - 2 lead but the Grizzlies battled back and fought neck and neck through the first quarter , which ended with the Warriors leading 40 - 38 . The Warriors continued to onslaught through the second and third quarters , outscoring the Grizzlies 76 - 60 during that stretch , to take a 116 - 98 lead into the final frame . The Grizzlies tried their best to battle back in the fourth but could not get within single digits . After missing 11 games with an ankle injury , Stephen Curry led the way for the Warriors in his first game back , with 38 points on 13 - of - 17 shooting , including 10 - of - 13 from long range . Klay Thompson followed up with 21 points , while Kevin Durant added 20 points . Zaza Pachulia finished with 17 points , eight rebounds and six assists , in 23 minutes . The Warriors shot 59 percent from the field , including 18 - of - 33 from long range . Meanwhile , Marc Gasol led the Grizzlies with 27 points on 10 - of - 13 shooting , in 28 minutes . Tyreke Evans followed up with 22 points , nine assists , three rebounds and one steal , while JaMychal Green tallied 12 points , eight rebounds and two assists . The Grizzlies shot 52 percent from the field , including 15 - of - 21 from long range . The Grizzlies ( 11 - 25 ) will be right back in action as they take on the Kings in Sacramento on Sunday . The Warriors ( 29 - 8 ) head to Dallas to take on the Mavericks on Wednesday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated visiting Denver Nuggets , 124 - 114 , at Oracle_Arena on Monday evening . Despite missing Kevin Durant , the Warriors got out to a blistering start , with 24 points half way through the first quarter . The Nuggets trailed 37 - 28 at the end of one but would not go away , as they outscored the Warriors by two in the second quarter , to trail 64 - 57 at halftime . The Nuggets came out strong again in the third and managed to tie it up at 69 , however the Warriors stepped it up a notch and rushed to a 12 - point lead before the end of the quarter . The Warriors remained in control the rest of the way and cruised to their fifth straight win . Stephen Curry led the way for Golden_State , with 32 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting , nine assists , four rebounds and two steals , in 34 minutes . Draymond Green had himself a game with 23 points , 10 assists , five rebounds , three blocks and one steal , in 35 minutes . Klay Thompson added a cool 19 points , while David West added 10 points , six rebounds and four assists off the bench . The Warriors shot 56 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 30 from long range . Meanwhile , the Nuggets had four players top 20 points , including Nikola Jokic who tallied 22 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting , 12 rebounds , 11 assists , three steals and one block , in 36 minutes . Jamal Murray finished with 21 points , six assists , two rebounds and a steal , while Trey Lyles added 21 points , five rebounds , three assists and three steals . Gary Harris totaled 22 points on 9 - of - 18 shooting . The Nuggets shot 50 percent from the field , including 8 - of - 19 from long range . The Nuggets ( 21 - 19 ) will look to bounce back , as they play host to the Hawks on Wednesday . The Warriors ( 33 - 8 ) play host to the Clippers on Wednesday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the visiting New_York Knicks , 123 - 112 , at Oracle_Arena on Tuesday evening . The Knicks started out great on the road and amassed a 31 - 21 after leading for the entire first quarter . The Warriors woke in the second quarter and outscored the Knicks , 37 - 29 , to close the gap but still could not take the lead , as they trailed 60 - 58 at halftime . The Warriors continued the attack in the third quarter , where they scored another 37 points , and held the Knicks to 26 in the quarter . The Warriors took a 95 - 86 lead into the fourth quarter and did not look back , en route to their 17th home win of the season . Stephen Curry led the way for the Warriors , with 32 points on 9 - of - 19 shooting , in 33 minutes . Kevin Durant tallied 14 points , 14 assists , four rebounds , two steals and two blocks , while Draymond Green added 12 points , six assists , five rebounds , one assist and one steal . The Warriors shot 55 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 30 from long range .
