The Golden_State Warriors convincingly defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 126 - 113 , on Thursday evening . From the game 's start , it was apparent that Golden_State ( 39 - 10 ) was in control . The Warriors jumped out to a quick 9 - 4 lead , and had the lead up to nine by the end of the first quarter . The team continued its offensive onslaught into the second quarter , and finished the first half with a whopping 74 points . In trademark Golden_State style , the majority of the team 's buckets came off of assists . By the game 's end , the team had 37 assists on 48 baskets . 11 of those dimes came from All-Star forward Kevin Durant , who had his first triple - double of the season in the win . Durant led the Warriors with 28 points , including six made three - pointers . Despite his big night , Durant in no way overshadowed the Warriors All-Star backcourt . Steph Curry and Klay Thompson scored 25 points apiece and combined to hit 12 three - pointers . As a team , the Warriors knocked down an absurd 21 threes . Minnesota ( 31 - 20 ) was missing a key component on Thursday , as All-Star veteran Jimmy Butler sat out his fourth straight game with a knee injury . With Butler out , newly - minted All-Star Karl Anthony-Towns took on an even larger role in facilitating the team 's offense . Towns was the game 's high scorer with 31 points , and he also dished out five assists . Unfortunately for the Wolves , his performance was not enough . Cold three - point shooting played a major role in the loss , as the team hit only six three - pointers on the night . Golden_State will host the Boston Celtics on Saturday , while Minnesota will see the Brooklyn Nets .
The visiting Oklahoma_City Thunder blew out the Golden_State Warriors , 125 - 105 , at Oracle_Arena on Tuesday . It was OKC 's game to lose from the start , as reigning league MVP Russell Westbrook exploded for 21 points and five assists in the first quarter . The Thunder jumped out to a quick double - digit lead thanks to Westbrook 's offense and the team 's pestering defense . OKC finished the game with 13 steals and forced 24 turnovers , the Warriors ' third - highest total of the season . Veteran forward Carmelo Anthony played only six minutes before being forced to exit with a sprained ankle . Still , the Thunder delivered potent offense thanks to a combined 74 points from Westbrook and fellow All-Star Paul George . The duo remained in the game until only three minutes remained , helping to see through their second blowout of the Warriors this season . The Thunder ( 31 - 24 ) snapped a four - game losing streak with Tuesday 's huge win . The team 's recent struggles did n't show , as they excelled in all aspects of the game on Tuesday . OKC combined for 12 three - pointers on 40 percent shooting and shot 49 percent from the field overall . Russell Westbrook had 34 points to go with 10 rebounds and nine assists , while Paul George scored 38 points and recorded six steals . The Warriors ( 41 - 13 ) , meanwhile , are in the midst of their worst stretch this season . The team is 1 - 3 in its last four games and has lost back - to - back games for the first time all year . On Tuesday , turnovers proved costly , but were far from the only issue . Golden_State seemed frustrated by its inability to contain the Thunder 's stars , leading to five technical fouls being assessed to the Warriors throughout the game . Two of those went against forward Draymond Green , who was ejected from the game in the fourth quarter after throwing the ball at a referee . The Warriors also saw little offensive output outside of its two primary stars . While Kevin Durant and Steph Curry combined to score 54 points , no other Golden_State player had more than 12 . Golden_State will host the Dallas Mavericks on Thursday , while the Thunder will travel to LA to visit the Lakers .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the visiting Dallas Mavericks , 121 - 103 , at Oracle_Arena on Thursday evening . The Mavericks got out to a great start on the road , as they led for most of the first quarter , and amassed a 33 - 23 lead heading into the second . They held a solid lead for the first half of the second quarter , until the Warriors mounted a 120 run that evened things up before the teams went to halftime tied at 60 . The Mavs came out strong in the third and kept the game tight until about the four - minute mark , where the Warriors pulled ahead to an eight - point lead heading into the fourth . The Warriors started the fourth quarter with a 70 run , which put them ahead 100 - 85 , with nine minutes left in the game , and did not look back en route to snapping a two - game losing streak . Kevin Durant led the way for Golden_State , with 24 points on 8 - of - 13 shooting , nine rebounds , four assists , two blocks and one steal , in 29 minutes of action . Stephen Curry tallied 20 points , eight assists and seven rebounds , while Draymond Green added 12 points , 10 rebounds , six assists , two steals and two blocks . Klay Thompson finished with 18 points , five rebounds and four assists . The Warriors shot 51 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 29 from long range . Meanwhile , Dennis Smith Jr. was the high - point man for Dallas , with 22 points on 8 - of - 18 shooting , in 30 minutes . Dwight Powell followed up with 18 points , six rebounds , two assists and two steals , while Dirk Nowitzki came up big with 16 points , 11 rebounds , five steals , two blocks and one assist , in 27 minutes . The Mavericks shot 44 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 37 from long range . The Mavericks ( 17 - 38 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Lakers on Saturday . The Warriors ( 42 - 13 ) play host to the Spurs on Saturday .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 122 - 105 , at Oracle_Arena on Saturday . San_Antonio looked poised for a big game when they led 37 - 27 after the first quarter , but Golden_State dominated from there . In fact , the Warriors outscored the Spurs in the middle quarters , 64 - 38 , as they led for the entirety of the second half while maintaining a double - digit lead for the whole of the fourth quarter . Golden_State ended up shooting 57 percent from the field , 44 percent from three - point range and 93 percent from the free - throw line while San_Antonio hit just 46 percent from the field , 19 percent from long range and 74 percent from the charity stripe . A 44 - 34 rebounding advantage was big for the Warriors as well , as they also outassisted the Spurs , 35 - 29 . The Spurs ( 35 - 22 ) were led by LaMarcus Aldridge , as he tallied 20 points , five rebounds , four assists and two blocks . Kyle Anderson matched those 20 points , adding six rebounds , four assists , three steals and two blocks to his tally . Davis Bertans started and totaled 10 points , five rebounds and four assists . Manu Ginobili led the bench with 13 points and six assists . The Warriors ( 43 - 13 ) got a lights - out game from Klay Thompson , as he dropped 25 points on 10 - of - 14 from the field . Draymond Green collected 17 points , eight rebounds and 11 assists . Stephen Curry accrued 17 points , four rebounds , eight assists and two steals . Both teams return to action on Monday , with San_Antonio traveling to play the Utah Jazz and Golden_State playing host to the Phoenix Suns .
The Golden_State Warriors blew out the Phoenix Suns , 129 - 83 , at Oracle_Arena on Monday . Things got off to a promising start for the Suns , who kept the game within a possession through the first quarter . Newly-acquired point guard Elfrid Payton started the game off strong , going a scorching 9 - of - 10 for 20 points in the first half . Payton 's efforts were not enough , though , as the Warriors pulled ahead by double digits to end the second quarter . Golden_State came out even more focused to start the second half , breezing by the Suns and finishing the game shooting 58 percent from the field . Golden_State ( 44 - 13 ) took a team approach in the blowout win , as five players scored in double digits . Two-time MVP Steph Curry flirted with a triple - double , notching nine rebounds and seven assists to go with a team - high 22 points . Forward Omri Casspi , who got the starting nod in place of an injured Draymond Green , recorded 19 points to go with 10 rebounds . The Warriors were ferocious on the defensive end as well , blocking 16 shots in the win . Phoenix ( 18 - 40 ) , on the other hand , had a tough night on both ends of the floor . The team shot just 35 percent from the field and made only three three - pointers . While Payton came close to a career high with 29 points , no other Suns player scored more than 14 . The Suns have now lost four games by a margin of at least 40 points , accounting for more than half of such games this season . The team is now 1 - 10 in its last 11 games and is the first team to lose 40 games this year . On Wednesday , the Suns will visit Utah and the Warriors will travel to Portland .
The Golden_State defeated the Oklahoma_City Thunder , 112 - 80 , at Oracle_Arena on Saturday evening . The Warriors ( 45 - 14 ) came into the marquee showdown looking to avenge a 125 - 105 loss at the hands of the Thunder ( 34 - 27 ) in their most recent meeting , but the first half was a competitive affair befitting the two playoff - bound squads . Golden_State held a relatively modest 52 - 45 halftime lead , but they took it up a notch coming out of the intermission . The home squad outscored the visitors by a whopping 60 - 35 margin in the second half , but their defense may have been just as impressive as their prolific offense . The defending NBA champs shot 47 percent from the floor - - including 45 percent from distance - - while holding Oklahoma_City to a 33 percent success rate . They held a strong rebounding advantage as well , winning the battle of the boards by a 54 - 43 margin . Russell Westbrook paced the Thunder with a 15 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included seven assists and two steals . Steven Adams turned in 14 points , seven boards , three assists , two steals and two blocks . Carmelo Anthony equaled Adams ' scoring total and added five rebounds , one assist and one steal . Raymond Felton registered 11 points and one rebound . Paul George had a nightmarish evening , managing just five points on 1 - for - 14 shooting . He also hauled in five rebounds , dishing out three assists and recording two steals . Josh Huestis accounted for five points of his own and complemented them with four rebounds and two assists . Kevin Durant paced the Warriors with 28 points , a total he supplemented with five rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Stephen Curry followed with 21 points , nine boards , six assists and three steals . Nick Young submitted a bench - leading 16 points and also collected five rebounds , two assists and one steal . Klay Thompson struggled through a 5 - for - 16 shooting performance but mustered 11 points , four rebounds , two assists and one steal . Draymond Green filled out the stat sheet with 10 points , eight assists , five boards , one steal and one block . The Thunder return home to take on the Orlando Magic on Monday evening , while the Warriors make the cross - country trip to the Big Apple to take on the New_York Knicks on Monday night as well .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the visiting Brooklyn Nets , 114 - 101 , at Oracle_Arena on Tuesday evening . The Warriors got out to a great start at home , as they outscored the Nets 35 - 19 in the first quarter . However , the Nets were not ready to call it quits , as they came roaring back in the second quarter , where they outscored the Warriors , 34 - 13 , to take a 53 - 48 lead by halftime . The Nets kept it close for most of the third quarter , before the Warriors closed the quarter on a 9 - 3 run to take a 86 - 80 lead into the final frame . The Warriors did not look back , as they pushed their lead to 14 just three minutes into the fourth and cruised to the finish from there . Stephen Curry led the Warriors with 34 points , six rebounds , four assists , three steals and one block , in 33 minutes of action . Kevin Durant followed up with 19 points , six rebounds , three assists and one block , while Klay Thompson added 18 points , five rebounds , five assists and one steal . The Warriors shot 56 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 23 from long range . Meanwhile , D'Angelo Russell led the Nets with 22 points on 9 - of - 15 shooting , in 34 minutes . DeMarre Carroll followed up with 19 points , seven rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 28 minutes . Spencer Dinwiddie tallied 13 points on 4 - of - 7 shooting , five assists , three rebounds and one steal . The Nets shot 42 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 35 from long range . The Nets ( 20 - 45 ) will look to bounce back as they take on the Hornets in Charlotte on Thursday . The Warriors ( 50 - 14 ) play host to the Spurs on Thursday .
The Golden_State Warriors narrowly defeated the San_Antonio Spurs , 110 - 107 , at Oracle_Arena on Thursday . The win marked Golden_State 's seventh straight . Just two minutes into Thursday 's game , superstar Golden_State point guard Steph Curry suffered a sprained right ankle and was forced to head to the locker room . Though Curry did not return , the Warriors ( 51 - 14 ) were able to earn a late - game comeback win thanks to strong play from their other stars . While the game started as a back - and - forth affair , the Spurs ( 37 - 28 ) took the lead with just over three minutes remaining in the third quarter and held onto it until the final minute of regulation . From there , a wild layup from Golden_State 's Draymond Green gave the team the lead , and the Warriors were able to squeak out the win in the final few possessions . Kevin Durant exploded for 37 points in Curry 's absence , shooting 14 - of - 26 from the field and pulling down 11 rebounds . Green had a triple - double , finishing with 11 points , 12 rebounds , and 10 assists . The team as a whole rebounded well on the night , coming away with 12 offensive boards in total . For the Spurs , meanwhile , All-Star big man LaMarcus Aldridge scored a team - high 30 points to go with 17 rebounds . Five of Aldridge 's boards came on the offensive end , and he shot a highly efficient 11 - of - 20 from the field . Despite Aldridge 's best efforts , though , the team could not eke out a win . Three-point shooting proved to be the team 's biggest concern , as they went just 6 - of - 22 from beyond the arc in the loss . The Warriors will travel to Portland on Friday to take on the red - hot Trail_Blazers . The Spurs , meanwhile , will see Oklahoma_City on Saturday evening .
The host Golden_State Warriors took down the Los_Angeles Lakers , 117 - 106 , at Oracle_Arena on Wednesday evening . Injuries were in no short order on either side on Wednesday , as Golden_State ( 52 - 16 ) was without Stephen Curry , Klay Thompson , Draymond Green , or Patrick McCaw in the win . The Lakers ( 31 - 37 ) , meanwhile , were missing star forwards Brandon Ingram and Kyle Kuzma , who were sidelined with injuries of their own . Despite the massive injury report , Golden_State was extremely potent on the offensive end , seeing seven players score in double digits . The Warriors sliced through the Lakers defense for 25 team assists and finished the game shooting 55 percent from the field . Kevin Durant was Golden_State 's top scorer with 26 points on 10 - of - 19 shooting . Veteran Nick Young stepped into the starting lineup to replace the injured Klay Thompson and scored 18 points while knocking down three three - pointers . Young accounted for half of the Warriors ' total makes from beyond the arc . For Los_Angeles , forward Julius Randle scored a team - high 22 points to go with 10 rebounds . The game was the third straight in which Randle led the team in scoring . However , it was not all smooth sailing for the promising young big man . He had to be separated from sixth man Isaiah Thomas after a testy exchange late in the game . The incident comes just one day after Randle was assessed a technical foul for shoving Denver center Nikola Jokic . Thomas added another 20 points for LA and dished out seven assists . Center Brook Lopez also scored 20 to go with six rebounds . On Friday , Golden_State will host the Sacramento Kings while Los_Angeles will see the Miami Heat .
The Sacramento Kings took down the Golden_State Warriors , 98 - 93 , at Oracle_Arena on Friday night . In what has been a surprising turn of events for Sacramento ( 23 - 47 ) , the team now has a winning record over its last nine games . Despite ranking near the bottom of the league for most of the season , things seem to be clicking for the Kings , whose young players helped them earn a victory over Golden_State ( 52 - 17 ) on Friday . The Warriors were missing a substantial part of their roster , including All-Stars Steph Curry ( ankle ) , Klay Thompson ( thumb ) , and Kevin Durant ( rest ) . That did not mean , though , that the defending champions did not put up a fight . After a back - and - forth game , Draymond Green knocked down a three - pointer with 50 seconds remaining to tie the score at 93 . From there , though , Sacramento 's Buddy Hield was able to draw a foul with 27 seconds remaining and another with 15 seconds on the clock . Hield knocked down three of his four free - throws to help seal the game for the Kings . His clutch makes at the free - throw line capped off a 22 - point night for Hield , which led his team . The Kings desperately needed Hield 's production off the bench , as no Sacramento starter scored more than 11 points in the win . Hield 's fellow sophomore Skal Labissiere pitched in an additional 15 points off the bench , including three three - pointers . For the Warriors , guard Quinn Cook was the top scorer with 25 points . 18 of those points came in the first half after Cook turned in an electrifying performance in the absence of Golden_State 's stars . All-Star forward Draymond Green also came up big for the Warriors , notching 14 points , 10 rebounds , seven assists , four steals , and two blocks in the tight loss . Both teams face the second half of a back - to - back on Saturday . The Kings will be traveling to Utah , while the Warriors will be visiting Phoenix .
The Golden_State Warriors took down the Atlanta Hawks , 103 - 94 , at Oracle_Arena on Friday night . The win came with a heavy price tag for Golden_State ( 54 - 18 ) , as superstar point guard Steph Curry exited the game early with an apparent MCL injury . The two - time MVP limped to the locker room after colliding with center JaVale McGee . Friday was Curry 's first game back after missing the last two weeks with an ankle sprain . He will undergo an MRI on Saturday to determine the severity of the injury . Despite Curry 's absence in the second half , the Warriors managed to overtake the Hawks ( 21 - 52 ) , who had led for the majority of the game . Golden_State was also missing All-Stars Klay Thompson ( hand ) , Kevin Durant ( rib ) , and Draymond Green ( pelvic contusion ) . Still , the Warriors enjoyed a potent offensive night . The team knocked down 12 three - pointers and dished out 27 total assists . Curry was still the team 's leader with 29 points . Veteran guard Nick Young , meanwhile , scored 24 points while shooting 6 - of - 11 from three - point range . Atlanta , on the other hand , shot just 44 percent from the field . Sophomore forward Taurean Prince led the team with 20 points , but shot only 6 - of - 18 on the night . Dennis Schroder , meanwhile , scored 16 points to go with seven assists . Schroder returned to the lineup on Friday after missing Thursday night 's game for rest . The Hawks will visit Houston on Sunday , while Golden_State will host the Utah Jazz .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 120 - 115 , at Capital_One_Arena on Wednesday night in the season opener for both teams . A wild back - and - forth battle between division rivals came down to the wire , with two clutch free throws by Bradley Beal with two seconds remaining finally sealing the victory for the Wizards ( 10 ) . A wild fourth quarter saw the Sixers ( 0 - 1 ) come back from an eight - point deficit to start the period and take a 98 - 96 lead with 9:9 remaining . Philadelphia would claim the advantage one more time on a Markelle Fultz 11 - foot driving floating jump shot at the 7:19 mark , but Washington would regain the lead with 6:42 left and not relinquish it the rest of the way . The Sixers impressed with their shooting throughout the night , posting a 46 percent success rate from the field , including 43 percent from three - point range . The solid accuracy helped lead to each member of the starting five notching double - digit scoring . However , Philadelphia 's 17 turnovers did them no favors , especially considering the home squad took much better care of the ball while committing only 10 miscues . Robert Covington paced the visitors with 29 points , seven rebounds , one assist , two blocks and one steal . He was red - hot from beyond the arc , going 7 - for - 11 from long distance . Joel Embiid followed with an 18 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that he complemented with three assists and one block over 27 minutes . Ben Simmons , making his long - awaited NBA regular - season debut , posted an 18 - point , 10 - rebound double - double of his own that also included five assists , two steals and a block . Jerryd Bayless poured in 13 points and added three rebounds , three assists and one steal . J.J. Redick was serviceable in his Sixers debut , providing 12 points ( on four three - pointers ) , four assists , two rebounds and one steal . Fultz , who came off the bench despite his status as the No . 1 overall pick this season , led the second unit with 10 points , three rebounds and one assist over 18 minutes . The Wizards were unsurprisingly paced by the backcourt duo of John Wall and Bradley Beal , as has often been the case for most of the last two campaigns . Wall led the way with 28 points , eight assists , five rebounds and two blocks , while Beal managed 25 points , six rebounds , four assists , three steals and one block . Marcin Gortat tallied a 16 - point , 17 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and three blocks . Otto Porter , Jr. contributed 10 points , eight boards , three steals and a block . Kelly Oubre , Jr. and Jodie Meeks co - led the bench with a pair of 14 - point efforts , with the former adding eight rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks and the latter also bringing in a rebound . The Sixers continue on their trip through the Northeast and next face the Boston Celtics in a Friday night tilt , while the Wizards remain home and face off with the Detroit Pistons on that same evening .
The Washington Wizards defeated the visiting Detroit Pistons , 115 - 111 , at Verizon Center on Friday . The Wizards ( 20 ) showed some resiliency in this game , and their never - say - die attitude paid off in the second half where they mustered an impressive comeback . Detroit ( 1 - 1 ) had a 65 - 58 lead at the break and looked in the verge of pulling a massive upset , but Washington turned things around with an impressive performance in the third quarter , in which they outscored their opponents 33 - 16 . Detroit won three of four quarters , but Washington 's scoring output in the third period was enough to give them the win . John Wall led Washington 's offense with 26 points ( on 8 - of - 12 shooting from the field ) and 10 assists , although he was n't the highest scorer on the team . That honor belonged to Otto Porter , as the small forward finished with 28 points , seven rebounds , and four steals . Bradley Beal added 25 points of his own . The Wizards ' starting lineup did most of the heavy lifting in this one , as they scored 93 of the team 's 115 points . Six Pistons players scored on double - digits , but that was n't enough to come away with the win . Reggie Jackson led the team with 21 points , six assists and four rebounds , while Avery Bradley added 18 points and Tobias Harris contributed with 15 of his own . Rookie Luke Kennard looked solid on his NBA debut , and finished with 11 points ( on 5 - of - 8 from the field ) , three assists , and two steals .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the Washington Wizards , 122 - 116 , at Verizon Center on Wednesday . Washington was expected to win this game easily , but they blew a huge lead in epic fashion . In fact , the Wizards held a 17 - point lead after the first quarter , but allowed the Suns to outscore them , 70 - 52 , in the second half . Scoring down low was the difference for Phoenix , as they outscored Washington , 58 - 46 , in the paint . The Suns ended up shooting 49 percent from the field , while holding the Wizards to just 43 percent shooting . The Suns ( 4 - 4 ) got a career performance out of T.J. Warren , as he dropped a career - high 40 points on 16 - of - 22 shooting . He also added 10 rebounds and two blocks . Devin Booker accrued 22 points and five assists . Mike James went just 1 - of - 10 from the field , but still finished with 10 points , four rebounds and six assists . The Wizards ( 4 - 3 ) were led by Bradley Beal , who scored a season - high 40 points to go along with six rebounds and two assists . John Wall collected 21 points , five rebounds , six assists and three steals . Marcin Gortat amassed nine points , 13 rebounds and two assists . Both teams return to action on Friday , with Washington hosting the Cleveland Cavaliers and Phoenix traveling to face the New_York Knicks .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the host Washington Wizards , 113 - 99 , at Verizon Center on Tuesday . Wire-to-wire wins are rare in the NBA and it 's even more rare when you pull out that feat on the road . That 's just what Dallas did here , as they held a double - digit lead for a large portion of the second half . Rebounding was the difference in the game , with the Mavericks winning that battle , 53 - 39 . They also held Washington to just 43 percent from the field , while shooting 47 percent on their end . The Mavericks ( 2 - 10 ) were led by Harrison Barnes , who totaled 31 points and nine rebounds on 11 - of - 18 shooting . Dennis Smith Jr. flirted with a triple - double , collecting 22 points , eight rebounds and eight assists . Wesley Matthews accumulated 14 points , eight rebounds and six assists . Salah Mejri recorded a 10 - point , 12 - rebound double - double to lead the bench , as he also added five blocks to his tally . The Wizards ( 5 - 5 ) got 23 points , three rebounds and 14 assists out of John Wall . Bradley Beal provided 23 points , four rebounds and two assists . Otto Porter amassed 13 points and five rebounds . No bench player reached double figures in scoring . Washington 's next game will be at home against the Los_Angeles Lakers on Thursday . Dallas will be off until Saturday , when they host the Cleveland Cavaliers for their next fixture .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 113 - 94 , at Capital_One_Arena on Saturday night . One might not have completely faulted the Wizards ( 7 - 5 ) if they were a bit overconfident coming into the contest , considering the ineptitude the Hawks ( 2 - 10 ) had largely demonstrated this season . However , Atlanta made sure that they made their presence felt in a competitive first quarter . Washington began to establish themselves in the second , leading to a 49 - 42 halftime edge . After a back - and - forth third period , the home squad was able to finally gain double - digit distance to open the fourth , starting the quarter on a 120 run . The visitors outscored them by a 27 - 25 margin the rest of the way , but the Wizards led by as much as 25 and never than by fewer than 20 from the seven - minute mark until the end of the game . The contest did feature plenty of miscues on the part of both teams , with the Atlanta committing 24 turnovers and Washington guilty of 23 . Taurean Prince led the way for the Hawks with 19 points , a total he complemented with three rebounds , three assists , three steals and one block . Marco Belinelli followed with a bench - leading 15 points , which he supplemented with two boards , one assist and one steal . Kent Bazemore and Dewayne Dedmon followed with matching 13 - point tallies , with the former adding two assists and three steals and the latter supplying eight boards and one steal . Malcolm Delaney was productive off the bench as well with 11 points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals . Dennis Schroder had a forgettable shooting night ( 2 - for - 16 ) that led to just seven points , but he added seven rebounds and five assists . Bradley Beal paced the Wizards with 19 points , four rebounds , four assists and three steals . Markieff Morris and Kelly Oubre , Jr. posted matching 18 - point tallies , with the former also registering four rebounds , two blocks and one steal and the latter turning in seven boards , one assist and one steal . John Wall , who came into the game battling an illness , was only needed for 24 minutes , a span in which he tallied 13 points , five rebounds , five assists , two blocks and one steal . Marcin Gortat and Otto Porter , Jr. combined for just nine points in a total of 51 minutes on the court . The Hawks continue on the road and next head to the Big Easy , where they 'll take on the New_Orleans Pelicans on Monday night . The Wizards remain home and face the Sacramento Kings on that same evening .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Sacramento Kings , 110 - 92 , at Capital_One_Arena on Monday night . The Kings ( 3 - 10 ) jumped out to a fast start in the first quarter , forging a 32 - 25 advantage through the first 12 minutes . However , that 's when the light went on for the Wizards ( 8 - 5 ) , who outscored the visitors by a 61 - 39 margin through the second and third periods . The distance they created allowed them to cruise to a comfortable win , one that saw them win the rebounding battle by a sizable 50 - 34 spread . Sacramento did enjoy some success from long distance - - as evidenced by a 52 shooting percentage from three - point range - - but no Kings player tallied more than 16 points . Meanwhile , Washington saw six players hit double digits in the scoring column , and they managed a 52 percent success rate overall on their 85 attempts . George Hill led the way for the Kings with 16 points , a total he supplemented with four rebounds , two assists and one steal . Zach Randolph managed 12 points , nine rebounds , one assist and one steal . Buddy Hield matched Randolph 's point total and added three rebounds , three assists and two steals . Garrett Temple followed with 11 points , two assists and two steals . Skal Labissiere also poured in 11 points and supplemented them with two rebounds , two steals and one block . De'Andre Fox registered 10 points , five assists and three boards . Willie Cauley-Stein contributed six points , six rebounds , two assists and two blocks . John Wall paced the Wizards ' attack with 21 points , nine assists , two rebounds and one steal . Marcin Gortat had one of his more productive performances as of late , providing 18 points , seven rebounds , one assist and one block . Otto Porter , Jr. turned in 15 points , seven rebounds , two assists and one steal . Michael Scott also produced a 15 - point tally off the bench , a total he complemented with five rebounds . Bradley Beal poured in 14 points and also had seven rebounds , seven assists and one steal . Kelly Oubre , Jr. was impressive on the second unit , filling out the stat sheet with 12 points , eight rebounds , three assists and two steals . The Kings continue their East Coast swing with a visit to the Atlanta Hawks on Wednesday night , while the Wizards head down to South Florida for a date with the Miami Heat on that evening as well .
The Miami Heat defeated the host Washington Wizards , 91 - 88 , at Verizon Center on Friday . This was a defensive struggle throughout , as neither team surpassed 41 percent shooting . Defense is what carried Miami to victory , as they held Washington to just 38 percent from the field . They also dominated the paint , winning the rebounding differential , 52 - 46 , and the points in the paint battle , 46 - 28 . The Heat also took advantage of poor transition defense , winning the fastbreak differential , 21 - 7 . Washington did fight back hard though , as they overcame a 25 - point third quarter deficit to get the game within one possession in the final minute . The Heat ( 7 - 8 ) got another double - double out of Hassan Whiteside , as he totaled 22 points , 16 rebounds and two blocks on 10 - of - 12 shooting . Dion Waiters finished with 13 points , four rebounds and three assists , Goran Dragic and Josh Richardson combined for just nine points on 4 - of - 21 from the field . James Johnson was huge off the bench , providing 20 points , five rebounds and four assists . The Wizards ( 9 - 6 ) were led by Bradley Beal , as he accrued 26 points , 10 rebounds and four assists . Marcin Gortat recorded an 11 - point , 13 - rebound double - double . John Wall collected just eight points , three rebounds and eight assists on 3 - of - 12 shooting . Both teams return to action on Sunday , with Washington traveling to play the Toronto Raptors and Miami playing host to the Indiana Pacers .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the hosting Washington Wizards , 108 - 105 , at Capital_One_Arena on Saturday evening . This was quite a tough loss for the Wizards ( 10 - 9 ) , as they had a healthy lead entering the fourth quarter but could not hold on to their advantage during the final minutes . Washington had a 52 - 41 lead at halftime and 83 - 73 after three quarters , but the The Trail_Blazers ( 12 - 8 ) stormed back in the fourth . Portland was down by 17 points with almost nine minutes left , but the Blazers never gave up and ended securing a huge 108 - 105 win that represented their sixth win in their last eight games . Meanwhile , Washington now has lost four of their last five . Damian Lillard led the way for the Trail_Blazers with another strong performance . The All-Star point guard finished with 29 points , six rebounds and six assists , and he made a couple of key buckets that propelled Portland 's comeback in the final 12 minutes . C.J . McCollum added 26 points , and Jusuf Nurkic contributed with 17 points , six rebounds , and four assists . The Wizards did n't have John Wall due to injury , so other players had to pick up the slack offensively . Bradley Beal led the way for the Wizards with 26 points , although he only made 10 of his 24 field - goal attempts . Otto Porter added 24 points with 10 rebounds , and Kelly Oubre Jr. added 13 points with six boards coming off the bench . Tim Frazier finished with 11 points and two assists as Wall 's replacement in the starting lineup .
The Washington Wizards defeated the visiting Detroit Pistons , 109 - 91 , at Capital_One_Arena on Friday evening . A tight first quarter resulted in the score tied at 26 going into the second quarter . The Pistons ( 14 - 7 ) used a 21 - 8 run to pull ahead in the second quarter , and take a 52 - 46 lead at halftime . However , the tides turned in the second half , where the Wizards ( 12 - 10 ) started the third quarter with a 170 run . They outscored the Pistons 35 - 15 in the quarter to take an 81 - 67 lead heading into the fourth quarter , where they cruised to the win . Markieff Morris led the way for Washington , with 23 points on 10 - of - 16 shooting , in 28 minutes . Otto Porter Jr. followed up with 17 points , six assists , three rebounds , two blocks and two steals , in 33 minutes . Tomas Satoransky tallied 17 points on 5 - of - 6 shooting , in 23 minutes off the bench . The Wizards shot 48 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 21 from long range . They dished 28 assists , nabbed 13 steals and out - rebounded the Pistons en route to the win . Meanwhile , Andre Drummond tallied 14 points , 16 rebounds , seven assists , four blocks and one steal , in 37 minutes of action . Tobias Harris was the high - point man for Detroit , with 15 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting , in 27 minutes . Avery Bradley chipped in 13 points , while Luke Kennard added 10 points off the bench . The Pistons shot 44 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 31 from long range . The Pistons will be right back in action on Saturday , when they take on the 76ers in Philadelphia . The Wizards head to Utah to take on the Jazz on Monday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the visiting Los_Angeles Clippers , 100 - 91 , at Capital_One_Arena on Friday evening . The Wizards started out with a bang , taking a 25 - 18 lead after one quarter . They continued to dominate and pushed their lead to 15 midway through the second , however the Clippers clawed back to make it a five - point game by halftime . In the third quarter the Wizards expanded their lead and took a 75 - 64 advantage into the final frame , but the Clippers battled back once again and had it tied up at 82 with five minutes left in the game . In the end , the Wizards ' go - to guys responded , as Bradley Beal , John Wall and Marcin Gortat came up big down the stretch . Mike Scott led the way for the Wizards with a season - high 22 points on 9 - of - 10 shooting , in 23 minutes of action . Bradley Beal followed up with 20 points , 11 rebounds , four assists , two steals and one block , in 36 minutes , while John Wall finished with 15 points , six rebounds , five assists , two steals and two blocks , in 29 minutes . The Wizards shot 44 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 22 from long range . Meanwhile , Lou Williams led the way for Los_Angeles , with 23 points on 5 - of - 14 shooting , in 32 minutes . Jawun Evans tallied 15 points , six rebounds , six assists and five steals , in 40 minutes off the bench , while DeAndre Jordan finished with 12 points and 16 rebounds , in 33 minutes . The Clippers shot 38 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 24 from long range . The Clippers ( 11 - 16 ) will be right back in action as they take on the Heat in Miami on Saturday . The Wizards ( 16 - 13 ) play host to the Cavaliers on Sunday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the host Washington Wizards , 106 - 99 , at Capital_One_Arena on Sunday evening . It was a hard fought game with multiple ties and lead changes . The Cavaliers held the slight edge for most of the first half however the Wizards had the game tied up at 60 heading into the half . Washington carried the momentum into the third and held a small lead for most of the quarter before it was tied up again , this time at 103 , heading into the fourth . The Cavs dominated the final quarter , outscoring the Wizards 23 - 16 behind some solid shooting by Kevin Love and LeBron James . James finished with 20 points , 15 assists , 12 rebounds and one block , notching his fourth triple - double in the last five games . Kevin Love was the high - point man for the Cavs with 25 points on 9 - of - 20 shooting , in 31 minutes . Jeff Green added 15 points , five rebounds , two assists and two blocks , in 29 minutes off the bench , while Kyle Korver chipped in 11 points on 4 - of - 6 shooting . The Cavs shot 48 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 34 from long range . Meanwhile , Bradley Beal led the Wizards with 27 points , five rebounds , five assists and one block , in 43 minutes of action . John Wall tallied 15 points , 10 rebounds , six assists , two blocks and one steal , while Mike Scott finished with 19 points on 8 - of - 14 shooting , in 32 minutes off the bench . The Wizards shot 43 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 33 from long range . The Wizards ( 16 - 14 ) look ahead to Tuesday when they play host to the Pelicans . The Cavaliers ( 23 - 8 ) head to Milwaukee to take on the Bucks on Tuesday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the visiting Orlando Magic , 130 - 103 , at Capital_One_Arena on Saturday evening . The Wizards ( 18 - 15 ) had one of their best offensive performances of the season , and in fact the 130 - point performance was a season - high for them against a struggling Magic ( 11 - 23 ) team that failed to get things going on both ends of the court . Washington quickly grabbed the lead , as they built an eight - point advantage during the first quarter that extended to a 24 - point advantage at the break . Orlando tried to fight back in the second half , but it was too late and the Wizards cruised their way to an easy win at home . John Wall was the star of the game for the Wizards , as the point guard delivered a strong effort of 10 points and 13 assists . He was one of seven Washington players that scored in double digits , and surprisingly the one who led the offense was Mike Scott with 18 points on 7 - of - 8 from the field . Bradley Beal and Otto Porter Jr. had 17 points each , while Markieff Morris and Kelly Oubre Jr. had 16 apiece . The Magic did n't have Aaron Gordon once again , so Elfrid Payton carried with the offense thanks to his 28 - point , 10 - assist outing . Mario Hezonja had 16 points , while Wesley Iwundu and Jonathon Simmons contributed with 14 points each . The bench struggled once again , however , as the second unit went 13 - of - 34 from the field for 30 points .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Houston Rockets , 121 - 103 , at Capital_One_Arena on Friday evening . The Wizards ( 20 - 16 ) delivered one of their best performances of the season in this game , as they cruised their way from start to finish and had little to no problems to overcome one of the best teams in the Western_Conference . The Rockets ( 25 - 9 ) looked tired and out of ideas , and they also extended their losing streak to a season - high mark of five games with another defeat . Washington built an 11 - point lead at halftime , and they never looked back . Houston tried to turn things around in the third quarter and reduced the advantage to single digits , but the Wizards closed it out in the fourth to secure an impressive victory . Otto Porter Jr. was the best player for the Wizards in this one , as he finished with a stat line of 26 points , six rebounds , and six assists . Bradley Beal added 21 points , and John Wall made an impact on both ends of the court since he finished with 17 points , five steals , four assists , and two rebounds . The bench came through as well , as they went 19 - of - 35 from the floor for 47 points . Kelly Oubre Jr. stood out with 21 points across 26 minutes . The Rockets had Chris Paul back in the starting lineup , but the veteran point guard only finished with eight points and six assists while shooting 3 - of - 11 from the field . James Harden was the team 's top scorer as he contributed with 20 points , but got little help from a starting lineup that only accounted for 26 points without him . Most of the production came off the bench thanks to guys such as Gerald Green ( 18 points ) , Eric Gordon ( 16 points ) , and Tarik Black ( 10 points , 12 rebounds ) .
The Washington Wizards defeated the visiting Chicago Bulls , 114 - 110 , at Capital_One_Arena on Sunday afternoon . The Wizards ( 21 - 16 ) and the Bulls ( 13 - 23 ) engaged in quite a battle that did n't have a clear winner until the final buzzer . Both teams went back and forth during the entire 48 - minute period , but in the end the Wizards managed to escape with the win after an impressive performance during the fourth quarter . The Bulls grabbed an eight - point lead after the first quarter , and managed to remain on top by six until the end of the third quarter but Washington would storm back in the final 12 minutes . After winning the final quarter by a 31 - 21 score , the Wizards came from behind to secure a massive win in their final game of 2017 . Bradley Beal was the best player for Washington in this game , as the talented scorer came close to register a triple - double thanks to 39 points , nine rebounds , and nine assists . John Wall did his part as well since he contributed with 21 points and nine assists , while Mike Scott delivered a strong effort off the bench with 17 points and four boards . Otto Porter Jr. struggled , however , and he only scored nine points on 4 - of - 11 from the field . Kris Dunn led the way for the Bulls , as the point guard left his knee problems behind and delivered a huge 19 - point , 10 - assist performance while grabbing seven rebounds as well . Nikola Mirotic was the team 's highest scorer , however , as he contributed with 21 points , five rebounds , and five assists off the bench . Lauri Markkanen added 11 points and nine boards , and Robin Lopez contributed with 16 points .
The Washington Wizards defeated the New_York Knicks , 121 - 103 , at Verizon Center on Wednesday evening . The Wizards ( 22 - 16 ) and the Knicks ( 18 - 20 ) played a very even game in the first half , but ultimately the second half saw the hosts grab the lead and secure a huge win in front of their own crowd to extend their current winning run up to three games . Washington had a 64 - 63 lead at the break and it seemed as if the second half was going to be equally close , but the Wizards had other plans . A 26 - 14 advantage over the fourth quarter pulled them away for good , and they increased their advantage in the fourth on route to a comfortable 18 - point win . Bradley Beal was the best player for the Wizards , as he finished with 27 points , six assists , and four rebounds . John Wall added 25 points and nine assists , while Marcin Gortat had a vintage performance , scoring 21 points and adding eight rebounds . Markieff Morris contributed with a double - double of 11 points and 11 boards . Tomas Satoransky added 10 points off the bench . For the second straight night , Michael Beasley was the top scorer for the Knicks since he finished with 20 points , nine rebounds , and three assists . Kristaps Porzingis scored 16 points with six boards and two blocks . Kyle O'Quinn added 13 points and 10 rebounds off the bench . Enes Kanter chipped in with 12 points .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Orlando Magic , 125 - 119 , at Verizon Center on Friday evening . The Wizards ( 24 - 18 ) and the Magic ( 12 - 31 ) were both carrying losing streaks into this game , and the game was surprisingly closer than what anyone would have expected . It was so tight , that both teams entered the fourth quarted tied at 98 , and there was no clear sign of which team was going to step up and rise to the challenge to get the win . But Washington 's greater experience flourished in the fourth quarter , and a 27 - 21 run during the final 12 minutes was enough to give them win , putting their two - game losing streak in the rear view . Meanwhile , the Magic remain on a free fall , and have dropped their last seven . John Wall was one of the best players for the Wizards in this game , as the All-Star point guard finished with 30 points , nine assists , three rebounds , and three blocks . Bradley Beal also collaborated with 30 points , seven assists , and three boards . Marcin Gortat produced a double - double of 12 points and 11 rebounds , while Ian Mahinmi had a surprisingly productive outing after finishing with 17 points , eight rebounds , and three blocks . The entire Orlando lineup scored in double digits , headlined by Elfrid Payton who led the way with 27 points , eight assists , and five rebounds . Jonathon Simmons chipped in with 23 points and five assists , while Aaron Gordon had 14 points , 10 rebounds , and seven assists . Bismack Biyombo filled the stat sheet nicely , as he ended the game with 21 points , 13 rebounds , four assists , and two blocks .
The Washington Wizards defeated the visiting Brooklyn Nets , 119 - 113 , in overtime at Capital One Area on Saturday evening . The Wizards got out to a great start on their home court , with a 25 - 8 lead , before closing the first quarter ahead 33 - 18 . They continued to control the game through the second quarter , and expanded their lead to 59 - 39 by halftime . The Nets countered in the third quarter , where they cut the lead in half halfway through the quarter and found themselves down by nine heading into the fourth . The Nets carried the momentum into the fourth and chipped away at the deficit until they tied it up at 107 on a clutch three - pointer that would send it to overtime . The Wizards got right to business in OT and scored twice as many points than the Nets to take back the win . John Wall led the Wizards with 23 points , 16 assists , three rebounds and two steals , in 39 minutes . Bradley Beal tallied 24 points , six assists , four rebounds and three steals , in 42 minutes . Marcin Gortat finished with 16 points and 13 rebounds , while Kelly Oubre Jr. chipped in 17 points off the bench . The Wizards shot 50 percent from the field , including 10 - of - 23 from long range . Meanwhile , Rondae Hollis-Jefferson led the Nets with 22 points , seven assists and four rebounds , in 38 minutes . Jarrett Allen followed up with 16 points and eight rebounds , in 28 minutes off the bench . DeMarre Carroll added 13 points , 10 rebounds , three assists and two steals , in 32 minutes . The Nets shot 42 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 43 from long range . The Nets ( 16 - 27 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Knicks on Monday . The Wizards ( 25 - 18 ) play host to the Bucks on Monday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Toronto Raptors , 122 - 119 , at Capital_One_Arena on Thursday evening . The Wizards ( 29 - 22 ) had found life without John Wall to be surprisingly tolerable thus far in the wake of his multi - week knee injury , as they came into Thursday 's game having won both of the contests that the All-Star point guard had missed thus far . However , given their matchup against the team with the second - best record in the Eastern_Conference in the Raptors ( 34 - 16 ) , an extension of that streak rightfully seemed like a dubious proposition . Accordingly , Toronto got off to a fast start and eventually built a 62 - 55 halftime lead . Washington regrouped at intermission , outscoring their visitors by a 67 - 57 margin in the second half , although the outcome was n't decided until the closing seconds . After Kyle Lowry twice got the Raptors within two via a pair of driving layups , Bradley Beal responded on each occasion with two successful free throws . DeMar DeRozan then saw his pass swiped by Otto Porter , Jr. on Toronto 's final possession , a miscue that sealed the win for the hosts . Lowry paced the Raptors with 29 points , five rebounds , five assists , three steals and one block . DeRozan followed with 23 points , six assists , five rebounds , two steals and one block . Jonas Valanciunas continued a recent string of solid offensive efforts with 17 points , six boards and three assists . Serge Ibaka poured in 16 points on crisp 7 - for - 11 shooting and added three rebounds along with one assist . OG Anunoby wrapped up a productive night for the starters with 11 points and three boards . Jako Poeltl and Norman Powell co - led the bench with matching eight - point tallies . Beal paced the Wizards with 27 points , a total he supplemented with six rebounds , six assists , three steals and one block . Porter generated a 16 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included six assists and one steal . Markieff Morris filled out the stat sheet with 15 points , seven rebounds , two assists and one steal . Marcin Gortat and Tomas Satoransky supplied 10 points apiece , with the former also hauling in seven boards and dishing out three assists , and the latter registering four assists , three rebounds and two steals . Mike Scott led the bench with 14 points and also posted four rebounds , two assists and one steal . Ian Mahinmi and Jodie Meeks were productive off the second unit as well with 10 - point efforts . The Raptors return home to tangle with the Portland Trail_Blazers on Friday night , while the Wizards travel down to Central Florida to face off with the Orlando Magic on Saturday evening .
The Boston Celtics defeated the host Washington Wizards , 110 - 104 , at Capital_One_Arena on Thursday . This was an extremely competitive matchup , as it took an extra session to decide a winner . In fact , there were 14 ties and 24 lead changes in total , as neither team ever led by more than 10 points . Boston really took control in overtime , outscoring Washington , 12 - 6 , holding the Wizards to just 2 - of - 11 from the field . That defense was big all night long , as Boston forced 20 turnovers from Washington while holding them to 40 percent from the field . A 39 - 26 bench advantage was also a huge factor for the Celtics . The Celtics ( 32 - 34 ) were led by Kyrie Irving , as he tallied 28 points , five rebounds and six assists . Jaylen Brown finished with 18 points , four rebounds and three assists . Al Horford accumulated 12 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Marcus Morris led the bench with 15 points and eight boards . The Wizards ( 31 - 24 ) got a double - double out of Otto Porter , as he led the team with 27 points , 11 rebounds , two assists and two steals . Bradley Beal went just 7 - of - 27 from the field , but still provided 18 points , five rebounds , nine assists and two steals . Tomas Satoranky accrued 14 points , four rebounds , four assists and two blocks . Marcin Gortat amassed 10 points , 10 rebounds and four assists . Boston will have to play again on Friday , as they play host to the Indiana Pacers . As for Washington , they travel to face the Chicago Bulls on Saturday for their next fixture .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the host Washington Wizards , 122 - 105 , at Verizon Center on Friday . This was a dominating performance from the Hornets . as the Wizards only lead came in the first five minutes . In fact , Washington never got the game within six points after the first quarter in addition to holding a double - digit lead for the final 20 minutes of action . Offensive rebounding was a huge factor for Charlotte , with the Hornets winning that battle , 13 - 6 . Rim protection was also key , with Charlotte recording five blocks and Washington failing to record a block . Turnovers were also a decisive statistic , with the Wizards committing 14 turnovers and the Hornets committing just eight . The Hornets ( 26 - 33 ) were led by Kemba Walker , as he tallied 24 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Nicolas Batum accrued eight points , six rebounds , eight assists and two steals . Frank Kaminsky was huge off the bench , providing 23 points , three rebounds and three assists . Jeremy Lamb also played well off the bench , totaling 13 points , five rebounds and five assists . The Wizards ( 34 - 25 ) got a gem out of Bradley Beal , as he accumulated 33 points , six rebounds , six assists and two steals . Otto Porter amassed 16 points , six rebounds and four assists . Markieff Morris finished with 13 points , six rebounds and eight assists . Both teams return to action on Sunday , with Charlotte hosting the Detroit Pistons and Washington playing host to the Philadelphia 76ers .
The Washington Wizards took down the red - hot Philadelphia 76ers , 109 - 94 , at Capital_One_Arena on Sunday evening . A fantastic second quarter helped Washington ( 35 - 25 ) jump ahead by as many as 21 points , a lead that Philadelphia ( 32 - 26 ) was unable to overcome in the second half . The Wizards thrived thanks to strong ball movement and top - down play . The team racked up 35 assists on the night and was highly efficient , shooting 12 - of - 25 from three - point range and 54 percent from the field overall . Washington contained Philadelphia 's shooters well , limiting them to 36 percent from the floor in what proved to be a brutal night for the Philly offense . Bradley Beal and Otto Porter led the Wizards with 24 and 23 points , respectively . The duo combined to shoot 19 - of - 30 from the floor , and Beal added an impressive eight assists . Point guard Thomas Satoransky , who is filling in for an injured John Wall , led the team with 10 assists . He also had seven rebounds . Off the bench , forward Kelly Oubre , Jr. delivered 19 points . Philadelphia , meanwhile , relied on its tandem of young stars . Joel Embiid was the team 's top scorer with 25 points , while Ben Simmons flirted with a triple - double . Simmons notched 16 points , eight rebounds , and eight assists in the loss . Three-point shooting proved to be the team 's biggest issue , as they went just 9 - of - 33 from beyond the arc . The team had won seven straight coming into the game , but saw its league - leading streak end with the tough loss . On Tuesday , the Wizards will visit Milwaukee while Philadelphia will travel to Miami .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Washington Wizards , 102 - 95 , at Capital_One_Arena on Friday evening . The Raptors ( 44 - 17 ) came into Friday 's contest with plenty of motivation , given that they held a razor - thin half - game lead over the Boston Celtics for the Eastern_Conference 's top spot . However , the Wizards ' ( 36 - 27 ) own postseason aspirations ensured they 'd be playing just as hard on their home floor , and accordingly , they jumped out to a 27 - 19 first - quarter lead . That early eight - point deficit seemed to wake the visitors up , as they rattled off 32 points in the second to take a 51 - 47 halftime advantage . Given the talent level and familiarity of both teams with each other , the second half was predictably hard - fought . The hosts even held an 84 - 80 lead as late with 6:14 remaining in the fourth quarter , but late free throws by both DeMar DeRozan and Fred VanVleet helped seal the victory for Toronto over the final minute - plus . The Wizards actually enjoyed a sizable 47 - 34 rebounding advantage , but turnovers helped do them in , as they committed 17 to the Raptors ' modest seven . DeRozan paced the Raptors with 23 points , a total he supplemented with four rebounds , four assists and three steals . C.J . Miles followed with a bench - leading 20 points and added one rebound , one assist , one steal and one block . Jonas Valanciunas posted 12 points and four boards . VanVleet matched Valanciunas ' scoring total on the second unit and also finished with four boards , three assists , one steal and one block . Kyle Lowry supplied 10 points , seven boards , five assists and one steal . Serge Ibaka produced a modest seven points , four rebounds and one assist . Otto Porter , Jr. 's 24 points led the Wizards , and he went on to add six rebounds , two assists and one steal . Bradley Beal tallied 23 points , seven boards and six assists . Markieff Morris poured in 15 points , hauled in five boards , recorded two blocks and logged one steal . Tomas Satoransky registered 10 points , eight assists and six rebounds , but he also was guilty of a game - high six turnovers . Marcin Gortat pitched in with an eight - point , eight - rebound effort that also included a pair of blocks and one assist . The Raptors head back home and await a Sunday evening visit from the Charlotte Hornets , while the Wizards stay put and tangle with the visiting Indiana Pacers on Sunday night as well .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the host Washington Wizards , 98 - 95 , at Verizon Center on Sunday . It 's rare to see a wire - to - wire game finish with a three - point margin , but that was just the case here . A 30 - 20 first quarter really set the foundation , as Washington could never tie or attain the lead from there . Free-throw shooting was the difference in the game , with the Pacers connecting on 22 - of - 24 and the Wizards hitting 15 - of - 19 . A 30 - 18 fourth quarter actually nearly capped off the comeback for the Wizards , as the Pacers hit a couple free - throws and got a stop to cap off the win . The Pacers ( 36 - 27 ) got a gem out of Victor Oladipo , as he tallied 33 points , seven rebounds , three assists and three steals . Myles Turner amassed 12 points , 13 rebounds and three assists . Bogdan Bogdanovic amassed 20 points , four rebounds and two steals . Cory Joseph finished with 16 points , five rebounds and two assists . The Wizards ( 36 - 28 ) were led by Bradley Beal , as he accrued 22 points , three rebounds , 11 assists and three steals . Otto Porter collected 17 points , eight rebounds and four steals . Markieff Morris accumulated 12 points , seven rebounds and two assists . On deck for Indiana is a home matchup versus the Milwaukee Bucks on Monday . As for Washington , they play host to the Miami Heat on Tuesday for their next fixture .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Miami Heat , 117 - 113 , in overtime at Capital_One_Arena on Tuesday evening . The battle between the two Eastern_Conference playoff hopefuls was expected to be a tightly contested one , and it certainly did n't disappoint in that regard . However , the first half was a bit more favorable to the Wizards ( 37 - 28 ) , which had jumped out to a 59 - 50 advantage by intermission . The Heat ( 34 - 31 ) made up some ground with a strong offensive showing in the third , racking up 30 points to head into the final 12 minutes trailing by a manageable 86 - 80 margin . The fourth period had a palpable playoff atmosphere , with both teams virtually matching each other basket for basket . A spectacular Dwyane Wade and - one with 23 seconds remaining ultimately knotted the game at 105 , and Bradley Beal , who scored a game - high 30 points , could n't find the net on his would - be game - winner at the buzzer . In the extra period , it would be Markieff Morris playing a key role late , as he sank a key free throw with 1:36 remaining and then drained a back - breaking 24 - footer from the left corner to give Washington a 113 - 109 cushion at the 1:7 mark . Although Miami would get as close as 114 - 113 following three successful free throws by Wade , three subsequent buckets from the charity stripe by Tomas Satoransky ( one ) and Kelly Oubre , Jr. ( two ) stretched the lead back to four and helped seal the win . Wade led the Heat with 22 points , a total he supplemented with six assists , two rebounds and one steal in 28 minutes . Tyler Johnson was right behind him with 21 points and added four assists , three rebounds , three steals and one block . Goran Dragic and Josh Richardson generated matching 16 - point efforts , with the former also supplying seven rebounds , five assists and one steal , and the latter registering two boards , two assists and three steals . Justise Winslow continued his recent stretch of strong play with 15 points , six rebounds , one assist and one steal . Hassan Whiteside had a quiet game , posting eight points , six rebounds , one assist and one block in 21 minutes . Beal added seven assists and six rebounds to his game - high scoring total . Satoransky accounted for 19 points , seven assists , three rebounds and one steal . Morris generated a 16 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and one steal . Oubre turned in 14 points , one rebound , one assist , two steals and one block . Otto Porter , Jr. delivered 12 points , five rebounds , five assists , one steal and one block . Marcin Gortat tallied a modest eight points , six rebounds and one assist , although he also drained a pair of key free throws in the extra period . The Heat head back home to tangle with the Philadelphia 76ers on Thursday night , while the Wizards head down to the Big Easy to do battle with the New_Orleans Pelicans in a Friday night showdown .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Indiana Pacers , 109 - 102 , at Capital_One_Arena on Saturday . The Wizards ( 40 - 30 ) and the Pacers ( 40 - 30 ) are both projected to make the playoffs this season , and both teams delivered a true battle this Saturday where the home team managed to come away with the win , but barely . Washington jumped to a 25 - 20 lead in the first quarter , and they quickly made it a 12 - point game at half time ( 57 - 45 ) . With the Wizards extending their lead again after three ( 86 - 71 ) it seemed they should n't have problems to close things out , but they were wrong . Indiana fought back and even though they won the final quarter 31 - 23 , it was n't enough and the Wizards held on for a much - needed win in front of their own crowd . The Wizards had a balanced effort offensively , as they had five players scoring in double digits but no one reaching the 20 - point mark . Bradley Beal was the top scorer with 19 points , and he also added six assists and two steals . Marcin Gortat chipped in with 18 points , eight boards and four assists . Kelly Oubre Jr. had 16 points off the bench , and Markieff Morris contributed 15 points and five boards . The Pacers had Lance Stephenson as their stop scorer , as the veteran guard came off the bench to lead the team with an impressive 25 - point , five - rebound and five - assist performance . Al Jefferson had 10 points and nine rebounds as Myles Turner 's replacement in the starting five . Victor Oladipo once again filled the stat sheet , thanks to 18 points , four rebounds , four assists and three steals .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the host Washington Wizards , 108 - 100 , at Verizon Center on Friday . The Nuggets got out to a 23 - 16 lead after the first quarter , as they led for all but two minutes after that . Free-throw shooting was the difference for Denver , as they connected on 17 - of - 18 , while Washington hit just 10 - of - 14 . Rim protection was also a huge factor , with the Nuggets recording 10 blocks and the Wizards collecting just two . Turnovers were also important , with Denver forcing 17 turnovers from Washington while committing just 10 on their end . The Nuggets ( 40 - 33 ) were led by Nikola Jokic , as he tallied 25 points , eight rebounds and five assists . Jamal Murray amassed 25 points , six rebounds , three assists and two steals . Will Barton started and accrued 23 points , seven rebounds , three assists and three blocks . The Wizards ( 40 - 32 ) were led by Bradley Beal , as he collected 24 points , four rebounds and five assists . Markieff Morris finished with 17 points , eight rebounds , five assists and two steals . Kelly Oubre Jr. led the bench with 15 points , five rebounds and two assists . On deck for Washington is a home matchup versus the New_York Knicks on Sunday . As for Denver , they return to action on Monday when they play the Philadelphia 76ers on the road .
The New_York Knicks defeated the host Washington Wizards , 101 - 97 , at Verizon Center on Sunday . There were 11 ties and 11 lead changes in this competitive matchup , as it was n't decided until the final seconds . In fact , it was within a seven - point margin for the final 20 minutes of action , as a 42 - 32 second quarter in advantage of the Knicks was the difference maker . All the statistics were extremely even , with rebounds , assists , steals . blocks and turnovers all being within two of one another . The shooting was the only real difference , with the Knicks hitting 47 percent of their shots while holding the Wizards to under 43 percent from the field . Fastbreak scoring was also huge for New_York , as they won that battle , 23 - 13 . The Knicks ( 27 - 47 ) were led by Trey Burke , as he tallied 19 points , two rebounds , three assists and three steals . Michael Beasley accrued 12 points , nine rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Enes Kanter totaled 10 points and 11 rebounds . Emmanuel Mudiay was a nice spark off the bench , providing 11 points , six rebounds and seven assists . The Wizards ( 40 - 33 ) had no player reach 15 points scored , as Bradley Beal led them with 14 points , three rebounds , two assists and two steals . Otto Porter amassed 12 points , 10 rebounds , three assists and two steals . Tomas Satoransky accumulated nine points , four rebounds , 10 assists and three steals . On deck for New_York is a road matchup versus the Charlotte Hornets on Monday . As for Washington , they play host to the San_Antonio Spurs on Tuesday for their next fixture .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 107 - 93 , at Capital_One_Arena on Saturday . The Wizards ( 42 - 34 ) and the Hornets ( 34 - 43 ) engaged in quite a battle in this one , as they went back and forth in the first half before Washington pulled away for good with a strong scoring output in the third quarter . Washington jumped ahead 30 - 27 in the first , but Charlotte won the second quarter 24 - 20 so they ended with a one - point lead at the break ( 51 - 50 ) . The big difference in this game came in the third quarter , as the Wizards established a huge 37 - 23 supremacy over that span that made it 87 - 74 after three and they never looked back afterwards . Washington won the final quarter 20 - 19 , and ended cruising their way to celebrate with a much - needed win in John Wall 's return . Otto Porter Jr. was the best player for the Wizards in this game , as he finished with 26 points , 11 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Bradley Beal chipped in with 22 points and three assists . John Wall looked a bit rusty at times , but for the most part he looked every bit of the All-Star he is and delivered a double - double of 15 points , 14 assists and three boards . Mike Scott chipped in with 15 points off the bench . Dwight Howard led the way for the Hornets with 22 points and 13 rebounds , but he could n't do everything on his own . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist and Marvin Williams each added 10 points , while Guillermo Hernangomez added 11 points off the bench . Malik Monk had 17 points off the bench as well , and Kemba Walker struggled after finishing with seven points on 3 - 9 from the field .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the host Washington Wizards , 103 - 97 , at Capital_One_Arena on Friday evening . The first quarter started off tight and featured multiple lead changes before the Wizards emerged with a one - point , 22 - 21 , lead heading into the second quarter . The Hawks started the second with a 17 - 6 run , which put them ahead 38 - 28 , mid way through the quarter . They managed to hang on to the lead , as they went into halftime with a 52 - 48 lead . The third quarter was tight the whole way , but the Hawks maintained their advantage and took an 81 - 77 lead into the final frame . The Wizards fought back in the fourth and tied it up just four minutes into the quarter . They took the lead and pushed it to a 93 - 87 advantage with 5:20 remaining . However , the Hawks took over down the stretch , as they outscored the Wizards , 16 - 4 , in the last five minutes , to take the win . Taurean Prince led the Hawks with 23 points , five assists , four rebounds and two steals , in 34 minutes . Tyler Dorsey followed up with 22 points , three rebounds , one assist and one block , in 32 minutes off the bench . Dewayne Dedmon chipped in 12 points , 14 rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block , in 31 minutes . John Collins tallied 10 points , 10 rebounds , five assists and one block . The Hawks shot 48 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 32 from long range . Meanwhile , Bradley Beal led the Wizards with 32 points , three rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block , in 40 minutes . Kelly Oubre Jr. followed up with 13 points , seven rebounds , three steals , two assists and one block , in 31 minutes . Otto Porter Jr. added 10 points , seven rebounds and two assists , in 34 minutes . The Wizards shot 40 percent from the field , including 9 - of - 25 from long range . The Wizards ( 42 - 38 ) will look to bounce back as they play host to the Celtics on Tuesday . The Hawks ( 23 - 57 ) take on the Celtics in Boston on Sunday .
